内容: Flight service has improved the last time I travelled to Israel. Food stew chicken was tasty & good range of fruits given. Crews are more alert & better than before. Seats are cleaner except no small pillows. Range of movies are fine. Though felt turbulent but flight are smooth it’s landing especially. Crew staff are quick to get passengers seated...

标题: Avoid traveling with this Airline specifically from Dubai
内容: Terrible, terrible service. I found the staff at the check in area (specially the one who checked me in) very rude and obnoxious. They talk to us like we are not customers and it feels like they are doing us a favor. I thought it was just me but when I was in the plane I heard some people with...

The service was excellent and the aircraft was clean. I felt comfortable asking for extra services throughout the flight and my requests were met with a smile.
Unfortunately Cathay doesn't have its own business class lounge in L.A. and subscribes to a multi airline lounge service. Don't bother going there. The food was awful and the restrooms were filthy. Now...

had a great flt we were most impressed with the HKG check in people free
the flt service was second to none

标题: Cathay came through when cruise delayed
内容:
We were delayed on cruise and it was impossible to make our flight! They allowed us to move our flight ahead 24 hours because they understood we had done everything possible to make the original flight but due to several unforeseen delays we couldn’t make it!
Service excellent! Best take off and landing ever! Outstanding pilot! But man the seats...

my wife is disabled , the crew assisted my wife by wheel chair to the bathroom, assisted us in hong kong to the baggage area, nothing was to much trouble. this was our 1st flight oversea would fly with them again

food was not great and customer service was pathetic.
dont want to travel with them again in future .

The flight was late leaving Barcelona and although it made up a little time into Hong Kong we had very little time to transit to our Sydney flight. With a number of other passengers also transitting to other flights we were met as we disembarked and smartly walked through the airport to catch the second flight. We appreciated the guidance....

For some reason I thought that this airline provides a descent service. I was wrong
Second flight now with this airline. Same route same poor service mostly from the ground crew in Cebu but not much better in Hong Kong
Will try to avoid this airline

标题: Wonderful if you are a frequent flier with elite status.
内容:
A short night flight of about 5 hours makes it hard to get a meal and sleep but they tried to serve food promptly.
Service is attentive if you ask. Crew do a lot of walking hurriedly up and down but help if you ask.
Biz class flat bed is good, duvet nice with no static
Very pleasant experience.
Return...

I have been flying with Cathay many times, with different in flight service experience. But the stard will always be there. Quick, fast attentive service crews, some where friendly some were not. The food is ok and entertainment is ok too. I still want to fly with Cathay Pacific.

Return flight to Tokyo via Hong Kong from London Gatwick. We had checked in on line for our outbound flight. Luggage tags and bag drop automated but the nearby staff were pleasant and helpful. Flight to HK was fine. Leg room reasonable and fairly comfortable flight. Food was terrible and drinks service sparse. Choice of movies and TV was excellent....

标题: Business as usual with a touch of excellence
内容: great check in ,fast and efficient.boarding was a bit tacky and unorganised ,on board service excellent ,great entertainment choice ,decently clean toilet but the on board food ( breakfast ) was sad ,not once but on two occasions that i flew last month. Also looks like the dinner menu ( return flight) hasn't been changed for years now ,its the...

Excellent seats, service, food and beverages. Choice of beer, wine & soft drinks with lunch.
Excellent selection of recent Movies / TV shows with good picture & sound quality.
Older version of planes, staff were friendly and service was good. Entertainment systems were old just like the plane
标签: North Asia' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Tokyo

内容:
Sitting in the middle row with no screen for privacy was very disappointing.
Staff were ok, but not as efficient as previously experienced.
Overall ok

Poor service in economy ,on a 12 hour flight they seem to put the lights out for 7 of those - not all passengers want to sleep . Food quality poor , if you need snacks in between you have to go to the galley and ask . The cabin crew are very pleasant and helpful if required . Seats...

Flight is 1.5 hours
Food was excellent
Wine is my favor one
Service was excellent
Clean and tidy
crew was delightful
lots movie selection
Too tired ate and slept all way through
Very enjoyable flight

This was our second trip on Cathay Pacific. A few years ago we flew to Australia. This time it was via Hong Kong to Xian, China. We've learned we can rely on Cathay Pacific and will choose the airline for any future trips to asia.

标题: This airline has lost a lot of prestige ..
内容:
I was so disappointed by this airline . it used to be a fabulous company . and it has lost a lot of its prestige. The premium economy was not very comfortable and the food was absolutely disgusting. it took forever to take the trays back on both trips.
I hope they are going to make a effort to regain...
I just can add my recommendation to many others. We loved the service , food , entertainment , accuracy.

Terrible food and very crowded flight
Staff was not very friendly and seemed overworked and stressed
Seemed reluctant to help other travelers when the call light was used

Cathay Pacific had always been one of our favored airlines, but after a decline several years ago, we'd been disappointed. We liked the schedule on this flight from Vancouver, BC to Hong Kong, however, and decided to give it another try. Apparently, at least on this flight, Cathay is back in the game.
Check-in was easy, ground service was courteous,...

标题: World class customer service in Vancouver
内容:
I must preface this by saying I am rarely motivated to write reviews, but the level of service I received from Cathay Pacific and their team at YVR is unmatched.
On my flight to Vancouver I visited duty free in New York, as is my custom. The item I purchased was one bottle of scotch, which I stowed in the...
Flights with Cathay Pacific is always comfortable, but this trip is particularly pleasant. Thanks to two crew members who demonstrated sincerity when interacting with passengers.

标题: Comfortable sleeping seat @ business class of Cathay Pacific
内容: A good sleeping facility for long-haul flight is very essential for starting a nice trip. I’m delighted to choose the business class of Cathay Pacific. Because of late booking, I got the last row seat. However, the single window seat with smart shell design brings me a more privacy. The seat is easy control to turn into a full flatbed....

Recently flew to Vietnam via HK with a few days stop over with Cathay having never used the airline was a bit anxious as usually use another well known airline but the minute I stepped on the plane I was greeted with warm smiles. Excellent service from all staff ,food good and seating comfortable will deff use airline again and...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Dubai - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: Flight from Singapore to Bangkok in cattle class (economy). Sat in 2nd cabin of economy class where the PRC tourists were. Boarding was fine. Not much order for economy class boarding. In flight entertainment was good. Meal service was good. Overall flight was good. PRC tourists didn't comply with or ignored seatbelt signs, sitting down when taxing, etc and flight...

Very good. The business seats were comfortable in both flight good service. Ordered vegetarian meals had a good meal
Very clean and upleep
Good service. Premium economy good but I wouldn't pay much more than economy. Seats narrow, good legroom. Toilet only on one side of cabin makes it difficult to get to.

Excellent service, right from the checkin experience, to food , transit at Hong Kong, and flight onwards. Really a service oriented airline which knows how to take care of its passengers.
Good and abundant food on board. Good entertainment options. you can select your seats in advance for most ticket types.

I was flying on BA but used the oneworld Cathay lounge at CDG. This lounge out classes and BA lounge I have been to (perhaps The Concorde lounge beats it but that’s only for passengers travelling First. Lots of space and meticulously keen and an awesome noodle bar

标题: Good flights, Non-flight customer service weak
内容: As a regular Cathay flier, my review is for overall experience, not one off. I am generally loyal to Cathay as their flight record is strong and their in flight service is good. However, they consistently lack good customer service out of the air. Their website and app are continuously down (not to mention the latest data breach) and when...
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: As always the Cathay staff are fantastic with customer service and look after you so well. The food on this flight was not very good. My meal was not nice and I was not offered any alternative although the cabin was mostly empty and there must have been spares.

Cathay is without a doubt the best international airline. When travelling with a child who took extremely ill just minutes before boarding the cabin staff could not do enough to provide care and attention. Arranged seating so he could lay stretched out.

This was the first time I had flown with Cathay Pacific and I was not terribly impressed - given the good reputation I thought they had. The flight was fine - the seats were spacious and comfortable but my problem was that I was unable to check in online. I went to check in as soon as check-in opened as...
Service on aircraft was good. Travelling with kids on cathey pacific is the right choice. Thanks to crew member of cathay pacific

Definitely defining the trend in travel. Airplane food that has taste. Comfortable seats that make a long flight survivable. Enough in flight entertainment to distract you. Thank you to the people of Cathay for making a long trip easier.

Transfer from initialBNE HKG flight with change over of 1hr 1 minutes. Longish walk with bag check and hoarding pass and passport check...no issues....arrived at appointed new gate with time for coffee and toilet. Clean the teeth break. Got onto plane. Placed bags above. And had quick meal and enjoyed the view. Newish plane. No issues with flight and baggage...

标题: Brisbane to Hong Kong Cathay Pacific
内容: 4 am flight. Booked thru travel agency and arrived at airport three hours prior and registered all our baggage initially. With baggage tags being stuck onto our baggage. Then when gates were open three hours prior to flight we had bags weighed and inserted thru X-ray machines. Went thru customs and waited for boarding. Getting onto plane the economy queue...

This flight was one of the best international flights we have experienced, this the third of our four long haul flights on this holiday, (and we have flown a few, quite a few). The Premium Economy seats were good, the service was excellent, the food was very good, (especially the Gluten Free options served to my partner - she says...

Staff were efficient and helpful. Smiling.
Cabin is clean. Food is good. On time flights. Ample amenities.

标题: Good but delays are a pain
内容: The flight on 22/9 was delayed by one hour which meant we missed our connecting flight in Hong Kong and connecting trains in London. Cathay notified us of the delay to the first flight but I had to follow up regarding the connecting flight from Hong Kong as they had not realised we would not make the connection. They did...

this flight was good - from the fact that we left very late at night,so was able to have some sleep overnight, and be reasonably refreshed for the next leg onwards to Beijing.
Both my wife and I pick late night flights - so we can also have an extra days sightseeing, before leaving on the homeward journey.

The flight was long. But, I made sure I had an aisle seat so that I could occasionally stand up and walk around a bit. The meals were so so, the crew was efficient, entertainment is usual. Nothing to complain but nothing stands out either. Seats were okay. If you want to get snacks or bowl of instant noodles they...

The service is FABULOUS. The flight attendants are constantly at your beck & call.
The food is great, and the whole experience was just much better then other airlines.
Full plane, CX service steadily deteriorating and this flight no different. Cabin crew not really interested in passengers
Two empty seats next to me so mostly slept. On time arrival and departure. Ordered special meal, non veg HIndu so nice curry

This was the first time we have gone business class and with 3 hours door to door C Norfolk to Melbourne it was worth it. The staff were helpful friendly and polite. The lounges provide everything C food, drink, showers, beds, computer spaces and comfortable chairs so the time just melts away. The flight was on time, toilets refreshed after...

For flights to Europe we have always utilised CX..we found their Premium Econ class very, very good value, very comfortable & just provided everything we required for a long journey. However this year we found a very marked difference & it wasn’t good. Syd/HKG sector, the crew couldn’t wait to get the meal served - we had to request a...

标题: Dreadful Seat, but good service from a maiily Japanese crew.
内容:
The seats on this flight were the most uncomfortable of any airline I have ever flown, in over 45 years of flying. Really hard seat, no comfort, impossible to relax or try to doze.
The Japanese flight attendants in our cabin were very sweet. Selection of English language movies was poor. I'm glad we wont be taking this flight ever...

标题: Check in at HK Station makes it easy.
内容: We checked our bags at the Hong Kong Train Station, so that made the trip to the airport much easier. Comfortable seat and reasonable service on the flight. Flight left late but arrived on time. Luggage came out in reasonable time, which is more a Melbourne Airport issue rather than a Cathay service situation. Overall a pleasant flight with enough...
Really enjoyed this flight. Service that you could not fault. Food was wonderful as well. Highly recommend this airline. Will definitely be flying Cathay again.

We were very happy with the flight on the whole. Good service, comfortable seats and nice food.
There wasn’t a huge choice English movies that interested me, but I guess that’s inevitable on an Asian airline.
We found the business lounge at the airport a bit underwhelming and quite small.
We didn’t receive the standard bottle of water on the...

We looked forward to flying Cathay Pacific. For years the name Cathay was a symbol for the best airline. I can not explain why but the service on this flight was exceptional out of line. There were enough crew members (in my unprofessional eye) but it was not working, food was borderline, a preordered vegetarian meal never found and it...

First leg of 4 business class flights to London and return.
Flight due to leave around 12.3am. Unfortunately delayed an hour, no problem we were on holidays and had time to spare.
When we eventually boarded and settled into our seat it all felt so rushed. The crew hurried around, rushing through a half completed meal service. Minimal offer of...

标题: Flight was delay from Tokyo and missed my connection flight.
内容: The food quality have dropped recently. My flight from Kuala Lumpur to HK, flight departed late due to technical issue. My return flight from Tokyo to HK was delayed and after boarding the flight took off much later because of traffic on the runway. As the result I missed my connection flight to Kuala Lumpur. I was rescheduled for a...
pleasant overall. the pier lounge in hk was ok. service onboard was very good, but the food served was often a disappointment. aircraft used and seat plan were excellent. 1-2-1 is the best in class.

I recently booked flights with Cathay Pacific for my parents and mother-in-law to visit us in Australia to spend time with their grandchildren and two newly born great-grandsons. I rang Cathay and explained they were three people in their 8s and after a call that lasted about 1-15 minutes they had organised seats together for the three of them, with...

Nice new plane with reasonable legroom but usual very narrow seats. Staff were great but formal and not super friendly but friendly enough. Meals were very good and I was surprised. Ice cream was top class.

标题: It was a nice experience but it could have been better.
内容: The trip was nice but it could have been better if the flight attendants were as welcoming enough. My overall flight was bland. It's nice because I got a whole row for myself going to Hong Kong. The inflight internet also was such a treat although I have to pay almost Php 5 ($9).

I am not sure whether it was the language difference or what but the cabin staff lacked the quality and experience of other airlines. This was a night flight departing at 1:, which was also delayed by 1 hour. The service was rushed, no bar trolly service before the meal was served, all a bit rushed. I ordered a drink...

Checking in was easy and pleasant. The meals were ordinary.
Seats were ok.
Service was just adequate, did the bare minimum..
Overall, will fly Singapore next time, as i feel they are a better airline.

Had good service checking in, on the plane though the service was pretty ordinary. I know i was flying economy but expected better.
The seats are tiny. They have reconfigured there economy section to get more seats onboard, and made there economy seats smaller. Luckily the seat next to me was free.
Will never fly economy with them again.

标题: Cathay Pacific aircraft urgently in need of refurbishment
内容: This particular aircraft was in very poor condition. I was in seat 12A. The fabric on areas of the seat was frayed. The condition of the furnishing was really poor. This aircraft should be pulled from service and be totally refurbished.

Very reliable airline. Very well organized, friendly staff. In-flight entertainment should be up-dated more frequently. Food is average. Had expected drinks before landing in HongKong form Colombo but nothing was served.

Premium economy is the most important reason we fly with CP. Other airlines do not have this service. They often offer some more space for the legs but this is in between that and business class. At least it is worth the money. This flight was well organized (as ever). Very friendly staff and quality. Only the in-flight entertainment should...

标题: Good flight but older A33 plane shows age
内容: I took the 11:5 am flight on Cathay Pacific from Bangkok to Hong Kong. I arrived at the airport about 2 1/2 hours before as I wanted to claim VAT refund. One point to note if you are claiming VAT refund is that while Cathay check-in is at Section M/N, you should asked to be dropped off at the far...

Nice quiet flight, plenty of eats and drinks. Good entertainment selection of Movies
and music. Seat belts even had airbags attached to them. Loved the icecreams and
chockies. Had to change planes at Hong Kong. then 8 hours to Perth. Luggage
went through fromTokyo. Have flown mnay times with Cathay - they never disappoint
very attentive cabin staff.

Amazing airline and friendly staff, the food was very good and the entertainment was up to date. The space in premium economy was sufficient and the staff was very considerate. The blankets and pillows were very soft and comfortable and the storage space for cabin luggage was so huge.
Will definitely use them again as they are top of the...

I dont usually fly long haul with Cathay, but my latest trip was truly worth it. The seat is lazy boy like, the section is very quiet( no crying babies during my trip), the comfort room is kept clean most of the time. The staff very polite and has soft speaking voice.The food needs some improvement( tho i asked for...

The flight was amazing,there was no drama and everything was in order.The food was served hot.My second time flying with Cathay Pacific I can't complained.But the one in Melbourne to HK and Hk to Cebu was a disaster because my luggage was broken,but the Cathay staff in the Cebu Airport reached out for me and gave a compensation about $5....

标题: Don’t trust them with a honeymoon travel
内容:
I would like to make all potential Cathay Pacific customers aware of the embarrassing and rude customer service my husband and I just received from a Cathay Pacific Customer Service Representative at the Hong Kong airport.
We are on our way back from our honeymoon which original route was from USA to Hong Kong to Bangkok. The inflight experience is...

This was a delightful flight. Plenty of leg room in the economy seats, and I was travelling with tall men (6'3"). The staff from check in, onboard and departure were all very efficient, friendly and relaxed. The on board food was very tasty and plentiful. I would definitely recommend flying International with Cathay Pacific.

标题: Cathay Pacific is the real business
内容: The service, comfort, food and wine were so good that my wife and I both had the same thought: "Wish this was a much longer flight!" Full marks to Cathay Pacific for providing such an excellent service to business users.

The experience on this flight was good. The flight was a little bit late leaving but it was because of loading delays. The seats were comfortable down towards the rear of the plane. The meals were okay. The cabin crew were helpful and polite
My first time travelling experience with Cathay Pacific was great. The flight attendants were very caring and dedicated. Counter agents were pleasant. Customer service overall was excellent.

Following the use of the excellent lounges at Hong Kong an efficient flight with good service and quality meal. Whilst short flight aircraft had lay flat seats with ample room. Good selection of films

I’m flying often from Beijing to Hong Kong and submit their online survey. I finally write on TA. Except my first flight from HK to France back to several years ago, I’m always happy with their service. They take good care of their customers and make sure they have everything they need. Today (31/1/18), Cecilia and Cindy were in charge...

标题: Quality and Service with a Smile
内容:
Endured another long flight between San Francisco and the Far East - to and from Hong Kong
Cathay Pacific came through with flying colors. Service was excellent, food was great, snacks were great, and in-flight entertainment was also great. Never felt the twelve hour flight, in either direction.
Unlike our last trip to Dubai via E______, the bathrooms on Cathay...

I often try different air line when there were different choices for the same destination. But for HKG to RGN it is sad to say there isn't much choice to make.
Cathay pacific is a good air line but when come to be on time for this rout there were way far behind the average.
In over three years of...

Two hours flight.
Hot meal, drink.
Comfortable, quick, efficient, friendly service. Professional.
Previous: Silk Air. Now: Cathay Dragon.
Parent: Cathay Pacific.

I usually only fly Singapore Airlines, I had the misfortune of flying Qantas internationally. Never again. I was apprehensive about flying Cathay. But I really can’t fault the service. It wasn’t Singapore but it was still miles ahead of Qantas. The flight attendants were attentive and the food was reasonable. I’m tall (5.7) and found the leg room ok.

We chose Cathy Pacific as we could easily arrange a suitable stop over on the way to Europe.
The return flight to Australia from Hong Kong was on one of their older B-777, but surprisingly we had more leg room than the other 3 legs. This could be because it was a smaller Premium Economy cabin.
Service was brisk and...

Yeah this was a nice surprise it was the first time on this carrier and it was great the leg room was great and this was the main reason for me as I am 6ft with long legs and thay didn’t rub on the seat in front plus the food was good and the staff were very helpful

标题: Its hard to be excited about a 14 hour flight, but it was a decent jaunt
内容: This flight had decent meals, all the staff worked hard to ensure the huge flight of people had everything they needed. Movies, blankets, food/drink anytime you wanted. But as you know, everything on all the airlines are getting smaller and smaller. Seats, room between seats. Not much you can do about it short of shelling out $$ for business or...

Traveled with a 7 year old and 7 month old on a 12 hour flight + another 3.5 hours after, we manged to have the bulkhead seats so we had plenty of room. As usual the flight attendants were very helpful and made the flight as painless as possible. Always like Cathay, especially now they have gotten rid of those...

This was the first time in Premium Economy and worth every dollar in relation to having just that little bit more leg room and recline space for the long flight, as well as nice touches such as the separate line for boardning. Service was attentive and friendly. What felt like the only slight drawbacks was that the meal service was...

i always choose Cathay Pacific when it comes to most of my flights, more so for ultra long haul. I get the perks of being their top tier frequent flier (Diamond member) from the check in experience to the first class lounge access in both Hong Kong and LAX - helps me alleviate the tediousness of a long flight. The...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - Salt Lake City

标题: Doesn't live up to its reputation
内容: The late night departure from HK was on time and the flight was full. The cabin crew as usual were well groomed and were pleasant and courteous. However, most individuals do not seem as though they enjoy what they do nor do they show their pesonality. They do the job almost like automatons. They want to get the service over...

标题: Have to increase seat pitch on longer flights
内容: Cathay does a lot of things well. Aircraft are top notch, the flight attendants are super hard working and efficient (not all that friendly but not unfriendly). This flight the food was better than last year. Not sure why but I actually ate something on board this time. Typically CX flights are on time or minor delays - this flight...

haven't flew with cathay pacific for a long long time i dont think i want to in the future, not much leg room , very small site ,i was so surprice when i push my site back the passenger told me i had my back of my chair on his knee ,so i had to pop my site up for...
Flew this sector last week and found this to be a popular route for this time of day. It was a full flight. The CX standard is always high and it is maintained on this sector.

My husband and I recently celebrated our 4th Wedding Anniversary, and treated ourselves to the “holiday of a lifetime” to Hong Kong, Australia and New Zealand. As an extra treat, we travelled Business Class which was just fabulous. We flew with Cathay Pacific and were treated like absolute royalty. Every member of the cabin crew were so attentive, efficient, friendly...

I had a connecting flight - Hong Kong International Airport - Wow - absolutely beautiful. My flight with Cathay Pacific From Hong Kong to Thailand was great. Flight wasn't very full. Great service once again. Flight was on time.
Thank you.
I really enjoyed my flight.

This was my first time flying with a different airline than Qatar Airways. I was worried due to some of the reviews I have read. Worried - All for nothing. I really enjoyed my flight. I felt comfortable and relaxed. The flight was full. Staff were friendly, kind and great service. We even got an ice cream for dessert. Seats...

Went from Heathrow to Hong Kong then on to Singapore and back excellent service great space for a 12 hour flight transfer seamless...food good ...staff very friendly ..second time with Cathay Pacific excellent

标题: They changed the seats to have less spaces!
内容: They changed the seats setting to cater more seats but the passengers have less spaces! The food is in smaller portions and no taste! They didn‘t even follow the menu that they gave out. Passengers will go with other airlines, at lease I will.

标题: The food and seats do need to improve
内容: With the increasing competitions, Cathy Pacific still haven‘t made a change! The seat are still very cram and the food is getting worse! The entertainment system are very old movies and TV series. If Cathy Pacific still don’t make any changes, they will continue loosing customers to the other competitors. Couple of my friends already changed to EVA Airlines and...

For this flight, i was lucky to get a better class. They changed my seat from economy to business class. On business class, the crew is very friendly and attentioned about you desire. The meal is also better.
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - Cebu Island

内容: Flew Perth to Shanghai via Hong Kong. We nearly had to run for the joining flight going and three hour wait coming back. Flight was good, in-house movies tends to keep me occupied so time goes reasonably quickly. Food was ok and service good. At the special I found I would highly recommend.
Have not taken a “Red Eye” flight in quite some time but this flight was great. I slept almost 8 hours of the flight. Service was great and meals very tasteful.
Staff were friendly and catered to our needs. Meals were served hot and if there was a wait they were apologetic.

Flew in two legs from LHR to Hong Kong and then on to Tokyo. Staff pleasant and attentive on both flights - food surprisingly good.
Flight very full to Hong Kong with no available spare seats. As a couple we were split up and unable to sit together as nothing available - a nice chap moved seats for us.
This was a super long flight but I am grateful that it went smoothly. The staff were amazing and the pilot flew very well keeping us updated along the way where need be
Good food, good service, stable flight, comfortable enough for a single-digit hour flight and safe too

标题: Consistently high attentive and efficient service
内容: I flew on Cathay from JFK to HKG where I changed to a Cathay Dragon flight to CCU. The entire experience was sublime. On time departure from JFK in a 777-3 ER aircraft with a 1-2-1 herring bone seating layout affording considerable privacy. Cathay Pacific uses Terminal 8 at JFK along with other One World Airlines. This is among the...

I am recent breast cancer on remission celebrating the 2nd life God has given me.?My dearest daughter had surprised me with a needed vacation after what i had been through for the past years. She sponsored my flight and she had chosen the best airline for me. Cathay Pacific has the best hospitable flight attendants. They would make you feel...

The airline crew for the NY flight were exceptionally professional, compared to the crew in shorthaul flights. They were attentive, very helpful (especially since I flew alone with my toddler daughter) and fast and efficient in their service.
I cannot say the same for flights to Manila, or Singapore, or Vietnam, which we recently had as well. Although I do...

I got to the airport almost 4 hours before my flight and unfortunatly I found mr. Anderson Lee at the check in counter: he told me that Cathay had made overbooking and I had to fly Economic (from premium economy). It was not just the bad news: it was the lack of education, no professional behaviour, no help offered (...

We hit a major problem and called the Cathay Pacific Service Team for help on the night before we were due to fly I was just amazed at such short notice just how supportive and understanding they were, its a long time since I have received such good support from such a large business to solve the issue we had...

标题: So near, yet so far from perfection
内容: At Heathrow we were met by extremely helpful staff at the check-in desk and spent a reasonably comfortable ,initial, stay in the airport lounge. But whilst our original flight was due to take off at 18:2 (for a connecting flight out of Hong Kong at 14:5 the next day), our Heathrow flight was delayed by approx 2 hours as the...

标题: Legroom & Seat size + extra charge for emergency exit!
内容:
Myself and 2 friends were of to Hong Kong and Bali for Vacation.
I must admit that the service in flight is really great and the staff are friendly.
One thing I would have to mention is the seat and legroom space. Our flight from Hong Kong to Bali (return) had ample legroom and seat width, BUT the long haul...

This was a terrific flight. Had plenty of leg room as we had row 39
The crew were so friendly and helpful. Not a full flight as we left early morning
Highly recommend

标题: Loved the Relaxation Room in Hong Kong.
内容: We had a 9 hour layover in Hong Kong before our flight home to Los Angeles and we weren't sure how to fill the time. Upon arriving in Hong Kong from Ho Chi Minh City we walked around to find our gate and noticed a sign for a Relaxation Room close to gate 23. That became our activity. There are...
标签: International' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Los Angeles

内容: I used to fly Cathay in First Class before I retired and am now in coach. This doesn't worry me - I sleep a lot on planes and use the entertainment system. I was lucky enough to have a window seat in a row of two seats to myself at a bulkhead but not near toilets or galley. The leg...

The service was outstanding, the staff were friendly and very helpful. I know it is there job to be helpful but they went further, I had a problem where it looked like another passenger who was sitting in economy had tampered with my seating area. Before I could sit they went over the area with a fine tooth comb and...
Disappointed we did not have a toilet for the use of Premium economy, which other airlines have, also service was slow. Toilets did not seem to be cleaned during the flight.

We would have thought that the extra cost for premium economy would have meant that the toilets would have been closer, not in the middle of economy, and clean. The surface areas were wiped down but when my husband lifted the seat, it was filthy. This was on all legs of our journey from Brisbane, through plane change in Hong...

I always use Cathay for my business trip to Singapore every month. This month tried the new plane of A35-1. It's a bigger size of A35-9 and catering more passengers. As stated from CX website, it should run those long haul route and surprisingly I've a chance to ride on it. Basically it's similar to A35-9 with the same format,...

Recent travel plans ruined by cancelled Cathay Pacific flights.
Not able to claim via insurance company for lost accommodation and out of pocket food expenses. They cancelled flights from Sydney to Hong Kong then New York to Hong Kong.
Apparently each plane had "technical issues", travel insurance company will not accept that reason for claim.
Very bad experience

A few days before our flight, I and my husband verified the security requirements on the Cathay Pacific website and followed the strict requirements. Upon arrival, we were detained and put in prison like criminals in Hong Kong for bringing certain items, which were placed in our luggages that were CHECKED-IN. We were very surprised to find out that we...

1th October 218 flight scheduled to depart 11:15, then announced at 15: flight cancelled, rescheduled for 11th October. Lost one days accommodation, our Travel Insurance company would not accept claim as paperwork from Cathay Pacific stated cancellation due to technical issue, insurance company will only accept mechanical issue as reason for claim.
Very poor outcome from Cathay Pacific.
We really liked the Flight - Check in was easy. Had great leg room, and the staff were fantastic. Food was good - after six weeks away it was a nice relaxing trip home.

Flying from Melbourne to Hong Kong and back was not a bad experience. Great seats, a lot of leg room (economy class), food much better than other airlines. Just a couple of downturns that make me give them just 4 stars: both flights had been delayed up to 1hour and the on plane service was a bit slow. It looked...

标题: Long Haul in Cattle Class - never a good thing!
内容:
I usually use Cathay for regional flights which is fine but rarely do long haul. I have to say that the food and service on this flight was very good. All in all it was as good as you can expect for economy!
Boarding at HK was, as usual, efficient and organised, (Silver membership helps). Chicago was another matter....seemed very...

标题: Great flight, great seats, great lounges
内容: I enjoyed my flight from Manila to Hangzhou with a stopover in Hong Kong. Firstly, departing Manila, it's much more convenient to use Terminal 3 (which Cathay Pacific uses) over the other terminals used by competitors: the traffic jams are usually less severe and check-in and other formalities are better organized. Secondly, the lounge makes a big difference because the...

After having flown Qatar, we were looking forward to experiencing Cathay b/c. What a let down, there are so many b/c seats, one actually feels rushed to eat, drink and then sleep. The food was very disappointing too. This flight was in September. I was told from 1 October 218 Cathay was improving their whole service.
What a difference, flying...

After a rather dismal flight with Cathay in 217, we decided to once more visit Hong Kong and because Cathay fly a direct flight we chose them again, this time we had a far better service and because my wife has limited vision they were very understanding and helpful, if unfortunately like us you end up sitting from rows 59...

At 15:3 hours this is another long flight. However when flying at night in a comfortable first class suite this flight is a breeze.
Staff is very accommodating and responsive to any need you might have.
Food is decent breakfast is quite well prepared.
This is the fastest way to fly comfortably to south east asia.

标题: Excellent cordial and friendly attention by the crew members
内容: Excellent service in the Business Class section with the cocoon shaped compartments with very comfortable seat that converts to a full flat bed. The food is fairly good, for plane food, with champagne and a good selection of French and California wines. The inflight entertainment was very poor, to my surprise. The airport lounge are quite basic and comfortable offering...

In September 218, we were to catch a flight from Rome to Sydney, with a transit in Hong Kong. Arriving at Rome airport, there was a very long line to book in and we found out from some other passengers, not from any airline staff, that there was a delay to the fight due to a door malfunction. We finally...

标题: A great comfortable ride, great service, friendly cabin crew
内容: Very comfortable flight - the seats were good the service was good. Friendly staff. On-time (actually slightly ahead of time on arrival). Quiet and uneventful flight, which is exactly what you want of a flight. Time to relax before getting back to the hustle bustle back home.

标题: Italian Vacation - first time with Cathay Pacific
内容:
This was the first time we had flown with Cathay and the first time in Premium economy both were pleasant experiences
The extra legroom for me was great being 193 cms it made the flight very comfortable
Good food , friendly staff, on time flights , efficient service at the terminals
All in all a very positive experience

标题: Out of control children + feckless crew = horrible flight
内容:
For over 25 years, CX has been my “go-to” airline and I would choose them even though they were a little more expensive or their schedule was not perfect.
I started to cut back after a minor airport situation and a totally unacceptable CS reply where they had the audacity to assume that I would be on another CX flight....

标题: Another amazing trip with Cathay who are 5 star with their service!
内容:
Can't rate this airline highly enough. Airbus A35 with excellent cabin crew service, food and the wine were all amazing.
Check in at London Gatwick was a breeze and although they don't have a Business Class lounge their, the wait a BAs lounge was fine.
Seat were comfortable, lie flat bed accommodate my large frame and the boarding plus disembarkation...

The flight attendants' atitude were good, food reasonable and flight smoothly. Boarding was very smooth, seat reasonably comfortable, flight entertainment update. Cabinet. Environment clean. Luggage handling at both airports were very good and smooth.

标题: Fantastic service and aircraft - shame others aren't the same!
内容:
I'll be honest straight away and admit that I only booked this flight with this carrier because I got a great online deal.
Previously, I had a nightmare with another airline who (by default) separated my entire family and had put my 9 years old daughter in between 2 strangers several rows away from the rest of the family and...

Because this was a redeye (.45am departure) I guess it's hard for the cabin crew to get the same level of enthusiasm as a morning/day flight but I found the Cathay welcome somewhat missing during boarding and pre-flight. I requested a bloody mary when drinks were brought around and got a plain tomato juice instead. Meal was served quickly and...

标题: Cared for "like a baby" with my badly sprained ankle
内容: I love this airline and they're not short of good reviews but on this Occassion, as an injured person, I had an opportunity to compare them with no less than 6 other airlines as I travelled throughout China on a 6 week work trip. Two weeks into the trip I so badly injured my ankle that I was still on...

标题: Great flight from Perth to LA
内容: Brilliant flight, great service, could not ask for anything whilst on board, Service was good from a very busy flight crew, could not fault their hard work.

Nearly a years long planning, culminated in our flights with Cathay, Sydney, Hong Kong, London and return. Having never flown Cathay before, and relying on friends comments we took the plunge.
My wife and I were pleased with their customer service from the booking November 217, and having to rebook an earlier flight, due to my son getting married, and...
Excellent flight experience staff were very good . Meals were excellent pilot kept us informed of any expected turbulence. Very comfortable.

标题: 1st Class isn’t Always Based on Just Price
内容: I travel quite a bit and mostly internationally. Out of ALL the airlines I have travelled on Cathy Pacific (& Cathy Dragon) are by far in the TOP three (3) airlines possibly in the world! When you can fly on an airline Premium Economy, no not first class, and get the 1st Class treatment (no free alcohol drinks) well that...

标题: Tokyo with a change at Hong Kong
内容:
I found Cathay Pacific a very efficient airline in all areas of their business.
I have no complaints, everything went smoothly, they are a very creditable service provider. Hong Kong should be proud of them.

标题: Cathay’s customer service has been disappointing gradually
内容: When we purchased the ticket, we choose to buy economy with upgrade option so we can use our points to upgrade our flights. However, Cathay won’t even allow the upgrade with points whatsoever bcs the ticket was purchased via Qantas. We used Qantas point to upgrade both ways, but not Cathay. It is sending us to fly more with Qantas...

标题: Four flights to and from Australia
内容: When you fly economic you cannot expect to be treated like 1st class passangers. I flew Eco. The service was very good. The food good. The selection of films and in flight entertainement was good.

Last minute rushed trip to China. Used Cathay Pacific and was not disappointed. Slept a solid 8 hours out of 14 flying. Clearly something was very right. I rarely sleep more than 5 or 6 hours on these long haul trips. Food was ok, but wine was good. Service with a smile for sure and yet never too familiar or...

Ive had better airline flying in to hkg.
CX was delayed fr 7hrs prior to our arrival in SIN airport...sucks!! And they told us its bcos the captain is sick... so the nxt best choice we have to wait for another captain who flew in frm hkg.
Dont think i will be taking CX again.

标题: To Cambodia and back from Vietnam
内容: Fabulous airline especially in Premium Economy. From the food to the legroom, this airline was just top notch and was probably only beaten by Air New Zealand in terms of our favourite airline. The only downfall with our trip was the attitude of ground staff at Hong Kong Airport which resulted in us missing our direct connection.

For my Hong Kong trip this year, i chose Cathey Pacific, obviously for the region i am flying to. Being a tall (6' 2") person, asked the checkin person (reached at the counter 3 hours prior) to give the seat that has some leg room. He didn't pay any head. Leg room was even smaller than the domestic flight. After...

标题: Economy is not fit for western people.
内容: The plane we were in looked pretty new from the inside, good, large touchscreen, clean fresh coating on the seats. But the width is on the narrow side to say the least, forcing everyone over 175 cm to sit up straight the entire trip. If you are around 185 cm, like me, your knees are pressing into seat in front...

标题: CONSIDER ONE OF THE TOP CHOICE OF AIRLINES BY TRAVELLER
内容:
Has been supporting Cathay Since more than 15 years ago and have never regretted on their service at all levels but of course there are minor issues here and there with the service level of flight attendants.
Overall an airline to be considered for better flight service, leg room and especially food menu.
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - Kuala Lumpur

内容:
Had been hearing about this airlines for years and this was my first chance to fly and the experience was memorable.
In my return leg the flight from Manila to Hong Kkng was delayed due to heavy rain in Manila and the connecting flight missed but the airline provided excellent accommodation and flight the next day and had an opportunity...

As it happened, there was a friend on the same flight and thanks to a fellow passenger we were able to sit together in the middle section. The cabin staff gave us an excellent service, as you would expect, but gave just a little more. They enlarged the table which allowed us to have our dinner together in one of...

Having flown to from London to Singapore on BA (using Avios points) we found it only marginally more expensive to fly back from HK in Premium Economy due to the reduced local taxes applicable to Cathay in HK.
Premium Economy is worth it. Bigger, wider seats and good sleeping angle, great entertainment selection, nice & friendly staff who don't give...
Cathay is very professional, with a high level of customer service, the lounge is the best I know of, we always feel great after flying with Cathay. Superb airline with very competitive rates

标题: Toilets were never cleaned and ended up putrid
内容: Premium economy passengers have to use economy toilets. Sorry I don’t get it. If they were cleaned and half humanly useable I wouldn’t have a problem. They were as disgusting as they could be. I will never fly Cathay Pacific again. Dry wretching and verging on vomiting is not part of the package.

I like the Leg room of this Airlines; Friendly Staff very accommodating. Individual
Monitor is a plus factor. The seats were comfortable.

标题: Got the short stick with Cathay!
内容: I flew Cathay from Hong Kong to Singapore and as the flight is about 4 hours I thought it would be a good idea to book a seat with extra legroom, at an extra cost of 5 Euro. It turned out that I was placed on an exit seat (59K, on an A33-3) right next to the door. Of course...

The older style seats on the 777 are still great as they are lie flat and even tall people can stretch right out. The food was delicious and the crew efficient. Our bags came off quickly with the priority tags.

This was our first time in Cathay’s premium economy and we would do it again. The seats were comfy and we liked the last row of this cabin as you got 2 full windows. The food was amazing. Better than qantas business...

标题: Awesome airline and air service - seat selection for economy class sucks!
内容: I've always liked this airline, both for its in-air service and the nice cabin and amenities on the plane. However I have two major gripes with them. One, the boarding process is a bit of a disaster. There doesn't seem to be any organization of who to board first. It seems like economy class all board together like cattle. second,...

标题: The BEST airline I have EVER Flown!!!!!
内容: This flight was another great one by Cathay Pacific. They are the best, especially in the One World Alliance. I love them much more than JAL and there food and service are second to none!!!! If they were domestic here in the USA I would fly them every week!!!.. Top Notch!!!!!!!!! I love everything about them!!!!!!!!!

标题: First time with this airline they impressed me
内容: Nice flight in economy, clean and nice crew. Good entertainment system and good food. I was re-routed on this flight due that my original flight was cancelled. SAS bought a ticket on another flight for me so that the delay would be a minimum great of them for doing so.

So it started in melbourne where people had waited up to two hours to be at the head of a queue only to find a laughing attendant saying at the last minute well everybody just make a run for it then the staff seem to be tired and stressed out and not obliging at all the food was lukewarm and...

The lost our luggage. All our newly brought clothes and gifts from London lost. They promise to find and deliver in 24 hours, let's see. We were not the only ones, it seems the luggage was lost during the transit in HK . Apparently our luggage never made the HK to Manila leg of our journey so they let us...

My flight from Vancouver to Hong Kong was relatively uneventful.
We arrived ahead of schedule landing at 6:5 pm instead of 7:15 pm. I can’t say I was a happy camper boarding. Our flight was full, and we were jam packed like sardines. I purposely selected aisle seats for my aunt and I to be in close vicinity. A couple...
Cx was a lot better a few years ago, but service is just worsening. A slight 1 hour delay but everything else is great.

标题: Great airline with a great customer service
内容: I have used Cathay Pacific may times because it's a really good airline. So far I never needed to call their customer service. But with my last booking I made a big mistake. So I called their customer service. Where European airlines are often considered uncooperative and costly, the representative of Cathay Pacific was very polite and even managed to...

We always travel on CX within Asian region and to Europe as the service is still the best compare to other airlines. We flew on First Class this time though usually on Business, the crew was excellent especially Dan and Edward who were serving us, their service was prompt, professional yet friendly. We were give a set of PJ from...

Flight delayed more than 9 minutes. Stuck 5 hours in airport. I hear that airlines in Asia struggle with being on time. Seems to be true in this case. I may change this review after the flight depending on experience. Also my connecting flight was changed without any email or text advice. Only knew at the bag check in counter....

This was my first return flight with Cathay Pacific and I can see why they are rated as one of the best in the world.
The only negative on the flight was related to a passenger being disruptive during the overnight flight while people were trying to sleep.

标题: First Time on this Hong Kong Airline
内容: We flew from LA to Jakarta and Yangon to LA (both through Hong Kong) with premium economy seats. The planes were clean and fresh. The service was attentive. The seats were comfortable and in a special cabin.

I can still remember the name of one of the flight attendants from that day, which to me, is a nice sign of great and kind service. Trixy was her name and maybe you will fly with her one day. The food was outstanding. I had a beef cheek dish, which I was leary of because of the name and...
标签: International' 'First Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Pleasant, but not a proper PE experience
内容: Lovely, bright, new and modern aircraft, comfortable seats, great daytime views, and good IFE. In-flight service very disappointing (small bottle of water and a hot savoury pastry) and the same as served in economy. Cabin service lacklustre.

标题: Economy experience is quite a good ride
内容:
I have travelled to London from Sydney on several occassions, but this time via Hong Kong both ways using Cathay Pacific. A stop over in Hong Kong both coming and going breaks the 22 hour trip into two more comfortable flights each way. This journey was seamless with Cathay Pacific, and the price was very good, comparitivly speaking.
I would...
Flight was late leaving, but this was not a problem. Flight was smooth, Food was good and service was excellent..

标题: Very Reasonably Priced Flight, Attentive Service, Great Time
内容:
I enjoyed this flight, the time leaving Hong Kong was 12.45 arriving in Brisbane 23.2. It allowed for a relaxing flight but not depriving of any sleep.
The Airline lounge was very nice and a generous 4Kg of luggage was allowed.
My only complaint was having to ask for water as no bottled water was provided.
I do understand this...

标题: Cathay Pacific (Perth) sets the bar high
内容: I recently flew from Perth to Hong Kong (return) on Cathay Pacific in Economy class. From the very friendly check-in experience to the onboard experience - seat comfort, food, entertainment - the flight was really enjoyable. The new Airbus A35 is lovely & the seats are certainly a bit bigger & more comfortable. Thank you Cathay Pacific, I look forward...

标题: Business Class on Cathay Pacific an experience never to forget, incredible!
内容: As part of our trip to Europe for an APT Rhine River cruise, we paid a small amount for an upgrade to Europe and return. Our first leg from Sydney to Hong Kong was on Cathay Pacific airlines flight CX 162. We were allocated the front and second row in Business Class on a Boeing 777-3 for the flight! From...

Got an upgrade to Business from Premium. A real bonus as we couldn't get it as flight was sold out when we made our reservation.
Food excellent and service top class, thankyou.

Check in at Heathrow was hopeless Huge que and staff standing around talking rather than manning the check in stations and no option of check in own bags given. Then told second flight (Honk Kong-Sydney) overbooked and they were going to put us on another flight from Hong Kong to Sydney at an earlier time- we had already booked an...

A very disappointing experience with CP. I booked a Premium Economy seat from Sydney to London and from Frankfurt to Sydney. On three flights I could not recline my seat without any help. I needed assitance from the crew to push my seat into a reclining position.
In the first row the legrest would not fully recline under my seat...

I took the first flight of the day therefore it is expected that flight would leave on time, gladly it did. It's a very short trip from Manila to HKG and all I can say is about their food. I expected more from a full service airline, I understand the sandwich/croissant part but to be given just water was a...

Always been told that CP were good and yes they are
The flight was comfortable, the staff were friendly, the seats were very agreeable
The food was surprisingly good and I have never seen my daughter clear her food on a plane and she still raves on about the seafood pasta
Made sure that we fly with CP next year...

While the interior is already a bit dated, the service, the friendliness has remained the same. Food is good, you can clearly see that here and there some savings are being made, but it is still more than acceptable. Compared to eg LH it is a no brainer on the same route, also price wise.

I have been travelling in Cathay Pacific for years now and for the past one year Cathay is always delayed by hours in departure. Cathay Pacific management should look into this. I had to wait for more than 3.5 hours at airport in my two recent trips. Apart from this Cathay is always a best airline.

标题: Indifferent service on Colombo Hong Kong Business class sector
内容: The flight from Colombo to Hong Kong - we were enrolee to Seoul - in business class was not at all busy. Yet the service was indifferent and a poor reflection of the airline. It must ne the only business class service that did not know what a cognac meant! Disappointing.

标题: No WiFi in long haul business class flights
内容: I had written earlier about Cathay Pacific's poor food and services in our round-trip, Singapore-Toronto-Singapore business class flights in mid-October. Now I just want to add another complaint. How could a real international airlines not offer WiFi in its business class for long-haul flights?! People traveling in business class are mostly on working trips. Yet Cathay Pacific makes the dumbest...

The aircraft was comfortable and the entertainment selection was on par with the better airlines servicing the business class traveler. However, I have noticed a significant decline in the quality of food on Cathay Pacific. This is disappointing considering that CX has usually been in the top 1 Airlines. Hopefully the F&B management will take note and improvements will be...

We flew over and the only complaint was that the food was horrible. BUT flying back home into Sydney was the most upsetting, we were to depart at 11.55 pm on Friday night, after sitting on plane for 2 minutes we were advised that there was an electrical problem and the flight was delayed to get it fixed, should only...

Our expectations were high given the reputation of Cathay, but alas the service, food and entertainment were a long way short of Emirates. The A35 is a beautiful aircraft but we didn’t like the layout of Business Class pods. My wife and I are average height but found it difficult to get comfortable due to the 45 degree angle of...

标题: Very mediocre for Premium economy Australia to Vancouver
内容: As a prior international flyer of Cathay it was disappointing the 'plane desperately needed internal refurbishment. For the first time, the food was borderline inedible; the airconditioning was far too hot and couldn't be changed, the tray table was damaged and wouldn't sit flat etc.. etc. At least the legroom was good and as promised. There was nothing once seated...

This is good flight for for South-East ASIA Zone Travel.
in flight food and service is good, i found them running on schedule ... which is good for business trip.
in flight entertainment is not very good... hence no other option than sleeping :)

标题: Service has deteriorated big time. Very disappointed.
内容: I needed wheelchair assistance getting to the gate, but staff said wheelchairs only become available one hour before the flight. After a long wait and less than an hour before flight time, still no wheelchair service, causing me a lot of stress. Inflight food quality has deteriorated, and so has meal service. Premium Economy seats were forward of the aircraft...

As a first time customer with Cathay Pacific, I was pleasantly surprised. After a very long layover in Hong Kong airport, it was a pure delight to finally board my Cathay Pacific flight to Brisbane via Cairns. We were informed by the captain of a delay once on board and at all times he kept us informed of the situation....

We left for Hong Kong at 1hrs, so after settling in we attempted to sleep for the 9 hour flight. The seats are very thin so you feel the person behind you reaching into the seat pocket, which is annoying, but apart form that, it was a lovely flight. Staff were lovely.

标题: A once premier airlines going one-way down hill
内容: My wife and I bought round-trip business class tickets for the Singapore-Toronto visit (via Hong Kong) in mid October. When one paid more than S$1, per ticket, one had the right to expect impeccable service and superior amenities. But what a lousy disappointment from an once revered premier airlines! Both planes for the round-trips were antiquated. For the entire business...

We had a mediocre experience with our mixed business & vacation trip to the Far East.
On our return, the plane was old and some of the technology (TV, seat recliner) were not working well. Food on both legs of our journey was sub-par. And, when we landed, we were not allowed to enter the first and business class cabins...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Flew 8th October 218 and I was very excited to be on there new a35 I've mostly been on middle East airlines and find them faultless , I'd always believed Cathay Pacific to be a top five star airline but here's the but on the Dublin to HKG flight The most unprofessional and uncurtious rude arogant flight crew I've ever...

I was not impressed at all by my 2 flights -- Paris/Honk-Kong Honk/Kong Cairns.
The first one was ok. Most of the cabin crew was a bit rude though.
Also this might sound like a small detail, but this is the first time I am asked to put my sit back in long haul aircrafts each time the passenger behind...

I travelled to Nepal three times with Cathy Pacific and was very happy with the airline's service each time. The one way journey is about 9 hours between Sydney and Hong Kong and then another 4-5 hours between Hong Kong and Kathmandu. My flight always arrived in Hong Kong on time to give me plenty of time for my next...
Not as good as previously. Cursory service of a hot pastry and a bottle of water on a 2.5 hour flight. No other refreshments or service offered. Aircraft was at least modern and spacious.

My mother in law was denied blankets because there are "no blankets" available for "short trips". Strangely business class passengers can request warm blankets?!
I understand that we have to pay a lot more for the comfort of blankets. I mean this is just business. Us, less privileged passengers, should just suck it up and endure the cold.
I hope...

Usually fly further towards the front of the plane but only Economy was available.
The Economy-class service was superb. Looked as though there were a couple of attendants short but the others rushed and worked harder. Always a smile.
Cathay is hard to beat for service.
A certain international carrier based in Frankfurt Germany should take a leaf from Cathay’s...

I had been told that Cathay Business class flights were very good, it was good but not as high as my expectations! The flight was smooth and more or less on time it was the service that was slightly disappointing in comparison with some of the other airlines on similar routes I have flown. It may have been the stewardess...

First time by this carrier. We found it very good. We were on our way to Vancouver via Hong Kong. As we were aware a long flight. Staff were very attentive and we have not experienced any much better. The transfer at Hong Kong on both to and from were seamless.
seat 47C should be proposed not to be occupied, because other passengers stand in toilet area, will hit the seat even touch my shoulder. I can't sleep comfortably.
It was ok. I dont find it the most rewarding airline. It was ok to fly with them but I dont like the airport in Hongkong too much walking. Customer service is ok . Food is ok.

We checked in at the Hong Kong Central railway station a facility offered to Cathay Pacific passengers who are travelling to the airport by train, great service saves lugging bags onto the train and off again at the airport.
The flight was thirteen hours, morning departure, we were travelling in economy. We had booked our seats but had great difficulty...

I flew business class from Hong Kong to Denpasar and vice versa. Staff were friendly and attentive. The food was pretty good. There was ample leg room and seat space. The most notable complaint I had was that the pillow case and fabric to the seat were quite rough and unpleasant when coming in contact with skin. The temperature in...

I flew the airline’s nonstop route from Dulles to Hong Kong on business class. My experience with business class with other airlines is limited but based on that, I must admit I was a bit disappointed. The crew was always polite, friendly, and attentive. On the way to Hong Kong, I had a seat in the middle of the cabin...

标题: Hong Kong to Washington, DC - Long and Comfortable
内容: Returned from a Viking River Cruise holiday to Thailand, Cambodia and Vietnam after 3 weeks. This was leg 2 after a hop from Hanoi and was delighted. This route is new as was our A35-1 and I can't say enough positive things. Service, food and personal space were all top notch for the price. Seats were roomier than US domestic...

标题: Very friendly and attlentive flight attendance
内容:
Flight attendance was very friendly and attentive,
Food was not good except for the ice cream with limited selection. Leg room was great because at front row otherwise very tight.
CX has put in premium economy but is basically a rip off with slightly bigger space but food is the same as regular economy and legroom still not sufficient. Would...

标题: A long flight, but worth it1
内容: I left on a late night departure from Hong Kong on a 12 month old Airbus A35-9 on a muggy HK night, mentally prepared for another overnight flight. Within about 1 minutes of getting up into the air, a late dinner service started. That's nice, BUT it's now well after 1am! I've been on the go all day i the...

标题: Check in left no seat choice
内容:
Cathay is a preferred airline. The service is excellent - better almost when compared to Air Canada - business class that I travelled YYZ-HKG inMarch except for the space.
But when I tried to check in 24 hours before the flight there were only 2 seats available together in the whole plane YYZ HKG. At least with AC I was...

Flight was comfortable with staff attentative and friendly. We had no trouble booking in and enjoyed the experience, the food served was average and I would not say one of the greatest inflight meals I have had. We had a 3 day stop over in Hong Kong to break up the flight time. Our only note was that you still...

Flight from Chennai to HK had a 3 mins delay so i lost the connecting flight from HK to Tokyo just for 15 mins (Lufthansa in this case wait for the incoming passengers to arrive). So I had to wait the next next flight for 7 hours. In HK airport I was asking if there’s any other solution to reach...
for a short trip, it was a pleasant one. the plane was clean, sufficient legroom, fair food, good crew

Beginning in November 217 through October 218, approximately 11 months, the CX Business Lounges in HKG [Hong Kong] and BKK [Bangkok] are experiencing major IT issues.
HKIA-CX The Pier, Business Flagship Lounge
During this time, 5% of computers lacked internet access and/or working printers.
BKK-CX Business Lounge
During this time, 66% computers lacked internet access and/or working printers.
The response...

Having flown with various airlines over time, we now only fly with Cathay Pacific. In flight service outstanding with the flight attendants always being of good cheer.
Food is always pleasant and Cathay always. by and large, runs to time.
I recommend Cathay Pacific as the airline that tops them all.

标题: Excellent staff who bend over backwards to help, whichever class
内容: When I checked in, t wanted an earlier flight, and the lovely Cathay guy who helped me got me exactly that. He was a shining example of how good the staff are. This must be quite a stressful industry in which to work, but the service is pretty exemplary. My one disappointment with Cathay is that they seem to be...

标题: Poor customer service at the gate with ground staff
内容: Travelled with husband and 2 kids (aged 5 and 6). Since my husband travels for work, he joined Marco Polo club (green level) which allows him to be part of the priority boarding line. A family travelling together, my husband organised our whole family in the line with him. We had been able to do this on the 3 previous...

Very relaxing flight from Hong long to London, however food and hardware quality can be improved. Cathay Pacific business class used to be among the best in the industry, but competitor continuously improves while Cathay Pacific is satisfied with the existing state of affairs and reluctant to move forward. By all means, Cathay Pacific will always be my choice of...

My mother and I flew from London Heathrow to Jakarta, Indonesia, via HK, on Oct 9 and we landed on Oct 1 at 17:15 in HK. We had requested wheelchair assistance upon check-in to final destination,Jakarta, Indonesia. However,none of the wheelchair assistance came after being told to wait for almost an hour after landing. 标题: Fantastic departure lounge at LHR, attentive staff and comfortable seat
内容:
Special mention re the CX lounge at LHR T3 - it's newly refurbished and has great food, especially at the noodle bar. Cathay's customer service on flights (no matter which class) is always fantastic.
The only let down I would say is the selection of movies is not as good as other airlines but other than that minor point, it's...

Did the late Friday night flight! Left on time! Meal arrived promptly. Very tasty and hot with menu handed out with some selection choices. Quiet flight so able to sleep. But omg when the seat in front of you goes back brutal! Sure wish airlines would reconsider this. Passenger got mad when we had to get up to use bathroom...

The food and seat are good but always deeply disappointed with the flight attendants of Cathay Pacific. My second last time was with CX893. The male flight attendant yelled at me very rudely several seats away from me because I fell asleep and did not hear the notice of erecting the seat. He could have come to me and just...

The flight itself was fine (as were all the others we took with Cathay on our return trip to China). Clean aircraft, good service, decent food, varied entertainment. Easy transfers in HKG and smooth boarding / off-boarding. Only complaint would be check-in at Brisbane airport, it takes the format of a budget airline with kiosk check-in but when travelling with...

Cathy Pacific to Amsterdam and return to Brisbane was a trouble free trip. Service was excellent and the food was tasty and served promptly and pleasantly. The seats were very comfortable and the extra space was well received .Flying is the one time I really like to catch up on new movies, I found the on board entertainment was a...

Yes I have posted before but I gave them another chance as they "promised' me I would definitely be sitting next to my wife and they sent me a special email with registered seats...... well what do you reckon.
Arrive HK and go to board and we are in different rows .....they had managed to change them whilst enroute from...

B-KPZ is getting old. There is a part of edge is fixed with adhesive tape at the side of flat bed seat.
A35 is definitely better than 777 indeed. Quality of services are maintained with no surprise. The inflight food is on average. All in all, I still can enjoy the asian hospitality.

Took an overnight flight to HK from Gatwick, as it is rather closer to us than Heathrow. Technology is being introduced to the checkin/ bagdrop process, but it wasn't all working and as it was the first time printing our own luggage labels, somewhat confusing. However, we got through quite quickly. We by no means the first to reach the...

标题: Yeti. Safe. Pleasant. World class pilots. Delays in rainy season but it’s handled well & is for everyone’s safety.
内容: Flew on Yeti to & from Pokhara ~ and I booked a flight to Jomsom that I never made (weather) and they refunded that quickly & easily. We were in Nepal during rainy season so there were regular flight delays all around but we were always communicated with & we knew it was about safety. Pokhara airport has a nice...

Leg room is bad so am paying extra for better leg room. There had been better airlines but I am stuck because of my frequent flier miles. Don't like the fact also that there are fewer airline partners in their frequent flier program. Looking for better alternatives.
Could have been better, for premium economy I have traveled in much more spacious seats. Food 3 out of 1, in-flight entertainment 4 out of 1, it all felt a bit dated

The cabin crew were very friendly and helpful. A vast amount of good watchable films and TV shows. Food not bad I went safe with English breakfast but the dinner Chinese fish was really tasty. I'm 6ft 4ins and the legroom was comfortable. Overall the 11 hour flight went really quick. The transfer on Cathay dragon to Phuket from Hong...

标题: what flying should always be like
内容: Flew NYC/JFK to Hong Kong and onward to Kuala Lumpur. Traveling with Cathay is the way flying should always be, especially for a 15-hour flight. The food was excellent, offering Western and Asian choices, with ice cream for dessert. Snacks/drinks, including beer/wine/gin/whisky, were readily available throughout the flights. There were tons of movies and music cds to choose from, a...
Amazing service and staff, highly recommend Cathay Pacific. The food on board was great with great choices. Very comfortable and relaxing flight.

标题: Not a patch on Air New Zealand
内容: We travel Premium Economy whenever we can and can say that Cathay Pacific Premium Economy is average at best. The seats aren't very comfortable, the staff are friendly but not attentive. The food is quite tasty but the presentation is no different to Economy. The entertainment system is, I think, the worst of any airline that we have flown with....

Return flights were pleasant. My mom was wheelchair bound so the ground crew from Singapore Changi Airport was very helpful to looked for us in the transit terminal and walked us to the boarding gate. He pushed her to the aircraft door. Although the experience from Bangkok airport wasn't as good as the assistant we had to assist with wheelchair...

标题: A Full Service Airline With Exceptional Service
内容:
This review is about Cathay Pacific Flight CX926 departing Cebu for Hong Kong. This flight leaves at around 8 in the evening and arrives in Hong Kong at around past 1pm.
One tip I can give: pre-order a special meal instead of the standard meal. That way, you will be served first and your food is guaranteed warm.
This flight...

All I can say was that my travel with Cathay Pacific Internationally was great. It was a long flight but I had enough leg room and I loved the beverages served. They were comfortable so although we flew a long time, I was not uncomfortable because of my seat. We had movies and wifi and I was happy. I recommend...
Excellent from start to finish. Very comfortable seats, excellent food / drinks, made to feel special.

标题: On time but in an aging aircraft
内容:
Punctual and helpful service was the norm. But I could not notice the CP has not updated some of the interior for some considerable time. Some USB sockets, power points and audio jack were not working.
Try not to ask for vegan or vegetarian food if you can!

标题: Great Airline !!! On-Time and Top Level Service
内容: This was our 3rd 75 mile non-stop trip with Cathay Pacific. In 216 they upgraded us from Prem. Economy to Business Class and it was the best service we've ever experienced. We've had two other 7,5+ mile flights in Prem. Economy and found it great. Food was good, Cabin service was top notch and the all the flights left and...

This was my first flight with Cathay Pacific and I had heard quite good reviews however was a bit disappointed with the service staff. We traveled September 218 from Rome to Hong Kong. I pre-purchased "extra leg room because we wanted extra space for the long flight but unfortunately only booked one seat. So we then asked for the extra...
Flight time didn't seem to affect their service. A goon one offered drinks, others never, didn't check the toilet. Overall, service was poor.

It was my first time flying with Cathay Pacific. While overall it was OK, I missed the basic necessities for long flights that are usually made available by some other airlines such as toothpaste and tooth brush. Meals also come without the usual supplies of salt and pepper. I know I could always ask but it would have been better...

Cathay Pacific CX829 We traveled on August 28 218 from Toronto to Hong Kong. I pre purchased "extra leg room because two of the three in our group are very long legged. We had the emergency door row and than heavens for that. I couldn't believe how narrow the seats were. Despite being tall, we are all slim. The seats...

标题: There are better choices out there for paid air tickets
内容:
Unpleasant flight to and from London Gatwick. Long story short, if I have to pay $ for the tickets, it won’t be CX for sure.
Start from the HK lounge, the Deck. Worst ever lounge I have ever been. It was dark and the food choice was disappointing. Simply not enough seats and the so-called resting area with sofas is...

Staff were very friendly and helpful all the time and worked very hard onboard. This flight was a very long one and we had to take another flight from HKG back home. Seats not comfortable at all as head bends forward when you sit. Flight was full and we had seats in the plane’s tail not a good one. Food...

Before I even departed the flight was delayed for a day. I had great expectations of the airline but was horribly disappointed. The food was awful, the staff do not top you up with refreshments during the flight unless you ask for it. The on board entertainment will limited - would never do this airline again.

It was 3 of us traveling to Beijing. The flight was excellent, flight attendants are friendly and very helpful, seats were good, food was really good and very abundant, movies entertainment were excellent.
Really enjoyed Cathay Pacific airlines. Very great customer service.
I would fly Cathay Pacific again.

标题: The best way to travel halfway around the world.
内容: It’s expensive to fly business class & I only fly business on epic flights like this. I’m usually in coach & it’s awesome BUT when one is flying in and out of days for hours and hours and hours & with a kid in tow - I splurge. You can sleep a lot on these flights - you are given...

标题: Not many crew members & broken seat
内容:
After finally getting the attention of the steward I was moved to a different seat quite a few aisles back with not as much room. Then did not receive my special diet meal.
I was not impressed

Easy check-in friendly staff. Flight really good crew very attentive food and service was better than on most airlines I have flown on in economy.
Inflight entertainment as well on a short flight.

I recently flew on the Cathay Pacific A35 9 in economy class from Manila to Hong Kong.
The Economy suites what some of the better economy sites I have flying on through app hundreds of flights. The seats where comfortable and off of plenty of legroom, end they was a good site design with pockets and 2 different tables on...
