After having flown few of the middle eastern and couple of airlines from the west in recent years, I had high hopes for Cathay economy during a business trip to Beijing via Hong Kong. It started with a bit of surprise when we boarded the flight around 1 am. The lights were switched off after being air borne - no...

标题: Not so good on regional business seat
内容: Regional business class seat was always my last choice for business class on Cathay Pacific. Those seats are out of date and need to be change asap. Overall the service and food recover the cons of the seats.

标题: High quality airline with tricky frequent flyer program
内容: CX is a very well organized airline with high quality service, although the biz clsss food is not as tasty as before. The cabin attendent speaks English, Cantonese and Mandarin, convenient for passengers. Facilities get a little bit old but well maintained, flat bed and good movies. Only their frequent flyer program is different from other airlines. Before you become...

An excellent flight with an outstanding cabin crew who achieve very high standards. My return flight from Hong Kong to London Heathrow is also with this airline. The aircraft a Boeing 777-3 was clean, and the cabin appeared to be well maintained. The flight an afternoon/evening was pleasant with a very good selection of entertainment, the service was excellent. In...

(1) It was delayed for the day i traveled
(2) Poor management of hand carry luggage (too many passengers taking large hand carry luggage onto the flight)
(3) Uncomfortable seat and extremely limited legroom (it was a 14 hours flight! The condition of the seat was poor)
(4) I will choose CX in the future for short trips only. It...

The plane was new, the service was excellent, the seats were comfortable and the flight attendants were the best.
We had our own private compartment, and the flight attendants did everything possible to make the experience good.

Flew a Premium Econ/Business return through redemption. Only a short haul flight, but it was very enjoyable. I did find the cabins on both flights to have slightly more wear and tear than I would expect given the age of the aircraft.
Food, and ife was good on both flights. Flight attendants were more professional than friendly, but nothing was...

Super flight
Good size seats
Decent food and drinks
Pleasant staff and modern plane
Enjoyed thoroughly

The staff were great ,the plane we were on on both flights were old the seating not good the entertainment very old and the screens very small.The food was ok just that nothing more .We would fly again with them as they do have newer planes.The wait in Hong Kong over 6 hours going out very bad

标题: Perth to vancouver and Nyc to Perth.
内容: I found the toilets unclean, floors wet. food was underwhelming , best was the Hongkong to Perth leg. The headset on two occasions was useless couldn't hear the sound properly had to ask for new set which didn't make much difference.

Took a flight from Boston to Singapore via Hongkong. It was a very Long flight but thank goodness the service on CX on both sector were very good. They were friendly and also hardworking. Generally the aircraft was well cleaned and food was quite good.. I would fly using CX if I have to go to Boston again. Thank you.....
This airlines is sooo bad... they have trouble all crew from pilot etc, until they can’t flying n they moved us to emirates , all passengers on that flight

I took the red eye from Newark to Hong Kong. I suggest you put the blanket in overhead storage. The business lounge in Hong Kong was great. Several food stations with lots to choose from as well as a bar. Lots of seperate sitting areas as well as a dimly lit are with lie down beds.

Bought round ticket from Korea to Taiwan during the pick season in half price of what market asked for. Not a good meal, not a super great service but no complain for the good ticket price that I paid gor.

We choose this airline because it was a lot cheaper. We noticed that the picture of the legs rests is not what you get in most seats. We had an exit row for our first section of the journey which gave an extended leg rest but the second plane did not provide this. We asked for gluten free food for...

标题: The 3 4 3 configuration on the 777 is not nice!
内容: I found the seat to be very narrow and the legroom to be cramped. The new screen was great... its like being in a cinema... when its an inch from your face. I much prefer the 3 3 3 configuration in the A35 so check what you will get before you book!!!! My flight to london was not a very...

The trip to Hong Kong was fantastic. We had great fun and the champagne was superb...
This is a classy airlines and the people are fantastic...

Flew to HKG for a quick business trip on daytime flights, in Cathay Pacific's premium economy class. We were both Marco Polo club silver members, we were able to use the dedicated check in and the lounge. We had the front row/bulk head seats in the cabin, they are quite roomy and comfortable, much better than the rows behind it....

San Diego to LAX via partner airline American; Los Angeles to Hong Kong; Hong Kong to Delhi. Our first time flying Cathay Pacific, and we were quite satisfied. The level of service both at the airports and on board the airplane was quite good. New planes; gracious flight attendants; good food included in the fare; Premium Economy is comfortable -...

There was a typhoon approaching Bangkok and so our flight was delayed by 2 hour. Luckily I was still at home when I saw the delay and so I didn't rush to the airport. The take offs and landing are terrible, I was sick when I got to Bangkok due to the landing. On my return, same take off and...

A two-leg flight from Tokyo to London via Hong Kong. Was impressed by the level of service and comfort on especially the Hong Kong to London leg of the trip. Great selection of in-flight entertainment. Only minor issue was that the in-flight food was...very in-flight food quality.

标题: flying back to HK from Tokyo
内容: Very pleasant flight. Depart on time and very good beef in the dinner offered. Service from the crew is also very pleasant.

The best thing about Cathy Pacific was the efficiency by which they ensured that I am on a connecting flight from Hong Kong to Johannesburg even though my initial flight was delayed. The Cathy Pacific flight attended waited for me at the door and we bolted through the Hong Kong Airport through security and customs. This would certainly not have...
My first time fly with Cathay, I like the services, foods and the entertainment. Cathay offer a lot of time schedule so that it would be convenient for me

We flew with Cathay Pacific because of pricing from and reurn to our home city Wellington. Also the stopover is Hong Kong which we wanted to revisit .
Reviews had been good so we were confident that all would be well. It was. Bonus was the return from Dublin, our last city on this European holiday with a direct flight...

标题: UnComfortable warm cabin before Push back
内容:
Before push back they had the Aircondition switched off second time in a row it was warm and uncomfortable they did not even think it’s worth to inform passengers...... I thought that was lil rude ....
Otherwise lovely flight and very well trained cabin crew

标题: Not what it used to be
内容: Wont be in a hurry to travel with them again. Service ho hum, comfort is almost non existent and choices on board very limited, Did four trips this year and nothing improved. Time for another airline.

Cathay pacific delayed my business bag which cost me lot of money and after claiming the same they had reasons and only 1 dollar to offer i was shocked the kind of service provided to business class traveler

It was our first time flying with Cathay, we have flown business class with many other airlines. The flight was at 22., so an overnight flight. We were both shocked that they wanted to serve a full 4 course meal at 22.3! The seat is easy to operate and turns into a flat bed. The layout of business class is...
Great experience. Seat very comfortable, plenty of leg room. In flight entertainment was good - nice big screen. Staff friendly and helpful. Food OK.

标题: Good business class experience on Cathay - long haul
内容: Initial flight SYD-HK was excellent. Staff were attentive, seats comfortable, food enjoyable. The HK-LGW flight was on a newer plane, and we found the seats not as comfortable, particularly when lying down on the flat bed. Breakfast service was in a word chaotic. I gather a new style of breakfast delivery had been introduced, and it showed. Complimentary toiletries were...

标题: a very nice way to travel
内容:
in these days of painful travel, these people excel, the check in and boarding, is slick, the in flight service is excellent, champagne on arrival hot towels, very good, headphones, the seating is great in Premium Economy cant speak for other, but it looks fine.
the in flight food is good for airline food, (I tend to like it anyway)....

It was like the movie "Flying High"..... is there a doctor on board?
flight went well. Happy staff, average food.

I have flown Cathay Pacific a number of times over the years. They are consistent in what they do without being exceptional. You will know what you get. They are on the level just below what I consider the top airlines like - Emirates, Singapore, Qantas, Air-NZ etc. Will I fly them again? Yes but I always prefer to go...
For 15 hours we were surprisingly comfortable in economy. Good meal service and friendly flight attendants. Also enjoyed all of the entertainment options.

Beware! Cathay oversell their seats. I paid for a business class seat six months ago but was downgraded to Economy as there was no seat available due, I was informed, to a company class policy of overselling, The compensation did not cover the difference between the the two classes. Vey very disappointing. Doesn’t seem ethical to take my money and...

I like flying with Cathay Pacific. Cathay Pacific deliver a nice, comfortable flight experiences to the travelers. The crews of Cathay Pacific is friendly, and care of passengers. There are a lot of great latest movie, great game, great entertainment and music. The food and beverage in Cathay Pacific is also very nice, and it serve the world famous ice-creasm...

We flew from LAX to Delhi via Hong Kong. The plane was a newer one (about 4 years old) which was nice. I had read that Cathy's Economy class was one of the more spacious among the long haul carriers. And we weren't disappointed. There was enough leg room and the seats were comfortable... enough. While Premium Economy would have...

标题: Still one of the best airline
内容: Flight leave on time. Very good service. Good quality & tasty airline food. Toilet always clean. Seats comfortable & no extra charge on prebook seats. Good choice on Inflight entertainment.

A great business class product especially on the a35, the staff on most of our sectors (syd-hkg-lgw-hkg-syd) were fantastic, the new catering on the 35 is obviously causing some crew angst but from a passenger perspective is miles better (although only loading 4 continental breakfasts for 38 J pax is not very clever - wife missed out on her choice)...
It is the worst airlines, Never on time. changes are very frequently. even-though the staffs are cordial but airlines itself is not doing good.
I have flown with Cathay 3 times now and by choice I would not fly with any other airline. The crew are professional and I feel very safe for a nervous passenger.

We flew from Zurich to Sydney via Hong Kong, and returned from Melbourne via HK. The flights were on time, with only a teensy delay boarding in HK on the way home, no idea why. But all flights arrived on schedule. The last machine was an older model 777, which was rather loud, but the first 3 planes were more...

标题: Enjoyable flight from Amsterdam to Hong Kong
内容: Always enjoyable to fly Cathay Pacific, especially in Business Class.. excellent service, food and friendly staff. The champagne on boarding is always enjoyable. We flew in to Hong Kong the day after the typhoon, and the staff were very helpful getting us on the bus to the terminal, as some of the flybridges had been damaged.

My wife and I flew Cathay Pacific Melbourne To Hong Kong, Hong Kong to Paris and then Madrid to Hong Kong , the Airbus A36 seating is much better than the Boeing 777, The 777 feels more like economy and particularly when the passengers in front fully recline it is very uncomfortable
We requested a diabetic meals for health and...

Checking is fast and friendly.
They give notices of changes or updates.
Flights left and arrived roughly on time.
Food services were good. Inflight entertainment was good.
Comfortable seats, and enough leg room for a long flight.
Over all I reccomed Cathay Pacific for its service and passenger treatment.

标题: Great Service before and during flights
内容: After multiple hour delay by AA and missing connection flight with zero support from AA.. Cathay agent met 6 passengers at gate in LAX and personally escorted us to their gates. Agents worked feverishly to get bags re-routed and to get passengers re-booked. Service and flight attendants onboard went out of their way to provide great service and help passengers...

Nice airline, friendly check in which was done quickly. Same seat pitch as BA so not problems there. All in all a pleasant flight and we'd use them again.
Food was really nice and came just at the right times.

Very comfortable seat (but not a suite with doors).
Amazing pyjamas and amenities kit.
The best champagne in the air (Krug) served with caviar.

Cannot fault Cathay Pacific from check in to boarding to in flight service. This was an overnight flight and we were served a full dinner meal and a full breakfast prior to landing. The food was excellent and the service faultless. On this trip we also flew over to Hong Kong and from HK to Chengdu we flew Dragon Air,...

标题: Smooth check in and comfortable flight
内容: My return flight to Hong Kong from New York was a pleasure. Flew economy again and was lucky as the flight was not full and had plenty of space to stretch. In flight service was good as usual. Although the choice of meal in flight seemed to be same as Hong Kong to SFO (was that a coincidence?) The check...

Smooth and on time. The flight was a 777-3 ER and we were in economy with a 3-4-3 config. The flight was absolutely full. The seats were definitely comfortable with a reasonable leg space for economy. The inflight meal service was nice. No cpmplaints there at all. The crew were nice and helpful. However, must add that in the event...

As a regular passenger on the Sydney to Amsterdam route, I always find Cathay to provide friendly and efficient service during this long-haul trip. New internal configuration has improved the space of the individual Business Class seating, while all staff maintain their high level of customer service. The bonus at HKG International Airport is the choice of airline lounges, and...

Have flown with them before and they are a very good airline to fly with.
meals are excellent as are the snacks they provide throughout the flights.
Staff are always courteous and polite and excellent to deal with.
Travelling with an infant we were expressed through all the lines to the front and escorted onto the aircraft first to settle...

标题: Great flight but food and drink service not up to scratch
内容: We picked Cathay because it was the best priced airline that had premium economy all the way to and from Brisbane to London. On all but the HK to London leg we had the Airbus 33 which was very comfortable with plenty of leg room as I am reasonably tall. The other leg we had the older 2 series which...

I took a chance on tight connections in Hong Kong. I made my flight but my bag didn't. In Tokyo someone was at the gate to inform me my bag missed my connecting flight and was put on a direct flight to Chicago from Hong Kong. It got there before me!!!! In Chicago had problems locating my bag. I stopped...
Everything about CP is well done. On time service, quality of the airplanes, meals (!!!), and their personnel. Really a great airline, probably one of the 3 or 4 best in the world.

We've never flown Cathay Pacific but a good deal was found so we gave it a whirl. We traveled on an Airbus 33 and the first thing I noticed was how noisy the aircraft was, if you have noise cancelling headphones all good, but we didn't so it made the inflight entertainment hard to hear at some points. On our...

Cathay Pacific are one of the best airlines in the world if not the best. They gave me 2 upgrades to Business for free. Im never flying any other airline. Im theirs for life. Needless to say the best service on the ground and in the air.

I took midnight departure for a four hour flight. It was almost half empty. I was allowed to sleep straight in a row of four seats. I had a deep sleep for almost 3 hours. This three hour sleep gave me enough energy to stay awake for the following 16hours activities.

Cathay staff are usually so polite and helpful and generally that's why we choose to fly with them. The Spanish contingent need a rocket, they were unhelpful and downright rude. I flew to Hong Kong for the first time with Cathy Pacific at the beginning of the year and was very impressed by the service. I am a past Customer Service Manager from LHR and was always told that the airline was good.
I have just come back from Cebu and to say the service was superb is an understatement.Just...
Old style seating on one of their busiest route. Services varies and I am really find it hard to see why so many people like it.

Cathay Pacific always my first choice for traveling, the price is reasonable,I feel comfy and relax during the flight.Much better than Malaysia airlines,Sri Lanka Airlines,and Royal Jordanian I had ever took.For some reasons,i prefer direct flight instead of going to HK transit.

Had problem with my flight because all flight to Dubai are overbooked so i dicided to take Cathay from MNL-HKG then HKG-DXB and im glad did.. Thanks to "Demi" in Manila for taking cake of me from check in to boarding!!

标题: A nice flight with expectations fully satisfied
内容: A very good flight with polite staff and comfortable service. Food, snack and beverage were great. Check-in and baggage claim were okay. Cleanliness of toilets was acceptable. I definitely would fly with Cathay again next time!

Good fight and while I didn't sleep much there was lots to watch and the time passed fairly quickly. Food was nice.

after flying on other airlines, i was eager to compare the experience and what has become of Asia's World City's flag carrier.
It is still as good as I remember.
For traveler ultimately...

This was a first time flying with Cathay Pacific and it was lovely . The staff were so nice and careing. We went premium economy there was so much leg room , Great food , great staff, so quiet. As a c5/c6 incomplete quadriplegic travelling can be a nightmare and I need to work hand in hand with any carrier.
Until this latest trip my preferred carrier had been Singapore airlines however in the future I will always look at my options with Cathay Pacific first.
Good communication is essential and Cathay made all our interactions clear and concise....

Due to the OSAKA TYPHOON we could not fly out of Osaka . Had to drive by an Uber car to Nagoya an 3 hr drive. Found the International departures on the 3 th level. Arrived at the Cathay Pacific assistance desk to discover the lack of English being spoken by the Japanese staff. We had no boarding pass's due...

This was an Package Tour to Japan arranged by an third party agent, there for we had no input with the travel arrangements.. Had to go via Hong Kong with an 1 hr stop over to change airplanes. . Not ideal, so quite a rush to reach the next flight. We not recommend this. Both flights where good, seats and...

This is the only direct flight for this route. Everything is so smooth without the hassle to transit. The Premium Economy seat is comfortable enough for a long flight like this. However the USB socket did not work to charge my mobile phone both way, and WiFi service is too expensive.

I contact CP by mail to the office in Copenhagen on last Sunday about the pre paid extra luggage....... NO Answer?!!!!!
I did the same on follow day Monday about the extra luggage I have ...... so I can have the pre paid it still-2%........ NO Answer....... really bad for an office, so I decided to pay at the in...

So I left Copenhagen 25 Of July in Economy class, to Hongkong.
So in Hongkong I will change to Cebu craft, when I come to the transfer area and line up to boarding the flight to Cebu, a service man come to me and asked me if I was stefan yes I said politely and give me a new ticket...

I’ve had problems managing flights due to motion sickness since young. I’m now in my 5s and unfortunately motion sickness is not something one grows out of. My recent flight with Cathay Pacific was a first experience where the cabin crew actually took note of my condition and watched over me through the flight, giving good advice and offering to...

My name is Jeff Meyer and I flew Business Cathay Melbourne to Hong Kong 24 September.
Upon arrival at my hotel unlocked my locked suitcase to find that my carefully packed contents were in disarray and that my iPad was missing.
I see Cathay as responsible for the safe carriage of my luggage as I was as a passenger.
The...

I had an unfortunate experience flying with Cathay, actually I had multiple bad experience.... flight attendant was rude, never ending delays, breaking my bag, ripping my bag and the never ending chasing them down to follow up on my points, being upgraded etc......
However Cathay came to a whole new low....
They changed the aircraft and downgraded my seat without...

First time on a Cathay Pacific flight, and I must say it won’t be the last. The staff were fantastic, the food and snacks were beautiful, entertainment system had lots of things to see and play, seats were more than comfortable with good room. Definitely fly with these again.

标题: Smooth flight, good entertainment and service
内容: We chose Cathay as we could stopover en route to Spain in Hong Kong. We booked 7 months out so got a good fare. The flight departed on time & meals and entertainment options were very good. If travelling with children make sure you request a kids meal in advance (minimum 24 hours).I’d travel with them again

First time with Cathy Pacific flight was ok food was terrible. If I had have a choice I would never fly with them again sorry. Uncomfortable seating felt like you were sitting on a bord, food was burnt an dry drink's choice 4 times I had to ask for a glass of wine then to be told they had ran...

That was the 4th time I bought my baby to go travel by flight, it made me very disappointed about the boarding service which was the worst experience with my infant. As she still was an infant at that moment, I expected that we would have the priority service when boarding. However, the staff in the boarding gate have not...
When our original flight was cancelled due to the typhoon striking Hong Kong, Cathay Pacific went above and beyond to get us on the first flight out of Vancouver.

标题: Amazing Service Perth To Paris Via Hong Kong
内容: First time we have flown with Cathay Pacific and were lucky enough to do it business class. The pods were amazing with great flat beds for sleep which was really appreciated on the Perth to Hong Kong leg which was at night. The cabin service was excellent and the food service possibly the best we have had. Whilst we did...
a good flight with no complaints. flight is spacious and clean. Fairly a decent experience. ambience was pleasant with spacious leg space

标题: Flight review on CX734 on 5 Sept 218
内容: When checking in, was informed that flight, which was scheduled to depart at 165hrs, will be delayed by one hour. By 163hrs, again we were informed that the flight will be delayed further but not sure till when! Many passengers were already getting very upset. By about 173hrs, it was announced that the plane will not be flying due to...
As long as I am not sitting right beside the toilet, I am alright with this airline. The seat there cannot be pushed back.

Could not fault this flight at all. The aircraft was modern and clean, the seat capsule was very comfortable and easy to adjust, the toilets were constantly maintained for cleanliness, food was excellent with good choices, service from cabin crew was friendly, caring and efficient. Our flight left right on time and arrived just a few minutes early, with a...

Good service and efficient. A lot of flight options. There was a reminder notification 4 to 6 hours before the flight. Provide good special meals for those with dietary restrictions and allergy problems. Excellent on-bound service and prompt on schedule. Families and friends also fly with them. I flew with them for over 3 years and are still very satisfy...

标题: A very forgettable check in experience!!
内容:
Very poor service from check in, being an assisted passenger in stroke recovery and checking in at 11.3am for a 5.15pm flight and requesting a premium economy seat with easy access, like bulkhead or window, and probably being the first to check in.....we were given the two middle seats in the centre block of 4, with passengers on both
Most...

Where has the Cathay charm gone. Compare to Singapore Thai even BA. considering this was a new aircraft the space was less the food was very average. The flight team disorganised. As you can tell very average. Shame. This airline was one of the leading airlines it didn’t feel like it any more. Staff keep equipment in lockers in cabin...

Flew Cathay Pacific to Taipei and it was a smooth pleasant flight. However on the way back our flight to Hong Kong was cancelled which meant we missed our connecting flight to London. These things can happen which is understandable but the lack of communication and the awful customer service we received at Taipei Airport has put me off ever...

I had booked a flight Singapore to Toronto. I departed Singapore on the 2nd of July,218 at 1.3 a.m. and returned on the 17th of July,218, at 11.3a.m. I spend S$5 for a return. The flight crew wasn't polite. There was a long layover at HK which lasted 6 hours. There was no Transit Hotel. I paid for the extra...

标题: Long distance travel made more comfortable
内容:
Long distant travel never easy , but Cathay made us the most comfortable they could.
Food was good , enjoyed the menu cards !
And the options were nice
Staff very pleasant, and tried very hard to make all happy.
The movie / shows/ music entertainment was great , had many good options to choose from , new and up...
The attendants were kind and nice, but the food was not delicious. They didn't take the initiative in serving hot drinks, unless you requested.

It was a long flight from Adelaide to Los Angeles Via Hong Kong. We posssibly will try and avoid this route again but was part of a special price put on by Cathay . Nothing wrong with the flight or food or service . We have flown Cathay before and know of their consistent service . The food choices on...

Outbound eastward to Canada, wanted to try Cathay Pacific Premium Economy, who was quite advertised on specialized magazines.
B777-3 is one of my favourite airliners, Premium is located just behind Business, with seating rows 2 - 3 - 2
Chose the first row, windows. That seat allows you more legroom and you are not disturbed by any galley or toilette,...

标题: Latest Aircraft but sadly no Improvement
内容: Well it started off well with type of aircraft, but still couldn't select seat even though I could get on the website as a member ........ the China thing apparently. Aircraft was an Airbus A35-9, so hoped that it would improve my experience and flight. It is a long 1 hour flight and needed to catch up on some sleep....

It was a satisfactory flight. It was less good than i expected and the flights were expensive. The flights cost about 9 USD and the seats have little legroom. It wasn't a really comfortable ride, and they made ridiculous excuses for the delay (stuck on plane for 2 hours before departure). The service was fine, but the meals were too...

标题: I though One of The Best and was sadly disappointed
内容: The first part of our holiday was an alliance flight with Air New Zealand ...... hmmmm! I asked our travel agent that I can't eat Roast or Pork chops ...... they don't like me. Sadly the airline interpreted that I was Muslim ...... thats new to me. Anyway I got served this and what was it like well ..... I...

First time flying with Cathay Pacific and it was an excellent flight. I highly recommend Cathay Pacific against any other airline flying long haul. In flight entertainment very good, staff were friendly and food was good.
I preferred this flight to my connecting flight.

标题: Lack of baggage transfer agreement forced me to spend 1.5 hours going through immigration in Hong Kong.
内容: I had to get an early morning Hong Kong Air flight from Haikou to catch CX5 and make my JAL flight at Narita. There is no alternative flight. HK Air, perhaps thinking the code-shared CX flight was a true JAL flight checked the luggage through to Honolulu. Arrived in HK to find CX would not accept luggage and only way...

I love traveling on Cathay Pacific and Cathay Dragon, whether it's in Economy or Business. And I love traveling through their hub -- HKG. I find them to have a very consistent level of polite, intelligent, thoughtful customer service, whether on the ground or in the air. Their Marco Polo / Asia Miles frequent flyer scheme is one of the...

Flight itself was great. Was a little bummed though that I didn't get an exit row seat for 22cm frame, but there were a few babies on board so them and their families got those seats which was completely fair and understandable. I will remember to book them earlier next time ! All in all, a great flight. Little turbulence,...

I flew Business Class for the first time in April 218, and Cathay Pacific sure didn't disappoint. It was a nice short haul trip from HK to Seoul Incheon and I was impressed with the Business Class product on offer. Great meals, excellent little cabin onboard, excellent range of movies, ample room for my 22cm frame, and very friendly attention...

Having heard about the quality I traveled one of the longest distances so far, until now.
I am only mentioning about two things- comfort of the seat and the in flight entertainment. Both these reasons actually did not make my jouney comfortable. Repeated requests also did not solve the problem.
Food was good. Choice of Asian vegetarian meal can have...

标题: Good experience. Crew nice but a bit remote
内容:
Crew were polite, nice and attentive, but up to a point.
Meal time was first class but the little things like "would you like a top up of your wine" were lacking.
Once the lights were off the crew disappeared. Maybe because it was a night flight?
Great flight,meals were excellent. Departed on time and arrived ahead of time. Staff provided excellent service

标题: Good efficient service and comfortable flight
内容: Good service from booking in to landing at Hong Kong and onward transit to Beijing. The seats and surrounding area were roomy and the food was better than most airlines. On line check in is 48 hours before the flight which enables you to concentrate just on last minute packing the day before the flight. I would certainly do a...

标题: Great service but what happened to the food?
内容: We used to love flying Cathay Pacific because of their amazing airline food, endless snacks, and excellent customer service. It's been 6yrs since our last flight with them, but I was shocked that the quality of the food had gotten so bad on our most recent roundtrip flight to HKG from SFO. The hot food looked bad and tasted horrible!...

I recently flew Cathay Pacific direct from YVR to JFK. I highly recommend flying Cathay Pacific. The check in and boarding was smooth, I got two free checked bags (I only had one) and a free meal. The plane was clean with comfortable seats in comparison to some other airlines. The flight attendants were also very friendly and attentive. Thanks...

We flew the airbus 35 to Auckland via Hong Kong,Great plane great service ,food and drinks all the way there and back.Plenty of legroom and comfy seats ,little table /phone holder aswell as try table .Good choice of entertainment.

Flying with CX via HKG is full of delays and flight rescheduling, Glad that I didn’t book my train ticket in advance else I would have to bear the losses myself.
In flight experience is within expectations, cabin crew can be more friendly and self initiative.

First class service throughout the flight. Hot meal (dinner) and breakfast but continually coming round with snacks, popcorn, crisps, healthy bars, ice creams, soft drinks and water. Also pot noodles available. Wide variety of cuisines. Good fares.
Cathay Pacific is our favourite airline and mostly use it when flying to the UK.The recent return trip was incident free and on time. Service was excellent.

Flew in Cathay on the way back. The inflight staff were amazing starting with snacks, drinks and anything in between. They never even thought it was a chore everytime we pressed the call button. They even went out of the way and gave a cup of vegetarian noodles(they mostly have chicken). Good food with ice cream and good choice of...
We have flown with this airline to Europe twice in the last three years and found their service exemplary. We couldn't fault them.
Delay around 1.5 hours; Food are ok, Dragonair's ground staff and fight attendant are much better Cathay Pacific, though they are the same company.

I love this airlines. Meals was delicious. Hagendaz ice cream for the dessert. Seat so comfortable n spacious. Tv Entertainment was great. New n old great movie. Snack n meals so many. Flight attendant so helpfull. Very comfortable flight. Recommended!
not that good but, perhaps I'm comparing to emirates which includes a stopover whereas hong kong flight was direct

标题: Not as good as their pricing sems to indicate
内容: Quite a while since I have flown Cathay Pacific, but I was a bit disappointed overall. I like the single window seating in business class, but I don't like the retractable armrest on the outside which had to be down for takeoff and landing. The seat was quite comfortable apart from that. I also found the the screen and remote...

标题: London - Hong Kong - Melbourne - Christchurch (NZ) - Hong Kong - London
内容:
A two month trip of a lifetime is a big planning excersise, especially when your organising 9 flights and sixteen hotels or apartments.
The flight organisation was very easy as my wife and I wanted to spend Christmas in AU with our daughter and then visit South Island NZ before heading back to the Uk via Hong Kong.
I can’t...

I recently flew to Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific for a family wedding. The flight was most enjoyable, with excellent, tasty food served by very attentive cabin crew and a very comprehensive selection of films and tv videos to help pass the eleven and a half hours flight duration. If you have to do long haul, this is the way...

Always been a pleasure to fly with Cathay Pacific. The new Airbus A35 was a wonderful plane. Spacious seats and legroom. The flight to Bangkok was great with all well-taken care of by the crew. However, due to the faster return time back to Sg (maybe due to a new and better plane), the service was a rush. But overall,...
the rooms of seats of economy class is enough and comfy, however the meal they provided is not under my expectation.

标题: First Time in Premium Economy - Will Definitely Use for Long Haul in Future
内容: Boeing 777-3 ER Jet, Dedicated Book-in Gate at Sydney, processed luggage without fuss three plus hours before departure, allocated seats as requested. Controlled boarding of PE before Economy was good. Champagne offered within minutes of being seated, toiletry pack supplied. Seat comfort was good including the extra width and leg room for PE. Meals were ordinary in quality and the...

As usual the services of this airline is crisp and professional.
Everything was flawless by the ground staff.
My return flight was cancelled due to typhoon Mangkhut but within 12 hours of the cancellation, the airline provided an alternate flight through another airline without any inquiry or hassle. This is remarkable in customer care.
On a lighter note they unknowingly...
I don't mind taking Cathay again for my future travels. The price is pretty competitive, just don't expect too much from the inflight food.

Cathay Pacific has been a personal favourite for years and I was looking forward to my flight from Sydney to Dublin return via Hong Kong. We experienced a minor hiccup with our booking when the first first leg of our outbound flight from Sydney was cancelled and we were arbitrarily rebooked on an overnight flight scheduled to leave a day...

Seats are not very wide (I am not a large person) and very hard, not very comfortable.
Food not too bad.
Not great on safety issues, everyone told to put their seats in the upright position and put safety belt on for landing but the female in the next row who had 3 seats was left to lay asleep across...

标题: Convenient schedule, excellent staff, comfortable flights
内容:
Convenient departure from Melbourne at 23:4, a four hour transit in HKG (in two excellent CX lounges) then on to Vancouver. Slept comfortably most of the way on both legs in (business class) lie-flat bed, arriving Vancouver about 7:2 refreshed and ready to go. Total flight time was about 21 hours, plus the transit.
Meals were good, no complaints. Cabin...
One of the best. Hong Kong is their main hub. Hard to think of any other airport that works as well and has such seamless transit to and from the airport. They set the standard for others.

标题: One of the best air in Asia
内容:
Simply describe..one of the best airline.
From ground to cabin crews, they all willing to serve you with smile.
Good selection on food & beverages and in between snacks are offered.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Kuala Lumpur

内容:
Had never flown CP before but based on price and schedule decided to use CP to visit sister-in-law who was working for the CDC in Bangkok.
Great food, great service, and great cabin crew. The cabin was tastefully decorated, amenities were (according to my wife) fantastic. And the lounges in Vancouver and Bangkok were very nice.
Will definitely use CP...
Flying Cathay Pacific always my first choice, love their services, feeling comfortable while onboard, good entertainment programs, foods are great too.

Flying to and from Bangkok is a long day. 1 flight to china and 1 to Bangkok. C.P.A is great. Flight crews ,on my 3 round trips in rhe last year, were great. Friendly, helpful, prompt when you need something. Not at all like flights in the states. I would recommend CPA highly. 1+

标题: Flight to bangkok (before and after typhoon Mangkhut)
内容:
Flight to Bangkok:
aisle seat with longer legroom and staff / people keep walking in front of my seat, very annoying.
food ok
movies not very updated and choices average
Flight to Hong Kong
upgraded to premium economy, very sweet.
service good
Very Handy from Cairns, staff is friendly, food is good..lounges are great specially the one with the tea lounge and rest couches...

I can tell the airplane is old its been around for quite sometimes Cathay needs newer planes especially crossing for hours on the pacific ocean. The seat mattress foam started to lose it firmness and getting flat - definitely needs a replacement for a comfy long haul ride. The seat shows its aged and accummulated stain. Food is pretty much...

标题: Awful food, no knowledge of special dietary needs, entertainment systems broken & scant service and bad for jet lag
内容:
We flew Gatwick to Melbourne and returned Cairns to Gatwick, both via Hong Kong Aug/Sept 218.
I ordered gluten free meals. Most of the standard meals had an option were (or had no reason not to be) gluten free. However instead of these inferior and dreadful notch pitches of meals were given instead.
All special dietary meals come out an...

A group of 26 people, all of whom are in the economy, some in premium economy and others in business. Not having had particular problems, the ground service has returned to normal, excellent seating (spacious and comfortable even in economy) and courtesy always necessary on long-haul travel.
Excellent organization of lunches for people with food intolerances

I thought this airline was better.
+ I had a window seat but as I had an empty row I could lie down for the whole trip
- the plane did not look very clean, especially the toilet, the food was ok, the eggs for breakfast were soggy, I was expecting a little pouch with toothbrush, toothpastes and socks
This is a 16 hour flight. Although I found this flight very long I could not fault the Cathay Airlines service or staff.

Somehow Cathay is becoming my favorite Airline of choice. The flight attendants are truly the best I have come across. They are so gentle, polite and kind. Without attitudes or frowned you can call upon their services at all times. They are awesome!! They are not afraid to feed you throughout.

Yes we know it’s economy class (cattle class) but better options of food needed other than the spicy noodle type dishes which stank the plane out for hours. The European options were no better either.
Not enough refreshments offered between meals to keep hydrated. Had to ask when we could get the attention of cabin crew.
It seems if you...

As a BA gold flyer I had the good fortune to be able to use the wonderful Cathay lounge at CDG. I love the fresh noodles bar, the selection of food and drink and the quiet, spacious and comfortable lounge. What a breath of fresh air after some of the terrible BA lounges.

One of the best airlines to date. It was a pleasure flying on Cathay from Colombo to Hong Kong transiting Hong Kong
and thereafter taking Cathay from Hong Kong to Chicago. The seats were comfortable albeit the long haul from HK to Chicago. The best part is the care and personal service by the airline stewardesses.There was service with a...

标题: Extra comfort at an affordable price.'
内容: Premium economy was great value with the extra leg room so good.In flight service was very adequate and the food was very nice.Staff at terminals were friendly and helpful.

标题: No customers service once or ever
内容:
On the last leg of our long trip after a flight from Barcelona to Hong Kong, we picked up our boarding passes to discover that our family of four was separated and possisioned in seats away from each other.
We asked stright away from the staff on the counter to change that and was told they will do it at...
Excellent Service. Plenty of leg room in economy. Efficient flight - left on time and arrived early.

What can I say? The other legs of the journey to Australia from the UK were not great. The entertainment system is dire (I watched movies from the 6s in the end). The seat from Sydney to Hong Kong had no window!!!!!!!! and yes it was a window seat-most disorientating experience ever (seat 15A). The best was saved for last,...

In August I flew via Cathay Pacific Jhb to Shanghai. Arrived at airport, no luggage in sight. Duly filled in a form (took an hour). Went off to work (I flew premium economy to be able to get off the flight and go straight to work).
Went to purchase some clothing - approximately 8 USD worth, which is a minute...

this is my my first to travel with my two sister my daughter is the one who booked our flight she choose cathay pacific bec . of the good service with the snacks and blanket the stewardes are very attentive ? i enjoyed watching the movie i highly recommend cathay pacific keep up the good service ???

What a lovely surprise...Economy class luxury. Good seat size and spacing. Comfortable seating and easy to get leg room. Food was tasty, good portions, and a good selection. A+ value, service and entertainment.

Cathay's service was outstanding in every way. The plane was modern and had an array of conveniences: USB charging ports in every seat; extra storage space; complimentary sanitary pads in bathrooms, etc. The food was good for aeroplane food.
What impressed me most of all about Cathay, though, was how easily they rebooked my flight when it had been cancelled...

Redeem my first business class ticket with Asia Miles and the overall experience is great! There is a priority lane for security check at Narita airport but a bit wait to pass thru immigration. Right after immigration you can take the elevator the the cathay lounge. The food choice at the lounge is relative less but the seats are very...

Did online check-in but only knew the aircraft got changed after I boarded. The legroom is always enough for me since im a short lady. Service is good and in flight meal is average, nothing to complain. However the cleanliness of the aircraft is a bit below average. I found stains on the tray table and arm rest.
the flight over was great cabin staff were excellent we were a bit disappointed on the way back with the cabin staff flight was great

标题: Will definately fly again with Cathay Pacific
内容: We flew Cathay on 8 August and returned 7 September 218. It was a midnight flight out of Perth so we slept almost immediately. We must have looked peaceful as the staff didn't wake us for dinner which was a good thing. Flying Premium Economy (PE) will be our preferred method of flying as we can't afford business class. The...

The first interaction was checking in. To our surprise, they hadn't left three children to sit together but split us up instead. This was the first issue. After boarding, I spoke with the air hostess who was very helpful and swapped some passengers to allow us to sit together. The flight itself was fine, no major issues. The plane was...

标题: Good service on board, expect flight delays!
内容: On the whole, the journey was reasonably good. Flights have been delayed twice on our first leg of the flights. Once before departing from our starting point and another at our layover at Hong Kong. The layover at Hong Kong was unfortunately delayed more than 2hours. It was made better with good facilities at lounge. However the lounge is very...

Flight was ok. On time. Cleanliness was not so good but I do feel for the cleaners as most passengers were pigs and left rubbish everywhere! Food was average and as the language barrier was not so good, they struggled to understand what my husband was asking for (Bourbon and coke). Over all it was a good flight and I...

Wasn’t looking forward to the long flight to Australia however our flight with Cathay Pacific was excellent. A very comfortable experience with the extra legroom and calf supports on the seats. Had a 4 hour stop over in Hong Kong which gave us time to stretch our legs before the following flight to Melbourne.

标题: Quality and Comfort in the Air
内容:
We flew Cathay Pacific from Sydney to London via Hong Kong and whilst the flight was a long one the flight crew made us extremely comfortable and were able to assist us when required always with a smile on their face.
The inflight entertainment options were broad and of a good quality. The food was light but filling and very...

标题: One of the best business class experiences.
内容: This was a very good business class flight. The cabin crew were efficient and polite and they were quiet when walking up and down the aisle. The food was excellent, the wine was of a decent quality. The business beds were amongst the best business beds that I have experienced. They were comfortable and I had about 6 hours sleep...

staff went out of their way to be helpful - food excellant - seating more than needed, turned into a bed - inflight entertainment had up to date films - long 12 hour flight made easier by the staff - staff more than ready to do extra drinks when asked nothing was too much trouble - boarding a breeze -...

标题: Pleasant service, with special care for an assisted passenger.'
内容: Friendly, efficient service, very busy flight, no time for extra attention, which probably indicates that this is a very popular airline.

标题: Best First class lounge & services in HongKong airport
内容: The best balance between prices and routes among all the airlines flying from Hong Kong to Europe. Lounges provide enough privacy and top-end services including independent bathrooms. Foods are quite acceptable on board. Planes are always better than I expected every time. Looking forward to next flight.

The aircraft I was on was very big. There was ample space to stretch your legs out even in the economy class. The attendants were very pleasant and the service was excellent. The food tasted good also and the flight was smooth.

标题: I gave it a 3 as it's a long flight and there just is not enough room when the person in front lay the seat down.
内容: The plane and flight itself was ok. The flight attendants seemed to be busy from people who expect 1st class service when flying economy. Not their fault There is just not enough room, for western people who are taller and larger than the average person. I have flown economy with other airlines and find that just another 2 or 3...

Our trip was always on time or I would say earlier than the projected arrival. Flight attendants were accommodating and if I would rate them from scale of 1 to 1 that would be 8. Food is ok. I would suggest that they should increase the choices of their movies. Overall experience would be 9. My trip to Manila to...

The boarding at Manchester was speedy and efficient where the boarding staff used their brains and started boarding from the rear to the front of the plane, which avoided bottlenecks of passengers having to wait for others to place their luggage in the overhead compartment. The food was decent with three choices of main meal. Good selection of movies, music...
good value . pleasantly surprised , we paid for the exit row and the extra leg room was totally worth the extra money

I think the economy flight in Cathay is just as good as the premium economy in some other airlines. The seat is spacious enough that I do not feel cramped in - about what I feel in the premium economy in some other airlines. I was able to sleep comfortably with my neck pillow without lying down.
The food is...

标题: A brief review on my flight.
内容: Overall the flight was good. The flight I rode was CX669 from Hong Kong to Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Int’l. Since I’m a Marco Polo club member, I could enjoy their priority boarding process, it makes me can settle down myself before everyone got into the flight. The crew and everything were great, but the usb charger of my seat was malfunctioning...

A friendly airline direct to YVR. Food is pretty good. Lots of movies to choose from. Heading east I was promoted to Business Class. IT was a real treat. Very comfortable seat/beds. The way back seemed cramped (full capacity) but friendly service & no incidents.
Booking in was simple, the inflight entertainment and service was excellent. The flight time went very quickly due to the space and leg room available.

This was actually an American Airlines flight co-labelled a Cathay Flight. Good experience just a tad under that provided on a previous Cathay flight.
I had obtained a new Australian passport and forgot to change my ESTA application. The American Airlines check in girl noticed this and went to a great deal of time consuming trouble to re apply for...

标题: Can they get the seats any tighter
内容: I travel annually to the UK to visit my daughter and usually travel with Emirates. This year my husband accompanied me and the best value flights at the time were with Cathay. Sorry should never go by price alone. I was staggered at how little legroom there was, they seemed to have squeezed in so many more seats than Emirates...
Enjoyable experience. Intimate attention by attendants and no fuss flight. Departed on time and landed on time. Smooth flight with little bumps.

标题: CX is one of the best!
内容:
I have reviewed Cathay before. When I have the choice I will take Cathay to and from Asia. The service is next to impeccable. The planes are modern and have sleeper seats that fit me in Business class. (Just a point of information, American's new 777-3 have the same seats and configuration.)
For the meal and beverage service I do...

Return flight Zurich-Bali with 3 hour stopover in HK, with family (2 adults, 1 child of 9 years and a baby of 8 months). No announcements for early boarding with babies in Zurich and Hong Kong.
Despite a baby without a seat with a bassinet on the long flight ZRH-HK, 13 hours with a baby on the knees, enjoy. Obligation...

This was the longest flight I'd been on (16 hours to Hong Kong, and then another couple hours to Vietnam), but it was a breeze. The seats felt roomy (granted I'm 5'1"), there was plenty of entertainment offered, and the transfer at HKG was easy. I always need a special meal (low lactose), which is always super bland, but the...
标签: International' 'Economy' 'New York City - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: Good reliable airline. Clean, decent service. What I like most is that they serve Haagen Dazs ice cream!

Cathay service is always good, quite on time except the connecting flight from HK to Toronto delayed by an hour, said for security reason. Recommendation they would also provide wifi on plane for long hour flight though said it is done gradually throughout all planes.?

The first leg of our journey was to Hong Kong in a plane with a 2 4 2 seating. We chose a 2 seat setting and were very happy with that. After a wait in Hong Kong airport of 9 hours during which time we did not know until an hour before boarding which gate we had to go to...

While I keep reading about the demise of 5-Star service (and as a result, I am on the lookout for evidences of such), I have yet to find even a slip in their step. On a trip where (for a variety of reasons) I experienced Economy, Premium Economy and Business classes of service, I found the experiences exemplary at all...

What an experience, lovely staff very helpful with the kids
the seats are very spacious.
Kids entertainment needs some improvement - a little limited especially for the under 8 year olds
if you are connecting through hong kong to another destination its imporant to know:
1) the lounge is small
2) the lounge gets very busy quickly
3) the food...

Cathay has a big name as airline. The service i thought kind of average. Wanna boarding and need to long line. No manageable to make people wait in convinience way, said by the number of seat.
The meal serve is ok, but run out of choice when arrive on my turn.
When i feel air sick and look for the...

Well, here it is:
I have to start by saying how increasingly frustrating it is...
Cathay Pacific provided a great service on this flight. The meals were quite adequate and the seating was most suitable. The Ground Staff and cabin staff for both flights were very helpful.

Good staff, all flights on time and great service and meals.
Very comfortable in Business Class - the seat configuration was odd but not really a problem.
Comfy seats, but limited choice if not pre-booked very early. Good food and TV. Helpful staff with the transfer at Hong Hong.

标题: Very Good Flight and Service by Crew
内容: The whole trip was very good for a LONG flight. Cabin crew attentive. Meals edible. Seats comfortable but good to walk the Isle.

We were well looked after well. Stopover at Honk Kong was delayed 2 hours but communication was good on letting us know when the next flight was happening. Leg room was ok on our 1st leg but a bit less on the 2nd leg with a different plane. Luckily we had spare sets next to us so that was a...
Online check in helped me get a better seat for someone who 19cms. Good service during the flight with friendly flight attendants and reasonable food.

标题: amazing airline carrier everything was fantastic.
内容: everything was great from boarding to exiting, great food, great service. comfortable seating. a great experience.

Booking everything myself-
I found the online booking service so user friendly-
Check in was a dream
Flight was so comfy I am quite tall and found the legroom suitable

3 toilets out of 4 in my section (economy) were very dirty and smelly. toilet papers scattered on the floor but most of all they all seemed to had small puddle of urine on the floor and splashes on toilet seats. the aircraft was a bit worn out but everything else was ok.

标题: Great service, food and value for money
内容: It was an all round great trip. easy check-in, great lounge, particularly in Hong Kong. The herringbone seat arrangement 1-2-1 in biz class gives you all isle access and is a super comfortable seat. The in-flight service was some of the best I have experienced in the air. Fantastic food and large entertainment screens with a very wide selection of...

Unfortunately my husband and I found the premium economy with Cathay Pacific to be very far from Premium. The worst aspect was the food. Served on exactly the same tray as economy and with a choice of 3 tin foil covered food packets, I didn't feel very premium at all. We even had to drink wine out of plastic cups....

Staff were lovely. Plane roomy and clean.
Strange way to allocate seats where you have to pay a fee if you want to book actual seats, as a result my friend and I were separated for the HONGKONG- London leg ,which I didn't like and the staff would not try to put us together even though there were many single...

Every year I travel to Boston visiting my family in Massachusetts in summer time. In fact I don't have any choice except CX as this is the only airline which operates direct flight from HK to Boston. However the attitude of the ground staffs were not helpful and quite rude. They never treat people as you would like to be...
We flow from Heathrow to Sydney via Hong Kong and then back from Cairns to Heathrow. On all if the flights the service very superb, food good and planes fantastic!!

标题: They'd better be good given their prices
内容: Just a regular flight. Food was good. Seat was decent. Staff friendly. Cabin was clean. Plane was new. Just a tad below Singapore Airlines overall in this route.

I fly internationally at least once a month and never came across such neglegance , lying personal, do not care aptitude as I witnessed .
I checked in , went to the lounge, waited patiently, got delay notification, went to the gate as instructed, showed my boarding pass to the gate personnel, he said “please sit down and we would...

We have been flying with Cathay Pacific for many years, but this trip we noticed a big change. Most of the crew members were impatient, not very friendly, and my 5 yo woke up hungry, but all they could produce were some peanuts.
Not impressed at all.

标题: Hope you never get a delay with this airline
内容: Hope you never get a delay with this airline. The customer service approach to resolving a dispute is pathetic, just a zero care factor among the ground staff. I’m $1s of dollars out of pocket for choosing this airline on top of the extra amount paid by them not being the cheapest provider out there. If you pay for a...

Flying directly to Shanghai to Mumbai is remarkably not possible but Cathay provided a seamless service via Hong Kong. The service was commendable and I'll be delighted to use their new HK to Dublin route

标题: Good flight for a good price
内容: good and nice cabin crew. The food was also okay The aircraft was clean and the crew was helpfull. Good legroom and seats

We had to change airports as a typhoon had hit Osaka airport, Cathay would not change the final destination airport unless we paid an exorbitant amount to change (HK to Tokyo) so in the end we had a full refund and had to book all flights again this being our cheapest option still costing us ￡19 more each!

标题: Best flight ever in Premium Economy
内容: Great service with very welcoming, helpful and friendly staff both at checkin and on flight. Lots of leg room, seats had good recline and a leg raiser. They were the widest Premium Economy seats I have ever sat it. Entertainment had up to date movies as well as older ones. Over the ear noise cancelling headphones which were comfortable to...

Cathay Pacific rightly have a good reputation and this trip (London - HKG - Kunming and Chengdu - HKG - London) lived up to it.
Only downside was relatively long stopovers in Hong Kong.

标题: Service was disappointing and seats uncomfortable
内容: Service was generally ok however I was feeling unwell a few hours before landing at JFK airport and requested a glass of orange juice. The flight attendant came to me and said they were serving beverages shortly and I would have to wait - I told her I was feeling sick and she still hesitated, 15 mins later she arrived...

Great experience from the airline never flown with them before but was very surprised with the service , from check in to reclaiming our baggage as we were flying via Hong Kong and was unsure about changing planes and our baggage upon arrival in Bali but we were pleasantly surprised as everything went so smoothly they were brilliant.
We liked...

标题: Good service and Food, comfy seats
内容: My first time in Premium Economy and whilst not as good as Business class, still very comfortable seats which reclined well and had an elevated leg rest allowing me to almost stretch out completely. A good level of food but not incredible. Service was excellent.
First time I have flown with this airline, found it very small leg room and although stewards and stewardess were pleasant did not like this airline so much as ithers

标题: Comfortable but the meals need an upgrade
内容:
Travelled premium economy, the seats are spacious and there's more leg room. Staff were very attentive and friendly.
Flight was a bit bumpy but that's to be expected flying over Russia, Mongolia and China.
Had the "Cod" for dinner and Prawns on the return flight, both served with rice. Both had a sauce but it didn't taste great.
Breakfast was...

Great airline and Hong Kong is a fantastic airport when flying to Europe as plane transfer was only a few hours and the airport is so big but easy to navigate around and find your way. I highly recommend flying with Cathay Pacific. They also emailed with flight delays and kept me updated and gave a voucher for food and...

Second flight with CP and as good as the first, we managed to get out of Hong Kong just hours prior to the Typhoon of the century striking the former colony. I have flown with a large number of airlines some new, some old and a lot that no longer exist, this however was the first time with CP, we managed to book two seats on their own right at the rear of the aircraft, they were comfortable and at six foot tall I had ample leg room, the crew were...

Great check in, boarding ,and efficient staff. baggage handling at its best when you arrive in Hong Kong Airport. Not a good service food for a short haul trip. ( sandwich small bottled water). I will always take this airline when traveling in Hong Kong.
The aircraft very clean the service was great. I checked in to one of the lounges in Hong Kong it was excellent, I’m flying again with them this year.

Had a family journey with connection at Hong Kong airport.
Flight attended are very polite and willing to assist if needed within seconds.
Aircraft was clean and suitable for long distance flight. Food was fresh and diverse, boarding was fast and easy and I the overall experience was excellent

标题: Short pleasant flight to HK, decent food and service
内容: Took a short flight to HKG on Cathay. Changed my perception of the awful experience some years ago on same airline. Tremendous improvement in service, food was good, and staff friendly and attentive. Price was competitive too. Impressed.

标题: 5 hours delay without even offering a drink
内容:
the flight was delayed several times giving us some blur reasons.
even without offer some drink or apologize to the waiting passengers.
every few minutes they announce a different time of departure.
the total delay was 5 hours.
disappointing.

the first time on board a359. the sheet was fine. my armrest was broken.
but cas were all friendly and kind. especially osaka dialect speaking ism was great !

Highly recommend!
We got off to a challenging start at the airport as we were ignorantly guided to the wrong queue at checkin.
However, after that everything else was perfect.
- the lounges at Heathrow and Hong Kong are large and spacious so you do not feel cramped. Little things like Aesop soap and luxurious marble in the showers all...

标题: What you would expect from an airline
内容:
I got a good price for business class, so decided to splash out. In terms of space and quality of service, it was certainly worth it. The food was good, the flights were on time, and the check-in was quick.
This long (two-night) journey is never easy, but it helps being able to choose your seat when you book for...

Once everyone boarded they then endeavored to move him to a 3 seat row where he was able to elevate leg and sleep for the entire flight. They...

标题: Comfortable and friendly, will fly again
内容: Flight organised from baggage check-in through flight to check-out at the other end, both ways on the return journey. Flight crew friendly, good communication, food plentiful and movies great. Seats clean and comfortable and there was a little extra space on both flights. Timings all good for connecting flights.

标题: What an amazing journey. Over such incredible country
内容: I have been wanting to do this flight for many years. 12 days ago I had my wish come true. What an amazing flight. We left New York, JFK, flew straight up over Canada then turned east to fly right over the middle of Greenland to continue on over Spitsbergen. To see below the sea ice and frozen land is...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: CX are a good option for travellers out of Dublin, Ireland wishing to head East. They provide competition for the 3 Middle East operators, and others. We were very pleased with our 4 sectors. Pre-flight; reservations, check-in and boarding was efficient and user friendly. Nice food on board. Good in-flight entertainment system. On-time departures and arrivals. I am flying with Cathay Pacific since more than 3 years and more than 4 Million Miles.
Since the early days when Cathay had this personal touch it has developed to one of the best AIRLINES in the world but recently it is scaling down their quality to the detriment of the passengers. No more smile when checking in -...

Cathay Pacific are a very reliable airline, very well organised and punctual. Great service at check in and very friendly staff. Their food is very nice and service is excellent. All in all a great airline.

Seats were wide, good leg room. Service was excellent. Food was great. However, the Cathay flight from Hong Kong to Vancouver was very different! The plane seats were narrow, no leg room. Service was rushed.

Quick access at the Gate and Check-in.
Good legroom, Reasonable food and inflight entertainment options

I would not recommend travelling with Cathay Pacific if you want to arrive with your luggage. My 71 year old mothers luggage was lost in transit and I received not a single apology from the Melbourne staff. I was told that this simply happens to lots of people. It took them two days to contact me despite numerous emails and...

标题: Convenience, frequency flight and good air line
内容:
always convenience, frequency flight, easy for arranging trip.
but ticket is not cheap, the seat on flight not clean, food need to improve, but still is a good airline for traveller
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Economy' 'Hong Kong - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: Customer service very good although economy nothing was too much trouble would use them again. Food was a good standard and the choice of films more than adequate.

Cathy Pacific is best airline in terms of time and service. Flight is most of the time is on time and the service is very great. be it check in / food on board/ service during flight / luggage at the destination. Their customer service is great.

Have been lucky enough to travel to Europe the last fees years with Etihad and Emirates so decided to try Cathay Pacific so we could enjoy stop over in Hong Kong. Couldn’t believe how poor the quality of food was and the lack of service available, they don’t even give you a littlebag with toothbrush, socks and eye mask. The...

We booked return tickets from TPE to Auckland, transit via HK, with very great price. The...
I haven't flown in a long time. This flight was very comfortable. The service was good. We enjoyed the food and the beverage services. I will recommend them to anyone.

I was very happy with the comfort on the flight, the food was ok and because the flight wasn't full I got three seats to myself.
The check-in staff at Manchester were very pleasant, but the aircrew were not particularly friendly..

标题: Satisfying flight out from Hong Kong
内容: When we checked in Hong Kong Airport the ground staff could not guide us properly and we had to make unnecessary up and down between counters. Leaving this aside the checking in operation was smooth. The seats were clean and okay. Foods were good. We had no problem in collecting our baggage. Overall we had a satisfying travel.

标题: A35 is great but computer system can do with upgrade
内容:
The new Airbus 35 is great. The seats are generously spaced and wide enough even for the large adult. Cathay Pacific food is better than most airlines though it's still airline food.
For the 2nd time, the automated check-in system couldn't recognise the e-ticket or booking numbers. Even the airline staff admitted that the system has not been working for...

The short flights by Cathay Pacific were on time both ways making a short visit more possible.
The only drawback was a long wait at Immigration upon arrival in Taipei.
National Museum, Taipei 11 and lots of nice food make it an interesting short trip.
Anthony Wilson.

The check in at Hong Kong airport was very efficient, we loved the airport and had a delicious meal which passed the time nicely. The flight was good, but delays at customs spoiled what was otherwise a very pleasant experience. We were waiting for 75 minutes in a queue just to go throjgh passport control.

标题: Premium economy made the flight so much easier.
内容: The whole experience was good from check in to leaving the aircraft. The premium economy section was comfortable with larger seats, ability to recline further than in Economy, leg support, and lots more room. The flight to Rome had no toilet in the Premium Economy section which was a shame as the one in Economy needed more attention from the...

We had booked a flight from Bali to Gatwick via Hong Kong but our flight had lon delays and we were re-routed via Bangkok, with several hours wait at both Dempesar and Bangkok. We then had to pay for a coach from Heathrow to Gatwick, where we had parked. The seats we had were at the back of the plane...

Perfectly pleasant trip flying from New Zealand to Amsterdam. I was with my elderly father and he had assistance, which makes the process easier. All the assistance staff (except a surly and unpleasant one in Hong Kong) were helpful and good to deal with. The lounge in Hong Kong on return was OK (forget the name - near gate 2);...

I decided to give Premium economy a go as the travel time to NY approx 24hrs. The leg room was good. I am over 6' (185cm) tall. Seat width and recline was adequate. Could be better. Food quality ok, even for vegetarians. By the way, there are other types of cuisines rather than pasta for vegetarians. At least in Premium...
Flight from Helsinki to Shanghai via HK was very smooth. Time schedule was kept well. Service during flight was excellent as well as lounge service.

Fuss free travel with Cathay Pacific. From the time I arrive at the check in counter to the time I board the plane, the staff are always friendly and helpful. Service on the plane is just as good as it is on the ground.

This was the first time we flew with Cathay Pacific and the check in was great. There were several automated check in machines and staff there to help anyone that wasn't familiar with them. The flight was good and we had a choice of chinese or English style breakfast. The food was typical airline food in that it was edible...
Comfortable. Cabin crew kind attentive and helpful Senior flight attendant welcomed you and farwelled you by name

I have travelled many times on Cathay from Melbourne to Hong Kong, but this was my first time all the way to Paris. I was able to use my QF frequent flyers for the whole trip. Service and entertainment were good. No complaints at all.

We flew from Auckland to Paris Via HongKong and returned from London with a stopover in HongKong.
We were very impressed with the staff, the food, the standard of the airport lounges and the comfort of the business section. We will travel with them again.
The first time I fly with the Airline butiful service nice food the crew1% all the flayed we Ben served with drink

As usual Cathay were really good with both great food & great service. Their 1st class lounge in Hong Kong is one of the best I have visited anywhere in the world providing excellent food & hospitality.

I took Cathay Pacific to New York last April 218. I traveled with my friend so i got the seat in the back most part of the plane for some reasons. One is it has more legroom as compared to the others (well i think there is). Two is i think the seats can be more reclined since it's not...

Flew premium economy Bne-HK-Rome-HK then upgraded to business from HK to Brisbane. Seats much more roomy than economy, very comfortable. Extra legroom appreciated. We had noone behind so could recline seat fully. Meals and service very good. Checkin and out excellent. No luggage problems.
Good inflight services.

Thus flight was taken during the recent super typhoon.
Cathay Pacific constantly kept me abreast of delays and rescheduling of flights.
In addition to helpful updates, I enjoyed a pleasant flight, with a few bumps as we approached Hong Kong, and excellent in-flight experience.
The flight crew are always professional and polite.
I would recommend Cathay Pacific without reservations.

Only thing I can say is seating space was good. Hardly saw staff and felt queasy after our meal. Not appetising at all. To repetitive, no imagination. Cabin crew looked grumpy and if you didn’t make eye contact when they were dishing out food or drinks you missed out!! Sat on tarmac for 2 & half hours in Hong Kong,...

内容: Have been flying Cathay Pacific for the last 1+ years on Business, Premium Econ and Economy classes. It used to the the TOP airline in the world and it showed. It's deteriorated for about the last 6 to 8 years as the service agents are all new, inexperience and quite blend. The attendants on the ground and in the air...

Our flight was scheduled to leave at 7.35am but was delayed by 1-hour. We received text notification of the delay well before leaving for the airport which we were grateful for. Having already received our boarding passes online prior to arrival at the airport the baggage checkin process was easy and straight forward. As it was an international flight we...

Having flown with 3 or 4 other long haul airlines I was looking forward to this flight. It was the final section of flights to Manchester, England & then home from Dublin, Ireland to Melbourne, Australia. Maybe it's my age, 64, but the 13-14 hour flights involved in this time were tiresome, I felt that there was not enough food...

Overall it is a great experience and comfortable. On time performance and good service in flight and ground. Meal delivered as preferred and inflight entertainment is very nice for international traveller. Excellent staff and will fly again for sure.

Good airline. On time. Services good. Foods are not so good.
Drinks are good: Coffee, Tea.
Seats are comfortable compare to United. Entertainment is great with 12 inches view. Late night snacks with cookies, noodles.

Mistook my flight schedule, so found only business class was available to get home,so went for it. Service was excellent, as was the food, and the bed comfortable and long enough for a tall person. So spoilt that I hope never to fly economy ever again.

标题: CX not a user friendly flight company
内容: i plan this family trip to London n Paris for a long time almost 6 month, and i have a lot of Asia miles points for exchanging the ticket. the flight company CX just confirm i can use my miles points to exchange to the one way flight from Hong Kong to London, but they didn't confirm the return flight...

I am a permanent wheelchair user, and this is the third time I have flown with this airline. I have traveled with various airlines in the past 2 years, and it is the best, most friendly,helpful and efficient airline I have traveled on. I travel on my own, and it can be a bit tricky and frustrating at times, but...

Sat in seat 4K - window seat. Although it was a 'bulk-head' and clearly had a cradle shelf, the leg room seemed shorter than normal, particularly when compared to the row in the middle. Aside from that, a good flight and lovely cabin crew (who had to re-set my TV set twice - but did it straight away).

We again received another notification in less than...

Almost 24hrs in from start to finish and the true measure, our kids, enjoyed themselves. The flight attendants were incredibly attentive, the plane was a reasonably new Airbus so it was clean and had all the bells and whistles. I particularly liked how staff looked out for you…of their own accord they the told person in front to put seat...

I purchased a round trip premium economy seat on Cathay pacific from SFO to Cebu
The hurricane hit Hong Kong and my flight was canceled
Cathay did not notify my until their phone center was closed and made me drive 175 miles round trip to deal with it at the airport.
