Friendly staff and not a bad trip for the length! But if you’re gluten free, take your own snacks. They have NOTHING - no crisps, chips, biscuits, even the ice cream contained gluten. So unless you can survive on the two meals they offer you might want to take some extras.

- Great meals and snacks
- attentive service
- newer planes have better entertainment displays and seats

Great can now fly direct to Dublin and family. Excellent flight well looked after and friendly crew.
Thanks Cathy Pacific

标题: So disappointing after last years amazing experience!
内容: Adelaide to Hong Kong and on to Amsterdam! What a disappointment! Firstly no dedicated staff to premium economy cabin. A real lack of service. Once the awful meal was served, with plastic cups and very little choice of drinks, we didnt see staff again until the next meal. No offers of drinks or snacks. Toilet was quite a way back...

I would highly recommend using Cathay Pacific when traveling to Hong Kong or beyond
Vwry comfortable excellent food and overall high level
experience

We’ve always flown Singapore Air when traveling through Hong Kong, but this trip Cathay Pacific has a better flight time for us. We had heard good things about the airlines and decided to give it a try. Singapore Air has far better cabin service. Their attendants are very attentive to the passengers and are very personable. We had to go...

Had a warm welcome and thoroughly enjoyed experience with Cathay...even leg room was bit longer than Qantas.
Didn't have problem with food and the snacks were suitable for a short trip.
Hostesses couldn't do enough to help and extremely friendly.

Flight was okay. However, the space was too cramp. My elbow was touching another passenger's during the flight. Seat was uncomfortable and too cramp. The breakfast on the flight was not to my expectation. Did not eat much of it.
Hopefully, they could revamp the flight and have a more spacious seats.

标题: Great service and lie flat comfort.
内容: Kudos to Cathay for making an otherwise grueling flight so pleasant. The inflight service was attentive without being solicitous. The flight attendants were professional and friendly and the on board food was tasty! The stopover in Hong Kong was made even more pleasing with the business lounge. There are at least four to choose from and each with distinct features....

内容: Having flown this aircraft in the past and had excellent service thought I would get good service again but unfortunately this was not so on this flight. The flight attendants were very slow in serving meals and drinks and did not, until just about when we were about to land, make sure that people were in their seats with their...

标题: The best way to do long haul flights
内容: We were travelling to London via Hong Kong with a change of airline. Our seats were comfortable, the food excellent & in service spot on.

标题: Flying out from Zurich to Hong Kong on CX flight
内容:
- Flight departed on time ex Zurich and arrived 1-15 minutes early into Hong Kong
- The check in process was smooth and check in staff were polite
- The boarding was efficient and First and Business class passengers were given priority to board first
- Welcome drinks with choice of champagne, juice and water
- Very comfortable seats, the...

标题: Very spoiled on Cathay Pacific to New Zealand
内容: I mostly travel economy and in the past few years have had the opportunity to travel Premium economy. And though this was an amazing way to travel..... the chance to travel with Cathay Pacific came up and I will never be happy travelling in economy again. From the moment we stepped onto the plane ....and I saw my amazing seat...

A non-stop journey longer than the geographical span of single plane is invigorating with the fresh air in the transit lounge of airport. Cathay Pacific excels in airline booking from departure to arrival through code sharing in customer service.

标题: 2 different flight experience from and to Hong Kong
内容: Everytime when I travel Singapore by morning session, good service and new airplane served. However when I return to HK by night especially at the evening session, the aircraft would be old model and crowded with passengers and the food is bad. So remember to have your dinner in Singapore airport before travelling back to HK.

We loaded onto the plane on time, and then were stuck on the tarmac one hour. Were then told Manila airport was closed and had to disembark. 6 hours 2 minutes later we finally departed. Not going to fly Cathay Pacific again.

I recently was scheduled to fly from Toronto to Singapore via Hong Kong. Typhoon Mankhut was predicted to hit Hong Kong. Two days before my flight, Cathay rebooked me on another airline to avoid trip disruption. I have never had such pro-active customer service on any other airline. Fantastic! I should also note that I was flying on a points...
the seat are big and comfortable . cabin crew are also very professional .Alot of selectionon the movie .

标题: They changed my seating assignment numerous times, though I had paid for premium. Most horrible routing I have ever had.
内容: Terrible ground service experience. My seat was changed several times to lesser preferred seating. Rude ground service in Hong Kong. I thought Cathay was good before but they have slipped. After sending a letter received a ridiculous response. I won't fly this airline again.

I flew Cathay Pacific from NYC to Denpasar, Indonesia. Considering that I was flying Economy class I was nervous about how comfortable I would be on an almost 24 hour flight.
The seats on the flight were well cushioned and comfortable with ample leg room. What I liked the most was that the staff kept us consistently fed with regular...

As all years i go to HONG Kong for the internazionale jewellery expo in wanchai. We have our booth as NICEM SPA SENAGO MILANO. I love This expo. As every year i use kathai pacific. Big compliment to all staff of the business class of the fly day 11 SEPTEMBER left MILANO around 1 pm.
Too gentile person there FOOD...

标题: Enjoyable, relaxing fights to and from Hong Kong!
内容: My private cubicle was very comfortable. The seat fold down to a flat bed, with a comforter & pillow provided. I watched two movies enjoyed two full meals ( food was good, not great) and still had time to sleep. I liked being able to track our position through out the flight. The flight attendants were efficient, professional and friendly.

By far this was the best airlines and most luxurious flight we had in all of Asia. Not only were the seats comfortable with leg room, but the flight attendants were very pleasant and happy. The movie selection was good and the seat monitor had a section for looking outside to see where you were, it was awesome for the...

Nothing exceptional or bad about the flight. It was just like any other economy flight with minimum leg space, food, drinks etc.
The flight was delayed by about 2 minutes due to heavy rains.
Check in was efficient at Singapore airport, however long queues were there at HK airport.

标题: high efficient, but low quality on flight meal
内容: CX crew are very efficient team, the design of the seat is very compact but still comfortable and sufficient for normal Asian body size. However, the on flight meal are very poor quality and not good taste.
Nice flight, good food and great service. It wasn’t on time, but not due to airline. We were looked after very well.

I travelled on one of the few flights that took off the day before Typhoon Mangkhut hit HKG and the delays on ground was extensive. The flight crew did make announcements as to why we were still on ground after doors were closed. Cabin crew served water on ground as we were waiting for air traffic control to give us...

Probably due to the fact that the plane at least in Premium Economy was more than half empty, we were offered a very good service and even the water supply - which usually is less than satisfactory - has been ample; and not the terrible tap water they usually dish up, but bottled Mineral water!
Food and wine were very...

Without even stepping on the plane I give Cathay Pacific 5 Stars for their telephone booking service. Despite the wait for my call to be picked up by an operator, i was continually told ‘we will be with you soon’. Not too much, but reassuringly enough. The operators knew their product. I had two bookings for multi destinations with stop...
Smooth flight, on time, adequate meals, enough leg room, pleasant service, kind people, (husband likes the A35 plane)

Our Flight from JFK New York to Hong Kong was long and arduous but the Flight Crew were attentive and helpful. Strangely the one thing I noticed was that we had to actually ask for tea and coffee...all cold drinks came through on the trolley. Check in was easy. We had a 5 minute connection in Hong Kong to board...
Could not fault any aspect of the flight. Staff delightful; food excellent; and all round comfort made the flight enjoyable.

Flew to Hong Kong on way to Finland. Greeted warmly, seat was comfortable, on board service was great, as was the movie selection. Felt like I was dining in a restaurant, very impresses with the selection of meals and wines.

标题: Beautiful amenities and great comfort - love Cathay
内容: Excellent service on Cathay, toilets always super clean, great menu, large bed, a very comfortable flight for 14 to 15 hours. Great lounge in Hong Kong with great won ton soup. Love to be able to dine with my companion in same booth.

The flight attendants were helpful, kind and pleasant in cleaning up, providing Pj's, and calling a doctor on land when my wife vomited soon after takeoff. In our confusion upon exiting the plane, we left a couple of items in the overhead bin. They had them ready for us the next day.

7 hour nonstop flight from Hong along to Brisbane.Friendly and fast ticket service,fast check in. Comfortable seat,entertainment system is ok,food ok,nice red wine on board.Very friendly Staff,foreign pilot.Will flight again with Cathay .

标题: Being somewhat disabled I was assisted at all parts of the journey by staff on and off the ground.The least helpful wer.
内容:
Food service was good, meals were of a satisfactory standard...mix of Western and Asian cuisine.
Seats were adjacent to the toilet, which we thought was convenient until everyone started using it through the night!
The usual gripe about the passenger in the seat in front who needed his seat right back throughout the flight.

标题: Overcrowded, Narrow Seats, Poor Service - a Bad Cathay Experience
内容: Flew out of Hong Kong on a Boeing 777 - the same aircraft we flew to HK in - 4 weeks earlier (comfortable trip). This flight was atrocious. The seat configuration, instead of being 4-3-4 (or less) was 4-4-4 with a very full flight. The aisle seats jutted out into the passage way so much that the crew could not...

The flight attendants not too professional, may be is overnight flight, flight attendants not smile and seem rude. The flight was delayed for an hour, no any special arrangements or offer any snacks .
The seat is cozy and the crew is very good.? You can chose your meal and it will serve to you directly.

Inside of the plane rattled so loudly was like the whole plane was going to collapse.
We were delayed by 3 hrs sitting in a hot humid plane no drinks offered ... wouldn’t fly them again

I took a fligh from LAX to Hong Kong. The flight was pleasent, the seats very comfortable with very good legroom (I am short but I believe is good also for tall people). The service for our trip was nice, the food is more like american style (some airlines use more the chinese style food) the snacks are pretty good...

We had requested assistance for my partner who is awaiting an operation. The help we received was exceptional. Wheelchairs were provided at each airport which was a godsend! Both ground crew and hostesses were not only efficient but also extremely pleasant. Food and beverages supplied were also mist acceptable.

标题: Seoul via Hong Kong, good value and good service
内容: Flew to Seoul on Friday arriving Saturday via Hong Kong, just missing the tornado. Flights well appointed and on time. 1.5 hr turnaround at HK is enough to stretch legs. Excellent Cathay service. Seat pitch a little cramped in economy but they were 777 and 333 aircraft. All in all a good value and relatively fast way of getting here.

Plane on time, prompt service, very comfortable. Able to have a good sleep and arrive refreshed.Didn't see any movies because it was a late flight and sleep was more important. The latest movies were on offer.

标题: Cathay Pacific continues its top-notch reputation!!
内容: Cathay Pacific continues its excellent service. We have flown several times from the western United States to destinations in Asia on Cathay Pacific in Business Class. This airline is superb in its service oriented attendants, comfortable seating and good cuisine.

One will rarely find this type of comfort in the regular economy class nowadays. When other airlines are trying to cram as many people as they can in as little space as they can get away with, Cathay Pacific offered us comfortable seats that reclined enough that I could sleep on the 16 hours flight. I was afraid the long...

This was my 1st time flying with Cathy and I was highly impressed to the point that they are now my new favorite airline, the service on our long flight was unmatched by all other airlines that we’ve flown so far, the seats were also very comfortable and the meals were very very above average and I usually hate airline...

I was assigned seat 41 and my husband was assigned 61. I tried to change his seat thru their website. The website did not worked. I sent them email. They said they would get back to me in 1 days. By the time I got their response, we were already on the plane and all seats were taken. We agreed...

I was supposed to be on CX flight from BKK bound for SIN on 16 Sep. However it was cancelled due to Typhoon. We received the cancellation notice on 15 Sep morning and tried contacting the airline for more information but failed. There was no updates on what to do next and we could not get through the phone lines....

We flew Cathay from Perth to Hong Kong and cannot fault the comfort or service of the airline although landing was hard. Also flew back Vancouver via Hong Kong to Perth and again had great service. Only criticism would be some messy people using bathroom but that's not the airline. We have flown Cathay before and would again

The service was super, the attendants are great, you are always treated with respect. There so many movie and tv choices to watch on your individual screen. for myself, I found a British sitcom series which I binge-watched and laughed my head off for the entire 18-hour flight!
I would definitely recommend Cathay airlines

标题: good food, good entertainment choices, but a bit too cramped, and seats are uncomfortable for such a long flight. Also,
内容: on more than one flight, there was an error with our seat and meal reservations - luckily, the counter service was able to find a pair of seats next to each other so my wife and I could sit together. However, they had to put together a meal for my wife from various unused meals because her food selection was...

This was a trip that we earned with purchasing points and was scheduled and planned and booked by others. As the flight was free we chose to upgrade to premium economy. We had never flown with Cathay Pacific before but were pleasantly surprised at how efficient the process was. The flight attendants were there and gone very quickly with their...

My husband and I travelled economy class outbound & premium economy inbound. On both legs we received friendly, efficient & professional service. My dietary requirements were catered for with no fuss ( I was actually served first!) The extra we paid for the return flights in premium economy was definitely worth it for the extra leg room and comfort. Flying...

标题: Experience with flying on Cathay pacific airlines from JFK to Bangkok
内容: Airlines booking experience and assistance is good but food very Bad. Food choices were terrible. Only pasta for vegetarian choice. I would not fly this airlines again.

My trip to japan was with Cathay and it was wonderful. Though it was bumpy all the way from Jakarta to Japan, but the crew was very helpful and charming. One of the crews was Jeffrey, who took care of me when I needed to take my medicine in the flight. He was always making sure I was okay and...

I was booked on an ArtNZ code share flight, but was given none of my Star Alliance AirNZ gold benefits. no premium check in, worst seat on the plane row 73, spoken to like I had done something wrong, did get lounge access but the staff were not happy letting me in, I shifted form one lounge to another one...

标题: Dubai To Hong Kong, Good But Not Great
内容:
The Lounge was not a Cathay Pacific lounge so they can be held entirely responsible for it being a little ordinary.
Check in and boarding was efficient and easy.
The flight attendant's were friendly and Champagne and beverages were served immediately.
The food was just up to business class standard however no meals on demand were available.
This was an...

This was a very long flight from San Francisco to Hong Kong, then Hong Kong to Denpassar, Bali. It was made infinitely more pleasant with an upgrade to premium economy on the SFO to Hong Kong portion. The extra leg room, better food, and generally nicer service was worth every penny. Unfortunately, the return flight did not have an upgrade...

Cathy Business class is just decadent.
Flew with my injured son home from Melbourne, Australia to Vancouver.
The staff were amazing and very helpful. The food, drinks and refreshments outstanding

标题: Best in class service and food
内容: I fly this route often with either Cathay or Qantas. Cathay very consistent great and highly personalized service. Food offered is also excellent and superior.
Great service, comfortable and lots of space. Food was good with lots of choice. Amenities pack handy and good quality.

标题: Brisbane HK London. Return Paris to Slovenia to HK back to Brisbane.
内容:
Excellent flight with Cathay Pacific. Could not be faulted.
Flight Brisbane to Hong Kong on to London.
Return after Paris to Slovenia on to London and to Hong Kong back Brisbane.
Staff are the best. Food just right.
Travel time return 11 hours London to Hong Kong 8 hours back to Brisbane.
A pleasure all the way.
The rest of...

Prepared to tough out a red-eye in premium economy but delighted to find that my husband and I were both upgraded to business class because the flight was full. Perhaps we lucked out by checking in a little early. Seats were comfortable, fully reclining, and the service was excellent.

The food is good, the service is good. Give thumbs up to the pilot, my ear doesn't at all (my left ear is sensitive). Boarding time is punctual. The entertainment is okay. But the plane is a little old.
Not great - very tired livery and service was minimal. Could not see a great deal of difference to Economy class.

标题: Only an average experience I’m afraid
内容: I’ve flown to Europe and back many times and this has been my least favourite airline to date. The food was very mediocre - sometimes awful! Service was unfriendly and I always felt like I was being a nuisance asking for water. The toilets were not well- maintained during the flight and towards arrival became quite disgusting. This coupled with...

标题: Finally, flew Cathay Pacific ... waited way too long
内容: We've often flown from our home in the US to our home in Taiwan via EVA or, more recently, China Airline. Starting in 217, neither was available to get to Kaoshiung, the closest air port to our home in Tainan. We'd often considered Cathay Pacific/Dragon because it was a bit cheaper. However, it had a longer layover in Hong Kong...

Having been advised of a cancelled Qantas flight and some robust conversation, the decision to take the Cathay Paccific flight was a stroke of genius! From personal care at Check-in, relaxation in a superb loung area, a warm welcome on board, to wonderful attention throughout the flight. Nothing was a worry. Flight attendants were observant and often anticipated your next...

The A35 is a newer sleeker and better plane for Cathay. Only a relatively short flight ( 8 hours), Business was comfortable, but the interior was shabby and showed signs of wear and tear, and not clean!
the toilets servicing the business cabins are small and really need to be larger for business flying patrons. Service was efficient but again...

I have flown from Vancouver to Asia four times with Cathay Pacific and had a great experience every time. On one trip to Thailand I missed my connecting flight in Hong Kong because of bad weather. Cathay booked me on a new flight to Bangkok and they gave me a free airport hotel room so I could have a nap...

We have flown Cathy previously and had hoped that the business cabin flights had improved. Alas not the case. They still operate the older Boeing 777 cabins. They are in need of a revamp. Whilst service was ok, it appeared cabin staff were more interested in achieving speed times for service and completion rather than attending to the customers.Whilst the...

This was my first tie experiencing business class and it was absolutely unbelievably good. The service was outstanding, the flat bed very wide and comfy and the good was restaurant quality. 1 our of 1.

Inaugural flight from DC to Hong Kong on an A35 1. Incredible aircraft - quite and cabin has higher humidity, lower cabin pressure than older aircraft so feel pretty good after 16 hour flight. Three class of service - b/class, premium economy,and economy. We flew Premium economy and it is the best deal going. Smaller cabin with only 32 seats...

Love this non-stop flight to Vancouver enroute to Hong Kong. Leaves around 9 pm local and in just after midnight local. Friendly and accommodating staff, lots of room even in economy and the food is good (and included).

Made the longest flight (15hrs, stopping over in Hong Kong) I’ve been on feel short.
Meals were great, staff are always helpful & on-board entertainment is really good.
Highly recommend Cathay Pacific for longer flights

I flew Cathay Pacific for the first time this past June 218. Hong Kong to Singapore is an almost 4 hour flight and every minute of it was wonderful. Even in economy the seats were comfortable and the leg space was better than other airlines in the same class. The flight attendants service was fantastic! So attentive and respectful of...
Despite being a 15hour flight, the attention and the onboard entertainment were perfect! Also great food variety and noodle soup at any time.

标题: Cathay Pacific - I would Use them Again
内容: The plane was packed to the wingtips (but that is a business expectation) and the plane very hot. Service was good albeit very slow as the Plane was mainly Hong Kong Residents who ate regularly during the night. We paid extra for wing exit seats but they were right beside the lavatory, which was in use most of the flight...

MY wife and I flew in May 218 with Cathay Pacific and returned in June. We had flown before and their service was as wonderful as ever. The staff are friendly, helpful and warm. You are met with warm towls to refresh yourself, a choice of OJ, water or sparkling white. The seats are confortable and roomy, and the food...

Very affordable direct flight to NYC. No fuss airline, excellent cabin crew. Okay food. One free checked bag. Only draw back is return arrival time in Vancouver is 2am. So if you need to take a ferry (me) or another flight, means a hotel in Van. Their online reservation/ check in works flawlessly!

标题: Superior nonstop services from HKG to TLV
内容: Tried to book business class and premium economy class the last minutes (within one week), but unfortunately, all were fully booked. So, i need to seat in the Economy class, but the caring services and food quality did impress us.

for reliability and comfort this airline is one of the best in the world ,the friendly staff assist you with every need and , if you need anything from needle and cotton to onward bookings they will go out of their way to help you.
One of the best longer flights we have made albeit with an overnight at Hong Kong; which reduced the stress levels significantly.

Flew with Cathay to England recently, very good service, efficient but not overly friendly. Seats had quite good legroom, would prefer 2-3-2 configuration in economy cabin, as when you travel as a couple much easier and more comfortable to be window and aisle seat without someone being on the end. We had 2 seats in middle row, but sometimes people...
Very good service especially during the night. Cabin crew were constantly about offering water, snacks etc. Food in flight was good. Entertainment was okay ,wasn't a problem as slept most of the way.

标题: Comfortable flight, lots of movies, meals are good
内容: We took an overnight flight from Hong Kong, lots of movie choices, had dinner and breakfast, meals are good.
my favourite long haul airline, not just because they fly direct with no stops (bliss) but for food and intelligent and pleasant staff. Comfortable planes

Cathay Pacific has always been a top airline of choice for Hong Kong trips as this is the airline for HK. However, I found that over the past few years the level of service on the flight has decreased significantly, while the process of the tickets have rarely stayed comparable to say Air Canada. The one incident where has pushed...
Have used CP several times now for long haul o/s flights. No issues whatsoever. Great planes, Great inflight service, and seamless transitions in Hong Kong.

Efficient transfer of luggage with a transit stop in Hong Kong
Friendly staff onboard, service was a little rushed, no pre dinner drinks/snacks, all served with meal thereby minimising alcohol consumption.
Temperature was comfortable throughout and seat spacing ok for economy. Surprised the seats in front still interfere with you when reclined as I thought all long haul flights now...

A long time since I’ve flown economy so was apprehensive however Cathay crew demonstrated good old fashioned service which was very well received. Food was good as was the alcohol selection.
Visa problem at Beijing airport and the Cathay rep on the ground was excellent, lending us his phone to advise our friends who were collecting us as we did...

From check in to the Lounge a pleasant experience. Very friendly staff. A goid selection of amenities.
Perfect food, a flat businessclass seat and a friendly staff on the plane.
A perfect flight as always, thank you

This Airline I would choose above others ...plenty room
I was in a moonboot and comfortable .Given excellent help and service from all air staff
Making a tough journey easy

标题: A disappointing and average experience on every level
内容:
As Cathay has now begun the process of reconfiguring economy to 1 abreast I decided to go premium for a slightly better experience
The only thing different between the 2 classes is the seat and even that is below par compared to other carriers
Cathay is a 5 star airline as recognised by skytrax but I fail to understand how....

Business to HK fabulous - however be aware - business between HK and Bali is really only slightly better than Premium economy. Seat foot rests are awful. Fly this part during the day if I were you as sleeping is not pleasant - However, everything else on that flight and on the larger leg of our journey was a pleasure...

All in all, very good! Direct flight, sweet cabin crew, food was 8/1. Entertaiment on screen is good, but cant bend screen. So if one seat goes back, you have eyes glued to backseat, not screen..:(
Good good!

First time we could understand the pilot taking
Great choice of movies
Plane food has really changed to the better

This time I'm flying from Jakarta to Vancouver. It was very last minute decision to go to vancouver, and I could accept the premium economy class seat. It has been more than 12 years since the last time I flew with Cathay Pacific.
For this time trip, I had a pleasant flight experience. The schedule from Jakarta to Hong Kong...

Initially there were no seats for selection on online check-in.
I happened to have arrived a lot earlier to the airport for my flight, and despite not holding any marco polo tiers but just the asia miles membership, I was offered to upgrade to Business.
Spent some time looking for the physical controls to my IFE coz the lights were...

标题: Great Entertainment System for Long Haul Flights
内容: Flew Cathay from Vancouver to Bali, Bali to Hong Kong, and Hong Kong back to Vancouver. Really enjoyed their entertainment system - lots to entertain passengers! I found their food to be better than Air Canada's food (oh wait - what food?!) and like how they have cup noodles and snacks readily available throughout the flight. I did find their...

Comfortable flight with good entertainment selection. I'm not a tall person anyway but I found the seats spacious and comfortable. I like that you can fold out the table in half or also just pull out the cup holder instead of the entire tray. I ordered special Indian vegetarian meals and both of those were actually tasty and felt like...

Chef LeeZ Thai Cooking Class Bangkok and crew found this flight to be a very pleasant experience .. I can see why they are in league with Air Canada .. modern airplane, good entertainment, great airline food, the crew with a super attitude.

CX from Hong Kong to Vancouver flight #888
- on 777- 3ER - 3-3-3-seat
- seat not as tight as the other direct flight to Vancouver
- flight delayed for an hour- seemed to be quite frequent with CX flights now as my last few with them were
- FA are pleasant and service as courteous as industry expected
-...

标题: Lounge locations and standard of catering on business class flights
内容: Cathay Pacific has several business class lounges at various locations in the Hong Kong International Airport. The logical choice for me is to use the one nearest the departure gate. Would it be possible for Cathay to provide some sort of location map at strategic locations in the airport, or, on the back of the invitation slip, indicating the various...

We had a great flight from Perth to Hong Kong; one leg of a multi leg flight. All legs Premium Economy PER-HKG, HKG-Amsterdam, then London (Heathrow)-HKG, then HKG-PER. All legs had great service, food was really good, selection of entertainment was great, comfort was outstanding with plenty of space.
The flights themselves were without incident, very smooth and we felt...

This is the first time I have flown Cathay business class in many years. I have flown business class many times from Asia to the US on other carriers, but I had some One World miles soon expiring, so I decided to try Cathay. I was not disappointed. They have a very good time schedule from Bangkok to New York....

Not a great experience and on the return leg they actually managed to lose my baggage. They did pay me compensation of 3 yuan.which I thought was bad. No apologies at all, and I needed to argue with them over getting 3. The flight was delayed on the return journey so I missed my connecting flight to beijng and then...

For the price we are paying and for a a full fledge carrier, i was appalled at the quality of the airplane. The seats were plastic (overlay with cushions - a design i google and realised was from 26), my in flight entertainment broke down twice, no leg rest and a musky smell. Even the seatbelt design was ancient. A...

We left JFK, NYC on time. It was an evening flight. People were just getting on line to board the plane before any announcements were made. The line moved quickly until we got on the plane. People were standing in the isles and trying to place their carry-on bags into the overhead compartments.
The food was not bad, however, we...

标题: Low numbers flew on Friday 13th, had an entire ailse to myself!
内容: First Cathay Pacific flight, it was flawless. Loved having an entire aisle to myself, being a Friday 13th flight. Enjoyed the food, the movies on offer, the tv screen giving geographical flight details. Staff were polite and professional. Will fly with them again.

Though have one hour delay, it is safe because there was thunder storm and raining hard. I'd rather it delay than forced to fly. Food in Cathy is always good. Have Plaza Premium Lounge of Cathay in the small airport of Siem Reap International Airport which is very convenient. Sometimes can get real cheap deals in fan fair of Cathay.

标题: Paying for exit row not worth it
内容: I flew Cathay pacific from Hong Kong to LAX and paid an extra $15 to sit in the exit row. I was seated next to a tall and Fat man with big arms. He took the armrest that we are supposed to share? Why don’t I have my own armrest? I was very uncomfortable and they couldn’t move me as...

标题: Tip of the cap to you m’ladies
内容:
Big fan of Cathay, the hosts/hostesses were on point with the meals, drinks and instructions.
Professionalism aside (which I can’t fault), the staff came over smiling ear to ear holding large helpings of complimentary red wine and noodles, a joy an absolute joy.
A great selection of films and tv on tap made it one to remember - cheers.
Get...

I booked a connecting flight of my entire family from India to Melbourne via Hong Kong, Their first flight got delayed and just by 2 minutes they closed the gate and didn't let us the board for connecting flight from Hong Kong. Its such a worst service and they have no apology for us. This is such a horrible incident...

标题: i dont think i will fly them again
内容:
i am a marco polo member and cathy pacific was my go-to airline when i am in southeast asia but with my latest experience, i dont think i will ever fly them again.
had a really bad experience with the boarding and getting on the flight, i ask to see the flight manager but was totally ignored. i wrote and...

We recently flew return Melbourne to Amsterdam with Cathay Pacific.
We have never flown with Cathay before but found the flight and service excellent. Cabin staff were attentive but not overbearing, food was very nice and plentiful. We were late leaving Amsterdam but were kept informed as to what was happening and staff were good with regard to concerns people...

标题: Great flight but food let down
内容:
Excellent check in . lounge was great . Boarding very quick , Crew very pleasant flight on time
Sadly the food was not inviting looked as though it has been preheated about 2 time
plus not Asian food - everything was European -- very sad for Asian Airline
seats not that comfortable

Unable to book in online until the day before we left and found all premium economy seats booked except for 2 seats well apart. No luck before we boarded to sit together until onboard and steward asked someone if he would swap. Now stuck in middle of four seat row in middle. Water chosen to drink tasted terrible so asked...

The flight was at 145 pm from Delhi and frankly, I was so tired that as soon as the flight took off, I straightened the seat for a flat bed and slept. Woke up just in time when it was landing on time. So in all smooth flight in right on time and had no complaints what so ever

Please be very careful with Cathay Pacific and your baggage allowances per person! Fly out of Australia with 92-kilos baggage allowance (2-people x 2-bags each with 23-kilos allowance) Six weeks later when flying out of London with 76-kilos between 2-people, charged ￡69. for “excess baggage” and the airline blames “North America rules”?!?! BE VERY CAREFUL......Ask about flights out AND IN....

On our flight to HK,there was no more couple seats available except for the only one that has got a bigger leg room,near the emergency exit. Both husband and myself are considerably average height but we do have long legs! So it was very comfortable seats for us. Asides from that, they provided blankets and food was good! Dessert was...

Staff on tbis flight should be commended for there service, there was a man who was I'll, and who was a complete nucenss the whole flight he was constantly calling them,at one time had five staff sorting him out with oxygen,taking him to the toilet,feeding him and tending to his needs. I know it's there job but poor crew they...

The experience has been fantastic. CX Catahai Pacific Premium Economy is a real premium, with enough space to strech legs, to put your luggage on the overhead without fighting with other people, and a very punctual service (welcome drink, dedicated menu, dedicated toilet).
Staff is very polite and always available in case of any need. I consider one of the...

Very good flight, good food and service. Inflight entertainment good. Would recommend and plan on using Cathy Pacific again.
Not so keen on the self service check in the airline are now doing but all airlines seem to be doing this

i flew from akl to ph via hk on aug 7,218 only to have my holiday plans ruined due to miscommunication between airlines. u see i booked this flight thru cathay website only to receive the itinerary 2-3wks after i confirmed it. and it indicated as airnz airline from akl to hk, cathay from hk to cebu. now, air new...

Cathay Pacific Lounge at Hong Kong airport was wonderful. Dandan noodle and wanton noodles were very delicious!! The signature cocktail, "cathey dilight" was refreshing. In the lounge, calm and comfortable. Business class flight offers value for money.
＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊

This was my third flight (two sectors each way) with Cathay Pacific and they get better each time. This time I was traveling with my partner, and my travel agent had forgotten to selects seats for us to sit together. The ground and flight crew went out of their way to accomodate our wish to sit together. Again, great food...
CX is always at professional standard but so disappointed that at mid-night flight is no more drink and meals only sandwich.

标题: Fabulous service and flight as usual
内容:
I have flown the Cathay many times and never been disappointed. Their service is impeccable and comfortable.
The bathrooms are cleaned and services regularly
Their food offers good choices and you are fed regularly without being overfed.
Congratulations Cathay on a job well done

标题: Takes the Stress out of Long Haul
内容: We flew London- Hong Kong - Auckland and return. Check in was always courteous and speedy, the lounges were comfortable with a variety of food and drink and the cabin crew were courteous and obliging. The seats in business were very comfortable and self contained and the food was amazing and always available. Nothing was too much trouble even in...
Great check in. It took us two minutes to get through. Great seats and impressive food and service. We were absolutely delighted.

I'll start by saying that the staff are lovely, very polite. Maybe this is contributed to the problem. When I book business class I am not just paying for a seat - I am paying for a premium service. This service includes a quiet and relaxing environment where I can rest, to arrive refreshed at my destination. Unfortunately there was...

Has flown Cathay extensively over the years. Its edge over rivals has narrowed over the years, but for long haul flights still pretty good. Excellent entertainment which is essential, and fairly comfortable seats. Quality of food has worsened noticeably, but they do serve snacks during the overnight flight. Service is good, and I suppose the thing I like best about...
Flew from Sydney to Zurich via Hongkong. Boeing 777. On time. Good IFE. They had my kosher meal on board on both flights.

标题: Efficient and as comfortable as economy can be on a long flight
内容: Heathrow very busy but we got through security etc quite well. Had 4 days in HK to break the journey and was well worth doing. Good efficient service throughout with Cathay Pacific, food quite good for airline standard, A35 is good but not as good as A38. Hong Kong airport lacks good seating areas but is again very efficient with...

标题: No seat selection, but good service and entertainment
内容: No seat selection until 48hrs before, but for Asian airlines that is somewhat common. Good selection of movies and tv even though you have to sit through the same long commercials before watching anything. They serve ice cream which was a nice treat. I found the staff more friendly and accommodating than most airlines. I would fly again.

I don't know what happened to the inflight meal caterers for Cathy Pacific but the quality of the food has deteriorated so much in the past few years.
Not only were the meals sparse, the quality of the food itself is pretty poor.
I used to look forward to flying Cathay for good Asian food on board but sadly, those...

I have got to get this review in context. I fortunate to be very used to travelling Business Class so this opportunity to travel in Economy was interesting but not in a good way.
Firstly, I am not a dancer. I am built like a professional rugby player so when I am shoe-horned into a seat next to an actual...

Our first time flying on Cathay Pacific during a trip to Asia. We wanted to experience both Cathay Pacific and Japan Airlines in order to compare for future flights.
The flight was good and confortable, but after experiencing Japan Airlines on our inbound flight, Cathay service lacks behind JAL.
The Hong Kong to Boston route is served by an older...

Flew on one of their long distance Airbus A33-3. Seating is comforatble even in Economy Class. Staff is attentive and respectful. Food and Beverages served are good.In seat Entertainment is very good. Check in and boarding are quick and planned.
Would recommend this for all travellers

The overall experience was wonderful. The flight attendants were always readily available to assist. The food was descent and the captain kept us informed all the way. It was a wonderful experience aboard Cathay.

En route from Mumbai to Seoul a few weeks earlier our plane had sat on the runway in Hong Kong while we waited for passengers from a delayed flight. This time our flight to Hong Kong was delayed slightly but we were informed that Cathay Pacific would not hold the flight from Hong Kong to Mumbai for us even though...

标题: Change of boarding gate is not announced
内容: The change of boarding gate was not announced. I only found this out by myself when I checked the notice board for all airline boarding information.

I tried to check-in online via cx website upon receiving an email notification from them but it failed with a message that online check-in not open. It indicated clearly in the email that online check-in is "now available"! I tried several times but still in vain. Next day, I tried again but the same message that online check-in is not...

标题: Delayed, lost luggage,poor in-flight service, poor counter service at Toronto and Hong Kong and Mumbai
内容: We traveled from Perth to Vancouver, Toronto to Mumbai and Mumbai back to Perth with Cathay Pacific and I was appalled at the service on some legs of our journey. This airline used to be one of the best we travelled with but NOT anymore. I will not be flying with Cathay Pacific airlines again! My bags were lost, then...

It is hard to changer any diet selection even for a silver pass member like me.
I ticked low fat menu for 2-3 flights years ago. From that time onward, they keep serving me low fat meals. I tried to change in their membership website so many times without success.
Now I have to tell the staff very time at...

标题: Perth Western Australia to LAX via Hong Kong
内容: This is such an improvement on getting to USA than on the flying kangaroo. Cabin crew lovely and accommodating, comfortable flight and really nice food!

标题: A staff of thousands and not one takes action
内容: I will never recommend cathay again. Imagine I purchase a ticket to fly feb 218 and cancelled months before date of departure. Inspite of repeated long distance calls (5) to be exact and emails to the airline requesting for action. NOTHING HAPPENED. THATS HOW BAD CATHAY IS NOW. WHAT DOES IT TAKE TO CONTACT AND MAKE UPPER MANAGEMENT ACT

They get the basics done right. Flight feels safe, generally fuss- and hassle-free. Boring and unexciting is usually good news when it comes to flights.
However, among the flights I have done with some of the other 5-star airlines, they do lack the "wow" factor. Service is ordinary - crew members do get their jobs done, but do not expect...

标题: Long Haul Flight to California USA
内容: Upon going through choices of flights I could take for my summer break, I saw a good offer from Cathay Pacific amounting to more than USD 7 round trip from Manila - Hong Kong - California LAX. The choices of time can be adjusted as there are several flights from Manila to Hong Kong so the lay over will not...

CX is no doubt a safe and well-serviced flight. The checkin process is really very fast, not like these low-fare airlines. Then, you can feel it is stable and calm when it takes off. The meal and Service of the hostess are good too.

Flew Melbourne to London with a 2 hour stop at Hong Kong. The flight crew were affable. Both meals (dinner and breakfast) were pretty tasty and served hot. There were a choice of 3 meals catering for both eastern and western palettes. Extra snacks can be requested from cabin crew during the flight.
In-flight entertainment had a lot of variety...

标题: Upgraded from Premium Economy to Business Class.
内容: I was Upgraded to Business Class travelling home from Hong Kong. Wow it was certainly an experience. The Cabin crew were wonderful and very attentive. The meals were first rate and plentiful. Makes me wish that I could fly this way every time as I slept so well.

Flight from Melbourne to Hong Kong Hong Kong To Shanghai was a comfortable flight thanks to the cabin crew who made it good.
Food was excellent,Service was second to none

Booked on a 615 flight, delayed by 1 hour due to late arrival. Missed of course connecting flight to London. Told day hotel would be available. Of course it wasn’t. Offered business class lounge which I could already access.
But really why I chose this airline was to get me to London on speed. Failed to deliver, no cigar.
Will...

标题: Quick flight but excellent service in business class
内容: Second flight on Cathay Pacific as I also travelled out to Hong Kong from LHR and then onto to Kaohsiung from HK by Dragonair. I was impressed with the food, level of information and cabin crew. Seats were comfortable and the team were great.

the seats were too small compared to other airlines, it felt like travelling on domestic airline..
Food was poor. infact they ran out of fish meal.

I have used most airlines in the past travelling on business and found Singapore airlines to be the best, but a friend of mine said i should try Cathy Pacific, which I did in March of this year using their premium economy service.
It was very good, although I still feel Singapore is better. Premium economy gives you a wider...

This was our first time flying Cathay Pacific and we were impressed. It was a long flight ~ 13 hrs.
We flew economy and had bulkhead seats going and seats 71 A&F (2 seats) on the return. Both were very comfortable. We found that there was more leg room than on other economy flights.
The flight attendants were very good...

First time flying with Cathay Pacific and would highly recommend - we flew from LHR to DSP (17 hours of flying) and there was plenty of food and drink and the air hostesses tried to do anything to help make the journey as comfortable as possible.
Entertainment package was also very good on the plane - loads of games, movies...
Consistent, professional service as expected from Cathay Pacific. The customer care team on the plane will leave you wanting for nothing.

We flew in Premium Economy and were shocked at the 'meal' service - a sandwich in a paper bag accompanied by a cookie and a bottle of water (there was no drinks trolley although I had a glass of wine after requesting one.) The crew said CX had also imposed the same minimal food service on the Hong Kong -...

We had expected much more from this airline given it’s reputation but seats were only moderately comfortable and service was really disappointing - crew were disinterested in making sure we had enough to eat and drink during the flight and the flight was only half full. The available entertainment was pretty mediocre with only a very small handful of newer...

标题: Excellent trip to Asia in economy
内容: Had a great flight in economy class. Sub charging on every seat. 2 meals and snacks and excellent entertainment system.
Best flight food Ive had in a long time. Good choices too, friendly staff, and amazing absence of annoying other punters (fidgets, busy children and hoikers).

Booked for econ flight, end up flying on business :D The trip was for celebrating my hubby's birthday, and can't be more perfect to end it with a free upgrade.
As a frequent user (for duty trip), this airline never disappoint me of it services, esp. its prompt handling of emergency.

标题: Maybe not rated high these days, its still a quality airline to me
内容:
The plane departed on time and lunch was served one hour later.
I had a wonderful lunch, which started with a fresh salad, prawn and scallops for appetizer and a nice piece of fish for main course. The service was good and the journey was very enjoyable.

标题: This would rate as the best airline I have flown with recently.
内容: This is a comfortable business service. The service was very friendly. The food was exceptional for me being Celiac.

标题: The little extra for premium economy was worth it
内容:
We chose Cathy due to their direct flights into Rome and the fact that we had premium economy option.
The extra cost was definitely worth it with plenty of room and enough recline to get a good sleep on the Hong Kong to Rome leg.
Meals were of good quality, especially if you go for the Asian option on the...

Good flight and service
As my trip was planned in a rush I couldn’t book my meal as I’m a vegetarian
But in the flight they helped me to arrange a vegi meal which is usually not possible
Also the crew team was good and friendly
But as usual both up and down flights were late due to heavy traffic...
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Economy' 'Hong Kong - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: It’s definitely worth paying that bit extra for Premium Economy. You have more leg room and the seats are a little wider than economy. Nice extra touches with sparkling wine with hot towels while waiting for the rest of the passengers to board. I would normally travel business class but as we did a stopover in Hong Kong it was...

Cathay Pacific is not the best Business class flight I've experienced, but it was overall a good flight.
The catering was good, but I expected better maybe.
The seat comfort was satisfactory, but without the luxury of some other airlines in Business class.

标题: HELP AT HAND AND VERY GOOD
内容:
I was feeling totally unwell on this flight and the Cathay staff were magnificent, I cannot say enough about their commitment to assist me...I am very grateful
Also the special assistance to my husband was certainly use them again.

On 5th September i was traveling from mumbai to los Angeles and it tooks almost 26 hour with halt. I am pure vegetarian so i choose the special meal option call Asian vegetarian. But during journey ait hostess said that i haven't choose any such special meal option. And told to eat non veg food. Their nature is good but...

This was our return flight after they had changed the seat plan to a 3-4-3 from the previous 3-3-3 experienced on the outward leg. We sat in the middle group of seats on an aisle and middle seat. The difference was very noticeable with my wife and I both feeling the reduction in space.
The food and in-flight entertainment were...

Another perfect flight from this high quality airline. Had THE best night’s sleep EVER on any airline this flight! From dinner in the lounge, quick access to night mode on board when first meal Service declined and a full 7 hours of uninterrupted sleep before a delightful breakfast, there could be no complaints, only compliments from me.

Overall Cathay Pacific were very good & provided a different option for the long journey to Europe. Hong Kong to Paris is a much shorter flight than the Melbourne to middle east option & the 15 hour stay in Hong Kong allowed us to see the sights. Good service & clean planes.

This flight was a breeze ONCE WE ACCESSED THE CHAOS which currently exists around MAN’s road network! This airport desperately needs much improved signage around the works to assist those returning car hire vehicles to find the Car Rental Village. Once checked in(no self-serve bag drop here for this airline) and into the lounge, it was all smooth sailing. Good...

标题: Disability services provided by Cathay Pacific & Cathay Dragon
内容:
My wife has some occasional mobility restrictions, and we received excellent customer service from both Cathay Pacific and Cathay Dragon on our trip from Sydney to Beijing.
Their service crew could not have been more helpful, and did everything possible to ensure an enjoyable experience

标题: Still good but beaten by budget airlines on price
内容: Cathay Pacific used to be my airline of choice, but now on short haul flights I usually take budget airlines. I took this flight because they had a ticket sale. The CX planes are modern and clean, the seats are OK, the service is efficient, the food box basic and better not eaten.

标题: Very comfortable, bigger seats, ok food.
内容: Stopped in Hong Kong. The airport is world class and is extremely easy to get train transportation to the city hubs if you have time on a layover. Fascinating city mix’s old world with high end shopping.

标题: check in flight melbourne airport cattle yard
内容: ground service for cathay pacific customers at melbourne airport was like a cattle yard not helpful staff it was like Iwas a passenger on a cheap RYANAIR flight !!

This was an overnight flight - not great if you have trouble sleeping on planes.
But the service was very good - as was the food. The bathroom was usable throughout and the A35 is generally a more comfortable aircraft than most long haulers

标题: Service with check in and on board was very poor
内容: service on flight no CX14 CX31 DATE 19/7/18 was very poor have adviced my friends do not fly with cathay rubbish airline

Flew 2nd leg with Cathay on CX 717, A35-1. After a delayed boarding with last minute gate change from gate 66 to 512 with bus service and tarmac boarding that always negatively effects the flight experience the crew made it up with their outstanding attitude and efficiency during boarding. The male purser greeted everyone in a remarkable way, he quick...

标题: Cathay Pacific's new A35 is a great aircraft!
内容: Ive been very critical of Cathay Pacific in past reviews, but I feel its only fair to give them credit when they finally get it right! I flew from Singapore to Hong Kong, via Bangkok, on Cathay's newest aircraft, the Airbus 35, and the new plane is terrific. The business class layout is 1-2-1, and I had a single seat...

On August 14th I flew from Hong Kong to Singapore on CX715. We boarded the plane on time and around 5 minutes before scheduled departure the "Captain", came over the PA to announce we'd be departing "momentarily". However we sat at the gate for a further 25 minutes, then when we finally pushed back, we were stuck on the ground...

The experience started with some relaxing time in the business class lounge. This I rate very highly, being beautifully designed, quiet and providing very high quality food and refreshments. On the plane, the configuration on the business class seating was great. I love that they have single seats along the windows so that I could have both a window and...

Another great flight with Cathay.
Service is excellent, food is above par. Got to try their special curated menu and the famous Betsy beer which is brewed specially for Cathay.
Lounges in HK are excellent.
Decent choice of inflight entertainment.

Our flight was very comfortable for The second leg of our journey. We were in the first row of premium economy and there was legroom aplenty. One of our screens did not work but it didn’t cause too much drama (we have teens) we just swapped seats amongst ourselves and shared the other three screens at various times. The food...

Terrible service on cx712 on 2 Sep 18. Will not recommend. Staff didn't bother to get enough Thai arrival cards. I asked for some earlier but they gave out to others instead. Crew will only act on your requests if you complain. Other passengers had the same sentiment. Bad jam at departure gate, flight service was slow and delayed. My...

标题: Good but need to update planes flying out of HKG
内容: Flight going from Brisbane to Hong Kong was a night flight, seemed to be a newer plane a lot of leg room for economy and seats adjust back quite far. the flight from Hong Kong to London was in a very old plane, seats very cramped together, when the seat in front reclined you could barely touch your knees, and...

I was worried about flying direct as the flight is 16 hours. But when I sat down I was surprised at the size of the seat and the amount of legroom. I was able to sleep comfortably all the way there. The staff were friendly and attentive and I would recommend this flight to all.

From Portugal to Bali, with good service in the boarding and check-in.
Seats ok, entertainment nice and with multiple choices.
Could improve the cleanliness of the airplanes and the food was also average, mainly from honk kong to bali....

The business class seats look like the ones in Singapore Airlines and do lie flat - but are set at a strange angle and are not terribly comfortable. Staff dont assist with making up bed as they do on other airlines- you are basically left to work it out for your. The armrest has to be stowed away during take...

标题: NOT SO GOOD EXPERIENCE AND CATHAY NEED TO IMPROVE
内容: Brought a rather expensive 1 way ticket to SIN and did not enjoy the flight: the folding table was very dirty and surely the cleaner was dreaming! The lunch was served at 4:3 pm ( departure 2:45 pm ) and was more like afternoon tea and worst; the chicken pasta has perhaps 5 small pieces of chicken and lots of...

标题: GOOD SERVICE BUT NO VALUE FOR 1HOUR 55 MINUTES FLIGHT
内容: Basically took biz class from Mauritius to Bangkok and MK do not fly to BKK so there must be a connection with other airlines from SIN / KUL / HKG to BKK. I took CX for the leg from SIN to BKK and it is not good value since the flight is rather short ( hence biz class was empty...

Hi,
I flew from HK to BLR on 31st Aug.. reaching Bangalore after waiting for the baggage for more than 45min, finally learnt that my baggage is missing. The customer service team couldn't trace it and they just taken the complaint and sent me without my baggage..next day morning they informed still they couldn't trace it.2nd day they could able...

flight Zurich to singapore via Honk Kong roundtrip, this August 218.
3 of the 4 flights in hour the other 3 hours of delay due to breakdown in an A-35-1.
Excellent service, new planes, reasonable food in tourist class, very professional and prepared staff, check in and boarding well done. Price paid:  43 round trip. video system easy to...

标题: What a terrible waste of money
内容: It’s been 15 years since I flew on this airline. It used to be wonderful but apart from pleasant staff on the plane it was awful. My seat was broken and my poor husband paid a kings ransom for a seat with a broken tv ... no sound. Nothing could be done about it. The food on the plane was...

Worst airline i’ve been in, they made me pay 6$ because when i booked the ticket i made a mistake in only one letter in my name although everything else was correct except one letter , so i had to pay 6$ so they can rewrite my name again not only this they were so rude to us they were...

Expected Warm Asian Hospitality but was quite Disappointed.
Very Businesslike cold and indifferent. Ground staff not very helpful. no wheelchair at Hongkong in spite of prebooking.

What I like about Cathay is that they have flight options allowing you to dine or work well into the night and then get on a plane and materialize in Hong Kong. Saves on a nights accommodation and it is consistent in quality and services.

We flew from Bangkok to Hong Kong To Vancouver in Premium Eco but no seat available from BKK to HongKong, that is ok. Flight Attendants both flights are well and no complain. Food is nice and hot. Seat is large especially front row. Movies has less selection than other airline but we can lives withit.

标题: Trip to Viet Nam and Cambodia
内容: Service was excellent, yes seats are crowded but what airlines aren’t? Lots of entertainment choices and flights were smooth.

标题: Great service, but what you get for premium economy varies from flight to flight
内容: We flew to Taipei from Toronto via Hong Kong. The service was friendly and courteous. The meals and drinks were great. The movies and maps were great. But the touch screeens were sometimes hard to operate. We were delighted with the seats we had in Premium economy for the Toronto Hong Kong leg. There was more space than with regular...

My Mom was travelling alone from San Francisco to Hyderabad last week via Cathay Pacific airlines. I had requested wheelchair assistance for her as she cannot walk due to leg and back pains. I called the airlines several times and they assured that wheelchair will be provided.
The day of the flight, Aug 28, flight from SFO to Hong Kong...

This was generally a good flight, although it was very full and I thought the flight attendants might have been a little friendlier. Entertainment and food were both pretty good, and I was pleased with the on-time baggage delivery. Not a bad experience at all.

We were scheduled to take a flight on August 17, 218 from Manila to Spain. Our airline was Cathay Pacific. At 12 midnight that morning unfortunately a Xiamen Airlines plane overshot the main runway of Manila International Airport. The main runway was closed pending removal of the plane. Our flight was scheduled for 8:2pm so we were concerned but hopeful...
Quality of inflight meals and variation of entertainment were much better. Crews are friendlier thoughtful than before.

标题: STAFF EXTREMELY COURTEOUS. FOOD GOOD. TIMINGS OK
内容: Flights were on time. The staff was very courteous. Inflight food was good. Any calls were immediately answered. Provision of blankets for those feeling cold. In short, kept upto expectations.

I recently booked tickets for my elderly parents . Called customer services three times to reconfirm wheel chairs as they are very elderly with heart conditions. They every times confirmed me the wheel chair. This morning the flight from Dhaka to Hong kong was delayed & then they had to miss the next flight to Sydney
They been booked for...

标题: Cathay Pacific is a great airline
内容: Whilst the first flight was late taking off(not Cathay Pacific fault) both flights was seemless, the food was really good and the flight attendants were polite and attentive, the in-flight entertainment was pretty good. Also loved their blankets.
The best thing of Cathay is the duvet they provide and obviously the awesome treatment given by the crew. The service in between courses is too slow.

The long haul flight departing Heathrow at 2 hrs to Hong Kong arriving at 7 hrs local time was a comfortable flight in the back row of Premium Economy sharing a window and aisle with my wife.The onboard service, entertainment and meals were pleasant allowing the 11 hours + to pass reasonably quickly.

标题: Delayed by air traffic control, but the on-board entertainment system worked perfectly
内容:
Boarding was quietly efficient, and the passenger load seemed to be quite low, so timing was perfect, as there were plenty of spare seats to enable passengers to spreadout and be more comfortable.
Departure was delayed for almost an hour because of air traffic conditions over the Phillipines, but the Captain kept us well informed, the cabin staff provided water,...

Excellent flight MEL to HKG on CX134. Flew daytime on an A35. Flight departed on time, service was friendly and professional, seats comfortable, excellent video screen and in-flight entertaining options. Used in-flight Wi-Fi US$2 for flight) which had reasonably good connectivity for most of the flight (worked with corporate VPN).
Return flight on CX15 was over night, departing HKG just...

Coming back to work from a long vacation is depressing but flying with cathay pacific made it more likely to be exciting. First i opted to fly with cathay because their rates are affordable. It was my first time to try cathay and i am impressed. First the plane is clean and spacious. I had extra legroom without paying additional....

Flew Cathay Pacific from
Hong Kong to
London Gatwick. I have to say not out of choice. I was switched to this flight after my previous Cathay Pacific flight from Manila to Hong Kong was delayed which caused me to miss my transfer flight to London Heathrow with British Airways. Having experienced Cathay Pacific long haul before I would not...
This was a fantastic flight. The seats are extremely comfortable, the flight attendants lovely and overall a great flight.

标题: Flight fare up but service down
内容: Probably due to huge losses in past years as the result of cruel oil hedging mistake, Cathay Pacific mades changes to increase fare prices, increase seat capacity and cost saving measures. The wrong doing of changing qualification to retain Marco Polo membership makes passengers losing their loyalty to Cathay Pacific. I personally consider the airline becomes more likely a budget...

I was on a connecting flight from India to Manila and stopped in Hong Kong. Layover was initially a little over 2 hours which then eventually became 17 hours. While the airline was not at fault as the delay is due to Xiamen Air incident in NAIA, Cathay Pacific failed to capitalize on the opportunity to take care of their...

标题: Terrible service on CX 461 for Diamond member
内容: Never has experienced terrible services on CX for Diamond member, the chief purser and senior attendant treated me as invisible. Even when I ask for some Evian, the senior attendant in yellow uniform in business cabin gave me a look?! What kind of training have you put through with your crew. With many delays, dusty toilets, and technical breakdown on...
For a long haul flight Cathay Pacific Premium Economy worked well. Good service, pleasant staff. An aisle seat helped make moving around easy, extra leg room very welcome.

标题: The usual excellent flights with Cathay
内容: The overall flight, Brisbane/Hong Kong then Hong Kong/ Dublin was what we have come to expect from Cathay. The staff, service, food and overall attention were excellent. The pilots kept you informed of all details of the flight and we were fortunate to be on their inaugural flight from Hong Kong to Dublin saving another stopover in London.

After traveling with Cathay Pacific for 9 years and the 2nd flight with CX this year and have one more trip planned from jfk later this year
I realize now that pax like myself that only travel Premium Economy and are only Silver member I’m not welcome as before. Since they changed business class lounge at jfk everything get worse...
Very efficient flight. Food was excellent. Staff were very friendly and always smiling. Can’t fault our flight

Flight left 9 minutes late (I had 4 flights with Cathy on this trip, all were late).After telling us that boarding would start , they left us stand for 3 minutes. Once seated, take-off was 1 hour later. Seat is oke, service too. But food is absolutely not 5 stars . I will not fly them again!

Amazing service and best chicken Biryani I have eaten in a long time let alone on a plane. The cabin was comfortable and clean whilst the toilets were kept clean throughout the flight. Plentiful supply of liquid refreshments left on time and arrived 55 minutes early

This magnificent airline with the best of service flew me from Sydney, Australia to Hong Hong. The service was immaculate. The food supurband the flight beautiful, flying over some of the Earth's most beautful places. From the Great Barrier Reef, thrugh Bali, Indonesia and all to the tune of Enja. It was a romantic and beautiful flight at the utmost...

Once upon a time, there was a flight company which was the pride of Hong Kong. This flight was Cathay Pacific. The flight attendants were polite and impressive. The in-flight facilities were great. The in-flight food was tasty. The bread was hot. The dessert was Hagan Daz. The service was always one step ahead before you were about to ask...

We've flown Cathay in business class a number of times, from 214 through 217 and they simply always do a great job. Whether it's over the Pacific or a regional flight like HKG to SIN, the cabin attendants serve the passengers wonderfully. The food is amazing - I looked forward to the prime steak and am amazed at how good...

Overall the flight was pleasant. Flight was smooth, flight attendants are attentive and the flight entertainment was good. I was able to check in 1 day in advance at the Kowloon Airport Express Station and I do not need to be at the airport earlier on the next day for my 9 am flight.

We wanted to try Cathay as it offered a very reasonable business class fare and also to experience their new A35 Airbus planes. The business class product was generally OK; comfy, private feel seat, slightly odd outer panel which could only be up after take off. Amenities gift bag rather limited. Lie flat bed OK; no separate blanket. Meals OK...

The 5th 777 for this airline. Amazing.Having flown premium economy Air NZ from Auckland was not expecting much. But it was fantastic. Best econ class ever. Great food, entertainment unit the best and staff fantastic.Could not fault anything.

标题: Favorite Airline for Flying Osaka to Toronto
内容: Been flying with Cathay for the last 5 or 6 years for flights between Osaka and Toronto, and I really love it! I used to fly other airlines but there are no direct flights to Toronto from Osaka and I would either have a layover in the USA (Detroit or Minneapolis) or Tokyo. I didn’t mind layovers in the US...

Comfortable flight ,seemed to have plenty of leg room ,had an aisle seat towards back of aircraft. Attentive and helpful staff.1st leg of the long haul to London so important that there be no hassles.

Good evening meal we chose the Chinese rather the western one. Good entertainment package I suggest taking your own earphones although the one supplied were ok. Comfy seats , attentive crew. Check in ok

标题: The best airline, expensive but worth it 1%!
内容: I have traveled at least 3 times using Cathay Pacific and every time it is amazing! I have also flown using many other airlines (British Airways, Virgin Atlantic, Qantas, Ryanair, American Airlines and many many others), but I always seem to find myself wanting to come back to Cathay Pacific. Their service is not only impeccable professionally, but their genuine...

My first experience on Cathay Pacific Business Class and honestly loved every bit of the flight.
Was on a premium economy seat but was pleasantly upgraded at the gate. Everything was just perfect and nothing that I would have to recommend as such.
In fact what caught my attention was the extra large and spacious Rest Rooms which are perfect...

I love Cathay Pacific business class. The herringbone layout of the seats enables plenty of room and privacy. The food was exceptionally good and service spot on. Lots of refreshing hot towels and drink service was good. Slept very well and although we departed quite late they managed to make up a lot of the time.

标题: Best airline we have been on.
内容: The service and food was excellent, even after a eleven hour flight the attendants were still smiling. The aircraft an A35 was quiet and comfortable. The Video screens were a good size with sharp clear pictures and a large choice of movies. Loved the cameras that showed the outside view as you took off and came into land would certainly...

I have travelled with Cathay Pacific twice this year. Not through choice but because they have the most availability. They have 3 flights flying out daily from LHR so during peak season I have little choice. I wouldn’t say they are a bad airline but I do find the stewards to be a bit indifferent and the food to be...

First time we have flown with Cathay. Thought we would have a change from Air NZ.
Cathay was ok we had the front seats in the middle in Premium, service was average, as was the food. Not absolutely sure we would travel with them again. We did want to have a day light flight so that influenced us to go...

标题: was eager to gouge on charging additional Luggage Fees in Spite of Holding a First Class Ticket.It deminished
内容: The BKK Check in Desk Crew was intent on charging me additional Luggage Fees Wasted 3 minutes of everyone's time and gouged me for an additional $2 USD for a 3rd Luggage fee in spite of holding a First Class Ticket and that I was not charged on the Originating Destination Flight that was Business Class on the Flight over....

Very good service, best sleep ever on a plane due to the comfort of the seats and the privacy afforded by their design.
Good food and wine selection, especially the sauvignon blanc.
My preferred airline when travelling between Hong Kong and London.
Will definitely use Cathay again, very comfortable, food ok , just a nice comfortable flight,when I travel back to Hong Kong next year will use Cathay Pacific

Good business class seats. Cabin is a little outdated & could use an overhaul. However, the staff was exceptionally courteous & friendly. Flight access was easy as a business class customer. Would certainly consider again in the future transiting to Honk Kong from within Asia.

Flight was OK, very full. Food was average - service was lovely. Landing in Melbourne was interesting as we barely touched wheels to runway before taking off again and circling for a second landing attempt. Slightly nerve wracking. Safely landed on second attempt. Explanation given was something to do with cross winds.
This Airline has the best economy seats, they do not recline instead your own seat moves forward not interfering with the person behind you, great idea.

From the moment we arrived at the check in to the moment we stepped off the plane in Hong Kong the staff were there to assist, nothing was to hard and always with a smile, showing courtesy. All refreshments were quality and presented with the highest professionallism. We returned to Australia with Cathay Pacific and again the service of quality...

While planning (yet another) 24h business trip to Seoul, I decided to switch from my usual route (business class through AMS, CDG or FRA), in favor of a longer, more expensive (+25-3%) first class ticket via Hong Kong (for the sake of completeness, by default, Milan to Hong Kong is first class, while the second segment is business class). All...

My wife recently flew from NYC to Hong Kong with Cathy Pacific. I unfortunately, stayed behind to take care of business, but am looking forward to a trip summer 219. Check in at JFK was easy, The agent reassigned my wife an isle seat, and she enjoyed the flight and return flight. She said the service and food were great....
Wouldnt recommend flying with Cathay Pacific airline, unfriendly, unhelful and bad attitude. Not cheap either. Better off with other airlines at a cheaper price

标题: excellent staff and comfortable business class
内容: we've flown Cathay Pacific a number of times and all the flights have been based on courteous service, comfortable seats and good fare. We especially enjoy the cheese plate after dinner and the breakfasts. In general the dinners are served in the middle of the night so we often don't eat them, but catch up on other offerings later in...

If you're traveling to Chiang Mai, Thailand, Cathay Pacific is ideal. You can avoid going through Bangkok and the seats in Premium Economy are worth the extra cost of a couple of hundred dollars each way. The seats are just a bit wider, recline just a bit more and you have a foot rest to raise your feet. I go...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Chiang Mai

内容:
Getting to Haneda Airport from Ginza is easy. We expected a smooth flight back to Hong Kong. However, due to a number of reasons ranging from weather to busy air traffic, the take-off time was delayed for over an hour.
When we were approaching Hong Kong, we heard again from the pilot that the Hong Kong airport was very busy...

I've taken 4 flights with Cathay Pacific and non of those times I have been impressed with the staff, the plane, or the food. The seats are incredibly small and uncomfortable. The food disgusting. The staff couldn't care less about you if they tried - I get very airsick and they ignored me.

Great service, great entertainment, flat bed. Food was exceptional. Amenities kit with Jurlique products, included sox, toothpaste and tooth brush, hand cream face cream and lip balm. Nothing was a problem with staff

标题: A good last leg of the trip
内容: Being the last leg of a round the world trip , even with a change in Hong Kong the whole trip was fine . Service and attendance are fist class , food is fine , entertainment - Movies up to standard

Cathay Pacific made us miss our connecting flight from Hongkong to Singapore. We arrive 2 hours late in Hongkong but still have 2 min. to run to the next gate. We have a stewardess waiting for us at the end of the gate when you got out of the plane, explaining to us they will not let us catch our...

This airline lost our bags purposely. they said the plane was too heavy so they did not even put my bags there while my bags not even a full size bag compare a lot of people who come directly from HongKong (direct flight instead of us who are on our connecting flight). they bags delivered 2 days later. we need...

You should always expect the best service when you board a Cathay Pacific flight. They are not the cheapest airline but when you have a long haulage flight with kids there are plenty of other factors to consider. Good entertainment system and relatively good seats is something I value.

标题: Cathay Pacific cannot seem t offer "On Time Departure"
内容: I am appalled at the constant failure of Cathay Pacific to depart on time. I cannot find out what their overall record of late departure is, but in my case at least 75% of flights fail to leave on time, many late by more than 1 hour. My recent rip to Singapore was another example of late departure, both my...

On our flight to HKG before TPE, i received notification that my flight was going to depart later and good news was I was rebooked on the next connecting flight to TPE. I am going to admit, I booked Cathay because of the food selection. I was also very very lucky to have been able to expereince the new A35-1...

I flew on Cathay last time in 24 when the service and amenities were much better. They provided amenities and lots of foods which have been missed this time. There are other airlines where cabin crews walk around with trays full of different types of foods/snacks/drinks on a continuous basis, specially on a long 16 hrs flight. In this flight,...

Took a flight from Cathay instead of the regular budget flights for short hops.
