Requested a change of menu due to food allergic days before our flight but was given no exceptions except to just order from whatever they have on the menu. While we would have selected from the menu if we could in the first place but this...

I was flying Cathay via SFO to HongKong and my flight experience was terrible. The crew was very uncourteous and untrained leaving a very bad customer experience behind. I had a connecting flight from HongKong to Mumbai which was an hour apart and we were rushed to the connecting terminal by one of their reps in an absolutely reckless and...

The staff at check in counter is very nice and helpful. The boarding counter is very smooth and efficient. The seat is comfortable with plenty of legroom. Attendants are polite in greeting us and serving us.

A good experience from start to finish. The ticket price is extremely competitive when booked in advance. Excellent customer care from the crew on board, especially the captain who piloted us through two hours of horrendous turbulence as we left Hong Kong airport on the return leg. There were delays but these were due to the prevailing conditions which you...
I feel like I don't want to get off the aircraft. It's so comfortable and the service was amazing. It was a smooth flight. I'll be flying again with Cathay Pacific in the near future.

Cutting cost made customer suffer. Understanding that TPE to HKG is just a very short flight, however I do not agree we deserve such food and service with the price we have paid for. The meal they served that day is rice with half an egg, pork. And a small bottle of water. It is horrible, no matter the portion,...

标题: It is a very good airline staff are great the coffee on board is woefull
内容: The staff were excellent, the plane clean and comfortable. The food breakfast, lunch and dinner is good, but the coffee is undrinkable. I tried the normal on board offered, and a cappuccino on a few occassions. A little staff training or maybe individual plunger coffee in Arabica only may solve the issue. Cannot expect a perfect cappucino as an onboard...

We travelled Perth to HK, had a layover and then HK to San Fran. In return LAX to HK and today it’s HK to Perth, which I am dreading.
Our departure flight was 7.3 am. We boarded and received a breakfast in a cardboard box consisting of a muesli bar/yoghurt and a stale pastry. We then waited until 14.1 before...

标题: Fantastic service and attention to detail
内容: Our second time flying CX from Chicago to Hong Kong in First class. The cabin crew were fantastic and their attention to detail was second to none.

标题: they have gone down hill and are now abusive towards customers
内容: I was on a flight that was delayed. I understand that weather delays happen. But the staff was beyond rude and unprofessional. Only 3 announcements were made in total for a 13 hour delay. Everyone was sent away from the airport and had to check back in the next day. When we checked in the second time there was only...

We just returned from Australia flying from Heathrow to Hongkong and then to Brisbane and of course back again!
Pro’ of CP?
Easy to use entertainment system with excellent range of tv and film
Food was pretty good
Flight attendants were friendly and helpful
Get a pillow and blanket
Headphones provided
Cons?
It was soooo hot on all of the...

inbound flight was usual, I was in Economy class. it was one hour flight but the return was business class and it was a huge difference, their business class on airbus A33-3 is very good in everything

we used to love flying this airline. this time we went as a group. they jacked up our prices astronomically after we secured our reservations. they said it was fuel charge but it was so high, I will never fly with them again. Then they refused to let us pick our preferable seats since we were a group. we were...

We traveled with Cathy Pacific in April 218, we went to Hong Kong, then Bali, then traveled back home from Hong Kong. The flights are really long but thank goodness for the entertainment on board. I think the menu could include more English food as there is a lot of Chinese/Asian cuisine and if that's not what you enjoy, its...

Missed my chance for a premium economy seat, so had to settle for the regular economy and was not disappointed. Excellent check-in and crew service, good meals and fairly comfortable seats.Late departure from London, but still arrived early.

I have flown Cathay Pacific for many years now. The experience never leaves you wanting for more. The crew are always extremely friendly and very attentive. The flat bed offering gives you plenty space and privacy to enjoy the Cathay experience.
Always a good experience with excitement to repeat.

The Cathay Pacific quality of service has definitely gone down over the years. It's sad because this airline used to be the best flying to Hong Kong. The friendliness and helpfulness of the flight attendants are sub-par now. Also, the land crew definitely no longer provides World class support to customers. Yet their airfares are still 4% higher than Air...

My first experience of Cathay, mostly good, food fine, staff helpful, flight on time, temperature fine, Transfer ok, the headphone socket wouldn't take my Bose with its airplane plug, Wish the toilets were cleaner

I always fly Cathay, and I am a Marco Polo member of the airline as well, which gives you great perks from the get-go. Whenever I fly Cathay it feels like coming home, the service is great, the airplanes clean and the food good, the snacks and drinks throughout the flight is great and the entertainment more the sufficient. I...

Would defiantly recommend Cathay pacific to anyone looking to travel overseas, very nice staff, always happy to help and serve. Meals were about an hour n half after departure and before arrival which gave us plenty of time to have a snooze inbetween, with next to no interruptions! Check in was amazing, self check in with people around to help,...

Flew Cathay Pacific Business Class to San Francisco to attend a wedding and to review some scripts
Cathay Pacific has Well-designed seats and good toilet facilities
The service was fair
When compared to Singapore airlines business class the seat, the food and service seems to be better at Singapore airlines although usually Singapore airlines may tend to be generally more...
Excellent service in long haul flight. Very impressed with the flight attendant on board service. 15 hour flight is really long but they made it easier. Excellent in-flight entertainment. Thank you.

I chose this airline because they have a GR8 transfer terminal in Hong Kong. Also the crew was very friendly, food service excellent and good entertainment options.
Checked bags are automatically transferred to my connecting plane and it's an easy walk thru to the connecting gate.
Beware of other airlines that make you collect luggage upon arrival in China, go...

标题: Surprisingly an upgrade to Premium Economy
内容: I arrived about 2 hours before the departure time 8.35 am. The CX check in counter staff asked me politely whether I would like to take an early flight, which to be departed 3 minutes earlier. Since my Singapore hotel check-in was 3 pm, I was puzzled for a few minutes. At last, I replied okay. And surprisingly, when I...

This was my first time on Cathay Pacific, and I was very excited to try its business class offering. The plane felt slightly dated, but the seats are comfortably sized and among the nicest to sleep on. We were served a very average dinner (and the ice cream on the menu never arrived), and my friend’s breakfast looked so grim...

I am a regular CX flyer because it is reliable, efficient and provides me direct flights to my destinations! CX is highly competitive in the HK-Ho Chi Minh route as there are 3 flights a day and the price is considerably lower than its chief competitor, Vietnam Airlines. The aircraft on this route A33-3 is well maintained, large screen with...
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Economy' 'Hong Kong - Ho Chi Minh City

内容:
In general, the flight was very good, but certain flaws in providers’ services need to be addressed.
Check-in and security clearance in Toronto were swift and easy, though properly handled. I prefer the security screening in Canada over others in North America as it is efficient, calm, and orderly and conducted in a respectful manner with special lanes for business/first...

The overall Flying experience with Cathay Pacific is very good. From the cockpit to the cabin crew, to the amenities such as in-flight entertainment and meals, we were happy with everything. What we were not so happy with was the delays to scheduled flights.One delay was an extra 3 hours between flights. We had been notified via email of the...

I had high expectations for Cathay, however overall I was disappointed.
The equipment is getting a little old and dated. the meal service was there NEW style and it was a bit of a mess if I am honest. It took them 4 hrs to complete the meal service in the Business class section so those wishing to have a...

Business seat 11d.
Close to the very front of the plane.
Was tired so slept well.
Had midnight snack of noodles and shrimp dumplings..quite deligtfull.
Got away on time and arrived early.
Staff very attentive and could not do enough.

标题: Wish they could improve the quality of meal
内容: The only reasons I like Cathay is the wide selection of flights and their in flight entertainment. The service was good this time, I saw some smiles on flight attendant faces so this made the whole journey more pleasant. My only complaint is the quality of food, the food in general was quite dry. They congee for breakfast is quite...

Good airline that did it all well, just nothing above and beyond. The price of the fare was awesome and given that there was a long stop over it made for a fun day in Hong Kong. The plane was comfortable and offered a good selection of movies, many were Asian films, but offered plenty of Hollywood movies too. Food...

I have always found Cathay Pacific to be very dependable with one of the best service levels of any airline. The quality and range of food items is great. The in-flight entertainment had a very good selection of films and TV. The seats were very comfortable, offering some privacy.
The lunch had a good selection such as cod with chili...

Every sector on this journey had issues. Mel-HKG and audio was faulty. HKG-CDG and leg support on seat was non-functional. Arrived in Paris and one suitcase was soaked and contents wet. Return journey from Dublin to HKG and the cabin crew were grumpy and un-helpful. HKG-MEL and sitting in 2nd row of the cabin and requested meal (chicken) had "run-out"...

For Economy class it was the best service I have got. Starting from Handling of luggage, seats, flights and food all arrangement were really good. Except a glitch that they left one of my bag in Hong Kong which was delivered to my doorstep after 2 days.

标题: cant book your seats in advance
内容: I find it very disturbing that I cant reserve my seats only 48 hours in advance, Im a family of 5 have a very long from from Sydney via hong kong than SFO and would like to be seated with the family, if only i was told this before we booked would of NEVER BOOKED WITH CATHAY PACIFIC.

Had wanted to go premium economy, but because of the booking through an online agency was unable to and so not looking forward to the long trip but from the moment we booked in to being on board everything went smoothly and the air hostess's did a great job with nothing being to much problem, the food was good as...

标题: Young and energized staff, reasonble food selection; cup noodles on request a bonus
内容:
Our family of 5 flew from Sydney, Australia to London via HK (stopover). We enjoyed the company of pretty young crew who were willing to assist/service compared to more mature crew on other airlines. We enjoyed the food selection.
Seats on the 777 are not comfortable compared to A38. Overall a good experience flying CX.

标题: Amazing service for first time flyer
内容: First time on a plane in 7 years and it was amazing. I was on the premium economy class and received a free glass of champagne. Seats has many amazing features like footrests and built in plugs. Food was quite nice with a good selection and in flight entertainment was good too.

I had heard so much about Cathay Pacific. Because of their strong reputation, I wanted to book the 15 hour plus trip from Newark to Hong Kong for myself and family. While we were in Economy, I paid the upcharge to sit in the bulkhead seats. The food that was served reminded me of airline food from years ago before...

My flight was at midnight, I got to the airport 4 hours early, mainly because of a huge storm system passing by, not sure about the flight leaving on time. As it was the flight was delayed 1 hours. Cathay put me up in a 5 star hotel with a money voucher to buy food. My connecting flight I was...

Our trip out to Australia was really good, no complaints. Food was good, service was good, transfer at Hong Kong was easy!
On our was back home I was extremely ill on the plane due to something I’d eaten before boarding. The staff were excellent. I was violently sick, weak and in a lot of pain. The staff moved me...

This review is made after 4 segments where I experienced long haul and regional business class service. The old and extremely noisy 777 fleet is having mostly the 1/2/1 seat configuration on an angle positioning. If you are a couple, even on the center seats you will be quite far from each other... and the window seats are not exactly...

标题: First leg of flight to New York
内容: Good flight, comfortable seats. Sat in middle with two adjoining seats, both with isle access. Difficult to communicate with my husband in the seat beside me as the low screen between the seats cannot be moved. Would have been better with one window seat and the seat across the isle. Food was good with reasonable choices. It was my first...

标题: Good night sleep and reliably good service in business class
内容:
Especially on the flight from Hong Kong to Amsterdam you can sleep very well in business class as the plane leave around 1 AM and the chair folds into a flat 18 degrees bed which is comfortable lenght.
Breakfast at arrival is too early as it starts 2 hours before arrival and therefore at around 4 am arrival time.
Love...

I would like express my huge disappointment on my entire experience with Cathay Pacific on this particular flight. I was on a flight with my partner from Dubai to Hong Kong after travelling around Europe for 6 weeks. We were on our way home back to Australia. So as you can imagine, we are very tired from all the travelling...

标题: First time flyers with Cathay Pacific
内容: I haven’t flown long haul for 4 years & wasn’t sure what to expect! All I can say is that it was a very positive flying experience, particularly the food which came around regularly, with a choice of 3 & was all lovely, accommodating everyone’s needs. It was a long flight but the pillow & blanket made it a comfortable...

Wow, its been a number of years since I traveled with Cathy Pacific.
Check in Heathrow.
Excellent staff very helpful, I arrived four hours early for the flight as I regard Heathrow as one of the worst airports in the world, disorganized, long, queues security staff with a bad attitude (should have done better at school).
Cathy Pacific.
Like most...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Isles of Scilly - Hong Kong

内容: It’s been a while since I fly with CX, comfortable flights with good seats and the Inflight entertainment was enjoying. Able to keep me entertained for 3 hrs. Food was light and they served my favourite Hagan Daz Strawberry ice cream. Yummy!

Our flight from Hong Kong to Sydney was quite good. We did a big trip around Asia and flew with Cathay Pacific most of the way. All of our flights with them were excellent except for our final flight home. My husbands seat kept sliding back even when he didnt push the recline button. Mine would not stay reclined unless...

Premium service with nice feast
Especially wasting caviar and drinking champagne upon the thirty thousands feet.
A lot of asking and caring during the flight
Before aboard, first class passenger can use flagship first dining
标签: International' 'First Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: The seats were uncomfortable in the A35 although we had exit door seats. It has been first time that we flew a long haul flight where the crew did not come to serve drinks at all during the night. Although we flew Lufthansa from Munich to Hong Kong, we did not buy anything in Hong Kong, at check in they...

标题: Bad experience for my first flight with Cathay Pacific!
内容:
I had decided to go with Cathay Pacific after hearing ample positive feedback about the airlines, but unfortunately I am disappointed to say after my experience I am unable to list a single positive thing.
For starters, the service of the cabin crew. The crew was inhospitable, moody, in a rush, and it was a rarity to see one of...

First, first clas CX trip - excellent. Never realised how good caviar was with Krug (actually never imagined trying the combination!)great staff. Great service. Really comfortable ‘beds’..lack of latest release movies was the only downer but really i can’t complain about anything
First business class flight with CX. And it was great. Busy flight but great staff made it very enjoyable.

标题: The kids love the kids’ meals
内容:
The kids meals come with kiddie cutlery and a toy straw which the kids love.
Stewardess service levels are good - Accommodating where they can on a full flight.
One thing to note. We took a different plane on our return trip and the in flight entertainment for the kids (games) were different!!
So I had to spend half the...
Excellent customer service. In flight service is very professional and caring. Cleanliness and attention to passengers need is better than many airlines.

The first flight in the A35 from Melbourne to Hong Kong was excellent. Comfortable and great service.
The change over was only 2 hours which passed quickly
The 777 from Hong Kong was very noisy but service was still great. Not as comfortable as the A35

Have never flown with Cathay before so was keen to see how it stacked up against Singapore Airlines who I've flown with lots. Cathay Pacific were pretty good overall for an economy flight. The staff were pleasant, food was okay & inflight entertainment was good too. My only complaint would be that they were a little light on with drinks....

I have flown Cathay Pacific many times, twice in Business Class, and have always found their service, care and kindness exceptional, as I did this time. However there was a failure when I arrived at Vancouver Airport. I am disabled and had booked a wheelchair and for help with my luggage. Somewhere there was a communication breakdown and I was...

With 2,4,,2 configuration, flight was full, but seats were comfortable, service efficient. Transfers at airport, easy. The leg to Hanoi was slightly delayed but it was a comfortable flight in a 3 by 3 seating. Luggage transfers were good. Cathay Pacific staff at Adelaide airport most helpful and visa stamping at Hanoi was not such a lengthy process.

The departure from Auckland was on time and the service very attentive. I felt the selection of movies on the entertainment system was disappointing and that there should have been a bigger selction of english and US movies that were recent releases. No good drama/dective movies or TV series to watch. The food is OK however nearly everything had chilli...

标题: Children around me did not have seat belts on at take off.
内容:
Plenty of foot room and modern plane but not a good choice of movies. All this is minor to the fact that no one checked that the children had on their seat belts.
One little boy near me was sitting forward near the screen and it was more than obvious he was not belted up.
Safety is important especially with...

Left Tarbes Lourdes Francs plane was too hot - no air conditioning while waiting inside the airplane. It was just so hot that day but I couldn’t understand why it was hot air blowing inside. I would not recommend this airline

Excellent service. Food was good but not great. Drink selection can be much improved. We flew two long flights. Australia to HongKong which was excellent and had a lot of toilets but the second long flight from Hingkong to Vancouver had so few toilets it was terrible to queue outside one for ages

Cathay has lost me as a customer. For years I have flown Cathay between Hong Kong and the US. I was willing to pay a little more because the service was better and because I could upgrade with miles. I stuck with them even as they became significantly more expensive than the competition. Well, now you can forget about the...

It didn't start off well but turned out good. Flight was delayed to the following day. Upon check in the apologized profusely for the inconvenience it may have caused
Once on the plane we had plenty of room for economy seating and the entertainment center was AWESOME! It was a 12 hour flight to Hong Kong where we had another...

This was my first time with Cathay Pacific and it turned out to be a great experience. Departure and arrival times were guaranteed, the staff was friendly and the food was up to standards. If I travel in that direction once more, I'll most probably choose Cathay again and I strongly recommend it to all of you reading this!

标题: Beware of Cathay Pacific Reserved Seats policy
内容: In January 218 i paid in full for air tickets to New Zealand with a stop over in Hong Kong on the outward and return trips. Departure date from UK is Monday 1th September 218 from Edinburgh to Heathrow then Hong Kong. Having flown to New New Zealand on several occasions by various airlines I choose Cathay Pacific for this...

Seriously good service from start to finish.
It's pretty hard to write something bad happening from check-in- lounge- lounge & the return flight was just as seamless.
They should be Number One airline.

Check in,Lounge and comfort were all very good,strange with dinner soured the experience a little when the pre dinner drinks was served following the entree.They made some lame excuse but the impression we got was to speed up the process.
Bumpy ride but you cannot blame the airline for that.
For the right price would use them again.

标题: Great service and friendly staff. Comfortable flight!
内容: I really liked flying with Cathay Pacific. The staff were lovely, they had everything we needed and the food was pretty good!

标题: Space in seats are too small.
内容: I am a small person,but the seat is still too cramp. The plane from Hong Kong to Manila is much better, compared to the flight from Toronto to Hong Kong.. the seat space is much bigger.

Large space for such a long trip.
I fully recommend.
The service was good, the staff very helpful and smiling.

标题: From A to B with no frills.
内容: The aircraft was tired with worn seats and worn IFE. The food served (breakfast) was some of the worst airline food I have ever had the (dis)pleasure to be served - it was seriously bad and was tasted then left alone. The flight crew were not exactly cheerful or friendly and when exiting the aircraft at the end of the...

标题: 5 hours delay with no minimal treatment
内容:
very disappointing.
our flight from Hong Kong airport delayed for 5 hours.
with some blurred reasons they gave us.
every few minutes they gave another boarding time.
no one even pay attention to passengers.
it was in middle of the night.
i expatriate from other air companies some drink or food or some better attitude.
when going to their web...

Cathay Pacific has been a typically dependable airline, but in my recent travel with them, it was an incredible disappointment. First, they delayed our flights (CX892) from HK to SFO (San Francisco) by over 2 hours due to their operational issues, so we missed our connecting flight from SFO to PDX (Portland). Second, we were not informed of the recovery...

标题: We flew with cathay pacific from Melbourne
内容: It is a long flight to London . We did stop for 2 hours in Hong Kong which was time to stretch the legs and have a look at the duty free items Cathay Pacific Air hostess and staff were wonderful they would go out of there way to help you and my husband i enjoyed their meals no complaints...

Cathay Pacific has been on top of the airline pile for many years. This was my first flight with them in a long time and i was not disappointed. Excellent service and a clean and modern aircraft, The staff were exceptional and the flight was very smooth. I will be back.

We recently flew return from Brisbane to London. The staff on the return from London were immensely better than the staff to London. On the way over the attendants seemed rude and inconvenienced by my daughter and I. However on our return the staff were friendly and helpful and very accommodating. I do think Cathay needs to expand the entertainment...
excellent service with their crew members and drinks are more choice like soft drink,fruit juice and wine. Also food was good taste.

The second leg of our flight from Dublin to Melbourne was not quite as good as the first leg. Different plane, maybe older but configuration of seats not quite as comfortable. Service a little more varied. Just felt not quite as good as the Dublin-HongKong leg and made me wonder if it would be worth checking cost of business class...

This was the first time I’ve travelled premium economy. It was well worth it! The flight was 12 hours so the extreme space and comfort was really appreciated. Things like priority boarding, a welcome refreshment (champers) as soon as we sat down, were lovely after the usual long walk and wait within the airport. Two flights to get us from...

标题: Business class - excellent service and great comfort
内容: Seat 19A window. Seat reclines back fully. A great wraparound blanket with legholes. Great choice of drinks even made a gin and tonic twice without asking before dinner meal. Quentin was the efficient and friendly pursuer. Had a Cantonese-style choice of a variety of Dim Sum sealmai/dumplings or the hot fish and peanut congee breakfast which was different fare with...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: The seats we chose were changed without being asked and informed only when we broaded. So disappointed! The overall services and meal are good.
Excellent service. Good food. Well chosen wine. Can't imagine a flight could be made any better. Overall better than expected. Got off the plane well fed.

I was able to redeem miles for a first class flight from Hong Kong to New York. Service was superb from start to finish. Cathay's first class lounge in Hong Kong was breath-taking. If you are flying in first, you must visit the cabanas for a shower! The wait times can be long, so be sure to put your name...
标签: International' 'First Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: We took Cathay Pacific from SFO to Cebu,PH round trip. The flight going was ok. However, our return flight from Cebu to HongKong was delayed. And because of that, we missed our connecting flight back to SFO. I understand that things like this happens but the airline employees not giving a sh!t about their customer is another thing. We arrived...

If you have to fly 15 hours from Toronto to Hong Kong I would recommend Cathay. Great service on the place, comfortable enough seats and lots of on board inseat entertainment. No one likes these long flights but they have it down to a science. they also offer snacks and noodles at any time during the flight as well as...

I tried very hard to earn points through credit card spending so that I can earn enough to upgrade premium economy to business class. Round trip upgrade used to be 45k points only and all of sudden with recent update to their point system it will now cost me 7k points for the same upgrade. All of sudden my entire...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: A super flight! The air hostesses were superb and you seem to never stop eating! The food was really great and they're forever serving snacks in-between the meals. The 12 and half flight to Hong Kong went well and then 4 and a half hours to Bali. As usual, Economy class seats are very close together but nothing less than...

If this Airlines claims to represent Hong Kong,it did a terrible job.
We flied CX 72 on Aug 12 218.Our seats were 44E and 44G.
First the flight was delayed.
Second the asian short hair lady inflight service attendant,only spent her time taking to someone she obviously knows while ignoring the rest of us.My poor husband tried to get me...

Surprisingly good flight - I have heard so many negative comments about Cathay recently so I had no expectations when boarding the flight. We had an enthusiastic flight attendant by the name of Leslie and his attitude should be copied by everyone on Cathay flights. He spoke to the in-flight service director to make arrangements for my assistant to have...

I have always flown with this airline for the past 17 yrs now. It offers very good service and affordable price considering the distance. The last time I travelled they lost my luggage and the team in Cebu were very helpful. They asked me if I was okey when they saw me left alone in the carousel waiting for my...

We were dreading the long flight from the USA to Malaysia. Booked on Cathay Pacific as I remembered it to be quite good. Their partners included Cathay Dragon, United and American Airlines. The American and Cathay Dragon planes were nice and had more space than United. The planes were newer and have screens on the headrests in front of our...
Two excellent flights via Hong Kong. The seats were great and the service fantastic from check in to arrival.

Just flown from Hong Kong to Taipei on Cathay Pacific CX46 and it was a perfect flight.
Nice lounge in HK with good choice of food and drink. Nice check in with friendly staff. Easy boarding and warm welcome on the plane. Great Food I had the pork ribs and banana cheese cake. Staff all very friendly and comfy seats....

We had the absolute pleasure of flying Auckland to Hong Kong on Cathay in prem economy. The food was lovely and the staff very attentive. The seat was very comfortable, and had several options for changing position to keep you comfortable. I would certainly recommend it over the likes of Lufthansa, who we had the unfortunate experience of flying after...

Cathay has good lounges in hk and tokyo narita and the pier is definitely one of my favourite lounges in the world. If u travel business class or u are a one world elite member, u could also gain access to japan airline's lounge whose japanese beef curry is great.
When it comes to the seats, i tried both the...

标题: CP is not one of the top airlines such as Singapore AL+ ANA Still CP is one of the best!
内容:
I have traveled for work as often as every 2 or 3 months from the USA to France and VN
For destination to VN I used to fly trom WDC to HCMC on ANA which is one of the top best airlines and their services are top professional although some hostesses can be rigid and straight for no reason! and...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Los Angeles - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: We hadn’t slept on our long flight before this one and it was such a comfortable and easy flight that we almost slept the whole 9 hours! The service was really lovely, the food wasn’t too bad and the captain was really vocal (he spoke about 4 times during the flight) which was nice because you don’t get that on...
This was one of the best flight I have ever taken! Premium Economy on this airline is AMAZING. Everything you can wish for on a 9.3 flight. Service was best! Arrival in HK fast and smooth.

标题: Decent inflight service and awful reservation and other experience
内容: In flight service is decent for the airline. The overall management of the airlines is poor however. 1. If you book with an agent you cannot ever change the reservation directly with airlines. So in an international travel when you may be across time zones and holiday season etc. you have to wait for the travel agent. This is ridiculous...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容:
We had a stop over in Hong Kong, total time 25 hours.
Having not travelled long distances for a while we were amazed
at the huge airport terminals, like the one in Hong Kong and Zurich
where you need to catch a train to get to some of the gates and
because of this we experienced some delays, but nearly...

标题: We flew Premium Economy and we had plenty of room
内容: This is the second time we flew Premium Economy with Cathay Pacific. The extra leg room really comes in handy if you are tall, also it's great to go towards the front of the plane without queuing up.

Inflight service is fine however catering needs more attention.
On the first leg I choose cod however the cod is over cooked and is very dry.
Breakfast I choose the dim sum selection dim sum are ok however the sticky rice is not even warm. I informed the cabin crew and she suggest to either prepare another one for me...
Exellent service great food and one of the best beds in the air.with Cathay you always get consistancy . To date i have never been dissapointed and cathay remains my airline of choice

the service was great. the food was okay. flight attendants make you feel comfortable. but seats are tooo tight. next time i would travel premium economy or business class. I would recommend for that long flight (15 hours to HK) to get a premium economy or business class seats. other than that service was great.

标题: Premium Economy Class flight from Hong Kong to Milan
内容: Had a flight back from HKG to MXP with Cathay Pacific in the Premium Economy Class. Boarding was OK but for me the PE class seat is not very comfortable. When I compare this with the economy class of Thai airways in the A35 then I would always prefer Thai even tough it is only economy class but the seat...

My husband and I together with my sister and her husband (who were first time flyers) flew from Colombo to Hong Kong and then to Melbourne, Australia last month and returned on 4/8/218. The service was very good and the food was excellent in both flights and we thoroughly enjoyed. The flight attendants were very polite and their service was...
The ground services like check-in and lounge are one of the best in the industry (at least in the region). If you can, stop by the Pier Lounge yo try out their noodles.

We flew from Perth to Hong Kong in a new Airbus 35 then on to London in a Boeing 777. Both aircraft were comfortable although I found it easier to sleep with the 'lie flat' bed at an incline rather than completely flat. Service was excellent and the food very good with a selection to please most tastes. The break...

标题: First time to Europe with Cathay Pacific
内容:
My wife and I recently travelled to Europe on a much needed holiday, and decided to fligh with Cathay Pacific in order to enjoy a stopover in Hong Kong on the return trip.
Over the years I have flown dozens of times to Europe and Asia, with many top airlines including Qantas, Singapore Airlines and Thai International among the best...

标题: Great service still exists in this world
内容: Our flight from NYC to Vancouver and back again went very smoothly. The flight attendants and check in attendants were very professional and helpful. Loved not having an extra fee for bags. Even got meals included. We were not used to this treatment on flights on US airlines! Seats recline a little more than most planes in economy. Really wish...

标题: New planes does not help with comfort during long flights
内容: Took this flight from SFO to HKG. It was A35-9, new plane. But inside was terrible. Non-working USB ports, no power on the seat. The seat cushioning is so bad that I could feel the back seat passenger in my back, literally massaging me thru out the flight. Uncomfortable seats, standard entertainment system made this flight very boring, looking at...

Ultimately my wife left in the same Cathay flight but on Aug 6th. Flight was on time, she reached HKG on time. From there she took SFO flight @ 3 hours. Well, the saga continued here in this flight. The plane was extremely old (Boeing 777 3ER). the air hostess and staff were extremely rude. The takeoff was the worst...

I was on a business trip to Bali fro three days, along with my wife. I planned to go early, take a couple of days off, spend some time to inaugurate our 25th marriage anniversary in Bali. Because I was on a business trip, my plan was to go from SFO to Bali (Sat thru Thu), fly out of Bai...

Once you get past the check in at manchester, which was ridiculously inefficient even when you had printed/ downloaded your boarding cards, the flight / airline was efficient . An A35 with 3x3x3 seat arrangement wasn’t ideal for a family of 4. Entertainment system excellent with more than enough up to date films . Food ok with on tap snacks...

Overall the flight was ok, the food (Indian Veg) was not that great on the Chennai to LAX leg, The checked in bag was missing and it took 3 days for Cathay to locate my bag and another 2 days to deliver it to me.

标题: The Best Frequent Flyer program and airline lounge I have experienced.
内容: Cathay Pacific airways (it is Cathay Dragon Airlines now) has the best airlines lounge (both Food and Interior Design) and frequent flyer program as per my personal experience after trying China Airline, EVA, Thai Airway, Vietnam Airlines, Garuda airlines, Eastern airlines, Air China, China southern airlines (airlines in Asia is better than the airlines from Europe and States in general...

标题: Great airline especially with a status
内容: Cathay has always been dubbed as one of the best airliens in the region. Cathay has rather a relaxed upgrade policy compared to other competitors in the region. High chance of upgrade if you're loyal to them!

When traveling from Jakarta to Nagoya, Japan my suitcase got damaged and the customer service department was already closed, the day after I wrote them an email with my issue of a damage suitcase, after few hours I got an email back acknowledging the situation and asking me for few more details, and to make it short after few days...

The seat is narrow although I have a small size body, not feeling comfortable than before. And the back can’t adjust front and back, guess my ticket is not Premium E price. The food quality declined so make many food waste, I rather have cup noodles instead.
The Cathy Pacific quality in few years ago were much better and price...

We booked a Canadian Holiday in Aug/Sept. 217 and because we had a great deal we had to pay the total when booking. We flew out of Perth on the 29 June 218 Upon arrival at the Perth International Airport we were second in line to have our tickets validated for our flight to Hong Kong and then on to...

We flew business class it was very comfortable nice food friendly flight attendants.
In flight entertainment was OK

I have flown Cathay Pacific before and this flight lived up to my expectations. The business class fares with Cathay, while not the cheapest, are reasonably priced, particularly considering the long distance involved from Europe to Australia. The check-in at Milan was smooth and the Lounge was well stocked, comfortable and the service excellent. The flight attendants onboard were polite...

We had paid $8 AUD extra to sit in the exit rows and on both legs they claimed that only 1 of the 2 of us had paid. Wasted a lot of time while they searched their systems and made phone calls to confirm. Our plane was very old and tired. Food was ok. not great just ok. Our code...

I prefer Cathay every time I go overseas coz of their good service .But I Think I will try other airlines on my next trip after all the experiences on my last trip. first of all , we travel of four with my family and three of them are seniors so we prefer to pay extra for seat assignment so...

We use to travel in past with them to Hong Kong and decided to do so again as its a direct trip. Out of 7 flights to complete our trip only one were on time and without hassles. Floor staff at Hong Kong customer desk assume everyone is working daily with there systems and that you bother them by asking...

Maybe because it was a newer aircraft or that it wasn't full but never the less, this was an enjoyable flight. Extremely comfortable seat with lots of leg room, in flight entertainment was stellar (many new t.v. series and movies) & I loved the meal (a baked chicken roll)! Staff was kind enough to give me a second serving?Flight CX...

We try to inform about the option to take 5 kg more luggage by calling the customer service of Cathy Pacific a few days before the flight. However, the callcenter made kind of reservation which resulted in this worst check-in experience ever at Amsterdam airport:
- error during self check-in
- waiting for 45 min to correct their mistake in...

I always try to fly CP (Cathy Pacific) its a little more expensive than US airlines or Air Canada an airline I try to avoid but the extra cost for 12 hr flight is worth it
The aircraft are cleaned and well maintained, the check in and boarding process is great and quick
I was a little overweight in luggage...

标题: compagnia perfetta, programma punti una truffa
内容:
The Asia Miles program is a scam...
I had 39. expiring miles to redeem, so instead of flying directly to Shanghai, I chose to connect from HK.
From the Cathay office in Italy, I was told that I needed to buy the most expensive Premium Economy ticket, in order to upgrade to business: so did I, and only then they...

You just can't fault it. Cathay has done just nice in everything a reliable and reputable airline should deliver. The aircraft may not be the most comfortable but decent enough. Meal was good and generous in size too. More importantly, passengers are given confident in travelling from A to B without worry of cancelled or delayed flight, last minute surprises...

标题: Quality airline slowing moving towards budget airline service
内容: Cathay changed their new infotainment system and seems like they offer much less movies in their system. Also the worse part is when I check in they request to weight all our hand carry to make sure that it's all under 7kg. This really make them comparable to budget airline but charging 3% premium.

for my opinion Cathay Pacific is better than Cathay Dragon, business class seat not very comfort. my point of view is the meal, items is not I expected, when I return from KL, my choice of main courses was out of stock, make little disappointed.
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - Kuala Lumpur

标题: Smart choice to upgrade from Economy to Premium Economy
内容: The CX256 plane has been changed to 3-4-3 instead of 3-3-3 on CX255 from HKG to LHR in Economy, and I am so glad to have spent my miles for an upgrade to Premium Economy class. The food and service in PE is good, especially when compared to those in Economy class (I can't believe CX doesn't offer overnight amenities...

标题: Pleasant flights but lacked any ‘wow factor’
内容:
Recent trip between Perth (AUST) and Toronto (CAN) with Cathay involved 7hr flights at the Perth end and 16 hr flights at the Canadian end (with Hong Kong the obvious link).
Historically I remember Cathay having a standout reputation along with their Singapore counterpart. Though these recent flights were certainly adequate and avoided any form of drama there wasnt anything...

标题: Great service on a 17.5 hour flight from BOS to HK
内容: Great service on a 17.5 hour flight from BOS to HK. Airline attendants were friendly and always willing to bring whatever you wanted

Manila To Amsterdam via Hong Kong. Flight from Manila to Hong Kong was on a Boeing 777-3ER, I was disappointed because it was supposed to be the A35-9, but they changed it for some unknown reason. As usual they give a warm pastry (it does taste good) with a cookie and a bottle of water on this 2 hour flight,...

标题: Excellent final leg of my trip
内容: Excellent final leg of my trip. Cabin crew excellent, food superb and Business class everything you would expect and very comfortable. Would highly recommend
Excellent first leg of my trip back to London. Cabin Crew very friendly and helpful. Food excellent . Everything you would expect of business class. Would definitely use them again.

The 2nd leg of my trip to Oz proved to be just as good a standard as the first. Again the cabin crew were very friendly, helpful and polite. Business class was very comfortable as you'd expect. Food excellent

Travelled in business class on the 1st leg of my trip to Australia and the whole experience was superb.
Cabin crew were every friendly and provided excellent service throughout.
Cabin and seats were comfortable and even managed to get some sleep with the comfortable beds. Food was excellent with considerable choice.

标题: No flight points, despite false advertising
内容: They say online they work in alignment with Qantas, booked an entire trip to U.K. and they refuse to award a single point despite it being all over their website as supported. Reason: "booking class not eligible". Total scam. Fly with Virgin!

It was an early afternoon flight and after a couple of hours lunch was served and then all the lights were turned down and the airline staff disappeared. All the lights were turned on again for breakfast, the staff served this and after clearing it away turned the lights down again and disappeared until we were preparing to land. I...

If you are traveling in the economy class, then choose the seats in the middle of the row. This airline offers more leg space than other airlines. The service is good, but flight attendants are doublechecking when caucasian asks for Chinese style breakfast. And I would like express my gratitude to a flight attendant who brought me my passport which...

For sure the comfort level cannot be compared to business class which you can enjoy the bed setting, but for my husband and myself (175cm & 16cm tall) the PE class already gave full seat space and incline angle. And the full leg rest for new aircraft is very comfortable. Food is ok with no surprise, my two way flight...

With a long-haul 15+ hour Flight CX811 Boston to Hong Kong connecting with 3 hour Flight CX767 Hong Kong to Ho Chi Minh City GOING and long-haul 3 hour Flight
CX754 Bangkok to Hong Kong connecting with long-haul 16+ hour Flight CX812 Hong Kong to Boston, I opted for the EXIT ROW UPGRADE. This was a VERY GOOD DECISION. At...

I chose the flight for ver Qantas because they are free1,2,1 seating as opposed to 2,3,2.
Hmm... mixed feelings. Singapore is much much better... but they don’t fly that route so it’s a mute point really.
Staff are a bit inattentive...you have to ask for drinks etc...they don’t really ask you. TV screen us pretty bad.
Food ok but not...

标题: No extra service for premium economy - what did we pay for??
内容: Started off badly at the check in counter in Hong Kong. Check in person was rude and disinterested and chatted to her colleague on and off during the process. We had recently flown premium economy with Singapore airlines and had received priority baggage tags. We assumed the same service from Cathay. We were told bluntly that it was not part...

标题: Five stars price, 3 stars services, 2 stars aircraft.
内容:
Cathay Pacific is not Cathay Pacific then!
I believe all CX’s customers have the same feeling that they are treated very differently in recent years.
They will feel that even they are still paying a premium fare, they received near budget airlines services.
Even if you are their “Loyal” customers, you will feel they p you off more! You will...
Very ordinary. Old aircraft in need of good clean. I expected much more from a business class flight. No better than premium economy on Qantas A38. Waste of money. Never again.

We were three of our family who took CX885 from Los Angeles to Hong Kong on June 21 218 - and then the onward connection CX631 leaving Hong Kong on June 22 to arrive Chennai on June 23 morning. In April 218, four of us had travelled out from Chennai to Los Angeles on the same airline.
The flight from...

标题: Excellent flight experience on a new A35-9.
内容:
The five stars are given for the flight experience only.
That was my first flight on A35-9. I was very much impressed: the cabin noise was very low (I felt it was much lower than even in B787 or A38), the air quality very good, the flight itself -- very smooth. I flew in business, with the a standard CX...
Both way i flew on business class. The ambience, food, lounge facilities etc etc were excellent. I should give my special comments on Hongkong " pier" Lounge. Its absolutely good.

标题: Terrible customer handling of a 5 hour delayed flight
内容:
The flight was for a business trip to Seoul and I always trusted Cathay to be on time with decent service.
This time the flight was supposed to leave at 92am and was already delayed to 94am, I picked this particular plane knowing it is newer based on checking the flight type and services available (with on board wifi).
Then...

Gets 4 stars because it is a cheap way to get to Canada from Perth, otherwise it was pretty bad. Firstly there was only 1 hour 1 minutes stopover in Hong Kong and by the time the plane had arrived late much less than that = stress. We made it but stress nevertheless. Secondly no amenity pack at all, not...

We found both economy and premium economy comfortable. The flights attendants always ready to give a good and smiling service. Clean wash rooms, very good airplane and very good food. We look forward to use them again.

A great airline gone bad. Flew from Nanjing to Delhi via Hong Kong. The first leg was with Cathay Dragon, however the problems on both Dragon and Cathay Pacific were the same. The TV screens did not operate correctly. Touching produced no results or wrong results.
A bad experience.

Yes I would not travel with them other than the fact they go thru Hong Kong and it is still the fastest way for me to go to London.
Cattle class is what it should be called because that’s what we are.
I swore I would not go with them again after last experience.
Complained that last time my wife...
Very good service, attendants were very attentive. Nice to get a pillow and blanket on the flight. Reasonably comfortable as it was economy.

标题: Aircraft worth $$$$$$$$$ and yet the jack socket for the headphones don’t work
内容:
One thing that pees me off with airlines flying $$$$$$ planes, and then the jack plug for the headphones don’t work. Really ??
The ground crew and stewards are all very good. Being over six foot tall, the leg room on the planes is pretty good. This particular flight was delayed, partially due to the weather, and runway maintenance being...

Excellent service,
Flights attendants always ready to give a good and smiling service.
They are ready to answer to every request you have.
Clean wash rooms, very good airplane and very good food.
Excellent flight, my first time with this airline but surely not my last.
One problem I found, If you try to become member of the Dragon Club...

we found Cathay premium economy experience good value service was good staff were very friendly and helpful , i left my phone behind on arrival in Melbourne when i reported it to customer service Mohammed needs a special mention he was quick on the ball
i had my phone back within the hour,
it would be nice if Cathay would...

标题: Business class check in at economy desk
内容:
I took the flight CX246 from Copenhagen to HK on 3/7/218 in business class.
The check in queue which included not only business class but Marco Polo members was so long that I finally checked in at economy desk which was much shorter.
The same situation occurred at the entrance to boarding and airport lounge.
I was upset with the...

This is to warn any passenger on a Cathay Pacific flight to avoid getting Row 46 aisle seating, it is directly opposite the toilet, so on a 14 hour full flight, you just get the opening and closing non stop with the light from the toilet shining on your seat every time someone goes in or out and the flushing...

My flight from Perth was ok.Service was as you would expect in economy but the return flight from Mongolia to Perth was a little less pleasant. Due to a typhoon all flights were grounded in Beijing and we spent nearly 36 hours being shunted from one area of the airport to another. The Cathay ground staff young woman who assisted...

I found Cathay service to be efficient, the food was good, although snacks were few and they had run out when I asked for some peanuts.
I have decided I can no longer fly economy as it seems the people who sit around you have no regard for the other passengers, leaning over their seats when talking to people, walking...

As the company is paying and its company policy to travel premium economy. Its a fair bit more expensive then economy but it does make the journey more comfortable. The seats are just big enough for even of the larger gentlemen like myself to be comfortable and not getting elbowed by the person next to you you. Enough legroom not...

Always use Cathay Pacific for flights to Australia, love a cheeky little stopover in Hong kong too for a couple of days. The service is excellent, great legroom, great staff. Keep up the good work Cathay Pacific

Cathay Pacific was a lovely flight to and from Melbourne. The seats were comfortable, the cabin crew were very accommodating and the meals were good. I would rate them as high as Singapore airlines in terms of service and comfort. I highly recommend this airline. Big thumbs up from me.

标题: Great flight from new airline to Dublin
内容: First time flying Cathay pacific and went all the way from Dublin to Auckland via a Hong Kong stopover. The plane was new. Leg room seemed bigger than usual (not sure if it was). Food was ok as even my son ate it. Service was very good. Would definitely fly with them again.

I was excited to be flying on the new A35 premium economy between Perth and HK, but what a disappointing flight, so badly designed. Seats on row 3 may have more legroom but you have to keep the front clear, so no handbags on the floor. The screens are on the wall, too far to reach with your arm, so...

I was ecstatic that Cathay put the leg rest for all PE seats, but I recently flew in their new PE and found it way worse than the old one: less spacious (had troubles getting out of my seat with the person in front of me having the seat reclined - and I'm quite slim!!) and an overall less comfortable...

Plane late. Bad weather. We were not kept updated. We went to gate as soon as boarding shown. Long walk. We rushed to plane and were admonished for being late! Not our fault! Then we were subjected to a bag search making us even later. Once eventually seated, the plane remained at the gate for more than 3 minutes. So...

标题: Fastest way to get to Bangalore from LA
内容: I have used this route to travel to Bangalore on multiple occasions since it is the fastest. The service on Cathay Pacific is good while it could be a tad better on Cathay Dragon. The seats in Premium Economy on the LA - HK sector are very comfortable. There is no Premium Economy on the HK - BLR segment :-(

标题: Comfortable flight, great leg room in economy
内容: Had 2 flights from Italy to Melbourne with this airline total 21 hours travel. Was pleasantly surprised at the legroom in the seats. My son is 6ft 2 and had enough legroom. Food was also great.

There was much to be pleased about given this was a 16 hour flight. The food was tasty and the cabin service was excellent. The leg-room was lacking and when the person in front of me put her seat back, it was very cramped. That seems par for the course in all economy flights. The most noteworthy thing about our...

We had a nice flight with this airline. My 4 year old son didn't complaint even it was a 13 hour long flight from London Heathrow to Hong Kong then to Manila. Lots of entertainment for children to choose from and lots of variety of food and snacks during flight. Attendants were very approachable and helpful. We will choose to...

Cathay Pacific is a great airline with excellent cabin facilities in Business Class. The flat beds are comfortable and spacious. Th entertainment has a wide variety of choices. The food was reasonable.

标题: We flew Auckland, Hong Kong, Vancouver return
内容:
We have flown Cathay Pacific before. The aircraft types we flew in were the A35 and B777. We found the Cabin Crew service on all the flights was of a high standard. The food was also of a high standard. The aircraft were all clean and tidy.
We were eligible for entry to a Business Lounge due to the amount...

标题: Worst Experience of my traveling life :(
内容: I am so mad about the way we were treated by this airline I can't even express! Our flight left the gate, then sat on the tarmac, then 3 HOURS later, we were back at the gate because it had been canceled (and this isn't even where it's gotten bad!). So they make us go back through miles of airport...

标题: Overall quality is good; but exit row is not worth extra money!
内容:
Overall quality is good. Good selection of movies and other entertainments. And I like the cup noodle at night.
However, do not pay extra for the exit row seats! They are all close to a baby basin. And the baby basin would always be occupied by a crying and noisy baby. I think I can sleep better in an ordinary...

标题: Good services but too narrow seat room
内容: The overall services and food quality were good, but for the seat and leg room were too narrow even for me, a Chinese especially for a long haul. This was a quite new plane (Should be) and big but the design of the back of the seat was too thick which reduced the room of each seat especially the last...

I always prefer Cathay due to their great in-cabin service. The cabin crew are always friendly. Flying to Australia I often can't afford them as they are usually HKD1 more for a direct flight than Qantas. This time I got a great price. My only gripe was the inflight movie choices. It seemed limited but since it was a night...

Clean plane, efficient service boarding/ departing, and very attentive flight attendants! Was pleasantly surprised by the comfort and room in economy; especially considering we were on two flights (12hr + 4hr).

Wow
Super fast and efficient check in,nice lounge ,easy boarding,nice welcome a really impressive start to a long journey,the seats on both flights were comfy and plenty of space even when fully reclined.
This was the first time we have flown Cathay and were slightly concerned about some of the negative comments about service and food options,it almost feltas if...

I took this airline with my family from Toronto to Hong Kong, and then Hong Kong back to Toronto.
Now I'm going to add that I'm 13, so you can take my word for this review or not.
Both times Boarding, Departure, and Arrival times were on point. The seats were good, with each person getting a pillow and a...

Flew to Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific, and then flew to Denpasar with Cathay dragon. Was quite worried about having an uncomfortable flight in economy (17 hours in total) but was pleasantly surprised! I felt we had a good amount of leg space and the seats reclined quite a bit back. The cabin crew were great and they had a...

We were pleasantly surprised by the amount of leg room we had. On top of that the plane was not full, so my wife and I had three seats available on both flights (Melbourne to Hong Kong and Hong Kong to Paris). Service was pretty good and stewardesses were very polite and efficient, quickly bringing the food and drinks and...

This airline have a direct flight from tel aviv to hong kong and from hong kong to sydney. We did a long rest in hong kong and continue after 2 days. We advice to make such stop for resting and "break the long flight
The service was very very slow. It took about 2.5 - 3 hours from take off to finish the meal. It was very hard to rest or getting sleep during that time.

Excellent business class. Flew A35's MEL to HKG, then HKG to MNL. Check-in in MEL was friendly and quick. Business class lounge in MEL is small but comfortable.
Seat (single/window) was spacious and comfortable. In-flight service was friendly and efficient. Food and beverage was very good. Had in-flight WiFi internet from MEL to HKG for US$2 (whole flight, no cap)...

I took CX829 in the early morning on 2 June. CX doesn’t has its lounge at the Toronto airport and the service of Plaza Preium lounge was average, limited choice of food and beverages. Lots of passengers were stuck at the small gate area as on board was slow. Service of flight attendants was not up to the standard for...

We arrived at Frankfurt Airport terminal E and had to transit to the Lufthansa terminal A (or 1) to fly to another Europe city. We were totally lost and found that all incoming passengers had to go through immigration. Whilst talking to an airport staff member one of the Cathay Pacific flight crew came over and I explained what we...

I took the late afternoon direct flight from Hong Kong to Toronto on 16 May 218. CX offers many lounges for business class passengers to choose from and the service was good. The flight was full and the service of flight attendants was professional, friendly and efficient. Amenities provided were Jurlique, but there’s no slippers and pajamas so Eva air...

标题: A couple of hiccups but the service was overall very good
内容:
This was my last leg of a almost 3 week tour around Cambodia and Vietnam. This was the last of 9 flights I had in my itinerary.
Everything so far had gone like clockwork. All on time, no issues with bags etc. So I had arrived on my flight from Hanoi to Hong Kong in plenty of time and had...
Cathay are a good airline and the flight route is great. Business class always comfortable with good service, food and great seat.

took CX 884 from Hong Kong to Los Angeles on July 21. The Captain who piloted the flight has the BEST PA voice EVER :) his voice is calming and clear. He came up to announce there would be turbulence on the way, and informed cabin crew to resume service when turbulence is cleared. His calming voice made me feel...
Seating arrangements were better than our previous trip the preceding day. Perhaps it was the change in airplane. Again the trip was average

Perhaps the worst flight ever for both my wife and myself... the seating was terrible and the staff, food and flight was average, to say the least. This really showed why it is called the "cattle class"

标题: Cathay Pacific. Great choice for a long flight
内容:
Recently flew HK to Vancouver and return on their 777-3er.
Certainly glad we travelled Premium Economy. The seats were very comfortable and had plenty of room. The extra recline and space was very welcome on such a long flight(12 hours out and 13.5 hours return). Food was good as was the IFE. Worth the extra $$.

Very happy with Cathay.
Efficient check in and boarding.
Loved the extra room in Premium Economy. Seats were very comfortable, there was a good choice of quality food and the IFE was excellent. Plenty of choices. Walking to the toilets in economy re-enforced why I was happy to have paid more for PE. Pricey but worth it.

It’s my first time to fly with Cathay Pacific and have heard good feedbacks from friends. I would say it was average and not so clean.
The aircraft was delayed for a few minutes. Upon getting onboard I saw hair on the pillow. I kindly ask for assistance from the crew. She took the pillow and just removed the hair....

Flew Cathay premium economy from hkg to syd on a Boeing 777. Pretty average service and the seats pale in comparison to the PE seats on either Qantas (747) or Luffhansa (A38-8), which we flew on the other legs.
If you have a choice, don't pick Cathay. The only good thing about Cathay was the ability to check in our...

Cathay Pacific crews were so kind and smart!
They can command many languages so we can
have a comfortable time in CX flight.
However I felt meal service of Cathay flight got worse than ever.
After we finish main dishes, we can't have any snacks and confectionaries.
Also, the quality of juices got worse either.
If you use the same...

Simply brilliant from start to finish. Helpful staff at LGW to facilitate a smooth self check in process. Fast & efficient boarding. Cabin was spotlessly clean with excellent inflight entertainment system which had an extensive choice of movies, music, magazines, podcasts etc.
Constant supply of snacks & drink all supplied with a smile. Food delicious - one in our party...

I'm a frequent flyer, and have used many top airlines. I found the services, from ground staff, transit assistance in Hong Kong, and in-flight service was to more that satisfaction.
I wish to travel again next month, will use cathey pacific air line again for sure.

Check in was easy. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Seating on the plane was excellent from Melbourne to Hong Kong and there was a change of aircraft slightly older plane from there fleet, but still very comfortable.
Food and service was good. Better than other airlines I’ve flown with.
The extra leg room and seat space is a must...

Flew via Hong Kong to Vancouver with Cathay Pacific Airlines. At every point, the staff were professional and efficient. Very courteous in helping a family member in a wheelchair at all airports.
I am a frequent traveller and have to mention that the meals offered on Cathay Pacific were great! Didn't even taste like airline food.

flew this route twice now and start to finish its always been great. The food, the service, entertainment and leg room have always been good. Top Tip if you ever fly this route have a cheeky 2 day stop over in hong kong to break the journey up.

标题: Very average flights even if we hadn't been downgraded
内容:
We took four flights with Cathay Pacific from London to Australia, via Hong Kong. There was nothing remarkable in any way about the flights although I am pleased to say the flights were all on time.
The seating was average, the food was average, the service was average. It was so hard to get a cup of tea that we...

Quite possibly the worst flying experience I've ever had, in 35 years.
Cathay Pacific are the trash sky bucket of the world.
The planes are old. Interiors are very poor. old dirty damaged hardware. Staff pretty poor.
Last time for this sham outfit.
Plane turned back due to a fault. Then flight canceled.
Not surprised there are maintenance issues. Flying...

标题: Staff at the check in counter
内容:
Staff at the check-in counter was not listening. I specifically said my luggage is fragile and I repeated 4 times and still they didn't put the fragile sticker and label on my luggage.
Also I flew business class and they forgot to put the priority luggage label on my suitcase so I waited for a long time for my luggage...

Quite good in terms of service. One disappointment is that the beef was hard like wood, I left it untouched.
Another thing is having arrived HK on this return flight, I waited almost 45 minutes for the luggage which was a huge disappointment compared to not having to wait over 1 minutes in Narita Airport.

Very helpful ground staff although the new checking system bit confusing,Second to none Cabin Staff,Cathay lounge at Hong Kong serves excellent food and comfortable for long connecting flights.
My many travels to overseas destinations this airline offers services second to none.

I was being free upgraded to the premium econ for this flight. The Legroom is great. The in-flight facilities are all great. Premium econ will be my further choice if choosing CX again. But there are only few rows there.

I have flown Cathay Pacific three times round trip in premium economy. The most recent on the 2 July Adl to Bos.
As I have a disability I fly premium economy for extra room and the other extras available flying this cabin. All three flights I have taken I have found it impossible to push the buttons in the armrests...

The overall flight was fine, but the one real issue came from the entertainment system. It doesn't seem to change that often and doesn't really offer anything that interests me much. For an 11.5 hour flight, one would hope something decent would be available.

Arrived ar Gatwick for 12.25 flight at 8.3. Short queue. Already checked in online. Just a baggage drop!! One woman walking around telling everyone to go to the unmanned kiosks and check in. Said we already checked in, but had to go anyway to get luggage tags, even though already had boarding pass. Kiosks not working! Waited for 1 hour...

On our most recent trip to visit family we chose to fly with Cathay. We had a great flight the service was exceptional. The only hiccup was that upon landing at Gatwick we had to wait for nearly 3/4 or an hour for a parking bay! Otherwise great flight good lounge availability in Sydney and Hong Kong.

Very nice experience with flying with Cathay Pacific.
According to the reviews the Air Line was not the better performance , but actually it's very nice experience , recommended to fly with Cathay Pacific

标题: The delay game was next level they should win a champion for it
内容: Leg room was alright,BUT if u sit anywhere but the front row and have to endure long flight, it was nightmare!! the seat was too uncomfortable and small, turning left and right was impossible. Food wasnt anything special, toilet was small but still manageable, movie selections was very little. Drink choices weren't much either. The tap water was not nice.......

Extremely comfortable flights. Excellent food and service.
new airbus from London and Boeing 777 Hong Kong to Sydney.

A good flight both there and back. Approx 12 hours in the air but reasonable comfortable seats (economy class). Good food and attention from the cabin staff. Like all airlines if you are tall then it would be worth looking at extra legroom.

标题: A pleasant surprise thanks to Cathay
内容:
As a frequent traveler little things make a big difference.
Cathay came through big time . We were on our way back from Melbourne to Boston having attended a Nursing conference and visiting family.
Cathay upgraded us on the Boston leg.
Their staff and service is second to non. We have flown most of the worlds airlines including Singapore and...

After reading reviews after booking I was not looking forward to the flight. However, all staff were happy and friendly from check in to leaving the aircraft.
Obviously long haul flights can be uncomfortable but the seats were fine as was the cabin temperature.
The food was ok, you can ring or walk to the galley for drinks/snacks at any...

This was my first time travelling on the A35-9 equipment of Cathay Pacific and personally I found the business class seat is more comfy than its counterpart on 777-3 (their long haul configuration J class seat). However the seat is showing some wearing and could use better maintenance but this is just some minor flaws. CX always have great lounges...

Flight was delayed but it's no fault of the airline due to the weather conditions that affected the inbound flight we were suppose to take heading to Manila. Check-in was quick and the movie choices was pretty good so it helps to keep us occupied while inside the plane. Staff were courteous and approachable. The only complaint we have is...

标题: Business Class not worth it, hard, narrow seats, poor meal choices.
内容: Purchased 2 business return flights, Syd-LHR. Check in good, service efficient and effective, meal choices poor, too Asian based, i.e. 2 Asian meals, 1 European. The flat beds are too hard and narrow. Think next time will try another A/L.

The return flight to Boston was just as good as the first. Can’t say enough about the staff and crew.
The flight was a bit delayed but they keep you abreast of the updates and left at the rescheduled time.
A perfect end to a perfect trip.

We Flew from Boston to Hing Kong on our way to Melbourne. Flight was right on time (aside from the 1 AM departure) the service was excellent, staff were very polite and accommodating .
The seats were excellent plenty of amenities.
The food and beverages were also excellent.
I would have preferred if they accepted my American Airlines Admirals club...

标题: Better than Most even for Economy
内容: Flew from Switzerland to Bali with a layover in Hong Kong, a very long day of travel and comfort, ease of check-in & transfer and in-flight service are at the top of my list. We flew economy and found the leg room and main meal to be really great, especially on the long haul between Europe and Asia. Try the...

Another great Cathay Pacific flight to Singapore.
The seats are OK in economy but the staff and service are always great.
The staff work tirelessly to help and make sure you are well fed and you have enough to drink. Courteous and willing to make sure you are comfortable.
Highly recommended.

标题: Definitely the way you travel long distance
内容:
My first business class experience and it’s very nice.
The flight from HK to Rome is midnight so you get to fall asleep directly, the attendants won’t wake you up unless you specify your needs.
The flight back is not so ideal as it takes off in noon time.
But you get to lay down completely with a comfortable space,...

We flew Sydney/Hong Kong/Barcelona and return Zurich/Hong Kong/Sydney on our recent European Holiday.Two Adults with 2 teenage daughters. Even though we were row 63 and 64 most of the time. The aircraft was full on all sectors, staff friendly and hekpful and you could eat the food.

Service: Staff is courteous, but still a bit cold. I guess that's always been one unique point about CX. I remember one time when I was the last passenger to board (running through the airport!), the purser shouted at me "Where were you, do you know how much it costs to leave late?" then proceeded to take me to my...

Booked using Asia Miles for Premium Economy on the Hong Kong to Osaka flight and back. Got upgraded both times to business class and the experience was fantastic. Classic Cathay personal service. We don't take Cathay much because of the prices but after this trip we might have to reconsider as we left on time, flight was smooth and enjoyed...

标题: Delayed with no reasons and forced the queue back to seats
内容: It was about time of boarding, all passengers were gather around the boarding gate and wait patiently. However the ground staff said becos of technical problem, boarding will be delayed but they cannot estimate the time. As no concrete time of boarding, passengers expected the delay will be short and stay in the queue and keep on waiting. However the...

标题: Cathay Pacific Airlines has been consistantly excellent over many years of flying on their planes
内容: The cabin staff are always helpful, cheerful and polite. The entertainment system is very good but different to the older ones. I did feel that there were less movie choices as far as Western movies went. The food is edible at least the breakfast as I didn't eat dinner

标题: Endless Entertainments from the Large Size Screen
内容: Enjoyed Onboard Movies very much. There were so many movies to choose from and also from different countries. Best economy class onboard entertainment I had so far. Touch screen easy to use and responsive.
I was quite surprised by this airline. Flew economy class and unlike many other airlines, there was a USB socket th charge my phone and tablet. Enough legroom and soft seat.

标题: Aircraft with a fault before departure!
内容: Disappointing start & the plane had a technical (?) fault after push-back. We then taxied to receive repairs at maintenance. One hour lost before departure from Cathay home port. Not very comforting with a long flight ahead. Captain did keep us up to date with apologies

标题: Worst checkin counter at Mumbai counter
内容: Arrogant checkin. They even weighted the handbaggae / laptop / ipads and forced to dump things. This will be our last time we will be using Cathay.

标题: Disappointing - One word says it all!
内容:
Even though I declare that I will never fly this airline again (British Airways being the other) I am having a hard time writing this review. Because it had some bright moments
.
1. Over all - the ground crew and inflight staff were friendly - except for the one flight attendant who angrily and rudely snapped “ just wait”...

Took the night flight and basically uneventful flight. Dinner was a big piece of steak and it was reasonably tasty but overcooked. Breakfast was better with dim sum ( although the skins were on the thick side! ). Premium Economy is good deal if one could sleep on smaller seats....

Very efficient service but lacking in attentiveness. In spite of its long duration the cabin staff were always bustling about or alternatively nowhere to be seen. Minimally friendly to people of all nationalities and were not concerned with the comfort or needs of travelers.

Airline company only worried about the money not the customer. They made a delay in flight almost 12 hours. I have been waiting in Hong Kong airport since morning. Unprofessional cabin crew and ticketing co ordinator in Hong Kong airport.

We have been Travelling via Cathay Pacific airline because of their aggressive promos
( mla - Chicago in November, 217 and Manila- HK in June, 218) on TOP of their courteous flight coordinators/ stewardesses. What impressed me most is their simple ways of making our travel delightful ( my seat was the only one with a ready newspaper
( mla-LA...

Always a pleasant experience with no hassle. The crew are friendly and helpful. The food is excellent and special meal requests are dealt with with ease and are also pleasant to eat. Thank you for an airline that takes care.

标题: Dodged Jet Lag - must be good
内容:
The Pier 1st class lounge had been a bit underwhelming with its scotch selections so I moved to red wine for this trip.
I arrived in Europe with minimal jet lag and my technique for doing this from Australia was this.
Mid morning flight from Australia to HK. Slept 4-5 hours.
Layover in HK of 4 hours with moderate alcohol...
The meal are impressive, they provide delicious main course, bread, and ice cream/puding. Normally, I'm not a fan of airplanes meal, but i really enjoy this one.

For our third trip to Australia I chose Cathay Pacific having been disappointed with Qantas ,and although I really like Emirates transiting Dubai can be tiresome.
I appreciate travelling business class is a privilege but everything about this airline felt as if they really cared about the customer experience. The lounges, food, Cabin and crew were all of the highest...

Departure
Boarded earlier than time. Took off almost an hour later.
Crew
There were a lot of them compared to other airlines. Just ok nothing to exceed one’s expectations.
Inflight entertainment system
Sufficient selection for a short haul.
Layout
Comfortable with sufficient lavatories
Food
Oh my. Oh my. When will Cathay Pacific accept the reality that a turnover or pie...

The service from the flight attendants was just brilliant. Unobtrusive and helpful in every way. It was enjoyable travel even though it is such a long way, but then again everywhere in the world is a long way from Australia!
The food quality was excellent and the choices fantastic. It was often hard to decide what to eat. Loved it...

The Business Lounge in Melbourne was very disappointing. Dull, windowless, no decor, small, not enough seating, very limited food and drink choices. On board the service was very good and efficient, although my chosen seat was unserviceable and I was moved to last row.
