Menu was good, entertainment system good, service was very good but food presentation I thought was...

标题: The Only Way To Fly From The USA to Asia
内容: This is the 2nd time we have flown on Cathay Pacific. Many of our friends have traveled on other international flights to the same area and told us of bad issues on their flights. None for us.

Although the flight is 12+ hours there is enough on the entertainment schedule to keep me, a none sleeping flyer, occupied. The cabin crew were very attentive and whenever I needed anything they were quick to help. Would definitely fly with them again

标题: Different between from and return air flight - Cathay Pacific
内容: I am a frequent traveller to Singapore. It was surprised to learn that 2 different class of plane when you choose CX. When you travel by morning flight from HK, the plane would be new and more comfortable. Food is more delicious than return flight (from Singapore). For the return journey at night, the plane usually old and the food...

标题: A long flight but a pleasant one.
内容: It was a very long flight but the crew service was great. They stayed out of your way when you needed to rest and they gave you attention when you needed them.

I recently travelled Cathal Pacific business class from Auckland to Hong Hong and then on to Dublin business class. I was deeply disappointed with the service offering and will never fly with CP again. Very poor and low value for money. We experienced multiple issue with both flights including broken inflight entertainment system, broken seat, dirty broken toilet facilities, terrible...

After family holiday in US, we were able to use the upgrade voucher we received from previous flight with Cathay Pacific. I would mention the check in staff in SFO that really help us to used the voucher and able to get my family upgraded from Premium Econ to Business, thank you.
The flight from SFO to HK is the...

标题: My First Choice for International Travel
内容:
This was not my first trip flying with Cathay Pacific. In term of pricing, it's a good value flight.
For flying experience, it's good. This trip we sat on Premium Economy, the leg room is ok, the headphone they provided is good enough to isolate the noise from the outside and comfortable enough for you to wear them while you're...

I’m 6’2”- you simply need to realize that you’re going to be miserable for 2 hours. Short flight from SGN to HKG. On time and fine. HKG to ORD took off about 2 hours late. Made up some in the air. The food is sufficient. I didn’t find it special being on Cathay. Food and space and entertainment were all...

Appreciate Cathay for texting the status of the flight before We left our place for the airport. The flight was delayed by 2hours. Though we reported much earlier than the checkin counters were open, they invited us to complete check in process and also offered a 15 $ meal voucher each. They managed the boarding process systematically and the crew...

The flights were ok - service was fine, food was very average, the seat was ok although the plane fitout seemed quite worn.
The toilets were disgusting. Too many people using too few toilets. (You have to use the economy toilets.) The basins were blocked. The floor was very dirty.
There was an extremely long stopover in HongKong.
Still, better...

标题: Cathy Pacific Frankfurt to Hong Kong
内容: Was very impressed with the attention of the flight crew. Very polite and helpful. Plenty of water offered at night during the flight. Meals were fresh with plenty of choice.Would choose this airline again.

标题: Not one of the best airlines
内容: This airline is definitely not one of the best and still have a lot to learn and a long way to go. The food they give is not enough and in the middle of the flight half of the passengers were hungry. They state on the menu there is 2min noodles as snacks for the hungry but there was no...

Usually a flawless experience. The flight CX 694 I took on 18th July had some technical issues after the push back but everything was resolved with the help of the engineers within 2-25 mins though it was a bit scary. Boarding was smooth and orderly and plane was spic and span. Plane staff was efficient and courteous except for one...

It was a red-eye flight so I slept almost all the way.
The weather was very fine on the morning we landed, and about 45 minutes before the landing the captain made an announcement on the stunning views of Mount Fuji, which the plane was passing by. Most passengers gladly woke and open the shades to admire the scenery.

Not as good, as expected.
Was returning from Beijing to New Delhi via Hong Kong.
Flight from Beijing CX 591 got late. But when landed in Hongkong still had 35-4 minutes for departure of onward flight CX 695 (@ 17:45, from Hong Kong to Delhi).
Cathay Pacific had already shifted me to next flight (CX697, 2:5). As 35-4 minutes were...

Where do I start?...
Ok, please return to your seats, fasten your seatbelt and prepare for a long and bumpy ride!
My husband and I flew from Brisbane to London with Cathay Pacific in March 218.
We used up all of our frequent flyer points to upgrade to premium economy, as unfortunately, our trip back to the UK was to...
Flight was good plenty of snacks to avail yourself during the flight .even the flight landed on time as well

There is a PE line for check-in and boarding. Once in, the service was quite immediate, before and after take off. Before: menu and flight necessity bag were given. After: drinks, hot towel.
Seat was comfortable. Can push back quite far. Good space. Pillows were fluffy enough. and blanket was a nice quilt.
Food was impeccable. Even though I didn't...

I have just returned from a trip through Italy & France and travelled with CathayPacific the whole way, they were amazing all flights left and arrived on time, I was even more impressed with how the handled my luggage as I had two pieces one being a bike in a soft bag. At every destination my bike bag came out...

Cathay Pacific is good, but honestly not as good as I expected. I heard great things, but I definitely wouldn't put it in the same class as Singapore Airlines. The food and drinks were good, but they didn't come with as much as other nice airlines. The entertainment was pretty good. The flight attendants were friendly. The seats were pretty...

标题: Good service on long haul flight
内容: Good service on long haul flight. The toilets were kept clean though-out the flight. Staff were pleasant and a good range of entertainment was available.
From the time we set foot on the plane we were looked after superbly. The food was great & any requests delivered quickly. We would definitely fly with them again

This flight was done in two legs via Hong Kong.
While very long the seats were comfortable enough to get some sleep. The food and service were very good however discussions with other travellers revealed that the price paid was high compared to other airlines.
Another couple flew business class for less on another airline.
Leg room was spacious, toilets were clean, food was not bad and tidy overall service was not bad at all,

departing from O'Hare terminal 5, we had long transit time between in-bound flight and this flight to avoid potential weather delay typically plaguing ORD. The terminals filled up quickly and when its time to board, the gate agents enforced the boarding sequence strictly, which is great for orderly boarding.
The 3 of us had the middle sections of the 777-3ER...

Went for a family holiday travelling with Cathay pacific from Manchester UK to Hong Kong. Family of 4 we normally seat in a row of 4 (middle aisle) in other airlines, but with Cathay there airline is a 3 3 3 seating set not like 3 4 3 seating, so me and my girls sat together my hubby has to...

标题: It was fine - although the service was a bit slow and one time we were forgotten with the drinks
内容: Our flight was fine, although the service was a bit slow at times - I had to wait quite a while to get a drink and then another time at drink service we were actually missed. It took 3 tries to get some water with ice. Otherwise the crew were fine and the level of comfort was adequate. The in...

Although CX is not my first choice for travelling long-haul, it have to say it was pretty good for this five hour flight to Bali. Check-in was smooth and fast, the seats were comfortable and as I was travelling with a companion, I didn't have to sit next to a stranger! The food was fresh and tasty and the service...

My husband & I took a Cathay flight from Vancouver to Hong Kong on June 24, 218. When we reached the check-in counter at Vancouver airport, we couldn't believe how very long the queue was. It was so long & so far away from the check-in counter that I had to ask someone in the queue that this line was...

标题: Purchased Economy Extra Leg room on Flight LAX to HKG
内容: We decided to purchase extra leg room in economy for our long flight to SG. Extra leg room was only applicable to LAX to HKG. We paid for extra 18USD per trip, but so disappointed with the experience. We sat on B & C and A( non-leg room), the seat nearest to the exit was not considered a leg room,...

Wonderful airline, very efficient, friendly and comfortable. I was at first very skeptical, but I would recommend this airline to everyone and anyone I meet. Really worth it. Everything goes smooth and they are very professional.

The staff at Check in helped us with our bag tags and got us checked in nice and fast. The flight was a little late on take off due to an extra security bag check half way down the loading ramp. (I don't think it was Cathay's idea but it did take more time to board.) The time was made...

标题: Good value for the money with Business Class
内容: Cathy Pacific is a good airline for business class flights, particularly because of the value compared to some of the excellent middle-east airlines such as Qatar Airways. The staff is friendly and nice, and the F&B in business class is very good. The seat layout is nice with the TV off to the side, but we prefer the TV on...

Staff very friendly; Sufficient Legroom even for economy class; New passenger display panel being more user friendly, e.g. Displaying useful info - Seat No. / Fasten Seat Belt; Vast selection of western / eastern / classic / latest release movies; Food is average (breakfast is better than dinner), now serving Movenpick ice cream as dessert

4 of us travelled from LGW to Hong Kong in the afternoon of 3/6/18
The legroom was fabulous, much more than Virgin or BA Premium Economy.
Check in was easy and we were given priority through security which was so much quicker.
The air team were great, attentive and helpful, inflight entertainment was really good and we were all very...

It's a nice flight experience although the travel time is short.
The interior is quite new and cozy.
The seat size is suitable for flight.

Great airline. Comfy seats, good choice of movies and friendly staff. The flights were on time!. Not a long wait in Hong Kong for connecting flight. Flown Cathay few years ago and highly recommend them

It's a long way - but the seats seemed to have more legroom than some other airlines. No freebies like socks or toothbrushes. Food very adequatewith good choice. Easy to use touch screens
On time for both take off and arrival

标题: cathay pacific chi to hkk to mnl
内容: done this flight over 12 times now and will continue to fly with them as aa uses miles for these flights

Great prices, comfortable economy class seating with good leg space, movies, good food, friendly crew. Will fly Cathay again and will surely recommend this airline for long journeys. Web check in could be done 48 hours before departure

Flew on CX 652 which uses the new A35-9. fit and finish on fishbone style B-class seat at 19K is not very good. looks ok but cheap to the touch. scuff marks near TV monitor, pocket areas, etc. plane can't be more than 1 year old but wear and tear level seems excessive, possibly due to cheap material used. toilet...
we always love to fly cathay pacific because excellent service,food was good our flight on time and in flight movies are great ?.??

Having flown Air New Zealand and Singapore Airlines previously, I was eager to experience Cathay Pacific. Together we had four fights on a return journey to Europe from New Zealand, via Hong Kong.
In my opinion, Cathay exceeded all expectations and bettered the other two Airlines in terms of excellence of customer service, lounge facilities, quality of food and timeliness.

This 16 hour coach class experience was easier than what I thought. Taking a day flight with good inflight entertainment is my advice for long haul Y class. I got a bulk head seat because of my member status. The flight was 85% full. The service was also good and professional. However, the aircraft was quite old and had no...

Always been a fan of CX been travelling with this airline for the last 2+ years. Today my flight has been delayed by around 3 1/2 hours - I normally don't complain as much but I believe the management should have the courtesy to inform passengers ahead to give them a chance to take an earlier flight or change to...

As most airlines now a days have an excellent safety record and fly mostly the same planes, it is the level of service and commitment of the cabin staff to make the passengers as comfortable as possible, that sets one airline apart from the other.
Cathay's staff do exactly that and they were very helpful throughout the full length of...

My first time with Cathay Pacific and I was really impressed.
Great checkin with helpful staff, comfy roomy seats, three choices on lunch menu with noodles and other snacks during the flight, and nice breakfast served before landing. Enough entertainment to keep you occupied during the flight with some old classic movies to choose from.
Definitely will be flying Cathay...

In June my girlfriend travelled to Hongkong. After a bad accident, she suffers from major pain in her spine, but would never ask for any help or comfort. This journey being her first one to Asia and out of Europe actually and having her fly for around 12 hrs one way, gave her some headache in advance. Finally I explained...

Incredible First Class Service! I am pleasantly amazed each time I fly on Cathay Pacific First Class Service. Besides the Caviar and Krug Champagne, I was actually served Maine Lobster on my most recent flight. The First Class space is the equivalent of 15 main cabin seats. There are two dedicated First Class Flight Attendants and the Lead Flight Attendant...

Took this flight as part of a package and it was on a scheduled A35 airbus leaving London Heathrow in the late evening.
Able to check in online and select my seat from 48 hours prior to leaving.
Bag drop was pleasantly uneventful and my suitcase was whisked away until I eventually retrieved it in Siem Reap many hours later....

We (a family of 4) flew Cathay Pacific from Johannesburg to Hong Kong on a recent family holiday.
The check-in process and boarding was smooth. The plane was sufficient however, the USB port used to charge your phone was a little 'buggy'.
A great addition to the Cathay Pacific flight is the late night snack bar featuring; sweet & salty...

I flew Melbourne, Australia to Hong Kong in economy class. First time in an Airbus A35 with the seat arrangement of 3/3/3, comfortable seats for economy class and enough leg room. Entertainment system has a nice big size just a shame the contents aren’t up to scrap - a lot of old and uninteresting movies. Something to be improved also...

This was the return home trip with a 4hour stop over in Hong Kong. The checkin at Heathrow was quick and easy and the lounge was well appointed and comfortable. It was quite a walk from the lounge to the departure gate which could be a problem for people with disability. The walk from the arrival,gate to the first lounge...

1. Service: very good
2. Food: good
3.Entertainment: great, with new screen size and platform
4.Seats: ni change, too hard, and some angles are not nice at all, flat ..... u cant sleep.
5.toilets: too small
Its nearly great, ... but seats really not nice.
Also put more video content lile before, as now the selection is more narrow.

Overnight flight to Phuket via Hong Kong. Service during the flight was good and meals were up to standard for the class.
The stand out was the excellent ground support at Hong Kong airport. Flight was late arriving to Melbourne, so we were delayed on our leg to Hong Kong. Landed 35 mintues before scheduled departure of our Phuket connection....

标题: Very comfortable for a long haul flight with great service!
内容: Great service. Food was decent, with 2 meals, drinks and unlimited noodles as a snack. Good amount of legroom. Flights were consistently on time. Would definitely fly again!
Pleasant journey both ways, with excellent food and entertainment. We were even early on the way back yesterday.

Checking in at Changi was very good and as a BA Silver Member I got access to the excellent lounge. I flew Premium Economy for the first time and the seats are a good in between economy and business. The entertainment is good and the headphones excellent for the class. The food, however, was very disappointing, two small pieces of...

We stack in London Heathrow staff on s.b we both tickets from Cathay thanks the staff of Cathay for helping us in London thanks to staff in Hong Kong for upgrading us the service 1 of 1 first time we used we hardly recommend

标题: COmfortable flight, nice food , nice entertainment
内容:
Its best if you do a check in online before coming to the airport to save queuing time.
When we returned from HongKong, at the HK airport the queue for check in at airport for three times the one for bag drop

Flew Cairns to Manilla via Hong Kong. To Hong Kong service etc was great however the temperature on board was very cool. Despite customer requests it remained the same all flight. I had a short turnaround in HKG and the ground crew couldn't have been more helpful to ensure trouble free transfer.
On my return journey the same occurred with...

标题: Round trip to Male with CX
内容: The overall service is good and the food is also above average. Since there is so many mainland china passengers on board, the crews spent a lots of time to take care with them but then make things a but rush to catch up the time.

标题: A Diamond welcome for a Diamond Traveller!
内容:
Check in is efficient even though for the USA you need to discuss your trip before check-in. You are handed a priority slip for quick access to the safety section and immigration.
Once through the 1st class lounge is excellent with everything the traveler would require on the start/transit or end of their flight. Showers, beds, baths, restaurant, champagne lounge...

Cathay Pacific is more expensive than many other airlines in all cabin classes. However, you pay for consistency. For example, some US airlines may boast of their latest and greatest business class but little do you know that it is only available in a few cities while the rest are still business class from the 9s - four in a...

I recently flew with Cathay via Hong Kong. The plane seemed pretty new and was as comfortable as economy can be! The crew, whilst polite and efficient were not particularly friendly. Cost of flights were excellent!

Great seating, excellent service and food provider was good by airline standards. Flight departed ontime however exceptional service after reading glasses left in seat back - within 24 hours they were found and returned,

Felt as if the plane was really old compared to what Cathays Pacific usually use. Very loud engines and seat not very comfortable. This may put me of using them again especially if for a longer flight

Could not fault the service of Cathay Pacific. Food on the plane was very good - slept through dinner when it came so asked if there was any spare that I could have but instead they just cooked a brand new one for me. Snack bar at the back of the plane was very handy also just to keep you...

标题: Hong Kong: the best way to Manila
内容: Best and worth money solution to reach Philippines: the Hong Kong airport i huge with all the facilities

Wow - what can I say? I regularly only fly on Qantas but on this trip I flew Cathay Pacific. The service, aircraft and business lounge are far better than a lot of the others which is why i rate my flight so high. The business lounge in Hong Kong was absolutely stellar with the multiple "rooms" for different foods...

Melbourne-London return via Hong Kong is a neat way to break a long haul as both legs are roughly equidistant. Helps too when the cabin crew are on the ball, polite, friendly and very efficient. The food and drink selection was also.very, very good. Both 777 and A33 with similar flat-beds. Reasonable, but not huge selection of in-flight entertainment. Melbourne...

I love Cathay Pacific very much and it’s the top airline in my favourite airlines list.
Tried business, premium economy and economy and enjoyed them all.
However for the economy meal, I had food poisoning from eating the fishy fish. I had a bad feeling after the first bite due to the smell but was hungry so I went ahead....

After booking my tickets late I was forced to sit at the very back of the plane. With this I began my 12 hour voyage expecting an unpleasant journey forgotten by the staff. However, I was delighted with the care and expertise with which the cabin crew gave each passenger. Cathay Pacific made sure I was never thirsty or hungry...

I really enjoyed flying with Cathay Pacific since 29 (my first time) they serve the 5 stars service, aldo the movie on the tv is up to date so we can enjoy our flight watching movie, and also the meal is delicious

We were on business class from SGN to HKG (A35). The crew was friendly. Seat was nice, private feeling.
But the main courses: my husband had fish, it was barely ok. But the Chicken: I could not eat it b/c of very bad taste, spoiled. And yes, I could jave asked something else, but I lost my appetite. Honestly it...
标签: Asia' 'Business Class' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Hong Kong

内容: Most of us would say spending 15 hours in a plane is not something we look forward to. After traveling to Hong Kong several times in recent years on a competitive airlines my colleague suggested I try Cathay Pacific. Upon booking with Cathay I was pleasantly surprised. I have flown out of Chicago O’hare and New York JFK. Cathay has...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: Back to the UK to visit family, first time trying Cathay Pacific, it costs only HK$6 per person, direct and good schedule flight. Will try again next time.

First time flying Cathay Pacific and I was really impressed!! I felt like there was slightly more space around me, the food was delicious and the staff were so helpful and friendly!! Travelling with a sick child, the flight attendants could not do enough to help! Absolutely will travel with Cathay Pacific again!!

标题: China: Cathay Premium Economy is a Must!
内容: Took a trip of a lifetime to China but we didn't want to take a lifetime to pay off the trip so we agreed upon spending a little more for premium economy seats instead of first-class. The money spent was WELL WORTH IT! The seats lean back about 3 or so degrees without making your neighbor in back of you...

We travelled for our 5th anniversary and enjoyed great service and attention all the way. Sydney to Hong Kong was day time flight stayed in HKG overnight and then the long haulm from HKG to JFK of almost 16 hours. Enjoyed the flight, caught some hours sleep in the lay flat bed and found it to be most comfortable. Good...

Good service, we were well looked after by a cheerful, crew. Everything spot on, in keeping with a quality Airline.
Good films, good meals, clean bathrooms.

On July 3rd, 218 I was on an overnight flight number from Hong Kong to Tel Aviv sitting in seat number 2 D.
I purchased my business class ticket and paid $4 + for this ticket. Usually I fly on other Airline which is are considerably less expensive for business class but I have in the past flown Cathay Pacific...

Long-haul business class on Cathay Pacific provides excellent, fully flat beds arranged in a herring bone 1-2-1 layout. Service and entertainment are also excellent. The meals are also good, but I would advise western passengers to go for the seafood option as the quality of the meat that I had on this flight and an onward flight to Singapore was...

This flight was a bit of a shambles with families including ourselves separated. The leg room is very cramped and when the meals came they had run out of the Beef and also the wine both white and red. I can’t say I enjoyed it. The films on that leg had also been censured compared to the first Auckland to...

标题: very good but i didnt enjoy the food
内容: service was good' very comfortable sits though the food wasn'very good but i didnt enjoy the food t that good

Usually fly Qantas but Cathay offers better connections. Got a great deal on premium economy, only issue was that i should have booked seats on making reservation as we ended up on the 2 middle seats of the centre block of 4 on first leg to HK. That said service excellent, food and drink first rate seats good and inflight...

Convenient connection from eastern part of India for going to far east and USA. We took this flight from Hong Kong after arriving here from Kolkata by Dragon Air flight. Flight seems to be popular as almost all seats were full. In flight entertainment had elaborate selection. Food served was as per specified requirement. On board service was good. However...

We embarked on a durian trip to KL with friends in July. Our outbound trip was delayed for two hours. We thought that only happened from time to time.
When we checked in at KL for our return leg, we were told that our return flight would also be delayed from 1745 to 195. When asked, we were told that...

标题: Briliant business class cabin - loads of storage and space
内容: We got the opportunity to try the new Cathay Pacific business class on our recent overnight flight home from Hong Kong to Sydney. Love the new herringbone 1-2-1 seating layout which means all passengers have aisle access to their seats. We also loved how much practical storage there was for your smaller items within easy reach around your seat! No...

Everything was great. The seats were very comfortable, amenities were good, with high quality of movies and features, food was great and stuff were very friendly. The only comment I have is that the price you need to pay is very high. I found myself thinking of business ticket in other airline at the same price of economy in Cathay...

For my return trip I opted for an upgrade having flown Premium Economy from Adelaide to Hong Kong. While that leg of the journey was good (although the food in premium economy seems the same as economy) the return trip in Business Class was fantastic. Irrespective of the class all Cathay flight attendants are extremely helpful and make that extra...

This was our first time business class and it won us over. The beds were easy to manipulate and comfortable. We felt that the service was good with all staff handling some quite demanding people in their stride.

My flight was on time―boarding was efficient.
Cabin service was immaculate―the food was good.
Overall, an excellent experience
标签: Asia' 'Business Class' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Hong Kong

标题: Will fly with Cathay Pacific again.
内容:
The trip from Vancouver to Hong Kong was great in every way.Very comfortable (though I had an empty seat beside me). I think the seats are more comfortable than other main airlines. They also recline in a better way. Good food. Helpful steward. I would rate it at a 5/5.
The flight back was not quite as good. The plane...

The trip was done in two stages, Sydney to Hong Kong, then Hong Kong to Gatwick. The aircraft was a Boeing 777, the 2 trips were log haul, and very uncomfortable. The seats were not comfortable, the leg room not too good. The configuration is 3 sets of 3 seats across the aircraft. My wife and I had a middle...

Aside from COMPLETE ignorance of flight information from staff in Vancouver Airport about a Cathay Pacific-American Airlines flight, the representative refused to take our luggage for eight hours. Despite previous notification of wheelchair assistance, we were denied a ride to the gate on the golf carts, which personnel rode for their own use. The gate was closed forcing us to...

This was a midday flight with included lunch and snacks, meal was ok, and the entertainment that was available was quite good, however the touch screen on the entertainment systems would occasionally not register what was being selected on the flight to Taiwan with a stopover in Hong Kong. The flight home was an overnight flight back to Sydney with...

First experience flying Cathay Airlines and I will never return. The pilots are very professional but other than that the experience was horrid. The only airline that I am aware of that offers "" points for miles earned while booking economy. Not only that, but once booked, cannot upgrade at any cost to a higher class cabin. Cannot use miles...

We took Cathay Pacific flight from Vancouver to Hong Kong recently and the meal they served onboard Economy class was horrible. The meal that we ordered was chicken with mashed potato. The chunk of chicken piece in this meal were so big that you had to literally cut into pieces in order to eat. The worse thing was that the...

标题: Happen to see entertainment + USB connection failure quite often these days
内容: This seems to be one of the most popular flights with quite decent scheduling from HKG to CEB. For me, the in-flight meal, the seat, the service were all okay, and neighbouring passengers behaved decently. However, I did see my colleague and my neighbouring passenger having problems with the in-flight entertainment system. On my flight back (CX922), my seat as...

Being a frequent flyer for business reasons, I usually take Cathay Pacific/Dragon for my trips to and from China. Whenever I have to catch my next flight, the ground staff are always very helpful. They have an organized way of rebooking any missed connecting flight due to delays for free with food and accomodation.

This is a long flight of over 14 hours leaving late afternoon. Served dinner following drinks and nuts. Meal was a prolonged affair which was nice as we had no where else we needed to be! Drinks replenished numerous times. Full flatbed ensured a good rest though unlike qantas and Qatar no mattress or pyjamas unfortunately. Small bag of toothpaste...

I liked the seat set up everyone has direct access to the aisle. Seats comfortable and are full flat beds though as this was a day flight not needed to fully extend. Breakfast was good and I was offered champagne. I liked the main part of the meal choices were on display on trolley to choose from. However unlike other...

标题: I enjoyed flying CP very much
内容: All round a very decent experience. Nice seating, clean plane, decent food, decent movies, cool flight attendants. I'd use them again and they are well priced.

标题: Cathay Pacific flight from Hong kong to Chennai
内容: I had taken flight from Hongkong to Chennai. I enjoyed the journey. I was not tired from the Journey and was taken care during the journey. I would prefert his airline

My fiance and I recently flew to her home in Manila to take care of some family business. For the first time in many years, we flew Cathay Pacific from Atlanta via Chicago and then on to Hong Kong and Manila.
Cathay Pacific made their code share partner (American Airlines) seem like an amateur airline by comparison. The service was...

I took the flight CX741 from Ho Chi Minh city to Hong Kong on 2 July 218. When I was waiting at the designed boarding gate, around 19:, the staff announced that the plane...

内容: Cathay has scored 1points for flight delay. The last two flights , one from Hk to Singapore and the other from Shanghai to HK ( morning flight ) where all delayed .. I have been an ardent and proud supporter of Cathay and have been a Diamond member , even a Diamond Plus every year possibly for the last 15...

Cathay Pacific amenities in Premium Economy are a step above most "First Class" domestic flights. Drink service, pillows, blankets, adequate leg room, reclining seats, and 2 delicious meals are provided on a 15 hour non-stop flight.

The boarding was very efficient after we found out about the gate change. The cabin staff were helpful and polite. Our flight arrived early and we had good entertainment on board. Very happy with the service.

Good airline. Flights were on time. Friendly staff on the ground and in the air and even the food wasn't too bad. Economy class was less cramped than what I've experienced on similar airlines, however 3 out of 4 planes we flew on were a bit old and tired & in need of a good clean (grubby seatbelts etc. =...

A long flight from NYC to Hong Kong, the seats do recline reasonably well but on the first leg of our flight there wasn’t much leg room. The seats that were near the bulkhead had more leg room but that cut off access to the toilet, which made a long walk to a toilet much further down the back. Food...

I have taken a few flights over the last few months & new A35 is a great plane - the crew really looks after you & does not let you down - flying business into Gatwick is cheapper than Heathrow however the business lounge in Gatwick is a real disappointment - all in all a great plane, good food (try...

Cathay Pacific has gone down in security ranking but it seems like it is also going down in customer satisfaction. Here is my recent experience.
I have travelled by Cathay Pacific in the past several times and I was your cheer leader always. I am a British Airways Loyalty customer and I was given a choice to fly British or...

The Audio is broken the chair is broken and the Manager is not accommodating you should send her to a training seminar for Customer Service Training . Kept telling us she is the manager I believe I do not need to know that . She did not even apologize for our inconvenience . She kept interrupting and trying to baloney...

Cathay Pacific is hands down my favorite airline. The best business class I've ever experienced. From the service to the food to the comfort to the entertainment. A+++++. If you're flying from the Hong Kong airport, you MUST get there early and check out their new lounge, The Deck. It's like a massive, incredibly designed, luxury living room. Fantastic food,...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Good experience on a long haul flight
内容: We had a flight from Singapore to Boston with a plane change in Hong Kong. For the long haul leg from HKG to BOS it was almost 16 hours. The premium economy seats and service are worth the extra money. Makes the trip more manageable.

we had plenty of leg space and i am six feet tall service was great and the food very nice the flight was at night and it was quiet we managed to sleep quite a bit so we did not feel too jet lagged when we arrived

标题: One of my favourite flight from Asia to North America
内容: I love this flight to North America as it is not expensive and really good. I mean there is cheaper option like Air China (which I will NOT recommend). Stick to this flight for the food, good inflight entertainment, and good flight all the way.

标题: Great way to cross the world
内容:
23 hours flight from Tel Aviv to Auckland with a layover in Hong Kong, is not an easy task but Cathay Pacific managed to make it as nice as possible. The seats were very comfortable, the service was great and the food surprisingly good.
They also have very good lounges in Hong Kong.
It was still great when we made...

Tried to book online for a flight JAX to CRK. I always try to book flights directly from the airlines rather than the travel sites. There's no JAX to CRK flight directly on the Cathay Pacific website so i had to call their booking service. They were able to give me a flight sked with their partner airline JetBlue. JAX...

标题: Bad Experience! They DO NOT care about customer, not even Marco Polo Gold member
内容:
We, family of 4, are traveling to New York, on CX flight.
We have bought 3 x Business Class Tickets and made a Business Class Companion Ticket redemption for our daughter. After asking us to wait for 1.5months, 3 days from departure, and I have no ticket being confirmed.
called call center every week, wrote to customer service, walked to...

标题: Flight from Hong Kong to Melbourne
内容: My wife and I have travelled extensively oversea from Australia over the past ten or more years; we both thought that Cathay Pacific was the best airline on which we have travelled. The service was excellent and the food was tasty and always hot. There was a suitable number of flight attendants so customers received timely attention.

Had an opportunity to travel from Manila to Hong Kong recently on CX92 flight. I was pleasantly surprised by the business class service both on the new lounge and aircraft configuration. Cathay offered roughly 7 daily flights and timing suits the business travellers. The lounge is spacious and seats offered privacy for those needing business work done. You can order...

Flew this 4 hour plus sector recently. I had flown there 5 days previously in a B777. This trip was in a A35. The differences were noticeable, the A35 being smoother and less noisy. The entertainment, however, is a step back. It is less responsive than the old system and it is not as intuitive. Cabin service was usual high...

标题: Don't join the Marco Polo Club
内容: It is impossible to get bookings if you try and redeem rewards. It is impossible to get through on the phone or book on line. Although you can travel further with their points you just can't get flights. One of the operators I finally actually got through to was so rude she hung up on me as she really did...

标题: Great airline, great air planes, great service
内容: Cathay Pacific remains one of the all time best airlines. I/We have flown Cathay Pacific several times over 2 years and can see why they keep their 5 Star rating. From past experiences and now in the present, June/July 218, the easy helpful check-in through to boarding, the ground staff are courteous, helpful and professional. The planes are always new'ish...

My family used Cathay for our MLA-HK-San Fo-LA roundtrip flight. We've also been flying with Cathay for the past several years already and the food they serve (pocket sandwhich) on their Manila-HK or HK-MLA have not changed at all. Please not everyone is a first time flyer of your airline. I think it's time to change it!
Also for such...

I fly this route, Bali to/from LAX via Hong Kong multiple times a year. Cathay Pacific has ALWAYS treated me with the best service, friendly crew and wonderful airport lounges. I will continue to use Cathay Pacific and give them my highest recommendation.

With such a long flight we decided that Business was the best way for us to go (26 hours in the air). Cathay offered seats at a good price and the added room made the trip more comfortable. Those things were good, but let down by the food and service. Two meals each leg, of the level I have experienced...

Flew Cathay Pacific for the first time and decided to spend a little extra to travel in premium economy. The seating was very comfortable, the entertainment was pretty good and the crew were excellent.

Thumbs up, after 9+ years this airline's theme (Barry White's LOVE THEME) song to and from Hong Kong and JFK still applies. You really feel like a great adventure has just started.
The air hostess moved like a ninja after I accidentally spilled a drink on top of myself and on the ground. The clean up was so impeccable, I...

The connection at Hong Kong airport was really good, just enough time to stretch our legs and enjoy the lounge. Good that Cathay prepared more than one lounge, so that we can select the lounge close to the departure gate. I like the new Premier Lounge it has a different concept of facilities.
In flight entertainment and service is good,...

We flew from MNL to DXB last June 3 had a 12hrs layover (btw, i chose the long layover so we can roam around to HK). Flying from manila to Hong kong took us 2hrs, we received a light snacks (food is okay for me). We arrived early than expected time of arrival (yey), then go out to hk intl...

标题: Comfotable seats, good service and entertainment but food could be better
内容:
First time flying with Cathay Pacific.
Easy check in with no standing around in long queues.
All flights between Melbourne and Paris were on time with only a two hour stop over between flights at Hong Kong on flight over.
Staff were very freindly and helpful. Seats were comfortable and seemed to have more room than other airlines I have...

标题: Service in economy class has noticably improved
内容: CX business class has always provided good service and decent food. But the service of economy class especially for a long flight was more often horrid than not. However, the recent transpacific experience was significantly better. I suspect CX may have revamped its staff training. Instead of shouting chicken or beef, the crew would take the time to make eye...

More leg space
Good food
Friendly crew
I have used Cathay to travel from multiple cities, including Bangalore, LA, Phoenix and Hong Kong. It will always be my first choice. Although the tickets from India to the US are a little higher, I would highly recommend it!

Had a great flight over, everything went smoothly, other than they damaged a suitcase. If this happens you myst lodge a claim within seven days of flight. Anyway, very friendly staff, good food, and snacks offered, including fruit! Plenty of seat room and you can get up to exercise.

Used to travel SAS business where there is no service at all, this was a fantastic experience.
The seats are the best business class seats I have ever experienced, great space and comfortable in all positions.
The onboard service was great, polite staff, very service minded. They really made you feel welcome in a personalized way.
Highly recommend.

I fly Cathay quite a lot. I always feel comfortable when work books me on Cathay. The aircraft are always well appointed and clean and the service is very good. The airfare costs are also very competitive. This makes Cathay a great airline to fly.

标题: Cabin service always excellent, unfortunately food in HK airport lounges have gone down
内容: i would say 99% of the time I have been happy with Cathay's check-in and pre-boarding services in Hong Kong, and with its inflight cabin service always. I have been a Marco Polo Gold member for years (and in the previous 12 months I was a Diamond member). I would like to say that the quality of the catering in...

标题: Poor service but good flight timing schedule
内容:
For the past few trips to Taiwan, I have opted to take Cathy Pacific for just 2 reasons, namely, my siblings prefer the flight timing meets our travel schedule and I dont mind stopping by at Hong Kong International airport to do some shopping. Otherwise, I would have opted for Singapore Airlines.that flies direct from Singapore to Taipei, Taiwan.
Crew...

Firstly time with Cathay. Only one stop between Adelaide and Tel Aviv at Hong Kong which was great but flying over we had an 11 hour layover and on our return it was even longer but we booked a room at the airport to make it bearable and even stayed a couple of nights in Hong Kong on our return....

The flight left a little late due to a freight issue, this made the time between connections a little tight. The inflight service was excellent if a little bit odd. We were served lunch as the first meal at around 11: and then the cabin was dimmed until we were served dinner. Seemed odd on a daytime flight.

Haven’t flown with Cathay long haul in a few years, always opted for a local airport and Cathay didn’t service it so decided to travel done to Manchester for the Cathay flight, checkin team were immense and ran through everything with us, boarding teams also very nice, crew onboard were lovely, one of the team spoke to my daughter a...

This was our first long haul flight and I wasn’t looking forward to it, but the plane was so comfortable with so much entertainment, the time just flew and we were there before we knew it. I didn’t sleep, but watched lots of movies, played games and loved the whole experience. More than happy to do long haul again and...

First time flying on Cathay and I was pleasantly surprised. The service is what stood out to me the most, the air hosts were more than happy to help with all my various requests. Good selection of movies, mainly classics though, not a whole lot of new movies. Screen size was good. Don;t forget your noise cancelling headphones - a...

Flew on the 777-3ER from Sydney to Hong Kong on Premium Economy. The premium experience started at the check-in counters where while there was a very long queue for Economy, there was no one waiting at the Premium Economy counters, which was quite satisfying. Priority boarding was great too. I was on the updated seat which had built-in legrests in...

Excellent service, very confortable seats. Seats become flat beds. Very good entertainment, plenty of movies to choose from. Changed planes in Hong Kong, no problem. Very nice lounge to wait for a flight. Easy and quick check in quick and efficient ground crew. Luggage arrived safely and quickly.

Cathay managed to rebook me back to UK after extensive delay in Beijing caused by local air traffic control and managed to get my lunch off delayed plane and onto new rescheduled flights
In air staff are polite and seem to enjoy being on the plane
Seat configuration is better than BA as you don’t have to step over people...

标题: We could compare Premium Economy with Economy
内容: At the beginning of our holiday we chose Premium Economy because we were facing a 14 hour flight from Hong Kong to Madrid, but on our return from London we used Economy, and frankly there wasn’t much difference. The checkin baggage allowance in Economy was more than we needed and the meals were no different from those in Premium class...

Had nice flight on business class. Food, sleeping conditions and overall service was very pleasant. Just two tiny issues: they offered to hang up my coat, which was nice, but did not return it to me when the plane landed. It was hanging near the exit for me to pick up. Also, at the check in counter in Chicago I...

标题: Cathay the easy way to fly
内容: Nice and pleasant flight just a short changeover in Hong Kong, Good entertainment system of films, music with Breakfast, lunch and dinner on board with snacks and drinks on offer. Good stewards and stewardesses too, helped to make the long flight comfortable and relaxing

I would definitely recommend flying Cathay Pacific Airlines to Bali from Lax. The flight attendants were excellent. The food was nonstop & delicious. My seat in economy was big and comfy. Movies were great. Plus 2 pieces of luggage are included with the price of your ticket.
Cathay Pacific really delivers on their customer service from check-in through to onboard service and arrival. The staff are always pleasant and helpful and the toilets were kept clean.

Cathay Pacific is normally an excellent airline overall. The entertainment unit for my seat did not work during the 8-hour flight. The staff were unable to fix the problem and because the flight was full they could not give me another seat.

in-flight service was not bad but the same cannot be said for the ground service. flights were delayed as well. we were made to run around and had to wait for the wheelchair. no meal voucher was given as we were rebooked to a later flight and given hotel accomodation.

标题: Cathay Pacific's service is becoming variable
内容: We would always fly Cathay because their service has been so good. Unfortunately on the last couple of trips there's been one leg where some of the staff appeared grumpy and tired. Some were outright rude, which was a shame as most are really good.
Good overall mostly because of modern airport lounge, pleasant cabin service, and many flights a day. Business cabin is kind of crowded, and the food served was awful - either way.

Overall pretty good. I think Cathay are falling behind some of the Middle East Airlines which also offer NZ to Europe fares. One this particular flight my seat was quite uncomfortable. - same type of aircraft - 777- as we had on our other flights - so suspect there was actually something wrong/broken. When we lived in HKG years ago...

Good flight - only slight negative was cabin crew seemed in quite a hurry to get meals finished shut the windows and create "night" so everyone would sleep - bit dissapointing given its a day time flight

Traveled AKL to HKG Business Class. In the mid 9's when based in Hong Kong I used Cathay on many occasions. This was our first visit back in 2 years. Service was still very good but having used a couple of Middle Eastern airlines traveling to Europe in the last couple of years I felt Cathay are being left behind...

标题: Pick your seat carefully - Business class
内容: Good flight good service. Flight left a little late - LHR problem not Cathay. Seated in second section of Business - only 3 rows and found this very good - far less disturbance than in the front section where there are more rows. While we traveled as a couple we chose on this flight to book window seats one behind...

Booked a Cathay flight this time, had flown with them once years ago and remembered them to be good. It seems Cathay is a well run and organized airline. There were no real outstanding issues. The transpacific flight itself went real well. The crew were all professional. There's an added measure of value with Cathay as they are considered the...

My first time flying with CP and I was less than impressed with how uncomfortable my seat cushion was - felt like a block of wood after 4 hrs....
Apart from that the legroom was good and food and service fine, and I was very impressed with the punctuality of the flight.

标题: Flights on time and service good
内容: This leg flying CP was more enjoyable than my previous one, mainly because the seats were more comfortable. Leg room was good and food and service perfectly ok for the price. My one disappointment was the long trek back through the plane to queue for the economy bathrooms - would have been nicer to have at least one near where...
After a ten days holiday in Thailand, it is a pleasure to have a smooth, on time and quick flight from BKK to HKG

This is MNL-HKG-MNL morning flight. It departs from MNL Terminal 3. Check-in online to skip long queue at the check-in counter. The ground staff are nice and efficient. This flight is operated by Cathay Pacific Airways utilizing B777 and A33. HKG-MNL has a seat configuration of 3-4-3 but at the back where seat 78A is located has 2-4-2 confirguration. You...
we flew on a Monday night the redeye flight and were lucky it was quite empty. 3 seats each and a good night sleep. Cathay has great staff and sttentive servicer

标题: CX HAS GREAT PRESSREADER BUT OTHER AREAS CAN IMPROVE
内容: This is my fourth biz trip on CX during the last few weeks and also 1st time to use the pressreader and very happy with this freebie ( but only available at CX lounges ). The Chinese beef congee breakfast was tasty but beef was so tough that it was simply not eatable even after repeated chewing! To add insult...

标题: Always stable, comfortable and reliable flight
内容: Beautifully take off and landing. No delay. Flight service is good except sparkling drink easily running out.

标题: Lounge at T3 Heathrow has improved.
内容: The check-in counter at Heathrow is still less than ideal being in an odd position and cramped, however the lounge has improved. Relaxing chairs and some decent food.

Great service at check in, lounge comfortable and spacious. Flight left ontime and arrived early. Service on flight was great, friendly and accommodating. Food good.
Nothing to complain about. Luggage arrived undamaged and fast.

The flight was fine, the service was efficient and friendly. Nothing special about the business class cabin. There was no first class on this plane. Was booked on this airline as it is an American Airlines partner.

After reading some appalling reviews beforehand I was pleasantly surprised how enjoyable the flight was. The seats were fine with a decent pitch, I had plenty of room and I’m 6 foot. The staff were attentive, friendly and smiling. The food was nice, chicken and mushroom, snacks and drinks available, just call or walk to the galley. It was all...

标题: Great airline and the people are great!
内容: Everyone on the flight were helpful and went the extra mile when I needed something. The Premium Economy seats are worth the extra money because I am a big man (186cm) and the standard airline seat is too small for me. It is the first time I slept on a long flight. Normally I don't sleep at all.
The Cathay pacific is very decent flight. Advice not to take the 1.5 hrs flight from Mumbai. This flight is invariably delayed. Food is good if you pre-order

标题: Just normal flight but be careful of choosing seat
内容:
It seems Hong Kong airport is highly congested. This flight too delayed from the start.
I thought I was lucky to get 4C in A35-9 carrier as Seat Guru says this seat is a good seat but I found it otherwise. Though the seat provides extra legroom there is no wall in front of me and as isle form premium...

Somehow flight was delayed after boarding the plane. We just sat there more than 4 minutes. The pilot explained this was due to air traffic congestion in Hong Kong airport!
Then about seat; I should have read the advice of Seat Guru as the site says, "Seats are designed with their own shell and slide forward instead of reclining into...

The flight was delayed by half an hour or so. The food service also was delayed a bit and we were served in the middle of the night, probably due to turbulence. The staff at Hong Kong airport are not as friendly as the ones in India or Japan. They were rude.

标题: Pier First Lounge and CX A35 Flight
内容:
This is my first long-haul experience on the A35 on Cathay Pacific and overall it was a good one.
Prior to my 11 am flight, I visited the Pier First Class Lounge for breakfast. Having had limited success with the Chinese breakfast set before, this time I went with the Belgian waffle with mixed berry compote and crème fraiche. It...

It is hard to find good quality air company this days - there are a lot of charters with paid seats, bags, food and drinks and so on. So to meet the reasonable priced air company is really nice. The service on the flight was good and polite, the food was delicious with snacks and ice cream and all of...

It was not a full flight on the onward leg - On time take off, good entertainment options, accommodating service team and overall sense of care are the elements that comes to my mind when I remember the Cathay Pacific round trip Male to Hong Kong. The service team were being attentive to little children needing that extra bit of...

On 9 May 218, had arrived at Vancouver International Airport quite early, having disembarked from a Cruise Ship. A really lovely and friendly Canadian women from Cathay Pacific had directed me to the check in counter, where she herself processed
my check in, issued my boarding pass, for Vancouver to Hongkong, CX837, and also my boarding pass for Hong Kong...

- Comfortable seats, lots of leg space
- Service was pretty good from the cabin crew
- Food was not that great but decent

标题: A step up from most airlines for the similar service
内容: I am a frequent flyer throughout Asia. My recent trip on Cathay Pacific had me feeling what a nice trip and airline. The trip was 2 plus hours and usually serviced with small equipment and uncomfortable but this airline offered a much higher level of service without being too expensive. I look forward to using them again when possible.
Cathay Pacific is Top Notch , Outstanding! They take very good care of customers and very well kept Airplanes.

The first leg of our long haul from BNE to CDG. Everything as it should be. Seats comfortable and easy to adjust to lie flat position and everything in between. A space for your footwear and a pair of socks to wear while flying in the amenities pouch. A whole bin overhead for all your belongings. The food is plentiful....

标题: Generally good service and always comfortable
内容:
I fly with CATHAY PACIFIC acouple of times every year and must say that I have never been disappointed with the experience in comparison to most other airlines. And I always fly economy.
Yes, I am somewhat envious as I walk past the other classes but I think about how much money I save and I immediately feel better. The...

My flight keep delaying when I flew from Singapore to Hongkong. Understand from my friend, this airlines is habitual delay for night & midnight flight from SG to HK. (Still been awarded high ranking?) Frustrated!!!

With its reputation for being one of the best airlines in the world I was looking forward to my Asian trip from NYC on Cathay Pacific.
My disappointment started with the boarding at JFK. It was a unorganized mess. In forty years of international travel it was the second worse boarding experience I ever encountered the all time worse was...

This is my review of the flight back from YVR and you would notice that it is different from my review of the flight there. Firstly, the flight from YVR got delayed by an hour and because I had a connecting flight back to SIN in HKG which had a slightly less than 2 hour transit time I asked whether...

标题: Not fantastic but it gets you there
内容: The flight from SIN to YVR via HKG was uneventful. However just some comments: 1. The touchscreen entertainment system really needs some overhaul. My daughter’s screen wasn’t working properly on the 12 hour leg from HKG to YVR which is not ideal for a 9 year old. 2. The pilot on the SIN - HKG leg needs to improve his...

标题: Smart, attentive and pleasant cabin crew
内容: Cathay Pacific brought back our faith in long haul economy flights. From a smilie, welcome aboard to our comfy seats, with adequate legroom, to our final farewell - there was little that we were not pleased with. Printed meal menus, which for economy class, we found very much to our taste and all accompanied by a good selection of included...

Was shocked this time, last time we flew with Cathay it was a nightmare, not this time, plane was a new Airbus, service was first class, Food was good, seems they have got their act together, well they did for our 2 flights, the staff at the airports were friendly not like last time, so i cannot fault them, apart...

The really comfortable flat bed was the best bit of the journey. The staff were also very helpful and efficient. Food was OK, some nice wines on offer, but the film and TV offerings were a little disappointing. I would definitely travel with them again though.

This is the first time on Cathay and we had heard this airline was exceptional having won many awards. So my expectation was high.
I can say it was average. When I asked for another drink out of normal service, I felt as though I shouldn't have asked as it was given to me begrudgingly. I'm still waiting for my...

Flight was comfortable despite being in
Coach. Legroom and seat are spacious enough for the petite Asian physique, movie selection is wide and interesting that one may forgetvto sleep
during 14 hour flight. Meals are sufficiently filling and one can have snacks should they still feel hungry in between dinner and breakfast.

It was a 14 hour flight form South Africa to Hong Hong and had a phenomenal experience, up to date movies,series, music etc. making the flight go past much quicker, and the cabin crew was very friendly and helpful, the food and drinks was way greater than expected even to compare form other airlines i have used, well done to...

标题: The flight was held up Manila Airport for 75 minutes when the flight was all ready to leave. Not Cathay problen I suppos
内容: Not sure why the Airport Authorities delayed the flight by 75 minutes when the flight was ready to take off. As a result missed connection from Hong Kong to Auckland on 16 June 218

I have been a customer with Cathay for many years. This recent trip was a major disappointment and I’m not sure I will spend the money to take another flight in the near future.
There was also many delays with the flights. This was especially bad because we missed our connection from Hong Kong to Sydney. We left 45 minutes...

I flew Cathay Pacific from Boston to Hong Kong this past February and had a phenomenal experience.
Premium Economy offers a good middle ground between business class and economy, as there is a little more legroom and the raised ottoman-style bottom section of the seat makes all the difference on a 16-hour flight.
The staff is very attentive and won't...

My experience can be summed up in one single moment once I was on board: I wanted to ask for water from the crew, and not one but TWO attendants not only ignored but turned their face away from me - a truly amazing gesture.
Cathay still has an impeccable safety record and good food and facilities, but unless someone...
标签: Asia' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Hong Kong

标题: Mostly great, but Economy not as good as competitors
内容: I prefer fewer connections, and because I work for a nonprofit I must keep costs as low as possible, so Cathay Pacific's nonstop from Boston to Hong Kong, with connecting service to Hanoi fit the bill for a business trip to Vietnam, with a round-trip Economy ticket for $1,3. I'd heard great things about Cathay for years, and their reputation...
A very unpleasant crew. I will not fly with this airline again. Food wasn't even good. I can't believe I actually paid more for this over China Airlines thinking this would be better. Lesson learned.

It’s difficult to turn 13 hours in an aircraft into a pleasant experience but Cathay managed it. We departed and arrived as scheduled. The economy seats are quite comfortable with good size screens and a really good selection of movies and tv shows. We got snacks and a meal which was tasty. Then they asked everyone to lower the blinds...

We actually flew SYD-HKG, HKG-MXP and return so this review applies to all four flights as each one provided an exceptional flying experience. Excellent flights with great service and comfort. Loved the Business Class seat which has plenty of space and is extremely comfortable. IFE had a great variety of recent and classic movies and a good selection of TV...

Traveled with them for the first time to Auckland from Vancouver with a stop over in Hong Kong. Staff was very nice and the in flight entertainment is good. There was a lot of leg room as well. Would recommend them for the future.

标题: Second time using Cathy Pacific and did not dissappoint
内容: Meals good, seats comfortable and fairly roomy. Service good. Very clean and inflight games kept me amused for hours!!

I am a member of the Marco Polo Club of Cathay Pacific. It helps at check-in and boarding. It also makes claiming miles easier. I am a teacher, so I fly economy. Cathay Pacific makes a 12 hour flight over the Pacific as comfortable in economy class. There seems to be a bit more legroom. The entertainment is terrific and...
标签: International' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Los Angeles

内容:
Seems like there is a declining level of service with more and more of the minimalist approach prevailing. Do the least on a proactive basis but accommodate the guest only and once asked for something.
My main concern was with the local Denpasar gate/check-in staff that were abysmal and an embarrassment for CP to associate with.
These are generally local...

A pleasant flight despite being in the air for just over 14 hours. Took off on a rainy afternoon and soon after the drinks service began (a comprehensive beverage menu was provided). This was followed by lunch of your choice (from 3 available options in the menu). A pretty good meal for Economy!
There was no shortage on snack on...

I haven’t flown Cathay Pacific since the 197s so it’s been a while. The plane was clean and cabin crew were okay. My daughter’s seat was broken so that was a bit of a pain. The movie choice was fairly limited compared to Emirates. But all in all, it was fine, considering how cheap the tickets were.

I have long long time haven’t taken CX , last time it was ... 5 years ago lol
I go to Bangkok with my cousin this time
It has a lot of choice of departing time , we pick 12 pm to depart, personally, this is the best time !
You don’t need to get up so early to catch...

Very happy with Cathay
We went perth- HK-Tokyo and then later
Manila-HK-Singapore
Service and food was excellent on all flights

We had a transit flight to get to in Hong Kong. Cathay knew as they pre issued our tickets for the next flight. the time between arrival and departure in transit was 1-hour (tight).
So what does Cathay do?
Puts us on the most rear seats in the plane!
Not surprisingly, (1) Flight is late leaving London, (2) At Hong...

I have flown with Cathay Pacific and always had very comfortable flights with good service however the same cannot be said about this flight.
Firstly it started with checkin long and slow even though I was one of the first there because of the new machines installed at Gatwick, it actually took longer for me to checkin. There was no...
Flight on time, smooth boarding procedures. Seats comfortable, food medium, a wide variety of videos. A long flight, but passing easy.

I really had no preconceived ideas about Cathay Pacific particularly their Business Class but I have to say I was pleasantly surprised. Everything worked from Check in through to the inflight service, the seats with stunning privacy for single travelers, entertainment and the food. The seat was comfortable, service was good, warm and friendly without being intrusive. The seat with...

Super airline, we went economy and was a bit worried that we were not able to upgrade for extra leg room seats ( two of our party really needed them) anyway we needn't have worried as the seating was fine, new plane, good food and lots of overhead storage- none of the usual scrabbling for space for bags ( and...

标题: A great flight once we got going
内容:
The flight was delayed only after final call had been made. Boarding was subsequently delayed several times and it was too far to return to the business lounge from our departure gate after each aborted promise of boarding. This was a significant irritation.
However, once on board, the flight and service were outstanding. The seats were comfortable and the business...

Very comfortable flight with Cathay pacific, check in , security etc all done in 3 minutes. Then relax with some coffee and breakfast at the lounge. Personally I feel it’s worth paying double price and fly business .
They lost my luggage going to Beijing, China. My luggage was finally found and Cathay Pacific at Beijing airport won't deliver the luggage until sometime next week. Terrible service.

The service on this airline is very average for economy class passengers. The seats are crowded, very little leg space and the food is pathetic. Even on the long haul HKG - NYC - HKG sectors, the snacks available to the Economy class passengers was wholly inadequate - noodles, no crackers or cheese, limited quantity of apples and very cheap...

Cathay Pacific is a dependable airline for the following reasons :
1. Safety. It is one of the world's safest airline.
2. Departure and arrival - often as schedule and in my flight from Melbourne to HK, the flight took off on time.
3. Service is excellent.
4. The food is airline food and on my flight it is palatable....

标题: Cathay long haul is one of the best
内容: Travel to Asia frequently for business, on Cathay Pacific LAX-HKG and return at least 8 trips per year. Never had a bad flight, great service, great lounge in LAX. Prefer LAX over SFO for several reasons. SFO has crossing runways that must close for bad weather. Plus, you must go outside security to get to the international terminals unless you...

标题: Flight CX 42 of Cathay Pacific from Taipei (Taiwan) to Seoul (South Korea)
内容:
Flight CX 42 of Cathay Pacific from Taipei (Taiwan) to Seoul (South Korea)
Excellent Inflight Service, Comfortable and Enjoyable Flight.
The flight CX 42 of Cathay Pacific from Taipei, Taiwan [ (TPE)-Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport] to Seoul (South Korea) [Seoul Incheon International Airport (ICN)]
on board of an Airbus A 33-3 aircraft and on economy class (in a 2+4+2 seating...

We have been flying with Cathay Pacific since 27 but this year we experienced a definite lack of service. I am not a person that complains easily but because this is the second time in four years with the same lame service I'am giving my honest opinion from notes I made after we landed. After a bad exprience in 214...

标题: Flight CX 45 of Cathay Pacific from Hong Kong to Taipei (Taiwan)
内容:
Flight CX 45 of Cathay Pacific from Hong Kong to Taipei (Taiwan)
Excellent Inflight Service, Comfortable and Enjoyable Flight
The flight CX 45 of Cathay Pacific from Hong Kong [(HKG)-Hong Kong International Airport), China], to Taipei, Taiwan [(TPE)-Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport], on board of a Boeing 777-3 airplane and on economy class (in a 3+3+3 seating configuration), was really very...

Rather disappointed and fatigued by the twice delayed carrier pushing us back by 3.5hours, and changing gates twice to different ends of the airport. There was some effort of service recovery by allowing affected passengers to spend HKD75 on any food purchases in the airport, but I gather most would rather get to their destination on time.

Nothing really bad to complain about but there is nothing outstanding about their Biz class. It's pretty middle of the road. Catering continues to be their weak spot and FAs were competent but devoid of much personality. But I got good sleep so the flight did its job. I would prefer to fly a better airline with a layover if...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
??Slow check in at Mactan airport
??Family with kids not a priority check in at HongKong whilst in Cebu it was. Only those with infant were prioritized.
??Not much choices foods for kids

Just flew back to back after a personal trip via silk air, and am impressed that Cathay Pacific has improved and had a better experience on this flight vs Silk Air. Friendly staff, inflight entertainment available, food choice was quite good.

my friend a platinum card holder and i were flying last night and it was the worst treatment we got from an airline ever
we checked in on line and proceeded to the airport at the airport check in counter our seats were changed without notifying us we went to first class lounge and found out the switch and when...

The flight was smooth & on time. The entertainment on the plan was Ok but the system not as modern as you would find on Singapore, QTS, etc. Although this could be due to the plane model & age. Otherwise OK.
Food was OK, as you expect in economy. but didn't like the plastic fork & knife. Especially the knife...
It was a VERY Good trip home with the old style good service and food. Thoroughly enjoyed our trip home with Cathay Pacific.

A great experience from the check inn to collecting my suitcase,Check inn was a breeze,The bridge lounge was a little crowded but nice food and good coffee.Once on the plane great service,good food and drinks,had a small problem with my inflight TV but the attendant fixed it immediately by doing a reset.Cabin was good,lots of space for my carryon.

This was my trip was Cathy after more than 1 years.
The staffs were good at the airport and on board.
Not much complains just only the planes that we were on board was an older model.
Probably, some upgrading will be good.
Cheers.

On both legs of the AKL-HK-Milan journey the flight was smooth and the plane landed safely, so there is a huge tick (and my eternal gratitude) for that. I selected Premium Economy because I wanted to fly direct and start my holiday in Italy immediately, and that is what we did do, so another tick there. The cost differential I...

Took the night flight to Melbourne and really enjoyed the beef brisket Chinese style ( very tender, juicy and very tasty ). The breakfast was less successful with the dimsum ( skin too thick but still OK taste ). Seats are only OK and not so

It was right after the Kim Trump summit and the plane was fully loaded. All seats were taken and we were lucky to have booked our ticket in April. The staff was kept busy all the time. The food and drinks were acceptable given the situation. Slightly disappointed with the seafood pasta hence a very good, not excellent.

标题: Extra Long Haul on Cathay Premium Business Class
内容: Just returned from holiday in the UK and flew Cathay Premium Economy Jakarta - Hong Kong - Heathrow and return so well qualified to review. Check in was fast (dedicated line) and boarding very efficient. Seats comfortable and the extra recline is a big bonus compared to economy but still way short of Business Class. Seat controls (leg rest and...

I got promo ticket from Cathay Pacific and the airline still gave me free return Airport Express between Hong Kong Airport and Hong Kong island. I also optimized the free Airport Express Shuttle Bus between Hong Kong/Kowloon Station and the hotels. I chose 1 hous transit time in Hong Kong airport so I still had enough time to visit some...

For the first time going to Manila and I was anxious about the condition of the carrier but it was very good and the journey was pleasant and cabin attendants were very kind much better than Singapore-HK-Haneda sectors. In my previous flight from Haneda to Hong Kong the blanket was awfully smelly therefore I checked whether the blanket of this...

标题: Thank God this time service was ok, and good Cathay lounge at Haneda
内容:
Though I have been using Cathay for many years recently terrible experience has made me doubt their efficiency and service quality. Especially two things I was concerned:
1st whether my transit goes smoothly or not
2nd What kind of mea they serve in this flight for those who ordered non-beef meal. Fortunately both were ok this time. Service usual and...

标题: AMAZING EXPERIENCE one must be in a sky with them!
内容: CATHAY PACIFIC is one of the best airlines I keep using in flying to the East! Yesterday we returned from our Bali via Hong Kong. All was delivered well and with a smile included: onboard services, email communication with all updates, in a town luggage drop in service in Hong Kong blew my mind, how thoughtful! No need to mention...

Original aircraft was scheduled to be a A359 but they overbooked it and changed to a B77G at last minute. My original assigned seat 47A was changed to 39A (first row with no extra charge). Just before the take off I've noticed that my entertainment system is OOO, the crew member offered to reset, she did it twice still failed....

标题: Don't bother with their service on board
内容:
As there's no service at all. And you are saying this to yourself on one of the major airlines in the world.
Boarding was fast and organized. Towards the end of the flight and the crews were preparing the cabin for landing (3 mins to go, started to clear trash) I gave one of the crews my empty cup, she...

Flew Cathay earlier few years back and now as well. The flight was good. Has ordered my special Indian veg meal which was good.
Inflight entertainment was having some nice stuff to watch
But hkg to Manila flight was delayed by more than 3-4 min we were inside the aircraft
Rest all was fine

The crew were courteous and professional, but lacked a personal touch. There was nothing to complain about but something was missing compared to some other airlines.
I would fly cathay again as the flight times work well for me but they are not my preferred airline.

First in last out, that's generally the rule with us families travelling with babies.
At the end of a 2 leg, 18 hour journey upon arrival in Manila, we were waiting for other passengers to deplane, with the logic that it's easier to move around with kids while there aren't any other people.
Two crew members then proceeded to shoo...

I have used this airline for many years and they have never disappointed me.
Their good quality and customer service are always up to the standard.

I have the perception that premium economy is more closer to business class and with the 4 flights felt it was closer to economy. Service is good from cabin staff. Aircraft on 3 legs was old, and this made seats worse for wear. Pushing the reclined seat back to position was a mission. On the brand new Airbus A35 seat...
Cathay is first class in my books! Just came back from touring China and the service was impeccable.

I think I have always been impressed by CX. Whether Biz, Prem or Econ. Planes, staff, equipment. All top and five star. Then last month: The new Airbus from AKL to HKG I couldn’t fault. Stunning plane. Staff tho were best described as semi efficient but gruff. Tea ordered never arrived. They always seemed rushed or absent. Lunch service they...

标题: Great with kids but not for PWDs
内容: They're awesome with kids. We weren't able to request special meals for our baby on our flight back but there were free flowing drinks and snacks for everyone during the long haul flights. When my toddler had a tantrum on our flight back (she couldn't poop in the potty properly during the turbulence), a flight attendant comforted her with a...
On board temperature was very agreable, so as with the flight attendants smiles makes my trip perfect. Snacks and any hot drinks are available at any time you request.

Check-in was smooth, but the flight was excruciating! The food was bland. The flight crew were curt, just going through the motions. I can navigate an aisle without hitting a passenger, but every time the came by me they hit me. Also, the seat was uncomfortable (I am 6' 4"), it seemed a little more leg room had been shaved...

A most pleasant long haul flight. First time in Asia and facilities were extensive. Many travellers used the kitchen facilities for noodles, rice etc and throughout there was plenty of free water available. Arrived ready to party!!

I cannot day enough about my experience with Cathay Pacific. We flew to Thailand with another airline last year (won’t name names) and in comparison, Cathay blew them out of the water. Their service was incredible, EVERY staff member was friendly and always smiling. The food was delicious. They even gave ice cream for dessert which we have never gotten...

标题: Trip to Taipei via Hong Kong
内容: We have been travelling in this manner for 2 consecutive years since 216. Though it takes a longer journey to reach Taipei, we saved on airfares and get to enjoy full flight benefits. We like the great service provided by the CX crew. Thumbs up!

Great service! These EU to Asia trips can be grueling. But the flight attendants on this flights were very punctual and polite. Food service was timely and not at all tardy for pick up. Made me happy to choose CX!

标题: Staff was nice with excellent Service
内容:
Service Crew was very nice and accommodating and will definitely fly with them again.
Checking in was easy and smooth.

Over the years, I have noticed a gradual decline when it comes to customer service with CX.
