Case and point, on 5-15-18, I flew on flight #883 from LAX to HKG, the male attendant was stern and did not even once smile during a 14 hours flight! I was never offer food or drinks during the several times that I...

Was on the maiden flight from Dublin to Hong Kong the ground staff could not have done enough they were very attentive however the cabin crew left a lot to be desired they run out of food and hot water hence no coffee or breakfast. You had to ask for everything nothing was offered. The return flight was the same....

标题: Home sweet home in Philippine Lapu Lapu city New happy homes
内容:
The flight from Gothenburg to London Heatrow by BA, and a 2,5 h waiting perfect to shopping and toilet visits.
The 777 who takes us to HK is good, I get 3 seats for my self.
The dinner is welcome fast eating and sleeping......
Few hours later we arrive HK, perfect but no time for shopping.....the transfer takes 2-3 minuets...

This flight was my first and definitely not last flight with Cathay.
First off their Checking in experience was easy, simple, clear and concise. With no fuss required everything was explained very well. The Airplane itself was an A35-9. Superbly clean, well lit and the seats were extremely comfortable. The staff on board were superb, well presented, willing to go...

After my first exp, I swear to never fly again with Cathay. Extremely rude staff, mismanaged, received food after 2 and half hours of taking off, 1.45 pm to be precise. Many vegetarian passengers were left with no option but to go hungry because they ran short of veg meals and were least bothered about it, leave alone being apologetic....

Changed gates twice.
Delayed on both flights (to and fro).
Dinner severed very late.
Overall experience is average.

I enjoyed the touches such as the sparkling wine and hot towel before take off. However, the food was awful. There were 3 advertised mains, but there only appeared to be two when the trolley arrived. This happened for the first service. On the second service it was more of the same sort of thing but different names. Got served...

I flew from jakarta soekarno hatta to hongkong internatinal airport with my family and baby.
Price is quite cheap, around 3 million IDR / seat roundtrip at the promo time.
The type of aircraft is not fixed for 1 flight number, if lucky to get a new plane.
Every day they use different types of aircraft, always check on the...

Flew business class to Hong Kong on Cathay Pacific's airbus 35. Had a smooth flight. Pampered and serviced exceptionally by great inflight service staff.
The food was fresh and well served. Great choice of alcohol. Slept well on comfy chair converted to bed - finally a great Asian airline flying to Israel !!
When we got delayed in Vancouver, the staff in Hong King helped us cut through the lines of the security, which the line was pretty long, and we got onto our flight just in time.

My first trip using Cathay Pacific, four sectors fro Adelaide to New York, via Hong Kong. First time flying with Cathay Pacific, and very pleasantly surprised. Not quite at the same standard as Qantas or Qatar, but ... a better price! Staff were not as attentive as other carriers on the first sector, but it was a 1% full flight,...

Because of the flight being so long. We booked Premier seat. Worth every penny.
The staff were very helpful and the seats were great. Extra leg room and slightly wider seats for comfort.
Food and beverages were also very good.
Cathay Pacific are one of the top carriers and are family friendly. I would definitely recommend Cathay Pacific as a top airline.

It started off with my check in at Mumbai International Airport, where i had a bit of excess baggage. the customer service representative at the counter was absolutely rude and disrespectful. i was told that there are extra charges for my excess baggage and when i asked how much, the lady at the counter threw my passport back at me...

This was my longest flight to date and was not looking forward to the long haul...15 hours in total. Have to say it was a good flight with helpful staff from check in to arrival in Japan. Leg room was good and seating comfortable. (Though not as good as Emirates air bus) Air crew also attentive. The in flight food...

Flew from Hong Kong to Manila in a Boeing 777-3, with the new 3-4-3 layout. Prior to this flight I was on the Boeing 777-3ER and the seats are much better, but for a short flight the new seats are fine. I wish they would serve a normal meal on the flight, but they only give you some kind of...

标题: Average comfort which seems to depend on the type of plane used.
内容:
The 2 sectors were quite different as we had different planes & different crew. The second sector was definitely better than the first.
There was nothing specific to complain about but compared to one of the other airlines we have travelled with, the meal service felt "rushed", the food delivery just a trolley in the aisle, and the quality of...

标题: CX Premium Economy seats fall short
内容: We were flying tback to Vancouver from Male via HK and booked premium economy seats on the HK- Vancouver leg. Having flown on BA, EVA, Air France on premium economy, I have concluded that CX premium economy class would rank last among the four. The PE seats on the Airbus 33 reclined but did not have the extended leg support....

标题: Premium Economy but is it worth it?
内容: Flew with CP in 216 and this time chose to fly Premium Economy (PE). Melb to Hong Kong seats were fairly good as was the leg room, a toilet was situated in the PE section which was handy, service was good and choice of meal options reasonable. Hong Kong to Amsterdam diffeent plane and crew, no toilet and the seat...

标题: Good short flight Osaka Kansai to Hong Kong but mediocre third party lounge
内容: Took the early evening 6 pm Cathay Pacific flight from Osaka Kansai airport to Hong Kong. Limousine bus from Osaka Station area to Kansai airport was efficient and quick at roughly one hour. Check in was quick at the business class check in and I was into the lounge very quickly. Cathay Pacific does not have its own lounge and...

I’ve been on many budget airlines to Vietnam and they seldom delay.
This time I opted for Cathay Pacific for better service, unexpectedly it said going to delay for 1.5 hours due to technical error!
It’s a just 2-hour flight and every passenger is stuck in the airport.
Since I’m taking a evening flight and it turns out I reach...

Flight entertainment are good, lots of movies for you to choose from, some of them are newly released. they now have a little shelf storage area right under the tv, so you can just simply leave your phone there while charging, but mine didn't work.

The ground customer service is very good but the planes are a bit old and the seat are not completely flat. At this day, there is no excuse for non flat bed when you’re charging full business class fare. Food and service on the plane are very good.
Best airline between Hong Kong and any country in SEA. Service is first class. I highly recommend Cathay.
Quick check-in, easy boarding, reasonable seat, good legroom, free seat next to me so plenty space, great for a long flight. Attentive crew, plenty to drink, good choice of meals but plastic cutlery!

We flew with Cathay from London to Hong Kong, then Hong Kong to Bali then Bali back to London.
The seats are all spacious and there are TVs on every seat which include a huge variety of films and tv shows. On the flight from England to Hong Kong pillows and blankets are provided, and the air hostesses are all...

标题: Horrible Delays and Insulting Attitude from the Airlines
内容: Experienced a horrible delay of more than 6 hours on my flight. Arrived at the airport before 7am, only to be informed that the flight would be delayed to 25pm. We ended up landing in Hong Kong close to 8pm at night. Practically wasted a whole day's time at the airport and inflight, when I was supposed to be back...

I have been travel to London from Kota Kinabalu in the past 2 years through many available airlines. Unlike Kuala Lumpur, travel from Kota Kinabalu is always more difficult. Cathay Pacific / Cathay Dragon made it possible and more pleasant flights with less time spent and better services even though aircraft is not 32 or 35, I had great and...

标题: Good Premium Economy service, but not so for Economy
内容: I chose Cathay Pacific to fly because it is one of the few airlines from Asia fly all the way to Vancouver, and that I could take advantage to have a stopover in Hong Kong in my return trip. I did not travel with SIA as there was a switch between SIA to another north american airline, which my peers...
Excellent service, great food, enough leg room, Good Experience, enough restrooms, comfortable seats

标题: Very friendly staff, tasty food but old planes
内容: Very friendly staff, tasty food but old planes. Very affordable price for the round-trip and that was my main reason I booked this one.

标题: Good range of on flight entertainment, provided you don't get the dodgy seat...
内容:
Me and my boyfriend used cathay pacific for our flights from london heathrow to ho chi minh (via hong kong) and our return flight from hong kong 3 days later....
The seats were spacious enough, until the incosiderate people in front of you back there seats so far back that you have their head in your lap!
The food was...

Not a shabby 16 hour flight. My flights were both delayed - one for 2 hours and one for a half an hour, though I'm not sure it's the airline to blame for that. They also covered my connecting flight that was missed due to the delay and put me on the next best option without it being a hassle....

Going to Europe for the first time was a dream come true; and the airplane that took me there was an Asian airline, the Cathay Pacific. My travel agent booked me for this plane, and this was also the first time that I took this plane. During the layover at Hongkong international airport, one has to wait an hour before...

In April my partner & I flew from Sydney to Hong Kong, and then Hong Kong to Paris with both flights on Cathay Pacific. With both flights the service was very poor when compared with Emirates with whom we flew home.
With Sydney -Hong Kong the food was average, however the staff did not collect the empty food trays in...
Easy flight, watched a couple of movies, only 5 hour flight. Lunch was nice, cabin crew were friendly.

We were taking early morning flight and had our luggages checked in at around 6am. Counter service was excellent, professional and efficient (asked to check in at Business Class counter as no line up there). The entire journey was smooth, punctual and satisfactory; stewardesses' servicing manners were courteous and efficient. Frontline personnels are great for CX. No doubt we will...

Cathay Pacific is an excellent airline in every regard. Well organised on the ground, welcoming, caring, approachable flight crew eager to assist, comfortable seats with good legroom, excellent food and beverages and plenty of "professionalism". Highly recommended !

Amazing service with lots of smiles. Each one of the crew were friendly, warm and welcoming. Suman the purser in business class was gushing with her efforts to make us comfortable. She kept coming around, addressing us by name and made us feel very special.
The tray presentation for the meal service was sleek and neat. Loved the food. Excellent...

标题: Flew from Manchester to Japan via Hong Kong and quite impressed.
内容: Brand new airplane with clever design creating a feeling of space. Staff were efficient and respectful. The in flight meal was good given the flight was Economy, as was the personal seat space. I thought the seat back was too soft as it allowed the knees of the person behind to dig into my lower back far too often. Worthy...

We flew Cathay Pacific from LAX to Hong Kong then onto Bali for our honeymoon. Was pretty worried booking an economy seat for such a long flight but did not want to spend extra to upgrade. My husband and I are both over 6' tall and were pleasantly surprised by the comfort of the seat. There was not a ton...

The night flight was great and not noisy at all .Also reached 2 minutes earlier .
The Service was good also at the same time . Always would love to travel with Cathay for the next trip for sure .

We were pleasantly surprised with the level of comfort and space. The seats were comfortable and I didn’t get the “numb bum” feeling that I’ve had many times before on other airlines. The food was good and arrived hot.
No complaints. Would fly with them again.

I was not looking forward to this flight! Some 24 hours in the air (Vancouver, BC to Hong Kong and Hong Kong to Auckland, NZ) and 27 hours in travel mode. However, the lay flat beds in Business Class, along with tasty meals and world class service turned the flight into an adventure all its own. The efficient and attentive...

Easy early check , boarding was made easy and settled in our seats
Great onboard service. Toilets were clean and well maintained, Big meals ,tea coffee sofa all served with meals, Had choice of three meals for both brew,fast and dinner comfortable seats good recline

I upgraded to a more spacious seat and was very happy. The flight was not full so many people were able to lay down in a full row. It was like this coming and going.
The food wasn't great, but that's OK as I was on the red-eye both ways.
Service was OK, I can't say great. The best part...

Flight was direct so that’s a real bonus, service was good on the plane as was the food.
The lounge at Manchester is not really suited to business class if you compare to Emirates although lounges in HK and Shanghai were good.
Service on plane good and you will get what you ask for quite quickly when you ask, but...

I travelled on premium economy. The seats were comfortable with a very decent recline. Food was good enough and it is important to mention there generous baggage allowances. The service could imporve a little bit. Some of the flight attendants seemed to forgot how to smile to customers. Overall a good experience. I fly a lot and travelled with many...

Staff are not attentive at all, for short they dont know Guest service. they are arguing to one another while passengers are in front of them.
try to book to some other airlines that will prioritize your comfort.
WORST AIRLINE EVER!

标题: Very good flight from Tel Aviv to Hong Kong
内容:
It was a long flight leaving at the late afternoon and mainly during the night.
We were kept busy with the on flight TV and the main dinner, which was OK.
When we saw already the sun coming out it was already time for the breakfast.
Even we were in the Economy Plus area there still would be good to...

标题: Great plane, friendly service, food and beverages about 1 years behind the others
内容: The staff were good but the style of service was a bit old school and food presentation could do with improvement> a lot of airlines lead with a pre and post take off drink CP didn't do the pots take off drink until the food cart was coming around which means it can be 1 hour. The food presentation was...

标题: good in economy, next time, Premium economy
内容:
Very attentive service, tasty food, congee for breakfast and cup of noodles as a late nite snack. Seats a little tight, but I guess you get what you pay for.
It would have been a nice courtesy to be able to check in and reserve seating more than 48 hours before flight.
Also the App on my android phone was...

My husband is stuck in Cambodia without a phone (that was stolen on board a Cathay flight). And not only did the perser refuse to call security before passengers left the plane, they told him its his problem and offered no assistance. Unbelievable. Am trying to reach CX to get someone yo help my stranded husband but nothing.. Absolutely shocking...

This was the first time I flew Cathy Pacific and I must compliment the Airline for excellent facilities and service. The Business Lounge at Hong Kong Airport was well managed. it was functional and well appointed. The flight from Hong Kong to Vancouver was 11 hours long and basically overnight and that was very convenient. The Business Class seats were...

We travel on a regular basis and prefer Cathay Pacific above other airlines.
Service excellent, food is generally good, sometimes delicious, wine selection very good. Comfortable seats, prefer window seat middle of Business Class. No complaints

标题: A35 Flight for BKK-SIN, Why not?
内容: CX is now using A35 for flight route HKG-BKK-SIN and it's very great. Aircraft is new. Server is very great. CX flight BKK-SIN service daily but compared with other airlines just the flight time is not good.

The queue at the check in was a bit long and slow. But once we reached the counter, it was quick and efficient. We went to the wrong end of the gate and was late for boarding but managed to get on board before the gate closed. The crew was friendly and helpful. The lunch served was good. The movie...

标题: Did not meet customer service expectations
内容:
Note this when booking 2:3AM flight time from Vancouver to HKG.
Online check-in system was inaccessible so we had to call HKG (not toll free so with fees since it was a weekend) to help us with seat reservations. We were a family but they could only give us separate seats in different rows, and middle seats. It was only...
First fly using with Cathay Pasific. In my opinion very comfortable and timely. an affordable price. for food can not feel because it is still fasting. maybe next time will use this airline again.

标题: Be careful when selecting your seat
内容:
This was our first A35 Cathay flight.
Our seats were 12D & 12G in the centre of a 1+2+1 layout giving all business class seats independent isle access. Rows start at 11 so 12 is only the second row positioning you close to the toilets and galley area. The toilet door is at an angle so at night the light...

标题: Excellent service and one world recognition
内容:
A35 out of Brisbane direct to Hong Kong
Excellent service
Food and wine choice excellent
cabin super clean
one world recognition excellent

标题: Little Touches help offset rare bad experience
内容: A three hour delay at Gatwick with no announcements about the delay, despite lounge visits, and no Cathay rep around to consult, only the airport departure boards. Bad. Not their finest moment. Made up somewhat by the Cabin Head leaving a post it note on my seat to say "hi and thank you" on the subsequent flight- where I had...

标题: Repeat flight, still a pleasant flight
内容: As always, a very pleasant flight. Attentive crew, decent food, smooth flight. Happy to recommend the airline to anyone.

Waiting for 1am flight to Manchester. Told 3 minutes before flight delayed for 2 hours. Then noticed that all flights operated by the airline delayed by few hours but other airlines operating as normal.
Quite obviously an operational issue with the airline i.e systems failure. However communications were appalling! My son also has food allergies and there is no way...

I have flown with Cathay Pacific a number of times and the staff are great.
The service is friendly and efficient.
The planes are clean and well maintained.
The foot is pretty good too.
The flight attendants always provide excellent service. But the problem is the Cathay management did a lot of stupid thing!

First time flying with Cathay Pacific, and very pleasantly surprised. Not quite at the same standard as Qantas or Qatar, but also better price! Staff were not as attentive as other carriers but it was a 1% full flight, so they were very busy. Definitely recommend trying them. About to board my second flight with them for New York. Will...

Boarded at 9, am, served breakfast around 1.3 and then nothing until 1 hour before landing in Sydney around 5,3 pm. No snacks or drinks were offered on the flight. Not much better going over but we had night flight so did not notice it as much. Crew were very lazy and did not really treat the passengers well. Will...

Cathay is a good and dependable airline that we have used on numerous family trips. They have nice planes, an up to date entertainment system, and have one of the most comfortable economy seats with plenty of leg room. Their food though is hit and miss....sometimes really good, sometimes I don't even bother.
If there is one area that they...

I usually travel on business class on business trips but this time on a family trip, I decided to try "Premium Economy". I was a little apprehensive at first since this was a long haul flight which was not the best flight to try "Premium Economy". I was pleasantly surprised as I got what I valued most and what I...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Booked last minute as this is the cheapest flight I could find out of NYC to my home country Philippines. I chose CRK as I would not want to trouble myself getting out of MNL Airport. Last time I flew CX was in 29 to RUH. The service and food then was great so I trusted that it would be...

We have been flying Cathay Pacific for a number of years now and this flight was typically excellent. The staff keep things organised, are always happy to assist and always work as a team. If something is not perfect for a passenger they are quick to respond. Food quality and in-flight service is wonderful.
We deliberately do not belong to...

Cathay Pacific is an excellent airline which we have flown several times. Since it serves Asia I do not have the opportunity to fly with Cathy that often but will pick it when I can.
Since the flight was a long one (over 2 hours flying) we flew Business Class and strongly recommend that class. The comfort, service, and amenities...

I have flown Cathay Pacific already several times in the past, and their service is still superb. Ground crew are systematic. Flight is on time. Food is decent. FA are friendly and accommodating. The plane is new. What I like are their in- flight movies, wide selection.
Gonna fly again with them.

First off, the check in took forever(1hour).
Thankgod we flew on a new A35(in flight entertainment??), otherwise it would have been horrendous.
The in flight service was poor, the food was, not food. Compared to other Asian airlines, I’m sorry, but all the others are better. 11-5 hours of hell, then another 5-5 hours of torture to Bali.
Never, never...

标题: Good choice for long haul routes
内容: I flew Cathay Pacific to and from Europe on holiday last year (MEL to HKG, HKG to AMS, then AMS to HKG and then HKG to MEL). The flights went well on all legs and the staff were very professional and passionate about their jobs. The inflight food was good and so was the inflight entertainment. The age of the...

I flew with Cathay Pacific, business class, my flight from Sydney to Hong Kong was delayed by 1.5 hours, I was advised of this 2.5 hours before boarding time by text with no possibility given for rerouting or rebooking. I had to phone myself and after being left on hold for 2 minutes was told all alternative flights were full....

Was looking forward to flying with this airline as we had heard good reviews. Found it to be very average. We left Manchester at noon and by 15. they turned all the lights off in the plane for 8 hours. I assume they expected everyone to sleep. The food was ok but again found it to be average. Leg room...
A very full flight where it seemed the staff struggled a bit to get the service out quickly, but they were courteous and smiling. The vegetarian food - I ordered Indian Jain meal was very good.

Cathay coming out, said they had tech problem, delayed 5 hrs, boarded plane sat there for 4 mins after doors were sealed to THEN be told flight crew had run out of flight time so couldn't fly until next day. Going back their flight from Vietnam delayed missing connecting flight ANOTHER 24 HOUR DELAY. No direct contact from any customer...
Cathay is always a solid choice, the airhosts are generally very helpful. Fortunately for me i had 2 spare seats in the row so was able to spread out

Cathay Pacific Airways, out of all others, has lost my luggage. A first in my little life. I flow from JFK to PVG in late March this year, via Hong Kong, of course. When I landed in Shanghai, one piece luggage was missing. After waiting and filing C it’s a hell that evening in Pudong Airport … the airport staff...

The two legs home leaving at noon (Madrid to HK; 2 hours wait; HK to Syd) meant arriving at 9pm and dropping straight into bed made the recovery from jet lag a whole lot easier imo. The comfort and foods available were fine as airline food goes and for once (in a long time) there were no screaming children to...

标题: from Amsterdam to Hongkong and from Melbourne to Hongkong and Hong Kong Amsterdam
内容:
The flight from Amsterdam to Hong Kong on the 5th of May ws okay. Drinks and food enough, kind attenders.
The flight from Melbourne to Hong Kong, attender by incheck was unkind, it was also not clear were we have to do ower inches because we did't do the incheck online, because that was not properly working. Than she sad...

Cathay Pacific is good flight with very courteous staff, the air pressure, temperature maintained in flight was perfect, I did not suffer from ear ache or pressure, similarly there was not suffocating feeling, though the leg space was less and it was little congested arrangements of seats.
Soft/ hard drinks are served on flight. The vegetarian food quality was good...

I took a long flight from Toronto to Hong Kong and then from Hong Kong to Bali with this airline and must say that it was a very comfortable flight. I have no complaints about the flight attendants and the food given was decently good for airplane food. I’m not a picky person or high maintenance nor did I need...

标题: Efficient flight with friendly staff and good on-board entertainment
内容: Brilliant service with great on-board entertainment for a long-haul flight. Good variety of food available and not too bad with the leg room in economy.
Flight was okay but nothing to rave about. The staff did what they needed to do but showed no real interest in making this special

Our shared airline lounge was ordinary, furniture stained. Overdue for a refurbishment. The flight itself was good. I think the seats were an older model but comfy enough. Entertainment choices were good. Staff were lovely and the service,wine, food fabulous. Then I bought some duty free beauty products. The staff knew we had a connecting flight with Qantas and were...

It doesn't matter whether you are travelling economy or not. In Cathay Pacific you feel like you're travelling First Class. The service is impeccable and other airlines should take a leaf out their book.
If I can travel with Cathay to any destination, they are my first choice.
Good service from airhostesses and the meals are also delicious. It is weird that decide to serve dinner at 1.3 am of the departure time.

标题: Expected much more from Cathay Pacific
内容:
Trying a new airlines is always exciting, may be its European or gulf one. I had very high hopes with cathay pacific, but in came out like a normal airline.
1)Food : It was okish (Veg), no idea about non veg. Should really change menu as per other airlines.
2)Seats: They were good. Happy with that
3)Service: This is a...

No one likes being stuck on an airplane for 14 hours, but I have to say my experience with Cathay Pacific and Cathay Dragon was phenomenal! No flight delays, excellent service and very comfortable. My new airline for Asia trips!

It was well worth the extra money to upgrade to Premium Economy. The extra space allowed for a far more comfortable flight. Cathay Pacific is one of the better airlines, where cleanliness, service and room are important to me.

标题: Prem Econ flight from London to Vietnam and return
内容: After flying Cathay business class not too long ago and thinking value for money is not given, my husband and I flew now in premium economy from London Heathrow to Hong Kong (Cathay Boeing 777-3er, 4class) and from there with Dragon Air to Da Nang. Return flight was from Saigon with Cathay (Boeing 777) to Hong Kong and back to...

标题: It was a decent flight, just some little annoyances
内容: Flew from Amsterdam to Hong Kong (economy), about 11 hours flight. I don't get why people are always in a hurry to board the plane, I just sat and waited until the very end to board the plane, no waiting in a long line, the plane will depart with everyone at the same time! Because I was one of the...

标题: Very good experience. BA could learn a lot from them.
内容: The Boeing 777 was relatively new and very clean. The seats are much more comfortable than the BA equivalent although BA may have some equally modern equipment that I have not been on (i fly London Gatwick to Orlando and back twice per year and equipment is always quite old with tiny TV screens). We were in the back row...

标题: Awareness of flight safety should be improved
内容: I was quite disappointed by the awareness of the air hostess on the issue of flight safety. On my flight to beijing, there were passengers stood up and intended to walk while the plane started running, to my surprise, no air hostess stopped that action, after a while, you heard a air hostess asking the passenger to sit down. The...

The Cathay Lounge in Taipei is wonderful,
I could have spent hours in it without any problem,
It was spacious, with good food, and relaxing chaise loungue too.

标题: Good service and good entertainment facilities
内容: I was impressed with the rather flight cabin and the large TV screen for entertainment. It seems to me that the long haul flight of Cathay is much better than its short haul flights that I have been using in Pacific Asia. Meals were good. Their air hostesses served with patience and smile. Especially impressed with their thoughtfulness to take...

Plane was delayed from Manila to HK, thus we missed the connecting flight to London(time in between flights is actually is so tight). We were transferred to another plane which is FIVE (5) hours later. The worst thing is that the seats with legroom that we paid for were not given to us in the next flight. My husband is...

The airline has a good safety record and uses newer planes. The food served on Cathay Dragon was below standard but the food served on CX premium economy was better. The seats were also comfortable. Staff were generally helpful.

标题: Great flight from SIN TO HK
内容: Absolutely wonderful route. The planes seem newer than those used in transpacific or at least sleeker. I am a big fan of the crews on this route, the free newspaper and even the moist towelettes. Comfortable and well run.

On a whim, my elderly and infirm parents decided to book themselves on a non-refundable trip to Japan, followed by a cruise. Fortunately, their travel agent booked their flights through Cathay Pacific. Both require special assistance for a range of issues including hearing and visual impairments. I could not have been happier with the highly professional and very caring way...

标题: GOOD AS USUAL BUT AGING PLANES
内容:
Took my wife to BKK for a short holiday on CX and have the following comments:
1. Bid price for up grading to C class was absurd ( min bid for one way was HKD2, + taxes )
2. On both legs of the journey, my wife's in flight entertainment was not working and need to reboot ( it took...

Cathay Pacific ticked so many boxes -friendly, helpful staff, comfortable beds, excellent lounge at HK airport - many restaurants and sitting areas to choose from. The showers and toilets at the lounge were clean and comfortable. Very happy to be fly with them again

We were removed from the flight from Hong Kong HK to Auckland, NZ.
It seems that Cathy Pacific needed two extra seats and found an excuse to remove 2 senior passenger from the flight during the boarding process. The company had number of days to let us know if there is any problems for our paid scheduled flight. We had...

In travelling, cathay gives me a good option in terms of flight time, they have a good service as well... good food and great option for drinks, comfy seats and they have a good selection of movies compare to other airlines.

标题: Badly let down by the food
内容:
We are frequent overseas travellers.
The staff on the Cathay flight CX 163 (and CX 292 for the Rome HK leg) were very professional and courteous. There can be no criticism of them, but some of the food served to Business Class passengers was deplorable.
The breads offered were stodgy and tasteless, the veal and the pork dishes were inedible....

Arrived at Gatwick plenty of time, checked in only to find once through passport control to find delayed, now it was the new A35 technical problems, so when we got to hong Kong we missed the flight connection hong Kong airport the most confusing I've ever been to, so then had to fly to Singapore then onto Bali I would...

标题: Quite disappointing experience at the airport and service in the cabin but ended with a pleasant surprise
内容: After arriving at Hong Kong from Singapore by flight No.65 at 1:4am I had to catch next flight to Kansai immediately which departs at 11:4. At the end of aerobridge finding a few airport staff I enquired how to go to my flight's departure gate No.3. They just show the direction and I just followed the sign without realizing the...

I have flown this route since 1965. Over the years, it has improved to the point that a bad flight is unusual. Almost always full and an increasing proportion of mainland Chinese. Cabin crew was as usual excellent.
Made the trip a pleasure due to service given by staff and facilities onboard. Without the trip due to its length could have been a painful experience.

In flight services were very good; flight was punctual.
Friendly stewardess.
Very quick and smooth walk through from plane door to immigration at HK airport.

标题: Cathay Pacific must not understand Seat Guru
内容: I booked my reservation far in advance. I picked my seat based on Internet suggestions. When I got to the airport I was ambushed to change my seat to accommodate a family, who hadn’t planned ahead. Cathay Pacific thought it was reasonable for me to give up my single window seat for a middle seat. (Btw, I gave up the...

We boarded efficiently and left on schedule. As always with Cathay Pacific, the service was excellent.
I skipped the hot breakfast, having fruit, bircher muesli and pastries only. The only very minor criticism with breakfast is that there appeared to be no champagne available - none was offered.
For lunch I had stir fried chilli prawns glazed with crab meat,...

After a break of 18 months when I had to travel on other airlines to Asia, it was a relief to travel Cathay Pacific again with their exceptional service. As ever, I was not disappointed. Up to their normal very high standards of comfort and service.
For lunch I had stir-fried beef tenderloin - great to be given chopsticks with...
Cathay Pacific provide an excellent flight experience from Hong Kong to Okinawa. Safe flight and no delay at all. Good service offered from the flight attendants.

Spacious, well maintained, good food and good services provided on the flight from Chennai to Hongkong. They were also courteous and did not disturb since it was a overnight flight. However on return from HKG they could provide food quickly. A refreshing drink just before landing also would be welcome. From the drawback perspective seat nos. and albhapets in row...

A flight attendant with fake smiles and very cold look called Yoyo , who spoke very poor Mandarin with rude manner and no curtesy at all, forced me to respond to her in my poor Mandarin... I thought that on the flight from Toronto to HK, primary language should be English, and then Cantonese ...
There is no wash room...

Sure, it's my fault for leaving it in the seat pocket, that happens after 3 hours in transit... But we called the number within 2 hours of landing, followed the prompts (twice), they didn't call back.
Next day after calling again I decided to trek back to the airport, to be greeted by a phone number that wasn't staffed. I...

标题: Not so fantastic but very ordinary service
内容: Having been using Cathay for quite some whenever I have go to Japan and also to visit Hong Kong on my way back this time too I chose to go by Cathay. This time flight was early starting at 6:45am. I sat on row 4 and enough leg room. The flight was just usual and quite a few vacant seats...

Fly from Manchester whenever I can. The flight to Hong Kong is around 12 hours non stop.
The attendants were very attentive .
The food was well typical economy
Entertainment was good .

I flew with Cathay as part of a package tour of Japan
I flew via HongKong so my Tavel time was 15hrs , and then home the same way this leg I paid to upgrade to premium, still a long flight but slightly more comfortable, and service. never again
The seats were narrow and the way they slide brown under...

标题: Good service but maintenance need improvement
内容:
My waiting time in HongKong from Surabaya flight was 11 hours, plus the flight it took to Rome was more than 13 hours. Super long.
Good thing is the lounge allowed us to use all 4 lounges during the 11 hours transit to kill the time :)
The plane cabin maintenance seemed need improvement.
I had broken cupboard handle, as...

Very comfortable flight. Food was average, staff were as expected. As a solo traveller, really appreciated the 1 2 1 configuration. Lots of privacy. Seat a little hard, but with an extra blanket. it was fine.

I found out in this trip that the headrest of the seats (in economy) could be adjusted both vertically (up and down, may be around 6 inches). It also could be folded on your head sides (not to allow your head to fall off on the sides)
I wish the seat could be tilted slightly more to make economy travel...

This was my return flight to Dubai. I received a prior notice via email that there will be a 2mins.flight delay. I was also informed at the check-in counter. I requested for my luggage to have fragile sticker since I experienced it was mishandled on other airlines, the staff agreed. I was informed to have my visa checked and the...

We flew from Sydney to Paris via Hong Kong (and return). The staff were uniformly polite and largely unobtrusive (absent?). Travelling premium is always better than economy but Cathay's fleet needs refurbishment (3 of the 4 aircraft we travelled on had clearly done considerable service). There is no doubt that tall travellers would enjoy row 3 enormously as the leg...

标题: Old planes - untrained ground staff - deplorable lounge
内容:
Flew back from Shanghai Pudong to Hong Kong. Super old “Dragonair” plane, no TV, old seats.
Ground staff wanted to force me to check-in my cabin luggage, but I refused. They were annoying me for 1kg extra when I am a petite and slim person, 5kg max. Do they ask men over 9kg to lose weight. Stu-pid. And I am...

WE were booked for Melbourne Hong Kong, and when we boarded, we were told one of our seats did NOT have a working entertainment system, and seats in row 1 were offered. As the flight was around the 9 hours, we said we would shift. These seats were right next to the toilets, an appalling design mistake, no matter whether...

标题: Beware - Cathy Pacific will nickel and dime you
内容: I went out of my way to fly Cathay Pacific - sort of an aviation buff and wanted to try them out. Flew full fare business - Newark to Hong Kong, Hong Kong to Beijing, Shanghai to Honk Kong and Hong Kong to Newark. Nice folks, OK seating (A35s), food OK, lounges OK. BUT Wi-Fi was an EXTRA US $19.95...

Thought would give Cathay another chance however proved to be poor again. Upgrade to premium economy however pay well over double economy &in reality is just a bit more leg room. No drink served not even coffee. Seats do not have leg rests. When you ask for a wine you get a plastic drinking cup. So sad when competitors are...

I'm tall and I need the bathroom frequently! I had a great isle seat with everything I needed including enough leg space so I wasn't cramped down there in cattle class.
Excellent food but any sign of turbulence and they won't serve hit drinks- I get it, but I like my hot drinks after eating thanks! Touchscreen was brilliant with...

I have flown Cathy Pacific before but as a business class passenger. This time my experience was in Economy and I wish I had upgraded to at least premium economy. Found the seating okay 3-3-3 but overhead locker above our seats was broken so we had to find a spare space in another locker away from our seating. One of...

标题: I've been flying Cathay for over a decade now...
内容:
Always excellent service and friendly, helpful flights attendants! Every trip, they get better and better.
Keep up the good work!
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: It was a pleasure to use Cathay Pacific. Checking in was simple and easy. On board and during the flight the flight crew were so polite and assisting. Nothing was too much trouble. The food was delicious and our premium economy seating was very comfortable. Congratulations to Cathay Pacific.

标题: Great Flight crew shame about the business class
内容: The flight from London to HK was great on the new A35, a 1-2-1 configuration that really makes sense on long haul. The HK to Bali leg was on the 777 with a 2-3-2 configuration that really needs updating. Most carriers wouldn't even consider this as business class and it made an excellent trip just that little bit less special....

Boarding was quick and hassle free. Our business-class seats were very comfortable and provided a good bed to catch a little sleep. The food choices were excellent and very tasty. Very glad we chose Cathy Pacific.

When ever we fly to here we take this airline. We fly premium economy because it has a bit more leg room than economy. We have been upgraded to business class one time and that was amazing. Clean planes and the airline staff is very helpful and attentive.

标题: B777 Economy 3-3-3 seating plan still ok
内容: 3-3-3 seating plan is good for my size between small-medium, but don't know how good/worse becoming 3-4-3 will be. That flight was delayed totally by an hour due to the plane had still not been tow to the terminal before ready to boarding, don't know who is responsible for it. Anyway, CX cabin crew provided standard service.
Although many people said CX is poor than before, however, I feel that no significant change. At least, cabin crew provided standard service.

The check-in was quite good, with attentive and helpful staff - my husband is a frequent flyer with Cathay, but I'm not. Nevertheless, they sent us both to the priority line, it was a nice gesture.
The flight was comfortable, food ok and the staff quite nice. The only thing that was not so good was the inflight enterteinment screen,...
Amazing food and service. Comfortable seats with the latest movies to watch. The flight left on time and arrived on time.

It was my girl's first flight and I had purposely chosen an airline which i thought was good so that she will feel more comfortable. Turn out when I asked for kids toy, the flight attendants told me that there was none on flight (same for return flight). And for kids meal, I was given the option to choose the...

took the morning (6am) flight to HK with my husband. seats and the inflight movies and crew service were good.however, we werent expecting the inflight food that was served to us which was a pie and bottled water. since this was a morning flight, we were hoping a better breakfast like rice meal or sandwich and coffee since we were...
Comfortable seats for economy and spacious for someone tall like me. Fodd and service were excellent.

The plane delayed in arriving in Tokyo because of engine failure. So the scheduled departure time changed to an hour later.
However, we waited for nearly another hour after we boarded the plane.
Upon arrival in Hong Kong, we were told that there was no connecting bridge available and buses would take us to the arrival hall.
This is not...

Although the flight was late taking off, the plane was full to capacity, we (my wife and I) paid for extra leg room, seats 59 the centre and isle seat, leaving the seat by the window. this last seat was later occupied by a man, when the flight was airborne, it became clear the man on the inside had no...

We had a 2 hour delay caused by a wheel replacement but the information was freely explained without the stuffy attitude you get from other airlines. Flight attendants were very pleasant, seats in economy had a bit of extra room between rows compared to other planes the video quality and selection was top quality and the complimentary food & drink...

Overall the flight went smoothly and the leg room was comfortable (I am used to flying US airlines -- this felt like "normal" seat, not needlessly cramped). Very happy with the entertainment options - lots of movies. The cabin seemed stuffy. Usually I find them to be on the cool side, but this was very warm for the duration of...

标题: % Star Service from Check-in to Destination
内容: Outstanding service from Check-in where we were assisted most professionally by Georgia, to the on-board greeting by Cabin Staff "Welcome Aboard Sir" made us feel at home immediately. Our flight was aboard an A35 with comfortable seats with very good/intuitive Entertainment Systems. On board WiFi was a pleasant surprize. The meals were excellent - at least to restaurant standard and...

As a marco Polo gold member my journeys with Cathay is very frequent. Throughout the years CX made my airline travel extremely comfortable. From ticket booking to disembarkation Cathay provides an exceptional service. A real 5 star airline among all other airlines. My only hope is CX will continue to maintain their high standards and give their customers the most...

Went to Korea via Cathay (transit at HK). This was the 2nd time onboard their A35 and could say that it is still as comfy as the first time, but not the best seats out of all. I still prefer their B77W seats for some reason I dont knw why. Personal preference I guess.
Food wise is better than the...

The cabin crew were extremely friendly and willing to do all they could to make our flight enjoyable. The flight from EWR to Hong Kong was just under 16 hours and they made it very enjoyable. Anytime you have to spend that much time on a plane and the crew makes it bearable that is definitely an excellent crew in...

I travelled business class and from the moment I arrived in the lounge the service was excellent. Food and drink was lovely, staff on flight were fantastic too, toiletry bag had great products in it. Movies were great, Seat was so comfortable too.

Well priced airline and good service on board.
we were frustrating that we could not book our seats in advance
Food was acceptable, but options ran out by the time the stewardess reached our seats.
Took a long time to take away our food at the end of meals.

The cabin crew on this particular flight were very pleasant and a positive disposition. Were very professional in their work . Would love to be on board an airline with very friendly and pleasant cabin attendants.
As always, the quality of service is exceptional.Food is better or way better than the other airlines I have flown. Plenty of movies to choose from.

Our first Premium Economy flight got off to a good start with a separate check-in lane. Noi lounge at Melbourne but good seats - just the two of us together on the A35, comfortable seats and enough recline to sleep - new plane - great touch screen entertainment and new content but they have changed the headset pins again and...
Good night time flight. Comfortable lie flat bed, and a quiet cabin. Dinner service prompt and good selection of in flight entertainment.
The redeye is awesome. You can sleep on the way in, land at 53-6 in the morning and you have yourself a full day. The service is good and the food is really good.

Flown to hk before with BA but decided this time to give Cathay Pacific a go as well as being an excellent price easy to check in baggage and on time we also managed to get an upgrade to premium economy which proved to be very relaxing with the extra leg room . Plenty of new movies but slept well...

Flights booked a year in advance, return flight from London delayed with no explanation, which meant the connecting flight was missed and had to spend 5 hours in Hong Kong. Staff at HK efficient and met all 28 passengers who missed the connection. Rebooked on next flight out, different seats, which was annoying as we booked early to get seats...
Not good for Indian travelers, as the food served in flight is purely authentic Chinese and they don't even have any suitable alternate for that and you have to live with it.

标题: It was a terrible experience. Will never fly with Cathay Pacific again
内容: This trip was Sydney to London via Hong Kong. What a terrible waste of money it was spending just under 1925 GBP to travel Premium Economy with Cathay Pacific. I will never fly with them again. I booked and paid in May 217 for a Premium Economy flight to Sydney. I was flying out to Australia on 26th September 217...
Cathay Pacific have a good and comfy flights. In flight crew was good and I faced no delays in both ways?
excellent service, good food, and very good value for money, adequate legroom, good in-flight entertainment

Flying from Cairns to London via Hong Kong has to be the best option for North Queensland departures. The airline flies out at midday and connects in Hong Kong so that you arrive in London early in the morning. Jet lag is a little less because you sleep on the last leg of the journey. Food was excellent and loads...
Both times that I have flown with Cathay Pacific, I have received exceptionally professional & courteous service

Used Cathay Pacific(Premium Economy) again, for Bris /Tokyo /Osaka /Taipei/Hong Kong/Bris over 12 days, very recently . Good airline ,timely flights ,helpful staff (ground and airborne) . Food standard on the shorter legs though, is variable . Vegetarian dishes always the same and are really "ordinary" ...work needs to be done on this section of the menus ! not good...

I flew from New York to Manila in April 218 on Cathay Pacific expecting it to be a marvelous experience. It was not, simply put, just ordinary, everything about this flight and aircraft seemed tired to me. The fold flat seats in business class did fold flat, being tall I had to fold with it, padding was almost non existant....
The business class in the new A35 on the singapore to hong kong route is a huge improvement over the older planes. While I still probably prefer Singapore Airlines it was very good.

标题: Overall very good, food a bit mixed
内容: This is always a very good flight - I like the reverse herringbone seat layout, the service is always pretty good and the food is generally good (though not as good as some others).
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
The flight crew were all attentive to the passenger needs. The reclining seat and the quilt provided comfort and warmth the entire journey made me sound asleep.
The variety of food/pastry and refreshment was someting to look forward.

标题: Very good service oand overall good experience
内容:
We travelled with Cathay owing to breaking our journey in Hong Kong to travel to Vietnam. Cathay didn't show up on multi-flight journey planners we tried, but turned out to be the cheapest option for us.
What doesn't show up in the reviews is that Cathay had a choice of 3 flight times out of LHR and we were able...

标题: Very long flight jfk to hong kong
内容: This very long flight was overall very good. I was a little disappointed with the food but the service was excellent. This check in at jfk was confusing with no curbside available and no help with our many pieces of luggage. The return was better but not as good as other airlines but kudos to Singapore airport for being the...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Premium economy just a bit better than economy
内容:
Apart from the wider seats with more leg room, there is nothing special about the premium econ seats.
I always think that for a short haul regional flight with cathay, provided u have access to airport lounges, there ia not much difference between flying economy and premium econ or business class.

标题: Excellent chair, food could be better
内容: For a short business trip to Sydney we choose to fly Cathy Pacific for the short connection in HKG and the times matched with our schedule. We could fly the new A35 from BRU to HKG which is a very comfortable and quiet plane. Depending on the wind the afternoon flight flight takes up to 12 hours. The cabin and...

标题: Unsatisfactory flight from Hong Kong to London Gatwick
内容: We flew from Hong Kong to London Gatwick on 21/5/18 on a very unpleasant flight.We had chosen we thought seats with sufficient leg room but proved not the case. After take off the young girl in front of us decided she wanted to lie back but my husband tried to stop this in view of the fact it would have...
They're known for their good service. Comfortable cabin layout, yummy onboard food and pleasant service. Their A35 aircraft is very roomy.

Ok the seats are more comfortable and more spacious than economy but that's about it. You do get to board the plane early however when you sit down all the economy passengers board and walk past so trying to relax and enjoy the complementary sparkling wine is not that relaxing.
The cabin is not fully enclosed and does not have...

I fly on this route twice every six weeks as I am currently working in Mongolia. I find Cathay Pacific very pleasant to fly with the plane is clean and the hostesses are friendly and helpful. There is ample entertainment on board movies, games, music etc. The food is good and beverages as usual are served constantly. Now and again...

标题: It's been over rated. Not worth it.
内容:
Didn't get the travel bag until I get off the plane. (Don't know I can have one)
Very hungry during midnight and order something to eat (no matter what they can offer is acceptable) and they kept me waiting for more than 5 minutes.... I got a burger with VERY hard bread that even couldn't bite... （so un-acceptable)
I paid...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: I flew to Hong Kong by Cathay Pacific on 1 th and returned on 17 th . The flight timings were accurate . Inflight service at both times were average . The cabin crew looked unprofessional but were working hard to sort out which breakfast to give whom ( veg or non veg ) which was surprising . No welcome...

Flew 4 legs with Cathay on this trip (BNE to HK, HK to CDG, AMS to HK and HK to BNE) and found it to be a pleasant trip. Service was good and there was nothing to complain about. Still find seat comfort and legroom OK, but not great for a tall person. Food was good and staff very good.....

Me beeing almost 19 cm like when airlines undertstand that customers are placed in a cabin where maximum amounts of chair policy isn’t implemented like it better. Avoiding fitting in one or two seat ? rows are probably a good way of calculating when the number of full flights are fewer than not full flights. On those flights customers get...

标题: An Awesome experience from start ot finish
内容: Boarding, flight attendants passenger attention, food quality, onboard entertainment was adequate but not extensive resulting in my Cathay Pacific experience being awesome. Even the legroom estimated at 32 to 33 inches was above the average plane and at 5' 9" my knees seldom touched the back of the seat in front of me. This was a Boeing 777-3 plane.

标题: Efficient service yes but without heart. I have flown Cathay a few times and always disappointed
内容: I just travelled from Tel Aviv, Israel to Hong Kong and then onwards to Sydney, Australia. The flights were not full, service was exxellent including attention, food, crew etc. I highly recommend. My tickets were purchased with Qantas points and it worked out really well. I travelled to Israel up to HK with Cathay too and that flight was full,...

After a 24 hour delay, we arrived in Hong Kong ready for our connecting flight only to find that our bags were not loaded on the flight from Manchester.
This company has a total disregard for its passengers and customers
So not only loosing a day of what should have been a trip of a life time, we now have...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Manchester - Ho Chi Minh City

标题: Flight cancel and now luggage wasn’t even on the same flight
内容: I understand airlines now don’t care about goodwill anymore but this is ridiculous. Over 6 hours delay, got on the flight then told to come off due to technical problem. Flight cancel had to recollected luggage and arrange hotel miles from the airport. The flight was suppose to be flying out approx 12:15, we got to the hotel at 21:...
Third time we used this carrier and they have been consistently good every time, three years running. The price is very competitive and the service is great.
Traveled via Hong Kong was very impressed on all sectors of the journey! Flight attendants were friendly and polite! Food and drink pretty good for aeroplane food will def fly with them again!

标题: Always a pleasant experience and service with CX
内容:
Flew several times both in business and economy with Cathay Pacific, and I can say they have excellent service.
For the business class,
Love the full-flat business class. Spacious seat and leg space under the entertainment system (though this might not be an issue due to me being more on the short/small size), food was great, service was great. The...

More spacious knee room. larger screen for movie.
We have our breakfast meal and I ordered a chicken congee.
I took the break first, and found the congee box only with 1/5 of congee, interesting.
He get me another one very quickly, once I paged for help.
Thanks!
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Economy' 'Hong Kong - Ho Chi Minh City

标题: great service on time and good food
内容:
really quick and helpful staff.
first class food choice of drinks.
not pushy with the sales talk
seats were quite comfortable

25/ 5/ 18: Manchester to Hong Kong: Cancelled the flight after 6 hours of being messed about, told different stories/versions of events. Boarded the flight: then cancelled.
All the passengers then put back in the hands of the terrible ground staff, who had led the merry dance throughout the day: aiding and abetting the removal of the delayed passengers being...

The loading of passengers was a wee bit chaotic but after a number of false starts boarding was easy for a flight which left a short time after midnight. Attendants were friendly and the seat comfortable and plenty of leg room for a six foot two inch guy even with the seat set to fully flat for sleeping. I think...

This was a long Flight (16) hours and business class was excellent.
The staff were fantastic and the service was good. The on board food was top notch.

This was a great flight that was on time and it was a nice new plane.
The service was excellent.
Ours was an overnight flight and the full size beds in business class were good.

Very nice flight on a brand new airplane. The A35 is really amazing. Normally flying long haul is exhausting but with the lower cabin altitude I didn't feel tired at all and found it easy to sleep. Partly due to the amazing recline on these new Cathay Pacific economy seats. The inflight entertainment was great, nice modern screen.
Service was...

When we lived in Hong Kong Cathay Pacific was our 'go to' airline and this year we chose to fly with them again on two sectors - the one listed and the next day to London Heathrow.
It was our first time flying in the new A35 and what a beautiful aircraft. On a par with Air NZ's 787 Dreamliner...

I had 7 hours to fill after my flight from Heathrow before flying onto Perth. Fortunately as I had flown FC to HKG I was able to go into the FC section of The Wing.in Terminal 1.
The Lounge was fitted out with quality furnishings including the strange individual seating known as the Solus Chair and was relatively empty.
I...

Cathay Pacific used to be a very good airline. But, after they lost from hedging oil prices, they start to cut cost and service and I personal don't like it now. The only reason attract me is the direct flight from Hong Kong to Manchester. The food is not good and the service is just standard nowadays. Perhaps, I only...
9mins flight from HK to Taipei. One of my favorite destinations of all time. Lunch was great on the return flight too.

标题: Best long distance flight for me until now
内容:
I travel quite a bit long distance, and perhaps because I had never been to the far east before, I have never had the chance to travel with Cathay Pacific, via Hongkong, and then connected to Cathay Dragon.
I was absolutely blown away by such an efficient service on board, and consistent polite and patient demeanour of staff on board...

We had an amazing flight on Cathay's 777. The crew were attentive and friendly, but still relaxed and not pretentious. The seat was widest seat we've had. Drink selection and meal are both excellent. In fact,I found the catering on Cathay the best we've had so far, even more so than Singapore Airline. The pajama provided was from organic cotton,...

If you want to book a Mult trip from Cathypacific , Please very becareful to process and double confirm your ticket. If you buy your ticket from Agent or Tour company. I share the below information for you .
My story is I booked through h.k agent to bought cathypacific ticket from Hk to Brussels /Brussels to Prague / Prague...

标题: Not the best flight i Had
内容: I soon as we boarded, i sit comfortably in my seat. everything was fine. After take off and seat belt sign went off. I reclined my seat and fell asleep on the spot. 15 minutes later i woke up on someone taping on my arm, the flight attendant woke me up to give me a bottle of water. I took...

1st and I think last time (depending on price of course). Having flown as crew for 21 years and travelled with many airlines I was excited to fly Cathay Pacific. However really disappointed. I have had better flights with Garuda and Kenya Airlines. You don't get an amenity pack, majority of Airlines still provide the basic of socks/toothbrush/eye mask. The...

There seems to be a communication issue between Cathay and at least one of its partners.
Our Sydney C Munich C Sydney trip was purchased through Lufthansa. Cathay to HongKong, Lufthansa to Munich.
Our outward bound trip was marred by seat allocations in two different rows. Speaking to their call centre was a waste of time, as was a written...

Wow, to say my family and I were looked after would be an understatement. We were given access to the lounges in Hong Kong are amazing. We were blessed with an upgrade that gave us room for my family and I on the plane that we do not usually have. The service and help given are second to none. Even...

We flow with them because we booked a world ticket with them for a lot of money.
A delay! Only fish food and unfriendly staff.
Owh and don't use their frequent flyer program *asiamiles*.
You are not able to redeem any points unless you have a zillion or so

LGW-HKG on the new A35 was a dream. Superb inflight entertainment, catering and refreshments. Aircraft new and quiet. Service was sublime, friendly and efficient.
Transfer at Hong Kong wonderful, plenty of shops.
Hong Kong to Denpasar on an older 777-3, delayed due to a tropical storm. Take off from HKG rather turbulent and stormy but professional flight crew. Service on...
Nice standard airline, very pleasant, helpful staff really great with children, they loved their Disney packs to play with on the flight

标题: One of the best in the region
内容: CX 653 HKG - BKK, flight was on time and service was good. Seat was comfortable and with enough leg room, food ok but love the Haagen Dazs ice cream. Entertainment were excellent with good and recent collection of movies and music. Price a bit high but got it on a share. Flight with Bangkok Airway and got a good...

This is our latest among unconutable times flying with Cathay Pacific. There was a twenty-minute delay this time because of the traffic at the Bangkok airport. The crew is as courteous and professional as ever. However the meal was disastrous. I suspect the chicken dish was unclean and caused my diarrhea.

The experience of flying Cathay Pacific Business Class is really amazing. Great food selection, and with their flat-bed, we arrived Los Angeles rested and ready to start our adventure as soon as we land. Experienced less (or absence) of jet-lag, as we were asleep most of the time in comfort.

I had not flown with Cathay Pacific since 1997, so was keen to see if they were still as good - they are. The staff members are pleasant, attentive and always professional. They are also amazingly dexterous working within the confines of the economy cabin. The food was good, and hot.
The in-flight entertainment system is fantastic. I did not...

Cathay pacific is an airline which you can fly without any hassle. Amazing and warm services, welcoming smiles of the stewards and hostesses. Food was good and most importantly departed and arrived bang on time.

We chose Cathay Pacific for our flight Mel to HKG and Beijing return and were more than happy with the flight. Left on time , arrived on time, cabin crew efficient and polite, meals and choice very good which is hard to get sometimes with airline food. Seats were comfortable with good leg room. Also inflight entertainment had good choice

Travelled to Shanghai from Adelaide via HongKong on Cathy Pacific and Cathy Dragon and return.
Excellent flight, tasty food and attentive service on all sectors of the flights. Economy seat comfort ok and the space is best it can be in the segment. (Have flown Cathy Business Class on previous trips so economy is always just going to be OK...

For those wondering if Premium Economy is worth paying extra, I can tell you that on Cathay Pacific long haul flights, IT IS!
It is really worth it if you are lucky enough to get the newly designed Boeing 777s as not only the front row has leg rests but all seats in Premium Economy have leg rests. It makes...

The flight between Melbourne and Hong Kong was very comfortable in the wonderful, private pods, which convert in to a flat bed. Flight attendants were very hospitable and pleasant. Food was fabulous, great up to date movies With the flight from Hong Kong to London, after the short stopover, I was feeling tired and mentioned to the flight attendant that...

The Cathay Pacific airline has good service quality consistently, they treat members well, the birthday card they sent is very creative and very personalized, the lounge of CX maintains a high quality of food and drinks, especially the lounges in HK international airport.
The only thing is the current MarcoPolo member award system is points based, no more sectors accumulation...

标题: An amazing flight in Business Class with excellent service+comfort
内容: An exceptionally comfortable flight in Business Class on a wide-bodied Boeing 777-3ER with excellent cabin service, comfort and food selections. The individual pod allows for full bed recline for sleeping, a varied selection of movies and documentaries for viewing and a comfy bedspread/blanket for a warm sleep during the 15hr flight. An on-time departure and early arrival was wonderful. A...

My wife and I decided to book a premium economy flight back to Perth after 3 days of tourising in Europe having our first white Christmas. Because of our exciting time we were having, we actually forgot we had booked premium economy seats. When we went to line up the flight attendant at the gate saw we had premium economy...

Because this was a night flight, a comfortable seat / bed was important.
The comfort level was good. 45 min delay in take off because of a sick passenger.
However this was not the airline s fault.

Had a return flight from London to Vietnam with Cathay Pacific. First time with this airline. Lots of choice from entertainment, food was better than I thought it would be...some other airlines give toothbrushes and toothpaste and other staff for long flights...maybe some more extra would have been nice!

标题: A33 aircraft lets this otherwise great airline down badly.
内容: In comparison to BA, Cathay were dreadful. No ability to pre book seats, even with a child meant no space, we were annoying for other customers and a genuinely uncomfortable flight on an airline that I had heard great things about. Shame

标题: Found the plane to be more spacious than other airlines I have flown with.
内容: I found the experience to be fairly satisfactory. Seemed to be more leg room than other planes. Food was not bad as far as airline food goes.
Nice staff, easy check in, good flight and food, good legroom and in flight movies and snacks during the night

Seat in premium économy very comfortable for a plané ! , Nice touch screen for , films , game sect
Service poor , it appears the cabin crew , not only serve you , but rest of the économy
Cabin !! , Qantus just have a cabin crew , for premium économy , on Cathy Pacific , seems same food...
TV was big. Good movie selections. Food was ok. The plane arrived on time although there was a 4-5 mins delay in taking off. Seats could be more spacious.

Quite comfortable (as far as Economy can be comfortable). There was a bit more space for the legs compared to many other airlines, the service was very friendly and the food was better than average. Hong Kong itself is ideal for a stay-over.

标题: Nice Flight, Comfortable Airplane, Excellent Service on Board
内容:
Flight CX 912 of Cathay Pacific from Manilla to Hong Kong:
The flight CX 912 of Cathay Pacific from Manilla, Philippines [Ninoy Aquino International Airport-(MNL)], to Hong Kong [(HKG)-Hong Kong International Airport), China, on board of an Airbus A 35-9 airplane and on economy class, was very nice, comfortable, safe with a large array of in-flight entertainment possibilities.
The service...

It was a couple of years ago we had flew Cathay Pacific and the experience was not if we had been missing something. The last years we used quite a lot European airlines for the easy connections. Going back Cathay, it totally went down expectations. The service on board was below "used to be", i explain: no travel kit anymore,...

标题: all on board 3 hours in flight food was served lights out no staff next 6 hours
内容: poor service nothing for 6 hours all staff sleeping no wine with food they just wanted to get to sleep morning was rushed delivery for breakfast never again
All transit passenger to Los Angeles are require to past security and thereafter proceed to your boarding gate. Be sure to immediately head to security to avoid delay and miss your transit flight.

标题: Great service and comfort. Miss the wifi on board.
内容: To fly east from hyderabad i feel Cathay is one of the best options. However they can't match the service of Emirates which I feel is far superior. That said, Cathay does have very good service and I have no complaints. The food is good, selection of movies on board is very nice. We do miss the wifi o board...

标题: Excellent flight we flew premium economy comfortable seats good service
内容: Right from the beginning when my husband couldn't figure out the seat configuration on the map he rang them and they were so helpful. And sorted all the seats for all five fights because this was a big adventure for us. The fight itself was so good on boarding we were greeted by a steward. And found our seats with...

Our flight was overnight. While we enjoyed the extra legroom. We would have been better off either using our points or paying for and upgrade to business. As we quickly learnt while travelling premium economy the only real benefit was the extra legroom as everything else was the same as travelling economy, except drinks before takeoff
Good standard of service with attentive crew. Lay flat beds were comfortable and food was OK. Not as good as Korean Air though.

Cathay Pacific always be my first choice of airline. Main reason is because their routes suits myself and provide lots of direct flight to different major cities in the world from HK. For Services, I'd experience most of the classes except First Class. This is my Chinese New Year family trip to travel to Australia( once in every year). Both...

It’s my 2nd time with Cathay, with my first time I was not able to see the difference until this flight. The cabin and everything is just like any other bigger aircraft but Cathay’s jewel lies on their people. Amazing staff, they go beyond your needs, efficiency of each is obvious during meals serving and clean up. They do it...

标题: Very disappointed with the Premium Economy offering
内容: Very mediocre offing by Cathay Pacific with their Premium Economy product. As a start, you DON'T get lounge access, at either end. The seat is bigger than economy but not great. Watch out that your carry on bag is secure while you sleep, my wallet was stolen during the night! Food was OK but a major disappointment was the cold...

标题: Cheapr business class than Qantas and almost as good.
内容: Never flown Cathay before. Was dubious after going to the Melbourne lounge as it was pretty basic . Hong Kong lounge much better. Flights were very smooth and service attentive. Lie flat seat and good choice of entertainment. Meals good choice between asian and western cuisine. Enjoyed it as much as one can a long haul flight.

标题: Always a great airline to flyz
内容: As usual, great service. Easy check in, great food and service. Business lounge terrific As a member of the Marco Polo Club you get extra benefits . It cost me $25 several years ago. - you get notice of all the specials

标题: Australia is a long way from everywhere !!
内容: First time on Cathay , and was happy to find a very clean /fairly new plane , Food was very Good , wine and beer also with a good selection of movies , would fly again .

Third time I have used Cathay Pacific and have been delayed every flight. Flights are fine but on the ground, staff are not very helpful or willing to give out information (that's if you can find Cathay Pacific staff member) and very disorganized when boarding.

This is an over-night flight that departed at 1:35 am and arrived in Hong Kong at 8:am
As usual, CX has a good service and the flight itself was without any problems.
Point to note, when you arrive at the Airport for check in, even if you have done the online check in, expect to queue up for at least...

We fly Cathay Pacific quite often. We find them reliable and efficient. Crew on board always pleasant. We prefer window seats. Food is generally good and a fine selection of wine. They have added a new selection of movies, thank goodness as we had watched almost all of them. Shortly we fly again,this time to San Francisco. No complaints
Crew is great. very good service. Maybe the aircraft i took is a new one (A35), the cabin is new and clean.

Early (6am) arrival in Tokyo but bit late for the 218 cherry blossom season, I headed off to Shinjuku Royal Garden but saved Naka Meguro till dusk so that Cherry blossom could be seen illuminated, magnificent.

I arrived at HKG at midnight by different airline then went to Cathay transfer desk and checked in without needing to pass immigration. I liked it, then i went to departure hall waiting for my flight.
Boarding process was quick and on time. the aircraft was A35. Seat was comfortable enough although back padding seemed to be thin. I can...

When we checked our seating 24 hours before departure, I found that not only had my husband and I been split up, but I had also been allocated a middle seat. I had specifically requested an aisle seat, because I move about a lot to prevent fluid build up. But there I was, sitting in a middle seat between two...

I flew from LHR to Tokyo via Hong Kong.
Both flights pretty comfy. The seats were a reasonable size and gave me pretty good leg room (I'm 5ft11).
The in-flight entertainment was good to. A good selection of films to choose from. If you're curious as to what the airline is showing when you fly. Simply Google it and it'll...

This was the 1st leg of our Europe trip (Hong Kong to Paris). The other 2 sectors flown were Zurich to Hong Kong and then on to Auckland. All 3 sectors were flown in business class. An Airbus 35-9 was flown on the Hong Kong to Paris sector and the Hong Kong to Auckland sector, while a Boeing 777-3 ER...
Nothing special about the flight and service. Very ordinary. Compared to Air New Zealand who are 1/1 Cathy Pacific are just 6.5/1.

标题: Good flight on time no issus
内容:
All goog no issues on time ,pleasant aircraft,our 1st long long haul flight,booked 8 months in advance well looked after
Had a 14 layover in hong kong no issues lugguage transfered across for us,got the free train into main hong kong
Booked direct with them for the convience and was well informed with seating food etc
If we go again...

标题: Comfortable flight in an almost new and quiet aircraft.
内容: Procedures at both Manchester and Hong Kong airports trouble free although plenty of staff on hand should we have required assistance. Booking in no problem - pleasant and attentive airline staff. Boarding aircraft, an Airbus 35, relatively quick. Economy seats were comfortable enough and leg room adequate (i am 5ft 1in) with enough room to stretch my legs out with...

This was my first experience of Cathhay Pacific. Before I went I was impressed I could order a low calorie meal for both legs of my journey at no extra cost. However, on both parts they did not have my meal nor any record. On the first leg to Hong Kong we had to keep asking for drinks (water etc.)....

We flew to Hong Kong - great flight, food wonderful and special diets perfect. Leg room not too bad. Staff friendly and professional. All on time. Movies not the latest but new enough for entertainment

The pastry was still served on plane when I's expecting a meal box of Taiwanese minced pork with rice. My friends told me that proper meals are served for lunch or dinner. Then why didn't they give me an omelette. Afterall, I didn't have a choice.

Flight to Shanghai from Brisbane Australia meant changing in Hong Kong to Shanghai, Cathay Pacific to Hong Kong great as usual then Dragon airlines to Shanghai also most comfortable.
Having travelled with Dragon airlines before I had no doubt of the China travel.

We flew via Hong Kong Airport with Cathay Pacific. First leg of flight was ok but nothing special, staff were fine. Hong Kong Airport was a nightmare, the transfer was not smooth as you have your hand baggage checked even though you are within the confines of the airport. It is not clear which items they want out for checking,...

We were able to check in at Kowloon railway station all the way to the Isle of Man even though the Cathay pacific flight stopped at Manchester. We were treated royally by the cabin crew and the flight was on time. The extras given on board were in keeping with any other business class flight I have been with with...
Seats much more comfortable than BA - friendly service from the staff. The in flight entertainment was good - a huge variety of films. Would fly with them again

A long flight is tiring especially if you’re cramped in economy seats but fortunately the seats are spacious and has enough leg room. The flight attendants are friendly and accommodating. They offer numerous flights to choose from that would suit to one’s schedule and budget.
