Excelantflight plety to eat lots of snacks the flight crew and stewardess and stewards were very. Good it took 11,45min to Hong Kong and 2,45 to Cebu both with Cathy Pacific both excellent .

标题: Seamless way to beat Jet lag
内容: Beats arriving morning rush and decent rest can be had,Arrival time though late means clearance from Customs etc seamless
Great service and always nice to fly with Cathay. Even managed to change my day of traveling as a late minute request....so big thanks to Cathay.
Cathy Pacific is one of my favourite airline. Its ASIAN food quality makes it better than other China bound airlines for me. The staffs are very cooperative and careful about on-board passengers.

Another long haul to OZ via Hong Kong was a bit daunting after our previous experience with Emirates. What very pleasant flights we had in comparison.
The seats were fabulously comfortable with roomy with space to stretch out.
The entertainment channels all worked as they should with lots of choice (not so on Emirates}.
The crew were always friendly &...

I'd booked through 'flight centre' and Cathay Pacific have a good reputation and aren't as expensive as many airlines. I can only afford economy and didn't expect luxury. Leg room is always going to be a bit of an issue but, overall, I had no problem and found the service, entertainment and meals quite o.k.
All airlines would have much...

I have used Cathay since the 198s and am always pleased with the service, from booking online to arriving at my destination.
Check in, cockpit and cabin staff always helpfull and efficient.
When I have had to make any changes on the phone, my requirements have always been dealt with quickly and in a very satisfactory manner.
I always tell...

标题: Very comfortable, good service, good night’s sleep
内容: Cathay’s Business Class seat has plenty of space and turns into a very comfortable flat bed which provides a good night’s sleep. Although I have a BA gold card I always choose Cathay to Hong Kong. There is more space and the bed is more comfortable. Cathay Business Class is more like BA First than it is like Club World...and...

Cathay’s Business Class on the new A35-9 is even better than the seats on their slightly older planes. Tech improvements include a wide screen TV, the ability to watch live satellite TV and reasonably priced Wi-Fi. Service, food and drink was to the usual Cathay high standards.

Best in class service compared with all flight services. You can either do web check-in or choose your seats in the Airport, Ground staffs are so kindful to help elders and value their customers.
And the food can be chosen at any time. But the only thing is Vegetarian will suffer a bit for their Foods.
The plane was a bit tired but the service was ok. Unlike BA, the entertainment package and food was quite good ! Let's face it, long flights are hardly a pleasure, but this was acceptable.

Just recently flew this route and experienced genuine hospitality which is rare these days. Everyone was not only smiling and friendly but informative. The only thing I wish they did better was clean the toilets from time to time. The rest of the service was sincere and efficient which is what you want in business class.

Cathay Pacific remains a good standard of their service. The food is ok and vegetarian could try to request/exchange their meals with Instant noodle if it is available. The entertainment system is good too.

This was right up there, as the best flying experience I have had between Melbourne and Nagoya. Cathay Pacific stop in Hong Kong, which is very good to get out, and walk/stretch your legs, other than that Cathay were, and offer the very best in business class service =D

标题: Good quality and value for money
内容: Great value for money for a direct flight from Manchester to Hong Kong. Plenty of legroom, food was good and staff was lovely. Journey was good experience.

It is great that CX now serve Scandinavia. I will use this route often, as I live in Norway. The new route is served by the new Airbus 35-9, a great aircraft. The only issue I will mention is the lounge in Copenhagen Airport. The use 'Eventyr' lounge (Dansih for 'Fairytale'). This lounge is big but most seats are not...

The leg room was very narrow compared to the economy class of another flight. Experienced super terrible turbulence during 2/3 flight. Almost everyone in the plane was screaming and couldn’t sleep at all. The wine got spit out to my legs as well. Not worth the price and the experience was terrible.

标题: UK to Oz via Hong Kong
内容:
Check in was simple and very efficient as was the boarding procedure.
Both flights were long (approx. 12 hrs each) but we well looked after by the cabin crew.

Uneventful which is often a good thing when travelling to China, and the flight was actually on-time, which was a pleasant surprise. The flight crew was professional and the pilot was pleasant in the cockpit.
If you have access to the lounge at HKIA, good as usual.

标题: A good choice for long haul
内容: Comfortable starting, plenty of space, good food and first class service. They made the 15 hour flight tolerable.
标签: International' 'First Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

标题: not at all impressed, staff not very engaging, very average experience
内容: horrible way to line up in Hong Kong and UK complete segregation one line business one line first class , one line premium economy, one line economy. poor economy left till last , very unpleasant.food very average, bottle water just dumped on seat before start of flight. staff not really helpful. morning bread one flight uneatable as microwaved to much.

New aircraft, reasonable seat pitch, excellent inflight entertainment. Check-in was quick and easy, the inflight service was pretty good as well, and to top it all the flights were reasonably priced, what's not to like!

We use to fly Cathay when we were younger but I've flown with them recently as we wanted a more direct route and I can honestly say, they have not changed in their phenomenal service.
Economy provides great comfort compared to some other available companies and their flight attendants are always giving a high level of treatment.
we fly with Cathay Pacific many times, almost once a year. The service is good. the Food and beverages are excellent. Entertainment is interesting with plenty new movies

标题: Services are getting worse than past
内容: Meal is bad as usual, but no more movie, Crews said because the flight was too short, no movie is provided........

Flew with Cathay Pacific to Hong Kong for a business trip I had in Shenzhen just over the Chinese Border. The flight was comfortable enough, a night flight over as per usual with Chinese flights. Not much sleep involved but felt absolutely fine when I landed and not overly tired. The breakfast was really nice, one of the best I've...

This is my first experience with Cathay Pacific and it was great. The seat was comfortable and I really appreciate the option to choose type of meal before flight.
Things that exceed my expectation was they gave me a complimentary Big Bus Tour in Hong Kong and it was wonderful.

标题: Shortest possible flight from London to Cairns
内容: Some of this fleet is getting a bit tired and can’t really compete with Emirates etc. However, I want to get from London to Cairns and they manage this with one stop in Hong Kong- which is a great airport. 23 hours to the other side of the world works for me! If you are flexible with dates and put...

标题: airline grades you in different class, quite discriminative
内容: The airline boarded people from first class and Marco Polo club, sapphire & Ruby and premium economy long before they board economy passengers. Once on board they serve bottled water to to all other classes passengers but only water from the tank to passenger in economy. My wife and I(Chinese origin) had stomach upset and asked for bottled water but...

Such a long journey but was made comfortable at all times. TVs on back of chairs and pillows/blankets available. 2 meals per flight and just very impressed with the service! They try to minimise jetlag also.
Would definitely recommend.

标题: Good service and pleasant cabin crew.
内容: Good flight, very attentive cabin crew, took off on time and landed 3mins early although aircraft had to be parked away from the terminal and buses used. Good amenities on A35 plane.

Services very efficient from boarding to disembarking. Staff very professionnal.
We had a problem with the video on board service on the return way. The manager solved it very well.

Very good from start to finish. The lounge at Heathrow was very comfortable with choice of food and drink.
The seating area was good, comfortable and the seats went to a flat bed to sleep, although if you are tall as my husband is, he could do stretch out completely
The food was very good, a lot of choice and...

Though I have traveled with British Airways, Jet Airways, Finn air but I must call out that the hospitality of Cathay Pacific's crew is outstanding. Polite in approach, helpful & served drinks without any if's & but's.
The cleanliness of their fleet is another factor which is an add on. Keep up the good work.

标题: The best business class service airline.
内容:
My best flying experience between Hong Kong and Paris.
Cathay Pacific offers on board, the very best in business class service.

- Cathay Pacific flying quality was certainly good as expected.
- Put bound flight till Hong Kong was packed, I felt legroom was fine for me.
- Food wise, unless you eat everything like me, you’ll be fine. Otherwise, please check the Menu in advance if you can.
- Plane was certainly better when flying from Hong Kong to Brisbane....

The best leg of the flights (also CX113 - HKG/LHR) was from AKL to HKG as it was one of Cathay’s more modern aircraft (A35). This is due in the main because it is a lot quieter (air/engine noise) than the 2nd leg (Boeing 777) older aircraft. It will certainly be a good move when the 777’s are replaced. This...
Very comfortable, smooth flight, food great, lovely Crew and the onboard Movie selection really good.

标题: SO helpful check in staff ensured we had a free seat between us to spread out
内容: Helpful staff, free seat between us so allowed to spread out and be SO comfortable. Cabin Staff really approachable and ever present. Food very good with excellent choices.

Excellent flight and service, only complaint was that this was a day flight from Cairns to Hong Kong and the cabin crew made everyone pull down their blinds to let passengers sleep!!!! I don't understand this on a day flight. My wife could not see any of the many Islands we flew over on route.

took Cathay Pacific for a short business travel to China.
the flight was a connection flight via Hong Kong,
For an economy class level service was very good and seats were rather specious. staff was friendly.
the flight itself was smooth with no delays on the way there (some delays on the way back due to bad weather in Shanghai...

I have been travelling by air since 1964. On 2 May I flew on the CX A35 flight to Singapore.
The overall service and attention was EXCEPTIONAL. From check in to luggage collection on arrival.
I was greeted and addressed by name by the flight manager who took my drink and lunch order on her ipad and withing 3 minutes...
Appears to have more all round room than most than most, excellent entertainment and meals, would definitely recommend.

Booking in was courteous and speedy. This was my first direct flight to Hong Kong. There was much more leg room on this flight than is usually available in economy All other in flight services were as normal in long flights.

the flights are on time. services are good and professional with kind air hostesses.
foods are good. comfortable seat,clean environment.
overall a sastisfactory flight as usual.

Im 6ft4 and ive never felt so comfortable throughout a flight.Leg room and quality of service like ive never come across with any other airlines and ive travelled with at least 5 other airlines over 8yrs. My number one company.
Great service as always. Looking forward to when they swop the B777 for state of the art A35s later in the year.
Really happy with Cathay Pacific, staff were friendly and helpful. Flying never fun but the Premium Economy seats were well worth it
Good flight, excellent service with good food. Evening flight leaving within a few minutes of due departure time and arriving more or less on time.

They really have 5 star service to economic passenger that make us feel comfortable especially for muslim traveller like us. I have a very first international flight with my husband and we both are muslim but we doesn't need to worry about meals on board because they have special menu for muslim.
The flight attendants were very friendly. They always...

标题: Timing and Connections - Excellent between Singapore and Tel Aviv (Israel)
内容: Cathay Pacific flights between Singapore and Israel via Hong Kong is a real blessing... The timing was perfect and the transit was not stressful. And I felt very comfortable.

Could not of asked for better service, a cleaner plane or comfier seat.
On my first trip to Australia, on my own, flying with Cathay Pacific-made the start of my holiday. Staff very attentive, food was amazing.

标题: Perfect flight Amsterdam Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific
内容:
We flew from Amsterdam to Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific.
The flight has been perfectly on time.
On board everything was perfect.
Seats are not really spacious but I'm not too tall so for me was more than enough.
We had a real big choice about music (a lot of type of music and also a lot of albums -...

Flew on their economy class. Flight was full due to the Labour Day Long weekends. There’s a delay of near to 1 hour when going to BKK due to technical glitch and they need to get it repair. When coming back we were informed that our seats TV is not functioning, how can this be happening? This is not Budget...

标题: Safety is always our 1st priority - By Cathay Pacific
内容:
Cathay flight always give us the confident as being one of the safest airline in the world, regardless of which destination, I sure will choose Cathay as by first choice. However, our decision will also affect by our budget, and number of hops to get to our destination.
As regards to Cathay, they always provide their best service to their...

标题: We flew on the new airbus 35
内容: We were very lucky we managed to get seats 4HJ bulkhead in front of us. Giving us a bit more space than the people behind us. We had a child from hell behind us kicking the seat and banging the table hitting the touch screen. This continued throughout the flight. The entertainment system was difficult to understand and navigate around...

Overall my expectations did not match the reality, as I though cathay pacific is one of the best airlines in Asia. To start with, the seat was bad, I think its a below average business class seat nowadays, especially for the long flight (+5h). The service both in lounge and on the planes was awful. During my flight we had...

We thoroughly enjoyed this flight due to the excellent service, the comfortable, fully horizontal seats allowing some hours of sleep and the high quality food. Our only stop was Hong Kong and fortunately this was only a short stop. There was a good selection of movies also.

Great company. Highly recommended ?
Plenty of space on the plane relatively to economy
Good service
Great in flight entertainment
Good price

Flying with Cathay Pacific has been one of my wonderful life experiences and it's because of the service that you get from this airline even before you take off from the ground. I have been a Marco Polo Member for quite some time now and I have no regrets whatsoever that I have chosen Cathay Pacific as my airline of...
Nice service. Good entertainment on plane. The food was good too. Just prepare for the transit time.
Good food, good service. Great entertainment system, comfortable seats and flight. Great for long flights! Very attentive staff and well trained.

We flew with Cathay Pacific for the 1st time. Leg room on the plane was better than other airlines we have used.
The crew were very helpful and worked very hard , nothing was too much trouble they were always doing something for the passengers. There was also plenty of food and drinks.

It was my first time flying with Cathay Pacific. Crew was friendly, food was good. Seats are spacious. However during my flight going back from Hong Kong to Jakarta (transit from Taiwan) I requested a drink from the crew, but maybe they were busy so until arrival time, it did not get to me. But apart from that everything else...

标题: Excellent quality of service but not so premium seat feel in business class
内容:
No doubt Cathay Pacific is in the top 1 airlines in world. But we were not very happy with the seat quality. The fabric was old & shady.
The service of cabin crew was very good, but that didn't make up for the overall feel.
The boarding process was haywire , even when coming back since we had a changeover...

Staff were excellent. Had problem with seat going to bed, which was annoying. Staff finally fixed it but meant could not sit up in seat as chair until they fixed it for landing. Would have been good to have been offered food when awake at night. Seems to have to know the ropes to summon stewards to get snacks.

标题: Great to fly from Asia to West Coast USA
内容: Enjoyed the flight very much. Good service, meals and entertainment on board. Did not feel the effects of a long-haul flight compared to flying through the Middle East countries to US. Seats were comfortable but I guess it's great, the plane was full both ways to and return.

On my recent trip to Bangkok, CX upgraded me to business class upon checking in. This was my first time flying business. The cabin crew were as friendly as they were to economy class passengers. The extra service of pre meal drink and good selection of inflight food was great. Of course, the seat is much more roomy and comfortable...

We travelled to Taipei on CX494/18May, before boarding the flight, we spent half an hour taking some breakfast inside the business lounge. I found the food quality has been improved and the services were also delivered appropriately. I asked and was told that CX is taking back the handing by themselves and not by the service provider anymore, which is...

标题: Flight Cathay Pacific is good and comes in budget
内容:
Nice Crew Service and flight sits are also very comfortable.
And Indian Hindu Non-Veg meal is good for Indian.
But before getting down from the flight, recommend to you to please check your belongings. Because after you come out from the flight it is a little bit difficult to get the stuff for the same.

I am a large guy @ 6 foot and 115Kg, during the 8.5 hour trip I had no issues. To me an aeroplane is a mode of transport, if it gets me A to B with reasonable comfort and a goody price that will work for me!

I looked forward to dining with chef prepared meals. But their in flight meals are now downgraded. No more veggie portion in the food canister. And just a choice of pasta or meat with rice. The dinner rolls aren't fresh, it's hard and barely warm. And contrary to the hotline's representation, breakfast was not served on the mnl-hkg route. Just...

Cathay Pacific made the 23 hour flight from London to Sydney bearable (Hong Kong stop in between). On the second leg of my flight, from Hong Kong to Sydney, I got a free upgrade to premium economy, which was one of the most exciting things to ever happen to me on a plane. The food was so much better, the...
Very good flight service. Seating in b class excellent and cabin very well looked after eg food and service.

The flight from Hong Kong to Rome was delayed as it was waiting for another plane to land with some passengers who were supposed to be on our flight. We left 2 hours late and arrived too late for our connecting flight. Cathay Pacific told us there wsss nothing they could do to help as our next flight was not...

标题: Best Economical Flight with International Standards
内容: I was searching for affordable flights to being my wife and 4 year old daughter to Beijing from Hyderabad (India). I had traveled by Cathay previously on several business trips and when I checked the ticket fare, it was inexpensive and I am aware of the quality and standards this airlines maintain. I booked an economy class ticket and they...

标题: Indeed a life well travelled with Cathay Pacific
内容: I booked a one-way flight with Cathay Pacific on my very first vacation at work. It costs me around USD$ 25 from DXB to MNL via HKG CX746/935. It was time to go for vacation and when i reached the airport i proceed to the CX Counter for checked-In, I asked the guy if the flight is full, and yes...

标题: Disappointment on my way to thailand
内容: though the agent tried his best to check my bags to my final destination in Thailand, his attempt was in vein. In fact his effort resulted in a horrific experience when I tried to board my flight from Bangkok to Khon Kaen. Because there was no alliance between Cathay Pacific and Thai Smile Airway I had to retrace, by an...
Good flight and love the entertainment which is all touch screen. Food wise was acceptable and the cutlery are all in plastic which are more economical too.

标题: Cathay Pacific provide excellent supporting for delay fight.
内容:
Our flight schedule departure on 15:, however the flight is delay due to urgent repair, during this period they provide cash coupon for drink & snack.
On 19: they announce the fight will delay to 7: next morning. They arrange hotel, transport and cash for dinner. All the passengers are satisfy their arrangement.
I will choose this airline for our...
Good Service in general... no complaints on service etc. But the planes have become old & it shows..

I found our Cathay Pacific flight to be better than I thought. Although we were right down the back in "cattle class" we had no real complaints.
Unlike Scoot where there were no creature comforts (note there is a price difference) we had our little blankets and pillows, drinks and meals provided with our movie/av selection in the head rest...

I had a pleasurable time during the whole flight! I traveled with my 6 year old girl and I had nothing to worry about because all our needs were met. Good in-flight entertainment, food was tasty and temperature was just right. We were comfortable! Airline crew were accommodating and service was really good. My favorite airline to date!

We had supported Cathay Pacific because of their support for NZ's Thoroughbred industry. However none of our three flights lived up to expectations. For health reasons we flew Business Class. None of the flights had comfortable seating and on the return from Hong Kong to Auckland the passenger alongside me told me they called the seats 'flying coffins'. I think...

Excellent service,big meals ,choice of three mains and two for breakfast ,service excellent , comfortable seats with large range of entertainment options,smooth flight landed earlier than expected,would recommend to anyone

标题: Shower in Hong Kong lounge is very refreshing
内容: A Very relaxing experience it’s the only way I will fly this route in future , the equidistant break makes this long flight almost bearable.

What an enjoyable 2 flights with Cathay Pacific. We had not flown with them for a number of years but ha enjoyed previous flights. From the boardings to the final departures these were very enjoyable,flights. The best part was the wonderful attentive service from the staff. Such great staff are now hard to find on some airlines (e.g. Emirates) but...

标题: A late start escalated into a fiasco
内容: As an aviation enthusiast, I was looking forward to our flight in a new A35. "A technical problem" of unspecified nature delayed our departure by four hours, resulting in mindless milling about an airport lounge and a second pass through dreaded security (by law!) We also had issues with our not-unreasonable choice of food on the flight, but that's another...

I had sprained my ankle during my holiday and requested wheelchair assistance at Hong Kong (in transit) and Heathrow. As soon as I boarded in Hanoi, the stewardess identified that I had requested the assistance, and from then on it was really good service. The captain even came to apologise for the delay getting the wheelchair, which was due to...

Check in was smooth and quick in priority lane as my husband is disabled. But experienced discomfort in my lower back for most of the journey. Food was rather light for a 12 hour journey, I was hungry for long periods of time. Having said that I could have got a snack anytime but forgot about that service.

标题: Good service by Cabin Crew, Cutting-edge Facility
内容: This flight shows a significant improvement of the airline. The cutting-edge aircraft did provide a quieter cabin, yet the change is not that significant as boasted by Airbus. However, A35 in Cathay Pacific shows a wider length between rows compared to B77W, so that tall people can also feel the comfort. The inflight entertainment provides an effective touchscreen and a...
Great flight good service and a real pleasure. Will use van whenever flying. Cathay pacific a great airline and food was also well prepared

very helpful staff let you more easy and effective way for finishing this procedure. its a twelve hours flight but I spend over eight hours sleeping right after the dinner, and have a breakfast before landing.

It is always a pleasure to fly with Cathay, in any class. I relax best at 33 k feet - movies, food, sleep, friendliest crew. I always know the flight will get me safely home or to my destination. And the most recent flight from Paris to Hongkong, CX 26 on May 1st stands out as one of the best....

We fly with Cathay regularly and usually enjoy the experience. This time however we had not even left Adelaide when they told us the plane was delayed due to a mechanical fault which was good as I would rather have a fault on the ground then in the air. The staff in Adelaide were great handing out water and snacks...

标题: Cathay has to improve in flight services if it wants to match SIA and others
内容:
I had a SIA cabin crew sitting next to me. She observed and commented that the service of the cabin crew is wrong and rude.
I had reported this incident to Cathay including my nasty experience with CX ground staff
Cathy Liu. She was rude and very defensive towards her crew without first establishing the full facts.
Regretable,
Peter Quek...

标题: Perth to Hong Kong for some business.
内容:
Have flown this route a number of times and Cathay do a great job, generally no delays
and the service is always of a High standard.

We were shocked when the airline didn’t call for passengers to board with people with children and those needing assistance first Rather the Asian passengers lined up 2 mins before boarding and just flooded the plane Huge carryon bags all very messy and disorganised

A good flight. A big selection of recent release movie helpful cabin staff great food and a good selection from the menu
much better than the Australian carrier
Great flight but it would be good to know ahead of time if the ticket purchased is upgradable via points or not. Cathay is fantastic...
I travelled with this flight and experience was avarage. Seats are not so comfertable compared to other popular flights.staff was friendly, food was ok. Overall experience avarage.
Flight was good and Check in was easy. Good leg room and great baggage allowance. Only bad point was they ran out of food options early on.

Great flight. On time, excellent flight attendant who couldn’t do enough for the passengers. Food so so - Captain who kept us informed and brought us in 1 mins early.
Super clean plane - bathrooms etc. pretty comfortable seats with adequate legroom. The button to incline the seat was pretty stiff and needed quite a lot of effort ( both...

Last minute need to go to UK, first time on Cathay via HK. Business class seat was ok- the whole cubicle looked a touch tired. Service and food also ok - but not quite Qantas on both levels.
Transitting HK was interesting: if I recall 5 options for lounges? Somewhat confusing but asked an airport info chap which one was...

标题: Good connection from Bangkok to Singapore
内容: good price /quality relationship with enough space for a 2 hours flight. Normal economy service, but ok.

标题: A pleasant experience but not outstanding
内容:
Another flight - unremarkable. Food average, service average, flat beds average.
Bit disappointed as we had heard Cathay was outstanding.

We flew out at 1pm so as not to lose a whole day in the air. The service was good but the seats are the hardest I've ever sat in on a plane which made it extremely difficult to go to sleep. The staff were friendly and courteous to any requests and the meals were definitely edible. I would fly...
I have flown Cathay a number of times and they are now my preferred airline. Efficient, on time, helpful staff. Good service

标题: Been upgraded twice to business class!
内容: I flew premium economy and had a stop over in Hong Kong. Whilst in HK I have to change plane to Cebu, whislt on this trip I have been upgraded to business class to much to my delight. And when i went back to Melbourne same thing happen. I had a stop over at HK and this time whilst I'm...

I fly this route several times a years. Cathy Pacific has never failed to provide outstanding service, even to those of us in economy. This stands in marked contrast to British Airlines that flies the same route.

标题: Disappointing on my maiden voyage with Cathay Pacific
内容: Off to a poor start when the Brisbane flight was delayed by 7 hours which meant that we had a 1 hour wait at Hong Kong for a connecting flight. CP did however allow us to utilise their lounge for the waiting period. The onward flight to London CX255 was an older plane and the seats were uncomfortable culminating in...

We have been using Cathay Pacific in almost all our flights (long and short hauls). The short haul (manila to hongkong) is a bit tight, however, the Hongkong to Madrid portion is comfortable. The food (Manila to hingkong) is not acceptable (bring back the regular hot dishes please). However, the long haul portion is generous with 2- 3 dishes to...

Everything that one expects in Business class
Comfort, flat bed, good TV options, delicious food and good service
No more to say
Just do it!

标题: One of the best airlines in the world
内容: Over the last years I flew in all classes mostly China/Hongkong/Taiwan/Thailand. For me as a very frequent traveller Cathay is one of the best airlines I ever choose. Stuff, airplane, longes (if I travel for business - specially "The Bridge" in Hongkong) and cleanliness are very good and I always felt welcome and as a guest. I try to fly...

标题: Amazing Flight to Australia via Hong Kong
内容:
First time traveling with CP and really impressed with the overall service from the Lounge at Heathrow to the inflight service and the wonderful business class cabins best we have ever had.
Staff very professional and nothing was a bother throughout the whole flight

Cathay Pacific airlines are very consistent when it comes to service and comfort. The cabin crews are well trained and know how to anticipate the needs of passengers before it happens. I have flown with CP many times and never had reason to complain.
Best flight from Cairns to Vancouver with good connection in Hong Kong & not via Brisbane or Sydney - Check out theirv low season fares

Reasonably priced, as all economy leg room is not so big. Food was ok, as far as airlines go. A bit turbulent in places, so for safety sake no hot drinks. Entertainment pretty good. Flight attendants were helpful and attentive to all. WiFi access, one plug between three.
You are able to check in on line, which is a bonus.

We travelled with Cathay Perth AU to Toronto CA via Hong Kong. The service was good , I requested mobility assistance due to a leg fracture & the staff were very helpful. The transition through HK airport was easy though allow plenty of time between flights to get between the arrival & departure gates. Each sector was on time &...

标题: Fly Cathay for service with a smile
内容: Now I know we flew Business Class, but I noticed that the service was the same down the back. The service was excellent and I always remember my father saying that their service was great years ago. The food and wines were wonderful and the wine just kept flowing. Now I am not one to turn down a drink but...

Great flight from Melbourne via Hong Kong to Osaka. This plane was new, and had great feature of being able to connect to the internet mid air for most of the flight. Huge entertainment screen. Food was excellent. I got seats in exit rows for free on every leg.- which normally costs an extra $5 each leg on Singapore airlines....
Great customer service, excellent leg room, great food! I guess Haagen Daaz ice cream is now a staple in all Cathay Pacific flights a we were given each on every flight.

It is a long flight, over 12 hours but over 13 due to delay leaving Paris. The staff were most obliging, cheerful and friendly. In fact best ever! The captain thanked the staff for their hard work (first time I have ever heard that). The only complaint I would have is the entertainment - but that is probably because I...

Flew with this airline and had a great trip. Even arrived early. Efficient boarding and seating. Good seats, even tho economy. Food was fine...for airline food! Toilets were clean and enough so no waiting if you needed them. The onboard entertainment was great, especially if you have kids. I would fly with them again.

Most of the crew were very polite
Cantonese is the main language of HK, when speaking to some crew, they kept answering back in English but without a simple explanation that they may not able to speak??? Shock of basic manner.
Service is good but you've the feeling that the crew kept running around during all the flight.
In-flight entertainment...
We flew on the newA35 was superb food yummy in inflight entertainment great and toilets very good highly recommended if you are flying with them

We usually fly Qantas, but decided to try Cathay Pacific and make use of the stopover in Hong Kong on the return leg. The seating is identical to Qantas but there the similarity ends. The food was the same as economy, the red wine selection all 217 vintage and not of great stature and the service impersonal, but efficient. The...

标题: Good but could be better still
内容: A good airline, but the staff being a bit more attentive would make this much better throughout. Onboard food was good

标题: Would try another airline next time
内容: We made a poor choice in travelling to Japan with Cathay Pacific because the long stop over in Hong Kong made the journey too long and boring. The flight was crowed, service was slow, the crew seemed too busy to care about good service and the seating was cramped and uncomfortable. The meals were typical airline food, bland and tasteless...

标题: Good well priced long haul service
内容: First part of a two part journey to the UK with Cathay. Check-in was straightforward with advice to carry on a bag or we'd be over the limit (we = she!). Vouchers issued for the lounge and off to customs we went. A very comfy and spacious lounge (the AirNZ new one in Auckland) with good food & beverages selection....

We recently flew from Manchester to Hong Kong then on to Melbourne after a few days in Hong Kong. We flew back from Cairns to Manchester with a layover of 4 hours in Hong Kong. It was a very good flight with plenty of food and drinks service throughout the flight. Attendants were visible and pleasant. Our smaller cabin was...

标题: Intense Sevice to detail Air travels
内容: Flew Johannesburg to Hong Kong onto Bali Awesome Schedule on time Clean planes good professional intense and friendly service , ok food could improve!! big up in comparable to other airlines out there.Well done Would fly same Airline again,for a great traveling experience..

Amazing noodles, you can have as much as you like. Its doll bowl noodles. I think it was the first time I experienced how proper ramen should taste. The cabin crew is so effiecent really wonderful, airline. Oh and eat ice cream. Lots of ice cream. :)
Professional crew, well planned meal service. A35 with orgonomic seats. B777 with standard layout. Nothing bad to say

标题: Enjoyable but lacks the special edge
内容:
Pleasant flight from London to Hongkong, Hongkong to Brisbane . Class - Business .
Our flight was slightly disappointing, staff from Hongkong to Brisbane were indifferent and our overall opinion was that Cathay Pacific didn’t feel on top of its game , snacks available were limited and poor . Food served was average . The competion is closing in. The...

标题: in group tickets you cannot select sit. very poor service !!!!
内容:
disappointed from the rigidity of the company and taking advantage over those who traveling in groups.
in group tickets you cannot select sit, nor check-in from home. very poor service !!!!
dirty toilets in 2 flights !!!
The services were very good contrary to some comments of my colleagues. I enjoyed the experience flying with Cathay Pacific. I will choose it again in my next trip.

标题: How can I comment as I was asleep on a J Class bed.
内容: As Cathay’s flights MEL-HKG-CDG and return are all overnight, a couple of Tamazapan and I’m out like a light for virtually the entire trip/s. A good feed at the Lounge before departure, stay off the booze/grog as it dehydrates and Bobs-your-uncle. Bliss. My Australian Target $15. pillow compresses nicely into my carry-on; it’s better than the supplied cushion. Herringbone seating...

Having flew with Cathay before I was happy to book again. My 16 yr old daughter and flew to Brisbane via Hong Kong, flight out was more than acceptable , enjoyable, albeit chinese designed food, which I like, caring cabin crew and generous beverages, a good stop over, we managed to get into a lounge, we ate and slept for...

We travelled in Premium Economy on all our flights from Australia to Europe and return. The supposed preferential boarding was a bit of a joke. We had to line up with the economy class and while we got on before them, we were not treated terribly differently. We were given drinks as we were sitting in our seats but they...

Always fly with Cathay from London to the Far East including Australia.
Always new planes, great service, snacks on hand, nice staff.
I fly for a long time with Cathay Pacific, and I must say they have a great product. In Hong Kong there lounge is fantastic and the service is top. Love the attending staff aboard the aircraft !

标题: Couldnt possibly be better customer service
内容:
This was a trip booked in short notice due to a family bereavement.
I booked through a third party but then spoke to Cathay Customer Service. Seat Reservations and Special Requirements for a young child couldn't possible have been easier
The connecting flight in Amsterdam was missed (our fault) and Cathay Customer service again couldn't have been more helpful, flights...

标题: Well its okay but i could be better
内容:
Since we brought a 4yo, then i choose this airlines because its transit in HK so my son wont be bored for long flight (unlike direct flight) its like half of the journey.
Our flight from and to jakarta had delayed for 3 minutes but its okay.
Check in staffs are great. Stewardess are ok but could be better.
Food...

标题: No problems to The Netherlands and back
内容:
A good flight both over and back. Short stop over in Hong Kong (About 3 Hours) made for an easy no rush change over.
NOTE: Cathay contacted us about a month prior to our flight telling us that our flight over had been changed to an 8 hour stopover. We complained, and they changed our flight to another that once...

This was one of four flights that I took with Cathay Pacific this month but it was typical of all of them. The planes were tired old Boeing 777s with uncomfortable seats and limited in flight entertainment. The planes were noisy too. I flew with this airline earlier this year on what looked like brand new Airbus 35-9s and A321s...
Excellent staff and service on the ground and in the air, had a stop in Hong Kong, spent a few hours layover in the club

标题: First Class desk at Transfer desk of Hong Kong airport needs some training!
内容: Due to a typo in my electronic visa for Australia, there was a problem and the system could not issue my boarding pass. In Seoul I was told it has to be dealt with in transit in Hong Kong. The booking was made with Korean Air but the second leg of this itinerary was code-shared with Cathay Pacific (CP). I...

This was a normal flight, there was a slight delay in boarding but nothing dramatic.
Just a relaxed normal flight. Nothing dramatic. Sometimes you want just that!

标题: On time- good food and service
内容:
This was a relatively comfortable flight- with a good choice of entertainment to choose from.
The food was also very good- I had pre ordered a vegetarian meal and they were surprisingly tasty.
The seats also were OK with a goo incline- helping one to sleep in some comfort.
The crew were very helpful and friendly.
Their regional business class is very comfortable for this relatively short flight. I just wish one could fly out of Macau airport with them instead of catching the ferry to HK airport

This was a 5 star trip with a lot of things that impressed us and made us feel comfortable, cared for, and good on the long flight overseas.
What we liked:
*the seats in economy are comfortable, with more leg room than average, great tray options and cup holders, and the recline is further than other airlines.
*staff are friendly...

The check-in and boarding process was smooth. Service was quick but the crew could cater more to specific requests. The crew seemed to be in a hurry to complete their duties soon. The in-flight entertainment had a good variety including Indian films. Flight was on time. The reclining seats were very comfortable. The baggage also arrived on time.

The check-in and boarding process was smooth. The in-flight service and food was good. The in-flight entertainment had a good variety including Indian films. Flight was delayed by about 4 minutes for take-off but some time was made up during the flight. The reclining seats were very comfortable.

Our flight was very good because the seats were comfy and the people were very friendly in aisa not so much in America and the food in America was ok and the food in all was not so great but other than that we had a great trip.

Our trip to Bangkok had a nice start on Cathay Pacific. We met some of the most courteous and helpful crew on flight. However the seat is a total nightmare. Legroom is small and space is almost nonexistent. I bet many people will be scared away by the cramped seats.

We flew first to HK and a second flight from there to New York with Cathay. Both flights were smooth and full planes. Service was fine, food choices good for both Asian and western food. Second flight left us hungry as a meal served soon after boarding and nothing else substantial for the rest of the flight. Snacks were put...

标题: Back to studies in Wenzhou medical university
内容: It’s a cheap and luxury flight for students to go back home,and Cathay Pacific gives students offer?

Vin and Mrs Merlot arrived in Hong Kong from New York to be advised of aircraft change and therefore seat change for HKG to Seoul.
Not bothered until we understood that new regional 777 version had a business seat configuration of 2-3-2. You guessed it we had been changed to the 3 sears with Mrs Merlot in the middle. Vin...

标题: Depends on the on board crew!
内容: This flight was from JFk via Vancouver to Hong Kong with a 2 hour stop over in Vancouver but if your travelling through to HK you are not allowed off the plane. This was not explained in booking arrangements or ticketing but was explained at the airport check in. Vin and Mrs Merlot and most other people would describe this...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Flight to London via Hong Kong
内容: We stopped over at Hong Kong airport and after boarding our aircraft bound for London we were left on the tarmac for 3 hours before the pilot informed us that we would have to disembark and that no flight was available for 9 hours. We were given 3$ each for food and we had to have our connecting flight to...
from check in to the food and flight entertainment,its always a seamless travel experience with cathay pacific

The trip was good. The total time was about 19 hours. Flew to Hing Kong - 16 hours and then 1 hour plus to Manila. The flight had enough leg room. The food was average to below average. The important thing is that it gets you to your destination in the quickest time possible.

It was our first trip with Cathay Pacific and definitely not the last. Right in time, no Problems at the stop in Hong Kong, good service, for an airplane really good Food and enough space for everybody. Great!!

First time flying Cathay pacific and not the last definitely better experience than other budget airlines I have used previously simple things such as pillows and blankets being provided along with the in flight entertainment. Meals were ok still room to improve in this area but overall definitely would recommend
Was a very simple and relaxing flight, food was very good and the service was excellent, there was plenty of leg room and I had time to sleep. In flight entertainment had a good choice of movies

It was a last minute trip and I couldn't get a seat on business class. I was a little apprehensive at first for a 7+hours flight but had to make the trip.
For years, I fly with only Singapore Airlines so, inevitable to make a comparison. In the old days, there used to be a mark difference between the 2...

It was the first time I have been on Cathay Pacific, I am 6ft great leg room and all of the staff on the flight were all lovely! Movie selection was amazing and I have been on many long haul flights and the food had a good choice! Defo worth the price spent!

The service, crew and planes are great. Just be careful about the time between connections. HKG airport is huge and confuse! If your first flight get late it's very easy to lose the next. So, try more than 2 hours.

Due to a strong thunderstorm we were stuck in the plane for over 3 hours. N evertheless, the staff was very helpful, with drinks and information and as time passed by decided to give us the dinner so that on ce we took off all can go to sleep at a very late hour like 4: A.M.
FOOD WAS GREAT...

标题: Always good service, just not so friendly
内容: It's not the airlines fault, but after using a number of other carriers, Quantas being the best, it's obvious that due to the culture of the counties carrier the service it excellent but lacks warmth. Other than that it was a good experience and would not hesitate to recommend.

A recommended option if you prefer day time flights to overnight.
Leaving Hong Kong at 9.3am & hopefully after a good nights sleep prior to boarding one is ready to take in a few movies & enjoy the excellent & attentive service.
Although seeming a little "dated" when compared to some other leading competitors the overall on board experience is...
The cabin staff were very good. The food and wine was excellent and the aircraft was clean and modern. The fare was also reasonable.

We are getting ready to board our flight and found out that we have to queue with the economy passengers as there are no special lines for premium economy. Why pay all this money and nothing special is offered? No early luggage, nothing! Go to Eva air. It is worth stopping over in Taipei to avoid the miserable service of...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Flying with Cathay Pacific was a pleasure. Toilets were clean and stocked, staff were friendly and accommodating. The only let down was the food, while the main dish in every meal was terrible, the sides were nice (roll with butter, fresh fruit). But the saving grace for the food was when we got H?agen-Dazs, I love ice cream!

Flying with Cathay is most often a nice experience. It depends if the crew is good and working together. I had a very nice and quiet crew, they knew immediately what the guests wanted or needed. The food was nice and especially breakfast was delicious. Our crew kept the bathrooms clean! That was perfect!
ticked all boxes, customer service, food quality,timeliness value for money. I recommend Cathay on this route is probably the best

If you are in economy, spend the extra money to get the extra legroom seats. Unless you are fully reclined it is a long flight that you'll be uncomfortable for. Both our flights to and from Hong Kong were entirely full so expect to be crammed in there.
Besides that: decent food; excellent attendants; great movie selections.
I am lucky enough to fly Cathay Pacific business class to and from HK. Great product, comfortable seat, great food and incredible service.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容:
Enjoyed the journey as the crew was very attentive and the plane in a good shape. As the plane wasn’t fully booked I was lucky to have 2 seats in the back of the plane. The lunch served was very delicious but somehow the dinner “went missing” despite being advertised in the leaflet.
That’s why no 5th point. Maybe next...

The flight attendants were very young, beautiful and knows their job very well. Always attentive and visible in the cabin even after lights were put to sleep. Food was great. Arrived on time. So many movie selection from the inflight entertainment. Will definitely recommend to my friends. Well done CX!
Best flight ever. Had aisle seat with leg room, great food, friendly staff and service. Amazing entertainment system. Worth it.

Flew them on May 5. The flight is over-all comfortable with great service as always. Found it less thrilling than the last flight I took from NY-HK last year but I think the difference was this was overnight.

Check-in was a breeze. Boarding was on time.
Were seated in 1st row in Economy, very comfotable and spacious enough.
Flight Attendants were extremely friendly and helpful. Food was good. In flight entertainment was the best ever: great options, new releases included some movies still playing in theatres!.

标题: Friendly service to dress up the averag food and beverage
内容: Comfortable seats in Premium Economy, very friendly service, however meals very avarrage and limited choice in drinks. But overall good price for premium economy seats

标题: Good service however as this is an overnight flight passenger demands are minimal.
内容: All good - nothing stood out as exceptional however nothing to attract any criticism either. Was an overnight and, as I cannot sleep in/on most modes of transport it's not a type of flight I relish due to the later effects. Watched a movie and then read a book for the remaining 6 hours.Two meals during the flight with good...

Just flew to Cebu with Cathay pacific
Very empresses found flight attendants very attentive and very quick to accommodate with all request
Food was as good as it gets along side other airlines flight was a n time
And coming back from the Philliphines is generally very turbulent this flight was perfect
Would definitely use again

标题: Improvement in quality and standard of service!
内容: New airplanes, clean toilets, good service. Compared to my recent trips last year, I can clearly see a big improvement in the overall morale and quality of service. Food wise was very good but more attention needs to be given to the mains. I only tried Asian dishes and they are still off the acceptable mark (eg scallops and prawns...

We travelled Cathay from Adelaide to Hong Kong. Sadly I was really disappointed the toilet smelt and there was an unpleasant smell in the cabin. I found the seating extremely cramped the food was OK.but not outstanding. It is not an airline I would rush to fly with again.

标题: If you miss outgoing flight during a transfer you will not be allowed on the return also they delete booking reference
内容: My father seldom leaves the county, he’s an old man who can just about use a smart phone to make calls. He booked a flight via a travel agency for flights from London Heathrow to Nanning via a connecting flight in HK to Nanning as there are no direct flights. While at HK airport he somehow missed his connecting flight...
The flight is comfortable, food is ok. The staff are friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Cathay Pacific.

Mobility check in Bangkok is good still has room for improvement. Lucky that we were early to the airport and my Thai friend was around to help. The main point was that the wait was a bit long.
The airport staff that assisted with the transfer was excellent!
All in all just need to give yourself extra time.
Very helpful and timely.. the entire team worked well. It was just seamless! Great work Sydney team!

标题: comfortable flight but they didnt had food which I had ordered
内容:
flight was comfortable with not so bad service .
But on my return journey they dint server me indian veg food which I had ordered .
Thy said some issue with catering service and because of which I had to starve for almost 14 hrs .
Apart from that one incident everything was ok

Connecting through HK on the way to Bangkok and my incoming from SFO on United was late. Cathay was ready to accommodate the late arrival with an automatic rebooking on the next connecting flight. Made the whole process very easy (needed to pick up a new Boarding pass at "Transfer Desk".
The airplane seemed a little dated but service was...

标题: Great service. Appalling food. Not enough toilets.
内容: Could not fault the cabin crew or the comfort of the trip. However, the food, coming from one of the world's food capitals, was the worst my wife and I have ever eaten on a flight. Furthermore there were only 2 toilets in the middle of the plane to service premium economy and economy plus another 2 at the back...

This time the service was not up to Cathay elite. Did not make trips to see whether we needed anything. They used to walk around and asked you in the past. I was served dinner after we boarded and then we were left to go to bed. The dinner was served pretty slow too. The food portion was small and...

Its a good airline for a long trip. Every seat has their own tv with movies and everything. The seats have enough normal space. And the service is pretty good.
This airline gives good quality food, compared to many others. I found upgrades were extremely expensive.

Started the trip overnight, but started to serve dinner for some reason. Landed an hour or so eariler than originally scheduled.
Food was good, but I have low expectation for airline food in general.

great flying experience.
All was as expected with attentive staff.
Their business class cabin has better layout than BA, no stepping over other passengers flat beds.
Good food.

This was the first trip on Cathay for my wife and I. We travel from SFO to Asia twice a year, and we vary the airlines based on availability of points redemption. So, we've traveled most of the major TransPac carriers in both the Star Alliance and the OneWorld Alliance, save Cathay.
Our flight was a two parter. We boarded...

This is my first ever experience on Cathay Pacific (CX). I had always have positive perception of CX. The lounge experience was one of the best. However, the cabin experience was below my expectations.
What needs IMPROVEMENTS:
1. Cabin:
The cabin had white light. The light does not work against the green color of CX. The cabin look cold, stale...
On my way back to HK from Manila, I got upgraded to Premium Economy class. In which it was great, as it provided more leg rooms.

My wife and I flew from Cathy Pacific to Australia from London Heathrow my wife chose not to eat on the planes and asked for extra drinks instead unfortunately Cathy Pacific file to carry out a simple taskLeft her asking for drinks currently generally the flight was good just The lack of requested beverages photos okay for myself as my...

The flights to HK are quite conveniently timed and in Singapore we get to experience the State of the Art Terminal 4. Excellent check-in experience and the Business Class Lounge is much larger and more comfortable than the DNATA Lounge in Terminal 1. one thing that I did not like in the lounge was the lack of vegetarian food /...

标题: The usual high class service from Cathay
内容: From the lounge to the baggage collection Cathay are generally top of the game. I fly Cathay often but still get surprised by the courteous service. The only thing that I would comment on is the selection of magazines both in the lounge and in the air. Always lacking in English language magazines. I know Cathay is an Asai airline...
When I left JFK flight was delayed, but the staff accommodated my connecting flight. Meal was good and it was a comfortable flight

标题: Good media entertainment to keep you entertained
内容: Service was good and food and beverage was not bad either. Didn't receive the little package that you get on some other airlines like to socks, toothbrush and eye mask. This must have been a cost cut. Safety and comfort were good and flight was on time. I like the flight view on the screen so you can see where...

All our flights were very good and the ground staff and flight crew were wonderful. We had a number of flights with Cathy - Brisbane to Hong Kong, Hong Kong to Osaka and Tokyo to Hong Kong, Hong Kong to Brisbane (Business class)

Although the flight was delayed by an hour much of that was made up during the flight. As usual the service and food was excellent. The seats were very good.
Overall a very good flight.

Very long, but nice flight. Flight attendants were friendly & courteous. Good selection of in-flight entertainment. Meals & snacks were decent. We liked that the seats slide forward when you recline back, giving you more of a lying down feeling. However, it's still hard to sleep.

标题: Got us from A to B
内容:
We flew with Cathay Pacific to Vancouver from JFK return as this seemed to be the only airline that flew direct on this route (apart from Air Canada who charged extra for hold luggage)
Flights were on time, cabin crew were a bit robotic and were constantly rushing round the plane throughout the flight. The food was ok but not...

Organized airline with new planes, but I have two comments which ruined the trip for me. (1) The security in Hong Kong was over-the-top! I have never been searched so many times, nor asked for my boarding pass and passport! Once definitely, maybe twice, okay, but I was asked no less than 15 times while in the terminal or boarding...

I would have rated them 5 stars if they have not delayed their flight from Singapore (29th April) for one hour. It caused me to miss my connecting flight in Hong Kong. However for my flight CX652, the air Steward and Stewardess was very accommodating. Due to the lateness in our departure I told them that I have to catch...

Have travelled extensively, from United Airlines to Emirates. Was very impressed with on time departure, the quick boarding, excellent and attentive flight attendants.
Impressed with the variety of meal preference options.
Great Airline, Great Service.

Representative refused to take luggage, so we sat with it for eight hours until the dockets opened. The Vancouver Airport does NOT provide accurate information for travelers to the U.S. Flight left at 11: P.M. and arrived on time at JFK. Dinner was served at midnight. In-flight movies, games, and TV shows were adequate.

标题: Very good indeed and much better than BA!
内容:
I hadn't travelled with Cathay for some years but since British Airways has got worse and worse and worse, I decided to give Cathay a try and I'm actually very glad that I did.
From the check-in to the gate to on board every single member of staff was friendly and helpful - the total opposite of BA! Nothing was...

I was flying by myself to Manila in the Philippines via Hong Kong and was very nervous due to be Deaf. However I need not have worried as I was supported 1% from Manchester all the way. I was given a lanyard to wear which very discreetly demonstrated I may need support which was acknowledged without being patronising. Staff on...

标题: Losing its charms, but still one of the best
内容: CX is one of the best airlines in the world, except its service is getting slightly worse, the newly introduced seats are not their best, the in-flight entertainment is tricky to get the hang of, and the current Marco Polo Club programme is not very rewarding (and it takes a lot to reach Sapphire+). But food is still great, lounges...

From beginning to end the airport staff and flight staff of Cathay Pacific were very helpful, polite and attentive.
The planes were very clean and the inflight food good to very good, also the airport Cathay Pacific lounges were well stocked with food, drinks, reading material and modern.
We would recommend traveling with this company.

标题: Cheap when u buy during their promotion
内容:
I was very surprised that the air stewardess did not automatically ask around and hand out immigration card to all passengers before landing. I have to ask for it. Even budget airline can provide this service without asking.
In term of price, it's consider cheap when I bought during promotion compared to other budget airline. But in terms of their...

Booking with this airline through American Airlines is no problem, customers service has it all. Check in so easy, we don't have to retrieve our luggage from HK, it goes direct to San Francisco for clearance, then check in back going to our destination Philadelphia no problem. We were in business class, the cabin itself is clean, seats very comfortable,...

标题: Excellent service, great product, let down by Sydney lounge
内容:
We chose CX for a holiday trip to HK and Taiwan for a number of reasons, including schedule, product, and price. We’ve travelled with CX a lot in the past, both for business and leisure and have usually been pleased with the results.
The business class seats on all long haul flights are configured in a 1 2 1 herringbone,...

We took the Cebu to HK trip this time. I was happy that they have improved their meal service this time. The trip was short but I really appreciated the meal service. The time was just right and we arranged in HK with enough time to check in and be able to do at least one activity before retiring for...

We flew from London to Hong Kong, onto Perth and then Bali and then home via Hong Kong. We flew on Cathay Pacific in business class on all legs experiencing both long haul and regional business class. The seat in regional was ok but the flat bed in long haul was superb. Service on all legs was also superb as...

Everything was smooth. No delays, no snags. Pleasant and polite crew. The food was average but sufficient. Loved toiletries and lotions in the bathroom. Nice touch. Helps with dry skin on the flights.

Dazzled. Cobbled together enough points to move up to business class. The attendants worked the entire 16 hour non stop flight, served two meals and lots of drinks (no charge). Meals and drinks were excellent. Flew over the north pole. We had center cabins adjacent to one another. No one is this aircraft section had to climb over or around...
Customer service and in-flight entertainment were good! Crews were very helpful. I hope that the seats can be improved with a little bit more legroom.

?- Think twice before booking, at the end it will cost you a fortune. Is a ???sucking airline with penalties and fees. Don’t expect it to be a world class airline rather similar to a discount airline. ?

标题: Red eye flight to be forgotten
内容: It has been quite a few years since I last travelled on CX but I did use them often. The business class offering has been cut to the bone. Seats were very uncomfortable and sorely need a mattress supplied. Food was uninteresting. Not value for money. Cabin service was matter of fact lacking in warmth.

The seats on this plane / flight are BAD. It seems that a piece of seat cushion is glued onto the seat. Instead of allowing the seats to tilt backwards, the seat glided from bottom towards the seat in front. There is practically no leg room if I slided my seat, imagine passengers with longer body or legs than mine....

标题: Meal service choices and hours odd
内容: This was a long flight that left in the afternoon. We had chosen Cathay Pacific over United and paid 1,8 each return to experience what was considered a very good airline. Both going to and from the meal service was odd to say the very least. We were served only 2 meals (unlike KLM to Kenya which brought something around...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: Just as our plane’s doors closed and we were strapped in, the military closed the airport and we had to sit there for 2 hours plus. Snacks were not served and we just sat there. As a result, I and many others missed their connecting flight. This was not Cathay Pacific’s fault but I feel they could have handled it...

标题: DO NOT FLY WITH CATHAY PACIFIC
内容: This airline has the WORST customer service I’ve ever dealt with. My middle name was misspelled on my ticket, which I thought would have kept me from flying. Instead of somebody kindly helping to fix it, they told me they couldn’t do it over and over again. I probably called 6-8 times, each time waiting about 3 minutes on average...

I've flown Cathay numerous times from NY to Hong Kong round trip , HK to Singapore (round trip), & various other connections from HK , the airline's hub, & I can honestly say I've never had a bad experience. I've been upgraded into Business from Premium Economy several times at no extra charge. Seats are very good, ample space &...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: Consistently good service, they recognise OneWorld frequent flyers and always address you by name .. clean planes, good flat bed seats and with good attention to detail when offering service Love their signature non alcoholic cocktails ?always feel valued

Comfortable flight with extra wide seats and extra leg room.
On board staff were all friendly and helpful.
Food was better than other airlines we have flown on same route.
best flight with more space in economy class. Food was really good and cabin crew was really friendly and with big smiles on their face.

I guess we have become spoilt by the usual carrier we use but as this was a package deal we had little choice. The cabin service is sparse no drinks offered once the meal service was over unless you buzzed & the meals were very average at best.
Not an airline we would choose again. The return leg was no...

标题: Continues to be "Great Service, Great Fare" exactly as advertised on TV int'l channels
内容: The staff superb in their communication-easy & willing-to-satisfy-your-needs attitude as ever (my 1st Cathay experience goes back to 198's) to make me wonder how the Company = Cathay is training its staff so successfully.
The best airlines towards east I like to fly Cathay because of excellent service, nice & clean aircrafts, Smiling faces& top of it excellent connectivity.

This was a great experience. Here is where I want to compliment the airlines. We hit a lot of turbulence on the way to Hong Kong. The head winds made us 5 minutes late. A lot of us were making the connection to Bangkok. When our departure time arrived, most of us were standing in a security line in Hong...

Green, serene and superlatively safe. The runway was not quite clear for landing in LHR from Hong Kong very early in the morning. My journey had begun a very long time ago. Over 24 hours in fact. The pilot just did all the right things as my fellow traveller and I watched on the camera,without fuss and we landed with...

I was looking forward for my flight with cathay pacific as i heard a lot about them.
Crew was amazingly friendly and professional. Seats were good and comfortable but cannot be conpared to emirates airlines.
Food was ok. I recall having much better experiences on business class.
The amenity kit was ok. Not very fancy but practical.
I would definitelt...

标题: Uneventful efficient service - the way it should be
内容:
Had a very tight 5 minute transit at Hong Kong, and the ground staff ensured that all of us making that transit were escorted through security and straight on to the plane. Very good.
Cathay's flights seem to have generous legroom even for economy, and the entertainment system has the latest releases and a good touchscreen that works!

Travelling weekly it helps when you have wonderful ground staff and service from the people. Manila Airport at 4am is already a chaos as one of their metal detector is down! But checking-in was a breeze with the Cathay team. And flight was able to arrive in HK on time. Very cheerful staff and always coming over to ensure we...

For others may choose other airline, for me Cathay is the only one I used to. Nice service, friendly as always. I didn't enjoy their meal on plane due to dinner appointment after. But did enjoy their lounge's service in Thai. Nice Curry Chicken rice. Yummy. Plane back to HK was steady since we have a nice experinced pilot. Worth...

We flew with Cathay on the Melbourne/Hk and return leg of our recent trip to Europe.
We found the seats to be comfortable and relaxing. The staff were friendly and always helpful. Food was excellent.

15 hours flight from LA to HK with the LA based crew was just a delight and I wished it never ended. Great seats, decent movie choices, meals on demand and I had 2.portij S of the appetizer and had my main course changed as I didn't like the spice. All with a big smile from my flight attendants. I...

标题: Should forgo its name... nothing like it was
内容:
There's really no difference between Cathay Pacific and Dragon. Cost cutting has hardly left any difference.
Buy Cathay Dragon flights instead and save some money. When you are flying out of Hong Kong and can't get a decent Cantonese meal, you know its deliberate because it is almost impossible to not get good food in Hk.
No wonder budget airlines...

To fly such a long distance, it's worth pony up the extra cash to have a bit of room. I can assured you, it's worth it. The plane I boarded on was an Airbus, with a 3-5-2 configuration.
The good:
- Courteous service
-COmfortable seats
- New plane (?)
- Bathroom always have a nice smell, rather than the dingy...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Los Angeles - Ho Chi Minh City

内容:
all set with online check in. great help of the check in staff at HKIA for boarding pass reprint and group my family booking together.
Enjoy the movie selection with Korean ancient movie.
Thai crew on board and quite helpful to other passenger as I observed.

this is my second choice of airline. Friendly and welcoming staff. Good service. Food were good. Main dish served hot and fresh and delicious especially appetizing for hungry me. Seats are comfortable.

The flight from New Delhi to Los Angeles went through Hong Kong. It was a new route for me and I was excited about it. As usual, I took the window seat. The crew were very friendly and catered to all the demands of the passengers. The onboard food, drinks and snacks were the best I have ever eaten on...

标题: One of the Top Airlines I have flown.
内容: Cathay never fail to provide efficient and comfortable service. Our flight was overnight but the service and food was excellent, always with a smile. The staff were friendly while taking care of a very full aircraft.We were given updates by the captain as to our flight times and conditions. All in all a great experience.

Arrived at gate for boarding, at boardi.g time, no aircraft at gate. Ground staff announce after 15min that flight will be delayed due no aircraft.... no more details. At scheduled dept time another announcement.. aircraft arriving, we expect about another 1 hr delay due operational reasons...
This is my 3 delayed Cathay Pacific flight this week... ground staff dont handle...

Departed Saigon late but travel in Asia this can be expected usually due to ATC clearance. (We had a connecting flight in Hong Kong to Beijing which was obviously missed.) In flight - attendants rude, would turn their backs to you while you are speaking, unable to determine what foods they had without opening every one - this is just...
标签: Asia' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Hong Kong

内容:
The flight from Narita to Brisbane meant an overnight way in in Hong Kong. The first sector was Narita to Hong Kong and then the following day back to Brisbane.
I have flown Cathay Pacific before and, when travelling overseas, it is one of my airlines of choice. The flights were basically smooth - except for the usual places where...

Check in was quick and efficient at Gatwick, we had two seperate bookings and the staff moved our seats so that we would all be together. Food was typical of an asian airline, and was nothing special to write home about! Seats were comfortable, however the aircraft was so dam cold, despite wearing a jumper and having two blankets it...

标题: Great service from ground to air
内容: Great service from ground to air. May not be the best food on board but it’s better than most airlines. Stewardess tried to be as accommodating as possible due to the length of the flight and service with a smile. Nice touch on leaving snacks and drinks around where passengers can help themselves without asking. There was also a midnight...

This trip was on one of the new A35 aircraft. The seating was very good with easy to use controls and very comfortable footrest with full adjustability. Seat pitch was great and the overall level of service and comfort was above average. A pleasant trip indeed.

Travelled from dhaka to hong Kong by cathay Dragon and then cathay Pacific. I purchased online tickets 2 months earlier by my Visa debit card and got very Munmum cost . On board crew hospitality was good . I selected Muslim food and got it . Transfer in the Hongkong airport was excellent. Many times I travelled in this route.

I am a vegetarian and have it noted so on my one world membership. Given Asia in general has more vegetarians than any other region I was extremely dissatisfied in a) the "special" meal I was offered ( it was inedible) and b) the fact that in business class no vegetarian option is offered ( one fish and two meat...

标题: Great service on the ground and in the air
内容:
Alignment with Qantas allows good facilities in Perth. Lounges in HK superb. Lounge in Delhi not so special but better than none.
In the air meals are ok, staff excellent. Seem to find upgrading regular customers easier than other airlines. My first choice airline for Asian routes such as Philippines, China and India.
Fares are very competitive.

Paid a lot extra for seats with the extra leg room but this didn't eventuate and I was shifted to Premium Economy, only through insisting that I had paid extra and would not go back to Economy. Crew were helpful and it was worked out. However, wherever the 'extra room' in Premium comes in I could only hazard a guess....

标题: Always great to fly with Cathay
内容: I am a loyal customer and always book Cathay if I am flying to any of their destination. I usually fly 1 to 12 times a year. Mostly Asia and Europe. They have a great set of crew and services are always consistent and good. Punctuality, cleanliness and great customer service.

标题: Decent seats excellent food and service
内容: The actual flight, seats, catering and service was top notch and put our previous experiences with Delta (good), Air France (good apart from seats), and KLM (lousy in general) to shame. The cabin attendants were hyper attendant and responded in less than a minute to a call, they were totally helpful and really made both the flights a pleasure (each...

标题: Sorry... but Qantas wins hands down
内容: Would recommend Premium Economy if Business class not available to you .I thought the service was only fair and I thought the food was very disappointing. In comparison, Qantas does it better .

This was my first time with Cathay Pacific although not my first flight to Australia. I chose them as I wanted to avoid any Middle East destinations as transfer airports. The flights overall were good and on time. Hong Kong airport is very roomy and the business class lounges were good.
Through my travel agent the price point was also...

I upgraded my flight to Premium Economy for an 15 hour flight to Hong Kong, then Economy to Chiang Mai. I must say, the experience was enjoyable, having flown coach/economy in 217 for the same route, the added comfort and exclusive location made it much more enjoyable. Snacks were brought to us upon request, there was a smaller section for...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Chiang Mai

内容: I see a review below that says 'Not what it used to be' and that is entirely correct. In the old days even economy passengers were treated with first class service but now it is just a case of another no frills airline that are more interested in getting bums on seats for as little as possible only to get...

We boarded on time but were delayed by over an hour due to an engine check which delayed the loading of baggage. However, the crew were considerate and we were kept informed. The food we had was very nice and the service was also very good. The inky fault was that both the red wine and the white wines were...

Our trip going to and from Hongkong was smooth. Thou, flight was delayed as they need to fixed something from aircraft. Airline provide entertainment where passenger may have an opt to watch movie however since since travel hour is too short, you may not be able to finish it. Food served was pastry with a twist.

标题: Poor seat due to aircraft change
内容: I had carefully selected seat 18K on the scheduled Airbus A35-9, which is a fantastic aircraft. Unfortunately the plane was changed to a Boeing 777-3ER (Four Class). I have previously flown on Boeing 777 and consider it an awful plane that I avoid at all cost! - and I was right - 18K on the new aircraft has a bulkhead...

标题: Not what it used to be
内容: There was a time when I would book through Cathay Pacific every time, and with my husband’s family in the UK, we travel back and forth quite a bit. However, our latest experience was disappointing. The booking via Expedia was straightforward, price was okay but the plane was old and shabby. Of the three of us travelling only two entertainment...

The Lounge @ BKK Airport
- It was my second time that I couldn’t find a proper seat in this lounge but sitting at the bar area
- The traffic was absolutely over loaded I would say as the bar ran out of proper wine glasses ...
- I would suggest to divide and allocate an area for First Class...

One of the best airline I have been travel in.
This is the first time that I was traveling to Asia on a different airline than the American carrier.
I was a bit worried about the long trip in a different airline.
I was delighted by the first impression at the airport with the person that checked us in. It...
Pleasantly surprised by Cathay Pacific. Modern planes, smooth flying, and excellent service highlighted the flight. Yet another airline that puts U.S. based airline service to shame.

标题: 16 hour flight made easy. Arrived early!
内容:
