I was hesitant to book the longest flight of my life (about 16 hours direct) on an airline I had never flown before (First trip to Asia!) After my experience, I hope this review can assuage the fear of fellow travelers who may be experiencing the same.
Cathay Pacific exceeded my expectations. The flight arrived about a half hour ahead...

I hate to fly but not on Cathay Pacific. No long lines to check in. This was one short flight from Bangkok to Hong Kong and a 15 hr flight from HK to JFK. Economy class is awful for all involved, but the service is great, the food is decent, there are a zillion films/tv shows of every variety (US,...

标题: Comfort chair and space plus good food service
内容: The chair has enough room and space. It is comfortable.There are lot of movie choices in different languages. The food service is great! Even in the middle of the flight, you can ask for a cup of instant noodle if you feel hungry. Besides there are a lot of snacks in the middle area where you can pick.
Very friendly and professional staff, from check in, through boarding and during the flight. And consistent service, every time.

标题: flight attendant from LA to HK. were not attentive
内容: i rarely fly. CX long flight like this one. From BKk.to LA. the crew was ok. But the outboud flight codeshare with AA was incompsrable. The AAcrew worked like robot, uncaring and too old to do the service work, . Until I get to transit in HK that CX crew was ok but not impressive. I will stick to short...

New airplane for the trip:
the seat by seat distance is wider, TV monitor larger, film is still play while landing and food is delicious!

CX flights are amongst the most expensive however it has been justified by a good service to customers and passengers, the recognition of loyalty was as well a valuable plus; It is to believe that this time is gone , I am travelling extensively in S-E Asia , USA and Europe , economy for S-E Asian flights and business for...

Have flown business class on this airline before and that is why we rebooked.
Business class experience was not up to the standard that had been experienced previously in respect to the service and a very tired plan fit out, whereby one could have flown say premium economy and achieved the same experience. In Flight Service and Cleanliness of the...

标题: Cathay is the Lufthansa for Asia - the best
内容: We were upgraded to Premium Economy, as I had a foot boot on (recent toe injury). The desk on checkin said he would be happy to upgrade both my wife and I- better seats (wider) better service (food, free drinks, etc). It made the VERY long flight (14 hrs) easier to endure. We got a special economy no-points/no-changes flight for...

标题: Pretty average (read poor) quality of food and drinks and Poor leg-space
内容:
Pretty average (read poor) quality of food and drinks and Poor leg-space
Very loud and uncourteous passengers

标题: Not as good as it use to be
内容: It has been a few years since we last flew with CP but we were a bit disappointed. The planes - one quite a new one for one of the legs of the journey - was quite tired looking and despite seeing the toilets being checked it appears the stewards only sprayed a bit of air freshener as every time...

This flight left early in the morning bound for HKG. I received my boarding pass at the check in counter, advising the counter staff that I did not have any checked luggage but on board luggage and a sealed duty free liquid purchase that had passed security screening in 2 previous airports. They had no further comment, but later I...

标题: Fantastic Service on the Overnight Flight
内容: The entire Cathay Pacific staff are very gracious. The service is top notched. The supper meal was hot and fresh. The breakfast was served just before arriving

We flew Cathay in 217 and 218 to Asia and we cannot say enough about how great our experience was in Business Class. The food was excellent and the service was the best. It is refreshing to fly with an airline where the employees seem genuinely happy and ready to do anything they can to provide a great experience. Everyone...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Chicago - Ho Chi Minh City

内容:
We haven't flown with Cathay Pacific for many year, but we found the experience pretty good. They are now using self checkin which is easy enough to follow. We found tjis much faster on the return trip than standing in line.
We flew on the A35 to Hong Kong then the A321 to Beijing. While these planes dont come close...

Enjoyable flight with regards to Entertainment and service, but a disappointment from my side that but allergy sufferers were not catered for, upon asking for more information regarding the ingredients as the menu stated, I simply had the usual sorry sir we cannot guarantee anything is nut free. Otherwise comfortable for economy with a nice seat pitch and good recline.

标题: Easy overnight flight on a great airline
内容: An easy overnight flight, great service from very attentive staff, tasty food served well at reasonable intervals.

标题: Cathey flight once again - Aircraft A35
内容:
Had a flight from Taipei to Singapore via Hong Kong. The flight experience was very nice once again. Very nice people, easy check-in process. Aircraft A35 was awesome. It has so much legroom and the TV screen is very wide. Loved it.
However, one of the flight (SIN - HKG) was delayed for about 2 minutes (its quite unusual for...
Comfortable seats, legroom space is adequate for a tall person(1.8m). Great video programs across movies(Chinese, English), documentary and sports.

标题: Cathay Business class is hard to beat
内容:
Well, where do I start. I suppose its fair to say that Cathay's Business Class is by far the best I've flown in. Great meals, comfortable bed, exceptional service and superb in flight entertainment.
An all round superb experience.

Flying on Credit card points is the only way I can afford this --This was my first time with a pod and it was awesome--After almost 15 hours I arrived fresh as a daisy--The service was great-and the food was good--all the amenities were very appreciated--

标题: Long flight, arrived one hour early-
内容:
All in all this was a good flight, but uncomfortable-- we left little bit late, however arrived one hour early.
The whole check-in and boarding process with very easy and well-organised.
The entertainment available on their screens was very large and extensive, so many films to choose from . The seats were comfortable with a good incline

CX quite literally work their planes to the bones; a consequence of this is if there is a delay somewhere in the system (and there always is because they use flights in and out of China) then there is a knock on effect that causes travel chaos. And guess what CX don't really care. For the last 6 flights to...

Our flight from Hongkong to Tel Aviv was nice and comfortable. The crew are efficient and kind and attentive to your needs. we are not bored during the whole flight because of the movies available on flight. The foods serve are okay and delicious. You will feel safe riding this plane.

Jhb to HK is about an 11 hour flight.
The crew did their best to make it as comfortable as possible. From efficient ground crew who got everyone boarded swiftly to the air crew who were helpful and friendly. The seats on Cathay Pacific long haul flights are comfortable with good head rests and you get a small pillow and...

标题: Super friendly and improved from my last flight
内容:
They did not have to do it, but they forwarded my baggage to another airline that was not on my ticket.
Food was good.

The business seat on the 777 was huge. Almost too big might I say? Unlike say Finnair you can’t easily put your feet up on the foot rest during take off and landing. The seat has so much storage which I loved and the food/entertainment/service was all top notch! I seriously ate SO much food. Sleeping was great and the...

We flew Cathay Pacific MNL-HKG on April 9. Check in and boarding were both quick and efficient at MNL Terminal 3. . the flight took about 2 and a half hours, arrived on time, and went without incident. On board service was very good.

The overall experience of the return flights from Singapore to Hong Kong was good.
The new Cathay Pacific lounge in Singapore was just ok. The noodles at the Noodle Bar were just ok. The food at hawker centers in Singapore could easily beat it in terms of taste. Drinks and other food was just ok. A business class boarding pass...

If you want comfort in your flight even the ticket is under economy i highly recommend this airline because each seat has an inflight tv, and headset cabin storage is enough to each guest electric adjustable chair is also a plus regular seat has enough leg room though if you want a true experience of comfort i suggest to book...
Really disappointed. Cramped seats, rushed stewardesses, appalling vegetarian food. Was expecting much better.

This was the first time I flew on business class with Cathay Pacific last January from Chicago to Bangkok Thailand. The foods were okay but the services were outstanding, the seat was very comfortable, however, the seat on the flight from Hong Kong to Bangkok was so so, nothing special. The lounge in Hong Kong was nice, quiet and clean...

标题: Great crew but bad bad seats
内容:
The Checkin , the lounge , the boarding get a 1% satisfaction.
the crew works exceeded expectations, the meal was so so but what made this trip a average trip are the seats.
they are uncomfortable, not one passenger around me liked them.
everyone complained .
I will be flying back to Bangkok next week for business and I almost...

标题: Nice but not special flight experience
内容: The A35 was very nice and the flight was smooth and comfortable. The crew was a bit detached and the food selection was a bit limited but good. We liked (not loved) the airline and the flight.

Despite flying from their own airport my flight is delayed nearly two hours after we board the plane. Why let us board then sit unnecessarily . Thirteen hour flight is now fifteen . Flying from own airport on time should be priority and easy .

Unfortunately I need to fly via Hong Kong to Jakarta but in the end I realized it didn’t mind at all as the stop over from Jakarta to Manila gave me some time to walk around and shop..
Food served on all leg was not that bad.. cabin crew were nice.. tho I wasn’t a difficult passenger as I was...

My wife and I scheduled a flight to Bangkok, Thailand with Cathay. The flight was from Shanghai to Hong Kong to Bangkok, and the same on the way back. We had flown with them before and decided to try them again.
Our flight had a two-hour layover in Hong Kong, and I was a little bit worried when they sent...

Have no reason to complain Left on time Arrived on time Cabin staff were very good .
Seats were good able to lie down & get some sleep . Food a little on the Chinese side but O.K. Would hope to use this airline again next time

Flew business class to Taipei. Planes are generally new and well maintained. Seats can recline totally flat. Onboard entertainment is up to date and many selections. Service is good. Quality of food is good too. Business class lounge in HKIA and Taipei while on transit was great. Many selections of food and beverage. Ailine offers web check in and seat...

Two different flights, two different experiences.
The plane used on the HK-Sydney leg is an older model plane. The seats were a little tatty, the seat-back screens somewhat slow and unresponsive and the general feel was of a 3 star rather than 5-star experience. My mood was dampened by the check-in counter opening rather late, requiring that we wait in...

标题: No baggage arrived, No compensation from airline
内容: My luggage did not arrive at jeju, during my journey in Jakarta with Cathay Pasific. The airline staff said my luggage was still left in hongkong during transit. Though I never took luggage from jakarta. I had to wait 2 days, until my luggage arrived at jeju. The airline did not compensate me when I waited. While I had to...

With this trip being 18 hours use points and booked year ahead. We had seats in the center. However now when reviewing we would have taken aisle seats. We would have been better able to see and speak to each other.....
Once at the airport, we were able to check in - special lines. People were there to help direct...

I paid for economy class and it was an overnight flight- hence the service given was mediocre at best. It could be short of staff, late nights, full passengers- Im not sure, but the service provided was rushed. The leg space were bigger than I expected. The seats are comfortable but its a shame, there isn't a charger port for...

We had chosen Cathay Pacific because we needed to stop-over in Hong Kong before our final destination, Tokyo. For the 4 sectors of flight from SIN-HKG-HND and returned, 2 types of aircraft were used, 2 sectors by Airbus A33 and the other 2 by Boeing 777. While A33 was new with 1-2-1 seating format, but 777 was old with 2-3-2...

The in flight service between Chennai and Hong Kong was a short cut. They skipped the drinks service and came with the food trolley almost an hour before landing.
However the sector between Hong Kong and Tokyo was good.

标题: Great business class on long flight
内容: Recently flew the almost 16 hour flight from Chicago to Hong Kong. Business Class seats were very comfortable and went down to flat beds. Plenty of storage space. .All controls were at eye level and easy to use. Touchscreen TV was very easy to use. Service and food were great. several choices for entrees. Flight arrived early in Hong Kong.

Had a connecting flight from Japan to HK. Plane arrived late in Narita and I had a one hour layover in HK to my next destination. Now HK airport is one long stretch from point A to B and I literally ran all across to barely make it to my plane. Because the ground stewardess was in a hurry she...

Mixed experience - HO to London was awful - counted down the minutes - flight seemed full - we couldn't choose our seats online as we had done first lag with another carrier from NZ. I had a large person next to me so felt I only had 1/2 a seat anyway. They had used all cabin space so we...
Flight performance was on time. In flight service was quite efficient. Good kind of hospitality. Flight announcements were informative.

Flight was delayed, gates changed reached late at destination & lots of running to catch onward flight but assisted by Cathay staff. Seats were not cleaned, pillow cover not changed. Food is good.but serving was not proper.
On morning flight, they served congee. Looks more like hospital breakfast. Other than food the service and flight was alright.

Great service, on time & friendly staff, only problem were those seats on A35 (3-3-3).
Seats are very narrow so no privacy - i could could stick my head between the seats in front of me (if i wanted to). Arm rest is about 5cm wide so impossible for 2 people to use.

标题: Boeing VS Airbus, Premium Economy VS Economy
内容:
The configuration of the premium economy class in an Airbus is better than the Boeing planes. Airbus has a dedicated washroom whereas on a Boeing 777, premium economy has to share washrooms with the economy class.
This is quite unfair, as the cost of flying is about three times more. Food I believe is the same, for a couple inches...

My last review for Cathay Pacific was Dec/216 and I decided to try again to see if they have improved their service since it been awhile. I can be very responsible to tell you I was very disappointed with Cathay Pacific. I see that their management system had got downgraded and so with their services. I am a regular solo...
I have a happy flly with Cathay Pacific, it's a nice airline, with professional crew members, they are helpful and considerate, thanks so much

My second time taking this direct flight from Hong Kong to Bali... It is an enjoyable flight although it is quite long flight time. In addition, so nice that the airline has upgraded me to business class. A big surprise. No matter what... service is nice and food is good, too.

We flew to this airline to and from Australia.
The service was excellent the attendants were very polite and nothing was a problem for them.
The newer planes are by far better. Our only problem was on our return, back to the older plane and my husband had trouble with his screen always freezing or cutting out. They need to...

We flew return AKL-HKG-MAN in economy. Seats were fairly comfy with slightly more room than other airlines I've been with. The service was good, food better than most and I recommend the pot noodles if you get hungry mid-flight. Entertainment was good and the system worked for the whole flight, even when parked, although the planes were fairly new. flights...

I booked and paid for premium Economy only to find out days later that it is not offered on Ceb to Hong Kong portion. 2 emails for me to contact them. 45 min or more hold time both times. Very poor Customer Service. Premium Economy Not worth it. NEVER AGAIN.

It had been years since we had travelled with Cathay Pacific and we were excited to have a stopover in Hong Kong on the way home from our trip to Japan. The four flights were terrible- seats narrow; indeed on one of the flights, my husband's seat was broken. Food was awful and offering of drinks was sparse - had...

I have just returned from a family holiday flying from Sydney to Paris via Hong Kong and then returned two weeks later. With my husband's flying experience in mind as well as my own, Cathay Pacific has always been at the top of our preferred airlines. This trip was no different - fantastic service, wonderful staff and the planes are...

I have given 4 stars as the service and food was very good. It could have been 5 but for these reasons: Aircraft interior was a bit run down with trimming hanging from the ceiling and foot rest more an impediment that a support and frayed at the edges. Configuration of Premium Economy is a bit bizarre as only the...

My husband and I sat in the front row of the middle section of business class.
While the cabin crew were top notch the aeroplane was old, the food disgraceful and inedible for the class being flown and the amenities poor.
My feet in closed summer shoes froze and I had to purchase socks at HK airport to warm my...

Doing this trip every 6 months & having previously always flown with Emirates or Virgin Atlantic I was worried about flying long haul with another airline, however I was pleasantly surprised. Boarding was speedy. I slept well (usually I don’t) the seats seemed slightly wider than other airlines & were comfortable. Staff were helpful & very attentive coming through the...

标题: Great trip with a with a bit of self-indulgence
内容: Had booked business for family to travel between Shanghai and Hong Kong. Surprised to see an excellent, clean cabin with 4 seats across in an Airbus wide body aircraft - ideal for long haul. Very spacious with 4 seats across a 2 aisle cabin. Staff were very attentive and I thought the service throughout the flight was outstanding!

Great crew, awesome food, brand new A35. Flight left and arrived on schedule. IFE was extensive and easy to use. Great addition of live cameras fixed on the tail and underbelly. Great value for money too.

标题: Cathay Pathetic, Premium Tariffs for Low-Cost Service
内容: We were supposed to take off at 143, but I received 3 different alerts during the day that told me things were going sideways. First alert said ETD - 15, the second - 1655, the last - 172. We were wheels-up at 185. Nearly 4 hours late, and no compensation. The ground staff at PVG were hardly helpful. The pilot...

I do not really like to travel on an overnight flight. But from India to Hong Kong, that is an option we usually have to take. Good thing is... I've got upgraded to business class again and I can have a few hours of sleep, laying down on the bed. Not bad though.
The flight was delayed, but it was communicated well in advance. It was a very nice experience flying with Cathay Pacific.

The flight time was not short. I was so tired that week as I was just back from Hochiminh the night before. Surprised that the airline upgraded me to business class. So, got some rest and really relaxed and enjoy the flight :)

Staff very professional and polite. Plane was on time and the boarding was so well organized and quick. The food service was excellent. I had forgotten to order "special" meal, but they very quickly accommodated my needs. Was very impressed.

Pleasant flight after previous flight with Jetstar. Food and drinks were free, choice of meals (although airline prepackaged food) tasty. Good leg room and although I paid for extra leg room it was not necessary as all seats were good.

We recently flew from Sydney to Rome with Cathay Pacific and enjoyed the flight. The only negative was we had a 7 hour stop over in Hong Kong. Can we suggest you check your credit card company and see if you qualify to use one of the premium lounges in HK airport to fill in the hours.

I’ve flown all over the world on multiple airlines. This was my first flight experience with Cathay Pacific on a trip from the USA to Asia. It will also be my last. A rude, arrogant, and uncooperative gate agent in HCMC named Qa spoiled my return trip. As a result I will never fly on Cathay Pacific again. I would...

标题: No wifi, average service, poor quality food; I've had a better experience in the past!
内容:
For the price i paid, I expected better service all around from check-in, boarding to inflight service. It was average. The quality of food was below average! I have had better experience with Cathay in the past. I was disappointed.
The service & food at the lounge at SFO was excellent. The service & food at the lounge at Hong...

At the checking in a bit rude, the plane was full of transit passengers from India or Sri Lanka, the service was good, the food eatable, it was only a bit cold on the plane,
Never accept coupons from CX - only valid on the plane and only one year.
only few crew is helpful mostly doesnt appear enjoying their job food not bad not good during transfer from hongkong
As it was in 1999 we can only comment on what it was like then it could well have changed as everybody seems to cut back to save money.

The flights were on time and the attendants were very friendly and hard working. The meals were good and the in flight entertainment was great especially the movies. The seat was comfortable and I had a nice nap on the way. Nice airline,

We were having seats in economy section and it was very comfortable with enough legroom.
We had 3 seats together with excellent services from all the attendants despite having a small kid with us they were patient enough to fulfill all the requirements.
Overall we were very happy with the flight and had great time flying with them.

The toilets were not cleaned often enough and there was mess all over the floor, at times no toilet paper or hand towel. They smelled disgusting. Very disapointing. Meal service was inadequate with people unable to get their choice. Didn't seem to be enough staff working for the amount of passenger's onboard.

The check-in was smooth. In flight service is very basic. Flighing with children is very challenging and it is always appreciated when the crew takes time to make sure you are comfortable. No one did. No game, no blanket, no pillow... nothing.

We prebooked seats in economy for this flight and it was very comfortable with good legroom.. We had 2 seats together with no one else to interupt or disturb us when we wanted to move (or sleep). Overall we were very happy with the flight and had great service from the flight attendants

标题: Great on board service, meals and entertainment options
内容:
Meals are awesome (including Haagen Dazs ice cream), on board service is great and the entertainment options awesome with new movies/TV series.
The only bad thing to mention is that they seem to have inexperienced pilots since almost all the flights have hard landings (but that can also be due to weather conditions).
Flight from Hong Kong is a sharing flight, some from China, some from America, some from Japan and may be some more from others. Flight from Hong Kong to Bangkok is quite smooth

标题: One of the best flight experience
内容:
Amazing service, cleaning and comfort. The entertainment system can help anyone make the flight fun, interest and fast. The food is very good and after flying with them so many times, I can assure that this is one of the best airline to fly with for long distance destinations.
The only thing is that if anyone needs to modify anything,...

My family and I recently visited Canada and the USA? We flew the long haul flights with Cathay Pacifc because they were direct out of Adelaide and also the cheapest. We found the aircrafts to be modern and clean with the staff very helpful. The staff were not overbearing, well balanced in their approach to meal times and rest. We...

We flew from Auckland to Hong Kong and then on to Frankfurt a month ago now.their business class I believe is every bit as good as Emirates which we have used alot.
The seating is well set out my only complaint would be I was unable to put air on and got a little hot.
Sleeping is comfortable plenty of...

For a long haul flight comfort is key. And Cathay delivered. Spacious seating and a high level of service. Good food and a decent range of drinks. Smooth boarding and a good level of communication from staff.

标题: Good airline but needs to improve food quality...
内容: Good fight - lie flat seats are quite comfortable and the service is amazing! The one weak areas is their food. We flew Cathay Pacific a few years ago and raved about the food. It would be great if the standards were raised back to the level that they were. Still, I would fly Cathy Pacific over any U.S. based...

I flew with Cathay from Hamburg to Manila and back. The initial very good connection got replaced with something a bit less convenient as flights had been cancelled, it seems as not enough enough tickets had been sold for one of the long-haul flights. The costumer service person I had to talk to for the free rebooking to a somewhat...

It is true -- I am a long term fan of Cathay Pacific, and over the many years I have travelled with Cathay, I have almost never had an incident that caused me to doubt its professionalism, service, cleanliness, and overall flight experience. This trip to Chicago was my latest Cathay experience.
1. The aircraft was very clean, everything worked,...

标题: Fantastic inflight entertainment with Cathay made this long haul flight a winner!
内容: Check in was smooth, pre-booked our seats online 48 hours earlier. Food choice was not great but and quality not as good as expected having flown Cathay Pacific long haul 3 years ago, however some meals were better than others. Wine or other drinks were served with the meals, however tea and coffee were not always offered afterwards which I...

As the flight was not full everything looked better -- less waiting time for the toilet even though one was out of service, toilets were clean, less people moving around, quicket meals, less disturbance whilst you are asleep etc. Quantity and quality of in-flight meals were good. CX In-flight entertainment programmes now put stronger emphasis on international tastes and less...

Had a 4.5 hr flight from Bali to Hong Kong before waiting for a connecting flight to England. Never flew with CP before but it was quite comfortable & they had a decent entertainment system. The only thing i would say is for snacks they were handing out peanuts which i think should be banned as it is such a...

Had to make a factory line engineering visit in the morning of landing, so being able to sleep is essential. Cathy Pacific PE class gave us just enough stretch and seat comfort to score a reasonable sleep. That is, after a decent meal for which I chose a tasty and tender filet mignon steak with a surprisingly good red wine....

标题: Business class very basic. Music player stolen from my luggage
内容: I flew from Shanghai to Bangkok with a stopover in Hong Kong. I did business class and have to say that their economy is good enough, and the business class not good enough to justify the difference in price. More disappointing, I checked my bag because I didn't want to mess with it when changing planes. Not a good decision....

标题: there is a reason i fly cathay pacific 9% of the time
内容: the good. the service. always impeccable. the legroom. even on economy, flying economy on such a long flight didn’t feel cramped. plus - because of the price, people seem to prefer other airlines. the flight back from london to hongkong felt like i owned the plane. there were about 3 of us on economy and we had rows of seats...

Again, we pre-purchased an exit row seat so we had ample leg room. On this leg of our trip the food was not edible. Service at gates is good. Flight attendants are nice. English is spoken first, then Chinese. Good choice of in-flight entertainment.

The desk staff were very warm and friendly. The plane was clean and the food going to Hong Kong was typical airplane food...although we did enjoy the ice cream bar treat.
Arrived on time. Plenty of movies. Paid for Exit row seating so there was ample leg room.

First time traveling on Cathay Pacific. I selected them as I am a Alaska 75k Gold member and wanted the miles on Alaska. 777-3 was a nice plane. I was fortunate that I had a empty seat next to me on the 16 hour flight to Hong Kong (head winds). Seat was comfortable and I was able to stretch out....

My husband and I travelled from Heathrow to Perth, Australia, via Hong Kong on the 1st of March 218. I cannot praise this airline enough for courtesy of staff and comfort throughout. We are vegetarian and found the meals offered were to our liking. Boarding and luggage claim were effortless. Our visit was for a holiday. I became ill towards...

Used CP (business class) from LHR to Hong Kong and then on the Osaka. Both planes triple 7s but both configured very differently. The long haul to Hong Kong was lie flat seat, the shorter 4 hour flight to Osaka very old fashioned sit up business class seats. On both flights the flight crew were very polite and attentive and...

标题: comfortable but still a long time in a small space
内容: This was an eleven hour flight and was comfortable for the most time, I had struggled a few months earlier on a 5 hour flight back from Cape Verde so not looking forward to it. It was much better than I had expected on what is our first long haul trip. The seats had room to strtetch your legs and...

We fly to Hong Kong every year and Cathay is our favourite airline. Online check in is very straightforward and we have never had any problem with delays. The flight is as comfortable as economy can be and the staff are lovely. The food is really good too.

I chose Cathay Pacific having seen the reviews and because the flight time was convenient. The seats were as expected in Economy but not as comfortable as Air New Zealand or Etihad or Quantas. The service was reluctant but available. Most of the staff seemed to treat us with disdain unlike the smiling faces on the other airlines. The meals...

标题: Excellent Flight from Hong Kong to Newark
内容:
Overall an excellent flight from Hong Kong to Newark, New Jersey.
Truly enjoyed the leg room and privacy of the Premium Economy Class.
Good Chinese and Western cuisine were served throughout the 14.5-hour flights, with good snacks to choose from.
Interactive entertainment system is updated with the latest technology.
Value for money.

Flew from Perth to Hong Kong on the midnight special. The flight was comfortable and smooth, but the service and the upholstery were disappointing. We were not offered the usual drink upon seating and the crew made a number of service errors in delivering the food and drink. I ordered a beer which didn't arrive, I was given a red...

标题: Tight seat space, not much leg room
内容: Love the tv monitor in front of my seat. Everyone has their own monitor and headsets. Tight seats and not much leg room. The food was not bad, except for one time the yogurt was warm, not good. Not enough toilets for so many people. Could ask flight attendants for cup of noodle anytime.

标题: new air bus 335 and had phone charging port
内容: the flight is big one line for 9 people / have business class/premium ekonomi and ekonomi insight the flight many entertainment movie and music + game , now also we can have a wifi on board, with charge usd 9,9 for one hour, a bit expensive, to try some time maybe never mind

标题: Cathay Pacific to Jakarta as last segment on American booked flight
内容: I spent 8 days/nights on a liveaboard dive boat in Raja Ampat, Indonesia. I booked through American Airlines but they used code share partners for the final segments into and out of Jakarta, Indonesia. Cathay has a large presence at the Jakarta airport and their flight was above average. I had a nice isle seat with plenty of legroom. Their...

I love Cathay. I especially love Cathay when I can upgrade to Business. Their "polish" and amenities aren't quite at the level of Qatar and other middle eastern airlines, it's true. But on Qatar, for example, I cringe when a flight attendant approaches, as I will have to plaster on a smile and listen to a memorized spiel for several...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: We had a 2 night stop over in Honk Kong and then onto Sydney, and return flight was straight through with 4 hour stop over The seats werer comfortable and spacious and food was good
We were surprised by how much leg room we had, economy is not usually noticed for space but on this flight we were certainly comfortable. A long flight made easier!

Very happy with the flights. Got these as the cheapest and couldn't fault the planes or service.
All up to date with good leg room and a wide variety of TV shows and movies as well as a few games to keep you entertained.
Would recommend and would use again for future flights.

Who knew that Cathay Pacific flew this route?!?! The flight actually continues on to Hong Kong, with the same flight number, which I guess is how it got around the challenge of operating a flight that isn't to or from its own country.
The plane was modern, clean and comfortable. Seatback entertainment options were good. Staff were friendly and efficient....

We had very good flight , comfortable , all the services were very good. Very long flight but didn't feel that tired. Inflight service was very good , very nice Indian Vegetarian Meals. Good selection of inflight entertainment

标题: Into the Cold Valley of the Clouds and Nearer to Thee My Lord I Come!
内容:
One of the great joys of flying (for me) is the fun from watching other passengers. It is also the reason i love flying coach. When i don't, i try not to lapse into behaving like the business and first class passengers who quite frankly provide most of the flight's entertainment (for me).
Joy begins at the aircraft's gate when...

The flight itself wasn't too bad for 14 hours. However we had a crying baby for 12 of those hours. The tray under the TV was filthy. Also my speakers did not work. All I was told is we will reset them but it will be quite awhile. They still did not work. After 3 hours, I got annoyed and...
Staff were very busy and hurry.Only served snack box and box drink. Disappointed.Plane was a bit of old and tired. AV entertainment system OK. Anyway safe and acceptable.

We had a very comfortable flight from Dubai to Hong Kong. It was an 8 hour flight so it was important to have a good flight. Thankfully the flight was good & the service + food everything was very good. Only concern was that we could not select different menus for the 2 ways of travel.
We travelled on 3th...

I recently flew to HK to volunteer at a Christian conference. I did the same trip last year via Singapore. This year I chose Cathay. It was the same price as Singapore this year, and I remembered Cathay was very luxurious. This year it was less luxurious than I remembered. Maybe things had changed. The seat was nice but regretted...

标题: Well managed flight from Asia to America
内容:
Service is impecable with lots of details from the crew. They will address you by name and will try the most to accommodate you. The "snack" cheeseburger is a must!
The choice of movies and music is fantastic.
Nothing but praise for this airline.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Our recent flight from SFO to Columbo Sri Lanka was great. We flew economy and had great service. The food was very very good as well. I definitely recommend Cathy Pacific if the fare is comparable to another airline.

First long haul flight. Premium economy seats were extremely comfortable and fairly spacious. Film choice was great. Service however was disappointing. Drinks came round soon after we had taken off. I asked for coffee but was told that would come when the food was served. I waited almost three hours until my coffee arrived! Food was adequate but nothing special....
cathay pacific is my #1 airline whenever I flight to Asia. I’ve never go wrong with them. They deliver the best customer service.

标题: Good option for long flights to Asia
内容:
My choice for HK/Shanghai travel although Cathay does not fly directly to Shanghai.
Nonetheless, the seats in Premium Economy are spacious and I haven't come across crowds in this upgraded class, so there are normally more than enough empty seats for spreading out. I was in the first row aisle going over and the crew worked with me to change...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: Very comfortable business class seating - far better than British Airways with whom I normally fly. Service is excellent, the food and onboard entertainment is very good

I fly a fair bit - short, medium and long haul, mostly on Economy. Took CX from BOM to PVG via HKG and had a good experience. Having long legs is not a boon for fliers in Economy but CX was ok and i did not have to get fixed like i have to on some airlines. Am glad i...

We flew BR-HK on April15th and back on April 22nd. The plane was a brand new Airbus 35. The flight was ok, but the crew was disappointing. They were so hurried (under pressure?) that they rather threw the food at us than actually serving it, they forgot to serve drinks to more than one passenger, gave instructions rather than engaging...

A long haul flight but a good in-flight entertainment system featuring a good variety of films, both old and new. The seats were ok for me at 6 feet tall, but only just wide enough. I was sat next to someone with elbows that stuck out. The meals were good as was the service.

标题: As my rating, they are GOOD ^ ^
内容:
They are my number 1 choice of airline and is highly recommended to my friends : )
I seldom fly the other airlines but still has a bit experience on the other airlines so here is my comment.
Fare: pretty high.
Food: good.
Service: good
Spacious in flight: quite good
Cleaning in flight: good
*So lucky that I’ve been upgraded...

I guess we're all different sizes, but even the moderately sized people were having trouble squeezing into these economy class seats. The food was mediocre to inedible, but the staff were fantastic and very eager to please.
One warning: when you leave HK, the paranoid Australian government will insist that security take away any liquids you have with you. I'm...

For this Europe trip, im flying from Jakarta to Amsterdam through Hongkong, and come back from Paris with stopover for 2 days in Hongkong before fly back to Jakarta. In the ground at CDG, we had an awful experience, the luggage weight were not calculated correctly, so we dont know why the overweight calculation is 15 kg for 4 baggage,...

标题: Full service airline, with budget airline's on board service.
内容:
Cathay Pacific is one of the full service airlines, but in reality, the onboard services, most of the time, felt like budget airlines'.
Don't get me wrong. I like flying with CX. CX got at least 4 direct flight daily to Hong Kong. I don't like long transfer so CX is definitely a good choice for the least flight duration....

标题: Cathay Dragon - Impotence In Handling Their Delayed Flights
内容:
I had a terrible, un-pleasant, un-acceptable, terrific memories and bad experiences from CATHAY DRAGON. First of all flight got delayed without notifying to customers on time. Secondly because of the mistake of CATHAY DRAGON's flight delay I have to miss my connecting flight at KL, Malaysia.
My bad experience started from here. When arrived at KL airpot, I was told...

标题: Flying - you gotta so what you got to do, Long Flight, reasonable comfort
内容: I have no complaints about this airline. In terms of flying that is a compliment. Commerical flying, at least in economy is about getting somewhere, the process is not fun. I have now flown about 6 times with Cathay over the past 9 years. Their flight service is efficient, the seats reasonably comfortable , the inflight entertainment good, or at...

Cathay Pacific is often described as a good airline for travel to Asia. I think it is quite average. They are usually late in opening their check in from stated time. The comfort and service is about the same as other airlines. The food is so so. The airline is fine but nothing special
Attentive service, comfortable seats and delicious food. Business class lounge in Hong Kong airport is THE BEST!!!

标题: I have always loved this airline
内容: I have always flown this airline whenever i could. The staff is always very friendly, courteous and efficient. I have flown both economy and business class and regardless of the class the experience is always a good one. Seats are very comfortable , the lavatories are a little more spacious of course on business class. The only drawback to this...

Adequate. The aircraft was a bit shopworn and not especially clean. The crew were quite efficient but seemed always to be rushing in spite of the long duration of the flight. They had little time or inclination, it appeared, to attend to interact with tor see to the needs of the passengers comfort or needs.

标题: Quality has worsened over the years
内容: I used to like to travel to Asia with Cathay, but not anymore. In our last trip, the plane was aged, the flight attendants seemed overworked and slow to respond to customers.

标题: First trip with Cathay Pacific (Mix feeling)
内容:
I’m impressed with the service and I love the seats. However, on my very first
Trip from Singapore to HK and to TPE. I had food poison after having the airplane food. I had to admit into hospital on the day itself at Taipei. Thank god I had travel insurance but it made me think twice flying with them.. nevertheless...

First time with Cathay Pacific business Lounge very good all the bits you need. Aircraft from Hong Kong to Sydney a little tired. Airline staff were great and the food very good. Timings which to me are important were good left on time and arrived on time, I would use again but Cathy keep up with the competition, in my...
Old airplane type and old configuration with not comfortable seat. Cold sandwich roll with pre-packed lemon tea served. On time departure at 145 and early arrival at 55. Overall, a 7/1 experience.

The flight was full house. The flight attendants were helpful and in particular one attendant who was so patience as she handles the mainland old folks. She was a down-to-earth young lady. She explained and gently assist these old folks who seems to have 'lost' as I guess these passengers travelled very little.
The food/beverages were satisfactory given that I...

We had never flown with them prior to our flight to Bangkok on Feb 21/18 and were very impressed. On our flight back the service why equally good or better. They are off the scale in comparison to our local airlines with in flight service. The food was very good and they catered to my wife's gluten intolerance. Would not...
The Airline service is really amazing. Food on board as well is sumptuous. Very safe aircraft and accommodating crews whenever I fly with them. Thank you!

标题: PRICE PROMISE GUARANTEED is a completely MISLEADING ADVERTISING. Fake promises
内容:
f I could give a zero star i would. I haven't even started my flight and I already don't want to fly with them. Communication and costumer service is the worst, they are willing to let costumers down for not even AUD 1, attitude of a low cost company. I really regret i decided to give you a go
PRICE...

I flew return with Cathay Pacific with my family. The service was excellent and all flights were on time. The only reason for 4 not 5 stars was the food was a little average. All in all a great experience.

Check in was very easy as well as security and immigration. Flight was on time and uneventful. Seats were the older intra Asia business class seats that only reclined a little. Not the full lie flat seats. Staff was very friendly and the plane was very clean.
Very good but expensive airline. Punctual, well run, all the seats are occupied. Recommended if you can afford it.

I used Cathay Pacific / Dragon from London to Bali. Sadly my one hour layover in Hong Kong turned into a few days (some of the best of my life!) due to the volcano eruption in Bali. The airline were kind enough to put me up in a 5* airport hotel with drinks and meals included. The inflight entertainment was...

The flight was smooth and excellent. Flight attendants paid good attention to customers and acted professionally. From the last year’s bad experience I was not keen to fly with CX but I would reconsider.
When I checked in online, seat mapping showed that rear side was quite empty compared to the front but I chose a window seat in the...

All the 4 staff i came across there were great and helpful.
Food was fantastic, with superb quality and more than adequate variety.
Set up was pleasant and spacious enough.
.

标题: First time flying with Cathay Pacific
内容: I had a 13 hour flight from YVR to HKG and a connecting 2 hour flight from HKG to CNX. The longer flight had 3 meals that were delicious, free snacks + water whenever you want, and a very great list of movies that had recently come out! Blankets and pillows were given out and the staff were very friendly...

It was terrible delay of this flight, the departure schedule was 11.5, but the actual departure was 17.45. The plane departure schedule from Hong Kong was 7.55 Bangkok Time (8.55 Hong Kong Time), so the plane would be some where on the route at my checkin time . It was the flight from Hong Kong to Singapore, with one stop...

For that destination, I had a very good price even on the website's company : 8CHF. The service on board is very good, the food is more than decent (I mean it's airplane food).
The entertainment system was perfectly functioning and the offer of movies and TV shows was up to date.

Our first time with Cathay and we weren't disappointed. The seats comfortable, the entertainment system was good and the service efficient. Whilst not up there with Singapore Airlines, a very nice flight

Good value with spring fare sale. Traveled in early April 218. Good 2-seat arrangement in last row economy. Boeing 777. Meal and drink service good, flight entertainment offer latest run movies. Sign up to their Marco Polo frequent flyer program to get priority boarding and free check in of 2 baggage up to 5 lbs. each.

标题: Good airline but with not so favor frequent flyer program for short haul passengers.
内容: Cathay Pacific airline (CX) has maintained a good service consistently, especial the lounges in HK airport is the best among the airline companies both in quantity and quality. But the new frequent flyer program that been implemented 2 years ago is not so favor to short haul customers, they didn’t count the fly sectors anymore, the score point system gave...

I purposely booked this flight due to its newly service A35 aircraft. I was really looking forward to it but the reality did disappoint me greatly. I was choosing row 12 to be the most forward seat but it was a bad choice. Unlike the 777, this aircraft has utilized every corner to store the inflight service materials (i.e., table...

标题: Good seat pitch and excellent service
内容: It was my first time with Cathay, but certainly won't be the last. Cabin was good, with comfortable seating. The 32-inch seat pitch was great and at no point was I uncomfortable. The service and attentiveness from the cabin crew was excellent and the catering on-board good, too. Plenty to choose from on the in-flight entertainment system to keep you...

I am a diamond frequent flier of Cathay. Flight delayed 3 hours. Missed my BKK flight. HK Ground crew was no help at all. They made me stay at Regal airport hotel and gave me a room that was so uncomfortable, view of the parked cars. Glad I am not claustrophobic. Felt unsafe. Expected better handling as a loyal CX...

We had a very long flight of 13 hours to Manchester from Hong Kong, following an eight hour flight to Hong Kong from Sydney. We were lucky to have 3 seats between 2 of us so we could spread out a bit. Not really enough to sleep though, although a lady nearby was able to curl up on 2seats and...

I flew on an evening flight from London Heathrow Airport to Sydney via Hong Kong. I was able to check in online and download my boarding passes for both flights to my mobile phone which was a real time saver. The flight took off and landed on time. The seats were reasonably comfortable and the food OK. The staff were...

I’ve flown with Cathay Pacific 3 years in a row now. I love their excellent service, but wish seats were more comfortable. It’s not that easy getting in and out of them and they’re not that comfortable on super long flights. Unfortunately, I can’t afford the premium economy to see if those seats are more accommodating.
The seats were ok, good choice of films and the food was very nice. The staff were very attentive and cheerful. Overall a good flight with no complaints. I would fly again with Cathay Pacific.

Regional rather than international business class seats were comfortable and roomy. Cabin crew were extremely focused on giving a friendly attentive service. Food and drinks were similarly of quality.
it's the first time to fly with this, it very nice also the food is good. From the CGK you'll have to check again when yo go to the boarding room, ... have a nice flight

In order to arrive early in Hong Kong for a meeting, I took the 6:2 am Cathay flight from Bangkok. Transport to Bangkok airport was smooth as I left my hotel at 3:15 am in the morning and therefore arrived at the airport probably within about half an hour. I was quickly checked in and through to the Cathay lounge...

标题: Business Class on A35 and Pier First Class Lounge pre-flight
内容: This flight was operated with an A35 so I had a chance to experience the Cathay business class flat seat on the fairly new A35. Compared to the arrangement on the B777, I much prefer the Boeing over Airbus. The seat was laid out in a similar manner with a 1X2X1 configuration in business class with the window seats being...

A very clean airplane
Spacious seats
Accuracy in schedules
Excellent plane service
Very good duty-free on the plane
Reasonable meals

We enjoyed flights on Cathay Pacific using Qantas frequent points. The flights were very comfortable and we really enjoyed the food. The little additions including the up market icecreams delivered with the meals made the trip enjoyable. The staff were all friendly and the flights were on time. Will fly with them again.

Take off of the flight was delayed by 25 mins but Cathay let us know early - unfortunately this was at 2:2am via text message. Not ideal.
Plane was newer or fairly recently retrofitted. Good sized, functional entertainment screens and USB port. Selection of media better than previously offered on Cathay Pacific.
Seats more comfortable than previous flights with this...

标题: Very efficient and hassle free experience, comfortable and entertaining flight
内容: I did a return flight from Sydney to Hong Kong in April and amazed at how efficient and easy experience it was compared to few other airlines I've traveled with. The online check in facility (48 hours before the flight) meant that I could go straight to the airport and drop my baggage without lining up. They also provide in...

As part of a holiday to Japan and Hong Kong we chose to travel by Cathay Pacific on all legs of our journey. The Sydney, Hong Kong, Sydney legs were comfortable with flat beds on a 1:2:1 configuration. If you want a window and travelling as a couple this is difficult unless you are prepared to split up. Service,food and...

The flight attendants were professional and efficient. The service they provided was excellent. The only complaint we have is that they ran out of breakfast food so there was no choice but one.
However, the 16-hour flight was rough. Because the flight was delayed in Hong Kong, the captain tried to make up for lost time. He flew us straight...

标题: My airline of choice to Asia
内容: Have been flying since PAN AM dropped off the grid and sold pacific routes to UA. Tried United 6 or 7 times to Hong Kong and 2 or 3 times to Japan. Service fair then switched to Cathy Pacific what a difference. Their busiess class was like first class and the coach was excellent. On time clean and a great...

标题: Long Term Companion - was, is, will be
内容: To be honest, I did not set out to review my last flight as I have been flying with Cathay Pacific since 23 when I can afford flying with a better airline. I was curious to see who are the best airline amongst the airlines from trip advisor’s newsletter and saw that CX didn’t even land on top 1 of...

标题: Tried to bumped me off on my return flight for not doing the online check in
内容:
This is my second review of Cathay Pacific and in my first review, I promised myself not to fly with this airline again but when our group of 15 friends and family decided to fly to Hong Kong last February 218, I had no other option but to go with the group.
Our Cebu to Hong Kong flight was very...

标题: Good services, more than enough legroom
内容:
Seat was spacious, and crew were great!
Inflight movies were quite updated, however, food was just ok, I rather have more fresh fruits.

标题: Enjoyed the leg room and the provision of head phones and tasty meals.
内容: Nice leg room and friendly, helpful staff. Didn't have to pay for meals or headphones like on some of the Canadian Airlines. The food was tasty and enjoyable. A very long flight made comfortable by very helpful and attentive staff.

标题: Always wanted to fly Cathay - glad I did
内容: I've always wanted to fly Cathay and it was a good experience. Far east airlines have good reputations and Cathay matches them - even normal economy flying all that way was fine. Service was good and staff made you feel welcome and special. Menus in economy still! Makes it a little bit of a treat. We flew via Hong Kong...

标题: Excellent service and attention to detail
内容: The crew’s service and attention to detail is outstanding, unobtrusive but always attentive and helpful. Highly recommended.

标题: Business Class flight HKG to LHR
内容: Reasonably good flight. Business Class quite comfortable. Good crew and polite service. Perhaps not as good as Emirates but better than BA.

No priority check-in at the airport (although we had already checked in online), no priority luggage (Singapore does offer this service). The plane was fine and seats comfortable with sensible legroom. Also if the seat in front reclined there was still plenty of room, better than Singapore in that respect. Flights all arrived on time or early. Limited drinks service...

标题: Business Class Flight to NYC a Bit Disappointed
内容: So for years, I have been hearing of the superior service of Cathy Pacific airlines and I was excited by the opportunity to fly with them from Bangkok to NYC with a layover in Hong Kong. After all the hype I was disappointed- the seats were comfortable although other airlines have better sleeping arrangements- there was no pjs offered a...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Normally Cathay offers near perfect service. NOT TODAY. THey started boarding 45minutes before flight time. First Class is usually pretty darn good on Cathay but today someone screwed up. No pre flight alcoholic drinks were available. We had 45 min until the doors closed. The senior person on board could not fix the problem. A simple phone call. So now...
标签: International' 'First Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
Checked in on line and printed our boarding cards. Bag check in at airport was very efficient. Plenty of desks open so no queues. Flight left on time from Heathrow. Flew PE. Very comfortable and plenty of legroom. Drinks and hot towels prior to take off.
Once in the air, more drinks and dinner. Three course meal. Delicious food. We...
This was our first experience with Cathay Pacific & we were impressed.In flight entertainment was great food really good & service fantastic.Flight was comfortable & we would fly with them again

As part of a connecting flight to Bali we had good expectations of Cathay Pacific! Although you cant fault the cabin crew it must be said that the seats are very uncomfortable and baring in mind that during a daytime flight they will ensure the aircraft is in darkness by 3pm its very very difficult to sleep in these rick...

标题: Treat us like members in a family
内容: Thank so much for the crew of CX at LA airport for their kindness and help. It was indeed one of the unforgettable moment in my family trip. It was in August 217, after I dropped down my wife and children at the airport, I suddenly realized the return bay of my rental in quite far away from the airport....

Following a delay with Cathay Dragon and expecting to miss this London connection,due to insufficient transfer time, it was pleasing to be greeted on arrival in Hong Kong by ground staff. Whisked through security and escorted to departure gate with just enough time to spare. Well done to the organization.
London bound flight was uneventful with on board facilities satisfactory...

标题: Excellent flight with very attentive staff
内容: Really enjoyable flight. Delicious food and great service. Good inflight entertainment system. The seats were very comfortable enabling a few hours' sleep.

标题: Good Service Crew and availability of Indian Food
内容: While on the onward direction, flight was on-time, return was delayed by 3 mins due to congestion at the HKG airport. Since it was an odd hour (2: AM) start from Chennai, breakfast was served at around 4:3AM and it definitely disturbs the sleep. Crew was helpful to the passengers.

标题: An amazing experience. Excellent service and comfort.
内容:
A wonderfully experience from check in at HK - quick, friendly and efficient, to the lounge The Bridge, nicely equipped, to the flight itself, all was good.
Although the flight was over 15 hours, the service and comfort experienced made it feel half that amount.
From the lie flat bed, the meals presented on white linen and endless pampering, nothing...

We flew economy both ways and found the food great quality and tasty. The inflight entertainment options are good, films, TV, games for the kids, TED talks. The seats were comfortable. The staff service excellent, happy to help, happy to serve drinks throughout the flight. Brilliant.

标题: Very old plane with chairs broken
内容:
I was told that the service and the conditions of the Cathay pacific plane has improved. With this feedback I decided to use their service.
The condition of the plane is not good at all for such a long flight. With air fares being so competitive and airlines needing to remain relevant this is not acceptable. Also consideration for people...

Cathy never fails to satisfy, in my experience. they are not the cheapest to fly but the experience is better than some other airlines. The staff is well trained and polite, the planes are clean and food is ok.

Flying with Cathy Pacific was fantastic the flight staff were very responsive to anything you wanted or needed , the leg room was great, it was almost like flying business class only without the bed. I would highly recommend them to anybody.
Though the food selection was limited, the kitchen provides hot noodle cups and various sweet and savory snacks, plus fruit, throughout the long flights, LAX to Hong Kong and return.

We boarded the flight in Gatwick with a change at Hong Kong then on to Ho Chi Minh City with Cathay Dragonair. Although economy the seat was comfortable with adequate leg room. In flight service was good, food edible, the headset for the TV screen was good and I could hear the programmes/ films. The staff were on hand if...

标题: Great crew and service made long flight seem much shorter!
内容: The combination of flights we took with Cathay Pacific over 2 days seemed much shorter thanks to the great flight crews and service on the planes. First flight from JFK to Hong Kong was exception from the service to the food to the seats! The flight from Hong Kong to Kathmandu was also very good. Again, the service, food and...

标题: Flinght departed on time and arrived on time
内容: Service good , food good, cabin service average a bit slow after serving dinner .Ground service at Adelaide very slow at bag drop could open at least 1 or 2 more drops as most PAX check in on line 21Century .

标题: Missed connection - missed opportunity to make us happy
内容: Both out outbound and return journeys were impacted by late arrivals of our flight into Hong Kong. On our return journey we missed our connection altogether, No one could explain why our flight arrival was late, and the first response was you can fly to Perth via Sydney instead (almost doubling our 8 hour travel time) or wait 24 hours...

Very good service. An excellent plane, flew 2 hours, but we were fed. Places are many, easy chairs with TV and cameras from the aircraft.
Очень хорошее обслуживание. Отличный самолет, летели 2 часа, но нам кормили. Места много, кресла удобные с телевизором и камерами с борта самолета.

Last time I traveled by Cathay Pacific was about 1 years ago . It is still in good shape. No delays and good service.
The plane we used was mostly Airbus 33 and 777 which had flat bed angled seats. Except the the return flight from Narita to Hong Kong which was a regional 777 were the seats were not...

Every time I fly with Cathay Pacific, they will give me a great experience. From their nice service to the high quality of food and in-flight entertainment. I won't feel that stressful after flying on Cathay and I can be fully charged for my trip!

Cathay Pacific service was outstanding from checking in and depart on time,pilots and cabin crews were professional and outstanding ,inflight meals and entertainment were amazing,it’s our first time flying with Cathay Pacific and surely won’t be the last..
I was offered an earlier flight on buisness class, the check in was efficient, flight departed on time, in flight service was great!

Picture this, you woke up 2:3 am to arrive the airport at least 3 hours before 6:5 am flight. We braved the congested and slow pace of Manila Airport, immigration line is a minimum 45 munites standing queu. Boarding is a breeze , all seated and off the plane goes. Here comes the breakfast service and its done! Faster than...

Disappointed. Not the first time I have flown them and what is becoming the norm is delays, lack of communication, late arrival, queues at check-in, queues to board the plane poor service and poor food. Other than the high fares and am really struggling to find a difference between them and a budget airline.

This was one of 4 flights during are holiday with the airline, but all comments 3 into the four are common.
Stef are brill, seats surprisingly ordinary and little different to economy. Food was a little disappointing as in choice and scope.
Entertainment, films etc was ok.
We have done the same trip with another airline 2-3 years ago, with...

We booked the flight with Cathay Pacific as I was told that they were excellent. However, I was disappointed for our long haul flight from HK to Mel.
I was travelling with my husband and 2 young children (4yo & 8mo). We got seated separately. I was seated with my 8mo alone with 2 teenager boys next to me at...

标题: Best airline I have travelled on
内容: The flight was one and a half hours early when it arrived, so it was easy to transit. Lots of legroom and I got upgraded for free to business class. Very good airline.

Everything is perfect about Cathey Pacific airline. They are very punctual, very helpful. The check-in process is very fast and hassle free. They do not mind if you take one or two Kg extra checked-in baggage. They did not weight the carry on baggage nor they measured the size of the carry on baggage (as done by LLC airlines). The...

Firstly, I was travelling with a friend.. so we wanted seats together... When we tried doing web check-in 5hrs before the flight, it was showing error on their page..at the check-in counter they did not allow us to choose seats together saying that all passengers were automatically allotted seats.. we found this very strange. They couldnt find 2 seats together...

I understand that Cathay Pacific was under new management and the company has not been doing well and has been losing money but it appears that the quality of its products has followed suit and has gone downhill! My trip riding in the premium economy class was a joke: the food was bad and no better than economy class and...

Last flight was on 28 Mar to Bangkok. Take off time was on schedule, customer services and the aircraft meal was good. The seating was comfortable with spacious legroom. Comparing the ticket price with other airlines which is similar hence I'd prefer CX for the next travel.

Decent food, flight attendants helpful but understaffed, blankets & pillows on every seat, clean, good movie selection, adequate leg room, timely departure and arrival; would fly this airline again. It is such a long flight, when you are in economy class you just have to tough it out.

I remember the last time I flew Cathay Pacific to China. It was the most amazing experience that I had. The airline was late, so I missed my connection flight, but they gave me a free hotel stay at the HKG airport hotel for free without a single penny. That's what I love about Cathay Pacific, they really do care...

In my opinion Cathay Pacific airline has being providing reasonable good service to their frequent customers. Food quality in business class is decent and the deserts, ice cram, snacks and cheese is pretty good. I love their between meals the cheese burger and noodle alway hit the spot. Some crew I have met is exceptional attentive to your need. Make...

On March 27 my wife and I flew on Business Class from HKG to YVR on Cathay Pacific’s flight CX888. The service standard is extraordinary from the moment you check in to the moment you land. If you can pay it, Business Class is worth every dollar you pay for it. The seat becomes a flat bed which is truly...

Their service personnel used to be impeccable about 5 years ago and has been slipping a little lately.
Overall, still very trustworthy airline.
Seems like the staff is a little overwhelmed at times. In HK, the grounds crew is not as friendly and smiley as before - I chalk it down to inexperience and a LOT of younger workers with...

标题: Slipped a bit but still one of the top in teh world
内容: Felt pampered in Business class. Great seats, decent to better food but great champagne and beverages with nice pert but unobtrusive service. Plus, as business class you get lounge access and their lounges at HKG are some of the best in the world.
标签: Asia' 'Business Class' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Hong Kong

标题: had a great view of Danali
内容: prepare to get fed! even on a 1-1/2 hr jump flight to an island, they serve lunch! uneventful and relaxing flight.

This was a very enjoyable experience, from initial booking to check in through to the flight itself was exemplary for both my partner and myself. Even in economy there is sufficient leg room (I'm 6'2"). Foods and general service on board were fantastic and the staff could not provide better assistance. In flight entertainment was expansive and first rate. I...

Check-in smooth and they were happy to rectify seat request error made by Flight Centre. Baggage travelled safely to destination, despite having to be loaded on different aircraft along the linked journey pathway. Seat comfortable and onboard entertainment easy to use. Toilets kept fairly clean and dry. Food satisfactory in quality and quantity
I was booked in on Premium Economy and when there was a change in plane which did not have a Premium cabin, I was bumped up to Business and it was a terrific experience!

标题: good flight and smooth on time
内容: good flight which is smooth and on time. good legs space too and able to enjoy tasty meal. quiet on plane too and i like the service of the air stewardess and very friendly and approachable

I’m a nervous passenger as it is and we were told on the runway that there was an issue with the air conditioning unit which would be rectified once in flight. Also that we may experience more noise as a result. I didn’t fully hear the info given and was worried about the flight. That said I trust airlines to...

The best was CX97 from Hong Kong to Manila because the airline upgrade me into premium economy. I have a good Aisle seat all the time. Staffs are very professional and very nice. I have flown with this airlines so many times. I am looking forward to my next vacation next year. The foods are still good but maybe new...

Very long flights from TLV to BNE with a 6 hours layover in HKK - but...the service onboard is excellent, the food was quite good...plenty of entertainment...and amazingly, enough leg room!
Tip: in HKK search for the relaxing room for free...:)

We flew with Cathay Pacific to Hong Kong on Monday 5th March 218 and it was an excellent flight. The aircraft was modern and very comfortable. The Crew and inflight service and entertainment could not be faulted. After a three day stay in Hong Kong, we flew to Hanoi with Cathay Dragon, which again was a great experience. Thanks to...

Very pleasant flight, nice choice of food and good inflight entertainment. Air hostesses are very nice and care for all your needs. The flight was smooth and room between seats was acceptable. I have flown with them many times and will continue to do so.

The crew were late for take off. - Delay
Passenger on board - unwell - removed from flight - Delay
Cabin staff not very attentive to passengers needs.

This was my second time flying Cathay.
They were brilliant in Economy before...this time was Premium ...even better....
Flew via Hong Kong. And returned the same way (I hate the way you're treated by U.S. immigration/security etc treat you if you fly via L.A. whereas at HK..they are lovely)
Seats are roomy, cabin comfortable. Boarding well managed...staff superb.
Will use...

Absolutely nothing bad to say about this airline and the service. For such a long direct flight I had my worries about being uncomfortable but that was not the case. What made the flight perfect was the Staff, they were just so hospitality driven. Also, the food on the flight was excellent, all the meals surpassed my expectation.
These comment...

My luggage was left in Beijing airport. Per Cathay’s agent, they were informed more than an hour about the retention of my luggage for further checking by Beijing Airport Security, however I did not get any early notice from Cathay. I arrived in Manila without luggage bag.
very accommodating and helpful, I travelled with my 3 year old and 12 year old children with maximum allowable handcarry luggage with a kiddie stroller, we survived thanks to Cathay!

I have flown in all cabins in my life and tried " economy plus" for the first time earlier this year and was pleasantly surprised. I had plenty of leg room and was qite comfortable. The food was good and I was able to recline more than coach.....not as much as business class but half the price

I travel a lot every year, so CX is just another brand, amongst many others. Most of my flights are done by redemption of FF miles.
CX first, is a truly great flight experience - from check-in to end. The first cabin usually has 6 seats in 1x1x1 arrangement, whereas, a comparable 'best' will be SQ has 1x2x1 arrangement either...

标题: Super service and comfort on long flights
内容: My recent flights BOS-HKG-BKK-HKG-BOS were excellent. These were Premium Economy seats, with terrific legroom and recline for me. An upgrade to Business seat for a middle segment was even better, which provided ability to fully stretch out legs. The flight crew was courteous and caring - seems characteristic of Asian cultures and sets high standards for my next flights.

We flew with Cathay Pacific from Manchester to Hong Kong. I was a little daunted as it was an 11 hour flight and I had never flown with them before. We had been weighing up Emirates and Etihad, but Cathay Pacific saved us a few hundred pounds on each seat and the reviews were still good.
We flew economy, the...

It took half a day to track down different locator and flight numbers from American Airlines to check into the Cathay Pacific flight, one of American's partners.
The plane's entertainment featured recent movies, of which I saw six on this 17-hour flight.
The two meals were fine. However, snacks were available throughout the flight. Service with carry-on luggage was especially...

All domestic flights in the Philippines are delayed. But most likely this is not their fault. It is the fault of the country's Department of Transportation who has failed to upgrade Manila's flight capacity.
So get ready for a minimum of 1 hour delay! Plan ahead because if you have an international connection, you will not make it.

My husband and I travelled from Sydney to Osaka via Hong Kong on Cathay in early April. On the first leg of our travels, We prebooked our seats together beforehand but found out just before flight that we have been split. As a disabled person, I had to rely on my husband most of the time and splitting our seats...

标题: Hot Towels....Spacious Seats...Plenty of Food.....Premium Economy
内容:
Big debate on whether to spend the bucks. Flight out had plenty of snacks offered....pre ordered our meal, so we were always served first...and the toothpaste in the little kit was awesome at hour 16 in flight.
Seats went back with a little recliner pad for knees.
Great for a long flight.
Wonderful travel experience from check-in desk staff to staff on the plane then ground staff helping with questions. Well mannered, polite and friendly. Excellent in Chinese and English languages.

Very comfortable and time went very quick for a long flight.
We were served a meal as soon as we boarded and there were snacks along the way but for me it seemed like a long time till breakfast and I would have liked a little sandwich or something inbetween .

I used to love flying on Cathay Pacific, but on my most recent flight to Manila (on an older plane), I was disappointed in the service and the airline. They used to provide more amenities (e.g. eye masks, socks, etc.), but I had to ask for an eye mask and the pillow I used was dirty (stained pillow case). After...

This airline left us 3hrs at check in on our return home from the trip of a lifetime, Our connecting flight Hong Kong to Manchester has been cancelled and we had not been transferred onto the alternative flight even though our booking was made a year ago and full payment made,
We were left distressed whilst staff attempted to help...

标题: Best airline I have ever flown with!!!
内容: Excellent flight! Staff was VERY professional, courteous, friendly and efficient. It was a 2 hour flight (16.5 hrs to Hong Kong and 3.5 hrs to Singapore. The staff on board made the flight as enjoyable as they could.

Great flight between Shanghai and Hong Kong. The gate at Shanghai Pudong airport was crazy. Everyone was queued up and ready to board and then another flight was called to the same gate and were rushed out so it all got very confusing, everyone was shouting, with constant announcements over the speakers but eventually we left with about a half...

标题: Cathay is First-Rate All the Way
内容: If you are going to be in an airplane for over 16 hours straight on a nonstop run from JFK-HKG, doing it on Cathay Pacific business class is definitely one of the better ways to go. Seats are comfortable and don't require an engineering degree to figure out how to operate--everything is very intuitive. The meals are excellent in terms...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
I As a frequent flyer from Canada I initially wanted to fly Air Canada since I’m a big fan of that airline and accumulate Aeroplan points but a trip with AC from Toronto to Hong Kong in business class is very expensive. So, due to a much better price and positive reviews, I booked Cathay Pacific.
The CP lounge in...

I had travel with this airline a long time ago and I have always remember how great they were so I booked this flight last Febuary. No more and never . Cannot begin to tell you how rude they were and no one have any info on my layover flight back to Las Vegas . I had to walk to...

Our long flight with Cathy Pacific was comfortable.
Check in and boarding was quickly expleted.
On board the staff was kind and came as soon as we called them. The choice of films in Italian language was quite varied and up to date and that helps time pass.
The food was acceptable.

Great airline. Service & food was great. Plenty of leg room. Flight was pretty much on time both going & coming. Little care packs w toothbrush & paste & eye covers came in handy. And for a change, all tv screens worked. Vs other companies. Movie selection was pretty good too

The service was really good the staff went out of their way to accommodate my needs even though I had NOT specified my dietary requirements whilst being seated in the premium economy section.
I am truly appreciative of their willingness.

标题: great for a longhaul flight to London
内容:
Very comfortable trip. Nice and roomy, had an aisle seat which I usually request.
Service and food very nice, got my choice of mains as well. Only watched one movie, but all was good.

The moment you check in for the flight to the arrival in Hong Kong, you feel totally pampered. You will clear customs and go directly to the executive lounge to wait for your flight. The seating is very comfortable and there is plenty of food or snacks to eat. You have a wide variety of beverages to drink from pop,...

标题: Premium Economy is totally worth it!
内容: I recently flew LAX to HKG (LA to Hong Kong) and back in premium economy on Cathay Pacific Airlines. For international flights I had found previously that it is definitely worth the extra cost to book a premium economy ticket. Cathay Pacific did not disappoint in most respects. I will provide though some comparisons to another premium economy experience I...

标题: Finally a dedicated washroom in this Premium Economy section.
内容:
On board service very good. It has been a while now. Hardware about the same except the extra washroom does help substantially. Food quality also improved.
Bad thing is lots of passengers have to cross over the first row, stepping over the center aisle passengers like me. If another washroom can be installed, would be better. Fat chance of course.
