Cathay Pacific makes this twenty hour fight as painless as a long flight can be without flying first class. Great service from check in to in fight made my trip comfortable and on time. Five times I have flown this route to visit my family and i have no complaints. If you are going to Hong Kong or any where...
Good airline. Food was excellent. On one of my flights, the seat did not decline which was a pain as I needed to sleep and a little uncomfortable

This was a very long flight, 15+hours. I saw flight attendants working non-stop, serving passengers with a smile. Food was OK, certainly not the worst. There was snacks and drinks at the back you could just help yourself, but the attendants near by would always ask you nicely if they could help. That made me feel good, although I never...

We flew from Vancouver to Hong Kong. My wife had a broken knee cap and the airline staff went out of their way to assist in making her trip as comfortable as possible. The staff were very attentive, the food and drink was excellent and the plane itself was clean and all passenger amenities were fully operational. I have flown...

标题: Very nice flight with a lot of legroom and a good movie selection.
内容: Everything was very good, except the fact that I had an alcoholic man next to me who drank 16 deinks. In addition, he needed to go to the toilet 7 times in an 11 hours flight. I couldn't sleep. Don't understand why the flight attendants don't limit the consumption of drinks. Everything else was great, very silent plane.

This was our first experience flying overseas and I wasn't disappointed. Cathay Pacific is the cream of the crop compared to our in country flights. The service, the attendants, the food, oh yea the food was awesome, at least it was more than a cup of pop (drinks were included) and a mini pack of pretzels. Breakfast, lunch and dinner,...

It was extremely disappointing that on the first drinks service, less than an hour and a half into an 11 hour flight, the bar service had no tonic water to offer any passengers, not just those in economy. Food choices were also disappointing and repetitive. Our fight was London to Bangkok via Hong Kong. On the second leg, there were...

This was my first time flying this airlines. It was the best flight I've ever been on, and I travel overseas a lot! This was also the longest nonstop flight I've been on so this airlines made it a good flight. So much leg room, seats are bigger and really comphy. They feed you well with great service. Plus there...
Very good seating roomy and comfortable. The service very good very attentive to your needs. Would recommend to friends and family.

The price r/t jfk tp Bangkok , $699 on Cathay pacific. Economy wasn’t too bad. The flight was full . I try to get an aisle seat, I did. The seats were ok. The in flight meals were pretty good. The flight staff was professional. Economy plus would be very nice just add @ $6 . I am 6 foot...

We didn’t carry any suitcases, so we used the self check-in kiosks to have our boarding passes printed, and then proceeded to the customs and immigration clearance.
Our flight departed on time from Changi Airport and would stop over Bangkok before taking us back to Hong Kong.
My seat was comfortable with adequate legroom and storage provided. Loaded with a...
The flight was on time and no problems. Food was tasty. Movies and music included. Service was great. I will use this company again.

Took the midnight-ish flight from LAX to Manila via Hong Kong. 15 hours. Since I have a prior fractured ankle, I need to fly business class so I can stretch out. Slept for the first 8 hours, watched movies, all in all, a very nice flight. Tons of movies. Try the "Oriental Breeze" non-alcoholic drink (it's the Cathay Pacific special)....

标题: First 16-hour Premium Economy experience & would do it again
内容:
I am used to flights of this duration in Business Class, and have memories from 25 years ago of similar length flights in Economy, so had some reservations about flying to/from Hong Kong from the US now that I am considerably older and somewhat larger (5'8/25 lbs)
I normally struggle to sleep in Economy/PE seats on transatlantic flights, but managed...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Its worth the extra for a long haul flight!
内容: The extras you get in service, politeness, and better behaved fellow travelers is worth any extra cost. The food is better, service is better. The flight attendants are polite and happy to help you. If 2 meals are not enough they have hot cups of noodles anytime during the flight. They offer you complimentary snacks anytime. Asking for and obtaining...

Worthwhile going to the service room before when waiting for the flight. Luckily had the front row on part of the flight so able to move more and stretch our legs. Drinks were included on this flight as well as meals. Short layover which was good for getting to our destination in the shortest time. Lots of good movies available...

We chose Cathay Pacific for the price and route and for that price this airline was great! The land and flight crew were helpful, kind and very caring. The food was really good for airline food and there was a wide selection of onboard digital entertainment. I will fly CP again.

标题: Great experience on a long haul flight
内容: We opted to fly Cathay Pacific for our honeymoon to the Maldives instead of using an American carrier. It was a smart decision as we felt like the service was far superior. The business class seats were not as new as some of the American products but they were comfortable and relaxing for the 2 hours of flying. The attendants...
best service, great flatbed , and the pod is great ( these pods have been around a few years but there great

We fly from the States to Thailand once or twice a year to visit family. This was the first time it worked for us to take Cathay. Over the past 5 years, we have flown mostly Delta, but have also used Korean Air and Singapore Air.
On Cathay, we flew Premium Economy, but were upgraded on one leg to Business...

This company so far has been the best airline, they are very professional, as well as friendly. their Airplanes are always very clean and comfortable. I have only flown premium economy and the food and service are excellent.

标题: It was a long long flight.
内容: In-flight movies and music included in the fare. Food was very tasty with a choice of 3 entrees. The seats were uncomfortable. I had to get up every hour to move to relieve muscle soreness. Next time I will pick a higher class of seating.

Had to endure 4 hrs flight time from singapore to hongkong with faulty seat and 2 crying babies beside me (unable to recline it, cause the button was stuck. All i get was just "sorry, the button is stuck" from the cabin crew).
Food was terrible and the cabin crew only offer drink twice during the last flight (15 hrs...

标题: Fabulous flight could have been excellent
内容: Seats very comfortable and entertainment was great with a broad selection from which to choose. Food better than some airlines. Flight was smooth and we arrived ten minutes early. That said, I would like to add that the flight attendants did not pay much attention to passengers other than the ones in business class. I ordered a cup of tea...

i always travel with cathay pacific and feel comfortable,i like this airline and also services is good and i had booked another flight again this coming Dec 218 the only problem is that cathay is more expensive than others,and also they offer the rewards points that can be used or redeemed for travel and other stuff.

标题: Very efficient and a pleasure to fly with
内容: Everything you have heard about and more. Very efficient airline. Staff are friendly and excellent service. Seats are comfortable, seat back screens work properly and they have actual headsets for passengers. Food was very good and served piping hot. Economy class seating is comfortable with enough leg room. The airline also offers the option of a camera view beneath the...

标题: Not what it used to be
内容: Check in process a bit unorganized. The on flight service was average/cold. The staff wasn't very helpful, they would tell you to get water yourself when you ask for it, pointing to the service area. And they aren't as friendly as before, and lack flexibility. This isn't the Cathay Pacific service that i am accustomed to. And the bathrooms weren't...

标题: Seamless transit and excellent economy class
内容: I took cathay pacific with my wife and kid when we were travelling from delhi to vancouver. We travelled economy class and were pleasantly surprised when were offered seat assignments when i had called for some other reason sine i was travelling with my kid. Seatng from delhi to hong kong was decent and we had pre ordered hindu meals....

Flew out March 21st and returned April 1st on CX828 - excellent trips!! Give me 15 hours on Cathay Pacific over 1 hour on Air Canada any day!! Great cabin crews, looked after you; comfortable seats, lots of leg room; lots of first run movies on personal screens; they actually give you a menu with real food to choose from...

标题: Quality of service dropped, still high on safety
内容: My trip to Hong Kong had been delayed for 16 hours. Yes 16 hours long enough to scrambled my entire Asia trip. Besides I only got a few hours of notice prior! At least I got the notice before I head to the airport. It would not be fun to start a trip with a taxi back, and, forth with...

标题: Enjoyed Business Class O'Hare to Hong Kong
内容: We booked this flight through American Airlines more than six months in advance. Fortunately I was checking on another flight in the booking when an agent informed me that this flight had been cancelled. She said the flight had been cancelled four months earlier. I'm not sure which airline was supposed to have contacted us, but we did not know...

I don't really bother writing reviews for Business Class flights as they are always excellent. Economy class are more helpful due to the bad legroom on many airlines.
Anyway we liked the lounge in Hong Kong which offered decent food unlike United lounges.
Flight a Boeing 777 left on time.
The crew were extraordinary. The flat bed very comfortable.
Make...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Fabulous service from lounges to arrival. Excellent staff were efficient and helpful without being intrusive. Business class seating was very good with sensible easy to use storage and a good quality in flight entertainment system. Food was above average and was quickly served and equally important quickly cleared when finished, Nothing was too much trouble for the crew including ensuring...

I have flown Cathay Pacific in First Class and also in Business Class. ( we are great at using our FF points). This is a first rate experience, either way. Starting with the First Class lounge in Hong Kong. Order from the menu. I learned , too late, that massages are offered, but they were booked for my time frame....
标签: International' 'First Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: The food is good. The attendants are amazing. Seats are comfy! Airline very clean and professional. They are a bit expensive but worth it. I feel safe flying with them unlike others I tried. Overall they never let me down ifever we arrive early.

I connected to Chicago O'hare then to Hong Kong and on to Manila. The planes were nice and the staff was about half the age of the US based airlines. Very comparable otherwise to the US based carriers but I thought the cabin configuration for the 777 and the Airbus 33 were both nicer than I have been on in...

标题: Excellent services and comfortable seating and other featuers.
内容: I have been flying frequently between Hong Kong and SFO. The best airlines are Cathay Pacific and Singapore Airline, both in terms of services and seating comfort. Their prices are slightly higher than some other airlines, but the price worth it. One of the worst is UAL...

All I can say is thank goodness for Cathay- they actually want to take care of the customer- Weird right! you fly any other airline (mostly american ones) and they couldn't care less about you - you want something from any american airline.. you'll get it when they get around to it.. or best even to not bother them.
I...
Second flight with Cathay. Just booked my third-lovely service, food is good, on time. Let you spread out if available.

Everything seems to be good about the airline. However, it becomes a challenge when you travel with an infant. Keep sufficient food with you as it seems to be little boring with the variety of food for infants. All my segments on return had the exact same food for the infant.

If you are making a trip to or through Hong Kong from Los Angeles a Premium Economy seat on such a long flight is a reasonable financial value. The airline does everything to make this flight enjoyable with current movie selections, food, beverages,blanket,ear plugs and a toothbrush with toothpaste.

Good airline.Great crew and service.Nice aircraft both directions. Went for the Premium Economy upgrade LAX to HKG . Worth it for the seats on a long haul. Didn't upgrade on return because Hong Kong upgrade price was insane. Seats in Regular Economy get kind of rugged after 7 hours !
This was the 2nd time I have flown on this airline.It is one of the best.The seats are comfy and there is ample legroom.The food is surprisingly good and the people are very nice.
Service was very good and the food was better than you would expect from an airline. The seat was very comfortable and I was able to get in some snooze time.
I have flown Premium Economy and Economy. I had bulkhead for the Economy and it worked out great. Premium Economy is nicer, but you pay

Wonderful Service
Better than anything provided by an American or Canadian Airline that I have experienced.
Good current movie selections

Efficient, courteous, and enjoyable flight. Even for 14 hours in economy. There seemed to be more legroom than on United, good movies, good food, and friendly flight attendants. It is what you hope flying will be, even if you have to fly economy.

The flight I had was very good and the flight attendants were very accommodating. Although I think that I got a flight with fairly new attendants. They did not seem to be as familiar as all of the attendants on board. The food is very good and they even will give you Ramen noodles on request at any time you...

标题: If you need wheelchair assitance, this carrier is not for you
内容:
I flew Manila to Hong Kong, Hong Kong to Los Angeles. Out of Manila, a profoundly disabled man was carried down the aisle to his economy seat, no aircraft wheelchair.
In Hong Kong they boarded wheelchair pax mingled with general boarding and that was a mess, with handicapped people trying to navigate the aisles with regular pax pushing bags into...

Cathay Pacific is so much better on the flight to HKG. I have flown this flight in First Class, Business, Premium Economy and Economy. In all classes it is so much better than United Airlines. Especially in Economy.
One tip for flying in Economy is to get a seat on the center aisle. The aircraft has a 3-3-3 seating in...

标题: Legroom, excellent in-flight entertainment. The opposite of United!
内容: Normal coach can be great on this carrier. They make a genuine effort on seating requests. Meals are quite decent, and the people are accommodating and nice. In all of this, they present a most attractive alternative to United Airlines. Especially in their routes, avoiding Narita.
Typical 777 Business Class compartments. Not much different than flying American Airlines. The staff at the check-in counter were especially helpful.

Having done international first class on US Domestic carriers in the past, had the opportunity to fly Cathay Pacific on a recent flight back to the US from Singapore. While the airplane was a slightly older Boeing 777 and did not have WiFi, everything else about the flight was so far above anything offered by domestic carriers that I will...

My fight (893) from Hong Kong to San Francisco was excellent. I had a bulkhead seat with plenty of room to stretch my legs out. I was NOT near any restroom and a curtain blocked off the seats in front of me…. I feel I really had the best seat in economy!!!!! Food was super with Cathay and the wines...

My flight (8887) from Bangkok to Hong Kong on Cathay Pacific was really nice!!!!! I had a bulkhead seat in the aisle and had tons of room to stretch my legs!!!!!! The dinner they served was the best and it included Hagan Das ice cream… I got to load with the Priority group due to my status with American Airlines……...

Nonstop flight Boston to Hong Kong.
Good check in service. Good service on the flight.
Good Food.
On time performance.

Flew from Manchester to Hongkong , and then return from Bangkok - Hongkong - Manchester and can not say a bad thing about the airline at all.
Seating is spacious enough and I’m 6”3 17stone. Decent entertainment system. Foods good. Air hostesses friendly. Thankyou

We treated ourselves to business class on our return so that we could enjoy a fully flat seat/bed. It was well worth the additional cost. We travelled out prem economy and whilst that was ok we just couldn’t sleep other than fitfully. Your feet are raised only slightly and your head just bounces about! The fully flat bed is exactly...

标题: Very comfortable, excellent food ... but the timetables are a problem
内容: The flight was scheduled for 1am departure after it had been changed several times in the weeks before. On the morning of the flight - on the way to the airport I got a text advising a 6 hour departure delay. Very unsatisfactory with insufficient notice - especially for connecting flights. Once aboard, staff were excellent, food was great. Lie...

We took the red eye flight to HKG then onwards to Osaka. Flight attendants were very attentive and responsive. Food was pretty good for cattleclass and entertainment system had a wide variety of options for adults and kids.

We flied on CX airbus A35 to and from Melbourne, Australia to HK in Mar 218 Am very satisfied with the comfortable airbus A35 seats and CX inflight entertainment. Worth recommending people flying out from HK to Merbourne on this direct flight, wiith a bit more $ but direct, no transit in other country wasting time.

The flight we took was a bit disappointing the plane itself was clean and the staff professional but did not really make you feel welcome but only did their job . The seats had good legroom but were not that comfortable, luckily we only had a 2.3 hr flight so it was bearable but they are very firm . The...

Business Economy is a oxymoron, that said it's well worth the money on a long flight, you get enough space to get reasonable comfortable and can actually sleep. Cathy Pacific is a great airline and they provide enough amenities to make the flight enjoyable.

Since it is a long haul flight; 16 hours. Flying with kids is not easy.
The service was average comparing to our previous experience. We had much better with Cathay Pacific.
Food was just ok but portions are good.
The timing for food service was too close together. After the last food service, there was a 6 hours gap until...
Night flight on the second part of our journey from Gb. Perfect flight. On time, excellent seating ,fine dining and loved the quilt to keep us warm. Would definitely fly Cathy Pacific again

The plane is nice and the food is ok. And the flight was on time. So not bad at all.
However, on both legs of the flight they ran out of one of the meal options and instead of saying sorry (or even offering business menus as happened to me once at Lufthansa) they just said "Sir, would you like...

I found the check-in staff very friendly and helpful. The boarding arrangements though were a little confused.
My first impression of the cabin crew is that they seem to spend a lot of time rushing about in a bit of a panic whilst not actually doing a great deal. Not calm and controlled!
Although we had, by and large, lovely...

From Boston to Hong Kong to Manila and return. Boarding areas were congested and confused. Gate service was friendly but unhelpful - at least they were trying! Once onboard the premium economy seating section is small (4 seats?) which is good. But the seats themselves are not premium unfortunately. Nor are the amenities/services/food.

标题: Great airline - worth booking premium economy for a long flight
内容:
Great flight, wonderful food, fantastic choice of movies
Really appreciated the extra room in premium economy
We actually were in two flights
First Toronto to Hong Kong and then Hong Kong to Sydney

Flew Cathay recently on 4 legs from UK return via Sydney and Hong Kong. Check-in, flights and seats were all good. Paid extra for exit rows at a premium. Staff were courteous and food was the usual airline fare. Would use them again.

标题: Nice experience, should improve customer service
内容: We travel from Amsterdam to Hong Kong and from Hong Kong to Amsterdam in 2 days in March. The check-in process, the online service, information about the flight was easy and simple. There were no delays with both flights. Flight entertainment was quite varied for everyone to find something. The food was delicious and on return flight the staff is...

标题: The airline is good but be careful of wo you book it through
内容: I booked this through a company in Spain called travelgenio. Do not book with this agent. I received my eticket and my name was spelt wrong. I tried to email them to correct it but they didn t have one only a phone number. Well I was n Vietnam and couldn t call spain, my Spanish is not good anyway....

标题: Great airline with good legroom for economy
内容: Airbus A35-9 awesome plane, most modern one ive been on. We sat at tail end of plane, had sufficient legroom for me, im 6'4. Plane has camera on tail facing forward and underneath just behind front wheels. During day flight this would be awesome. Toilets at rear were tight, but toilets towards middle had lots of room. Kitchen at rear...

It was my first experience with this airline, but it has not surprised me with anything special. Sometimes I had the feeling that the flight attendants were bored and not happy when you needed something.

标题: on time flight but service has degraded
内容: The flight is on-time. The premium economy class is slightly more spacious. However, the seat is full of hair and dirty (I believe they need to strengthen their cleaning service). The seat is designed to allow you to lie down with angle. However, it really hurt my back as the support of the seat is not enough. The meal is...

We flew Business because of those wonderful credit card points from our Amer Airl card.
The aircraft was a 777-3 R --We had a "pod" and it was fantastic to be able to be totally comfortable with the ability to make the seat recline to any degree including a full bed--BUT the best was the staff of little "China Doll"...

标题: Attentive and excellent service. Comfortable flight.
内容: Comfortable flight that helped me started a new day at my destination with ease. Staff were very friendly and attentive to my needs.

Bad things :
~Flight has been delayed for half an hour but no announcement given at all at the gate !
~Didn't schedule to deliver donations envelopes to passengers after their standard announcement likewise; Stewardess couldn't find any even though i asked them consequently !
~We ordered difference of veggie meals in advance. As the result, they rendered us the...

标题: Not like it used to be
内容:
We took a midnight flight from Singapore to Hong Kong. Flight was delayed 3 times. Once on the morning of the flight, another before we head to the airport and another time when we were on the way to the airport.
In flight entertainment could be better with more movies and games available.
Service was lacking on the flight as...

The airline staff were very friendly the seats were good and plenty of room the food was great and staff were helpful with anything you want to make trip as best as possible take off and landing was the smoothest I have had for a long time would fly with them again

This was my second flight on a Cathay Pacific a35-9 and it was very nice experience. The seats were a generous width and pitch. The plane is the quietest I've flown in and the twelve and a bit hour flight was very comfortable.The large screens in the seat backs had a huge range of films, TV shows and games to...

Cathay Pacific again did the marvelous job, yes they are a little more pricey but you definitely get what you pay for, always on time, great service by ground personnel and flight attendant on board.
In three weeks of business struggling total nine long-distance flights out of them five flights were by Cathay Pacific, smooth smooth no issues no complaints...

This flight from Osaka to Hong Kong was full being code shared with two other airlines. The air hosts were courteous and helpful not to mention very efficient during the meal service. The food provided was a bit disappointing though.
The inflight entertainment was OK with wide variety of options to choose from. Legroom was comfortable for a person of...

This was my first flight with CP in about 5 years. I chose CP because of the good fare I got and quick connecting time in HK to Phuket. The plane was spotless, flight pleasant , staff friendly. Service not quite on par with Emirates and QAtar but I avoided long overlays in Doha and Dubai

Nowadays, you hardly would expect a real surprise in your flight experience. Things have been so expected and routine. Overall smooth operations, air hostesses were courtesy and attentive. The five hours flight with a some good movies to watch are good enough to kill your time (and if you know some skills, you might be able to watch 2.5 movies)....

标题: Best Airline I have been on
内容: Second time for flying with this airline. Comfort, service, food, entertainment is excellent even in economy.

Aircraft is the new A35. So, the windows are larger, the air is fresher and more pressurized and less dry. The better cabin atmosphere made me feel better than other similar flights.
Seats - perhaps they recline a bit more than older premium economy seats. All seats now have leg rest, not just the front row. The space to the...

Flight was in time but services from the younger crews were disappointing. They showed face when we requested for things and weren't helpful at all considering we had a baby on board with us. They made us feel as though we were very troublesome when we needed food tray to be cleared so we could lift the baby off the...

标题: Fly Cathay over SAA from JNB
内容: Having had a particularly disastrous experience with SAA on more than one occasion, i strongly recommend that if you have a chance to fly Cathay, do it. Seats are way more comfortable and the flight crews each time have been efficient and superb in their service.

I use to travel with Cathay Pacific many time, especially long haul. They have 3 meals before but now cut it to 2 meal. I tried last time from Zurich to Hong Kong, the last meal serve before 7 hours which flight arrive Hong Kong, that's make passenger very hungary when off the flight. The quality of crew still keep...
On-time, attentive staff, professional service, excellent food, excellent in-flight entertainment. Overall, I will be recommending them!

Best choice flying from / to Taipei with so many flights during peak [Easter] holiday period. Always meet the expectation with excellent services and warm welcome. Good timing control and seldom delay flying this route. Confident and value-for-money!
Excellent flight, great movie selection. Good food and wine! Enough room for legs and comfortable seats.

First time to fly with Cathay and certainly not the last time! Including change of planes in HK, heading for Cebu, a trip of 15 hours! That's great. Service on board is super, good entertainment and food, even in Economy.

标题: Quick flight so missed end of movie!
内容: So many announcements interrupted the film that missed the ending. Shame they cannot solely use text to relay information. Book seats early to avoid being separated from family, especially during busy holiday times.

Very Good quality of services even in econimy class. Attentive staff, good food, snacks always available during the flight, great variety of movie and entarteinment options. Can not provide a real value for monyey because this flight was booked by my compaby. Amazing check in at the airport, and the lady did not cared about the few kg extra in...

标题: Excellent & Professional Service make this my airline of choice
内容: While I normally fly Premium Economy, I usually use my Asia miles to upgrade to business on the way home. Either way with Marco Polo (I'm silver) check-in is a breeze as is priority boarding. In flight the attendants are professional and super helpful. The meals in business class are great and in my opinion superior to most other airlines....

标题: Severe weather for landing - pilot sounded lacking in confidence.
内容:
Flew back on 1st of March. Heavy snow showers and winds in London PM.
Pilot outlined difficulties on leaving Hong Kong - sounded pessimistic.
Voice of white wine was no choice - Spanish White or Australian. I chose Spanish as a joke and if my kitchen sink is blocked i will know what to use. The champagne upon boarding was...

标题: Inflight service OK, seats not good; baggage care HORRIBLE
内容: I flew from CCU to LAX via Hong Kong. To my surprise, of the 2, one bag did not reach its final destination. That's OK to happen....worse is no one will call you back to give an update.... you have to call yourself. On top, most of the time no one picks up the phone at LAX office, unless you...

Only 4 toilets for approx 1 passengers, was an eye opener. The crew was mainly young, and battled to cope. Where was the experience? Why dd you leave the clearing of food trays until the plane was in descent? Very surprised at the perfomance of Cathay

标题: Good connection decent food all in the best priced economy available.
内容: The connections in both directions were very good with minimum walking to change planes. Avoiding going thru Bangkok is a real plus in traveling to Phuket. The pricewasvery reasonable. It would be hard to beat this.

We often fly Cathay Pacific. The seats in economy offer enough room for a pleasant and comfortable flight. There are lots of tasty snacks available for free (self service) and there is a wide choice of movies to watch. The meals, however, are average and the water that is regularly offered during the night tastes like a swimmingpool. But despite...

Flew from Hong Kong to Jakarta March 218. Made reservations back in Sept. 217. would not assign seats until 2 wks before departure. Called several times trying to get someone and was placed on hold for hours each time with no one ever answering the phone. Tried using the computer and basically the same results. Due to a total hip...

标题: Be quick to reserve a seat
内容: All in all not bad but was very surprised when checking in 48 hours prior to departure to not have been allocated a seat and the only available option was the last row (luckily on this plane the seats could recline but that's not always the case when in the last row). Most airlines will allocate a seat for you...

Taking this flight just few days ago and still remember the exact taste of the moldy water, it was absolutely terrible and please for anyone from Cathay Pacific to improve this condition as soon as possible as drinking water is essential, is our basic necessity for goodness sake. Water served on board taste so like dirt, mold, everything that perhaps...

Was looking forward to flying what I was told was a great to awesome airline with Great service and attentive flight staff. I / We must have been on wrong plane...no they all said "Cathay Pacific" on them. Terrible flight service (Except last flight), flight attendants acted like you were intruding if you asked for some water of coffee ...on...

Cx252 day flight to hk....in part fun for the rugby..in part work for factory visits.
This airline is world class.
From the lounge to the flight ...World class.
BIG thanks to Sharon in the Lhr lounge for looking after our group.

Frankly, I don't fly CX often, given my presence in another airline, and my previous experience with the airline was nothing too amazing. The old business class (probably many years ago) was just, in my opinion now, something like a premium economy class.
During my recent trip, I decided to try CX again and I am pretty happy with their...

标题: Pleasant flight though it was crowded
内容: Check-in at Terminal 4 was a breeze. Though there was a short delay in the departure, the flight was smooth. The cabin crew was efficient.

标题: Great flight from Vancouver to Hong Kong (then connected to Koh Samui via Bangkok Airways)
内容: Comfortable flight. The plane is nice and I really appreciate Cathay keeping the 3+3+3 seating in economy with the wider seats than competitors (who are cramming in 3+4+3. that extra 1.5" makes a big difference on a 14 hour flight. Seat power and USB worked great. Food was good. Crew did a great job keeping things clean.

标题: Always fly Cathay Pacific when I travel to Europe
内容:
There are so many cheap flights available but for me, I'd rather pay extra for the reliability, comfort and service that Cathay Pacific provides. On a long flight I need to have room to stretch my legs and not be too cramped in my seat.
On board movies are provided to pass the time. (I tend not to be able...

First time flying business class & it didn't disappoint. It made the experience of a long haul flight truely memorable. Your seat area was spacious & being able to lay down & sleep made the journey comfortable. The inflight films weren't to my taste but I managed to sit through a few. I'm not a fussy eater but the food...

标题: Do not waste your money on Premium Economy with this greedy airline
内容: Other than reducing the seats in each row from 9 to 8 to give you a little more room and getting extra baggage allowance, everything else is Economy. There was no dedicated toilet for this class of service and if the seat in front is fully inclined and you have do not have an aisle seat then getting out is...

Very comfortable seats on the Boeing 777. Excellent service. Good food menu.
1-2-1 configuration in business class means all seats are aisle seats! The airport lounges at SFO and HKG were very comfortable, well stocked with good food and drinks.

标题: Everything is excellent except online check in - which is horrendous
内容: I have never had such a frustrating experience in my life with online checkin. Im a Canadian citizen travelling with my American wife. The online checkin took all my info easily but then it wanted my wife's Visa/Permanent Resident Card. She doesn't have one because she is an American !

Flight over North Pole and Siberia to Hong Kong was very smooth, very good food and crew was courteous and did everything to make this 15-hour flight comfortable. There was a very good selection of the most recent movies. The flight Hong to Toronto was also excellent. I highly recommend Cathay Pacific.

标题: Very Disappointed as it used to be great
内容:
Cathay Pacific- Perth to London.
Terrible. Premium economy wasn’t worth the extra. The seats were a decent size but the block in the middle means that if the flight is part empty, you can’t spread out. The foot rests were metal bars- not sure how they are considered comfortable. The worst part was the food. It tasted terrible, so I...

On a last minute impulse, I booked Cathay Pacific through Expedia as the price was reasonable.
The Service on board was good with cheerful, friendly cabin stuff. Food was average, wine and champagne was very good.
What I want to compliment most is the after sales service or customer service based in HongKong.
Due to an unfortunate incident, I had...

Cathay Pacific is the best...
I have never had a bad flight with this airline. Exceptional service, cleanliness and the food is always great.

标题: great plane and good overall experience
内容: I have taken 4 legs of flying in the last week, 2 business class, 1 premium economy and 1 economy and overall, I really liked the experience and in average I really rate the airline. Planes and entertainment are excellent, business lounges great, but I rate service and quality of food inside just average in all class of service, Not...

Cathay 33 flight from dubai and onward connection from hkg to Shg. very good connection which was on time and schedule. The flight was little old but overall good flight and good food and enough channels not to get bored.
Can recommend for business flyers as on time and on schedule .

Cathay Pacific was our choice for flights to and from Hong Kong. The service was excellent, the food was good and the economy seats reasonably comfortable.
This all has changed. During our most recent trip, JFK-HKG; HKG-SFO, I was needing a wheelchair. At JFK, no problem. On aarival in HKG, there was no wheelchair. After waiting a while at the...

A very convenient flight indeed with nice Hindu vegetarian meal as booked before with tickets. Nice in flight entertainment screens with wide variety of movies, music English n Hindi both. Pleasant and helping crew.

标题: Always Been a First Class Airline
内容: My wife and I have flown Cathay Pacific several times now. In fact, we're using them again this Aug (218) to fly to Hong Kong again. They're always putting customers ahead. I don't remember if they're ever been late for departure or arrival of our destinations. Keep up the good work Cathay.

Very nice service! Impecable plane with very pleasant ambiance. Of course, with the competition and cost cutting that airlines have gone through, one can not expect to be served Dom Perignon in these flights.
The crew has a very well thought way of making your trip easy and arrive to HK with little jet lag.
The breakfast arriving to HK...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: One of the best flights I’ve taken
内容:
I flew Cathay Pacific for the first time to Hong Kong in economy class on their new A35 aircraft. I had a window seat over the wing in very comfortable seats and good leg room . The crew was attentive, polite and very helpful and everything was done with a smile .
We had little turbulence en route which made...

This was one of those awful flights in which you are to answer questions from some security company (business or leisure? Where were you? What did you do on your trip? etc.) before you are allowed to board. I hate this so much. In my opinion, only immigration officials should be asking those questions. Second thing that infuriated me about...

My second time to fly with Cathay Pacific and still my experience was the same at its best. The sitting area was very comfortable and entertainment up to date. Food selection was okay & Beverage was non-stop.

I had 2 cases and was allowed 4kg. I was over that by 2 kg and was told that i should be careful as this is not acceptable. I accept this but I was travelling with friends who had less weight with their luggage.
The food choice was limited and there was no offer of drinks or refresments in between...

We have traveled to and from Hong Kong many times, mostly on Cathay Pacific. Their business class is very good, where you are treated very much like an honored guest. The seats on the 777 concert to a reasonably comfortable bed (not quite like our bed at home, but you can get a decent sleep on this very long flight)....

Our flights from SFO/CEBU was good cabin crew were nice and friendly we were served our vegan meal, however our flight going back to SFO which has lay over in HK was delayed and was not assigned a gate when we check in so it lead us to a chaotic and stressful time finding out which gate to run which...

标题: Worst Service and Policies (did not let me use my return ticket)
内容: I had worst experience with Cathay Pacific. I booked 4 tickets from Melbourne to Delhi and in return 3 days stay in Hong Kong. I had done online checked in a day before (System accepted) and then next day when I went to the counter and then realize my son's passport is expired so I have sent my wife and...

I feel the services are definitely better than before. Before was good already, but this time even better. The flight to Japan was quite full and my boyfriend and I weren't booked in to sit next to each other. But the cabin crew team assist us to change the seats to the best they could get.
When we came back...

Flew from Manchester to Sydney (Australia) return via Hong Kong. Flight from Manchester was virtually full.
Boarding was done by Row Numbers, but people don't listen and just queue up anyway causing more delay, then get told to sit down again. Flight was comfortable, Entertainment system had all the latest movies, TV series. Food was quite edible. Staff was very...

Cathay Pacific had disregarded our beliefs and dietary needs by failing to pass on out request for vegetarian meals on our outgoing flights, despite our efforts to fill all necessary forms.
The reply from their Customer Relations Executive was poorly at the beginning, blaming us for not mentioning our vegetarian request for the third times when Cathay changed our flight...

标题: There must be a better way to spend your money. Or maybe not.
内容: At twice the price of a budget flight, I expected better from Cathay. They did not carry my booked Veggie meal, and only had pot noodles and an apology to offer instead. They became the 5th flight out of 9 flights with 4 companies in 2 months to not carry my booked meals. Seems to be the new standard. The...

Cathay is a premier airline and provides service and comfort that is one of the best among all airlines. The Business Class lounge is fantastic and provides food, drinks, magazines, newspapers, showers, restrooms. Boarding is stress free and the business class pods convert to flat beds which is great for the 15 hour flight. Food is excellent and snacks are...

Our family 3 pax selected Cathay Pacific cx47 from Hong Kong to Taipei (original time was 1745 on 29 March 218) for Easter holiday, unfortunately, the flight delayed to 22:24 , there’s 4 hours and 39 mins delayed, no explanation, no help the customers. Finally, we arrived hotel at 3:3 am, lost holiday, lost money, after then that we all...

标题: Great Lounge in Singapore Terminal 4 but love A35 less than Boeing planes
内容: I took CX69 from Singapore Changi Airport to Hong Kong and flew in economy. I arrived quite early at the airport as I was coming off a cruise that docked early in the morning. Cathay now uses the new Terminal 4 of Changi airport and it is indeed a stunningly beautiful and efficient airport. I prefer dealing with an actual...

I flew to Denpasar (Bali Indonesia) from Hong Kong on CX785 in economy. The flight was operated by a B777-2 (I note on some days, the flight is operated by an Airbus 33-3 instead). I was lucky in that I was sitting on the aisle in the middle section and the middle seat was not occupied giving me extra room...

Having flown Emirates a couple of times, this our first with Cathy Pacific. It was a very long flight but enjoyable as time flew by!!
The food was good but a bit too spicy and hot for our liking, but others enjoyed it, and that is what matters. Drinks available, if you wanted more you only had to ask.
Service...

Overall a decent long haul flight. No delays, excellent check in and boarding. Polite, helpful staff, comfortable seating with plenty of leg room and good entertainment options. The two areas of concern for us were the food and the sanitary arrangements. The former was poor, congealed and only heated in places and the latter was a case of walking some...
Every time I went to Hong Kong. I would like to fly with Cathay Pacific night flight and arrived early morning in Hong Kong, that would save me a night for the hotel.

This flight was lovely
Very long flight but comfortable as can be
Meals good and staff lovely and attentive

The planes are nice and tidy and for the most part, the flights were on time. I was very disappointed with the service. Over the course of a 14 hour flight, there was very little service. I think they offered water once outside of the meal service. When I got up to ask for water bottles for me and my...
We have used Cathay before and each time, our trip has been very relaxed and enjoyable. Reasonable connection time and the staff are more than helpful

We ended up flying with cathay through our travel agent, they were proving cheaper than its competitors and were also having a sale. I was very impressed indeed, definitely got the feeling of flying with a high end airline, from checking in to the business lounge and last not least the flight itself. The aircraft itself appeared to be quite...
Flew business class from Brisbane to Hong Kong then on to Mumbai. Return was Delhi Hong Kong, Brisbane. Service and comfort is still as good as it was the last time I flew on Cathay a few years ago.

标题: Flying at Economy Class with Cathay Pacific
内容: Flying economy class is of course already predictable of what you can get value for your money. Food, amenities etc. So, flying with Cathay Pacific is just right. I was able to watch two films that are still current and enjoyed it; plus, I can monitor our flight distance through the moving map and as the passengers are also polite...
Since the flight from Hong Kong to Paris was fully booked, that why, I were denied to upgrade to Premium Economy. The cabin in Economy class was too spacious and I were being trapped for 12 hours.

标题: Best airline in the world for business comfort.
内容: The seating in business is superb. Only single seats on the window and 2 in the middle so you have total privacy. Food is one of the best I have had in this class of travel and entertainment system modern. Staff are attentive.

I have been on 8 Cathay Pacific flights over the last 2 months and all I can say is over priced and poor service
One of my flights was delayed by 6 hours on one occasion
Staff are not very welcoming or friendly
I would not recommend this airline

标题: Very good airline for long haul fights.
内容: I have been flying with CX on and off for the past decade or so and they always deliver the very good level of service - consistency. The flight attendants are very professional with a friendly demeanor. It's very good for family with young kids too. The only area that CX could improve on is the in-flight meals. Depending on...

标题: Short time from Melbourne to Stockholm
内容:
Friendly crew, good legroom, seats a bit hart however comfortable,
Food and wine selection limited over all good.

My wife was telling me Chinese airlines hold 5 of the top 1 airlines in the world. Here's why. Comfortable seats, very attentive cabin crew, good food and, very important, restrooms CONSTANTLY cleaned including air freshner throughout the flight. A choice of several movies a bonus. As an American it disappoints me that our airlines can't offer this sevice.
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Los Angeles - Ho Chi Minh City

标题: All in all not too bad for Economy.
内容:
Economy class return flight to Auckland via Hong Kong departing from Paris.
Opting for aisle seats for all my flights certainly made them a lot more comfortable with the ability to have a wander and stretch my legs at will. As to be expected Economy is a little cramped but the seats were comfortable enough as I managed to sleep...

Cathay Pacific's economy class seems to have considerable leg space compared to other airlines in this same class category. The head rest of the seat can be adjusted to a certain degree in height. also the head rest can be bent so that the passenger's head does not fall off (droop) while sleeping.
In economy class, long hour flight of...

Overall a good experience flying with them. It's a short haul flight and I thought everything was good enough in view of that. It beats all budget airlines hands down and I got a pretty good price with the promotions.

Service was very good, which I had expected since I flew this same route last year as well. Flew MNL-HKG layover to PEK round trip Wed-Sun. (return on CX331+CX95) Nearly or completely full on all segments. One segment of the flights was by DragonAir (KA92) their affiliate airline but there was no dip in quality. The food was very good...

标题: A very good flight with efficient and kind staff
内容:
Flight was on time, kind and efficient staff
Fairly spacious, good reclining seat, latest films & nice small cabin.
Worst Customer service. Not helpful at all and unprofessional and unethical. Rude and was very arrogant,

Good Experience and Flight.
Definitely much better than other Airlines.
Long Flight but seats are comfortable and you can enjoy some privacy as well.

Have travelled with Cathay in business a number of times and loved everything.
This time for a daylight flight we travelled pr mismatch economy.
Seats are like qantas domestic business, good choice of pre dinner and dinner wines and drinks. Nice selection of food too.
Perfect for a daylight flight

The flights to and from Auckland, NZ from Toronto via Hong Kong are understandably long and tedious. The airline provides plenty of entertainment for those who are unable to sleep - watched 6 full length movies each way.
The attendants are attentive, and the food is acceptable (as airline foods go). The seating is generous enough for near 6' guy.

Was not looking forward to a 12-13 hour flight in economy but the A35 plane and service was so excellent that the time passed well and we even managed to sleep for a few hours.
Excellent in flight food. Very friendly and efficient cabin crew - dont know how they were still smilng and looked so fresh after such a...
Excellent service, Didn't like the food to much. all the films o.k a bit restricted on the music side. ample seating room, made for a comfy flight.

we flew from HoChiMinh to Hong Kong and then Hong Kong to LAX. Both flights were on time and not too uncomfortable given the length of HK to LAX. However, between the 2 flights, both of my TSA locks were apparently deliberately broken and the zippers on my duffle bag broken in the process. This was quite aggravating.
标签: International' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Los Angeles

内容: I must say that 75% of my experience with attendants were bad in the past 2 years. This is just my first time writing the review. Sadly, Cathay Pacific used to be the top class airline but now the worst. When you were on the plane, you could see clearly that attendants hated their jobs and passengers. I also heard...

My flight returning to SF from Japan was very pleasant. The airline attendants were welcoming and friendly as you enter the plane. Throughout the flight, attendants were attentive to the needs of the passengers. Midnight snacks were well-organized at the back of the plane and readily available for the passengers. The request for hot-food items were quickly and quietly served...

标题: Cathay Pacific with it New Airbus 35
内容: Travelling with Cathay Pacific to San Francisco with it new Airbus 35 was such a delight. First of all, the seats are so comfortable, even on economy, it is spacious, big monitor, and equip with separate space for smart device charging and another table for eating. The tv series are great, i was able ti finish one season there instead...

Being a frequent flyer (Diamond) on CX to Asia, I find their Product average.
Seats in Business Class are good, not too small, with a lot of privacy when you travel by yourself.
Flying to HKG (and beyond) every month, the food is really not good (or your choice is not available), but most annoying is the cabin staff running...

Flew from Heathrow to Sydney via Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific and have to say this is the best airline I have ever flown with! I travel a lot so have flown with other big airlines (even Business Class with British Airways) and none of them beat the quality of service offered by the team on Cathay Pacific. Drinks and...

标题: flying malaysia to hongkong , so we feeling comfort and balance. so can be hear music.clear, quiet and comfort.
内容: so we feeling comfort and balance.so can be hear music ,clear, quiet and comfort. there are fresh food and fresh orange and bread.

The only way to Fly! Extremely long flight with a connection in Hong Kong. Laid over at the Wings lounge..(Cathay Pacific).Very comfortable not overly crowded..Noodle bar was cute idea +fresh made to order noodles..Coffee bar nice addition.. Nothing over the top but made the lay over pass comfortably. Cathay Pacific 777 3er..business class laid out very nicely with good space...

Flying on Airbus A35, good legroom, decent food and drinks. The service was good and overall a good flight experience. I flew back on LHR with an old B777 from Hong-Kong and luckily the flight had low occupancy so I had three seats from myself. Again a good service but definitely the A35 is a much better plain.
I didn't...

We had purchased a round trip ticket from Los Angeles to Hong Kong. While in Hong Kong we had to leave earlier and called Cathay Pacific. Their representative showed no understanding and ability to deal with situations like this. The only option given was purchase $92 new one way ticket. Being in dire straits we paid $1,82 (for two) and...

These flights are never easy, Cathay Pacific made the journey as comfortable as they possibly could. In flight meals where very good and lots of water available. Many films to watch on yhe in flight entertainment system. In short a good airline but would like to try some of the competition.
Really well thought out business seating, comfortable and private. Good service and food. The business lounge in HK has to be experienced to be believed, huge, comfortable and massive choice of food.

Very Comfortable seating with lots of leg room. Superb meals with excellent service and very courteous staff. Business class lounge at Tullamarine and Hong Kong airports are top rate with a variety of food and drinks.

Due to strong wind at the first of March, we had a delay of two hours, and could not be in time in Hongkong for the connecting flight. Near the gate there were tabels with boarding cards for everyone wh had missed the connecting flight. Printedwith our names already. We were going firtst tot Bangkok where a woman stand at...

First time I've flown with Cathay Pacific and I would definitely use them again. The plane was an older model with not so many choices on the in-flight entertainment system as other flights I've taken but certainly a good enough selection to fill the five hour flight. I also really liked their option to tune into a camera under the...

The flight was pretty full and we took off on time. The flight was relatively short but ATC put us on a holding pattern for some time so that in the end we arrived about 15 minutes late.
The service was outstanding. The choice of food and drinks very good and I enjoyed all I had from champagne, Lynch Bages,...

Flying with Cathay Pacific is a breeze. The whole flight to Hong Kong was very comfortable, I loved their range of entertainment! I was also very happy with their level of service - the staff were always offering beverages at the perfect moment and they were very accommodating. Even though I was flying economy I was treated very well. Would...

标题: Inflight service is not like the old days
内容:
The 1st class lounges at HK airport are fantastic,especially the new showers. Noodle bar is always great. The aircraft are nice and the 1st class suite is lovely, the flight attendants are adequate, but the food and drinks are not what they used to be.
The caviar is still a nice touch, but gone is the Krug champagne. Same with...

CX can offer quite many flights from Taipei to Hong Kong in the afternoon and evening, almost 1 flight per hour.
As usual the flight offer TV for the film entertainment. But the food is not good, cold and not delicious.

This was my first trip on Cathay Pacific and I was impressed. Although the plane probably could use a bit of updating I felt the cleanliness was well above standard. The service was efficient and friendly. The service is some of the best I've come across in a long time. I'd have no problem flying CP again.
Flight was good, legroom great, and a comfortable seat, service was good and the entertainment system was up to date. But cost has gone up, so not sure if it will be economical next time?

I had a great flight. I was greeted as a OneWorld elite flyer and had access to their wonderful lounge with made to order food.
The economy seats were comfortable and the service was good.

I actually enjoyed my flight to Hong Kong even though it was 14 hours flight time.
The staff were very pleasant and accommodating. The service was great I do recommend flying with Cathay Pacific.

It’s probably the best business class airline I’ve travelled in. Outstanding customer service from check in through to inflight service & entertainment. The food keeps coming as do the drinks (wide selection) and if you are transmitting in HKG their lounges are brilliant too. There is nothing that I can fault with their service. I will fly Cathay any day.
I was concerned about leg room when checking in for this flight but the aircraft offered plenty of room and was very comfortable

标题: Another problem on CX 495 operating airbus 359
内容:
Just informed by staff CX495 technically broken down!! 23 March
When CX can fix the new aircraft airbus 359 problem??!! Why they need to keep receiving this type of aircrafts that keep breaking down??

The new Airbus A359 makes such a difference to your flying experience,the seats are comfortable plenty of leg room ,on board internet so you can work while you are in the air,the tv screens are quite adequate,and the onboard entertainment is excellent,the Cathay staff on this flight were exceptional,warm friendly and nothing was a problem,one of the best flights I...

I can’t take it anymore the service CX renderered to Business Class customers. I can’t beleive the lounge has no food provided. Get a glass of wine like begging for it.
Hungry in the midnight they are simply asked me
To wait for breakfast time.
In Osaka the lounge also provide nothing.
Even the normal lounge before Immigration are much...

After flying to Hong Kong on a BA A38 this aircraft seemed dated. It had seen a lot of use. The seats were wider than BA and more leg room, but not as comfortable. Good service with a smile. But dinner was served at same time as drinks (alcohol), wich seemed wrong. Maybe less work than doing two different runs?...

标题: Poor Customer Service and always leaves late
内容:
My Husband and I recently flew with Cathay Pacific and I’m not too impressed. I travel a decent amount and have never felt the way I do toward an airline like I do this company.
We took 4 flights with them and NOT 1 left on time. I realize planes will need to leave a little late here and there...

As a partner with American Airlines, we had one flight number which changed under Cathay Pacific. It took half a day to get the right locator number and flight number for check-in. The direct flight was long and relatively uneventful. Service from the flight staff was good.
When we finally arrived in Hong Kong after 16 hours, we had another...

I do not often fly, and on this occasion was able to take advantage of a reduced offer on business class. Everything was comfortable and well organised - a lie flat bed for the overnight flights and cabin attendants just a call away to provide drinks and snacks at any time of the night. The attendants were always cheerful and...

Cathay Pacific customer experience is legendary and this flight didn't disappoint. I spent several hours in their airport lounge before hand which primed me for what was to follow. The seat was comfortable with plenty of space, folding flat for sleep.The entertainment system was good, with great choices. The pod did appear a bit tired, with not all of the...

Really good service, food and wines good. Hostesses were polite, attentive and efficient.
We will fly with them again

标题: Good Staff, Flight to Hong Kong
内容: Service was good and upto the standards. I loved the meal and the variety of drinks on offer. The flight crew made sure that we were taken care of and were given optimum comfort. Would fly again!

The flight experience was absolutely amazing, service was very good, stewards were handling all request with professionalism.
Food was good for a flight meal and options to choose. Overall it was a very good experience and the best economy travel I have experienced so far.

Oh dear, this was certainly the most uncomfortable flight we have ever done. (and we have done a few)
Can't fault the customer service of all staff we met.
The flight itself was good
The issue came with the seats, yes I admit both hubby & I are of rather big frame but I spent the entire flight sat in...

Cathay Pacific NY-HK was my first really long flight and I have been flying with them ever since, both around Asia and between Asia and the US. For flights within Asia, it's a little more expensive than most and for transpacific flights it is average/ good prices. Cebu Pacifc offers in flight entertainment, meals, good leg room, clean cabins, friendly...

We chose Cathay Pacific as they had looked after us in previous long haul flights and again did not disappoint. Flight was comfortable, food was a little average, attendants great given flight to Hong Kong & again to Paris were both full. Would fly again with them.

标题: One of the best Airline I travel so far.......
内容: One of the best journey I had in international airline. The staffs are helpful, flight is clean and seats are comfortable, food is delicious, what else you can expect from an international airline. I highly recommend this Airline to all.

标题: Great flight experience and willing to solve problems
内容:
After 7 years of avoiding Cathay Pacific and going for cheaper prices - I went back to them and was not disappointed. I initially had a problem booking but this was resolved.
I saw an advert for cheap flight during Chinese new year and decided to book but found that the sale had expired early. I contacted Cathay Pacific and...

It has been a few years since I flew with Cathay Pacific and my recollection was that they were the cream of the crop. Time has not served them well. While the staff were very friendly and efficient in their service, we had the feeling they were focused on 'getting the job done' versus providing an experience.
It seemed that...

Premium Economy options opens up new possibilities for long haul travel. Especially with airlines cramming in extra seats in coach class (777's with 1 abreast economy), the PE offering is a breath of fresh air. Costing roughly 5% more than a full priced coach ticket, PE seats and service ensure that you arrive at your destination ready for that dream...

标题: Flight delay made us lose a connecting flight, then the 2nd flight delayed as well.
内容:
I chose Cathay Pacific to fly LAX to Hong Kong, and back from Kuala Lumpur Malaysia to LAX through Hong Kong, based on the good reviews, even though it was not the cheapest airlines for that route. I also paid extra $99 for the Marco polo club membership (which turned out to be waste of money btw).
Our flight from...

标题: I wish I had used another carrier
内容: I normally fly emmirates to the phillipines, I thought it would be good to try Cathy Pacific. My overal experience was very neautral. I tried to book extra room seats and was told there was none available, there was empty extra room seats on my flight plus I just felt the cabin crew felt like they were going out of...

I have flown with Cathay a number of times. Every time the service is exceptional the cabin crew are always pleasant engaging and cannot do enough to make the flight as pleasant as possible for you as a customer. Having flown with other carriers on long haul routes I believe Cathay to be the best regarding customer service.
On the...
Service was good, flights were on time. Their website in the US is not up to where it should be. Upgrades are on a lottery basis, which is very strange to me. Otherwise, no problems

From the moment we boarded until we arrived at JFK, the service by the flight attendants was superb. I had three different meals throughout the flight and all were prepared well and very tasty. The business class seating was comfortable with plenty of entertainment options.
The only disappointment was that we didn't have wifi available on our flight.

It seems some airlines cant wait to get you to sleep on your journey. Flying midday from Heathrow it seems a shame that after the meal is served it is time for bed. The window blinds come down and the staff disappear. Why airlines think we are ready to sleep I will never understand and it makes the journey a...

This is my first time visit UK, due to good timetable & flexible schedule, I chose Cathay Pacific service from Taipei to London.
On the airplane, of course my friend and I had choice to choose delicious meal and really enjoy the entertainment, too many latest movie & TV program can choose. The captain had great drive skill, no uncomfortable...

标题: interesting: always overbook and food bad
内容:
we check in online and reserved seat already. When we get the boarding pass .they said my friend didn't get the seat, they want him transit in kuala lumpur.
finally i complain and complain they give the seat to us.
Food is really bad.
interesting interesting./always like that

I am a small person, a Senior, and found the Premium Economy section very comfortable..however, I wasn't fond of the food offered. I didn't request special food either...but, the FA was very nice to find me food from Business Class to make me happy. The only drawback for this flight was the hub in HK which I found extremely far...

标题: Worth every penny to fly BC to HK
内容: For me the best Business Carrier. I regularly fly Cathay for more than 25 years. I like the service and the stuff is friendly. I never had a problem during my time on board and felt safe the whole time.

I've flown with Cathay on several occasions, and they're generally uneventful especially for a short flight like Manila-Hong Kong and back. The food is predictable (chicken wrap, a biscuit, and a drink) and the seats are generally decent. My only concern with this flight was the in-flight entertainment. I was seated in the front row, aisle seat, which had the...

We settled into our seats and were very well looked after. The seats were comfortable.
I saw latest film Churchill which won several oscars. The dinks menu was good.

标题: The best airline I ever experienced
内容:
CX 's service never dissapoint me from a pre-check in reminder, check in, flight service, and collecting my baggage.
The crew is always attentive, efficient. Meals are good enough, with adequate drinks / snacks serving throughout the long flight. At least I feel very comfortable by requesting a service than all those Western countries's airlines I feel respect as a...

Good airline with very good customer service.
use their service in past also and found worth to use and recommend to others.

On arrival at HKG the check in Lady was most helpful and transferred me from my booked flight which had a stop in BKK to a direct flight leaving ten mins before , the seat 2 G was comfortable but the service was disjointed from one side of the cabin to the other - the food pretty average and the...

We had to book 2. One way flights from Osaka back to Perth via Hong Kong this week, at a cost of close to $1, Aus. each for the price of very average service.I chose Cathay as I thought the service would be worth the extra money for the flight.......but sadly disappointed,.
From Osaka to HK was very average...a well...

If you ever have to travel this far, this is the way to go!! Great attentive service, lots and lots of room to lay down and relax, decent food and beverage service and an overall nice experience. Very friendly and attentive flight attendants-North American airlines should take some notes! You can check your bag in in the subway system in...

标题: Comfortable way to travel with very good service
内容:
Very good comfort level of the seats that recline fully to flat bad allowing to to get a good night sleep on ultra long and otherwise tiring flights.
Service was very good and up to Cathay Pacific's reputation.
Very good selection of food and drinks and snacks in between meal services.
Selection of entertainment is very good and quality of...

Outstanding flight experience. Would highly recommend Cathay.
One time, new plane, comfortable cabin, welcoming and helpful staff, tasty food and snacks offered. All round excellent.

Although sitting in Economy, we managed to book seats with slightly more leg room, sitting in the middle section, but at the front, over the wing/emergency exit. The staff were very professional, courteous and kind. The food was very good. The plane was clean, toilet/wash rooms kept clean too. Plenty of t.v. options to choose from. Blankets and small pillows...

标题: Absolutely zero seat choice with online check-in!
内容:
This was my first ever trip with Cathay Pacific, and as I wasn't aware that online check-in opens 48 hours prior to departure, I wasn't too surprised that there was very little choice of seats available on my outward journey to South Korea.
However, wiser now, for the return trip, I was logged in and ready for the online check-in...

标题: Excelent airoplane Airbus 35. First class service. Fantastic food very good wine's
内容:
The check in was very friendly & quick. The staff was very efficient
The Airbus 35 to Hong Kong was very good, comport seats, excellent service and food.
Every passenger has a name.
Do notmiss this airline

Cathay Pacific give good service and the food is reasonable and the entertainment is like all the others. It doesn't stand out as being better than other airlines. Premium Economy just means slightly more room but everything else is the same. Maybe more attention to detail - some how they need to have an edge on the other airlines to...

I normally choose Cathay Pacific for all my international flights, and usually there are no issues. This time however, the service was below average specifically the pickup of the dinner tray. It took almost one hour after I finished eating until my tray was cleared away. And when we asked the flight attendant to pick it up, she replied that...

标题: I guess Cathay lost its edge
内容: While Cathay is still listed as one of the top airlines and they certainly have an absolute top crew and service, we were disappointed by getting the meals in plastic bowls and the cabin seats being quite worn out. We had two middle seats so we could sit together but the arrangement is such that it works well for solo...

Urgent travel plan left me with first affordable ticket from this airline. The flight was good and comfortable, staff was really kind, generous and supportive.
However, quality of food is not exceptional.

标题: A bit shaky cause weather with XX 79
内容: Most time Cathay pacific is very stable and safe flight among other Asian airlines , but this time because of wind and small rain since take off the plain is keep shaking and feeling scary for at least 1 hour during the journey , crew service is good and entertainments is good enough too .

Me and my friend were a bit tired at the end of the trip. At our check in, we are so glad to know that both of us got upgraded to Premium Economy class. The seat is much more comfortable and spacious as you can imagine. We had a relaxing trip back home and got some good rest, too. Thank...
标签: Asia' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Hong Kong

内容: A quick direct flight from Hong Kong to Hochiminh. The check in staff are so helpful to ensure my friend's landed visa application and documents are all ok before checking in. She gave good advice to us. Thank you
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Economy' 'Hong Kong - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: On our trip to Vietnam, our seats were upgraded to Premium Economy which made a big difference. On the way back they were unable to offer this, and the regular economy seats were surprisingly tight and uncomfortable, similar to the American airlines that Asian airlines were supposed to surpass in service and comfort. The food was average, but the water...
I experienced everything I had expected based on my earlier flight to Bangkok 6 days earlier. Extremely good.

An outstanding experience. I have not travelled Cathay Pacific for quite some time. I had originally booked and paid for Premium Economy. However, due to Cathay's inability to provide PE, I was upgraded to Business and no extra charge. The new seating arrangement is first rate. The in flight service was first rate.

标题: Long Flight from Newark to Hong Kong
内容: The flight from Newark to Hong Kong is a long one, but we managed to get quite a bit of sleep, since this flight is entirely in the dark, leaving at night, flying up close to the North Pole, and down over central Russia, Mongolia, and China. Was a very nice smooth flight.

Everything super, was really impressed that they use a 777-3ER on this short flight with flatbeds! Not that we slept but the the whole inflight system on this aircraft and these seats are terrific. We had just flown LAX-HKG last month on the same aircraft type with Cathay Pacific.
We were actually flying Bkk-Hkg via Sgn on the Sunday after...
标签: Asia' 'Business Class' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Hong Kong

内容: My flight was over 13 hours long, and I am really surprised that I felt quite good after. Seats were very comfortable, and cabin crew were very polite, friendly and helpful.

标题: Still flying the way we like to go
内容: One of the airlines that still seems to treat passengers as though they cared. Food, comfort and service very good. Flights on time or within the envelopes required for connections.

Flew Cathay Pacific to Hong Kong then onto Singapore and return. Paid extra for Premium Economy...definitely worth the extra money...larger and very comfortable seats which recline with extra space between you and your fellow passenger. Separate cabin with own dedicated toilet too. Meals were good - we selected low fat meals for all flights, which were very nice. Cathay Pacific...
Not a superbly great service, not bad either. Some snacks available during the flight. Lots of noise of the other pasengers.

Excellent flight to Oz. Cabin crew friendly and nothing was too much trouble. Food good with free drinks. They came round twice for drinks but if you wanted more you just asked or collect yourself. Check in at the airport was efficient and speedy and we were allowed three bags instead of the two in the hold. The only problem...

After spending the Christmas holidays in the Korean capital, we flew home with Hong Kong's flag carrier and were well looked after on board.
The crew was courteous, the seat was comfortable as always and the food was nice.
In particular, I liked the way they served nuts, appetiser, main course, dessert, cheese and fruits smoothly one after another, so...

标题: Good inflight entertainment, reasonable leg room in economy.
内容:
Plenty of inflight movies ranging from Western to Asian movies.
Wifi is available but you need to pay.
Reasonable leg room, the food is OK.
Service is a bit rushed, coffee and tea was not offered unless asked for.
Reasonably good flight, better than some other airlines in the region.

标题: Routine flight from Chitose to HKG
内容: This was a standard commuter skiing flights from Chitose to Hong Kong and packed out with skiing families returning to Hong Kong . The aircraft was an older one - no flat beds in Business. the cabin crew as usual coped manfully (or woman fully) - although we were surprised to be told that they could not provide a bottle...

标题: Return from HKG to SYD, not as good as the trip over.
内容: In all honesty, the flight back was not as good as the flight over, both planes were full but I think the SYD-HKG leg was better than the other way round. I tried calling asking for a cup of tea, but was told they were too busy and would get back to me (that was in the quiet time, not...

标题: The flight was actually pretty good
内容: i used to fly Sydney to Frankfurt monthly, so I have done too many flights to think about, I have not travelled for a while, so I recently did SYD-HKG with Cathay. I must say Cathay was quite good, always pot luck who you sit next too and the flight was very full. All in all an OK experience.

标题: Cramped Leg room, uncomfortable seat height and positioning. Food gave me diarhea.
内容: I booked Cathay Pacific Airlines thru Expedia. My trip was between Sep 217 to Oct 217. Flying from NY JFK to Manila Via Hong Kong. Three things, Very Cramped Leg Room, your knees (I'm 5'8) has only about 2 inches room between your knees and the back of the seat in front of you. If you are to choose. I...

标题: Business Class via Hong Kong to Brisbane
内容: Leaving in the evening the first part of the flight was good. Unfortunately the five and a half hours wait to connect to the second flight was not good. Hong Kong Airport is always cold but this time it was painful to the extent that my knees went stiff! Even a hot shower in the Business Class Lounge couldn't warm...

I love Cathy as the flight is direct from Toronto and I much prefer it to Air Canada currently, however Cathy's quality seems to be dropping slightly.
The food on my flights were at best average as far as Airline food goes, and the chairs both I and my associates found to be a little uncomfortable when in the lie...

标题: Very decent Airline with fair pricing
内容: If you are looking for a reliable Airline with decent service even in Economy her you go. Cathay Pacific fly's on long-haul flights almost exclusively the spacious and comfortable Boing 777. The Crews are usually very friendly and attentive and the configuration in Economy is ok. As usual for large ppl its not enough but average size ppl can somewhat...

This is a 1 am in the morning flight so everyone is tired
Leg room and plane good , food no different to economy
The big plus is it goes direct to Manchester
2 mins from touch down , through immigration and customs
Crew were helpful but bland overall ok

Everything is fine with Cathay, but two items:
1- our first flight was with Westjet as Cathay do not fly to Montreal. Online checkin with Cathay is 48 hour in advance, but for Westjet is 24 hour. Cathay system requires the first flight to checkin first, so we had to wait until 24 h to checkin with Westjet.That's done, Westjet...

标题: What a difference two weeks make
内容:
We had a terrible flight on the 28th February see “Cathay Pathetic “ review .We we’re dreading the flight home but it was a great experience even traveling in economy,the cabin crew were a London Based crew and they could not do enough for us,my wife got her brandy and coke on this flight .
If all crews were like...

Took CX739 as I prefer late morning flights that gets me into Singapore after 3 pm check-in. Enough time to freshen up before dinner & going out in the evenings. Purchased economy tickets on this trip & pleasantly surprised. I do have Asia Miles gold status so was able to use the CX Lounge in HK as well as priority...

Travelled on the A35-9 in premium econony. Configuration was 2-3-2 - 24 seats in total.
Entertainment system was great - I saw a multitude of films and the headphones were good quality.
The seats were spacious with a footrest you could use to spread out and a good recline too.
Priority boarding was given at Hong Kong only.
