A very good Business class option. Nice big seats and lie-flat beds, good entertainment selections and a nice menu. My only complaint was that in lie-flat mode the bed/seat wasn't as comfortable as some other Business Class carriers I have flown.

The flights themselves were not uncomfortable but on 19hours travel and two flights only 1 of the 3 meals were vegetarian. This was after both the travel agents booked for a vegetarian meal on all meals offered and double checking when booking in on the day and we were told that they had reserved me the meals - on serving...
It is a famous airline in HK, and the package we booked for competitive and worthy price. The in-flight entertainment was good, food is fair, seat is comfortable.

Traveled as a family of four. At first we were a little worried about the more than 12 hour flight time. Turned out we were lucky to have one empty seat in between us, it made a big difference. One on flight entertainment feature I really enjoyed is the movie, and Cathay seems to put a lot of attention into...

For a little extra money it sure makes a big difference. The extra leg room, width of the seat and the extra room to recline your seat make a huge difference. A nice blanket,small pillow and eye shades, headphones and more current movies made for a great 15 hour flight

My first time flying on Cathay was a nice experienced. The journey was pleasant. The seat was comfortable and the legroom in economy was quite spacious. The halal food was better than some other airline. Cathay will be my first choice when I travel from now.

标题: A truly wonderful experience in economy, really
内容: My seat was actually quite comfortable with very generous leg room. One observation was very interesting. I generally don't do this because I try to be considerate of the person sitting behind me but I decided to stretch out for a few minutes so I put my seat back, or so I thought, however to my genuine surprise my seat...
The airline staff were friendly and helpful. The food was delicious and the seats comfortable. The in flight entertainment was excellent.

标题: CP used to really great, but.....
内容:
CP used to be among the top airlines to fly long distances. We've not flown them for a few years until this week.
The competition across the pacific is now pretty fierce and, unfortunately, CP has not kept up with its competition!
The food was just adequate - no more. The lie-flat beds are not a good design - having...

It was an overnight flight so we were fed and watered shortly after take-off. Food was good, eatable, hot and served with wine, water and soft drinks.The lights were then dimmed so we could rest, sleep or watch movies. Pillars and blankets were provided too, however after 7 or 8 hours any seat can become quite uncomfortable! There isnt a...

It was a pleasure to step on board Cathay's 777 bound for Hongkong .
The plane was immaculate as were the staff who were both very friendly and helpful.
The Plane took off exactly on time and it was a very pleasant flight with excellent service and good meals .
my only gripe is that there was a baby crying...

Cabin crew are very good and attentive. The meals were well presented and of good quality.
Very comfortable seats with good leg room. Always select an aisle seat
Only complaint that I have is that the toilets are far back in economy and also rather small space wise.

标题: Good leg room for economy class
内容: Comfortable journey for economy. Good food but TV screen did not work so missed out on choice of recent film releases. Crew were friendly and efficient except my tv screen was not mended.

标题: Long Haul to Europe from Australia Business Class
内容:
After travelling between Europe and Australia over 25 times in recent decades i can assure fellow travellers that Cathay Pacific Business Class is right at the top of my list to check out every trip before I book.
Their advertised early bird rates are never beaten up to the departure date booked, the service is impeccable the food and beverage...

标题: The Only Way - JFK to HK to BKK!
内容: I have never flown non-stop from JFK to HK before, and I can say I will never fly another way now. The Cathay experience was awesome. I flew Premium Economy on the way there and plain economy on the way back, in a bulkhead seat. The in the air staff was amazingly polite, dedicated to pleasing everyone. The seats in...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: An average flight flying economy cass across the Pacific from Hong Kong to NYC.
内容: Just another long and boring flight from Asia to the USA. I have made many of them and they all seem the same. Flying in the cheap seats you always get mediocre food, a tight space, essentially you get what you pay for. I got a good deal at $646 USD round trip from JFK to Saigon so as I...

In the last few flights to Hong Kong, I was distracted by the competitive prices offered by Air Canada to drop CX. After many times of unhappy experience, I finally decided to pay slightly more to go back to CX. Though the overall level has dropped a little bit, Cathy is still Cathay especially when you compared to the services...

In the past Cathay Pacific was a good airline company. But time had changed.
Even in the Premium economy Class the service is medium. The food is terrible and the choices on the menu are sometimes not available. I mean, on the menu but not on board.
So never fly again when there is another possibility.

Recently flew with Cathay from London to Auckland via Hong Kong and six weeks later from Sydney again via Hong Kong back to London. These guys really know what long travelers need and their attention to detail is impressive. Very courteous, great food and comfortable seats/beds. I would have no hesitation in flying with Cathay in the future.
1st time flying with Cathay Pacific, I found the boarding experience very organised, flight left on time, great meals and in flight service. Will definately fly with them again.

Cathay is well known for being one of the best airlines and the really proved it over and over again with their super nice and efficient team! The only bad thing I have to say is after flaying on 4 of their planes in the past month I found that although the cabin was nice, the toilet it self-was not...

标题: Well worth the extra money for premium economy
内容:
Premium economy gave us extra leg room which was great as we had an overnight flight. The seats reclined and the leg rest came up to allow us to have more comfort to try to sleep.
The flight was 7 hours so the extra space was very welcome.
We were greeted with a choice of orange juice, apple juice, water...

This about the 5 time that we have flown business class with Cathay from Bangkok to Singapore as the cost of a ticket was very good value around 3% cheaper similar airlines. The service in the lounge and flight was good service. Choice of food was good on the flight and in the lounge in Bangkok, Singapore lounge was not...

We did not get there because Cathay Pacific would not issue us with an ETA as we did not have a visa. Who knows you need a visa for Australia???
ETA is an Electronic Travel Authority and can be issued by air lines!!!
But the Australia National Airline would not let us fly!?!

标题: Terrible at first then Each leg of our journey improved
内容: Our first leg from Australia to Hong Kong was really terrible, we got the worst seats, the leg room was equal to a cheap economy flight, crowded, food was terrible, flight attendants seemed rushed, stressed and not so happy to serve.we got off that flight swearing we will pay anything for an upgrade there was none avail. The next leg...

I thought the staff were lovely and the tv systems and choice of entertainment good. We also got fed and watered well. However on the first flight (2 hours to Hong Kong) everyone got meals and no vegetarian option at all. Then on the longer flight (13 hours) still no vegetarian option for the breakfast. We were told this option...

标题: Pretty good. Always late but not by much....
内容: I detest flying so to not complain too much is almost a complement from me. Only Thai Air ever got a good review from me. But Cathay Pacific falls somewhere in the C+ range. Biggest complaint: 1.5 hours getting our luggage after a 14 hour airport/flight ordeal. You can check-in easily but getting out is difficult. Shades of hotel California.
Flying to Bangkok from Vancouver and back there were delays in both directions causing missed connections.

The notification on the delayed flight arrived on my phone as we entered the airport. Weather in BOS delayed the departure from about 6P until after 3A!! Long time to hang out BUT HKG is an OK airport to have to do this.
Flight was good as usual with dinner served at 4A!!
Arrival at 6Ain BOS had us sitting...

标题: Long Haul Trip to New Zealand via Hong Kong
内容: My first long haul flight ever and I was pleasantly surprised at the comfort of the plane and entertainment. I found the cheapest flight possible by booking well in advance and would recommend others do the same. My brothers traveled with alternative well known airlines (more expensive too) and had some issues, which I didn't experience. My cases were taken...

标题: Lots of ecomony leg room and good food!
内容: Far more leg room than we were expecting, and the food wasn't at all bad for aeroplane food. The in-flight entertainment was varied and worked well. We were held on the tarmac at Manchester because of a problem with the water pump, but on the whole the flight was a very pleasant experience.

A pleasant flight from onset when we were immediately offered drinks. A menu told us what to expect from the meals which proved as good as airline food could be. We had loads of leg room in our seats and together with generous luggage allowance would make us fly with them again.

标题: Long flight but was looked after
内容: This is a long flight with a stop in Hong Kong. I had good service there and back, no delays. This was the first time I have used Cathy Pacific, very pleased and would use again. I found the food was fine both ways, seat was comfy and had legroom I was happy with. My cases arrived at both ends...

Best Asian Airline I have flown in. On time, customer service is outstanding, quick and easy boarding. They still offer food, snacks and drinks for free. Entertainment options are great. Seats have plenty of leg room. Flight attendants are awesome. First rate airline. Highly recommend .

I've flown Cathy for several years now, twice on Premium Economy and twice in Business. On a nearly 16 hour flight everything counts and their service is second to none. I go to Hong Kong every 2 years and intend to make them my airline of choice.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: Very kind and helpuful crew and always showed up a happy face even after a long flight. Service in cabin very good and you were served good meals and drinks by lovely people.

Going to HongKong and Mumbai, I was fortunate to have no-one sitting beside me. This allowed me to stretch during the night and prevent my feet from swelling. The best to sit aisle for long flights. The attendants are not being seen when everyone is sleeping.

The flight was over ten hours long but the cabin was very comfortable, the cabin staff very pleasant and a very large selection of films to chose from. The flight departed at 3pm when most passengers would have had lunch but dinner was served with a lighter meal shortly before landing (past midnight at point of departure). Some rescheduling would...

标题: Overall, a great airline at a great location.
内容: Three years of Diamond, and unfortunately a Gold member since last year but this airline has always been the top choice for me since I relocated to Hong Kong. Their lounge in Hong Kong is top of the notch, high chance of upgrades no matter flying short or long, great crew and ground staff (not too much like the ones...

标题: perfect timing for a weekend getaway
内容: exchanged this flight with my asiamiles... lots of flexible flight time available for me to get to the airport after work on a saturday. flight is ontime (slightly earlier) as usual.

CX offers some of the best food for an airline. The lie flat seat in Biz class (on our 777-3) has plenty of length for someone like me that is over 6 foot tall. I do wish it was a little wider but overall I enjoyed the seat and was able to sleep.
Flying in Business class gives you access...

标题: Not as awesome as it was
内容: We save and buy miles to be able to travel business class on flights over 8 hours long. I purposely chose Cathay Pacific to get to Vietnam because of our first experience four years ago. It was magical (my first business class flight ever and I was in my sixties!). It feels outrageous to be complaining that the treatment wasn’t...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: 3 out of five it’s fair rating
内容:
I fly premium economy but my review will be based on the overall experience.
Asked if I want s drink upon seating. In one occasion I asked for an alcoholic drink and I was told to wait until take off. In another occasion I asked for a bottle of water. Same thing. What they mean with take off is to...

标题: Best economy class I've ever had
内容:
To start with my flight from Auckland was delayed, meaning I'd miss my connecting flight from Hong Kong to Manila. Cathay Pacific re-booked me on a later flight, which meant an overnight stop in Hong Kong. Cathay Pacific organised and paid for my overnight hotel stay in HK as well as a voucher for breakfast the next morning.
The flight...

Flew outward from LHR to HK with stopover in HK and then onto Auckland. Flew back from Perth WA via HK to LHR. Outward trip just ok. Seats in premium economy to HK seen better days and became uncomfortable after a few hours. Meals just very ordinary. Best to eat before you get on. Drinks are sparse for such a...

This is a review about the terrible attitude this airline has to clients who book a tour via a travel agent.
My wife and I booked a tour with Bicton Travel of Perth(our third such cruise with them)in August last year(217). We were informed that seats on the flights from Perth to HK and HK to Vancouver could NOT be...

标题: One of the better flying experiences
内容:
This was the last leg of our journey having flown with American Airlines and Quantas on other stages and was by far the best.
From check in to disembarking the service was welcoming and efficient. The seating was comfortable and when the seat in front was reclined didn’t feel claustrophobic.
The menu was suited to all tastes and there was...

标题: Always a wonderful flight experience with Cathay
内容: Have always been enjoying flying with Cathay Pacific since 26! Wonderful staff members and courteous customer service!

标题: Pleasant flight, good food and free instant noodles
内容: I usually flew with Cathay from Helsinki to HCM city and back. Flights were generally pleasant. Flight attendants were very friendly. Food was good and suited my asian taste. Especially, there was always ice cream for dessert which was very refreshing. Free instant noodles during the flights.
I am travelled bf Cathay Pacific couple of times and found them punctual and great customer oriented service. Best thing is to get Indian veg food.

Seat on the aisle near the back off the plane. I am only short so did'nt have a problem with leg room. Staff were attentive and meal was served pretty quick. The plane was full due to Chinese New Year quite a lot of children. Wine served with the meal generous measure and also quick refill when requested. Did'nt find...

First time flying premium economy in the new A35 to NZ. Reclining seats with footrest and noticeably more spacious than economy class. Personal entertainment system (TV) have a wide selection of movies and the supplied headphone is noise cancelling. Food was decent enough as airplane food goes, Overall, a very pleasant experience and well worth the money for long haul.

We had 2 seats together in front of a bulkhead - no 3rd seat next to us. The seat reclined well enough for a night flight and it felt spacious. The cabin crew were very friendly and helpful and the food was a lot better than on many flights we have taken.

On time departure. Premium economy seats really comfortable with good recline. In flight entertainment good variety for all . In flight food, actually better empanadas from before. All in all, great job Cathay Pacific.

On time departure, very comfortable seats in premium economy. Cabin crew was efficient. The in flight snack was a empanada and fruit juice.
A choice of local beers also included. All in all, quite well done for Cathay Pacific.
i am 6 foot tall and seat for me where very nice and comfortable good service and very nice for long haul

This time we few from Dhaka to Toronto via Hongkong. I'd unpredictable back pain about about a week earlier, so decided to opt for wheel chair. Cathay Pacific had obliged to provide the wheel chair service. The security and the wheel chair attended at the airport assisted me and my wife till the door of the aircraft for boarding.
I...

Flight was in 2 stages: 11 hours from Auckland to Hong Kong, 4 hour stopover and 13 hours to Manchester.
Despite hearing some reservations from others about attitude and food we found the staff to be friendly and attentive. Overall the food was excellent and I particularly enjoyed the Chinese breakfast served before landing in Manchester.
The timing of the...

Our long flight to Hong Kong was not nearly as bad as I anticipated. The seats were comfortable, blankets were nice and food was ok. I asked for a drink not long after we took off for before dinner and they said I couldn't have one until later. Later was after my dinner and everyone else in the plane had...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Long haul from Hong Kong to JFK
内容: Everything was great except the food...not very good. I have flown this trip in first class where the food and service is exceptional. I didn't expect that same level in economy, but I did hope for a somewhat better quality of food and service.

My partner and I recently had 4 days in Hong Kong, leaving and returning to Bangkok
I used frquent flyer points to "splurge" on the flights. Business class going and first class returning.
The business class was as expected with Cathay, excellent. The return trip in first class was amazing.
The space accomodated by personal areas was very generous, room...

I have to admit I was dreading the flight. It was about 15 hours to Hong King, a four hour layover the 4.5 hours to Bali.
The seats had plenty of legroom for my 6’ long legged frame. There was no internet/WiFi but I enjoyed the disconnection! On board individual entertainment was plentiful and in many language choices. Two full...

The airline is very efficient, the food was great as I selected the vegetarian option. The seats were comfortable as we paid extra for the leg room at the front of the sections.the inflight entertainment was great. All current movies and a good selection of music
I travelled from Bangalore - Honk Kong - Melbourne, The flights were on time, good ground and on flight staff. Enough leg room however the layover is too long.

I had heard many good things about Cathay Pacific so we booked. I am not sure I will ever use them again. From my perspective they use their oldest planes for their longest flights. We flew to and from LAX to Hong Kong (both flights) on their older planes and from Hong Kong to Bangkok on newer, better equipment. Doesn't...

标题: Undercooked rice and luggage zip was broken
内容: My 1st time flying with CX. Great legroom but .... Service was average - some of the staff was friendly while others aren't; inflight meal was average - rice was undercooked during my flight from HK to SG; baggage service was bad as my luggage zip was broken and unable to lock using TSA lock.

标题: Rice was undercooked and my luggage zip was broken
内容: My first time flying with CX. GREAT legroom; average service - some of the staff were friendly while others aren't; inflight meals (veg oriental meal) were also average - the rice was undercooked for my return flight from HK to SG; baggage service was bad as the zip was broken and unable to lock it using the TSA lock.

We flew on Cathay Pacifc to Ho Chi MInh Cirty through Hong Kong in Premium Economy. The flight going to Asia was not so bad but return had the most issues.
Economy Plus is definitly nice to be in for a long flight becuase the seats are bigger and wider. The service is attentive and polite but there is not...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Toronto - Ho Chi Minh City

内容:
Was efficient , but its getting worse and worse over the last 2 years, food is terrible! seat spacing getting smaller, service getting even worse...cleanliness is terrible as always
time keeping also getting worse...now to a stage I stopped flying them!
Fare still cheap but who wants to fly a gradually degrading airline?

Flight was on-time from SHA-HK and HK- MNL service was consistent from meals served a few minutes after flight. Seats and Toilets are clean. Movies and entertainment are updated with enough choices to keep you busy thru the flight.

Redeemed a ticket from HK to Frankfurt in the premium economy class. Glad to have the first row seat with even more leg room. My review of the CX premium economy class shows below:-
Seat : seating pad is to short, could only place 2/3 of my thigh. For long haul, that would add much stress to my thigh. Perhaps...

As outward journey could not find out if I could check in on line and select my seat. Why is information not on website? Flight was good and on time. Service better than outward journey. Day flight again with lights out and blinds down. Why? I really hate this for day flights.
Toilets got in a poor state during flight.

Surprised could not check in on line, so had to be at airport extra early. Difficult to find out what time needed to be there. Not clear on website. Could not view and select seat.Then long wait before flight. Then all hand baggage checked again manually at entrance to plane. Overhead lockers too high for small people. Allocated seat by...

I had a flight scheduled home with Cathay Pacific Airways this past Sunday, March 4th 218, from Bangkok to New York, John F. Kennedy Airport. My friend and I, decided five months ago to book our flights with Cathay Pacific Airways, as the airline is recognized to be one of the most respected Airlines. I would like to make you...

标题: Cathay Pacific Airline, New Zealand to UK via Hong Kong
内容:
Cabin crew were very unfriendly and meals served were terrible, irregular and often unavailable.
My suitcase was badly damaged. When reporting this to the airline at my earlier convenience I was told they were not responsible as it was outline the 7 day deadline.
The reason for travel was to attend my fathers funeral so reporting a damage suitcase was...

Its a rarity we fly first class only twice before, but this was FIRST CLASS in every sense of the word. Filet Mignon served piping hot and medium rare. Ample appetizers and salads and desserts and service like a five star restaurant. They make your bed when ready and add patting so that it really feels like a bed. Sound...

Very nice fligth with serviceminded staff. Nice food and beverage.
Smooth passage with this airline.
It is always a good experience flying with this airline, even for short flights. Their crew are very well trained and make you feel good.

标题: Longest flight I have been so far
内容: I have booked a very good flight with only 23 hours from Portland to Danang with Cathay Pacific Airline. But at last I was informed to change the whole flight that I have paid to a new flight with 39 hours. I had to wait 7 hours at LAX for transit to flight from LAX to HONGKONG. I had to...

标题: Stay Away - Choose a Different Airline
内容: We chose to fly with Cathay Pacific due to the great service they previously offered. Unfortunately, this trip highlighted the demise of Cathay Pacific. Our flights to and from Australia were disastrous! Our flight to Australia was cancelled within 24 hours of leaving. The alternative flight they gave us extended our travel time by 1 hours!! As soon as we...

Friendly staff,providing good customer service,the plane was new so it had all the new technologies,it was very comfortable with good leg room,the meals served were very good ,the entertainment system was excellent,and you can access wifi while you are flying ,that enables you to send and receive emails and access to internet ,very convenient if you are travelling for business.

Had a great flight JFK/Hong Kong in first class and just as good Hong Kong/JFK 2 weeks later. I used miles for both flights and did not think first class was a lot better than business class. This is not saying that first class was not great but that business class on this airline was really good. The nice thing...
标签: International' 'First Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: This seems to be a long flight, but actually is only 11 hrs 1 mins. Had a very comfortable exit seat with unlimited legroom. The seat was comfortable and I managed a few hours sleep. The crew were attentive and very professional and I felt that the flight was good value for money. Cathay Pacific is a good airline, however,...

Honk Kong airport must be one of the simplest, easiest and most user-friendly airports to negotiate anywhere in the world. The home airline, Cathay Pacific, replicates this in all aspects of its flight service. We took off to time and everything about the experience was happy. This route will undoubtedly be our preferred route to the Philippines in future trips.
Decent food and staff. Drinks served. Flight is normally late. Seating is manageable. Good movies to pass time.

标题: First Class service by a First class airline
内容:
We had several flights with Cathay Pacific and Cathay Dragon during our recent holiday to Vietnam and Cambodia. We felt that everything about these flights were First Class.
Every Flight took off within 5 mins. of its expected departure time, we felt that our seats were very comfortable, food really good and the entertainment on offer excellent. We cannot fault...

Wonderful service. The seats are very comfortable, lie flat and quiet. The entertainment options were less than some other airlines that I have flown but were decent. The food and staff attentiveness and service were outstanding.

标题: Nothing to expect much but great and comfort aircraft 777-3er
内容: The flight from London to Hongkong was a very comfortable and enjoyable one. Flight departed on time. I was seated on 39A on economy great leg room and the seat was comfortable with a good view outside. One thing I did not like much of this aircraft is the TV screen. The screen was located quiet far and high when...

recently flew Adelaide-Xiamen-fuzhou-Adelaide. as a recently new member of Marco Polo ( priority boarding) . i was very pleased to be upgraded to business class on Cathay Dragon flights (hk xiamen-fuzhou to Hk. all 4 flights were great, FA,s were all friendly lunch /evening meals were tasty ( breakfast not a fan of egg and sausage first thing in the...

This is a long flight and leaves Hong Kong at 1: a.m. Even when flying long haul in business class the quality if the experience really depends of the staff. On this flight the crew were excellent: professional, attentive and responsive. The flight arrived a few minutes early. Cathay still needs to work a bit on business class food.
I felt comfortable and have no complaints. The staff was nice. the food was good. GOOD ENTERTAINMENT
from the business class lounge to the 14.5hr flight, everything was very nice. Food was great, and the attendants were very gracious.

标题: The precipitous decline in value continues
内容:
The airline is fine in general but their frequent flyer program Marco Polo is so dysfunctional that I cancelled my next few Cathay Pacific flights. Luckily, I was able to get 1% of my money back because I just bought the tickets days ago.
MP Club is the worse. None of their contact numbers work. The online and counter data...

The onboard entertainment for economy class is a new full touch screen panel, which is very responsive with high quality screen resolution. The choice of movies are plenty, and enough to let me and my kids stay busy for the whole flight. The system would notice you whether you've enough time to finish a video or not upon the arrival....

Hong Kong has a beautiful and efficient Airport. Cathay Pacific has a very efficient operation there.We were impressed as they got a huge aircraft full and off the runway on time for a long flight to Boston. The service and food were great and the seats were comfortable. After 15 hours we were ready to get home. My only complaint...

My husband and I flew YYZ-SYD-YYZ on Cathay and were very impressed with the service of the ground and air crew.
Special thanks to a Flight attendant who operated the last leg of our journey HKG-YYZ Flt#826 on 16Feb, not sure of her name though. She is Toronto based and her name could be Anne-Marie or Maryann. She was working...

Departure was at 3pm and we flew economy. We had a bassinet seat as we had our baby with us. We had plenty of leg room, enough to stretch out, a little bag of helpful items for the baby and very friendly staff who would come and talk to us and our daughter.
The food let it down slightly. We...

The flight attendants on CX flights are usually good. They are more attentive than the North American and European ones. However, I do noticed the Korean flight attendant on this particular flight showed a little better than the Hong Kong ones. She did not do anything special for me; but I just noticed the slight difference.

Few in new 35, comfort and facilities were excellent, however the food was very poor, quality of the chicken was terrible, and the service was a little more lax than normal. The next legs of the journey, to Australia and back were much better, even though the 777 was much older.

CX256 LHR to HKG 28th February
We got to the airport and checked in with no problem it was only when we got to the departure gate that it started to go downhill the only passenger announcements were for business and premium economy the economy passengers just either just sat or queued ,when we finally got on the plane our...
Cathay Pacific is a pretty good airline, as a Hong Kong people should be proud of it. Even now there are many competitors, but I still think Hong Kong people should support Cathay Pacific

It was my first time flying Cathay and I was wondering what all the hype was, as I kept hearing how great it is and comfortable. So I chose it to fly to Southeast Asia from Shanghai. I must say, it was fairly comfortable and the attendants were very friendly. The seat space was roomy and spacious to feel loose....
A long flight but the staff were efficient and kept everything going. The plane was reasonably roomy and the captain et al kept the flight smooth and uneventful - the way I like it!!

Service and food was good. We found the interior of the plane we were on a little beat up, carpet tread bare, trim pieces loose, seat adjustment not working great, foam was very hard, and our USB port not working.

标题: One Airline is the Way to Go
内容: Cathay Pacific recently has included Tel-Aviv as a destination. previously you had to go with two separate airlines. One airlline to Asia or Europe then change to another airline to Tel Aviv. making the connecting flight was always a hassle and stressful. You would be very lucky if your luggage made the transfer. Flying with one airline was much easier....

标题: Nothing to really to fault. Nothing to really love. And NOT Singapore Airlines!
内容:
Nothing bad about the experience, but nothing outsatanding at the back of the plane. Seat reasonably comfortable and entertainment reasonably good. Food was of the standard airline variety-not horrid, but hardly rich in flavour.
Service was OK, but crew were not that smiling and just a touch officious. I had so sense of being really well looked after or pampered....

Having flown Cathay from Singapore to Hong Kong a number of times now, the punctuality and quality of this airline is becoming an issue. Flights are constantly delayed in my experience, whereas it's direct competitor Singapore Airlines doesn't have this issue. Cathay is very underwhelming nowadays given the quality of once offered.

I have been flying since the last 3 years to Asia for business, and flyed with several Air companies, and to me, without any kind of doubt, Cathay Pacific is the best of all them !
Service is excelent.
Caviar, Salmon, Krugg Champagne, Fried eggs, Espressos, etc etc...
Quality of wood is excelent
Seats / suites are comfortable, like a...

I used choose CX as my first choice for my personal flights. I usually reading newspaper first when I settle down on seat and watching films during the flight. There are many different kinds of film for me to choose and so I pretty enjoy watching it. Flight attentants are nice and helpful. In overall, I like taking CX everytime.

The whole experience with Cathay Pacific was just wonderful. Hassle-free check-in and boarding, comfy seats and awesome in-flight entertainment. Crew was great and advised me what to choose for meals.Flight was exceptionally clean. Loved the food as well. Would love to fly again with Cathay Pacific.

标题: Good experience. Would fly again with them
内容: Good flight. Captain kept us well informed. The little blanket provided to each seat nice although air temperature perfect. The tablets were excellent - touch screen and there seemed more than usual leg room compared to other airlines. The crew were attentive and friendly. This was a night time flight so we got an evening meal, then left alone for...

I have had a pleasant experience with Cathay Pacific from San Francisco to Mumbai and back. Service is good and attentive. Multiple meal options are available however it will be helpful to select the special meal beforehand specially for the vegetarians. Transfers and airport staff service is good.

标题: Longtime CX flyer but airline going down slowly
内容:
They only thing good about this flight was CX finally have ditched those awful "slopping seats" and gone back to reclining seats
So it was a new'ish plane
The food was below average, the movies old and limited -but both had more style than the crew

Flew the New Airbus 35 in business class. Food, Audio Visual, Service and Sleeper Bed all outstanding. I fly often and this is truly an outstanding new plane. Quiet plane and TV screen flat screen large very easy to use and large selection of movies.
Would be great if the US base carriers could offer this level of service regularly.
a pleasant flight overall. crew very attentive. food on flight was ok. the pier lounge in airport was great, very well designed and comfortable. i highly recommend this airline.

My recent flight was Cathay Pacific Airways. The food standard was normal. I most like the bread to be hot, but in recent days Cathay Pacific has eaten bread that is frozen and I hope to see some improvement.
Because the flight attendant was too busy and did not have time to do other services and saw them in a...

The stewardesses and stewards did a great job, but the flight was so cramped it was uncomfortable. We had a 12 hour flight. I was able to order vegetarian meals ahead, so that helped. The in-seat TV had a lot of movie and TV selections, but every few minutes, it popped up an advertisement, which was super annoying. Even though...

I continually fly this airline and find it to be the best in all areas. I was impressed with the assistance received by the staff and crews in many ways. Counter assistance is and to me the best for I have been flying for many years. If you hate the food on some airlines you will be really impressed with...

标题: How air travel ought to be
内容: Although I was nervous at first since economy doesn’t book a seat until 48 hours before a flight. The employees were competent professional and super helpful. Got seats together all the way through. Free meals, spacious seats, on time, friendly staff clear instructions. I was very impressed. It put domestic American flights to shame.

Flight was on Boeing 777 which was clean and fresh in appearance in economy class , though the publications in the seat were grubby and tatty & well used. Flights were punctual and the crew were friendly and efficient. It's a 12 hour flight and there was adequate food and beverages provided even in economy class. The infotainment system worked...

the help on the plane treated us like king @queens.. The food @ the service was exceptional..The bathrooms were very clean ,no smells the seats were very comfortable. The stewardess advised us where to eat @ go @what time to be there

Great company to fly with. Everything was like clockwork . Check in really good. Boarding really good seating and leg room very good. In flight entertainment really good. Food on plane very good. Staff Excellent. Great flight. We were about an hour late but that was due to problems at Singapore airport before we took off. But we were kept...
Flight was very comfortable. Staff very courteous and helpful. Meals were quite good with selection of drinks available. Not a full flight so could stretch out.

标题: Cathay Pacific flight Manchester to Hobgkong
内容: Calm flights both to and from Hongkong. Plenty of choice of films, books, games and entertainment from personal tv systems for the long flight. We traveled economy class but was surprised at the good width of the seats and also the amount of legroom, blankets and pillows were handed out for comfort. The food was sort of ok as usual...

标题: A35 Business Class Hong Kong to London Gatwick
内容:
Trip
If you have to spend 13 hours on an aircraft this A35 is probably the best aircraft to do it in. Spacious, quiet, pressurised to a lower altitude and with a higher air moisture, it definitely is so much kinder to your body and physical well being C very noticeable on arrival.
This Cathay aircraft was new and clean....

We have flown many times with Cathay Pacific in the past with mixed experiences, some good and some very bad. This time I was impressed with their service and the food on offer, in particular the beef goulash. Normally I am not fond of airplane food but their beef goulash is the best I have tasted on an airplane.
All...

The flight from Hong Kong to Bangkok is a relatively short (2h 15- 3m) flight. Even with 2 kiddos in tow, economy class should work out ok. And it did.
The seats in economy were decent sized (even for my enormous frame). There was a good amount of legroom and on our flight the seats didn't "recline" back, they sort...
Loved this flight with Cathay Pacific. Great new direct route from Chch to Hong Kong. Good service and everything was easy.

Boarded the early morning flight from jfk and had the last seat in business class, after the usual welcome drink and hot towel the menu came. It had the usual light meal and it had a delicious choice so I liked to opt for that.
They served the drinks and I asked the attendant if I could choose the light...

I regularly fly with CathayDragon but since my company “went cheap” on short flights most have been in economy. This was the first time I had been given an upgrade which was rather nice and something of a surprise.
Given that any travel through Xiamen airport is more often than not (as in this case) subject to air traffic delays,...

Please avoid this airline if you are NOT WHITE OR NOT CHINESE. This crew treats well only for white and Chinese. If you are Indian or Black, Please go different airline and I am very disappointed the way treat you. PLEASE TEACH LESSON TO CATHAY PACIFIC ADMIN and they insult you so badly if you ask for Water or Fruits....
Great flight brilliant crew good was good with snacks and drinks offered all during the fli not bumpy at times but no problem

标题: Cool flight from London to Hong Kong in Nov 217
内容: I flew to Asia with Cathay Pacific after i got the chance to switch from Qatar Airways to a direct flight which seemed to make more sense. The outbound flight was cool. Really enjoyed it. I did fly economy, but the thing that made this flight good for me was the stewardess serving/operating in my part of the cabin. Very...

标题: Superb New A35 with flat beds and full service for a 2 hour flight.....
内容:
A two-hour flight in Europe or North America will be a single aisle flight with small seats and simple catering C even in Business Class
Cathay offer, for this two-hour flight from Bangkok to Hong Kong, a brand new twin aisle A35. Fabulous aircraft. Quiet, spacious, good air humidity and low-level pressurisation, topped out with a fully lie flat bed,...

标题: CX is usually ranked high, wondering a bit about what the reasons are
内容: 5 hour trip in a half full 777, as a first-time traveler at CX, expectations were high after seeing their ranking among airlines.Seating near the galley is always an experience of disturbing sounds.On top of that I've always thought the Boeing 777 was a quiet machine but it did not turn out to like that. However, a large inflight entertainment...

Quality of service was very good as it always is but a glass was broken when it slid off my tray. The tray would not stay horizontal. Now this is a small issue dealt with very efficiently by the crew but it should never have happened. The problem had been there for a long time. The tray needed to be...

标题: First Class Treatment in Business Class
内容: A long 12.5 hour flight was turned into a very pleasurable experience due to the excellent cabin staff, enjoyable food, and very comfortable lie flat beds. The whole experience from check in to arrival was seamless. The check in and security at Heathrow was swift. The business class lounge at Heathrow was good but not as good the Cathay Pacific...

Ok, as a person from Hong Kong, Cathy is basically our "go to" airline", 9% of our travelling are with them.
Pros:
1) They have great flight entertainment system with lots of movie and music to choose from.
2) Decent food service
3) Friendly (95% of them anyway) cabin crews and professional pilot
Con:
1) Delay are very often -...

标题: Not as good as we had hoped
内容: Despite having checked in on line, the process at Gatwick was complicated and long winded, but much easier and efficient on return journey from Auckland. The seats on the Airbus 35 were reasonably comfortable, less so on the Boeing 777 and not as comfortably as we had experienced on previous long haul flights with other airlines. Having spent approximately ￡1...

The flight took about 2 hours and left close to on time. Pretty uneventful trip. The newer planes are comfortable and the entertainment was great. The food was the only letdown. Scrambled Egg & Mushroom Lattice Pie, Cookie & a bottle of water. Edible but ordinary! Service was very good as expected on this airline. The cost was more than...

I had expected more of Cathay Pacific, but both on the outward journey to Hong Kong and the return the standard of service was average and the food poor. The staff on the plane were efficient but not attentive; I was offered only one cup of coffee on the return flight and no alcoholic drinks at all. Both flights were...

标题: After Philippines Airlines, This Was Paradise
内容: Compared to last year my journey went without a hitch. Timely, clean, courteous staff, up-to-date facilities, most of all massive selection of special food options. My kids went for the lacto-ovo vegetarian options, my partner, the oriental vegetarian and I had the Indian vegetarian option. Just great. Unlike last year with Philippines Airlines (PAL) where my flight was delayed by...

We were supposed to fly from AKL to HKG
CX practices over booking
We were told we had no more seat available for us when we were boarding the plane!
Why so late? We waited for 4 hours in the airport for nothing!
They had no apology, nothing
I asked to switch to other airline as I cannot trust CX...

标题: The crew was wonderful, the seats comfortable and the good was excellent.
内容: We flew Vancouver to Hong Kong and Hong Kong to Sydney. 2 long flights. Next time we will make sure to break the trip along the way. We were extremely tired by the time we arrived in Australia

标题: long flights, but very happy with service and on-board video entertainment
内容: This was a long flight from Vancouver to Sydney, with a roughly a 3 hour stop/connector in Hong Kong, and return 3 weeks later. Service with Cathay Pacific was good. Lots of movies to watch. I was surprised with the quality of food/meals and wine all included in price. I would fly with Cathay Pacific again.

Boarding was fast and efficient. Other airlines should take lessons from this airline. Seats were comfortable, food was good. Snacks offered throughout flight. Available entertainment was plentiful. Flight crew was professional and friendly.
The only negative was the state of the bathrooms throughout the flight. The floors were sticky, there was urine everywhere, the garbages were overflowing, and they smelled...

This airline is terrific. We had a connecting flight in Hong Kong. Had Economy Premium seats. Only regret was that we didn’t go Business Class flat-bed seats. It took 18 hours flying time plus time at the HK airport between flights. Would have been more comfortable sleeping, though Economy Premium gave sufficient seating room.
Smoothest touchdown in Hanoi!

标题: Horrible staff let down a potentially lovely airline
内容: First time flying Cathay and had somewhat high expectations. I would say we’re easy travellers, don’t even have checked baggage. The lady at the counter assisted in our check in and placed my partner and I at opposite ends of the aircraft. Rows 39 and 73 to be exact. Once we realised we asked for assistance in getting the seats...

On boarding I went to the loo before take off , the cleaners had not done a good job .To think we had approx. 12 hrs in the air and it would be used non stop . I ventured to another toilet only to find this too had not been cleaned properly . The stow away tables had not been...

I am a current Marco Polo Gold member and used CX for 3 years. In this flight on 15/2 I meet Kris from Taiwan, a flight attendant who had provide exceptional services. He is very polite, attentive, down to every details. Have not seen one for a long time.

Great service, good variety of food and beverages. Great selection of inflight entertainment, movies, tv shows, music. Good headphones. Very comfortable seat, can lay right back and sleep with cosy blanket.
Well worth the $$ to travel business class if you're going on a long flight. Airport Business Lounge has excellent food and beverages, you can take a shower there...
All in all very good, comfortable. In our opinion, not as good as Emirates but would still use them again dependent on price

My flight was via Hong Kong home of Cathay.
In flight service and facilities such as movies were great.
Comfortable sitting arrangement where you are not stepping over people to get to toilet unlike say BA business class seats.
Staff are very professional but also welcoming.
Lounge at Sydney was shared with Quantus and was lacking in power sockets which...

I traveled to South Korea via Hong Kong, the flight was very comfortable and the food was different but good. The in flight entertainment was up to date and the staff were ever attentive and responded to your every need.
Both legs of the trip there and back were enjoyable.
Nice flight plenty legroom, brilliant choice of entertainment. Food was nice but a little salty. Attentive and helpful cabin crew.

I have had great service from Cathay Pacific and their sister airline Cathay Dragon. From the time I walk to the check in counter to the time I leave the airplane, everyone always makes an effort to be friendly and helpful. This attitude makes a tremendous difference when traveling long distances. Even when a technical issue delayed a departure and...
Can’t think of anything negative to say about this airline. Super friendly and helpful cabin crew and very comfortable accommodation on board.

标题: Great Flights - Will fly with again
内容:
Flew with Cathay in February, from Sydney to Sapporo (via HK) and return. Check in was quick and easy with helpful desk staff at all ends. Cathay sent automated reminder messages prior to each flight, which although unnecessary for our large group were still good to have, especially if travelling alone or as a couple.
Once on board we received...

标题: It used to be very good but went downhill
内容: I flied a lot and used to fly with CX. It used to be one of the best airline in the industry but recently I found the newer flight attendants are not up to par with the older flight attendants. The newer flight attendants are less friendlier and like to talk in the back among themselves than serving. The thing...

On mid-morning of the 13th of February this year, I was first next in line at Cathay Pacific's "Assistance" counter in Terminal 1 at Hong Kong International Airport. I was waiting for the lone female employee to get off the phone when a man blatantly cut in front of me. Astonishingly, this Cathay Pacific employee served the queue jumper. Though...

I actually wrote a very good review few years ago, but I really had to write a new one again.
Cathay is becoming ridiculous, while they are always the more expensive, their service is only get worse.
In the last year, on most of trips, either my wife or me had broken earphone, problems with the TV and often staff...

I have seen several reviews comparing Asiana to Cathay, and decided to try them both. I guess I ma glad I did bc now I know they are *not* comparable, but I did waste a nice business class flight on Asiana. In short:
1. Cathay has amazing lounges in Asia. The food spread, alcohol, restaurants, and comfort are top notch....

标题: The best way from New York to Southeast Asia and back
内容:
First, Hong Kong International Airport is a pleasure to fly in and out of. It’s a beautiful, airy facility and very efficient. So it’s a good start right away. Being the base for Cathay Pacific, this airline has excellent and well placed facilities.
Cathay’s transpacific business class has a 1-2-1 configuration with lie flat seats in fairly roomy pods that...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

标题: A total loss. Was not able to use the tickets as promised
内容: Cathay would not except there tickets as promised. These ticket where all sold to me in good faith but when I tried to use them they would not except them. Talking to customer care was hopeless as was going to the offices in both Manila and London.

From the Cathay Lounge to the flight this was a wonderful experience!
The lounge offers a wonderful shower room, lots of food choice and a beautiful view towards the mountains to watch the sun going down.
The flight was made eminently bearable by the attentiveness of the hostesses and the delicious food on offer.
The seating pods were very comfortable...

Booked in on line, web site easy to follow. They email flight information to you. Remind you when to book in on line. Comfort, service and food excellent. Polite staff who keep you organised. I wish on all flights they would board by seat number, it’s quicker and saves the long queues, that’s my only gripe. But I will say...

标题: CX25 LHR to Hong Kong and return (CX239)
内容:
My wife and I flew with Cathay on the basis of assumed comfort. How wrong we were!
I was careful to choose our seats as soon as they became available (about 48 hours prior to flying) and chose two seats together in a row of two, both for the journey out and return. On both occasions, the plane we flew...
the flight is delayed due to the engine problem so have to wait for another 1 and half hour. But the service is good and they keep apologe for what happened so it is acceptable

标题: Flight from Hong Kong to Auckland in Feb 218
内容: The flight from Hong Kong to Auckland was average. The seats were not comfortable because it was very narrow eventhough I have selected an aisle seat. It was quite noisy during this flight with un-considerate passengers. I hardly had any rest and the trip was was bad.

As you would expect. Friendly staff, ok seating for economy, food as expected, hot and plentiful, we had dinner and breakfast due to it being an overnight flight, entertainment system with good variety. I particularly liked the ordering of snacks, drinks and other requirements via the screens that go direct to the staff area. Very prompt service. Toilets clean. Flight...

标题: Long flight made comfortable by nice flight attentants
内容:
Good food
Lots of good movies
Seats are comfortable
Pillows and blankets are very nice
Flight attentants are very friendly

I did the craziest thing flying from London to Sydney and the average flight takes 25 hours! There are other flights but they take longer like 35 hours!
How would you spend the whole day and a half just on the plane flying.. no thanks..
The flight didn't seem too bad coz the entertainment kept me company.
I managed to...

标题: Lovely service decent food and take off was on time
内容: I flew business class which was quite Pleasant and the flight attendants book very well in English they had really good professionalism and Taylor to everything that I needed it was really good service the airline was really old so that the chairs were kind of outdated and the entertainment was lacking but it's a good Airline and I would...

Flight was average in terms of comfort etc. There were several films available but nothing in the way of shorter tv programmes which is the norm these days and my preference.
On 4 separate occasions the cabin crew missed us out with something. Twice gave us our meal but forgot to offer drink and we had to call them back....

The only complaint we had was the food. We ordered lacto vegetarian. Two meals were served. Both were unimaginative and mainly vegetables. The lacto was the tub of Lurpak butter!
The seat, space, entertainment were fine and the crew friendly and helpful.

I flew Cathay for years because they were above average in all categories - their staff was always polite and helpful and their meal service was excellent. Lately, they've slipped. I constantly run into surly, unhelpful staff (beyond unhelpful recently as they somehow managed to delete a connecting flight without telling me) and the on-flight meals and service - sadly...
I got issues with my entertainment system which it didn't work for 13 hours out of my 14 hours flight. Also for such long flight I thought that the beverage and meal service was minimum.
This was absolutely fabulous. The staff were warm and friendly. The seats were luxuriously comfortable and the IFE a dream!

Easy online check in. Luggage drop easy and fast. Short distance to boarding gate.
Seats sufficient comfortable. Food very good, best we had in economy since long time.
Entertainment average. Flight delayed by approx. one hour.

i was flying from delhi to guangzhou with a stop at hong kong. my flight was late by an hour late night flight. when we boarded the flight i requested the air hostess to serve me dinner first as i would like to sleep and avoid jet lag. to which first she did not listen and then simply said we...

标题: Cathy Pacific does not listen to their customer complaints
内容: I missed my connecting flight at Hong Kong due to delay of more than hour for the first flight. I had to pay my hotel accommodation. My complaint was not even heard properly. I am told that I had 5 min to transfer (which is not true even)

I enjoyed the whole flight with the movie selection, the comfortable seat and food provided.
After enjoying the lounge - the Pier in HKG airport. I am not expecting myself able to have too much food on the plane. The food actually really nice for me. I suppose you will need to able to pick the right food. There are...

标题: Great but with only 1 big issue!
内容: Cant fault Cathay ever and we trainer often. We, the family, always book premium economy. The flight from hong kong to Denpasar had premium ecomomy seating and we were not allowed to sit in premium economy seats even though we paid extra for the class. Understood their may have been a plane change which offered the seats however with seats...

标题: Good flight times, no stops, but more expensive
内容: Flight leaves Manchester mid morning and arrives early the next day, giving you a full day in Hong Kong. The food is good, the service excellent. though you seem to pay a premium for this (cheaper prices are advertised but hard to find) and they don't fly everyday from Manchester.

标题: Business class for long hauls the only way to fly
内容: Seats were fully able to recline and actually comfortable for long haul . Service was good and food was good. Watched 4 movies and still got some sleep. There is nothing easy about long flights of 12-15 hours but if you must----- why not deal with it in some comfort.?

Effortless check in, good sized seats, very reasonable food. Very clean aircraft out and return, IFE screens a bit small and not a lot of adjustment available when the person in front reclines their seat. Big bonus - the meals arrive on trays that actually fit on the tables!

标题: Mixed feelings some good some bad
内容: We recently used Cathay for our holiday to Hong Kong and Phuket Thailand. The outbound flight to HK was very good. The aircraft, a new A35, was comfortable with ample leg room and comfortable seats. the food was very good and the crew very efficient. The second leg was Hong Kong to Phuket via Cathay codeshare partner Cathay Dragon. The...

标题: Cathay Pacific Should Invest With A New Fleet
内容:
Cathay Pacific should invest in buying a new set of aircrafts to stay in this business. i know I only booked an Economy flight, but you can observe and see how old the plane is. You can smell it too (if you know what i mean).
Good thing the personalised service of the cabin crew makes it up for the...

Nice flight, the staff is very helpful, food was very good.
And because they have the new policy from 216 with 2 checkin baggage/person in a total of 3kg (instead of one) that was really helpful for us to bring some souvenirs from Bali. Thank you

Travelled via Hong Kong. Used the Air New Zealand Lounge in Auckland was very good. Both Cathay flights were on B777s and the personal space in Business Class was exceptional. The food was also very tasty. When I was searching for these flights the Cathay price was nearly half other airlines. I didn’t explore to the back of the plane...

We went to Hong Kong and back on Cathay Pacific this January and February on a Boeing 777. The seats were comfortable and reclined back nicely to a comfortable position. There were wings on the headrest so I was able to sleep pretty well on both trips. The meals were pretty tasty with very fluffy eggs for breakfast. You could...

We enjoyed our flight with Cathay, every aspect was just right. Having just flown in with BA there was no comparison and the 3kg baggage allowance (BA 23kgs) came in useful as we enjoyed the January sales in Hong Kong.
Kudus to martha of cathay pacific hotline she patiently solve my rebooking issue never drop my calls!this kind of staff deserve a appreaciation!! Job well done!!

I did fly from Bangkok to JFK in an economy class with a stopover in Hongkong. There was nothing I was positively surprised with (entertainment offer was probably the strongest component of both flights). Food was decent, but all in plastics (cutlery), wine was really bad. On long overnight flight, no toiletries nor sleeping kit was given.
All in all,...

标题: Poor Communication / Proof one more time it’s lousy service
内容:
The ground staff of Cathay Pacific is extremely poor in communicating with their guest. I was asked to wait until boarding is finished but 2 times I was missed to be informed that boarding was completed. Ultimately I wasn’t able to get proper dinner before the flight (after a day of travelling) and stuck with their airline food.
I am...

my flight had a stop at hong kong with a 8 hour transit time. flight from guangzhou to hong kong was short and fine with on time arrival. but the flight from hong kong to delhi was not so good specially the food they serve to economy class passengers is pathetic. moreover the staff was also not very attentive like...

Arrived HongKong on time, transfer was very easy.
Flight B777-3 regional business.
Business 3% loadfactor, Economy almost full.
Good service, nice meal & drinks offered.
On time arrival into BKK.

标题: Comfortable full recline business for a long flight
内容: Charming and helpful flight attendants, great service, comfortable seat with a warm duvet blanket and pillow, beautiful aircraft with the biggest bathrooms,nice choice of Asian or Western meals and snacks. Long haul between meals on the night flight, but snacks are available. Good variety of movies and TV, in several languages. Some confusion at the airport in boarding, changed gates...

标题: Short flight, predictable and consistent service quality
内容:
Issued companion ticket using 25, Asia Miles for my spouse. All-in excellent value flying two people on business for the price of one. Could only secure seats on this morning flight departing HK 9:1 arriving in Bangkok 12:3. Turned out to be a great choice giving us rest of the day to explore Bangkok after checking into hotel.
Comfort, service...
One of the best if not the best in first class service . Food is excellent too . But why did Cathay change from Krug champagne to an inferior one . It's the cost!!!

标题: Caution! Careful booking with Cathay Pacific
内容: Cathay Pacific's ticketing procedures are very poor. We almost did not get home because on double-checking our flights we were told that the tickets did not match our passport names because the middle name was omitted. This is the convention on all other airlines so why don't Cathay Pacific follow this? Its help centre staff were rude and inattentive. The...

标题: Was a real pleasure to be on board
内容: To get a reasonable Buisness class fare, we had to route via Hong Kong, was very impressed, we where just 4 across, the seats very comfortable, everything was easy to operate, food very good, really thought I can’t wait to travel with them again

标题: Late replacement when Emirates cancelled one leg of Australia/ NZ trip.
内容: Informed by last minute email that our Brisbane to Hong Kong flight was cancelled by Emirates (4hrs notice in the middle of the night) we were rerouted from Sydney to HK on Cathay Pacific. Just grateful to be getting away at roughly the same time, we were pleased with the level of service. Young and charming cabin crew, decent food,...

标题: Can't say enough about Cathay Business class - service, food and lounges
内容: Don't be discouraged about an extended layover in Hong Kong if you are traveling business class....the shopping is great, the lounges are even better. One lounge in particular (I think its the Pier Lounge - one of three for Cathay Pacific at the international terminal #1) even has a noodle bar where you can get freshly made pho and other...
The flight was on time, well prepared with helpful staff. As it should be.Choice of European or Oriental food. Both Delicious (never thought I would say about airline food!.

标题: Long flight, not enough water, was seated seperatley.
内容: We had two tickets booked and paid for over 4months with the same booking ref. The plane was full, but despite knowing we were a married couple, allocated seats opposite sides of the plane. We asked to be put together at check in and they said it couldn't be done. So after take off we swapped seats with the one...
in the earth ,the best of it give some guests very comfort,safe and nice good service. next time we till choose it. you can watch the good view.

Impeccable experience on this flight (great food, beverages and entertainment) but what made this an airline you can rely upon, they tracked down an iPad left on a prior flight, and by the time I landed there was someone waiting for me as I stepped out of the plane to make arrangements for its delivery on the next flight. Very...
good legroom for economy compared to other airlines I have taken. Food was good and lots of snacks and drinks were provided.

W, a mature couple, were politely greeted as we boarded the aircraft. The flight took off on time and arrived at our destination on time. The seats are comfortable and can be lowered into a flat bed. There are also various configurations that the seat can be made into. A welcome drink was available shortly after boarding. The food served...
the aircraft was new but dirty, the cabin crew service ver cheap, food to forget, check-in and assistance worst than terrible. All 4 flights were late

Flown with Cathay Pacific some years ago, still decent service. Unfortunately we were delayed a little, but I think due to traffic control rather than the airline. In-flight entertainment is reasonable. Food is edible, but not the best I've had. Staff are courteous and attentive.
Coming home is always a great feeling. Cathay Pacific attention to detail helps make it just that little bit sweeter.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
I was really looking forward to this flight with Cathay Pacific but I have been disappointed!
Plane: old and tired really!
Service: 5 star service.
Food: very good but...either on the main meal and on the snack meal my first choices were finished...
Entertainment: nothing to write home about not many choices of movies really.
Disappointing really

Traveled to Hongkong via Cathay Pacific. Crew are okey. What was noticeable for me is the bigger legroom compared to others. Additional plus point is the free wifi on board making us connected even on air/ high above the sky. Negative point for me is the food they served, it was just a pie/ meat pie , juice and water.

The lounge selection at Hong Kong is fantastic. The "Wing" is my personal favourite. The service on board was brilliant as usual. It isnt the best bed in the sky but its very good. Food and drink superb.

I really like the Cathay Pacific J class product. The way the meals are displayed on a trolley helps make selection easier. The staff are some of the most intuitive in the sky. I wish they gave pajamas out but that is a small bug bear only.

Flying economy is normally never great and sometimes not all that good, but Cathay Pacific is the exception. The flight attendants were that and more. Extremely attentive and everything with a smile. The food , seats and service were unexpectedly great (considering it was economy). They made an over 16 hour flight most pleasurable. It was my first flight with...

I have travelled with Cathay Pacific umpteen times on the way to Guangdong on the mainland before China Southern flew to and from Brisbane and I have found their airline and service quite good parring on excellent (for economy) pay more for higher service. I use to work there and did a bit of business in between. I also stopped...

Very nice experience. This is a long flight -- 15 hours, but it was comfortable and service was good. I especially liked the 1-2-1 seating as it seemed more private. Know that they serve only two meals, but a hot "snack" is available upon request. The snack on this flight was a hamburger and fries, which was excellent.

标题: Great Flight, Great Crew, Great Value
内容: Had the chance to sit in Premium Economy product. Absolutely fantastic for the price. Comfortable seats with a great amount of recline. Food was definitely better then economy although there is room for improvement still. Treated like a first class traveler by the crew. Nothing bad to say about this flight. Got it at a great price. 1/1 would for...

标题: not the best in the sky
内容: food was good, staff good, leg room was not the best. flight was pleasant apart for the legroom. they cater for all w.r.t. their food offering.

标题: I'd say that CP is right up there with the front runners!
内容:
Even for such a short flight, I was pleasantly surprised with the overall wonderful everything with Cathay Pacific!
The food was excellent and beautifully packaged/presented.
The foot space was super, and the seat both comfortable and wide enough for any size person.
The service was exemplary, and paid attention to the fine details.
Imagine what the other 'class' travellers receive...

Cabin crews always unfriendly and no services or "select services", especially ground-services, always"黑口黑面"... your luggage check-in by yourself, almost no one will assist you...chaos and crowded...some Chinese's group travel in the flight, so noisy and lousy...So I still avoid the CX's flight... so disappointment and unworthy ! no improved, always "rubbish" airline !

Look nothing against cathay pacific, Im sure most airlines are simular, service was ok.
food was average but we arrived at hong kong alive, and that was the start of a great holiday. I suppose if you want to be treated like a king on an air plane pay the rediculous
premium and travel business class.

The route from Boston to Singapore via Hong Kong is over the pole and takes about 16 hours to HK and another 3 to Singapore. The legroom on our flight to HK, was very tight, though the return flight, both on 777's, seemed roomier. The attendants work very hard. The food is ok. There are many movies to choose from....

Four flights altogether (change in Hong Kong). Every one of the four flights were delayed. Made the changeover in Hong Kong very tight, so tight that on the return leg, they sent someone to escort us to the next plane. (Which was a tick for them).
We were on a newer plane on the way out and that was very...

Traveled on Cathay pacific to Frankfurt business class. Their business class provides the right amount of privacy and comfort just what a passenger requires. Did Online check in which was easy. Once arriving at the airport for bag drop the Cathay staff at the airport showed you that it’s going to be a nice flight. The agent who helped me...

标题: Great flight experience, very friendly staff, will try to fly cathay whenever possible.
内容: Absolutely great airline!! Enjoyed a very relaxing and nice flight. Good food, very friendly staff, enjoyed it very much.

Staff at the boarding gate need to do a better job in making sure passengers are in the correct lines and effective boarding sequence i.e. start boarding passengers from the back rows. Cabin crew is doing great job during the flight. Food offered in flight can be improved.

Two flights - first Phuket to Hong Kong with Cathay Dragon and second a long 13 hour flight from Hong Kong to Manchester. First flight was very budget and second was very poor for economy. Narrow uncomfortable seats and haphazard infrequent service from crew. Only beverages offered were red wine or soft drinks and coffee was awful. There weren't enough...

Check in fine and swift. Boarding easy and very well organized. The seats on the 35-9 are very comfortable, the new inflight entertainment leaves some other airlines far behind.
Great service with a smile.

great and leisure flight!!!
as a matter of fact this was the first that I could stretch my kegs a really be comfortable.

It was a pleasure to review of the CX Suite. Everything was very smooth as after 15 Min after takeoff , flight attendant named Kit and Alan start serving customer. I was also lucky that I am occupied the whole first cabin, The food was good but I still prefer the Pier first class lounge in HKIA. I have enjoyed...
Flew HKG-MAD... Hospitable staff onboard all the way with unlimited snacks at the galley. Clean toilets and fantastic food. Bravo :)

Member of Asia miles and once loved Cathay Pacific until a recent round the world trip. For the first time ever when the wife and I was boarding in Hong Kong we realised she was at one end of the plane and I at the other. Managed to barter with other passengers and found out we were not the only...

标题: Needed to get on a full flight for medical reasons
内容:
We had a medical emergency. My wife developed an eye infection and we had to leave a cruise to get home for treatment.It could be serious, I tried to book online and that application is a disaster. I tried for 2 hours and never got it to work. The ship people tried too and no luck.
We went to the...

Our flights to Sydney via Hong Kong and return were good despite being very full. I had a walking problem and was helped very adequately.
It is worth noticing that extra drinks and snacks are available in the kitchens. So you fetch them yourself. Not everyone seems to be aware of this.
I was seated in chair 58C which is...

Long haul is boring so anything which helps time pass and is comfortable gets my thumbs up. The staff were helpful and attentive. The seats easily converted into flat beds (and anything between). Slept on second leg (Hong Kong to Sydney) and arrived with hardly any jet lag.
Also took the opportunity to use their special airport lounges for food...

It was a 17-hr long flight from Manila to London via Hongkong but it was a good experience.
The movies/entertain was nice, quite many options to choose from. We were served with snacks and full board meals, but the food was okay or nothing to be excited about. I was impressed with their service since, it was a two-connecting flight...

Several unexplained delays but we eventually took off. I was in Business Class, window seat, 23A flight time of 11 hours 12 minutes which got us to HongKong at 9.15 local time.
I started with a glass of champagne followed by dinner service which was not overly exciting.
Movie selection seemed fairly dated and not very extensive.
Reasonable amount of...

标题: Great flight , the No fuss quality airline!
内容:
Having suffered an overcrowded miserable connecting flight with BA it was a pleasure to step on board Cathay's 777 bound for Hongkong .
The plane was immaculate as were the staff who were both very friendly and helpful.
The Plane took off exactly on time and it was a very pleasant flight with excellent service and good meals .
my...

We departed on time and arrived on our destination on the dot without a hitch. Cabin service was good with helpful flight attendants. Online check-in was easy where you can choose your own seats, confirmed and print your boarding pass. I like the food served on-board.

I have to admit that I opted to travel on Cathay's business class for the rather short skip and hop return trip from Singapore to Bangkok only because I had come across a good offer. Nevertheless, the product ultimately determines it's worth, and if based on just this experience, I feel that Cathay can be reasonably proud of their business...

Everything about this journey was perfect. It was two flights in each direction via Hong Kong, and it was as though Cathay Pacific has taken care to ensure every detail matters. I wouldn't hesitate to travel with them again

标题: Nearly missed flight booked by a colleague
内容: I just wanted to thank Cathay for doing their best to ruin my, and my sons weekend in Hong Kong. We arrived nice and early at the airport, but on check in was asked if I had the credit card used for booking (my colleague booked the flight the day before). Obviously we didnt, and was told we needed to...

It is a regular route and fortunately not delayed more than an hour, I call it on schedule unusually, but it's good enough comparing their "normal" service. The aircraft 2 years old 33, I believe it was the oldest I have taken...... they need upgrade these for the price paid. Too many noises in business class because some passengers with...
It was a very long flight, but the staff , food and seating was wonderful and I arrived feeling some was rested for 16 hours in the air.

Cathay repeatedly make the cabin way too hot and stifling. i realise they do this to organise the behaviour of passengers but they are way overboard. I have made this flight around 3 times in the last few months and not got a moment of sleep.
Although i live in Adelaide i now choose to fly Hong Kong - Melbourne...

The company booked me this flight. This is my second time flying with Cathay Pacific. I was impressed the plane flying from la to hk. Seats were very comfortable. The cabin crew was friendly and the food was decent. Entertainment was good, with blockbuster Hollywood movies to ease the the long flight. Two hours layover, in hk was quick. Grab...
标签: International' 'Economy' 'Los Angeles - Ho Chi Minh City

标题: Great service and value for money in economy
内容:
I actually purchased a round trip ticket from Dhaka to Phoenix, USA and only got the actual Cathay Pacific carrier from HKG to LAX in the three leg journey.
I was checked in through Cathay Dragon in Bangladesh so wouldn't be able to comment on their exact check in, however boarding was smooth and amiable.
The seats and legroom were...

Normally travel economy but for this trip splashed out, to be truthefull the service I received Premium economy was no different to flying economy apart from the fact I had a bigger seat. The attention from Cabin crew was weak plenty of staff running the left side of the plane. I book all my travel for my company, will not...

标题: Puts all the other airlines I have flown with to shame
内容:
I have+never had so much room in a seat in economy on any airline I have travelled with.Best for comfort,seat width and leg room.
In seat entertainment second to non big screen with decent headphones.
Lots of choice to watch listen ,can also charge phone etc.
Loads of height as overhead lockers seemed to be quite high above seat.
Staff...

标题: Almost as good as Singapore Airlines
内容: Really good level of comfort and service at every stage of our two- flight trip. Check in was good; lounge at Hong Kong was excellent; food was superb; service was warm and friendly; seat and flat bed were comfortable. Not quite as good as Singapore Airlines, but then againe nobody is, but very close. Really looking forward to our return...

Great food, roomy seats, all the movies, TV , music you can absorb in 15 hours. Very friendly flight attendants who take service seriously. I would definitely fly this airline again and highly recommend.

标题: Very good flight from Amsterdam to Hong Kong.
内容: The comfort and service aboard was excellent but personally, I don't like the herringbone configuration of the capsule like seats.Food and wine, very good. 13 hrs and 2 mins.

While the seats were layflat, dimming the cabin lights one hour into the flight was not helpful to getting back on EST. The food was alright, but no where near ANZ or even United to SYD. We ended up being unable to sleep on this 15 hour + flight, but did watch a lot of movies. There seemed to be...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容:
Service throughout the flight was very good.
Seat was very comfortable and all gadgets worked.
Cabin staff were very helpful. They arranged someone at Hong Kong to guide me to the next flight. Much appreciated as the time between flights was marginal.

Travel this route about 4 times per Year. Yes, premium eco is more expensive but the chairs are really Much beter! More space, good sleep angle, more leg space
I am 186, normal shape and my feet or knees do not hit anything at all.
Food is same as eco class, except the welcome drink.
Service is always zo good!...

Cathay Pacific is my preferred airline for several good reasons; always perfectly clean & comfortable seats, perfect temperate, attentive, smiling staff, good food.
