On the night flight possible to get hot food ( noodle soup) at the rear of the plane together with hot or cold drinks. Wide selection of films.
Great Airline Staff very helpful, comfortable seats and plenty of space between seats. Couldn't Fault them

This was a day flight. We have flown before with Cathay, and always were reasonably ok with them, but they seem to have changed their procedures. Shortly after take off they drew down all the blinds, so it looked more like a night flight. We specifically want a day flight to help with jet leg and I find this unacceptable....

Booked this city break with Cathay Pacific and were very happy with the hotel and the flights both ways. Ground and cabin crews were very helpful and accommodating. Reasonable leg rooms and satisfied with cleanliness. The only disappointment was the return flight was delayed for almost an hour and we only received notification two hours before the scheduled time.

We regularly use this airline we travel to Asia. They always have newer planes , more legroom and excellent service. We are also Marco Polo club members for so many years and been upgraded numerous times. You need comfortable seats and amenities when you have long flights. Restrooms are always clean.

标题: First Ever Flight with Cathay Pacific
内容: First flight with Cathay in Business Class. Excellent. Left on time, arrived 3 minutes late in Hongkong, but that cut the waiting time for onward flight to Bangkok. Arrived Bangkok on time. Smooth boarding, excellent on board catering, first class staff. Same on return journey.
Full length bed facilities, doona blanket, great food for the body, and fresh baby orchid in a vase for the soul. The movies even have different language choices. Friendly crew.

It was an average experience, nothing so special. Crew members were nice and treated well. Need to keep update the movie collections every 15 days since i have watched most of the movies when i traveled from Auckland to Chennai.

Really comfy seats, probably one of the largest I've flown in. It does have a weird compartment to put your feet in which means they get quite hot (just me?) but otherwise the staff and food were fantastic - can't fault it at all.

I was booked to fly first class but I’m not sure Cathy Pacific had this class on its plane - it was more like business class.
Long flight- no good movies.
Refreshments were average.

My friend had an upset stomach during the flight and the cabin crew did everything to help him. Brought him water, food, medicine, and checked up on him every hour during our flight.
However, when I asked the steward for water she said no problem and went on her way. She came back and brought my friend food but somehow...

From Nagoya to Singapore, there is a transit at HK airport. The connecting flight from HK to Singapore was been delay for an hour or so. I was disappointed that pillow was not provided in Economy class. However, the overall experience was good.

This was our first time traveling Premium Economy, and I was a little worried that it wouldn't be worth the extra money. I was pleasantly surprised. The service was excellent, and I would never go back to Economy again. There was so much room that when the Hostess suggested we could spread out as the plane wasn't full, we didn't...
Please remember to select the food beforehand else you will have to eat whatever is available. The other point is you do not get the blinds and ask for them if you want to have un-disturbed sleep.

Right up there with SK ,EK, OZ ,JL etc for on board service - though not all their flights have 18 fully flat seats in J: CX 749 HKG-JNB, for example.
I've used their CathayDragon subsidiary for HAN, BKK, KUL etc, and always been well pleased.
Plus, HKG is one of the world's best airports, and CX's Lounges are equally...

标题: The quality of care and food has gone a lot down
内容: Left me and my family with a bad experience, so as to avoid fying again with them. We were just looking for average service but the Quality is way down. Better to put few dollars for a better flight,

We booked this airline company because of its reputation but we where disappointed.
The cabin crew where children, very chaotic and no idea about European standarts.
Why bring a drink to the seat if I ask for one in the galley, where I want to drink my drink and strech my legs.
I think the only adult attendant I have...

After a stressful year, we decided to go to Bali with Cathay Pacific.
I have to say that we were both impressed. The seats on the A35 are very comfortable and even on the shorter journey from HKG to DPS the service was very good. I preordered my vegetarian meal and apart from one, all tasted good.
What we also...

First time flight with Cathay Pacific, my expectations were met the airline from check-in to landing went smoothly and no issues, seats were comfy (not to sure if I would rate the same if I had a 1hr+ flight!) meals were good - no complaints.

Quick and professional check in, nice on boarding experience with full service by happy smiling courteous attendants.
Meals were adequate and self service snacks available throughout the flight. Film availability was excellent with very large choice.
All areas clean including toilets during the entire flight only down side is the comfort of seats, still a little posture challenging given the...

I flew with these guys in December 216 and came back late January in 217 - service was exceptional! This was my first ever long haul flight, and I was travelling alone but the staff from check ins to in-flight were always so friendly and helpful.
Seat room was pretty decent for an economy seat, especially compared to other airlines....

Suba divers be aware. They do weigh your Carry on bag which needs to be 7Kg or less. They wouldn't budge over 8kg. For people traveling with very expensive and heavy underwater photography equipment this can be a problem. I recommend a photographers vest. Put everything on your person then transfer items back to your carry on after they weigh...

After 2 years later I come back try Cathay pacific business class flight again ; first, before boarding I choose the newly renovated lounge next to 63 gate , it include food place , bar area , tea area , and rest area , this the best lounge design I have ever used; second , after I board , the...

This was our first over seas flight, so we were very apprehensive and stressed. We arrived 4 hours early to make sure that we got everything right. The friendly staff at check in allayed all our fears and calmed us down.The staff were very efficient and organized. Our allocated seats were at the rear of the plane, just 2 seats...

标题: Asian airlines should train all the Western airlines and Europeans in customer service
内容:
Fantastic, impeccable service.
Was traveling solo with my toddler and they made us feel like First Class passengers !
Good food, on time, modern fleet and organised crew. Very intuitive to my needs also. Like Night and day in comparison to flying with SWISS (awful - NEVER again).
It’s hard flying long haul with a toddler, but he didn’t even...

标题: No care factor with Cathay Pacific
内容: Our journey to/from this wonderful country of Japan was terrible. Firstly our flight was delayed 2 hours (missing our connecting flight in Hong Kong), thank goodness for Qantas in this case, even though we landed in a different airport and had to arrange for our portable wifi to meet us at the hotel. Our return journey to Melbourne, delayed again...

Pleasant enough flight. On-line check in, but seats I wanted not available Sort of defeats the object of doing the on-line check-in....hmmm any theory's? Mine is that they hold certain seats back for selected passengers such as kids traveling alone.

Recently I had the privilege on flying with Cathay Pacific for the first time, we flew from Toronto with a group to Hong Kong on 6th January and returned 24th January from Kuala Lampur. Excellent service from the crew both ways, very efficient and polite.
I would highly recommend their service.

I truly enjoyed my round trip flights on Cathay Pacific - they are very organized with check in etc. the airplanes are very clean and the service is amazing. My husband and I both said that we would definitely fly Cathay Pacific whenever available to us. The food was pretty good for airline food and they have snacks that you...

标题: Terrible customer service on business class
内容:
I lost my bag and tried to contact the airline and received no response. There was no one in Cathay Pacific over the weekend and I have not received any form of response from the airline. It was extremely distressing and as a business class customer there was no support.
It was extremely disappointing that Cathay Pacific does not provide...
Cathay were good but not great can not fault timekeeping food was ok but not exceptional I would use them again in the arose

标题: London/Melbourne via Hong Kong Business Class
内容: I flew from Gatwick on the A35 to Hong Kong and from there on an older 777 3-class version to Melbourne. Window seats on both planes offered a decent amount of privacy, seat comfort while lounging and watching movies is ok but all-flat biz class seats while sleeping weren't too comfortable since I kept feeling the bar/divider of seat to...
I flew for the first time from Mumbai to Melborne with Cathey Pacific.Mumbai to Hong Kong and Hong Kong to Melbourne.Flight was really comfortable.Good food and good quality of drinks.

标题: Disappointing assistance when things went WRONG!
内容: A two hour flight turned into a five and a half hour flight! No fault of the on board Staff at all but sitting in a plane on the tarmac going nowhere without any coffee, tea or juice was not really what anyone should expect from an airline. We had alreàdy been on an hour flight and had bookings in...

Very kind staff on the ground and in the flight. Enough leg room, very comprehensive multimedia system, helpful crew. The food could be improved , but it is quite acceptable in comparison to other airlines

标题: Smooth flight always makes me happy
内容: Flew from Milan to Melbourne with a 5 day stopover in Hong Kong. First time flying Cathay Pacific - very smooth flight - I hate turbulence so this always makes me happy - cleanliness could be improved - tray tables needed a wipe - food ok, service ok, would fly with them again - good economy option.

标题: Boston to Perth via Hong Kong
内容: From booking my flights, through check-in to four terrific flights and extensive use of lounges in Hong Kong , Cathay provide a great traveling experience! The Business Class lay-flat seats are comfortable, the new in-flight entertainment is excellent, the food is terrific and the service first class. The lounges in Hong Kong are terrific with showers, a wide range of...

标题: A35 Economy, what a poor quality economy seat!!
内容: Flew the A35 from dusseldorf to Hong Kong and back. And boy what a poor seat. There is no padding in the back so if the person behind you either puts something in the seat pocket or puts it's knees against the seat back you feel this! And not a little but very much so i kept being pushed in...

Not enough space which made my leg hurt.
When you needed help, the FA(male) let you did it and ran away.
Flight delayed.
Too hot but no way to control the air-condition.
Bread was not for eating, just hard as a stone.
My GF got stomachache but the staff said nothing could help.
It was impossible to imagine the price...

We flew out premium economy as we were staying over in Hong Kong for a few days, and then flew back business class. Both legs of the journey were excellent with good service, good quality food and drinks. The attendants were courteous and attentive. The premium economy seats were comfortable with leg extensions which gave added comfort. I wouldn't say...

标题: Another BOS <-> TPE trip with wildly uneven performance
内容: I had to fly another round trip from Boston to Taipei, on last minute notice. I was grateful that there were still seats on Cathay Pacific for the round trip, and used their ability to book a package to also get a hotel for part of my stay. (However, feedback point #1: it would be useful to be able to...

Special attention started at checkin. I was travelling with oversized luggage and Cathay was very careful with my equipment. Checkin was painless with no queue and they presented me with my boarding pass, priority card and lounge pass.
The lounge was pleasant and clean and I managed to relax before boarding. The business queue at the gate could have been...

I was taking a Cathay's premium economy class for a biz trip to Shanghai. Nothing special except the foods were bad. Understood the foods should be same as economy class, but it was exceptional bad on that flight. The person next to me was a diamond club member, he filed a complain and the flight attendant seemed very polite to...

I flew not just from LAX to Hong Kong, but Hong Kong to Auckland. Whew! But in Premium Economy I had very comfortable seats and was well taken care of. If you are going long haul to Asia or using Hong Kong as a hub, I recommend this airline.

标题: didnt receive my upgrade and no food available to eat
内容:
Didnt receive my upgrade that i was meant to receive.
There were no options available that i liked to eat.
I asked for fruit and was advised they dont have any fruit.
I advised they had fresh fruit available on the previous trip and was told in a rude and abrupt tone that they dont have any fruit.
I asked...

标题: No food available - wasn't catered for
内容:
No food available - wasn't catered for
The only option i had available to eat was an apple.
Staff didn't try and find other options for me when i woke up, was advised sorry there is only particular food available which i dont eat

Actually we flew from Melbourne via Hong Kong to Tokyo and then from Osaka to HK and back to Melbourne. Everything was just fine re cabin staff helpfulness and our vegetarian meals were fine too. Nothing spectacular but no complaints. The staff were also helpful when my grandson spilt his meal all over his seat. When I mentioned re water...

There is only one toilet for the PE Section on the starboard side and inaccessible for port side passengers unless one treks all the way to the rear of economy and passes thru the Galley, very bad design and not considering for PE passengers
Excellent service on board of the 777-3! The crew was very helpful, and are running for you during the whole flight. We flew many airlines, but this wat certainly a 1!

Our section was almost empty on this flight, in the old days one could lift up the arm rests and stretch out along a row of seats, nowadays with the arms holding so much tacnology and trays etc, that is now impossible and was frustrating. The service we got from the cabin staff was excellent. However, for the extra fare...

标题: Enjoy, transit, luxury lounges at Hong Kong！
内容: My 7years old son and I could enjoy fright from Nagoya to Cairns. When we transit at Hong Kong we love to go shopping and to take a rest in lounge. They give us good meal and coffee, magazines, shower room.
excellent service! from check in, boarding, in flight attention, to food. u.s. domestic airlines should take lesson from them on how to treat passenger.

标题: Fly Cathay today, you will enjoy it
内容:
Check in and boarding with a Marco Polo card is a delight.
Friendly service
Good food, snacks
Comfortable seating

标题: Not like it is to be
内容: I had flown Cathay Pacific many years ago for business. I always remember it as a premium airline and how great the flight was from the staff, the food to the seats. It had been awhile until recently that I got a chance to again fly with them again from Hong Kong to Toronto. To be honest either they got...

Cathay is one of the airline has highest flight frequency between HK & Taipei. Unfortunately, Cathay also has many old panel running between this route. Due to flight time very short, serving meal has been also a problem. CX has been cutting cost after SARS, from a regular meal to a good looking only but taste horrible pastry. Recently CX...

There are two seats together towards the rear of the plane, Row 71 Seats A and C that have great leg room and easy to get up and stretch or go to the bathroom. Perfect for couples. Normally there are 3 seats per row but the plane tapers in the back so they put 2 seats in this row.
Leg...

we flew Cathay pacific on the 2nd leg of our journey to New Zealand, and I must say I was very impressed. The Pods are well designed in business class and are comfortable too. next to you is additional table area along with a small cabinet, as well as storage by your feet. unlike other airlines that offer blankets- they...

Flew non-stop from Boston to Hong Kong to start a recent trip to Asia. This is a verrrrry long flight, over 16 hours, and may be the only non-stop option to Hong Kong. Good food with international options available and decent leg room. After our very long flight we stayed at the Regal Hotel inside Hong Kong airport. They offered...

Last time we will fly cathay pacific. This is the second time we have been given seperate seats. Wd were told that the plane was heavily booked and that we couldn't be sat together. This has happened before. Will not travel with them again.

I hope more people like myself try this airline, my gosh their service is the best I ever experienced. They gave me an upgrade because of their connecting partner who happens to be a big name airline (United) not only got us there very late, but messed up. Rather than dwell on them I will continue with the positive. Cathay...
Comfortable seats ,on time, very good food , toilet facilities were adequate and clean .Staff were efficient enough but not particularly friendly

My family of 6 flew this airline and we enjoyed it. The flight staff was very warm and cordial. We had a 4 hour flight and the meal they served was decent. They have in-seat entertainment with a decent selection of movies. This was the first time I flew with this airline and was pleasantly surprised. I am a tall,...

标题: No cradles for screaming babies is dangerous
内容: My husband and I had travelled 3 hours on a coach to the Beijing airport. We then waited two hours at the airport prior to boarding and another 2 hours inside the plane whilst the airline was de-iced. Immediately after take off two babies, seated with their mothers in front of us, started screaming. The screaming went on for the...

What a wonderful flight, albeit very long
From the designer PJs to the cooked breakfast
The crew attended to your every need
I would choose them again upon a return visit to
Asia

Great service. Pre ordered gluten free meals and they were there!!! Knew where I was sitting! No hassle. Roomy seats. Good choice of films, tv, musc. Pillow and blanket supplied. Friendly staff. Some flights more generous with alcohol than others!

标题: eight hour delay and no compensation
内容: I've never encountered a situation like this before, where the flight is delayed by 8 hours because the pilot for the incoming flight got sick and they didn't have someone to fill in for him. So accordingly we lost our reservation on a dinner cruise in Hong Kong and were told, that there is no compensation for that
Absolutely loved this flight from DBX to HKG! The crew were fabulous, the food was outstanding and the seats were comfortable and very private! Would fly Cathay Pacific again in a heartbeat! ?

标题: Flight is okay but check in and seats are always a hassle
内容: Once you are on the Cathay flight the service is good. The seats, entertainment and food are standard and the service is okay. They are bad at seat allocation. It's the 3rd and final time we will fly with them due to their policy of locking out seats unless you pay in advance for them. We had seats for 3...

Very satisfied with Cathay Pacific. I am not an overly fussy traveler, so I am probably not as stringent reviewer as some might be, however, the flight was smooth, the staff was polite and attentive, the price was extremely reasonable, and I was overall very satisfied. The meals on Cathay have always been decent, and I have flown comfortably with...

标题: Great - once they're in the air
内容: Once we got in the air the crew were outstanding. The problem is getting there. Of the five flights we took in a recent SE Asia (Vietnam and Cambodia) all three Cathay Pacific flights were delayed from as long as 13 hours to 2 hours. The longest causing us to miss the first day of our tour.

标题: Punctuality not a priority for CX?
内容: Lately it seems flight punctuality on CX is no longer a priority. All of the 4 flight legs on my TPE-HKG-BKK-HKG-TPE trip were delayed in some way. Worst was the BKK-HKG flight which was rescheduled to an hour later (nice to be notified by SMS but as it was only about 4 hours before the flight was due we were...

I still fly Cathay - i really like the food and service. My only complaint is the club membership before if you have achieved Marco Polo status you will be a member forever now you have to pay 1 dollars to maintain if you didnt fly for certain period. I am still good for another year but Cathay will no...

I used to take Cathay Pacific, but experienced how other airlines have much better service and food. This time, my daughter and I took Cathay on a last minute purchase, we just wanted to spend a few days in HK. First flight out delayed, we got to HK an hour later than we were supposed to arrive. Food was BAD,...

标题: Customer service tainted by a couple of very poor attendants
内容: We received very poor from service from a couple of flight attendants who treated us very poorly. Up till this flight we have received very good service by Cathay. We were most disappointed.

标题: Brisbane to Paris via Hong Kong
内容: Staff were polite and helpful. Food was good (special GF diet), beverages excellent. The toiletries pack was very useful and meant that on the next trip I didn't bother with having to put these sorts of things in the display pack you have to have at the airport.
Amazing service! The food was exceptional. The lay flat seats with down comforter made our flight amazing!
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Cathay Pacific’s premium economy was a fine way to make the long trip between Tel Aviv -Hong kong-Melbourne.Spacious comfortable seats, which has a generous recline, expanded legroom and a supported head rest, Healthy meals,were offered by a menuso we could chose our meal. Fresh fruits and vegetables, selection of wines,a wide range of entertainment, amenity kit that includes socks, an...

标题: Not Too Bad Flight But Room For Improvement
内容: The flight was probably one of the longest but it is not too bad. The equipment (777ER3) was a bit dated but the seat (21K) was alright. It is just after the bulkhead in the last business class section. This seat has a little bit of extra leg room and you can put up your legs without being too rude...

标题: Upgraded from Premium to Business (Flight Redemption)
内容:
I booked a roundtrip flight from Cebu (CEB) to Paris (CDG) on Premium Economy using my miles on Cathay Pacific.
I am looking at a glass half full considering I got a complimentary upgrade to business class for my CEB-HKG leg.
For one, short haul business class service is mundane. Totally predictable 9% of the time. They’ve lost the element...

标题: BE CAREFUL - THEY ONLY DO PERIODIC MAINTENANCE CHECKS
内容:
I had problems when flying with Cathay pacific.
My chair didnt work at all. It wouldnt incline or decline.
I was advised by staff their is nothing that can be done.
I followed up compensation after a long flight sitting upright which caused injuries to my back and affected my holidays and was advised by Cathay Pacific staff that they...

Service considerate, polite and efficient.Meals good but not haute cuisine
Plane arrived 2 minutes early

I flew on this airline from Johannesburg, South Africa return. Overall the flight was good, however the cabin staff are not as friendly as those on Emirates and to be only offered one beverage on a 11 - 13 hour night flight is not acceptable. I would prefer not to use this airline again.

Excellent service, in-flight and off. Well-designed and comfortable business class lounges with great amenities and buffet offerings. Excellent personalized service in flight, with very comfortable seating. Cathay may have been bumped by Emirates and Singapore as the top-rated airline, but I find it reliably efficient and well-serviced.

My favorite airline by far. While this particular trip was uneventful, that can be a big plus... On previous flights, I have had the crew go far beyond their standard duties to the extent of arguing on my behalf with a particularly intransigent immigration officer who mistakenly stamped the wrong boarding pass such that security was not going to let...

This is connecting flight for Miat flight from Ulaanbator to Hongkong.This one flies from Hongkong to New Delhi.Hongkong is one of the best airport is the world.This flights keep the professional experience intact.Keep up the good work!

After flying from london gatwick to hong kong and being on a superb plane, this one was old and rattly.
The plane was ancient and so was the chairs etc. No where near as much leg room as the newer plane.
Service was adequate but food choice was literally the same on both flights.
We are hoping the flights back...

A lot of schedule, very flexible, especially for asia.
Just make some plan dan book far away before ........

标题: incredible service and attention to detail
内容: Everything about this flight was perfect. From boarding to meal service to the overall 8 hours of flying time, this was by far the best flight experience I have endured. Well done Cathay - you have won me over.

I had booked my flight in February, 217 and was scheduled to fly out of Los Angeles, via Hong Kong, to Sri Lanka in November, 217. I received an e-mail about a month before departure informing me that my seat had been changed on the flight from Los Angeles to Hong Kong. It was not until I read deeper in...

标题: Quality service? Depends on 3 major components: chance, nationality, gender.
内容:
As a Hong Konger, still a passion to supporting CP. But the quality of service is no longer a reasonable expectation, as if what I observed in a flight from Shanghai to Hong Kong last week, depending on your gender, nationality, and chance.
The female flight attendants 'tends' to show more smiles and politeness to male westerners, but turned into...

I paid way too much money for this one way flight from Sydney to Toronto. As I only needed a one way flight, we were ripped off for this privilege. However, I had heard good things about Cathay and was looking forward to this flight. Well it's an understatement to say how disappointed we were. In the first leg of...

标题: Eventhough not as high class as it used to be, it still is up there close to the top
内容: Still really good service, altough they were quite late on the afternoon flight from Pudong to Hong Kong, I expect that being a "shuttle" service the early morning flights went OK but as the day progressed, the airport delays kicked in so I can not blame 1% the airline
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Economy' 'Shanghai - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: Cathay is well known first time travelling with airline, Double security, bought water after first to take on board only to have another bag check & it taken off us.

Overall a good flight - seats were reasonably comfortable for economy - did like the way the chair declined. In flight entertainment was average - but then I don't watch much TV so for some it may have been good. Good food and plenty of it. Flight attendants very accommodating

Cathay Pacific provided the first 3 1/2 hour leg back to the United States on AA. What a difference in comfort and service compared to AA! I wish we could have flown all the way on Cathay Pacific! The seats were comfortable, service was great, and the food was good. We paid an additional $ 1 per seat for the...

标题: True international flight company, multicultural meal options in HK Business lounges
内容: Nicely presented Vegan meal for business class passengers. Variety of vegetarian and vegan dishes in HK international airport. The only thing is the taste of in-flight vegan meal is not that good. Lounge vegan meal option is good and freshly cooked by order. It really warms your stomach and your heart in transit.

Crew members were very nice, friendly, and helpful. Left Singapore at 2pm, and they served full lunch, 3 choices (fish/chicken with rice or pasta), fresh fruit, hot bread, ice cream, water, plus other alcohol/soft drinks. More than expected for this 2 hours' fly.

I had always heard a lot about this airline, but this is the first time I actually travelled on it. Comparing it with about 15 other airlines I have flown with, I think this airline is just over-hyped as there was nothing special about it. In my opinion, the quality of an airline can be best assessed when one has...

I recently flew with Cathay from Vancouver to Hong Kong to Mumbai. The flight was delayed, food wasn't good, seats had no leg room. Due to delay of the airline I missed my connecting flight there wasn't any consideration or any apologies. They gave me a boarding pass to Chennai for which we had to run to the boarding gate....

标题: Hot (no air circulation) and surly staff
内容: What happened to individual controlled aircon vents above each seat (we didn't have these on any of our 4 Cathay flights)? Without the ability to adjust aircon, our seats became hotter and hotter making us all feel ill. Eventually my daughter vomited from heat stroke and, aside from giving (eventually!) us materials to clean up ourselves, the in flight staff...

I flew to Osaka in November 217. I don't have any complaints about the flight except for their bidding system. You can only bid for the next fare class up. For example, if you paid for an economy ticket, you can only bid for a premium economy class. So on and so forth. Not all bids are successful. Fortunately, my...

I have no complaints about my flight except their upgrade system to the next class. It was done through a bidding system. Not every bid is successful. Fortunately, my flight to Osaka was. I ended up paying a little more than an economy fare but less than a premium fare. It was worth the extra money. Some of the perks...

Lovely new plane A35. Very clean. Very helpful pleasant staff who helped us all the time as we required assistance. Only problem was no toilet facilities in Premium Economy, had to walk a long distance to the ones in the Economy class . The hand towels were a shocking quality.

Service is great, the crew is very efficient and friendly. Best economy class food I’ve ever eaten. Entertainment system is top notch. Loved their luggage drop off option at the subway stations downtown Hong Kong the day before your flight. Very convenient. Would fly with them again in a flash!

Could not fault this trip. Lounge in HK superb. The layout was excellent and they even had a long bar. Professional barmen, even made a superb martini. Facilities on board were first class and the cabin crew friendly and efficient. Food very good indeed and in flight entertainment top notch. Loved it.

I have traveled in Cathay many times and always had a great experience. Food is good only if you pre-order your preference. Last time I forgot and was in trouble as we have some food restrictions like (no beef or pork) which hardly gave me options to eat.

标题: Terrible service. Will never fly Cathay Pacific again.
内容: Had booked business class from Hong Kong to Amsterdam 19th of January. The seat is good and the flight entertainment is ok, but not great (although the screen is good). The food from Hong Kong to Amsterdam is bad and definitely not business class worthy. But the worst is the service. Some flight attendants, especially the one male flight attendant,...

havin flown with emirates and singspore airlines we decided to try cathay pacific this time the price was very good so we booked,seats on the plane were spacious comfy as well entertainment system was very good to always helps on long haul flights.
on e bug bare was that they werent fully stocked first drinks thru cabin and they had...

Cathay as usual at their excellent best in terms of service, check-in, in flight. Took good care of my son who was sick with regular follow ups etc. Cabin crew are polite as usual and always willing to help.

标题: Memorable for a series of firsts
内容: This recent flight marked a number of firsts for me: first time visiting the new Terminal 4 lounge at Changi Airport, first Cathay Pacific flight, first experience of the airline's business class, first flight on an Airbus A35-9. The flight itself was delayed by about twenty minutes to the plane's late arrival from Bangkok and despite it being only a...

Cathay Pacific have been very accommodating over the years. When there were family problems, flights were rescheduled and charges were very reasonable. On my last flight, there was a problem with one gentleman regarding his meal. It was dealt with firmly, but with discussion and empathy. I expect to be flying with them again next year.

We were on our way home, the lounge experience in Kansai was not good. It was small co- shared with other airlines and the variety of food so limited. The area was small and crowded; not relaxing at all.

标题: Check slow, flight delayed by an hours and in flight foods was very average at best
内容: I travel a range of airlines from budget in Asia & the EU to premium airlines on long haul flights. I was very surprised and sadly disappointed with the service from start to finish. Only a short flight and I took the opportunity to book premium economy. The check in process was grossly disorganised. the flight was delayed an hour...

The flight for the most part was great. On the way out I was bumped to Business Class from Hong Kong to Perth just because they had seats available. The aircraft on my flight out of Perth was delayed. This caused me to get into Hong Kong late the day before Chinese New Year. I ended up with a long...

标题: Sincere service and the perfect flat bed
内容:
This is true Asian service, from the stunning Cathay Pacific business class lounge The Pier on HK airport to the extra pillow I requested and immediately got on board. Our night flight of 12 hours to Amsterdam was very comfortable. The staff in business class is very concerned with your wellbeing without being intrusive.
The food is is of high...

The plane arrived in Singapore late and thus we boarded late. Once we left the gate, we sat on the taxi-way for about 45 minutes. The pilot then said that we needed to return to the gate because there was some sort of sensor that indicated there was a problem with the brakes. We returned to the gate and after...

标题: Excellent Flight from NYC to Asia
内容: Cathay Pacific is one of my favorite airlines when heading to the Far East. I had flown with them on multiple occasions via Premium Economy, Business & First Class. Decided to splurge for my daughter's 1st trip to Asia and booked business class tickets to Thailand. We had a great flights to and from Asia. The food and service is...

This is the first time I flew Premium Economy and I decided to pay the extra $$$ for more comfort.
The choice of airlines to London out of Brisbane was limited. I was recommended Cathay Pacific by the Travel Agent as the best choice and I was disappointed in what I received for the cost.
You do get extra leg...

My friend selected this airline as the timing is better to fly from Kuala Lumpur to Guilin transit in Hong Kong. The Hong Kong airport provided the data service plan that can roam in China that can be purchased before fly off to China.
Everything works, smooth, on time as expected of Cathay Pacific. For such a short flight, it even includes a hot meal. Other airlines should take note.

Recently flew to New York from Australia in premium economy. I am a big guy at 26 cm so the extra space in the front row was a bonus. Huge variation in the quality of both the hard and soft product in the different legs was a let down. Some meals were close to business standard, others were straight out...

First time on this lovely aircraft. Staff friendly and accommodating. Premium economy comfortable. Clean, quite, lots of good movies to watch and the food was good for airplane fare. I would recommend this airline to anyone flying to Asia.

I have flown this trip about 1 times using Air Canada, United Airlines, Quantas and Cathay Pacific. Cathay Pacific service, in flight entertainment and food are better than any alternate I have used.
While Air Canada is marginally a faster route it fares are not competitive. I will never ever fly United again.

标题: When things go wrong, as they sometimes will...
内容: You learn a lot about a business when things go wrong. I've learned today that CP struggle greatly to deal with difficulties. My premium economy flight was originally scheduled for 17:15, to Perth via Hong Kong, but was subject to repeated delays until my connection was under threat. The people in the lengthy queue at the desk informed me the...

标题: Never fails to meet our expectations
内容:
Our trip to France was part of a longer trip to London, Hong Kong and Taipei before our returm to Sydney - it was about a 2 month holiday. As always Cathay's service was excellent and the seating and food were great.
My wife in particular loves the flat beds on the larger aircraft
In most instances we find this...

I Flew London Heathrow to Ho Chi Minh via Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific. What an incredible airline. There no is coincidence that they are a 5* airline. Everything about them was quality. The service from the cabin crew is the best I have seen. Extremely polite and friendly, will do anything for you. The food was very nice, washed...

标题: Enjoyable return Flight to Hong Kong
内容: Smooth check in, prompt on-time departure from Bangkok. Flight is smooth, except during the journey we had to pass through a lot of turbulence. The crew made us feel at ease and continued with the cabin services like nothing happened. Food is fine as well the onboard entertainment. Prompt arrival and quick arrival of luggage on the belt. A good...

I had a great experience with the wonderful fast check into an enjoyable flight to Bangkok. Inflight service is good, a nice meal, charming and professional service. CX is a good and reliable airline.

标题: Cam - ground agent in Manila - saved us!
内容: Cam (or Zam - I may have the spelling wrong) was incredibly efficient, effective and professional in running down our luggage that was lost in Seoul Korea. We'd had a horrible time in Korea with the airport and everyone who worked in the airport (we met about 3 people in our weird odyssey there). We were exhausted when we got...

The flight was on time and the seats comfortable. The staff were all friendly and good. The choice of foods are also good. The toilets were always cleaned every after use of the passengers. Blankets are provided to everyone who needed it. Ear plugs and ear phones are in good condition. Tv shows are available always. Drinks are of various...

Despite it being a long haul flight, with a brief stop at Hong Kong to switch planes, the service we received as economy passengers was excellent. The staff were always friendly and professional and had no trouble with conversing in English. The food served was excellent, the range of free drinks (including alcoholic) and free on-board entertainment was excellent. It...

One of the best experiences we ever had on an airline. Most importantly, these beds are 36" wide, solid construction, and dead level flat. The configuration is 1-1-1 and only 2 rows. Only 1 other passenger on our flight. They don't upgrade just to fill the section. We flew with 3 empty seats out of the 6. Suites are wide...

标题: The worst flight experience for the last 7 years
内容: I have been flying the partner carriers of American Airlines, either Cathay Pacific or JAL on business class or First class for the last seven years internationally. I have had no complaints at all. Most of the times, I appreciate their very good services, reflected in the paper surveys. I never had a problem with the Cathay First. But this...

I traveled premium economy and I had a great flight. The seat was very comfy, and with extra leg room. In flight entertainment was good. I am not a movie lover but i watched 4 movies on this flight. The food was of high quality and very delicious. It's like having fine dining at a restaurant as you are given...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: I had a terrible Hong Kong trip since Cathay Pacific lost my bag without any responsibility for delay and lost baggage with several follow ups. They had Repeatedly Postponed, lied and finally deceived since the first day (Jan12 ) till now (Jan 26). I went back to Bangkok on Jan 15 without any help, advance money and compensation for necessary...

Flights on time, comfortable seats, friendly staff, the choice of food was very good, inhouse entertainment was excellent with plenty of choice of films, tv programmes and music, we enjoyed the fitted cameras that enabled us to watch take off and landing of the plane.

标题: Longest line I have ever been in
内容: I had a change over from Sapporo Japan and usually that plane is worse but this time no. We had to switch planes and wait another hour plus air conditioning made such a difference and then I had to wait in a very long line, even the business class line was long. Tray tables were terrible and it was a...

Check in at the Toronto Pearson airport is very slow at the Cathy Pacific Counter - they have implemented the self check-in luggage system. With that, there was a lot of passenger with the luggage over-weight. They have to spend a lot of time repackage. - otherwise, the whole flight was uneventful

标题: Excellent flight at a good price
内容: Three of us flew premium from Manchester to Bangkok with Cathay Pacific in premium what s short stop over in Honk Kong. The flight was good with good service on board. The stop over time was good at about 2 hours. There was no premium on the Hong Kong to Bangkok leg and we were upgraded to business class on...

Seats and cabins are comfortable and roomy, impressive in flight entertainment, food served was Soy Ginger Lattice Pastry (surprisingly better than I imagined). Cookie served as snack was pretty bad though - threw it after one bite.
Attendants are warm and attentive, courteous as well.
All in all a good experience.

标题: No delay, good food, high level
内容: I had a flight from Hanoi to Zurich via Hong Kong (KA294 and CX383). Both flights departed with a tiny delay and arrived earlier that scheduled. Boarding was efficient, on-board team was professional, both pilots are great, food is amazing, clean, on time, no problem at the stop over. And the price for the return ticket from Zurich to Hanoi...

标题: On time, nice planes, bad food
内容: Long, long flight. Connecting through Hong Kong, you are looking at 15+ hrs to HK and then an additional 9 hrs to Sydney. Best price but you feel the trip takes forever. Take a more direct flight if possible. The only other time I've flown Cathay was many years ago during an Air Canada strike. Through a fortuitous set of...

Flew business class from Heathrow via Hong Kong onto Melbourne then Sydney and returned the same way family of 3 and it was our 1st time flying with Cathy Pacific and we were all very impressed . We thought it was far better than 1st class with Virgin and better than other business class airlines
In flight service very good,all...

Great staff, excellent service and a good range of entertainment options. Planes were clean and well-kept. Meals were good. I would definitely fly Cathay Pacific again and recommend to others. Especially to Hong Kong.

Flew Business to Brisbane. Great flight
Purser (Mary) and staff on board absolutely fabulous. What a great team

标题: To my surprised the lunch was pretty good.
内容: Usually, the inflight food was always over cooked. This time to my surprise the lamb chop I had was totally diffident. The taste was absolutely good. Well done Cathay.

标题: Best airlines for travelling among Asian countries
内容: Best and warm service provided by air stewards, reasonable price as most of time have promotion for couple. Comfortable cabin is provided with privacy, premium lounge is also provided before on board. I can only criticise its food provided on board not reach my requirement. Fortunately, I may say I have compensate as I served by the food provided by...

Recently I flew Cathay Pacific as the final leg of a round the world ticket. The ground staff were hopeless and very dismissive. Families were not seated together which created problems for the poor cabin crew who tried for 4 minutes to relocate families so they were seated together. Would never fly wirh them again

I flew, return, from Switzerland to New Zealand. The business class was very comfortable, the staff was nice, professional and helpful. While waiting to board the leg Hong Kong-Zurich, I have waited in the Cathay lounge close to the gate 67, the most recent and newest of the lounges, and I found it spacious, rich in selection of food and...

标题: A smooth flight from SIN TO HKG
内容:
Cathay Pacific have recently shifted their operation to the new Terminal 4 at Changi Airport. Despite operating in a new terminal, check-in and luggage drop-off was smooth and fast.
Flight departure and journey duration was acceptable.
Seat, in-flight entertainment, and in-flight service was also acceptable.
We enjoy the flight from SIN-HKG

I usually fly with another airline but thought of trying this one. Had sub-par service especially with asking for beverages after the food service. Though the FAs are a bit friendly they take a long time to service you. During the 12hr flight I asked for extra water(as everyone should always do) it took about 3 minutes before they were...
Great baggage allowance, excellent inflight entertainment, great mobile app, very reasonable on board meals, drinks and service, my choice of airline every time I go to the Far East

标题: Business class is good, but not great (and on a downward trajectory)
内容:
I fly CX because of my relationship with American. (I had been an EXP through 216, Plat last year). I am questioning whether I will fly with them going forward, or whether I will fly Singapore Air.
I have flown to Asia on Singapore Airlines twice, and the flight and service was OUTSTANDING. The seats were AWESOME and I actually...

Our flight to Hanoi (with a stopover in Hong Kong) couldn't be faulted. The staff were very attentive and all seemed to have a good attitude. We received two meals on our 8 hour flight and 1 meal on our 2 hour flight, plus drinks anytime. Also good legroom and great choice of movies (on a relatively big screen).
Side...

Flown with their B-777s. Good leg room, IFE was good with very wide range of western and Chinese movies.
Food was one of the better ones I had in a flight. Return flight from HKG was a little delayed (waited on the Tarmac for ATC clearance) which is not their fault. Highly recommended

I flew economy out and premium economy back. The difference is noticable and I might consider flying premium depending on price. Cathay is a quality airline. The food is standard and not much different from EVA, which I usually fly. The entertainment system is great and helps the time fly.
The only negative, and it's big, if you need to...

We decided to upgrade our flight to premium economy to see if it gave us an easier journey. Booking was easy but when the flight times were changed I rang to discuss this with the flight provider. I was assured that it was just a change of time of departure by ten minutes and nothing to worry about. The evening...

I got an upgrade for the flight between HKG and LAX from premium economy to business. The staff was nice and welcoming, food and drinks offered several times during the flight. The espresso was excellent! I chose the pork as the main dish and this was a mistake. The staff saw that I could not eat it and a replacement...

标题: At the very back! Not as bad as I thought
内容: I recently few Cathay Pacific for the first time Dusseldorf to HK and HK to Sydney. On the Sydney leg my seat was the absolute last one on the plane. 72 I think and I was dreading it thinking people would be lining up to go to the loo all the time but turns out there is like a room...

标题: Night Flight - Difficult to sleep due to the cold
内容:
The staff on the flight were polite and helpful. The seats were reasonable and the food was quite good. Also, I found the online check in really good and relatively easy to follow.
However, I've graded this as two because it was really cold throughout the entire flight. it left Hong Kong at 1. am and it was approx a...
Spend all that money on business class ticket and the business lounge the Bridge looks like a school canteen. Nowhere to sit. Very average

Flight was overnight and delayed leaving, but friendly pilot, South African, reassured us that a lot of the time could be made up in flight. In the morning, our descent into Brisbane was sunny and clear, little wind. The plane was flown carefully down to the ground, and there was not a bump at all, on landing. So lightly did...

This was my connecting flight on the sector Mumbai - Hong Kong - Fukuoka. One thing cannot be denied is that the service and attitude is much better on flights not starting and going to India. compared to the Mum - HK flight this flight was much better and the service/care etc much better. Anyways the flight was great and...

A great airline, good inflight entertainment and service. Was satisfied overall.
Checkin and boarding was also well organized

标题: Good, but not as good as they make out.
内容: The first bad point was the total mayhem on boarding in London. It seemed to be every man for himself. To be fair though this did not happen in Hong Kong or Brisbane, so maybe Heathrow might get there act together. Service was good if maybe a little aloof, a bit like when a policeman calls you sir. That said...

Our flight left San Francisco on time and arrived at Hong Kong 2 minutes early. We were served dinner and breakfast on our flight. The food was ok, nothing to write home about. The flight attendants were friendly and helpful. There were many current movies and tv shows offered on the flight. I managed to watch three movies on the...

Bad experience with this company, first the seat booking doesn't work well as we were denied to choose the seats togheter, and in the other flight we had 3 hours delay for various reason, this company need to improve their service.

Everything would have been perfect, other than the seats themselves... Great service before during and after flights, lounges were good, food I really enjoyed ( my wife wasn't all that impressed with the food onboard, other than the cheese!)
I found the seat to be really firm. I like a firm back, but the seat was also firm to the...

标题: Good service on on time flights
内容: Good level of service . All three flights on time . Stress and issue free travel . Hong Kong stop over a bit long but we knew that when we booked.

The flight attendants were amazing, courteous and really helpful and i honestly have zero qualms with them. The food was was alright but there was no catering for people who don't eat pork in general. Choosing the hindu meal is not an option because from prior experience the food was horrendous.The seats were not comfortable and there was zero privacy...

标题: A seat comfy enough to sleep in.
内容: Premium Economy is close to what Business Class used to be, before the lie-flat pod seating; wider seats, that lean back further, with ample leg-room; most of them have a leg rest that makes the seat into a comfy recliner. The service was enhanced somewhat over regular Economy, though it wasn't up to Business/First levels (it is nice to be...

Have just completed first leg of our homeward journey Bangkok to Hong Kong then transfer for second leg Hong Kong to Manchester the flight from Bkk was great take off time B777 3 series plane plenty of leg room good attentive flight crew and meal was good looking forward to second leg of journey in about 2 hrs time

Great moment, nice crew, good food! I recommend!
Hong-Kong airport lounge is a little bit far in the airport, but warm welcome from the crew.

We had high expectations from a previous flight. However, the standard turned out to be a disappointment despite the newer aircraft. No separate toilets in the cabin, food standard reduced, one type cheapest red wine, coffee no good - i.e. obvious signs of cost savings. Also gluten free food very disappointing.

treated the family to Business Class from Singapore to Osaka, chose the flights with stop over in Hong Kong as it worked out a better arrival time each way. so was four flights (and another quick stop in Taiwan).
Two of the flights we had the pods and they were fantastic, so comfortable.
And on all flights the menu, drinks...
Was surprised that the web online check-In is so user-friendly. Better than some of the popular airline.
From check-in to get off the aircraft, everything absolutely fantastic. Crews are very professional. Cathay, you are one the best in the world!!

On this ultra-long-haul flight, I decided to try CX for the first time given its good reputation, and I was not disappointed. Despite weather and technical delays due to the East Coast storm, captain and crew kept us informed and provided snacks to the passengers. Rest of the trip was uneventful, service was prompt and efficient. Food was quite good...

标题: Comfy and roomie seating on the 777-3
内容: Had seat 21A in economy and was please with the extra leg room and very comfortable seat. Was a short flight of 3.5hrs and felt I could have easily travelled another 1 without any discomfort. Inflight service was at it's usual Cathay best including the meal and refreshments provided.

Excellent service while going. Multiple entree choices and terrific service.
However, I gave 3 stars because return journey from Perth, Australia to JFK, via Hong Kong the service was only 3 stars. Breakfast was served without orange juice (forgot to serve!) and coffee was brewing. It arrived after breakfast was over.
Service from Hong Kong to JFK was poor. There...

标题: Cathy Pacific Worked Wonders Despite the Weather Challenges at Toronto (YYZ) on 15/16 January 218!!
内容: My wife and I have been flying Cathay Pacific for more than two decades - to say that they provide a great and consistent level of service would be an understatement! We are especially fans of the new fleet of the Boeing 777 aircraft - they are quite, afford plenty of room and are quite comfortable. Despite there being a...

One of my favourite airlines.
leaving from the new terminal 4 made this flight more enjoyable, so easy to get through the airport to the lounge which is also fantastic.
As usual, the staff made me feel welcome on board and look after me well due to my One World Emerald stautus.
The new A35 aircraft is exceptional, lot's more...

Business class to Hong Kong and I slept for 9 hours. What more can I say ?
Staff very good. Could not do enough for me.
Wine selection good. Cheese selection perfect.
A/V and seat perfect.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
THIS is the best airline to travel with...in my humble opinion.

Even if the seat was economy, the seat was not that narrow .and all part of the experience(like service,meal,...) in flight was normal.
i recommend flying with Cathay pacific to travel to HongKong.

标题: Premium Economy the way to go
内容: We were lucky enough to be upgraded to Premium Economy on our flight home from Hong Kong. The seats were so much better than those in Economy--way more leg room, a foot rest that swivels up, and just 2 instead of 3 in a row. Being so much roomier, the screen was much further away than in Economy, meaning that...

I had fond memories of a Cathay Pacific flight from Hong Kong to Tokyo on business on the deck of one of the last 747s. Today's 777 was more standard for obvious reasons on economy but the service remains good. I also appreciated landing on time and the ability to print out my boarding pass at home and go directly...

I flew to Manila via Hong Kong and return. Meals were very good and the associated service was exemplary My only comment would be that when using the auto check in at Gatwick you don't get a luggage receipt and it doesn't tell you that you will get it when you drop your luggage off at auto drop off. Apart...

标题: Always My First Choice - 是我的第一x
内容:
I travel in quite high frequency. Accessibility to all destinations, lounge quality, flight service, in flight food & seat comfort and leg space are things most important to me. Cathay Pacific are really my number one. It always satisfied me.
我相常旅行，所以到各地的航、Fe室的品|、wC上的服铡wC上的餐c、位子的舒m度和_部空gξ叶际亲钪匾的，泰是我的第一x瘢因楦鞣矫娑甲我很M意。
The seats were extremely uncomfortable but service was good and food nice. Flight delayed and very noisy plane. Overall wouldn’t fly them again.

Flew Manchester to Heathrow then onward to Perth via Hong Kong and return . Business class service lived up to my expectations. The business class lounges food and drinks were amazing and offered free shower facilities to freshen up. The only exception to this was the arrivals lounge in HK which I found to be tired and tatty ... badly...

Good service and comfortable seats. Had luxury of being in front row with no seats in front of us in economy - bit of extra leg room and easier to get up and down. Transfers were smooth and ground staff in HK and Hanoi (return journey) efficient. Cathay needs to tell passengers in advance not to buy duty free in...

标题: Nice flight from Adelaide to HongKong
内容: Decided to fly from Adelaide to HongKong as we were going to Israel. The flight was very good the staff were ok. I have noticed that the food should have been better. I am vegetarian and the choice of foods could be better and nicer. I would like to be part of their people that actually pick veggie meals. Apart...

标题: Comfortable flight with pleasant crew but could have been better
内容: It was an Ok but short experience with Cathay Pacific flight but could have been better especially when you are travelling with kids in terms of kids meal could have been arranged looking at the flight timings and duration
Excellent service and rated high. Good seating and food. Row 3 at the bulkhead good as plenty of room
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Auckland - Ho Chi Minh City

内容:
Flew to Philippines from New Zealand and there was a stop over in Hong Kong. The long haul flight from Hong Kong to Auckland was decent. The seats are slightly small but you don't really feel it until you try to sleep.
The food was alright. You generally had a choice between two options. Meals also came with ice cream...

Would recommend Air Canada over Cathay Pacific. Food, seats, entertainment system are just ok - nothing special. The service by staff is less frequent. You are served two meals and odd hours and there is no meal/drink service for two separate 5 hour periods.

标题: First time in business class on long haul flight
内容: This was my first business class long haul flight and I was not disappointed. The check in was smooth, went to the lounge to grab a coffee and wait for the boarding (our flight was delayed) The seats on the flight enabled you to lie flat, I managed to sleep most of this flight which was needed as we had...
Every year we always flying to Hongkong using Cathay Pacific since we only have 2 direct flight from Jakarta. We always choose to use Cathay Pacific since they are always on time and the hospitality.

标题: Overall ok flight from JFK to Jakarta
内容: Had a problem at the check in as I have read at the website that baggage limit was 3kg. Apparently it was 23kg. I argued that the website did not mentioned it and the Check in person lady revert to a different link at the website. Had argued back and forth and she at least acknowledge that the website was...

标题: Ok flight from Jakarta to JFK on Premium Economy
内容: Overall the flight was average for a Premium Economy. Expectation was higher. Flight was full. Seat comfort could be better. Check in process in Jakarta was smooth. Cabin service was fine.

标题: shambolic, treated like second class citizens!
内容: We flew from Heathrow to Hong Kong , without an issue . Checking in on line 48hrs prior to flight has never been an issue before . However this time proved a huge problem and we will never fly with Cathay Pacific again! We checked in on line as soon as it opened . We were given sat apart from...

On the 3rd and 4th of December 217 I had the pleasure of flying with Cathay Pacific for the very first time. I flew from Bangkok Via Hong Kong to Christchurch New Zealand. Traveling Premium Economy I was most impressed with layout of seating in our cabin, very comfortable seating arrangement with plenty of room. Aircraft were young and well...

I’d never flown to Hong Kong before but had been on a flight of similar duration once before. I was a little apprehensive about the length - particularly as i had an onward journey to Melbourne, but i needn’t have worried.
The flight was smooth and service on board was regular and frequent. Entertainment was excellent and I loved the...

Very nice layout of the seats, comfortable, they even got the plug ins so you can watch your own movies, usb and video in.
The food was excellent, service a little bit slow but very friendly - however the flight was full as usual.
Take a pullover with you - it was very cold during the flight. Try to get...

A guy named arron in ground staff check in area, he is unpolite and really unhelpfull as i asked when the check in counter open and he said 7 and i said i need help to locked my baggage (since the TSA lock was unlocked by TSA staff at the airport which caused my bag to be opened by just...
The online check-in is very user-friendly. Love the in-flight entertainment and the Haagen-Dazs ice-cream dessert. Other than that, not much different from other airlines.
The flight is alright. Not bad, but not very wonderful either. There are other airlines that are better nowadays.

The aircraft we flew on was old and dirty. The seat I sat in had a dodgy headphone connection so I couldn’t listen to anything for the entire 9 hour flight. The aircrew were friendly and helpful and tried resetting the entertainment system several times before accepting it couldn’t be fixed. Because it was a full flight I could not...

We flew in an A35 from Hong Kong to Melbourne in January. The aircraft appeared new and in excellent condition. The staff were attentive and pleasant. The food was surprisingly good for airline food.
The only downside was that the Premium Economy section did not have its own loo or crew.
Can recommend...

Nothing exceptional - Average service. Usual uncomfortable seats. Did give me the side and window seats seats as requested. Polite staff. Nothing outstanding to talk about. As expected most messengers were Cantonese/Chinese and conversation was impossible
Perhaps this airline caters most to the oriental population. and I felt some of a misfit from canada.

I had a wonderful experience with Cathay Pacific! The staff were all very friendly, personable, and helpful. The meals on the plane were also great and exceeded my expectations. They also served extra snacks and refreshments throughout the flight, which was a nice touch on such a long flight. In addition, I had an issue where I missed my flight...

I will def book flight in the future w Cathay. The staff is great. Seats and entertainment are good. I'm a vegetarian and they offer 8 different kinds of vegetarian/vegan styles.
Unfortunately there was a medical emergency on our flight and as we were flying over Greenland we turned around and landed in Toronto. Cathay had to put us all...

Myself and my wife could not get seat together online check in,I have requested on Hong Kong airport check in counter to put us together I was shocked the agent reply, “when you book next time pay higher price to get better seat”.
We have travelled separately sitting different seats where is the courtesy word from the agent- Yes lady...

We've flown across the Pacific and Atlantic many times, and this trip with Cathay reinforced our experience that non-USA carriers are much better. This is the first time I've not needed my own inflatable seat cushion, or felt "scrunched" by a narrow seat with little leg room. Food was better than the typical slop of American carriers, and the back-of-seat...

This airline is working hard to provide good service at a reasonable price. I found Cathay Pacific to have above average legroom and the flight attendants were exceptional. I would definitely book this airline in the future.

We liked the ease at check ins with Cathay Pacific - despite all of our flights being full, check in happened quickly. The food was good, the staff mostly incredibly helpful and there was a good selection for onboard entertainment for my 6 year old which makes me happy.

The only thing I found disappointing was the Business Lounge. The food was average, the service was less than average and the lounge was somewhat outdated.
The flight itself was wonderful. The overall condition of my seating was good and the area was clean. The food was excellent, as was the service.

In my experience, this premium economy option was well worth the extra money. I am very tall and these long flights are simply not comfortable in coach with the changes made in airline seating. I found the service very good, as was the food. Nice job, Cathay Pacific.

No problems with the flight from Sydney to Hong Kong. All aspects of the product was good. The flight from Hong Kong to Vienna was pleasant and relatively comfortable. Entertainment system was functional and the food was good. They were good to fly with. I do not have a problem flying with them again. They have a very good network...

标题: Too long. Too crowded. Flu delivery-in-a-tube
内容: It is NOT the airline's fault that the flight is too long but it is their fault that it was delayed two hours (why? Because we flew from HK to Bangkok a week later and it, too, was delayed two hours). I got aboard healthy and landed sick. Spent a week in a HK hotel room with the flu. That...

I booked 4 economy seats to Sri Lanka via Hong Kong with a stopover in Hong Kong on the forward journey. My first issue was that they charged my credit card and also blocked the same amount on my card which was hugely inconvenient. After complaining to the travel agent eventually I figured out she was chatting to Jenny Liao...
On-time departure and arrivals, courteous, clean, good food, and overall good service. I have flown with this airline a few times and have not been disappointed.

I loved to travel with Cathay Pacific!
Everything was perfect. Attendants, seat, lounge, baggage service and food.
I recommend it!

Flight was delayed by 2 minutes which was communicated via SMS 4 hours before. Since I had no connecting flight, this did not represent an issue to me.
Service was standard and solid. The only downside was that Cathay operated an aircraft with the old regional business class configuration which is not as comfortable as the newer version.

I've flown with Cathay Pacific twice now and both times have been smooth sailing from airport to airport. No problems at check-in desks and never had problems with lost or damaged luggage. The stewardesses are always nice and helpful, flights usually leave on time, which is very important when you have two other connecting flights. There may have been one...

I flew Premier Economy from Heathrow to Hong Kong ...absolutely splendid..great staff..food ..comfort ...timing
So looked forward to ongoing flight with them to Auckland 4 days later
What a disappointment....I was upgraded at check in with assisted passage ,so was so excited at upgrade
Sad to say ...I was so so left feeling they had just had a free awkward...

Seating was comfy. There was enough legroom and the body can still lean too. The in-flight entertainment was very updating, lots of new movie collections. Unfortunately not so with their music collection. The meal was pretty good, yep you know. But they still served wine even though that was a flight under 5 hours.
The cabin crew looks friendly and...

Sadly enough check in was all about doing it yourself. hate this. It is much nicer to have personal contact with airline staff. Only business class passengers were allowed to check in at the desk. This should be forbidden. It is not passenger friendly at all.
Good flight , nice staff and little snacks in between meals.
Entertainment on board...

This was the flight we wanted!! Going down under!!
For the rewr regular flight, foos was ok. Entertainment was more than ok.
And arriving on time.
Was a little chilly in the flight, but i received an extra blanket.

We flow to Sydney with a stopover at HKG.
Food again was "om te huilen" (not good).
But there was an entertainment system on board, because this aircraft belongs to Cathay Pacific.
When landed, because it was an connecting flight, needed to go in a bus ro the terminal, not real cool and little stressfull.
But at the terminal staff...

28th of decembre we flow to HKG. Regular night flight.
Perfect no strange thinks. We where able to get some extra drinks and the left some extra cookies and peanuts in the galie.
Oy think was the diner. Only fish left.
But if everbody takes chicken instead of fish i can imagine.

11 and half hour flight was very cramped really but it was economy. We was given a menu with a choice of food which was alright they was a bit tight on the drinks i was only drinking diet coke i was not even given the full can she poured half in a glass and kept the rest.. Then later...

The business lounges at both Melbourne and Hong Kong were lacking good facilities . The service on the plane were fined disappointing on the return flight Hong Kong to Melbourne, We plane was delayed 45 minutes before takeoff in Melbourne.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Melbourne - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: I have flown Cathay Pacific in the past and loved it. Unfortunately seats were incredibly small and the level of customer service was incredibly poor. Such a disappointment.

标题: Hong Kong to Singapore: Reminding me of how flying Cathay Pacific is always a joy
内容:
Hong Kong to Singapore is a very short flight (for seasoned travelers), and Cathay Pacific's standards, from the cabin design, to the seat comfort and space and material, to the leg space, to the food in economy class, is as enjoyable as ever.
It may be a short flight, but the only meal served is filling and delicious. A tantalising...

Used to like CX but their food is getting bad, service is becoming just like others. Nothing spectacular. Toilet cleanliness is getting worse, either due to lower frequency of cleaning or less diligent. They used to have nice food during snack time, now it is just biscuits and dry fruit. movie selection is mediocre. For a higher than average price,...

标题: One of the best airlines in the world
内容: Have travelled many times with Cathay from London to Hong Kong and/or Manila and have always been very happy with their service. Travelled to MNL just after Boxing day with my family, including both my young sons (4 and 2), we were given prority boarding even before 1st & business class travellers - this helped us to sort ourselves out...

I booked with Cathay Pacific a round trip Manchester-London-Hong Kong-Bangkok-Hong Kong-Manchester because it was a good price 4 of the 5 flights were late. The first leg was with their partner British Airways and was better than I expected -- half empty plane, very comfortable seats and excellent coffee (although I had to pay for it). The only snag was...

Yet again, the flight was delayed. The 5th flight on this airline and they have all been delayed. The ground staff were pushy, trying to corral us all in line, almost acting as if the late departure was in some way our fault. We were happy to board in line at the end of the queue, and once in the...

This was my first time flying with this airline. I can tell you that my experience was amazing. The flight crew were so professional, accommodating, funny and helpful in this very long flight.
I eat a gluten free vegan diet and the food I was served was superb.
Next time I travel to Australia I will be taking this airline...

The best part of the flight was the staff, who were very polite and accommodating. The cabins were nice and clean, though spaces between sits were very tight. The food was reasonably good and flavoursome. Unfortunately, there were delays to our flights from Melbourne to Hong Kong and from Hong Kong to Male.

I have been flying Cathay Pacific for the 6 years and unfortunately will probably look for another airline. This recent flight I flew premium economy ( at considerable expense ) and would honestly say it’s not much difference than their economy section with the difference that your seat reclines an extra 8 inches, that’s it. The service was mediocre, the...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: One of the best Asian airlines!
内容: I have gone to Italy a number of times and have tried many air companies. I can say that Cathay Pacific is one of the best -- if not THE best -- among the Asian airlines that fly to Europe. It may cost you a bit more compared to other airlines, but paying more for this airline is worth it!...

Decided to take a long 15 hour direct flight. On time. Efficient. Friendly attentive staff. Accommodating to change my meal time so I could sleep when I wanted to. Very friendly and respectful stewardess. Comfortable sleeping arrangement. Will do this flight again without hesitation.

I have had some bad experience with Cathay Pacific, but the last leg from Hong Kong to Brisbane was really good. Service was good, we had plenty of water given to us for the flight, and the seat control panel was operational. The food was really tasty for in-flight food, and they offered WIFI for a small charge.
Overall, it...

标题: Faultless in every way (still the "best airline").
内容: This was a planned trip to Europe (into Paris, out from Barcelona) and as past well-travelled passenger wanted to ensure we arrived in Paris "awake, alive and ready to tour" and hoping no jet-lag (had none). Took business class as long trip x Sydney, a Hong Kong 4+ hour lay-over, then 14 hours to Paris and my age (am now...

标题: Cathay pacific - still a class apart
内容: This was the CP flight that goes via Taipei and the only irritant was that had to leave the plane at the stop over. CO lounges in HK are some of the very best in the world and the food is excellent. On the plane service is good, food excellent and its a good experience. The seats though need upgrading,...

Comfortable seats that converted to a decent flat bed. Personal welcome on board and excellent service. Transit lounge in Hong Kong was new and very good with a reasonable selection of snacks and a nice shower area.
Overall a very pleasant experience.

It was a first time visit to hongkong i choose this flight because its a native flight company of hongkong. it was amazing people and staff in flight they are supportive and they always try to give a best flight satisfaction and tour. i suggest it to you all. if you travelling from Delhi to honkong.

标题: Flights to and from North Asia, Cathay is the best.
内容: Cathay's business class is at the opposite end of the scale from BA, especially on the newer A35s it is everything that BA is not. The seats are wide and comfortable, they make into a proper length bed and you don't have to climb over anyone to get in and out. Nor of course do they have the ridiculous situation...

As a Cathay Pacific Airways passenger I arrived at the No.1 Lounge (Cathay Lounge at Gatwick) to queues of angry passengers and the unfriendly staff not letting them in as they said it was full. The tables and chairs were dirty as were the toilets. The cleaner tables were reserved but stayed vacant and there was plenty of free seating,...

Wasn’t impressed by this airline, or its customers. I had very little room on an 11 hour flight, and couldn’t even put my hand luggage in an overhead locker as they were full. I had to put it under the seat in front, so felt squashed in. Partly linked to this, the lady in front of me continuously was moving...

标题: Leg Room non existent. Dismissed by the Cabin Crew
内容: The passenger in front of me reclined their seat, He had issues so called upon the cabin crew for help. After banging his chair a number of times he managed to get his seat to recline but had to brace his leg with the seat in front to maintain it in the reclined position. When he did this his seat...

标题: First Class - not the 1st class service
内容: Bad experience towards food service, traveled a few times on 1st Class to Europe and USA & this is the worst experience. I only had some snacks during the flight, then when I asked for a normal meal ( the one that I like to have ) and been told all sold out, only left those no one actually want...
标签: International' 'First Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Flight was on time and the service was not bad，flight meal was quite nice especially the breakfast!!

Excellent service! When we checked in online, there were no 2 seats together on the HK - Melbourne leg. Friendly ground staff at Delhi sent a message to HK ground staff to request reallocation of seats, or an upgrade at cost to the extra leg-length seats. When we arrived in HK, seat allocation hadn't been done, but under request from...

标题: Great Service Cathay BUT the Lounge at Gatwick South - Terrible!!!!
内容: You can't beat the staff or Service on a CX flight. Check in staff fabulous too! A decline in the standard of food recently which is disappointing. Lounges are great especially in HK. Gatwick though...oh dear! CX please please.....no more, let us use the BA Lounge! The no 1 lounge at Gatwick is terrible. Joined a very long queue to...

标题: A good but not great airline -Economy meals ok but not outstanding
内容: Check in very good and easy , baggage reclaim also good very little waiting . Seats and cabin clean with cushion and blanket on each seat . Meals not great and a distinct lack of hostesses coming round with drinks and snacks . But all in all no grumbles of any worth .

Flying out from Manchester via Hong Kong was ok but the return journey was terrible. From Brisbane to Hong Kong the food I wanted had run out and the alternative was something I could not eat. Nothing else was offered. The next leg was a night flight. There was little leg room,the cabin was freezing and the staff non existent....

Great staff, great comfort and quite reasonable food. You can't fault the service in business class, the beds are flat and so comfortable.
Airplane was smooth and you felt really safe, all staff well trained and professional.

Ok normally fly economy. Fly a lot. Platinum card frequent flyer -blah blah blah. Arrived on time for this flight as directed by the lounge staff. On board the staff really could not care, so apathetic, so cold, so unwelcoming. What can I say Cathay Pacific, shocking. No where to put my carry on, no welcome drink, no Hello Sir,...

On the 12 hour flight from Johannesburg to Hong Kong on 1 January, this was a highly pleasant flying experience barring one surly relief crew member who let the Cathay Pacific team down.
