This would have been a 5 star review but loses one point based on the strange behavior that in this lengthy flight, only Asian passengers were offered...

I had a choice of airline including our national carrier and chose Cathay Pacific. We flew them Heathrow to Hong Kong, HK to Ho Chi Minh, then Hanoi to HK ( Cathay Dragon ) , then HK to LHR - a lot of flying.
I hadn't flown Cathay before and what a difference! The plane was comfortable, all the food...

标题: Comfortable seats, okay food, appalling hygiene.
内容: We flew premium economy on Cathay's CX118 flight from Auckland to Hong Kong on January 14th. While the seats were comfortable with great leg room, we found the the food was just regular uninspiring airplane food which we weren't too bothered about. However, the toilets were disgusting. They had very obviously not been cleaned for some time - this was...

We flew CPA from Auckland NZ to Hong Kong in mid-December 217. The Airbus 34 was pleasant and clean, and the seats were comfortable. The food served was good. The cabin crew were excellent. They seemed to have a passion for handing out bottles of water to help the passengers keep hydrated, which was much appreciated.
What did peeve me,...

There is nothing particularly welcoming about this airline. The crew almost run everywhere, there are no pleasantries apart from a brusque welcome. The food and beverages are almost thrown at you as they rush down the aisle ... apparently they have somewhere else to go. The entertainment is fairly average ... I was struggling to find anything to watch on...

As a frequent traveller to Hong Kong I usually fly Premium Economy. This time around there were no PE seats available so was able to book an economy seat exit row . Seat 59C left hand side of plane
Paid for exit row which was worth it for leg room. Cost an extra $2 which is OK.
CX11 is a...

Actually this was two flights... we had a connection in Hong Kong. Both flights were good. The entertainment system had enough movies to keep you occupied for the entire 16 hours home. Seats were better than United. Food was airline food so meh for the food. Overall, I would fly them again.

I have been loyal to Cathay Pacific (CX) since 3 years ago and been traveling with CX for several hundreds of times in the last 1 years. I have been a Macro Polo Gold member for years. In spite of becoming green since after less biz trips, I always recommend and book CX routes for our customers. I've received many...
Service is nice & food is nice but airline need improved facilities of aircraft...charging point not working properly....
标签: Ho Chi Minh City - San Francisco

内容: It was my first time travelling on Cathay Pacific and I must say, I thoroughly enjoyed my flight on its A33 through the new Changi Airport Terminal 4. It was a smooth and automated check-in experience from kerbside to gate. I was particularly impressed with the aircraft interior and in-flight entertainment. The aircraft interior was clean and tidy. Its in-flight...

I booked my flights thru Fly.com a booking site for this airline. The date I was suppose to fly, the airline cancelled the flight 15 minutes before boarding. We got rescheduled for the next day and flight was delay by 5 hours. The cabin crew was extremely gracious. However, when I called the airline and Fly.com the next day for...

Flight was delayed departing HKG - this seems to be an issue with all flights (at least on Cathay) from HKG. Managed to arrive only 1 minutes late due to very fast flying time. Major problem is the replacement of the aircraft on this route. In the past was a 747 with international seating whereas now a B777 with domestic...

Was transferred onto this flight from a flight cancelled by Qantas, so thank you Cathay for helping at short notice. As J class passenger you have access to Qantas First Class lounge which was excellent. Boarding was delayed as was departure, but a short flying time allowed an ahead of time arrival. Seats fine on B777 used on this flight...

标题: Great Flight but MAN Lounge is Poor
内容: Cathay has got Business Class down pat and knows how to provide good service but their MAN lounge admittedly not their own is very poor. It was full of non Cathay guests, poorly attended, low quality facilities and services. Once on board normal quality service begun. Great flight and food and landed on time in HKG.

标题: Premium Economy - good going to UK - not much service USA - Aust
内容: Good flight with plenty of legroom. Service good and menu ok. The downside was the flight we went on had an 8 hour wait in Hong Kong and we were advised not to leave the airport in case we were delayed in traffic on returning to the terminal

标题: Pleasant enough and not among the top
内容: Generally the flight and service was fine. The air stewardess servicing was pleasant but not overly friendly and approachable. In recent years, CP has gone from a rather desirable airline to just average typically in meals and this flight has not changed my review. I travelled with CP really because its flying direct from London to Hong Kong. Pleasant enough...

标题: Off lately a reduction in the service standards
内容: I am loyal to Cathay Pacific and being a marco polo member its always in my consideration list for any route. The flight is excellent in terms of schedule , no second thought. However I feel for long haul flights, the service quality and standards are not great enough for the price paid. The night snack bar runs out of...

Having travelled Premium Economy on a Qantas service to the United States two years ago, we were keen to try what Cathay Pacific had to offer. (Cathay is the only way to go Premium Economy from Australia to London with a Qantas affiliate airline).
Unfortunately there is no comparison. The Cathay service is far inferior to Qantas.
The only discernible...

标题: Best first class we have experienced
内容:
We received a warm welcome and great service throughout the trip. The hostesses were extremely attentive and thoughtful and made us very comfortable. Meals were excellent. Could
Not fault this trip in any way.

I’ve flown with Cathay once before but honestly don’t remember them being this good!
An economy flight isn’t meant to be that comfortable, but I found that Cathay at least appears to have quite a bit more leg room than my last few “hosts” being Qantas and Air NZ all three on long haul routes.
The inflight entertainment system works...

I had a good flight. The A33 was an early model, which did not gave as much room leg as the later model. Catering and inflight entertainment system was also very good. Cabin crew were very attentive to pax. I would recommend them.

This was a short notice booking (48 hrs before the trip). The price were very good (22 HKD) for a return flight the same day. Inflight service was very good. Entertainment system was very good, so was the catering.

Although our take off was delayed due to ice on wings for 2 hours the flight was excellent plenty of leg room comfy seats very good service . Upon landing in Hong Kong we had missed our connecting flight to Kuala Lumpur but we need not ha e worried our selves to much as we disembarked desks were set up...
Cathay has one of the best service records among all airlines, plus its safety record, good food, extensive routes, it is one of the main airlines I consider when booking flights.

标题: Potential for disaster but because of Cathay Pacific, ok
内容: This flight leaves at 1:am and after connecting from flight from Charolette all seemed a go for a long flight. We were informed at 11:3 pm that the flight would be delayed until the following evening. Cathay Pacific got us our luggage back and bussed us to a hotel giving us also 3 meal vouchers. Since the flight was not...

Great service great crew very comfortable excellent food and ? the seats are new and you can sleep nicely even the toilets are big lighted and even have a window, the crew will offer again and again drinks dessert wine ice cream chocolates and of course the service level is an absolutely very high

We flew from Hong Kong via Düsseldorf to Oslo. This route was very good, nice new aircraft, good food and excellent service from the crew. Arriving at Düsseldorf airport is a pleasure, our connecting flight was a couple of gates down in the same terminal. The flight is during the night, which makes it easier to sleep and then arrive...

We travelled Premium Economy and it was well worth it. Check in was quicker in a preferred line and so was boarding on to the plane. The service was good from the cabin crew. The bes thing was the extra space to stretch your legs. We will always fly with Cathay Premium economy if possible. The food was good

I booked and paid for 2 flights almost one year ago under the same booking reference. I checked in online 48hrs before this leg of the flight and found that not only had we not been seated together but there were no seats available to change my allocation. The lady at airport check in seemed not to care but gave...

We travelled Business Class from Hong Kong to Sydney on a Cathay Pacific Boeing 777 on a day flight. The configuration of this plane is excellent with 2 large toilets at the front of the cabin which were kept spotlessly clean. The cabin crew were superb, hard working, well trained and focussed on great service, some of the best we...

I travel with Cathay Pacific often and it is quite sad to watch its decline. Food is not good, sometimes it's even disgusting. The interior of planes looks old and outdated, usually no wifi service on a long haul flights, old entertainment system, a part of the movies is old. Never take the window exit row seat - it is...

We flew from Melbourne to Hong Kong and then from Hong Kong to New York City four days later. Flight crew were very nice, we were comfortable in the exit row seats (extra cost, well worth every cent), food was good and inflight entertainment kept us occupied. Overall, we had a very good experience.

We got free upgrade flight to Business class for earlier flight . Thank the staff to help fix
the inconvenience. the plane flew from HKG to BKK ,there is not enough toilet .for 2blogs of seat s economical class only 1room at the corners that. is 4.

Convenience , on time, leg space ok, good food,although there was only 6min to connect flight , the luggaes went through the final destination. Excellent services.
If you connect. Flight BKK-HKG-KHH ,you should have not less than 2 hours . Because of crowded security control and the different buildings to get at the gate by shuttles bus.

flying with this airline was good experience,plane was modern .Leg room with this airline is most I have flown with so great because I am very tall and most airlines my legs are hard up against the seats.Movies had good mixture of recently released with old classic and the food was like any other airline.Nothing negative about flying with them.

标题: This an airline that anyone should fly to the far east.
内容: The economy class is as good as it gets. Food is good. Entertainment/movies are in plentitude. Flight crew always friendly and helpful.

To be honest, the seats are roomy, the food is ok but the gate service is dreadful. Also we weren’t allowed to select a seat meaning that for 16 hours, my wife and I were at opposite ends of the plane. Felt like I was in Cargo not economy.

I flew to Auckland Via Hong Kong. The flight crew were very attentive and always polite and happy, no mean feat on two 11 hour flights.
The food was acceptable, better than many airlines that I have used. There was an option to get cups of noodles outside of the normal meal times, for anyone who needs food to take...

We flew through cathay pacific for the first time from Mumbai-HKG (CX66) and then back from HKG- Mumbai (CX663) and had a very contrasting experience. CX 66 had the worst food ever. The flight was at 1:25 am and got delayed to 2:3 am and on board they didn't serve food until like 4:3 am by waking us up in...

We flew to Bangkok via Cathay Pacific, stopover in Hong Kong.
Flight was very comfortable. Quite spacious considering Economic class. Solid service, meals cater both for local cuisine and a more western theme. Can happily recommend

We were not sure how we would manage given the almost 17 hour flight but we were delighted by the service, comfort and care provided by Cathay. Staff were friendly and helpful, the seats were much better than what we have grown used to on domestic flights and best of all, there was lots of legroom. What a difference from...

The service was excellent. They are very helpful to me and my 2 small kids. The flight attendants never left and even entertained my children when I had to use the rest room. Food during short flights like ours need improvement though. Not palatable and not suitable for kids. Good in-flight entertainment, event kids had plenty of selections. Still one...

Even though I travel a lot I'm petrified of flying . I felt at ease during the flight even with a lot of turbulence . The landings ( and take-off's ) were what really showed me their professionalism . Hats off to the pilots . The staff were also so polite and professional . Overall it was one of my...

Need to improve of chair the chair is not feel comfortable I can’t sleep which terrible. In check in we ask if can upgrade the business class because too many people on economy class but she said no they don’t want get the money only points which stupid

First time flying Cathay to other country beside Hong Kong. We needed to transit via Hong Kong to Osaka. Transit time was not too long. However, the gate was super fast. We needed to walk a long way to the gate for the transit. Coming back was more rush as we needed to clear the custom again and the gate...

标题: Enjoyable experience on the new Airbus A35
内容:
First time on the new Airbus A35 and was pleasantly surprised by quiet the engines are, this resulted in a more relaxed flight. As a result fell asleep a few times.
Cutlery was plastic, should be metal like Emirates.
Watching movies on the huge screens were brilliant, superb choice of films and games to pass the long flight.
I would...

标题: Long anticipated flight, but average at best
内容: I have long wanted to use Cathay Pacific because the reviews over the years have always been top class and people I know have raved about them being a cut above other flight providers. Our usual route to Europe from Australia is usually via Singapore so it was with some anticipation we looked forward to our Cathay Pacific flight to...

Staff that show they really care about their customers. Ticket agents and aircrew alike all know and appreciate who is buttering their bread.
My only complaint about the airline was the hard, poorly cushioned seat. I'm just 15 lbs but still found the seat uncomfortable, especially for such a long flight.

The plane from Zurich to Hong Kong (CX382) took off 45 min later that scheduled. However, it arrived on time. Many places were empty, good choice of recent movies, thin flight journal compared to other flight entertainment magazines, different newspapers for your convenience. The only thing I did not like is the breakfast choice on the first flight and dinner...

Overall, the flight was good and on time, but there are a few things that surprised me (maybe we got spoiled by other airlines)
- the seats were dirty
- the tables had food leftovers from previous passangers
- the pillows were used by other people before (you could find hair), but the blankets were provided in packaged PVC bags...
Spacious, great entertainment on each screen, tasty food and over comfortable with helpful staff. A very pleasant flight indeed!

Although it was only a 2 Hour 4 minute flight we were impressed by the service from boarding onwards. The crew referred to us by name, food and drinks served were also outstanding! Next trip from London to Hong Kong will be with Cathay Pacific.

标题: Nice flight but ran out of stuff
内容: Nice flight plenty of leg room service good but they ran out of beer, nice to have a couple of beers when travelling over 11 hours I had one and was told they had run out also the western breakfast had run out so fish or rolls with jam, Cathay pacific nice airline but need to stock up for long...

标题: Choked sinks in all toilets on a brand new plane A35
内容: Throughout the 11 hour flight from Tel Aviv to Hong Kong on a brand new plane, the A35, all the sinks in the economy cabin toilets were choked within 3 hours into the flight time. And the toilet floor were really wet and dirty. The crew did not bother to replenish the toilet paper nor to clean up the mess....

On our return flight from Manchester to Hong Kong, we were expecting an improvement on the previous service. Unfortunately, Cathay Pacific has not add rested to issue of dehydration. Most good airways do a regular round with water. On this occasion, the call button was operating and we decided to ask for some water. The cabin staff were again conspicuous...

标题: Cathay's Premium Economy seat and service needs major improvements!
内容:
We had a family holiday to New Zealand recently and our party of 12 decided to take Cathay Pacific Premium Economy. The flight from HK to Auckland was around 1.5 hours and our experience with Premium Economy is as follows:
SEATS
Yes, the seats have a foot rest and have more recline compared to regular economy class. My husband will...

标题: Good flight, but room for improvement
内容: Overall, the flight was good, but in comparison to top airlines, there are a few imperfections. First, the little bag with the toiletries is not placed on the seats before take-off, but is distributed about 3-4 minutes after take-off. This seems to be somewhat inefficient, as many business class passengers take off their shoes and look for the socks among...
Love traveling with Cathay. Their service is exceptional, and always feel welcome when I board the plane. They have been refreshing a number of their planes to increase comfort and convenience.

As I live and work in Hong Kong, I only fly with Cathay Pacific or Cathay Dragon and mostly for business rather than leisure. I recently flew to Singapore on Cathay Pacific and it amazes me how efficient the service is from using the mobile phone app to pre-book the flight and reserve a seat, to the friendliness of the...

We were rebooked to Cathay Pacific due to a missed connection. Even though we were disgruntled due to the missed flight, we were surprised how comfortable the flight was and how efficiently the crew performed their tasks. Would definitely fly again

Where to start...
It was a 15 hour flight from Hong Kong to Boston. January 3. There was not an empty seat on the 777. Behind me were four people and three seats. The mom was sitting behind me with a year and a half hold on her lap. I was not able nor did I want to recline on...

Cathy is my first choice for flights in and out of Australia although this mean you must travel via Hong Kong. It is great out of Hong Kong for long haul into Europe or North America. Hong Kong airport is very efficient and not a problem to spend an hour or two for transfers. At worst on the way back...

Actually when I bought ticket just premium economy but 24 hour before fly i hot business class. Thank you so much Cathay ?
Very good services that I got from the air crew. Delicious food and various drink.

I just hate this airlines. 1. Made a big issue with our luggages that we are carrying too much so they cant take it (which was withing the limit). 2. Rude behaviou of groud staff at the hongkong airport. When I said I would complaint they did not bother at all. Finally after a great argument they somehow accepted our...

标题: Impressed with speed of cabin crew
内容:
Crew seemed to be always on the go and quick to respond to calls in a calm manner. We were very lucky To have smooth flight..the fresh baby orchid in vase gave a sense of being in hotel adding extra comfort.
Full marks in all categories

Business class seat, well worth the extra cost for a 16 hour flight. Excellent service, comfort and amenities. The business class seats and service were excellent. The longest flight I have ever taken as well as the most comfortable. Staff & crew were friendly and helpful, although we left a few minutes late, this did not change our arrival time....

标题: made an 11 l/2 hour flight painless as usual
内容: always treated especially well. wonderful service with great food and wines; comfortable sleeping accommodation; love this airline!

标题: OK but a long flight Hing Kong to Londan
内容: Could have been better but glad we had a spare seat next to us. Staff OK but food very average. Bit cramped.

Service, politeness, eagerness, pleasant personality on all crew members. Food and beverage service well above average for economy. Entertainment center is one of the best I've seen. Seat comfort and cleanliness, also above average.

i never have any problems with CX . regionally they are one of the best. unfortunately the IT platform is old school and constantly comes back with ' unable to proceed we are having technical difficulties". At a dinner recently one of the CX ground staff working in IT said "out IT platform is a Dinosaur"......sums it up perfectly

Cathay has always been one of my favourite. It's great to have both Asian and Western food choices. One of the reasons is because I don't need to collect our luggage when we stop over at HK & change flights. Normally, ANA or JAL would ask us to collect our luggage once at HND or NRT, which I hate, especially...

On time and high safety was the reason continue flying CX for years.
Food was fair, cabin services dropped
See no reason why CX sell higher market fare than local airlines, they should compare how the local airline like Eva airline is improving much inflight services and their flight safety standard level. The poor management decision downgraded the benefit used...

标题: The audio and video amenities were not working the entire 14 hour flight time.
内容: I am writing you to file my complaint regarding the above mentioned date and flight number. Please note, I decided to pay a premium to fly with Cathay Pacific because of their reputation as a 1st Class Airline providing extra amenities/service, enabling for a more pleasant overseas flight experience. Our 1st issue encountered was our flight leaving Vancouver was late,...

You think once bitten twice shy, ok last years was a fiasco with Cathay Pacific, this years, well we havent even travelled yet and already Cathay Pacific are their usual crap standard. Booked multi flight with BA, first flight is BA to Hong kong, from Hong Kong to Auckland Cathay pacific, still BA flight numbers, Auckland to Hong Kong also...

Just returned home having flown Business Class for the first time on 6 different flights. The problem now is that we will never want to fly Economy again. Everything from the food, service and comfort were first class and we were most impressed.

标题: food and beverage is better than American companys
内容: I was always told that Cathay Pacific was a top airlines. I think that they have slipped in as I noticed the planes were older and needed to be refurbished or changed. The service its efficiant but I also noticed that the crew was a little inexperienced and new. They did try hard but was lacking in friendliness and care....

we travel from surabaya to japan with business class, return.
the lounge during transit in hongkong is very comfortable, really like it, there is bathroom and very exclusive bathroom.
food during flight is great, fresh salmon, etc, our family really enjoy flight with cathay

标题: Good airline but still need improvements
内容: Was on Premium Economy seats. Wider seats and more legroom. Meal table folds out from the armrest at your side instead of fold down from the seat in front. Slighter wider touchscreen entertainment system. Given over the ears headphones instead of earphones. Meals portions are small and lack presentation. Food quality is average. Same food served as Economy class unlike...

标题: OK flight nothing to write home about
内容: Not the best airline we have flown with, the seats are not comfortable for a long haul flight, considering it was an overnight flight we were not given any extras in the blanket pack, not even any head phones were to be found. No tooth brush or tooth paste to freshen our oral hygiene up, nothing just a blanket. The...

标题: Just another Flight, but nothing to complain!
内容:
We boarded the flight at Kolkata, India and flew to Hongkong,
where there was more than 6 hours waiting before we boarded the flight
to San Francisco. The service including food and beverage in both the sectors was ordinary; seating comfort was good and cleanliness was good too. The checking in including the luggage booking & clearance at SF were...

Quite disappointed,
Service not as good and polite as before,
Maybe passengers are the one to blame,
Food quality bad,
Waiting for a long time for baggage,
Even economy class passengers got their luggages,
Will fly in other airlines if possible.

We lined up at the empty premium economy queue and there were 3 service reps that could help. One of the staff leaving the counter motioned us to go ahead to the counter. I looked at all 3 and went to the closest one. He (Vincent) was busy playing on his cell phone as we walked up to the counter...
We checked in online a day before. When we arrived the airport on the day, we just dropped off our luggage at the counter. No waiting at all. The flight was on schedule and very smooth landing.

First leg to Hong Kong was great. A35, quite new with good audiovisual system and good service. Enough leg room.
Next leg was in an older A33, video sys not as good. The rest, the same.

标题: Good flight, plenty of entertainment and nice food
内容: Flight was good overall 24 hours in total between the two planes. We stopped off in Hong Kong. The flight was pretty good, no turbulence which was a bonus. Plenty of food and drinks supplied. Plenty of entertainment on the plane too with films/programmes etc. You can check the website before your flight too so you what films etc will...

Took Cathay pacific business class 2 days ago, the cabin looks tired, last minute aircraft change , seat is not spacious at all, when come to the cabin service, I could not feel like a warm environment, food and beverage service is like hmm, basically crews are not serving with genuine care, for sleeping passengers, they just skip the service,...

This was our first time flying with Cathay Pacific in Business Class all the way from SUB to YYZ via HKG and return.
The regional sector from SUB to HKG, CX operated A 33-3 aircraft. The Business Class seats were similar as those found on the long haul flights. The only different was its size which was a bit smaller,...

very efficient flight staff seats were ok with adequate legroom considering you are flying economy the staff are on the go the whole flight you need anything they are there would definitely use this airline again.

标题: People on the same booking will given seats apart
内容: Cathay Pacific has an unbelievable policy of not allocating seats to a booking so every individual, including under age children will be given separate seats. No amount of complaining at the airport gave 4 people booked in the same booking seat together. Two children sat next to me with their mum and dad in different ends of the plane. Absolutely...

I was travelling with my 2.5 years son, and the seats were pre-booked, but at the last moment, aircraft were changed and hence seat of my son were placed on the same row but in the 4 center seat, away from us. So I requested to cabin crew / flight steward to bring him closer to us. but there was...

Being a frequent traveller I have never experienced such bad customer service. Due to a shoulder injury I enquired about the price of upgrading to business class to which the response was " it is not possible. You have to buy a new ticket and forfeit the current ticket". I think they don't care about their customers inspite of seeing...

Due to a shoulder injury I enquired about upgrading to business class at hong kong airport and asked the price of the same to which I got a response "it is not possible. You have to buy a new ticket and forfeit the current ticket". They don't care about their customers. I will never recommend or fly with them again....

Sitting at HongKong airport and asked the customer service how much it would cost to upgrade our flights to business class due to my wife’s shoulder injury. A straight up “this is not possible. You will have to buy a whole new ticket” was the response I got. With my wife in pain and ready to pay for an upgrade,...

The flight got delayed, connecting flight to vancover had left. We missed two flights to vancover. Stayed in hongkong airport for 5 hrs. When we landed in vancover we got the Alaskan cruise in time. As soon as we entered the gates of cruise ship the doors were closed.

标题: Overall good, but service was so so
内容: We were upgraded to Premium Economy seats, so got a very good flight with good movies, lovely spacious seats, yummy oriental meals and drinks... and some good sleep. The only thing I did not like was... when the airline staff served the refreshment meal and i asked for hot tea, he used his dirty fingers to take and touch the...

It's a 11-hour flight. Long but comfortable enough. I was luckily booked at a bulk head seat with more space. So, manage to enjoy an 8-hour sleep.
Always enjoy taking Cathay Pacific flights, ... with good services, lovely oriental food and drinks. Everything was good on this trip.

The boarding was smooth. When I got on the plane, I was amazed that the flight was not full. I could used the space next to me. It was smooth when the flight took off. The flight attendants were cheerful and helpful.
I chose seafood pasta as my dinner on the flight. The taste was alright. However, the portion was...

标题: Plane engine failure and chaos in transfer
内容: This is probably the worst experience ever when fly with Cathay. Has been a long term fan for the Cathay and tend to fly it when possible. But this trip is the probably the most disappointment for all. The plane engine fail and can not take off. Did not make the announce in timely manner and keep the passenger waiting....

Cathay Pacific is one of the world's best airlines. Period. From the incredible service to their clean, modern fleet of planes, Cathay Pacific is consistently excellent in all categories. We flew Premium Economy on this flight (and our onward flight to Manila) and it's well worth the extra dollars. Wider seats, better food selection and separate cabin make it a...

Flew Cathay Pacific business class from New York to Perth via Hong Kong - approimately 24 hours fyling time - the service we recieved from the moment we checked our baggage in to the time we collected it in Perth was excellent - the cabin crew could not have been more helpful and made every effort to make the flight...

I gave this airline 3 star as we had a reasonable flight from Frankfurt to Hong Kong and a good flight from Hong Kong to Melbourne, that cannot be said for the flights over. I have never been in such cramped conditions, seats are the smallest and uncomfortable. The staff were clearly not interested all they wanted was for everyone...

Yes, Business Class does make a huge difference on a 15+ hour flight. 15 hours to Hong Kong and then another 3 to Bangkok. Everything about the flight was professional and comfortable. The departure was on time. The food was very good, the flight attendants did everything to make the trip a pleasant experience without being intrusive. It helped tremendously...

标题: Great airline to fly to hong kong
内容:
This was a 16 hour flight to Hong Kong. Economy seats are very comfortable. Lots of leg room. Customer service is outstanding. They don't nickel and dime you for anything. Pillows blankets free entertainment. Two hot meals that were very good. Snacks the entire flight. The best was the hot noodle soup they served around the 1th hour.
Very well...

标题: So much better than China Air!
内容: In looking into flights to take to Asia, I wanted to find an airline better than China Air because past experiences with them was awful. I also didn't want to fly on Malaysia Airlines. I'd never flown Cathay Pacific before and I'm glad I chose them. Premium economy was very worth the extra money. I'm not sure I would've liked...

Our seats were at the Bulkhead, which meant there was a bit more room. However, this also meant it was a passageway for everyone to cut through to the other side and the toilet - which was right opposite our seats.
For the amount of money we spent on Premium Economy seats, the service was certainly NOT much better than...

This was the first time I have flown with Cathay Pacific and quite frankly I don’t think I will fly with any other airline again, they were that good! The planes we flew on (four in all) were all quite new so everything was in very good condition. The seats in economy were not only very comfortable but there was...

标题: A superior flight crew makes all the difference
内容: A long haul flight can be an arduous, punishing journey and ours was a real trial. My wife and I were visiting our son and his family who had emigrated the previous year to start a new life. We set off from London Heathrow and stopped off at Hong Kong for 5 hours before our onward connection to Brisbane. The...

标题: Premium Economy - not worth the expense
内容: Going from Hong Kong to Bangkok, we opted to take the Premium Economy. The food was terrible and really nothing different from the basic economy class. The seats were bigger but for such a short flight, it really was not worth the additional expense. Cathay Pacific has really gone out of its way to cut corners and you don't get...

If you have to be on a plane for 16 hours-front of the bus is pretty special. The service is terrific as is the food and beverages. Best are the size of the seats and their comfort. Hard to beat, thanks to American Airlines miles I was able to do it
标签: International' 'First Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Nice and Easy with Cathay Pacific
内容:
Very professional staff. Glad that there was not the usual constant stream of announcements you get on some airlines. Food very good.
toilets were cleaned a couple of times mid-flight (which was good given some of the passengers are not very clean!).
The iphone app needs some work and is not the best.
Very good service and friendly, no nonsense and not over-the-top staff. Lovely showers in one of their many lounges in Hong Kong.

We flew from Singapore to New York with Cathay Pacific, the service provided by the flight crew was great. They were attentive and friendly, serving food and drinks during the flight. In-flight entertainment was decent, with movies, games and shows available. Meal provided during the flight was quite delicious with enough options available that it was not the same meals...

Cathay Pacific standards have definitely dropped since we flew with then just over 2 and a half years ago. The gluten free option meal was very poor in quality and the standard meal was not as good. The service was a lot less intent than previous flights, these flights cost a lot of money and do not seem to offer...

After the hassles and the threats,and non compliance of IATA baggage rules by QANTAS on a similar route,the check in with an extra bag was easy.It was written and booked on the ticket and went through easy.
The only problem for the check in staff was they had to manually write out 9 coupons for the the other airlines,3 of...

It has been quite sometime since my last trip on Cathay Pacific.Now they charge a fee if you select seats during booking. You can change your seats during flight check-in but it is unlikely to have many available seats for a swop. Despite being a short haul flight, the choices on the entertainment system, especially the latest movies were limited....
The trip was nice, the service abroad was good too. Punctuality assured. We had no problems with the baggage handling.

The first thing that I noticed as I sat down was there was actually some room between my knees and the seat in front - a big advantage even over Cathay's own 777s. The second was that the safety card stated it was an Airbus A35-9 which meant nothing at the time. Third - the flat screen was bigger and...

Travelled from New York to Vancouver with Cathay just prior to the new year. The lounge in JFK airport was good. Food good, service good, amenities good. It’s the American Airlines flagship lounge. Boarding and staff on the plane was good. Food ok. Nothing compared to Qatar experience. We manage to get the forward business cabin which was quiet. Let...

Plane left on time. The plane was fitted with long haul Business seats so that was a bonus. Staff were excellent and looked after us very well. Food was to the standard expected and wine choices were good. As always Cathy offered an above expectation. My Qantas Platinum One Level was recognized as well. Good flight. Good airline
We flew to Hong Kong en route to Singapore. The service, the food and the comfort were not comparable to any other flight we have taken. The aircraft seemed brand new and immaculate.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: One of the best airlines around
内容: First time on Cathay Pacific but this will be my go to airline when traveling through Asia. Flew economy but was treated well. The food was very good. Decent leg room. Can't complain about anything.

标题: What has happened to Cathay Pacific
内容: Been a while since we used this airline but ended up as part of our trip to Australia for Xmas. Have to say it has gone back massively since we last used them when service/food/people were all great. I try to give positives on this site and avoid the negatives but our business class flight back was truly dreadful, tired...

标题: Snow Delay - Constant Changes - NO Communication
内容: I am booked on a flight scheduled to leave JFK at 9: on Jan 4. Clearly, the snow event became an issue. However, the airline just issued one new departure time after the next taking us into 22:3. Then, a further change - now to the next morning at 1:. Communications with waiting passengers was very poor and attendants provided...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: The flights with Cathay Pacific and their subsidiary Cathay Dragon (to/from Phuket) were excellent. Comfortable seats, good meals and great entertainment systems. The return flight to Vancouver was especially memorable as I had a chance to try a Chinese breakfast. The steward was a little leery about giving it to me, saying that it was more of an Asian preference...
We flew in a brand new plane with excellent service and very comfortable seats. More space and comfort than flying with a US carrier in a domestic route.

标题: One of the best business class
内容: I flew several times with this company and actually I can say the the level of their business class is really high. Comfort is excellent, you can have a small flat bed. Service and food is quite nice even though there always is room to improve. Just a note is on the business lounge in Bangkok airport which is really...
First time to take this flight from asia to spain with Cathy. The staff and the food and also the seatting is comfortable in this long time flight.

标题: Great first time and trouble free
内容:
Very good experience and no issues whatsoever. Staff were extremely efficient and pleasant. Leg room was not cramped and I would say entertainment is 3.5 out of 5. Movies and programs are Eng and Asian mix with which I am fine but pure English is ok but not great.
Meals were good but between meal snacks would also be 3.5...

Nice company to fly with. Very good onboard services. Good food. onboard entertainment could be improved. Nice option (i.e. economically) to fly to Australia, in comparison to Etihad or Emirates. If needed, will fly again with Cathay Pacific.

Dreadful flight...delayed 2 hours, freezing cold, inedible food served and hour and half into the flight, seats not working. Return flight not much better, food again dreadful and bus to the terminal.

Hey, you scamper like a squirrel', I told that young little girl who was serving me drinks and dinner aboard that flight. She quietly laughed and said 'this is the best I have been told'.
I love travelling with CP. Their lounges are nice, seats very comfortable to accommodate old bones and staff welcoming. always.

Lounge is very difficult to find. No map/signage was provided. While other airline lounges are clearly marked Cathy Pacific had no clear signage. Lounge has a distinct smell of rotting food. I couldn’t get service at the coffee bar. Too much confusion with people be served out of order. No seating available because patrons were all taking up two or...

We travelled with this airline for a lifetime trip from London to Newzealand, the flight was ok on the way to NZ via Hong Kong and I was looking forward to our flight home. We were slightly overweight with the baggage, however this was wavered on our way out as we did not have any hand luggage. On our way...

I've read many reviews prior to taking Cathay Pacific for the first time. I chose to fly in their Premium Economy product because I was flying long haul solo, and I didn't want to risk being encroached upon by a stranger for a day of my life. Yep, it's a long flight. The seats have a large armrest between them,...

We used Cathay Pacific to fly from HKG non stop to Bangkok. About a 3 1/2 hour flight. We traveled business and the seats were the lie down flat seats. I was surprised they used this kind of aircraft for such a short flight. The lounge at the airport for international travelers was very nice. I'm sure they share this...

Although we did experience a fair amount of turbulence, the food and drinks service was excellent and their lie flat beds are pretty good and I managed to sleep a fair amount on the 2 flights (via hong kong). The only small moan is that the film selection was not particularly good - plenty to choose from but few popular...
Everyone ranted about Cathay Pacific but I can honestly say it felt very average to us and I don’t think we will go out of our way to use them again.

I flew Cathay first class from JFK to TPE couple of times. The service is superb and the seat and space is excellent. The only down side is that I have to transfer the flight at Hong Kong airport. The entire trip extends from 16 hour (EVA Airline) to 2 hour (Cathay). The VIP lounge at HK is great. You...

I've flown Cathay my whole life to and from Hong Kong from Brisbane.
I personally find them great and have never had any issues. I find the food and beverage fairly good and service on par. Seat comfortability is good for me - being 5ft 5.
As of late, there have been more competitors in the market so now I...

标题: A trip to Taipei via Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific
内容:
Very friendly air stewards, and comfortably flights with Cathay.
Worth to mention a couple of things on this trip:
1. Flight stopover in Hong Kong, landing gate 25, and boarding gate 27 for Taipei.
Although the connecting gate is a few steps away, all transit passengers have to go
through the transit area and the full security checks. Be aware...

This is the biggest trap in Airline Industry. I planed my Christmas and New Years trip to Brisbane and I thought I give myself a treat and pay more to purchase a special class of Premium Economy so that i can use my mileage to upgrade to Business Class.
First of all, I fully understand this will be subject to...

标题: Competitive premium economy service, food quality is top in the industry
内容: I have been travelling on long haul flight in premium economy cabin. Their premium economy service is competitive. Seat is comfortable, 4" legroom and 2" width, although not the best, it is enough for quality rest/sleep on 16 hours flight. The advantage of this cabin is small, only 32 seats, and you do not have to line up to fight...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容:
The flight attendants were generally really friendly for out flight back to Singapore. We asked for ice cream and they gave us. As we had a no- beef meal ice cream wasn’t given.
Friendly. Warm,
Going to Hong Kong not so friendly crew.
The movies were limited. Expected more from a national carrier or at least a full service carrier.

标题: Top Notch, Big Treat with Style!
内容:
Let a world class airline give you a service to remember forever.
Most comfortable fully flat bed.
Every seat has isle access and the window seats have slightly more space than the "couples" twin seats in the centre of the aircraft.
The Boeing 777 3ER is most spacious and relatively new.
Great hospitality with First Class service.
Meals quality maybe...

It was a pleasant experience, despite the long flight hours. The staff was efficient, dedicated and smiling. We asked for and received special food, without any problems. We got phone help when there was a check-in problem. There were no delays on the flights, and the conection was fine, our luggages were automatically transferred from the first flight to the...

标题: First time on Cathay, good but long...
内容: I recently flew Cathay from Dubai to Vancouver and return from Los Angeles to Dubai. Their Business Class product is good albeit I found it a little cramped - maybe I'm used to flying Emirates Business. Overall the service was good. My only issue both outward and on my return leg was a peculiar smell in the cabin - it...

标题: A long routing but so what!
内容:
I had the pleasure of flying From Johannesburg to Los Angeles via Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific. Whilst it’s a long routing, the 9hr layover in Hong Kong was a good break. With this much time the 25 minute direct train ride from the airport made a couple of hours of ambling around Hong Kong doable.
Take a window seat...

Cathay have good equipment; most of their planes are reasonably new. Their Business /Economy set up is good-- the staff are less distracted by trying to provide three classes of service. Their Business Class seats are comfortable, flat, and have good storage space.
Where Cathay's long haul experience shows in in the treatment of their passengers. A 15 hour flight...

First point is that at Gatwick you are told to use a Business lounge that Cathay Pacific have identified. DO NOT USE this lounge you should go to the British Airways lounge which you can use as a One World partner. It is far superior in every way. For example you are allowed more than one sandwich in the BA...

I have been flying Cathay for over 7 years now and they are certainly my Airline of choice. I fly regularly for business and pleasure and it is great to know you can rely on an airline and its staff to make your flight as comfortable as possible.
This flight was a little different from usual as we were flying...

I fly a lot and started to go the the part of the world they service. I’m deeply disappointed by the quality of the airline. They flew us on a B777 for 14 hour flight that was poorly maintained and falling apart I was horrified and I love flying. The plane is loud, you can go deaf. The seating is...

This direct flight from Boston to Hong Kong took more than 15 hours but this flight was pleasurable from start to finish. From the champagne offered shortly after takeoff to the wide reclining seats with adjustable headrests and comfy blankets, pillows and multi-channel seatback screen, the extra money you pay is worth it. My wife is gluten-free and she felt...

There wasn't really anything "wrong" with my experience on Cathay but it also wasn't as good as top tier airlines. Checkin staff in Brisbane were not very helpful and cabin crew were fine but not quite as professional or friendly as other airlines. The aircraft and seats were OK but not as modern as other airlines and a below average...

We flew Cathay Pacific from JFK to Hong Kong and then from Hong Kong to Sydney. It was as pleasant as a total of 23 hrs in planes can be. Business class seats are very comfortable. The lie flat seat is good but felt a little tight down by my feet. Food was excellent as was the service. My only...

I had the pleasure of flying to Paris recently on this airline ,the plane was an A33 great seating great crew and food ,the last leg back home from Singapore to Sydney I flew Qantas what a difference ,Qantas could learn a lot from CP .my choice for my next flight will be easy to choose ,try it youll like...

标题: New A35-9 but very conservative changes
内容:
I still can’t decide if I should like Cathay Pacific. They use the new, much smaller “budget” terminal 4 in singapore which is not fitting a premium airline. On this flight CX636, latest A35-9 aircraft but no dramatic changes to the interior, the seat was mostly the same with some small modifications.
I like the TV screen though. Touch screen...

Just an amazing experience from check in to arrival at Christchurch (via Hong Kong).
Marvellous cabin crew, fabulous food and the most comfortable seats we have ever come across.
We will do this again.

Thanks to Cathay Pacifics upgrade seat bidding process, I was fortunate enough to win the bidding process and I was upgraded to Premium Economy.
Was heading to Sydney from Hong kong Airport.
Boarded the plane in the Premium Economy prority line.
With a 2-3-2 seating process, there were a total of 21 seats in the Premium Economy cabin.
Upon boarding...

Under previous post I mentioned that the outward flight we were allocated row 2; same on the return but the cabin manager had space for the 2 of us in the main BC and moved us up - for which we were very thankful. Service for dinner seemed rushed as was breakfast - cant think of a reason for this...

Late night 1:3pm flight just before xmas. First time flyer with Cathay pacific. Staff were very helpful, smooth flight, in flight entertainment had so much variety to keep myself entertained for the entirety of the nine and a half hour flight as I find it hard to sleep on Aeroplanes. Inflight selection of foods kept my stomach happy.
Overall great...

We were in row 2, which backs to the galley - unfortunately unable to change this (see return flight comments - the airline moved us to the main BC cabin). Service, food and attendants were attentive and welcoming. Dinner service was marred by the red wine being too cold. Enjoyed the experience.

Always had a positive experience on board a CX flight. The food is of acceptable standards. For the first time, we were served porridge, which was delicious. The service is often very good and in-flight entertainment sufficiently varied to meet any taste.
I would love to fly long haul on CX one day, and experience the business class one day!

My wife and I took the above flight for the first leg on a recent trip to France. We flew business class in seats 16K & 17K. Both were window seats. The format on the 777 flight in business class is 1-2-1.
Left and arrived on time. Service was perfect. Couldn’t have asked for anything better. Good food and drink...

I travelled with my family{infant + parents}.
The crew took very good care of us. The baby meal offered was very good.
One of their crew member - Ambrose was very friendly and helpful. Even offered to take care of the infant so that we could have our meals. Appreciate and respeCt that.

标题: If only the lie-flat beds were more comfortable
内容: My main reason for choosing Cathay Pacific between Manchester and Hong Kong was convenience -- it's a direct flight, no change anywhere and therefore a relatively short journey. Unfortunately, our departure was delayed an hour and a half. However, the food was acceptable quality, the service good and the legroom and personal space were excellent. The lie flat beds are...

Recently I flew Sydney-HK-Amsterdam and London-HK-Sydney with Cathay in Business class. on full fare. I have travelled in B/C with many of the major airlines but these flights were the worst re comfort that I have ever experienced. The flat bed is not well padded,I had to use the pillow to sit on for the 2 hours flying time ,each...

Poor maintenance of toilet seat and need upgrade. Extremely low recognition for being a long time loyal Marco Polo member for past 2 years. No complimentary upgrade to a higher class seat even business class is not full even for diamond member which is very disappointing. Could have switched to others like loyalty programs who could have provided better services...

标题: Perfect flight from Haneda to Hong Kong.
内容:
It's an excellent flight from Haneda, Japan to Hong Kong. Ground service and in-sky service is excellent. Food is okay, leg rooms is average, in-flight entertainment is updated. I don't use Cathay Pacific headset, I use mine (I always bring mine), temperature is comfortable but if too cold for some people flight attendant offering the soft blanket.
Duty free shopping...

I flew SIN-HKG and vice versa with CX in the J cabin, and I was unlucky to have scored their 777-3.
The J cabin seats on this intra Asia version of the plane were no better than glorified economy in my opinion.
CX occasionally runs an A33 on this sector, and that has a far better J product than the...

Always a great trip with Cathay - food is excellent, service is excellent, seats are comfortable and the lounge at HKG is amazing. Go to the lounge at Gate 68 (The Bridge) - food is so good and the seating is very comfortable.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Air hostess needs to do more.
内容: First time on Premium Economy with this airline and i was at times comfortable throughout the flight. The lounge needs better food as it was only basic. The issues i have are (1) Noisy Chinese people on board, talking at the top of their voices, (2) Babies crying which the air hostess did nothing to stop. Lazy Air hostess must...

Due to good experience with CX previously, i booked my flight to Bangkok with CX. On 22/12/17, I came to know about the flight delay without any reason given after i have check-in and waited at the airport for 4 hrs. Their reply to my email subsequently was that due to some restrictions imposed by air-travel, the flight was no...
Well, the checking in to the boarding were smooth and the inflight services were prompt and polite. But the inflight movies, especially the Chinese movies, were a little outdated.

标题: Spoiled luggage, flight delay, spoiled enterainment system
内容: It was my first time taking Cathay Pacific. The first flight from SIN-HKG-TPE was normal. My family ordered a mixture of vegetarian oriental and jain vegetarian meal. Jain meal was delicious from the appetizer to dessert. Not so much for the vegetarian oriental meals, I had better meals flying with China Airlines. Service as compared to China Airlines means there...

First flight on Cathay in over 2 years. It was a very pleasant flight, was very impressed about the comfort on premium economy. The staff at the check-in counter were very nice and always smiling. The check-in was very easy and fast. On board, the service was great also, with friendly flight attendants. I was also most satisfied about the...

标题: Good service but air steward English standard need improvement
内容: Good service provide in flight, but face minor issue when communicate with air steward as one of the air steward does not fully understand our needs. However, the service and efficiency boarding @ gate need more improvement as everyone is rushing into the line. May learnt the method used by EVA air. Overall are good.
Overall are good, just only the meals are su....., the services, entertainment,cleanliness,legroom, all are good. just the meals.

Wonderful customer service at airport, pleasant flight attendants. It made my trip so pleasant.
My luggage from Air Canada was not arrived to Taipei but Cathay Airline customer service was kind enough and helped me identify where the luggage were. Then they helped me bring the luggage to Taipei the next day, and shipped to our place.
I wish they...
Return trip was as good as outbound. Update of in-flight movies would be appreciated (no change in 5 weeks). The business lounge in Hong Kong was very good.

Great start to a long trip to Europe. Everything went smoothly. Loved the option of having tail or wheel based camera during take off! Would definitely fly with them again. The business lounge at Melbourne was nothing special however.

标题: Still the best among the existing airlines
内容:
I was upgraded to fist class from business class, a perk after flying with CX for years. I have flown in all classes of CX dependent on the flight hours and found their service best among the existing airlines.
Of course people can ask for more and more and imagine flying in a perfect airlines, but it is only fair...

I always try to book with Cathay and is easy to do so with their many destinations routed from Hong Kong. Cathay is usually not the cheapest Airline to my destinations but for the small amount you pay over the top of the cheapest Airline the quality you get is definitely better.
I feel the space and leg room you...
Friendly crew dedicated to customer comfort. Boeing 777 was spacious and well appointed. Very satisfied

标题: Impractical Attitude of Captain/ Crew/ Airline
内容: This was a short flight. The flight was delayed as announced by the Captain/ crew due to weather issues and non clearance by Dubai ATC and the ostensible queue system of Dubai ATC. We were given a free upgrade and we are thankful to Cathay Pacific for the same. However due to the weather condition, food and beverages were not...

标题: Airline is better than average, but not as good as expected or it used to be
内容: On the way to HK the flight was excellent. The seats were very comfortable, food was better than average and the service was excellent. On the way back the seats were not as comfortable, the food was mediocre, some of the food items were finished even in the Premium economy class. The service was rather poor. The flight attendant forgot...

At least 4 times a year I will need to take this flight. From Vancouver to Singapore, in all plus the stopover in HongKong,it will take about 18 1/2 hrs(plus & minus) flight,excluding stop over time of about 2 hours in HK. Premium Economy when in CX 889 is comfortable BUT a No No if the flight is CX888, cos...

We were celebrating our 38th wedding anniversary with 3 days in Ho Chi Minh and then 8 days in Phu Quoc. We chose to fly with Cathay Pacific and as the first leg of the journey was 11 hours we wanted to be as comfortable as possible, so travelled in Premium Economy. Plenty of leg room and the staff were...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Manchester - Ho Chi Minh City

标题: Awesome Premium Economy on Cathay Pacific
内容: The very comfortable seating with extended reclining as well as a foot rest really made the trip to Hong Kong from Johannesburg very comfortable indeed...it was like part of our holiday was being in the premium economy cabin! The larger TV screen with an absolutely superb selection of entertainment was further complimented by very comfortable Cathay ear phones. The cabin...

Like most of HKers CX has been our major transportation for years, it has been servicing us with once the best service in the world. Until nowadays when budget airlines become so popular we have started trying with many new airlines with really competitive offers. This short break my husband and I had in Nov 217 we haven't checked with...

标题: Great service, comfortable Business Class, movie selection could be updated
内容:
Overall the service on the flight was great, better than the outbound leg - thanks Simon (Customer Service Manager).
The flight is a Boeing 777 and this particular aircraft was well worn. That said, all functions operated as expected and overall the functionality on Cathay Business is pretty good.
The food selection was great, I had the Australian Beef which...

I'm just updating my last review. When we arrived at the airport we were upgraded from premium economy to business class for our first leg to Hong Kong . Don't know if this was because we had been downgraded for the flight from Hong Kong to Vietnam but it was great. Service was excellent and food was very good. Cathay...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'London - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: We had 2 fights to Taiwan. The flights were on time, the connection in Hong Kong was very convenient. The seats were comfortable' the service was very good. Te entertainment was good- we watched several movies , English speaking.

标题: Cancelled flight but good customer service
内容: We were to depart Brisbane at 55hrs 25/9/17 but after being initially "delayed" the flight was cancelled (mechanical issue) and everyone either sent home or provided with accommodation. CP is terrible to contact but we were contacted by them later that day and advised we had been placed on the same flight leaving that night and fortunately that went without...
Attendants were very good on both flights. Food was great and entertainment good. Premium economy gave us a bit more leg room.

I believe is this time and age where many people travel on a plane, I guess expectations seem to be higher and higher. With economy seats, one can only expect a decent service and decent food at least. With that in mind, guess that's what I got. Can't complain much it's definitely better than a no-frills budget plane for sure....

Upon boarding the plane the flight crew are very helpful and will show you where your seat is if you are unable to locate it. They explain all safety instructions in three different languages so that everyone understands. The food on the flight was nice as it consisted of a tuna sandwich with fruit and a cake and juice.
The...

标题: Good Flight Service, Food and attentive staff
内容:
Processing at Auckland and Hong Kong Airports was quick and functional,
Inflight service was as good as Air NZ whom we often fly with. Only negative to any trip past 4 hours in a plane, is the narrow seats and too short a leg room for anyone around 5fit 1inches, all airlines seem to offer narrow and less comfortable seats...
The seats were fine and the service reasonable. The food was fairly poor and the in flight entertainment limited. The lounges apart from one were average.

标题: CX 139 Hong Kong to Sydney great service even in Economy!
内容: Despite a delay at Hong Kong due to a faulty seat in economy departure was over 1 1/2 hours late and quick flight to Sydney, saw an arrival of less than 1 hour late. Service in the Economy cabin was exemplatory, breakfast was very tasty with lots of top ups of juice or coffee. During the flight I had a...

Toyed with giving Cathay a 5 rating but there a a couple of "small" reasons why not. Normally travel BA but have found nearly everything about them slipping downwards. What was good about Cathay was the 4 business flights we took (London/HK/Auckland back to HK and then London) worked out about ￡125 each overall cheaper with Cathay than other airlines....

As I prefer the day time flight from Sydney to Hong Kong (both there and back) in the past I have only flown Economy, figuring it's a waste to fly Business class for a 9hr flight where sleeping is not a requirement. Cathay Pacific Economy is quite acceptable.
On my most recent trip I decided to give Premium Economy a...

I really enjoyed this flight to and from Bangkok. the service was great. the flight attendants work hard to ensure your safety and your comfort. You could virtually get what ever you wanted when ever you wanted. You wanted more wine you got more wine, You wanted coffee in the middle of night they kindly got you coffee. They were...

Much cheaper than flying out of Canada. When checking in they upgraded us to Premium Economy from Economy. Flight Attendants service was excellent, food was very good and they could not do enough for us. On Time flight with great check-in. Free luggage check-in.
Would fly every time if I had the chance. Thank You Cathay Pacific

We found the flight reasonably comfortable for economy. The legroom was not bad and the food was good. I had forgotten to order a vegetarian meal, but since I enjoy fish, I had no problem. The flight left about 3 minutes late, but arrived on time.

Cx - hk to bkk - delayed for 3.5h
Plane model - B777-2- seat 3-3-3
- embarking in an orderly fashion on time
- Seat comfort - medium- legroom - its feels a bit spacious than the long haul flight - ok
- Meal with pasta or rice / Haagen ice cream - food is surprisingly good
- A few...

I flew Cathay Pacific from LAX to ICN via a layover in HKG for my exchange program in Korea. The flight was about $3 less on studentuniverse.com than direct flights to ICN via Korean Air/Asiana. My flight to HKG was delayed by about 6 hours due to the typhoons in China however the airline compensated me with a $15 meal...
Very efficient. The meals were good for airline meals.Excellent movie choices which kept us occupied for such a long flight. The flight attendant were very helpful & courteous.

Cathay Pacific is our choice for Boston - Hong Kong flights (also NYC - HKG). It is the best value for time (non-stop in about 15 hours), service, comfort and convenience. Prem economy gives more seat tilt and leg room for more comfortable sleeping.
HKG is a fine airport to have to spend some lay-over time if connecting to other...

Overall this trip was very good. The flight attendants were mostly good until the last leg coming into London. The male attendant completely forgot we existed after the dinner meal and never asked whether I required desert. The seats are comfortable and bed configuration meant decent sleep. Meals were good but having flown Qatar last time they need to work...

标题: Be careful of the last minute arrangement
内容:
went to Korea. Arrived 3 hrs before flight time . On check-in, was told at a last minute change that flight was 1 hr earlier . Had to inform the relatives.
On returning, same problem. This time round, 2hrs delay. This was completely unacceptable. Was infd by staff that they are filling up all seats to the maximum, thus the...

Our third Cathay flight in 7 years to Australia and they haven’t let us down again. It’s a long old flight and our first trip was in Economy. It was a perfectly good flight but as we found, if you can afford the Premium Economy, the space and comfort gets even better. This trip just completed was on board the...

标题: Cathay Pacific’s service isn’t the same anymore
内容: I fly with Cathay Pacific multiple times per year between London and Australia always redemption flights through frequent flyers. When needing to make a change to a flight I have found that they are extremely inflexible which is really disappointing, it comes across as there is no consideration to customer service due to booking a redemption flight. This has completely...

标题: Flight to see family during holidays
内容:
We were flying from Vancouver BC to Kolkata via Hong Kong in Premium Economy. The seats were very comfortable and noticeably wider than economy class which I flew a year back. Food was up to par but not outstanding with free snacks available throughout the flight.
Comfortable and recommend

First time flying with them, and honestly so so so pleased. So much extra seat width, so much extra feet space. We had a very quick connecting flight in Hong Kong and were worried about missing it. We were initially delayed in Melbourne and started panicking. However somehow we arrived 3mins EARLIER than the original departure time. I've never boarded...

Cathay Pacific is considered to be one of the best Airlines in the world and it doesn't disappoint at all everytime. We have been flying cathay pacific whenever we go to Hongkong and its always a good flight everytime. :) they should offer more travel promos though hahaha #wishfulthinking! :) All the best Cathay Pacific!

plus : good relation between price and quality, only one tranfer
less : time for transfer in Hong Kong 7 hours
Excellent service, especially food. Several diet types. flight attendants were very friendly and helpful.

We were friendly welcomed & assisted by the staff, from check-in, boarding & in-flight. The seating was clean & comfortable, even for a taller traveller. Food was adequate & some variety. Blankets & pillows are given & needed. Airflow & air-conditioning is good. Baggage was well handled. Special request regarding food & needs are discretely & professionally handled.

标题: Comfort & service on a very long haul
内容: I'd always heard about Cathay Airlines but I finally had an opportunity to experience it. I've taken many long haul flights to Asia, Africa, Europe and South America but I must say this was likely the best flight I've ever taken. They cater to your every whim and the seats are comfortable and you have plenty of privacy. Love the...

标题: Good value but could be improved
内容:
The best thing about long haul on CathayPacific is the opportunity for a stop over in awesome Hong Kong. The airline itself was on time and comfortable enough.
Things they could do better:
1,Seats in economy cannot be pre-booked. Other compatible airlines such as Emirates and Singapore offer this as standard. Come on folks, Cathay Pacific is not Ryan Air!...

Since they informed me that my seat I booked, which was premium economy, didn't exist on the plane that was changed (because of technical problem or something) so a new ticket with a business class seat was provided, which was nice. The seat was comfortable, also with several entertainments (no Wi-Fi). Food and Beverage was nice. I got salad, prawn...

I was flying from Bangkok to Hong Kong for a transfer to Mongolia (by MIAT).
I and few people who was flying with Cathay Pacific from BKK only had less than an hour to go to another terminal and re-check in for the connecting flight while the time we had was scarce. But everything from bringing us to another terminal...

Been travelling with CPA over the past 2 odd years. It is my wife's preferred airline, especially she requires wheelchair services in recent years. The flight is punctual and the in-cabin staff friendly. They are mindful of passengers requiring special needs. We frequently have seats close to rest-rooms to minimise her in-flight walk. We love the waiting area away from...

Long flight but comfortable.
The flight I was on was not full and thus I was able to have the whole row to myself for the long haul flight from HK to NY (JFK). I was grateful for that. The food served on the flight was good but we only had 2 main meals for the long flight. There were...

I think Cathay isn’t what it was. The service and catering is clumsy and is deficient when compared to the Gulf carriers.
The newer planes are obviously nice but the older planes are past it.

There are very few frills in business class on Cathay Pacific, especially when you compare it to the Middle Eastern carriers. If you’re travelling as a couple and want the ability to actually interact with each other (i.e., talk) this is a poor seating layout. The cabin configuration on this plane is 1-2-1 in business. You can’t see the passenger...

标题: Overall great airlines with many areas to improve
内容:
I used the airlines during my recent trip to Taipei and Hongkong. The first thing I remember is its inconsistencies in service and facilities offered. My flight from Hongkong to Jakarta was way better than from Jakarta to Taipei (via HK).
The flight from Jakarta to Hongkong did not serve alcohol on its cart. It could be that passengers have...

标题: Poor reservations and ticketing, ground crew, and lack of communication on baggage
内容:
My wife and kids didn't get to seat together despite us booking thru Cathay Pacific ticketing office in advance.
Ground crew in Taipei was also rude and not emphatic.
Also they had 7 pieces of luggage with enough leftover weight clearance but we're told we can't check all in.
We are not aware of their only 2 luggage per passenger...

Have traveled a lot and was very satisfied with the service and employees. International flight was very good and the seats were better than most. Highly recommended. Flight was on time and in-flight entertainment was great. Meals were better than most also.

We chose Cathay Pacific as an alternative airline to Europe this year to include a stop over in Hong Kong. The flight was uneventful and the safety standard of the airline is good - these are our main criteria for choosing airlines.
Having said that, the food and entertainment are not as good as Singapore Airlines, while the price to...

Cathay Pacific operates via Hong Kong. Flight wasn't bad being punctual and helping staff. In Delhi ground staff was quite helpful. I requested veggie meal. It was disappointing as the same food was served twice!
Beverages options were good and hostesses were better in service with smiling faces! Seat 47 A was on wings but had space. Whatelse one would...

Just great,
Room for legs
Tasty food
Very welcome service.
Up-to-date entertainment system,
I would like to fly with them again

Have travelled thru Cathay Pacific a number of times between India and US and always liked the in flight food and service, ground staff support, airline cleanliness. Air hostesses are usually very cooperative and helpful. They have good food and drinks selection. Recently traveled to Melbourne and had the similar experience. I was upgraded to the Emergency Exit seat. Flight...

标题: Cathay Pacific: The Friendly VERY Expensive Airline. One World Group.
内容:
Cathay Pacific: Hong Kong/China - Bali Denpasar/Indonesia - 8/12/217 (business class)
Good flight, good pilots and excellent service from the crew.
Only this Airline is to expensive for what you get.
Business launch: Excellent food, good WiFi, very good service, good seating, but should have a smoking area.
Pre-boarding: Perfect
On Time:
Food on board: very good
WiFi on board:...

Cathay has comprehensive inflight entertainment which I enjoyed. The service of the attendants were satisfactory as well. However, if the food quality can be improved would be better. Despite many negative comments from some "journalists" , "columnist", I think do be fair to consider the price and service provided. I still consider Cathay is safer than other cheap flights.

标题: An extra mile done by the aircrew
内容:
Started a flight going back from a vacation can be a sensitive one. Especially when you realize something is afoot.
Boarded CX565 on last Dec 2th from KIX to HKG. Uninformed totally that the flight had 1 transit in Taipei, it's mentioned only as KIX-HKG in e-ticket, booking reference, web-checkin, and NotiFly. We didn't buy the ticket for that kind...

CX has been a good airline for Asian travelers. Good service and also the inflight meal is delicious. The pricing is competitive if you don’t mind to stopover at Hong Kong (comparing to direct flight). However, the recent experience is that HKIA has been to congested. Our flight had to roam on the air for 3mins in order to land...

The flight left YVR on time at 1.15am on the 22nd December 217 arriving 1 minutes late in HKG on the 23rd December 217. The first idea things were not going well was when i tried to fire up the entertainment system.....the handset was registering ERR. I mentioned to the steward and he reset the system...to no avail. I told...

I am a Diamond member and was flying with my wife Business Class from Hong Kong to Europe. Although the booking of the ticket was under my name, we were not able to get seats together. I had to call the Marco Polo hotline to arrange for this. the outbound flight from Hong Kong worked; but we also made the...

Cathay Pacific is the most expensive airlines among the direct route from Hong Kong to Los Angeles. You can fly cheaper via taipei and Bejing using China Air or China Airline. But if you want a direct flight and comfortable flight, CX is the only choices. CX delivers better services than US airlines including UA, American airline, Delta. There is...

I have flown on many Chinese carriers and Cathay is on par with any of them. Friendly hostess who went above and beyond for all and really great seats and entertainment which make a flight go that much quicker for me. Nothing ws a problem for the staff and simply great experience. will hopefully have some specials on when next...

标题: If you have to fly economy
内容: If you are like me and can't afford business or 1st class then economy on Cathay Pacific is like most airlines - cramped ! If you book early enough you can request a premium economy seat although I must say they didn't particularly look any roomier. The cabin staff were extremely friendly and helpful. I usually love a window seat...

Baggage drop at Heathrow faultless and T3 Business Class Lounge had everything you wanted pre-flight. London flight an hour late departing due to de-icing. Cathay Pacific staff great at Hong Kong, speeding Perth bound passengers through the airport. Cathay Pacific held the flight and made up time en route. Flight landed on time and our baggage was first off. Super...

Just got off a business class flight, very disappointed. It's been a long time since I have flown with Cathay and I have just reminded myself why. Travelling with 4 adults 2 of our 4 chairs on the flight would not function, nothing the staff could do one seat stayed in the recliner position even when we had to land....

many flights cancelled...due to mount agung eruptions, upon our arrival at the airport,flights to singapore , kuala lumpur, australia ..but hey cathay pacific brought us safe home ...on schedule as ever!
we were amongst the few lucky ones !
The flight was very good in time. Service on board was excellent. Chairs were good to do some sleeping, especially the seats.

标题: Always a great airline to fly with
内容:
I am always a big fan of Cathay. The aircrafts are modern and safe, the service by the crew is professional and the food is much better than what you can expect from an airline. Also, i trust the pilots.
My last flight was on a A35, a very pleasant experience !

标题: Worst long haul flight to far east
内容: I had high expectations of Cathay as I had not used this airline before. The alarm bells rang when I was unable to book preferred seats without paying extra. I don’t mind where I sit on an aircraft other than near toilets so was disappointed when these were the only ones left. I checked in 48 hours before flight so...

标题: Flight Change - No Explanation - Poor Seat
内容:
Originally booked flight CX253, in April, departing HK in the 15 hour.
In August, however, Cathay Pacific changed the flight to CX257, departing at 94.
No explanation or apology was given.
This meant getting up in the 4 hour on the last day of our trip.
As we had already selected and paid for extra legroom seats, this had to...

On arrival at HK, my wife realised that her seat was soiled with chocolate, which was not noticeable in the dark cabin. This was extremely embarrassing.
Cathay Pacific do not appear to be bothered by this.

标题: Business Flight cx 72. Robots without Smile. No wonder they are going bancrupt.
内容:
After flying on Qatar even Cathay becomes a joke.
Their champagne only piper, not even billecart salmon. FAs nice but smiles ? No wait, fake smiles was Thailand, instead for China no smiles at all. Don't get me wrong, they tried to be nice, but that was all. The seats not even more reclinable than a handwith.
Pretty disappointing the...

标题: They were much better years ago!
