内容: I flew with them a few times already, but unfortunately they got worse and worse in my mind in what they offer. At this time I flew from London to Hong Kong with an onward flight to Australia. On the flight to Hong Kong they used a 777-3ER, which had very old and uncomfortable seats in Premium Economy, the food...
the flight is very efficiently driven with helpful staff , the flight food though was not very nice.it used to be.but the staff service has made up for it

I flew with Cathay Pacific to and from China from Sydney Australia. On the outward journey I had premium economy seats on the flight to Hong Kong. These seats were surprisingly comfortable and roomy compared to the normal economy seats. I didn’t think they would be that different. This was a daytime flight. The service was excellent, the food quite...
First time I flew Cathay Pacific and I would take this airline again especially for long haul flights. Lots of leg room, lots of entertainment selections. Food was OK.

The flight flew on time and we arrived safely - two positives! Other than than, everything was fairly average. The seats were fine for economy and the in flight entertainment was ok, a reasonable selection but not as good as other airlines. The food left a lot to be desired - no where near as good as airlines such as...

It was a 12.3pm flight. Meal service very slow. In order to arrive early at Tel Aviv airport for check-in & tax refund, we had 7am breakfast and nothing after that. My biggest mistake. After takeoff, instead of immediately serving lunch, they took one full hour to serve an extremely tiny pack of peanuts and fruit juice at almost 2pm....

标题: Great Cathay service despite the delay
内容: We left Brisbane nearly two hours late due to delayed arrival of the inbound aircraft. A little nerve wracking, given our three hour transit at HKIA. Nonetheless, nearly 3mins was made up in flight and everything went smoothly during the transit and we made our Finnair connection in time. The Cathay A35 service is great.

The seats in economy were Ok, but the inflight viewing beat me. I could not get the screen to change from Chinese to English. Drinks were generous. Food was just Ok. No, I won't mention the toilets.We arrived on time despite delay boarding.
Note the online check-in begins 48 hours before your flight and is well worth using. Choose your...

标题: A great airline to fly long haul with
内容: I have flown with Cathay Pacific a couple of times, from a few European cities (London, Frankfurt, Paris) to Sydney via Hong Kong (always Economy class). It is one of my favourite long haul airlines. The service is always great and very friendly, the food is excellent as far as airplane food goes, and generally my flights have been on...

Firstly, I am a huge fan of Cathay Pacific but I must admit that not everything that Cathay Pacific provides in its flights, for example, their meals, are not as great as it was 3 years ago. My family chose Cathay Pacific for we had a good experience on it the last time we took it. However, Cathay Pacific should...

The haul was very comfort and safe. The cabin room of A33 is good. I have enough leg room at Economy class. In terms of food quality, it is good with adequate quantity. Entertainment is good but there is too many advs inserted.
Thank you to all hardworking crew and i have a nice trip returning home.

标题: Good Service and Hard working staff
内容: A night haul. Crew were working hard and i observed that they could take care of most passengers especially for those who was travelling with kids. A little bit disappoint was the smal leg room of 777 . A33 is pretty good

From the moment we stepped onboard this flight we received the best customer service. Friendly, smiling staff who were available when needed.
The seats were very comfortable and lay flat. Plenty of leg room and space.
Food was good with a good selection on offer.
Movie selection was average and not many new movies, mainly older ones, but it was...

标题: Very polite and helpfull stewardess even in economy class
内容: I like the food especially their bun with meat inside, sooo delicious, so i will say good for food. The staff also very helpfull as their know i sit alone on economic class as their flight full at business class, so i separate sit with mom and my brother.But their willingly to help me pass an immigration cards for them....

We decided to fly premium as the journey was so long and felt that it was worth it for the extra room and better food. Well what a let down. The seats were fine as was the space and entertainment but the service was sloppy getting our meals wrong, forgetting drinks and what made it worse was the food was...

标题: Our experience was like flying on two different carriers. The first leg was excellent the second not too good.
内容:
Our flight from Sydney to Hong Kong was excellent. We were on a triple 7 aircraft The service and seats were great, with easy access to the bathrooms, a good entertainment system and fine meals. By the way this flight was completely full in all classes and yet the service was still prompt and regular.
From Hong Kong to Vancouver...

Wide comfortable seats, good in flight entertainment, champagne and free drinks are the start. Excellent service, good food, plenty of legroom and room for carry on bags are more. Affordable upgrade from regular economy is the topper. The total of about 16 hours en route was the fastest connection, and the flight times were convenient for getting to the airport...

标题: premium economy is my new standard
内容: Premium economy for a 15 hour flight is a real luxury, and if you can afford it the seats are totally worth it. Extra wide, with a legrest that pulls out, the seats are comfortable and the entertainment choices vast.

The flights from Brisbane to Hongkong and Hongkong to Amsterdam was OK.
(+) Spacious leg room. Flights were on time.
(-) The food service felt very rushed. I felt like i was in a Chinese restaurant where they expect you to eat then go! Customer service from the crew was average. Most of them were not rude but were not...

This was our first time flying Cathay Pacific business class. Overall great experience. Lay flat beds were as comfortable as you would expect, the blanket is very substantial. Food and drinks were plentiful, including snacks throughout the flight, and hot food you could order any time. I was disappointed in the lack of good vegetarian options for all courses -...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Good Leg Room but Terrible Food
内容: Good seats and great entertainment options. Decent leg room. The food unfortunately atrocious on both legs. It would put me off flying with Cathay Pacific in future

Thank you for wonderful experience! It was my first time flying with Cathay pacific, but not first time flying overseas. I spend a lot of time on air yearly all over the world, I’ve experienced Emirates, KLM and many other airlines’ services and I was amazed by Cathay. The seats even in economy are comfy, you can change the position...

My wife and i frequently fly Cathay to Hong Kong en route to Bangkok. Even though a longer flight than some other good airlines we feel the value for money weighs in the balance of Cathay. Good food, service and flight frequency are all positive issues for us.

Cathay's premium economy class at the brand new a35 is lovely. The seats are spacious and the design with its wood features makes it feel elegant and modern. Service, food and drinks are very good and the entertainment system offers a vast selection of movies, TV shows and live news. The cameras outside the plane are an exciting feature. They...

标题: Flight staff needs to be more attentive
内容: Overall, flight was good. My husband and I had different bookings, and as a result, during online check-in, we were not able to get seats side-by-side. However, while dropping off our baggages, the airport counter staff saw that my husband and I were at different seats, and suggested to let us sit together. We really appreciate it. Thanks so much!

It has been awhile since I have travelled on Cathay as I found their regional routes business class seats to be old and uncomfortable. I was pleasantly surprised as this sector had the new business angled business class seats so that passengers do not need walk over another at any time. The seats were also very comfortable and I slept...

A group of six of us flew business class with CP, coming home after three weeks in Oz, and taking the Brisbane-Hong Kong, then Hong Kong-Heathrow route. Things did not start well. We arrived rather early at Brisbane airport, and OK, we know three hours is generally the earliest you can check in, but when the three hour point came,...

Excellent friendly service and comfortable seats with brilliant in-flight entertainment package
With free extra legroom on return flights
I am 6'3" legroom was adequate on outbound flight but better on return with free upgrade
Out bound check in was chaos due to new automatic check in that didn't work properly and not enough signage or assistant s

had a return trip to vietnam via hong kong. i absolutely hate long haul flights, but this one wasn't too bad. it lacked some of the frills as compared to the gulf airlines.
bought tickets online. the website was adequate, but would time out frequently. booking special meals etc was also a problem. with online check in , the website...

标题: Best Business Class between Singapore and Bangkok
内容: Cathay Pacific is not only Hong Kong's flag carrier but also one of Asia's best regional carriers featuring some interesting intra-Asian routes with 5th freedom rights that it developed during its early years. Singapore - Bangkok - Singapore is one of these interesting routes with flights originating in Hong Kong and Singapore, stopping in Bangkok in each direction. Frequency is...

“Excellent service”
Flew Cathay Pacific from New York to Hong Kong and on to Manila, and same in reverse flights. Service and comfort.

标题: Almost the best flight I have had
内容: Having never been with Cathay pacific before, I was pleasantly surprised by the service and quality of what we received on our flight. Arriving on time at our destination after having an uneventful flight
Great experience well organised great food we were able to book the exit row for an additional fee which made the trip more enjoyable. Friendly staff no complaint

After reading some unflattering reports about this airline, we were a bit worried when our tour operator (Wendy Wu) booked us with them for our flights to and from China. Our fears were totally unfounded. We had no problems at any stage of our journey, and the flights were totally uneventful. Delicious food, and excellent in-flight entertainment. Cabin crew were...

We flew Cathay Pacific from Auckland to Hong Kong and on to Heathrow. Two back to back 12 hour flights. However the service and comfort were excellent. Nothing too much trouble for the cabin crew. Would certainly recommend. Much superior businesses class layout to British Airways.

标题: Could be Better with a bit of Effort
内容: This was one of those average flights where nothing went wrong, but you felt that with a just a little bit more effort on the part of the airline it could be a whole lot better. The food was only just average, the inflight entertainment system was poor and in spite of the option for both English and Chinese subtitles,...

标题: No selection of seats despite 48hrs prior to departure
内容: This is our first time using Cathay Pacific, indeed an awful unpleasant experience. Left us a very bad impression of the airline. First, we were not able to select the seats and thus ended up separate seats during the flight journey. Second, flight delayed for an hour. We have been using Singapore Airlines and Thai Air to Bangkok, it has...

Once upon a time Cathay was at par or even superior to the leading carriers of today. Has Cathay stepped down to the budget airline category? I had a late evening flight and food service was a terrible sandwich, and no alcoholic beverages were offered. I probably expected too much, but really is Cathay in the budget airline league, if...

Flew Cathy Pacific as it was the carrier used by the cruise company. Flight was ok but not as some others I have used on far eastern routes. Seat pitch was good for my self food was ok and entertainment via media was ok. One of the toilets was not working on flight out no amenities like socks or toothbrush...
The flight was very good. We could sleep 7hours out of about 12 hours. Service was great , food was very good and staff was exallant .

We fly Cathay Pacific at every opportunity. Look forward to our next flight to Europe early next year. We reserve the same seats.Beds quite comfortable. Excellent cabin service. food delicious and good wines. My only complaint is ...Please a new selection of movies would be greatly appreciated....Thank you.

The amount of leg room was excellent as was the service and choice of food this flight was like going back in time when flying was a pleasure able experience including printed menu which I haven’t seen for many years when flying ecenomy class. The only adverse comment is the issue of plastic cutlery which is a shame considering the...
Great flight with wonderful flight attendants. This was a 2-1/2 hour flight with meal service. Did depart late due to high traffic at the airport.

Flying to Australia is a big deal, it is a hell of a long way to go and Cathy Pacific made it very comfortable.
Starting with check-in at Heathrow - simple and fast
The Lounge - very good
On the plane - WOW, what service, the team were all great, the attention perfect
Press a button and the seat becomes...

I have flight that was supposed to leave at 5:15 but we had 6hrs delay inside the plane already 3 x take off only to comeback due to mechanical error,sick passenger,another sick passenger, provided its a circumstances that cant b prevented,but atleast the crew itself should have made it easier for the people on board some of the stewardess are...

A very budget airline, a bit on the cramped side,Food was shoved at you, the flight out was just a modicum better than the flight home, which really was dire - if you didn't wish to sleep then don't use this airline, all the lights were put out, woken to eat and the same again all through the route, only...

标题: Not as good as last year... why?
内容: Last year I took CX flight all the way CGK-HKG-JFK n return and I had a great time. The attendants were nice and quick in giving above the standard services. B&F were great in variety and taste. That experience was not met in last weekend trip before AA. Surprisingly the American who used to be less in its service quality...

Simply superb service and facilities which was one of the best experiences in business class for many years . This was the first leg of a trip to New Zealand and the high standard was maintained on all 4 flights . The seat was comfortable and environment restful and relaxing . Food excellent and service world class . Highly recommended

Maintains its place. Nothing to complain about . Cabin staff excellent & remembered us from previous flights. The new route continuing on to Tel Aviv is Tremendous. A 4 hour lay over in Hong Kong was good & the entire trip Tullermarine to Ben Gurion airport is just on 24 hours, an excellent way to travel to this fascinating dynamic...

This is my 2nd travels with Cathy Pacific.
1st travel 215-6 : Singapore - Hong Kong - USA (LA)
2nd travel 217 : Singapore - Hong Kong - Japan (Hokkaido New Chitose)
My experience & opinion remain unchanged, there is plenty room for improvement. from flight, stewardess, gate service.

标题: Passanger Centric, comfortable, good food and service
内容: Cathay are consistent - good service, attentive staff and the basics food and entertainment better than BA and the price was competitive

标题: One of the best flights I have ever had. Loved the food and courteous service. Will definately fly again.
内容: Wasn't expecting the service to be this great! Last trip to Philippines was horrible. This trip? AMAZING! It was a long flight and it was economy so I expected to be uncomfortable at times because sitting for long periods of times. But the great service, and decent food made the flight enjoyable. The flights were on time or early to...

Having flown premium economy on other airlines this one was average at best. Although the leg room was more and seat width wider that's the only difference from normal economy apart from the price! The service, food and inflight entertainment is no different to standard economy. They even forgot to remove our dinner trays. Don't waste your money you will...

Flew from Rome to Hong Kong and then onto Brisbane in economy. I made an inquiry with Cathay before our flights requesting a spare seat in our row of three due to a leg injury of mine. No fuss and no bother and it was done by Cathay. Made our trip home far more comfortable than we imagined. I was...
Flew from Brisbane airport to Hong Kong and then to Paris. We flew premium economy. The flight was great as was the service and the food. Couldn't fault it and happy to fly with Cathay again.

标题: It's not business class, but at least you're comfortable and can get some rest!
内容: This was my first time finally travelling in premium economy class, as the previous times that I almost got to sit in premium economy, I ended up just getting upgraded to business. Similar to business class, you get some champagne upon boarding, which was fortunate as the plane had to be de-iced so I got to knock a few back...

We travelled on a 2 leg journey, LHR-HKG-MNL in Economy on a Cathay 777. Overall the plane was clean and modern, the cabin staff as always highly professional and courteous.
The IFE was decent with some good movies, seat recline in economy was the industry standard, but Cathay still have a 3-3-3 arrangement in economy unlike EVA who are now...

Booked a last minute flight for family emergency so wasn’t expecting a great seat, but was allocated exit seats all the way out and back. The staff were very friendly and attentive- greeting me by name when I sat down and then remembering it throughout the flight. A level of service you quite often don’t even get in business.
The...

I had heard a lot of good things about this airline, so expectations were high. Unfortunately the experience didn't quite match. The seats seemed very old and rather tatty, however they were quite comfortable. The entertainment was good and the cabin staff were very pleasant - though the food was pretty average. I expected landing cards to be handed out...

We have been flying several times now in Cathay Pacific in small groups 1-2 pax.
Cathay doesn't bother to take care of passenger seat service. When group tickets were bought you are not able to select your seat at all. People are split in all over to the airgraft. Even family members cannot travel together.
Now just recently we had...

Cathay business class was once the pinnacle of business class travel, however I’ve noticed a significant decline in its service. The equipment has become a bit dated and showing wear and tear, the service was not as personal as it was in the past and has taken a back seat to some of its competitors in the region like EVA...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
Perfect Herring bone configuration which means maximum privacy. Lots of storage
space and seat converts into a flat bed . In flight Entertainment and meals were
excellent. The" chic" touch were the warmed nuts that were served with the drinks.
Such a simple thing but what a classy touch!!
Punctual on both long hauls.
A shame this could not be...

Our first time in Premium Economy. The seats are definitely bigger, with more legroom. My wife and I could not get seats together and we could not do it earlier or at check in, the system blocked us, so that was a negative. I was in the front row, so plenty of legroom against the bulkhead. I was also constantly...

On schedule departure and arrivals,courteous staff,,clean well maintained aircraft with reasonably comfortable seating,entertainment on board adequate.Food was pretty standard affair but served hot,drinks aplenty,staff attentive to needs of passengers.
Overall efficiency and courtesy.Good experience compared to many western carriers!

标题: No customer service support for Cathay pacific. Shame on HK national airlines
内容:
I have taken other airlines such as finnair, qatar and BA and they rearranged missed connecting flights without a charge.
My family recently took a flight CX65 from Singapore to Okinawa on 7th Dec 217 and missed the connecting flight in the HKIA due to a long connection distance between terminal gates. There was no instruction / assistance / announcement...

标题: Good service, good inflight meals, lots of leg room
内容: The was lots of space in the seats, even in economy. Both meals were very good in the context of airline inflight meals. I would definatly fly with Cathay Pacfic again. The selection of inflight movies was much better than the Bristih Airways plane I arrived in Hong Kong on.

For our 2nd trip to SE Asia we decided to cash in our American Airlines points for two business class seats on Cathay. To my surprise our November trip that we booked in May, I only had to make two calls and move our dates for our two week trip by one day. Three of our flights were on A35-9...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Newark - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: Always believed Cathay Pacific was meant to be good, worst flight ever. Despite going on to online check-in as soon as emailed arrived was unable to sit with the friend I was travelling with. Wanted a window seat, given seat by emergency exit, no window, narrower than usual seat and the man sat next to me took over part of...

标题: Great experience on premium economy seat
内容:
Seat was on the first row of premium economy, great leg room. The only problem is we cannot enjoy the personal TV while take off and landing. Food is on average and the flight is on time. Cabin crew was lack of smile but overall acceptable.
One thing only, quite a mess in Rome airport since we can't find any...

标题: Cathay Pacific is my first choice of airline to travel
内容: I feel at home flying with Cathay Pacific (International) and its Cathay Dragon (between HK and China's major cities) and sales and discounts are often. I always get the best value from Cathay Pacific, with the advantage of flying to China & stopping over HK. The in-flight entertainment is by far the best.

标题: still good but not what it used to be
内容:
I have been doing this for years and this was probably at least my 5th transpac on CX.
What used to be the best airline in the world (yes, better than SQ) is loosing it's luster with every flight. This is probably due to their financial concerns.
In and of themselves, the things that i am noticing are small but...
标签: International' 'First Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
more comfortable flight with longer leg room and slightly bigger in width seat.
however muslim food was disappointing. was given a vegetarian breakfast. dinner was bland rice with curry chicken and black beans. food reminds me of army camp food that i didnt want to take photos.
we were hungry during the long flight.
stewardess was helpful and friendly but...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: This time checking in is smooth. Their lounge in TPE is better than HKG. No people sleeping in the lounge just like their home. Food in the lounge are great but small. Boarding time was smooth. Onboard service was okay.

Check in is quick, using the lounge near gate 63. There are quite lots of people sleeping on the sofa, just like camping like their home, the lounge food was great compared with SQ, onboard was delayed for an hour. Nothing special at all.

Good food with tasty white wine
Enjoy the warm greeting from crews during the flight, I also have great experience having white wine taste.
很享受整段旅程
喜g一_始的香c餐搭配的夏多劝拙
座L也很勤诘姆张c},一切都很棒

The flight was smooth, the air hostesses were so great and did an amazing job. There was so much food that you didn’t go hungry. Food selection was good. Selection of movies was great something for everyone. The flight was on time taking off and landing too

I'll start with the positives. The A35 aircraft is a very modern aircraft with a reasonably wide range of entertainment choices, including WIFI. The flight was smooth and on time. The food was quite tasty, especially for economy. The cabin crew were reasonably friendly on the odd occasion that they were present.
Now for the problems. I don't tend to...

My first time flying with Cathay was in Nov 217, I’d heard good things and also because I’m a One World member I thought it’d great to earn some air miles. Well, within the first leg of my journey the bathroom mirror was smashed, there was no hand towels and the cabin crew were pretty rude, to the point of...

Cathay lived up to previous business class reviews we had read - they didn't disappoint. As we had a night flight it wasn't long before we were comfortably settled down for the night. The crew were quick to respond to requests for water etc throughout the night, woke us gently for breakfast and gave service with a big smile.
The...

A newly Renovated Terminal @ SHA. Modern and clean at the moment. The check in areas are not greatly improved even though New.
Not enough space.
Lounge is a third party lounge which all the airlines use and is too overcrowded.
Food is reasonable.

Cathay are as expected, reliable and good hosts. Their flights are a little crowded (which isn't great on a long-haul flight, but we were well fed and looked after. Their 777 fleet feels pretty tired and run down, but their A35s are fresh and bright. Choose a seat in front of a bulkhead - loads of legroom and recline.

Had 8 odd flights with Cathay over last 6 weeks and some were great, some were delayed and some flew us into the wrong airports without notifying us that we would miss connecting flights. Many of our flights were moved / delayed / even sent to different airports / late inconvenient gate changes - and when you try to talk...

标题: A great way to fly. Always
内容:
It might seem a little unusual but we flew JFK to Hong Kong and then to Sydney. A few hours longer than the normal way. But the flights worked out so well we were very satisfied. A much better seat than Qantas we had crossing the Pacific and the one we had previously had on Virgin
The food and service...

There's lots of flights by now for the travellers to travel to hk
2 major i mean major flights to hk are cathy and air canada
of course there's others but thru out my 3 yrs in canada - and flight back to hk
every other 3 yrs - i personally never took others but 2
guess because of the...

Really disappointed with Cathay Pacific today.
Firstly they lost our bookings.
Secondly, we checked in at 8 am for a 4 pm flight - they delayed it for an hour- and we just got in at 4:45 only to find us sandwiched in the middle! Luckily we’re still in Premium Economy class!
Last time I travel by Cathay for a...

The chairs are reasonable comfortable for a economic class. The air quality is good. The washrooms were quite clean at the beginning of the trip. However the entertainment system... The touch screen is not that sensitive and not too much intuitive. Also the system had to be reset many times at the beginning of the flight and after a certain...

I have flown many times with Cathy Pacific and always found them very good. But, this was several years ago. This time I flew from Heathrow to Cairns via Hong Kong and return. The flights Heathrow to Hong Kong and return were fine, but not the Hong Kong to Cairns and returning Brisbane to Hong Kong and then London. Basically...

I have happily flown Cathay Pacific to Hong Kong many times over the past 2+ years and on this most recent flight I was once again impressed. Well maintained aircraft, better than average food and above all--service! From the minute I checked in at the gate in New York I was reminded why I love this airline. To a person,...

标题: Comfortable,on time and good inflight service.
内容:
Overnight flight,seats fine, service and food great,reasonable nights sleep and arrived in Hong Kong in fairly good shape for a full day sightseeing.
It had been a few years since flying with Cathay and won't wait as long again before rebooking.

Cathay is great for frequent flyer taht have a racked up enough sector points to use their added value services. From time to time they offer very good value for money business class tickets. Great service overall however, they get let down quite often by the ground staff that operates their ticket counters in many cities apart from Hong Kong....

Taking CX to Osaka. The travelling experience's satisfactory. Service was fine and efficient. Nothing fell short of my expectation. Inflight meals were so so, I got a HD ice-cream on my return flight which's great.

Flying overnight from Melbourne to Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific was a good experience. The crew were attentive without being intrusive. The food was really quite good. The cabin fitout is excellent if you are traveling however if you were traveling with someone then there is a fair bit of distance between you and your companion.
Would certainly recommend Cathay...

标题: Best you can have for Mumbai - Hong Kong
内容: Have travel very often to Mumbai - Hong Kong but Cathay is the best Airlines to travel. Best in all aspect Food,services, Seats and timing.

标题: One of my favorite, if not the favorite.
内容:
I have flewn with Cathay for about 6 flights and I just have to say I really like Cathay.
Everything about them is positive. I mean, off course if you travel in economy class you will not get good leg room, but I do not think about that.
I have nothing bad to say about Cathay Pacific.
Excellent service overall. Plane was new and very clean. Really supportive staff. Great menu, impressive list of videos.

The customer service from the inflight crew is outstanding. Very friendly and everyone always has a smile. Economy comfort wasn’t so bad but definitely will upgrade to business class next time for a long flight. The breakfast, lunch and dinner was very good for airline food. They have a good selection to choose from. A big thumbs up to the...

标题: Mechanical cabin service and arrogant ground staff at airports!
内容: Don't fly with this airline unless you have plenty of time for your connecting flights. Take note that their staff only smile at Caucasian passengers!
Good value for the flights everything on time plane is just average service ok but lacks the touches of some of the other major airlines poor choice of films food ok

This was my first time flying on Cathay Pacific. I was impressed with the service for a long haul flight. Friendly and professional checkin staff, even with many demanding customers. Good food, friendly and responsive attendants, good in-flight entertainment (screen in front of every seat with movies and other entertainment to watch) and a comfortable flight. Flight attendants catered to...

标题: Singapore to Vancouver via HKG in Nov 217
内容:
Our recent flight in Nov was good. The food was especially good on the Singapore-HKG-Vancouver leg. Service is good and efficient.
Liked the baggage allowance of 2 x 23kg per pax

标题: Want to cut 4 hours from your travel time??
内容: This was my 4th trip to Thailand! From my experience, the trips are very, very exhausting, due to 1-13 hour layovers in Beijing, Shanghai, or Kunming. I was looking for shorter ground time, and a one stop flight. That flight was on Cathay Pacific #889. Because of the usual length of the trip, 23 1/2 - 24 1/2 hours, I...

Cathay Pacific Premium economy class in Airbus 33 offers reasonably wider seat, with generous seat pitch and reclining angle - even though it is not made of leather so looks less premium than SQ Premium economy seat but it is definitely more comfortable.
Food is good, even there’s no special meal order. We also can enjoy priority check in and...

Flights take off on time which is great. Food for me is just okay. The seafood noodle that i took somehow taste bland. It seems like the in-flight movie selection is not as many as i remembered on flights that i took previously. Seat is okay for a person with average built like me.

From Helsinki to Sydney. So tired after the flight from Helsinki. The lounges in Hong Kong were so relaxing. Only the prob were, none of the staff were kind or professional. Maybe they all are poorly paid. But the in-fligth personal was ok.
I really like to thank my flight attendants for calling and remembering my name. Thats service.

Generally had good flights both ways from Vancouver to Hong Kong. Flights were on time, the cabin crew were pleasant and the service was good. Food and drinks were good and entertainment options seemed current.
The Business Class section was arranged as single, double, single. If you are flying solo the layout offers more separation from the other passenger in...

标题: Excellent service, leg room, food and entertainment
内容: My previous experience of long haul flights was one of an arduous and uncomfortable experience, Our flight out to Philippines via Hong Kong was very pleasant, the in-flight entertainment kept us fully occupied and the hostesses couldn't do enough for us. The flight back was slightly less comfiortable but probably because it was a night flight and we were exhausted...

标题: Hong Kong starts with its own plane.
内容: Your visit to the island of Hong Kong should start with its home airline. We flew premium economy in a fully booked flight. Checking in was easy and using online though difficult to start was quite straight forward in the end. Book your seats early or you may be disappointed. Dropping your bags was very easy with loads of counters...

In recent years i have been a regular user of Emirates. On this trip i was quite excited to be flying with Cathay Pacific, an airline i have heard many good things about over the years.
My first flight from Perth to Hong Kong was 7 1/2 hours of general discomfort in the narrow and basic seats in economy class....

Having flown Cathay Pacific on several occasions over 35 years, it always had a good reputation, but I have never traveled on such a small plane for a twelve hour flight, I traveled economy class and were treated accordingly which was pretty bad. From past trips what were economy seats have been upgraded to premium economy, right size for long...

标题: one one person at the baggage drop off at YVR, attending 2+ people. Horrible staff, slow and poor sense.
内容: one one person at the baggage drop off at YVR, attending 2+ people. Horrible staff, slow and poor sense, we were there more than 3 + hours before just to Drop Baggage, this way they delayed the loading and at YVR and arrive late @ Hong Kong they lost few baggages, This is my 3rd experience, going to India from...

Cathay flight was nice, they provided blankets and pillows. Seats were comfortable and provided nice quality meals and snacks on board the flight. One of the best flights, I've had. They have a great selection of movies and tv shows.

terrible when checked in online there were no seats together even though we did it as soon as 48 hours slot opened, tried at baggage check in less than helpful. Friend given small seat (allegedly extra leg room) right next to door no window although said it was? No tv screen to watch on a 13 1/2 flight really?? Offered...

The service of Cathy Pacific was great. They offered us lounge facilities both at the origin and the destination. This was good to freshen up after landing.
The in flight entertainment was good with reasonably good choice of programs. The food was good
The cabin crew were very efficient and helpful

Flight started out with us sitting on the tarmac for 9 minutes, as a thunderstorm prevented the plane from being refueled. During that time the cabin crew were good, and have everyone something to drink & the captain kept us updated on what was happening. The flight was an Airbus A35 and the seat was very comfortable. I rarely manage...

标题: All was as it should be!!
内容: We were very pleased with a direct flight out of Adelaide . Check in was made very easy with the automation and was assisted by a very helpful staff member. Baggage drop was also easy. We appreciated the seating on the aircraft being just the 2 seats on each side. The entertainment facilities made the 8 hour journey pass quickly....

标题: Very passenger conscious and efficient cabin crew.
内容:
It was my first flight for a few years and the plane was fully booked. I was impressed with how quickly the attendants served drinks, meals and met special requests. The clear away was also very efficient.
On board meals were tasty and with reasonable choice.
With a full complement of passengers there were times when the wait at toilets...

One of the best aircraft i had ever flown, You can still smell the freshness of the brand new aircraft. new plastics, new carpet etc. It has a wide LCD screen where you can monitor the aircraft's location, speed, altitude and course. The outside view from the different camera installed outside of the aircraft. Wide windows however it is still...
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Economy' 'Hong Kong - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: After a connection from Cathay First JFK-HKG this was quite a poor experience Bad food, little flat champagne offered and the aged CX A33 fleet is decrepit and showing its age No Cathay Pacific Parfums de Voyage freebie offered Sat in preferred seat 19A and a total squeeze as a 6ft3 man Flight half full and First is not offered...

After a visit again this year to Greater NY Dental Meeting again decided upon a redemption back to Australia in Cathay First. I wasn't disapoointed! T8 at JFK means you nowhave access to American Flagship Lounge and Flagship Dining Room Lots of Krug onboard, great PJs, great multi-languaged crew, good food and a comfy flatbed First was full this trip,...
标签: International' 'First Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容: Apart from a delayed departure due to air traffic control over Europe there was absolutely nothing to complain about on this flight. Even with the delay staff came to my seat and apologised for the delay. In doing this they referred to me by name. The configuration of the cabin is suitable for couples travelling together or passengers travelling alone....

标题: In my opinion "One of the best airlines out there"
内容: Premium economy was a good compromise. Not much more than economy and a lot less than business. You have your own cabin.Seats were wide and plenty of leg room with consoles between seats. Free drinks and two good meals served graciously by attentive staff. Only thing I missed not traveling business was the ability to lay flat. But at what...

Cathay Pacific is still using those terrible seats that don't recline but instead your seat base slides out to mimic reclining. Really pathetic that a legacy airline is still using such seats. CX, it's time to change the seats..!
Boarding at Changi T4 was terrible, very messy. Staff don't seem to bother to sort out the boarding process.
The Cabin crew were extremely helpful and even helped us to use our 8 hours between flights in Hong Kong to maximum advantage.

It's really great from Mumbai to Hong Kong. Time schedule is great than other flight, and food is also good for Asian. I can recharge my mobile with airplane recreation device as I am in the airplane, so I can use my mobile device as I land.

Just flew to London and back for a Whirlwind family wedding. While Cathay Pacific doesn't have as many bells and whistles as the top couple airlines,repeatedly ( have flown with them four times) get marks for getting to the destination promptly even making up time when late and getting everyonme on board quickly yet politely.
I noticed a young mum...

标题: A comforting travel experiece every time.
内容: I travel Cathay Pacific to Hong Kong a few times a year and travelled to Europe for the first time with Cathay in September. The Premium Economy seats are great, without the added expense of travelling Business Class. The extra leg room and the wider seats, when compared to economy class, allows one to relax and certainly get some vital...

First of all, we are happy on board of this flight due good services provided, especially flight attendant Fred. However CX shifted their checkin counter to T4 & economy class can only perform by automation boarding card/baggage checkin. It's inconvenient to seniors & families. Human interactive processing is faster than this automated system. Many passengers have to re-do the boarding...

The personal space was good, the service was good, I only ate the starter for dinner and it was good. The breakfast was not so good ― why do airlines persist in offering omelette when you can’t provide a good omelette in the air? The lie-flat bed was better than many in that its design avoided putting the junction of...
My first flight with this airline. A pleasant surprise after a previous flight with another airline. Everything about the airline was great. I look forward to more flights with this company.
reliable, no delay, friendly staff/crew, good choices of food, comfortable seats, drinks and beverages are available throughout the flight.

Many overseas flights from Australia originate from the adjacent capital city if your a regional dweller (in our case Cairns). For us that involves a long trip south before heading north again to a Singapore or Dubai, etc: a waste of time and expense. Cathay Pacific now provides direct flights to Hong Kong (and return). We earlier tried the Silk...

标题: foods good but not the entertainments
内容:
Nothing much out of ordinary at all.
All as it should but just the entertainments were a little bit out dated.
Foods were better then regular airlines services provided by the crews were very good.

Average at best
seats not comfortable
service is missing as in you can never find anyone
food is just average
short haul maybe ok for less than 2 hours but this was a shock to see the poor level of service on this flight

标题: If you have to fly 15 hours to Asia fly Cathay
内容: In the last 4 years I have taken this flight about 12 times. If you are traveling the the east coast to anywhere in SE Asia this is the best option and from HK you can connect to anywhere. Cathay service is top notch and the setup of the plane and staff are excellent. I have flown both economy and...

The worst flight ever on my life, the crew was really irreverent with everybody, the A/C into the airplane doesn't work properly, bad food, the cleanness of the airplane was really bad, for sure I'll never take any flight with this Airline.

标题: The worst out of so many times
内容: This is not the first time that I take Cathay. I started to become a Macro Polo member since 211. This is the worst time out of all. The crews are nice, but until when was about to arrived at Heathrow airport, one of the toilet was broke. The queue was like crazy, one of the crew was keep pushing...

Great flight, superb service, great food too !
Air crew went above and beyond, one of the best long haul business flight out there.

The Pier Lounge is very good, spacious & comfort. Inflight fruit plate good! Breadfast dim sum is cold, I ask the crew is it serve as cold, or why it's cold, then she take it to reheat and return back to me. I just feel it's unacceptable & ridiculous. It should be easy to handle & no chance to let...

I prefer flying Cathay than Qantas. The Cathay crew have excellent work attitude, manners and service. They always have customers' satisfaction first in their mind. I can tell by observing them at work. Food is always of good quality and presentation. Toilets are clean. The pilots are so professional. When the plane descends and finally touches down, it is really...

标题: Good choice to go HK taking this flight
内容:
Food not bad. The service is good. Ample of drinks to choose from. Quite up todate movies for selection viewing. Flight take off/ landed not delay.
However, not many selection of movies.

Flight performed on the Airbus A35-9. A very nice and quiet aircraft with nice seats, descent legroom and nice Inflight Entertainment.
Nice crew and catering onboard and the aircraft is able to keep a lower cabin pressure than other similar aircraft, which leaves you better rested upon arrival

Would like to complement the service of a cheerful air hostess, Cindy, on this flight. During the whole journey whenever she was serving, she was in a pleasant state with nice smile, patiently attended to my requests and responded in good time and manner. Nowadays, we seldom encounter this kind of service on most flights.

It's always great to fly with Cathay. Since the last 5 years, this carrier is my top choice when visiting Hongkong. Very comfort seat with many choices of onboard entertainment. The food is good and the service provided by cabin crew is more than expected.
Last 2 years, they changed their meal pack from very high class paper box to...
标签: Asia' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Hong Kong

标题: Getting the best for your dollars.
内容:
From the moment you check in you know you are going to be well looked after throughout your flight.
Once on board the flight attendants make sure you are comfortable and the seats are well maintained. Thought the flight you don't fell that you are a bother like you do on some flights. You are left alone if you want...

Cathay Pacific airlines
I had the chance to travel by Cathay airlines in October. Even though it was a long flight I found it comfortable in the economy class seat. Their service on board was polite and sufficient.
I particularly appreciated the attention to help the seniors who need assistance from the check-in to the gate on departure and back...

The service is professional albeit a bit grim. Paying extra for business class one would assume one would be treated more welcoming. The pillows are not in a plastic/protective covering so one doesnt know if it had been used by previous passengers. Cleanliness of seat/surroundings is lacking. The food is terrible especially for the Western palate. Lastly, the cabin crew...

Been with Cathay Pacific many years ago, and not disapointed. I wanted to go to Phnom Penh, Cambodia from U.K. and in recent years; several other options have started. This trip via Hong Kong was inexpensive; as compared to prices i've viewed in previous years. The service was excellent; drinks food adequate, and the TV service was the best i've...

标题: Good service for a relativley short flight
内容:
For a short inter regional flight, it is great to have a fully lie flat sleeper seat - especially as I had just transferred to the flight from Europe and was tired.
It was an older slightly worn looking 777-3ER and was full, probably as this flight goes on to SIN after BKK.
Staff were friendly and efficient, breakfast was...

标题: safe flight is the most important thing above all
内容: my hub and I always took Cathay to everywhere they destinate to cuz my hub have a serious problem about taking a flight, serious acrophobia and Dooda. So every time we need to travel the world, he will choose CA and the plane model like 777 or 77W to get a safer flight himself. CA maybe not the best service...

This flight had the old business class seats - but despite this the trip was very smooth and comfortable. Cathay is always a reliable airline - with efficient service and good quality food. The lounge they use in Amsterdam is the BA lounge which is awful - we left for a nicer cafe in the airport. I do wish Cathay...

Firstly, this service uses what I believe to be the best aircraft in the skies today C the Airbus A35. Quiet, smooth, sense of space and pressurised to 5, to 6, feet which protects your body and means you arrive feeling physically much better.
The cabin crew were excellent, responsive and friendly. Always addressed you by name.
The wines were...

标题: Worth to fly on Cathay's business class
内容: Cathay Pacific offer a nice catering service , also the crew was really efficiency. From ground to air, this airline provide an outstanding service.

Having recently relocated to Hong Kong, I heard great reviews about Cathay Pacific and their customer service and so we decided on a direct connection for a weekend getaway. We booked our seats and were informed to call the airline to add the infant. So I did, to be informed that our seat reservation would be reimbursed as we needed...
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - Cebu Island

内容: I enjoyed the flight experience as a whole. It was very comfortable and clean, with good choices of in-flight entertainment. The food selection is good as well. I can only comment that the male flight attendant assigned to our cabin was not smiling the whole time and was giving me the look as if it was my first time to...

It's a good journey. However, Cathay should upgrade their aircraft. Certain flight been upgrade to A35-9 for this route but still many flights in this route are using A33 or 773. We pay for the signature Cathay Pacific business class seats but return is old fixtures of business class seats. No privacy during the trips.

On my flight from BNE to HKG, I bought some duty free makeup, on the book, it comes with a sample of the same brand, they told me it’s out of stock, gave me a perfume instead and when I got home and opened it, there’s nothing in it, it’s just basically an empty bottle!! Other than this the flight...

Cathay is very strict about checkin luggage capacity. What was very disappointing is that they charge for even 1 kg excess and any weight above 4kgs for a business class traveller , they refuse to checkin the luggage till some luggage is offloaded in a seperate cardboard box. Inflight services are average including food options. Air Stewards are polite and...

Overall a very disappointing flight. Late departure without any explanation. Quality of food was so poor that it was inedible. On two legs of this journey our preferred meal was not available. Almost no consideration to passenger's needs.
the flight attendents are very nice and polite, she keeps smiling and patience to everyone, even in busy, that make us very appreciate and have a happy flight
wonderful new bird with very good entertainment system...the seat has more space in width when you are lying down by comparing with other models’ business class... don’t hesitate to choose A35 :)

I’m a great supporter of Cathay Pacific, but I can not rate their Maldives flight from Hong Kong a 5star service! In general the flight service as the usual as one can expect from Cathay, however on this flight from Hong Kong to Male the airline only serves one Meal. This is a long stretch for only one meal and...

The "flight" started at check in, when I inquired about an upgrade. I am a OneWorld Sapphire, and have been offered both paid and free upgrades on CX. I was told that economy was full, and business was relatively empty, but it was too soon to tell. At the gate, just prior to boarding, I was told that none were...

This airline is good. This is the second time I flown from JFK with Cathay Pacific. The first time was a disaster but the other part of my time on the airline was good so I decided to book again. I like this airline. The food is good and so is the service.
I like they offer wine and other...

标题: Excellent service, departing and arriving on time
内容:
An excellent, though tiring, journey, with a brief stopover at Hong Kong. Business lounge facilities in Sydney provided by Qantas. In Hong Kong, there are several business lounges, with various facilities. In Hong Kong, the lounges were considerably further away from the eventual departure gate, leading us to be almost the last to board.
As a fairly tall person, I...

what to say? Its just a pleasure flying with this company. Good seat in business class, you can recline it and sleep as a bed. Very good service and lots of care and kindness from the hostess.
Very clean plane and nice entertainment on board.
good selection of latest movie for all the ages and interest in all the language....

标题: 11 hour trip improved by space in Premium Economy
内容: 1st time I’ve flown with Cathay and quite impressed by them. Premium economy cabin is 2-4-2 format, so good for couples who manage to book window seats, but less good for those in the middle. Normal PE perks like more legroom and better sear recline, pre takeoff drinks, early boarding/exit. It’s worth having a look at the seat map for...

we flew the midnight flight out if Perth and arrived in Hong Kong at 7.3. The flight crew were excellent .Our next flight was a long one to Vancouver a total of 12 hours and I couldn't believe we would get a better flight crew but we did.THANK YOU Cathay Pacific

This airline’s Premium Economy is OK but well short of our experience with Air New Zealand. Given the extra cost over Economy, the fact that they ran out of our menu choice was unacceptable. Could not recommend Cathay Pacific Premium Economy. If you fly with them, save your money and just go regular Economy.

A comfortable, modern aircraft. Excellent cabin crew and service. Good technology, food/drink and food service. A good nights sleep and swift embarkation at destination.
Very good Business airport lounge at H/Row

For a long haul from Hong Kong to JFK, I prefer a direct non-stop flight. Some airline stops in Tokyo, some in Vancouver, but nothing can beat the Cathay Pacific CX 83. It leave HK at 9:3am and arrive JFK same day at 1:2pm. Fifteen hours may seem a very long flight. I have taken CX business class flights before,...
