标题: Staff were good but cramped seats
内容: Firstly, I am not a big person and dont really care about airline food. I usually fly budget airlines however this time chose cathay pacific thinking comfort would be better plus included meals and checked luggage. Also schedule suited me better so paid 25% more for fare. Sadly expectations were not met - seats were cramped and food was no...

I had always heard how wonderful and special Cathay Pacific Airlines was. Well what a disappointment. I don't know what the opposite of pampered is but that was the way I was treated.
From the hot towel that is given you- which proved not to be hot and barely moist- to the few dreary meals offered the trip was terrible....

标题: While their service is still reasonable, we experienced pretty disappointing food on this recent flight
内容: I have been travelling with Cathay Pacific for many years. Have been a diamond member for a couple of years and then in recent years, because of their change of club point system and my less frequent business flights because I retired, I have been downgraded to Gold membership in the past four years. Their food has usually been OK...

Great flight, very smooth. This was a direct flight over the Arctic and we could watch the flight path from start to finish. The attendants provided great service. The choice and quality of the food was also good. Lots of choice on what to watch - movies, shows, music - in both English and in Chinese

The Cathay Pacific service on board this A33-3 aircraft was excellent and the Economy Class seat was comfortable. Nonetheless, I thought it was highly overpriced considering the relatively short length of the flight and the fact that I’d booked it some time in advance.
I was due to fly on from Taipei to Fukuoka, Japan with Cathay Pacific but, to...

标题: Very comfortable even for 6ft 4inch person and good value
内容: The non-stop Cathay flight from London Heathrow to Hong Kong represented excellent value for money at under ￡48 for a return that includes leaving from Bangkok to Hong Kong before the London leg. At 6'4" I was still comfortable although luckily the person in front didn't full recline their seat. The food was just OK and the in-flight entertainment was...

Comfortable flights in premium economy - typical Cathay in-flight service , good food & beverages , excellent attention from cabin staff.Seats were wide & reclined nicely to enable a comfortable position. As a frequent long haul flyer I can honestly say I have never had a bad flight with Cathay (usually in Business or Premium Economy). It pains me to...

Best seating arrangements we've come across with one by each window, two in the middle. We always seat one behind the other so we both have wi Dow views but can still communicate. Service and food always good as is the film options available.

Haven't flown Cathay for awhile ,I usually fly Qantas but the service has dropped and the leg room in economy is like a sardine in a tin. Cathay planes had more room to move in economy and the food was great, a pleasant surprise. The price is a fraction more for economy but worth the money on a long flight.

I travelled on 4 flights recently with this airline but the flight attendants on this particular flight. were comical to say the least. They appeared to be on a mission to see how fast the meals could be distributed. They then proceeded to start collecting rubbish before the meals had been finished.
Duty free offers were presented with a hostess...
What a pleasure to fly with them again. The service was great, the seats comfortable, service good and the food was fine.
Great customer service where the staff are so helpful and ready to help at any time. On board medi is quiet good and meals are really good .

标题: Best airline I have ever tried
内容: Flew CP from London to Hong Kong and from Hong Kong to Brisbane in January 217. Have since flown with both Emirates, Thai Airways and Etihad Airways, but I maintain that economy on CP is the best (though Emirates is close). The seats are comfortable, the in-flight entertainment system selection was both broad and deep, and our cabin crew were...
very capable and helpful staff. very attentive too, ever willing to serve snacks as soon as any passengers are awake.

Not a bad Premium Economy. Seats recline in a way that one can catch some sleep. Seat configuration is 2-4-2. Since the flight was not fully booked some of the centre rows were entirely free and became a long 18 degrees bed for some passengers who relocated seats after take off.
Highs:
good enough seat recline to have a nap...

标题: To Hong Kong and Gatwick London
内容: Only one issue, on the way I was asked to move but I had to sit at the front next to a Mother and two children which is ok but I like my cabin bag with me because my medicine is handy and also I couldn't watch the tv Also I had a problem checking in online both ways because...
Although this was a very long flight, it was made much easier by flying Business Class. The Flight Attendants, the food and to top it all off the flat bed for a good sleep made all the difference.

Flew via Hong Kong layover to Delhi was a bit long! Hong Kong was a very big airport but plenty of amenities.Cathay have several lounges and of a high standard.We had showers and relaxing time had.The service for disabled was first rate.

标题: Cathay Pacific can not be beaten by other airlines
内容: Aircraft is the latest model, spotless clean, ground and cabin crew are very professional, helpful and very friendly. Even with the mass production of meals, they still taste amazing and hot. After many other airline experiences, nothing comes close to perfection like Cathay Pacific.

标题: First time for a 12 hour flight from Vancouver to Hong Kong on flights for the past 17 years.
内容:
Excellent flights.
Vancouver to Hong Kong arrival 1 hour early. Service & cabin superb.
Flight to Chiangmai Mai with Cathay Dragon on time; only negative was cabin temperature uncomfortably hot.
I rate Cathay Pacific one of the very best airlines world wide.

The business class setup is as you would expect, private space, space to work, flat bed. The food is better than average and service of food and drinks as one would expect. Check in and lounges are easy and comfortable. My only issue is that I am happy to serve myself with drinks, the bar service lacks some variety and...

Like all airlines the leg room as gotten shorter - but the service was great - better food then on most airlines - be careful of the weight of your carry on they are strict and may make you check it -

标题: Time to renew the lounge and plane
内容:
The ground crew in check in counter cool face with ritualistic manner, even did not describe how to access the business lounge. It was the poorest experience in my business class check in.
Business lounge (the Wing) in HKIA served with hot noodles and food. Plenty of drink and alcohol. The furniture and decoration a bit of old, especially compared...

标题: Budget catering on a so-called world class operator
内容: When flying on a 2hour+ flight, you would expect to be served decent food on an operator like CX - but the catering on the MNL service is simply unacceptable - and it has been the last couple of years. This my wife and I decided to go for Economy Plus to get the extra leg space and better catering....

What a joy to fly this airline. Had heard about Cathay's legendary service and it did not disappoint. From the champagne as soon as we boarded, to the amenity bags, from the in-flight entertainment to the food with a choice of entrees, it was all fabulous. The flight attendants were warm, professional and went above and beyond to make our...
Comfortable economy class. Great service from hostesses. Good flight from NZ to Europe, as split the journey pretty equally by landing in Hong Kong.

标题: Still Good But Little bit down Compared to early days
内容: Its the same service but feel like they are trying to economise in there meals, Its not bad and not complaining, but feel the comparative difference from the past .
From check-in to luggage pick-up at end the experience was first class.Service was very polite and accomodateing.Meals were very good and filling.Would recommend to anyone.

I was concerned since this was our first long haul flight experience. It was awesome. Was in business class in the lay flat seats. Service was good and they fed us twice on this 16 hour flight. I would say the seats could be softer. I still had some achiness after the flight but was more comfortable overall on this...

Although we had a problem leaving Shanghai and missing our connection in Hong Kong we were very well looked after with an overnight stay in HK with accommodation, breakfast and lunch on the airline before boarding another flight home. Staff in HK were very helpful in trying to re-schedule us.

标题: Cathay - First Choice Way to Fly
内容: I always choose Cathay whenever I fly. They are flexible, helpful, pleasant, efficient and have generally customer-friendly policies. Service on board is very quietly attentive and personable and I have never experienced a bad flight with them on the many legs I've done. One downside of late I need to mention. You used to be able to hold a reservation...

标题: A good pleasant airline to travel with well trained crew
内容: Flew from Penang to Hong Kong, then to Taiwan, then to Pudong, then to Hong Kong again and last back to Penang. No single hick up. Luggage arrived together with the passenger at all time. Cabin crew always nice and polite. Good choices of in-flight entertainment. Only thing that get me bore is the food. Wish to have more choices,...

标题: In and out of my local airport EWR - could not ask for more.
内容: Cathay Pacific (CX) is an unknown airline unless your a seasoned traveler. They operate 4 x daily JFK-HKG and 1 x daily (13 hrs ETD) from my local airport Newark (EWR). Cannot praise them enough, the config allows all bizclass pax to have aisle access, very private seat- full bed option - great food and AV system. U will not...

I was very impressed with the whole cathay Pacific experience. First of all was the ease in booking. No hassle to get tickets via internet and they immediately inserted the promo code with discount. The check in was also easy via online and even on the ground. Service counter agents were friendly and helpful. The plane was very modern and...

We have returned to Cathay as they run daytime flights. Service was wonderful, staff friendly and very helpful. Meals were excellent. The inflight entertainment was good although there were less traditional films offered than on other airlines but a wide range of Asian films available. Space in the seats was good and the floor space was not restricted by control...

We are senior citizens, frequent flyers to SFO. Tried Cathay Pacific this time for a change.
Due to a painful limp I ask for a wheelchair. In Delhi I was provided one. But at Hong Kong I was told that the Delhi Office did not include my name in the list for wheelchairs. So I was told to get off...

I have never flown Cathay Pacific before and never will again. We left Melbourne for Hong Kong with a connecting flight to Guangzhou to follow. Started to take off when we braked and the captain said we needed to return to the gate as they had miscounted the number of people on board. It took an hour before we were...

Flew Cathay Pacific from Amsterdam to Hong Kong and this was a great leg of our journey. We had exit row seats with no one next to us which allowed plenty of leg space (sorely needed).
The menu options were fantastic with a wide variety available, usually some sort of seafood, other meat(chicken) or vegetarian option.
Staff were friendly and...

标题: I didn't want to get off the plane
内容: Just a wonderful experience from start to finish, astonishingly comfortable for a 15 hour flight. The seats are so comfortable and they recline enough to sleep comfortably. The food is very tasty and more than enough. The service is very attentive and pleasant. I highly recommend premium economy. On a long flight it is worth every penny as compared to...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
Well this was the first time with them, Bad service from the BNE terminal as it is a self check in from the start then we had to line up again around the other side to do it all again. this was frustrating!.
We then noticed that this airline has no room at all between the seat like Virgin,Qantas,Singapore AL....

标题: Worst experience of flying that I have ever had.
内容: I flew from Cairns to Hong Kong then Barcelona. The flight from HK to Barcelona was particularly bad. I had a rude and inconsiderate passenger next to me with her young son. She "climbed over me" when I was snoozing. She fed her son rice out of a plastic bag. He vomited. The airline staff generally were inefficient. I went...

After our last couple of flights with QANTAS, I sat in my Cathay Pacific seat and thought wow, there is so much more room on this flight. The seat was very comfortable which meant that trying to sleep was better than on most other airlines we have travelled with. The meals were very good and they were actually tasty which...

The room to stretch out for a six foot three inch chap was there. Service was faultless. Cabin crew are friendly.
Meals were just great

This was my first international flight & I was surprised at how comfortably we travelled (after hearing the travel horror stories from friends). We travelled in premium economy and had plenty of room to stretch out (I'm 6'2) and be comfortable. The meals were great, as was the service from the crew. I'll fly with this airline again.

Could not recommend all aspects of our flight highly enough. Wonderful personal caring service, great food, very comfortable seats and made to feel special. Another important factor was the very reasonable price of flying business class with C.P.

标题: Ok flight got me from a to b
内容: Have flown business class before although not with this airline so we tried premium economy. You get a drink upon take off and the hot towels and the seat definitely has comfortable leg room. The seats didn't feel any wider than economy and I still felt cramped and the earphone socket is at the side of the seat which is...

标题: One of the best in Asia
内容: Lovely new A35-9 with huge leg room, confortable seats, newest multimedia system and tail camera. Service is outstanding, snacks and drinks all available. No delays, everything went so smootly :)
Comfortable flight offering good service. Food was good with plenty of snacks and water on offer. A good range of flight entertainment and the flight landed early.

This is the way flying used to be. We were not only provided with exceptional service, the seats, legroom, entertainment and food were top notch. They provided a menu for meals. I have not seen that happen on domestic airlines in decades, unless it has a price list attached.
They even had soup and noodles that could be requested at...

Cathay Pacific service was absolutely impeccable from the time we arrived at the check-in until we departed the aircraft. We were greeted by name upon being seated and received great service throughout the flight. The pod was very comfortable and roomy for sleeping with a great entertainment system. Food and beverages were second to none.
The airport lounges were also...

One of the last Cathay Pacific Boeing 777 with a 3-3-3 seat configuration. Comfortable seats with plenty of space, good service, food and wine. Only problem is this layout is due to be changed to. 3-4-3 as I understand!

标题: comfortable seating during long flight from chicago to manila
内容: first time flying this airline. impressed with professionalism of staff and comfort of seating. return flight was two hours less than scheduled. highly recommend this airline.

The stewards and stewardesses service was courteous and efficient.
Would definitely recommend flying with Cathay Pacific.

Really brilliant flight from take of to landing, although a very long flight, we were looked after very well by cabin staff and they were at our beck and call if needed all through the night with a warm smile and so helpful.

Long haul flight which usually enjoy,but not on this flight. The plane was very outdated and tired looking.The entertainment was not a problem but the stewardesses made you feel bad when you asked for anything, especially when others were asleep. They also ran out of snacks which was frustrating as I was starving.But I can honestly say ibwont travel with...

I had two great flights with Cathay in November. Luckily for me the first leg from Heathrow to Hong Kong was quite empty so for the first time in years I had 3 seats to myself which was wonderful. My requests for aisle seats (as I am very tall) were met and the service and comfort was good, well as...

Very good service, drinks prior to take off as well as refresher towels, seating was comfortable and with a little more room than economy, meal was served with choice from menu and actual cutlery, not plastic. Overall a good flight, pleasant, friendly flight staff plane was clean, well presented.

标题: Good flight but check-in expereince not good.
内容: Check-in at HK airport was shambolic with long queues and staff running around like headless chickens. While we accept that things go wrong, we were taken aback by the rudeness of young man that checked us in - no acknowledgement when we said hello, no pleases or thank you and a permanent scowl. We complained to Cathay but received only...

标题: Good flight experience with smiling faces
内容: Flight attendants were energetic and friendly. When I called for a cup of red wine, the attendant promptly approached with respectful eye contact. Moreover, the meal was just acceptable but the size was satisfied. I had seen a halal meal set ordered by a Muslim lady sitting close to me, its smell was very attractive. After the meal, I had...

标题: Cathay have almost got it right!
内容:
I loved how easy checkin was. I loved the Club services at Gatwick (really yummy breakfast)
The only hiccups were at Hong Kong stopover with the Club services being far far too crowded and complimentary food fairly ordinary and the walk from arrival gate to departure gate took 25 minutes

标题: Good inflight service, connecting flight and checked baggage policy.
内容:
We flew with Cathay Pacific to Denpasar, Bali, with a layover of three hours in Hong Kong.
Good inflight service and we arrived on time in Hong Kong with plenty of time to look for the location/waiting room of the following flight to Denpasar, Bali.
The fact that passenger in the Economy class has the option to carry two pieces...

I recently took 4 flights with Cathay Pacific on a holiday to Japan via Hong Kong. I'm a frequent traveller but this was my first experience with CP, I normally fly the flag with BA. In comparing the same class of service and long haul flights, I would say that Cathay have the edge. their staff on board were very...

Regular flight, everything you require for the price paid.
My wife follows a gluten free diet, and her meals where some of the best she has been served.
However understandably all the differing dietary options are served first, which resulted in my wife and I never eating together!

I flew Cathay Pacific from London to Sydney, changing planes at Hong Kong. Whilst the trip was as good or bad as most other airlines, what really annoyed was that for half of the meals I took, my first choice from the menu was gone. These menus don't change much from flight to flight so surely they know what the...

This was the second leg of a journey that started in Adelaide, in every way this was a most positive experience, the self check in makes things easier, the service is first class and the cabin was clean, fresh and had enough leg room!

标题: Run of the mill long haul flight
内容:
This was our first flight with Cathay Pacific and I was expecting something out of the ordinary but not so. Seats were average space and the food catered for Asian and European tastes. No complimentary socks,eye shade etc. In flight entertainment was excellent.
Staff were very good and attentive.
No significant issues at all. Flight on time, staff polite and helpful, quality of food and drink VG. An extremely hassle free experience.

The flight from Frankfurt to Hong Kong was comfortable, the service friendly and attentive. I did enjoy a relaxing flight although the food was not to be compared with f.e. Austrian, but still ok. Totally different then the flight from Hong Kong to Denpasar. The plane was quite an old one. At least the seats and the whole set up...
An average airline. Legroom space is little less and seats are not that comfortable. Food served was okay okay. Veg Hindu meal does not have much options. Staffs are friendly and helpful.

From boarding to departing the plane was a great relaxing flight. There was a good range of new movies to watch that I had wanted to see. The food options were fabulous and tasty and of very good quality. The seating was very comfortable and I slept well. Great having individual pod type seats as I was travelling by myself....

The flight was delayed departing owing to en-route congestion which was not the fault of the airline. I much prefer the day flight as I find that it causes less jet lag. Catering was good although the mid flight snacks in the galley could have been more substantial and the service was good. The seats were comfortable although I understand...

Cathay Pacific in my words is an excellent airline, Throughout my whole journey I was in comfort even in economy class. Economy class had a decent amount of leg room & the entertainment options were not bad either. I specially requested the Muslim meal option 48hrs before departure & was really satisfied with what I got. At the push of...
Easy check in u can do it much earlier... Easy bag drop. Adequate plane seats sufficient leg room. Cabin staff helpful and pleasant. Flight smooth and on time.

We took a late night flight arriving just before 5am. There was the usual chaos in boarding, but we eventually got on OK. Everything went pretty much as expected given the class we had booked. Seats were OK but a bit cramped. I had ordered a special meal which arrived before everyone else was served- in some ways this is...
The flight was fantastic it was the first time we had gone business class the experience was great. I cannot fault Cathy Pacific the staff were brilliant all the way to Australia.
We my family always use cathay pacific everytime we go back to the philippines ..there services are amazing from food to assistance i cant wait for my next flight with cathay see yah

标题: More than 15hrs flight with 2 kids... and everything went very well!
内容: Before departure, we called Cathay to tell them that we would be traveling with 2 children (6 months and 5 years). They offered us priority boarding and places at the front of the section (lot of legroom!) because it is possible to put a bassinet for the baby. The bassinet is provided by Cathay and was fixed by a flight...

This flight is always full - because it suits everybody very well for timing. Cathay have upped their game, having slipped quite badly for a couple a years in terms of quality (food and drink) and quantity - after paring down cabin attendants it's now back to more than adequate - indeed, very good.

Because the vulcano eruption my original flight was cancelled. Cathay rebooked me to other flights, all with reasonable good information through my mail.. Flights were on on time and food is good. Pitty there is no dinner on demand. Cabin staff is friendly and helpful.
The "bridge"in HKG was busy and had not enough seats to spend a good Leisure...

标题: Long flight but comfortable seats even in coach
内容: The flight was just under 16 hours but even in economy the seats were larger than most economy seats and there was ample leg room. The service was great, especially on our return flight. The food was good. I would definitely fly this airline again on my next flight to southeast Asia. I have been on other airlines fora similar...

Travelling with Titan on Grand Tour of Asia. My wife has an egg allergy which was declared to Titan who passed the information on to Cathay ( I contacted Cathay before the flight who confirmed that they had the information). On the 12 hour flight no provision had been made for a meal for my wife so she had a...

Disappointed with the allocated seats which were by the exit. This meant that there was no window and the TV and trays were in the arm and there was nowhere to store small items (ie no seatback storage in front) It also meant that the flight crew would regularly kick my foot when passing thereby waking me up. As it...

Very polite and helpful stewards/stewardesses. Self-service mid-night snacks (chocolate, museli bars and fruits) available. Check-through luggage from Milan to Sydney which was convenient when transiting in Hong Kong. If you have a few hours to spend, then it might be a good idea to spend it at a nearby suburb of Tung Chung (sight-seeing, shopping). It is less than 3...
Great service very helpful staff long flight but made it a pleasant on thanks Cathay will definitely use them again

Been flyingwith cathay pacific for s4vetal times.
this time the turbelence was really bad but was handled efficiently and safely.
From boarding to the end of the flight everything is very good

Chennai check in was good. Flight was clean and neat. I got the aisle seat and the leg space for a 6 foot tall person like me was good. Food was neat and good. Compared to some airlines this was better.

Pleased to be able to fly direct from Manchester to Hong Kong. We were flying in a very new plane and everything was clean. The seat configuration was 3:3:3 and we were in the middle block. Leg room was more spacious than some flights we have been on. Cabin staff were friendly polite and helpful. Good selection of films and...

标题: Premium economy - not worth the money
内容: Having travelled to Australia in economy for the last 2 years with BA and Emirates, I thought I would explore options other than economy for this year’s trip. Business class was too expensive and so I looked for premium economy options (Cathay, BA and Singapore). I was surprised to discover that not many airlines offer premium economy for this route....
Very good staff, seats fairly comfortable for a 12 hour flight. Films though were a little old compared to competitors. Food ok

标题: best deal from bkk to sgp
内容: This flight in Business class was cheaper than Thai air eco. I would only believe it, when we were on the flight and in the air....

标题: good staff, planes a little bit cramped
内容:
12 hours estimated flight time in a 777-3ER with 3+4+3 setup.
Legroom was not good (I'm 1,77m). Once you sit down you your knees touch the seat infront.
Enterainment system was okay but not great. screen can only move upwards a little bit. One the person infront of you leans back you'll have a weird viewing angle.
Movie selection was...

标题: Very attentive and good food and snacks throughout the flight
内容: Cathay was very good - we joined the MarcoPolo Club and the Lounge facilities in Hong Kong were amazing, Gorgeous showers, great food. The flight was also very good, nice food, attentive staff and all in all a pleasant flight. Lost bags were quickly located and returned to us.

Right from hte chaeck in desk to boarding this is a tremendous experience. A warm welcome and relaxed atmosphere created by the CP staff ensures a stress free time.
Once boarded the relaxed atmospere continues, with almost personalised service for comfort with blankets and pillows, instruction on how to use the tv screen and the flat bed. When meals are...

标题: To Sydney,return from Auckland cattle class
内容: Trip was to Sydney then a cruise and back from Auckland. Check ins throughout were OK.Flights out and back were via HK. Trepidation was high on check in as my wife's middle name not on some papers but all OK. Prior to departure airline hopeless at resolving this.Economy class is dreadful for flights of this length,I would never do this...

Great Service, using the latest planes since I believe such an important business route. Even economy the services available were great, huge film choice, books, magazines, music and access to the internet all available. Food was also very good we thought. Quite a reasonable amount of leg room available too.

标题: Disappointed Not the airline they used to be
内容: We had flown with the airline in the late 198's on many occasions and were more than pleased with the experience. This last trip in September was very disapponting and there were many aspects that left a lot to be desired. The food for the class we were in has run out of a selection of the food for premium...
There is a noticeable difference in each class. The ultra attentiveness of the stewards is not there. If you understand the airline, you can get the best of your ride.
The experience was wonderful! The stewards were very attentive,and they gave great service. They make you feel special!
Lovely Airline Service First Class and Food excelant would not hesitate to fly again with Cathay Pacific

标题: My first time on Cathay Pacific
内容: Seating was comfortable; the stewards were respectful and the food was great! O yes, I was grateful for those warm rags!
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
FLYING FOR THE FIRST TIME (AND LAST) WITH CATHAY. I WAS LOOKING FORWARD TO THE FLIGHT. However it didn't take long to realise that I had made a mistake. Seated in the last row of premium economy class, I immediately had doubts when my welcome drink finally arrived in a plastic cup. They had run out of glasses.
Although the...
Flying business class made this journey an extension of the holiday. Fantastic service, delicious menu and a fully reclining chair within your own pod.

标题: Comfortable flying experience with affordable price
内容:
Warm hospitality.
Comfortable flying experience.
On time flying schedule.
Attentive staff.
Good meals.

Traveled from Hong Kong to Adelaide with Cathay Pacific, this being the first time I had flown with them, and must say that the service was excellent, even though our cases did not arrive in Adelaide with us. However the Cathay Pacific staff at Adelaide were very efficient and our cases were delivered to our sons house by 9: the...

I was supposed to fly with another airline, but the flight was canceled. So I had to find another airline, and Cathay was the only choice left. First the price was equivalent to the price for the other airline, so I was happy that I did not have to pay extra. The check-in was quick and Cathay already had my...

First time flying on Cathay Pacific. More legroom than I was expecting and a comfortable seat. The range of films available were good. Cabin service was friendly with a choice of meals. The only thing I missed was any night pack.

Was via Hong Kong. It's ok - no better no worse than the others. Return was Chicago to HK to Perth. Got the premium economy on the Chicago to HK return - at no little cost. Don't waste your money - seat in front still comes back into your face!

I have flown CX since 1982. There had been so many times CX had failed me. Business class upgrade coupons then to be demoted back to economy at the point of boarding. Cancelling flights due to typhoon when no other airlines cancelled their flights that day (CX, you remembered that a while back! It was a pilot strike!) I haven't...

Used this airline for a return trip to Hong Kong with my husband and two teenage children to visit our daughter.
We have never flown a long haul flight before, and cannot fault the whole experience with Cathay Pacific.
The staff were lovely and the food was SO good!
Leg room was a bit tight but expected in economy class....

Having never flown with Cathay Pacific previously and being on my own with 2 children doing a long haul flight, I can say I was a tad anxious. But I didn't need to be. From check in to transfer at Hong Kong to Manchester the staff were faultless. Ii had been advised that (as many airlines are) Cathay are Autism...

I flew out early Sunday morning to Mactan Island, Cebu at 8.3 am after doing a 24 hour shift .I was very tired but Hong Kong Airport and Cathay just make everything so easy. No diificulties, just a high level of professionalism that you know you can rely on. I flew back the same day at 8.3 pm with my...
Flight was a very enjoyable even if it was long haul . On time and no delays. Food and service was very good, no complaints .

标题: Lousy service, smelly cabin, close toilet
内容:
I was utterly disappointed with the recent flight home from Hong Kong to Singapore.
The Cathay stewardess are constantly chatting amongst themselves. They looked as though we owed them debt.
There was a boy who had diarrhoea on the flight and there was no stewardess assisting the distraught family and the smell was throughout the whole plane. To make matters...

标题: Very comfortable both before and during flight
内容: Check in was smooth and fast. Business class lounge was welcoming and amply stocked with food and drinks. When on board, the seat was very comfortable, and private. Meal was first class. I did find it difficult to reach the TV control, due to the positioning of my seat. Airline staff were very efficient and quite friendly.

标题: Execellent service from flight crew, good food and quite a pleasant flight
内容: Boarding was efficient and the crew was very helpful in getting passengers to store their carry-ons to the overhead compartments. I find that the Cathay flight crew in general has one of the best service attitude in the airline industry and on this flight, no different. They are attentive, polite, patient and professional. I find also on the other hand,...

i flew form Manchester to Hong Kong then onward to Beijing and then back again - both flights were on time and boarding was done swiftly and efficiently. even though i flew economy it was comfortable my knees had space in front which is a good thing, also when the seat in front was in relax position it didn't infringe...

标题: Always a great airline, cabin staff always very attentive and helpful, no matter which cabin class you fly.
内容: Always prefer to use Cathay Pacific for long and short haul flights, the whole experience is much better than any European or American airline. Better to book online for best price and choice of destination. Since I am from North East England, I use thier service to Manchester, but they also fly to Heathrow and Gatwick if you live in...

标题: One of the Best Airlines I flew with
内容:
For the price we paid we did not expect a "first class" service, but in fact we got it.
The food was awesome, the seats had enough space.
We will fly with them again.

Great trip with Cathay. Food was excellent and the staff were very attentive. Space on board was good and comfortable and the flight was quiet and peaceful.
The only reason for not giving 5 stars is that on both outward and return flights, despite checking in as soon as it opened the seat allocation was nil. All seats were selected...

Our decision to upgrade to Premium Economy for the 8 hour flight was well worth it. Seat comfort and room plus the excellent quality of the meals plus the little extras made such a difference. The cabin crew were very attentive and pleasant. If it wasn't for the fact we could'nt lie down one could be excused for thinking we...
Great flight and service. Got upgraded as the flight was overbooked. Upgraded to First Class. What a lovely treat. Great service etc from staff and very good food.

Service very poor and haphazard. Rude staff. When I asked for a coffee I was interogatted on why as I had had a cup of tea before and they would have to change the cup.service was slow. My wife never even offered a cup of tea once in a 12 hour flight. Poor in relation to our outward flightbwhere the...

As frequent flyers we used the Cathay service to Hong Kong it was a good standard and my request for legroom seating at the airport was delt with to my satisfaction for a fee . Was not happy with the check in on line this can only be done 48hrs before . Also your meal selection is not offered on...

标题: Flight Crew were excellent.Very friendly and efficient
内容: For Long Haul Flights this airline is excellent.The only criticism i have is that the in flight entertainment is not that good.

Cathay has direct flights to almost all of my main business travel destinations - Singapore, Sydney, Melbourne, Tokyo, Toronto, New York and for pleasure, it's Sydney, Adelaide, Vancouver on an annual basis. Therefore, I usually travel with CX. The staff are friendly and helpful. The newer planes are comfortable but once in a while, I luck out with an old...

We flew back from Shanghai to London via Hong Kong on Cathay Pacific in September. The business class upgrade purchased on booking was approx ￡19 per person for this return journey from China. The experience was excellent and well worth the money. Far better than BA our only other recent business class experience. Service was excellent and totally customer focussed....

Out bound flight left on time arrived early, return left late but arrived on time. The first thing I should say is that the seats were very comfortable (old business class seats?) which is so important on such a long flight. I would avoid the front row of Prem Econ on the 777 as passengers have to walk across it...

Cathay have changed our whole idea of travel. My wife and I have always travelled first class and when I came to book this flight, my agent insisted we should travel business class and that we would not be disappointed. He was 1% right. The crew could not have been more courteous and pleasant and the seat was incredibly comfortable....

标题: Lots of space in economy & friendly staff
内容: Good experience, lots of space in economy, staff were friendly & helpful. Only let down was the food - quite plastic-y & tasteless - the pot noodle snack in-between is tasty though & a nice touch. Would definitely fly again

Travelled from Switzerland to Australia, I choosed Cathay Pacific and this was the best choice for the ZRH to HKG to MEL flight. Check in as well as clearing security was very convenient with no queues. F/A did great job and the welcome drink before taxi was the perfect start in our 6 weeks holiday. The 1-2-1 business class seat...

Bid for an upgrade to Premium Economy. Check in and boarding were stress free and a nice glass of bubbles whilst waiting for take off. Seat was comfortable with plenty of leg room. Service was excellent. Whilst a 12 hour flight is still not my idea of fun, Cathay Pacific made it bearable.
Premium economy with Cathy is an excellent way to fly, the really look after you on the flight with drinks on boarding. The food is excellent and the comfort is also excellent.

We fly regular to see family in Oz. having used Quantas /BA and made the mistake of going via the Middle East of late we have chosen Cathay Pacific via Hong Kong where we enjoy a few days. Overall service, punctuality and food have been superior to the other companies and we will be sticking with Cathay from now on.

Superb flight. Great legroom, comfortable seats. Good entertainment. Decent food. Left alone. Cabin lights turned off for sleeping.
Cabin staff excellent.

First time to Israel and I was feeling a little apprehensive. Traveling with my very eccentric brother-in-law, probably didn’t help. As we boarded the cabin crew took all my anxiety away. Service was that of a 5 star hotel or a 3 hat restaurant. (I think those sound about right?!?)
I had all the comforts I needed, plus, when I...

标题: The Stewardess are polite and courteous. Comfortable to sit. The food was great.
内容: Perfect Flight. Highly Recommended.The stewardess was great, cheerful, courteous, comfortable sit with nice film. Nice food too. and mostly we got the cheap flights.

They advertised more leg room than average, but this was not true. When I contacted them they took a long time to get back to me. I said that there was no comfort to be had in economy there response was to tell me to go on line and choose my seats, but you have to pay to do that,...

The staff on the flight were extremely friendly and very willing to help the passenger on board the flight. The seats were comfortable and the food was quite good. Overall I would highly recommend flying with Cathay Pacific for their excellent value for money service

The whole experience was pleasant and the airline staff friendly and courteous.
Requests were handled with the mi I mum of fuss and were very prompt.

This was our first time flying with Cathay Pacific. Loved the Premium Economy. Very comfortable and spacious. Definitely a big difference to flying Economy. We have been spoilt now. Service & food all very good. Only downside we found was the lack of toilet
facilities on board...there was always a queue.

Very happy with our recent flight @ 13.45 29/9 from Frankfurt, Germany to Singapore then onto Sydney - with a reasonable layover in HK - so time to walk around & feel refreshed from the long journey in the airport hotel facilities - before the next leg.
Service was great, crew very pleasant, attention to detail was good & the...

Our first trip to China. Our first trip with Cathay Pacific. What lays ahead of us? The Visa process was a little daunting. Would mine get processed in time? Wife and grand daughter's went through with only one "Speed hump" mine had two. Finally we were seated and on the way to Beijing. Quite comfortable seating for "Cattle Class". Reasonable...

The very best in in meals and service, excellent throughout the flight. Lots of in flight entertainment. Very attentive cabin crew to look after your very need. Will fly Cathy every time I fly to Asia.

Very disappointing when you receive an email telling you your long haul flight is cancelled. Absolute chaos at Shanghai, followed by hours of queuing (party of 2).
Late arrival in Hong Kong meant no connecting flight and very little support.
When we eventually managed to leave HK there was an issue at the check in as we were advised that...

The check in for the flight was very easy. The ground staff very pleasant and helpful.
Seating/Sleeping very comfortable. Meals excellent.
been to Hong Kong 5 times now once Qantas three times with Singapore airlines and the last time was with Cathay pacific we will be flying with Singapore airlines next time

Not Aires seat Still not good

餐c有中式及西式的料理,^W美airline好多了,只是仍要以英文υ橹
