My 1st time flying with Cathy Pacific to HK. Pleasant Flight experience greeted with smile from the Air Stewardess crew.
My coming back to Singapore i am also boarding Cathy, allocated the last row from the flight. When the plane landed Singapore, as i was seated the last row so i went to the ladies. By the time i came...

I used to use Cathay Pacific (CX) for my international travelling, the reason is schedule is convenience, friendly staff, affordable price, comfort aircraft, nice entertainment and always transit in HongKong which I consider as my second home country, love HongKong very much. Sometimes I also use business class and you can get flat bed which is very convenience. Definitely I...

标题: Travelled to Hong Kong en route to new york
内容: Excellent flights both to hong kong and then to New York. Premium economy seats go further back for sleeping than economy. Meals are better and you board after business class. More leg room. Cathay pacific do advertise a glass of champagne on board before leaving. In premium economy . This did not happen in all our trips with Cathay only...
We purchased seats at the front, one tip don’t sit near the toilets people keep treading on you feet

标题: New York to Hong Kong to Perth Autralia
内容: Log haul only 1hrs change over in Hong kong. very good service good meals and first class crew.Only negative was Hong Kong Perth link was an older aircraft however still first rate service. I have flown Cathay Pacific quite a few times over the years and always found them to be first rate.

professional, very helpful when our flight was cancelled from Taipei to Hong Kong due to Typhoon,
Kept informed and rescheduled ASAP.
great service
most leg room I have ever had in economy

I have travelled Economy before and thought I would try premium.
Best thing I could have done. A very comfortable experience that I would recommend to anyone. More room and better service with seats that reclined a lot further back.

I travelled from sydney via Hong Kong to Manchester. Business class well worth the money. So comfortable lay back seat/bed. Great food and flight attendants were great. Felt very comfortable and arrived quite relaxed. Lots of luggage allowence. Definitely would fly with them business again.

标题: Nice smooth flight and earlier arrival than scheduled!
内容: Nice flight experience, from the check in all the way to the baggage reclaim, love the selection of movies on board, food ok and in flight service was corteous and attentive.
Cathay provides good service for economy passengers. Seats, meals, in-flight entertainment, check-in and in-flight service are all very good.

U will not regret this flight.
1 hours of kindness and good service. The plane is big, a room for legs, also to big people, nice and big screens to watch TV, new movies and serious. The food is accually tasty.

We recently travelled to and from Japan via Hong Kong and were very happy with the level of service, the food and the politeness of the flight attendants We are beginning to prefer the Asian airlines above Qantas as earlier in the year we flew to South East Asia with China Southern and were impressed with them too.

Great flight from start to finish! Welcomed by the lovely staff, served food/drink with a smile and noodles during the night at request. Great comfortable seats. Arrived feeling relaxed and in the holiday spirit.

标题: Best to arrive a few hours early on international flight
内容:
Our flight was midnight on 8th October 217. Check in very early about 4 hours before flight. Luggage check in before arrival to HK airport via on line check in.
By 11 pm , we had announcement that our flight was cancelled until the following day.
Quickly to check in counter and they placed both of us on to earlier...

First time I've flown Cathy Pacific and the experience in general was very good. The only thing that I was disappointed about was that it really was too warm in the plane. This was a night flight and the temperature was just too high. We did mention this twice and were told it was adjusted but it didn't seem to...

Very comfortable seats with plenty of leg room, good food and very helpful staff
Would definitely recommend them and the extra cost to premium economy is well worth it.

标题: Friendly customer service and enjoyable flight.
内容: We had issue with our Qantas flight. Cathay Pacific was able to take us on a flight only one hour later, better than our Qantas flight, and processed us aboard happily. We had a very enjoyable flight, good food, friendly service and comfortable roomy seats.

It was worth the extra to fly Premium Economy. The seats are like the old business class (I think) and have lots of room. Providing you have a good travel agent who makes sure you're booked into seat/s along the window side (the middle has 4 seats). The configuration is 2-4-2.
There were some priority areas and the service was...

Everything went smooth travelled from Melbourne to Hong Kong, Hong Kong to Bangkok and back all4 flights were on time, check in was quick and easy & actually super quick at Hong Kong, I got to choose a preferred seat on each flight and all the cabin staff were all very friendly and helpful all in all it was a...

This was my first flying experience with Cathay Pacific from Mumbai to Melbourne via Hong Kong and return...what can I say except that it was the best service for a very affordable airline. I was informed personally about a delay from Mumbai which could affect my connecting flight. I had to rush in peak hour traffic so they could check...

This was our first flight in Premium Economy and it is significantly better than Economy, the smaller cabin, early food service, and bigger seat were all great, but in the end the additional cost over Economy is hard to justify.
Very good service the entire trip. Wheelchair service for my wife was first class. Seating was comfortable and roomy.

标题: staff dedicated to Cathay Pacific and people's satisfaction
内容: I had lost my computer at the security check in International airport of Hong Kong. the Lost and found , Mrs Iris found it, Cathay Pacific Lost and found luggage of Taiwan managed to give it back to me in Taipei. Fantastic!

标题: Certainly NOT a Top 5 Airline for Economy Class passengers.
内容: Since we were flying economy class to Hong Kong, Cathay Pacific was our choice as it is rated as a top 5 Airline. This, without doubt, was not our experience. It was very disappointing. The service received during the delivery of meal/drinks made us feel that we were in a class lower than Economy Class. I will avoid Cathay Pacific...

The flight takes off on time. The ground staff are extremely helpful.
The hostess are pleasant and friendly. They assist the passengers who need help. The seats are very comfortable. i would suggest the aisle seats.

Flight in the new A35 which is so much quitter than other equipment. Experienced the new Cathay Lounge at Changi Terminal 4 which is amazing. Please now do something with the Lounge at Beijing Capital Airport, it is a disgrace to the Cathay name!

Staff are always friendly and courteous. The flights are usually on time. On this trip I noticed that the food served was much more tasty and refined on the Paris to Hong Kong leg than on the Hong Kong to Melbourne leg. The premium economy seats are comfortable but there is no way of putting the armrests out of the...

标题: A great airline, especially good in Business class
内容: Always a great airline only fall back is that they always stop in HK. Tokyo to LA is a very long flight
I have always loved travelling with Cathay Pacific from the ease of check in to the service on the flights

标题: Business Class a real treat on Cathay
内容: Flying Cathay Pacific for my first Business Class experience was fabulous. Even before having an opportunity to compare it to another airline I knew that I was onto a good thing! The space was roomy and private in its positioning as a single seat next to the window (another airline had me sharing a space and sleeping next to a...

After flying from Perth to Vancouver and return I was very disappointed with Cathay Pacific. Out of my 4 flights 2 of them were delayed by over 2 hours. The food was terrible, movie selection the worst I have encountered. I also had one case (as I had been on a tour) which was 3 kilos overweight and although I...

Every service on this airline cannot be faulted. As a Wheelchair Assisted passenger I was taken care of by charming staff who were polite and respectful. My seats were comfortable and the food very good.

We had taken a return flight from Mumbai to Hong Kong. The check-in and boarding were efficient and polite. The staff was very polite. The leg-space for the economy class was quite good. The food was tasty and ample in quantity. The flight was on time. Excellent experience.
This airline amazing from the time you book the flight to checking in and enjoying amenities and service. The staff were friendly and very helpful in every respect

标题: Cyclone season in Hong Kong delays flights
内容: Airline was very good but apparently mid July is cyclone weather in Hong Kong so flight delays are inevitable, cannot blame the airline for this but will not use this time of year again. Service and food very good, choice not bad but not as good as Singapore Airline. Lay flat bed quite comfortable. Personally prefer Singapore/London route or Dubai/London....

Flew premium economy. I’m tall and leg room was only ok. Food was nothing special, and wasn’t the BC menu.
My flight had to stopover in Manila for some ‘operational reason’ for 4mins, which was a pain and unclear why. Crew were quite good.

标题: comfortable economy department and good service
内容: very quick checkinn flight on time arrival on time good service tasty food a lot of drinks comfortable seat during entire flight in between service there where allways small snacks and drinks for self service at the pantry n the back of plane.

Chose this airline as it lands in my city, Adelaide as opposed to Melbourne or Sydney. It is easier to clear customs on arrival. A full service company and that is what I received. Polite, quiet and efficient from check in to arrival at Adelaide.The"lounge' was not open prior to the early morning departure so i was told but I...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Adelaide

内容: As it was our first time to take this flight -it was a very pleasant one and arriving quite early to Hong Kong ~ 5AM local time is of great value as well

Flights ran on time, ground crew very pleasant and helpful with check-in. Cabin crew were particularly nice on my flights from Brisbane to Hong Kong and then Hong Kong to London. Not so pleasant on the way back but the flight was a lot busier.
Fairly good selection of movies. Vegetarian meal was okay although next time I wouldn't bother...

We could check in our luggage all the way to Osaka, unlike Japanese airlines, which requires passengers to take their luggage out at Tokyo and take a bus to Tokyo’s domestic airport before transferring to Osaka.

Flying to Incheon, Korea and always try to get on a Cathay Pacific flight BUT due to its popularity seats go very quickly.
This is a Great Airline. Everything goes so smooth ..great food and great on board entertainment

Cathay Pacific is a very average airline now, Its good, staff are friendly plane clean seats very tight, but nothing special. The food though is dreadful, don't get on the plan hungry Baked beans for dinner and breakfast the only good thing was the ice-cream. The change in time zone by 6 hours means you have to get your head...
No doubt one of the best airlines economy class.Plenty of legroom,excellent service and a magnificent plane.

标题: Still a loyal supporter of CX;
内容:
I had always been happy with Cathay Pacific (CX) even over some of the other airlines like SIA or Emirates which are touted to be better...in fact I've had my worst experience flying Emirates (both Business and Economy classes).
Anyway my last trip with CX, was a bit dissapointed - as I was travelling with my wife (and she bears...

Flight scheduled leaving 85. Arrived at airport around 6. Was told due to weather, flight was delayed over 3 hours. Finally boarding but the arrangement on queuing was in a mass as people jumping queue and ground staff has lost control. I told one ground staff those jumping the queue should be sent to the back but instead she ignored...

标题: Cathay Pacific and the wonder of Qanats FF points when you need to travel quickly.
内容: Got news I had to visit my seriously unwell mother at 9.3 am on a Sunday morning. Through the help of a great travel agent got a seat on a Cathay Pacific flight to London via Hong Kong at 3.3 pm that afternoon. Service was totally proficient, leg room acceptable and the attitude of the staff was very positive. The...

The chairs were very comfortable . The service were verry good. The food is tasty .
We felt we are in goood hands .
Great service. Cannot complain. Best service on the OneWorld Alliance. Beats British Airways any day.

This was my first experience flying from Hongkong to Seoul with Cathay Pacific.
We checked in online one day before departure and dropping bags at the airport were smooth. Ground staff were helpful and acted fast. Plane departed half an hour late but it was still within tolerance. We luckily did the online checked in, otherwise we would not get...

Have flown with Cathay last year abd opted to use them again.
No real problems, check in always efficient, seats comfortable and recilne quite a goid distance.
Food is quite good considering
This flight one particular hostess was extremely clumsy, 4 times smashed trays into my seat when walking past, one time I had just moved my head or I...

标题: Generally good however for Business Class I have had a lot better.
内容: The crew seemed very busy. One cabin attendant split coffee on me and didn’t seemed bothered. A long way off Air New Zealand standards. Also boarding was very random and no privilege for Business Class.

The booking staff were brilliant. We were kept updated on any changes. The extra leg space, the seat size and the arm rest width are so good we could not go back to flying economy class. You can actually sleep in the bigger seats.

We traveled from San Francisco to Hyderabad (India) via Hong Kong on 3rd October. In the San Francisco international airport we got our economy tickets up graded to premium economy by paying additional amount. The premium economy section where we were seated is a very small and congested place with a single toilet. Each time we visited the washroom, we...

标题: Great staff, lovely service and delectable food!
内容: I flew Business class from Hong Kong to Perth in November it was a beautiful trip and the staff were nothing but delightful! I definitely recommend the business class the seats were spacious and private. Private enough to let me meditate undisturbed. The inflight entertainment was brilliant with many options available, including one where you are able to see via...

标题: Good service with room for improvement
内容: Efficient and punctual, and everything you would expect from the cabin service of a premium airline which commands a premium price tag. The Marco Polo (members) line at boarding was much longer (as usual) than the non-members line, which in some ways negates the bonus of priority boarding. But all in all, a reliable and solid service.

the plane - a 777-3 - had a 2-3-2 config in Business which I found very unsatisfactory for an International flight. The plane was also old and a bit knocked about inside plus it had a very small screen. I comment because normally Cathay planes are of a high standard. I suspect this was an internal flight plane being used...

Polite hostesses and great attention. I do not sleep when in the air so it was pleasing to be offered snacks and juices without having to ring the gong.
The Cathay lounges at Hong Kong airport were exceptional what i really appreciated was the choice of cuisine. I had an 8 hour gap between flights and really enjoyed ho clean...

Cathay Pacific is certainly on the downhill. Cannot believe the appaling quality of food served on board as well as the absolutely disgusting and unusable touch interface of the entertainment system. I am surprised that all these years it was not improved. Try navigate that cursor/arrow on the touch screen and you will know what I mean.
They even try...
The staff always know your name, and assist with your chosen wine requests, nothing too much trouble. I am almost embarrassed by the attention. But its not too much or over the top.

标题: Pleasant staff but not very visible during flight time
内容: Long long flight...16 hrs then change at hong kong, another 9 hours. Seat space reasonable if u not too tall. In flight entertainment worked well and good variety. Meals reasonable for plane food. However most of the choices werent available so no choice really. staff disappear quickly after meal service and i had to go looking for someone a few...
Good service, always very friendly with a smile and acknowledge by name. Good wine and good food, both dinner and snack.

This was a special treat for myself as I was travelling alone and it lived up to my expectations. The seating was wonderful, made it possible to sleep comfortably in privacy. The vegetarian meal was very good and the service was exceptional. The access to the business class lounges in auckland and Hong Kong was tha icing on the cake....
Nice flight with the aircraft A35 9, seat are much bigger and screen easy to use. Flight attendants was really nice and good service as usual.

I use to travel on Cathay often as the aircraft were newish and the service was always good. However now I find the aircraft have had their day. One of the things I appreciate on long flights in particular, is having my own air vent, Cathay do not. Instead the air streams down the sides. Not so good when there...

Have travelled long haul flights with Singapore & Etihad previously, in hindsight we should have stuck with them. The seats we had reserved were changed, the legroom is terrible and service in general not great. Considering the prices are similar we will stick with the other airlines in future.

Arrived early at the airport for our 12:2 pm flight. We were ushered to a special lane for those who have already checked-in on line. It was a short queue and was able to check-in our luggage in a few minutes. We were offered if we wanted to take the 11 am flight instead, to which we immediately agreed. The...

Premium economy is a big step up from economy , seats a larger with more space and leg room , meals are better and the overall service is better plus it gets you onto the aircraft earlier than economy.l

Don't waste your money Flying Premium Economy on Cathay Pacific! All you get is a slightly roomier seat, for which you more than three times the price! Service is not more than you would receive in Economy. You are guaranteed your choice of meal served up exactly the same way as Economy! My advice, Save $3 Dollars and spend it...

Flight experience was very good, Cabin crew were very professional, Pilot/s were very good, it was a smooth flight and were informed for turbulences so we were informed beforehand.on board entertainment was very good , in flight food was good but it could be improved upon.
Got an upgrade to Business Melbourne to Hong Kong and the rest of the flight including the return flight was in Premium Economy, with both classes being the best of any airline we have flown
i flew premium economy. space was good and food ok. I tend to travel business class from Melbourne to the UK but premium was not bad for the 9 hour trip.
Frequently travel between Hong Kong and Osaka with Cathay Pacific. Good airline to travel. Convenient flight schedules and comfortable service. Prices maybe higher sometimes but serves my purpose.

标题: Rushed meal service and very little detail to customer service
内容: Staff seemed to be rushed and not customer focused and wanted to just get the service over. There was little positive sense from the flight attendants and seemed that they were just wanting the flight to be over. They served some economy passengers with drinks like orange juice and water but not all, so seemed to be very ad-hoc service....

For 26 years I have been traveling with Cathay Pacific. the aircraft is always in excellent condition. I am also a Marcopolo member. The inflight service is just as good and the meals is rated above than any other carriers. Since HongKong is the Transit airport wherever I travel, I feel so familiar with the HongKong Airport facilities as well...

It seems the service level has gone down a bit.
Even we could feel so with the lounges at HK.
Overall it was a good experience but certainly not the same experience that we used to have in past

标题: Everything was so good that I forgot to have jetlag!
内容: My daughter and I both flew on Cathay Pacific Airlines for the first time earlier this year. I have travelled widely and I really believe that this is the best airline I have ever flown on. We scored an excellent fare below $1 return for each of us. When we arrived at the check in counter, the attendant said that...

标题: Paid Premium Economy - curtain around our seats left us in Economy!!!!
内容: We were seated in the last row of Premium Economy on window and our seats, when upright, were back behind the solid screen separating Premium from Economy. On take off, the curtain was closed from the solid wall, curving back behind our seats. Effectively, we were in Economy! When we reclined later on, we were DEFINITELY IN ECONOMY! Don't get...

Safety, second to none. I wouldnt be surprised when they were voted for Airline of the Year for nothing. Will not take safety for granted. Safety checks are thorough. Service was also awesome. Friendly cabin crew, attends to everybody with a smile. Movies were great.

标题: Poor in flight staff look totally untrained
内容: From word go it was armature hour lining up to get on flight they changed our seats,then to our amazement we where seated in the seat we wanted in the first place.Then serving the meal was a disaster was a shocker they seemed to lack leadership. I was aware we would be landing soon, but they had made no attempt...

标题: Long layover at Hong Kong airport
内容:
Reasonably pleasant flight from Frankfurt to Hong Kong.
Not happy re seating configuration in business class. If travelling as a couple and you would like to have a window seat, then you can't sit together as window seats are all single seats.
Found the seats very firm, verging on uncomfortable after some hours. When seat is in flat bed mode...

It was my first time to fly on the A35 with Cathay Pacific in their Premium Econ class. I was quite looking forward to this experience as I heard from others that the A35 cabin is the best ever in among of PEY class.
I had in-town check in service at Hong Kong Station and the check-in was smooth, then...

booked cathay ended up flyin air nz plane 2 minutes late leaving and for some reason could not make up that time between auckland and hong kong so were left behind hong kong had to wait 8 hrs to get another flight cathay didnt really help much

标题: Cathay Pacific Business class Brisbane to Manchester
内容: Flight left on time after a very easy check-in at Brisbane and after a couple of scheduled stops at Cairns and Hong Kong arrived in Manchester about 15 minutes early. All staff from the check-in desk to inflight staff were excellent. They knew our names and were always very obliging. I think what lets Cathay down is the food selection...

标题: Hong Kong to Tel Aviv, Israel
内容: We went in the Airbus A35-9 aircraft. Firstly, I must say its just a magnificent aircraft and the level of comfort is amazing. Economy class too had ample leg room. Cathay's class of service was very good. Food was good, flight attendants were very attentive to the needs of passengers. I'd definitely go long haul with them.
Flights were on time. Cabin Service very good - would have liked to be offered tea or coffee - without having to ask

I had been dreaming flying to Paris for years, this year, Cathay Pacific made a wonderful dream came true! I worked till very late the day before the flight, and barely slept in order to pack all my belongings. The journey cross the continents was perfectly smooth, not only I had a cozy rest onboard, i had enjoyed a snack...
I have flown with Cathay Pacific many times, and I continue to use them, because of their quality of service, and attention to detail. I will continue to use Cathay in the future.

Have flown business class before, the code share using Air New Zealand is always fantastic. From hong kong we were on a Cathy Pacific plane. The service, and the friendless was missing. It was like being in economy but with better seats. Checking in from Paris on the return flight was abismal, I have never waiting so long to get...

Flying with Cathay is always the best, the new AirBus 35 cabin is already the best corner in the sky, this flight also offered the mattress pad to enhance the comfort bed to allow a even better sleep in the flight. See you soon Cathay Pacific!!! :)
Took Cathay from Delhi to Beijing via Hong Kong. Overall ok experience food was just fine also the drinks. The ambiance is very average nothing like Emirates

Kolkata to Tokyo via Cathay Pacific is a good option. This is the first time I took this route and there were a couple of interesting observations:
I was scheduled to depart from Kolkata on 19th November 217 at :1 hours but after do my web check in I saw the the boarding pass was showing the departure date as...

标题: At the Back of the bus
内容:
Left check in a bit late on the way back from HK and ended up in row 74.
I know turbulence is better in business class but the plane handled it very well and had a smooth flight - staff were excellent and the food and drinks were v good (compared to Jetstar last year from Singapore when we did...
Good service, ok food... the only different was the cabin crew which less friendly and bit noisy (particularly when you sit at the back row)

great comfortable seat flat bed I. business class. top service from the flight crew. great choice of meals. premium wine and spirits. great service on the ground and easy fast check in at the airport counter. very competitive rates. lounge can be improved as the staff at the lounge were not up to my expectations in customer service. choice of.movies...
Meal of rack of lamb was fantastic with great service. Movie's and in-flight entertainment was very good.
Flights were on schedule. Seats were comfortable. Food was enjoyable. Staff were very pleasant. Would be happy to fly Cathay Pacific anytime
Absolutely wonderful flights, the food, the service the plane everything was good. We would fly with them again.

标题: Perfect Flight with the valuable price
内容: Good service from CX. Flight was clean and the food was good. Couldn't find any fault on the airline

CP service is always solid. Food is acceptable. Seating is acceptable. You get what you pay for i.e. midway between economy and business.
It would be good if they had a dedicated PE toilet on all flights. I don't like sharing with Economy.

Out flight from Sydney to Manchester via Hong Kong was for the most part good and uneventful. The flights lest on time, we flew Airbus A35 which are awesome planes and the service was good BUT not as good as Emirates!

Leg Room is less. No Films in Kannada, where as the other Flyers have.
Variety of Food for Indian Vegetarians are less as compared to others.
Travel time is less as compared to others.
Enjoyable flight with the extra legroom and larger entertainment screen compared to economy. Loved the meals and the choices available.

As a qantas gold member Cathey invited me to their lounge when returning from Hong kong.I found the Qantas lounge was a lot more comprehensive regarding all aspects of food and drink. On the actual flight I found staff to be very welcoming and friendly. The amount of legroom in premium economy was rather a treat from normal economy.The only...

标题: Comfortable flights to Hong Kong then Israel
内容: Smooth and comfortable flying in economy class with excellent entertainment system to assist with passing the time was enhanced by first class service from the airline staff prior to boarding and while flying. Food served was above average for air travel and access to additional drinks and snacks was available. Despite a fairly full flight, managed to enjoy the trip...

Pricer than most, you do get what you pay for: be it relatively more comfortable seating, all-round better in-flight programming and in-flight meals which are than most other carriers.
Staff were exceedingly charming and competent at all levels, unlike the, "condescending Sky Bags of western carriers," as one pilot put it.
Online updates, reminders and other flight management options are...
We were very uncomfortable being five foot ten and six foot tall. Being newbies to this airline and booking in a hurry, we did not consider leg room. Our own fault.

For the first time, I flew business class from Vancouver BC to Denpasar, Bali via Hong Kong. Friends had raved about Cathay Pacific’s Business Class service and I was fortunate to finally experience it myself by using frequent flyer miles.
The Cathay Pacific Lounge was a bit crowded in Vancouver, but the food was delicious and chairs comfortable. Boarding my...

Fly around 4-5 times a year with this airline. Since I have trouble sleeping on planes
Cathy Pacific have a day flight to HK. Great inflight sevice and usually little delays.

标题: Great flight from Melbourne to Milan via HongKong
内容:
This is the first time that I have flown with Cathay Pacific
Premium Economy. It was a great flight there and back and much better than normal economy, priority boarding, better food, seats much more comfortable with extended recline. Will do it again if the price is right.

Cathay Pacific have an excellent direct service from Cairns to Hong Kong and have done for many years. The cabin service is always excellent and flights are on time. Why fly south when you can exit Australia from Cairns and save time.

标题: Always a pleasure to fly Cathay Paciifc
内容: I love this flight. It leaves at midnight (or just after), a quick layover in Hong Kong which is just long enough to use the Amex lounge which is pretty great. Then the plane leaves on time and arrives lunchtime on the same day. Good service from a full service airline. I'm Vegan and they get the meals perfect too....

August 217 we flew to Vancouver return on Cathay.
The seats felt like a wooden bench and were about as comfortable and the service on board was very average.
Yes I was flying economy but never again with this carrier.

Took the red-eye from Perth to Hong Kong with our connection to New York with a short layover of 1 hr we were worried that we would miss our connection but Cathay have this down pat and we were on our way. In-flight services where great the flight attendants are attentive. With comfortable seats and plenty of legroom in economy.

I flew with Cathay in 216 for my wife's 4th birthday. This flight was the second leg of our trip and linked well with our flight from Australia having only a 9 min stopover.
As we don't travel internationally much and will likely not travel for a while (kids, mortgage) we treated our selves to Business class seats. It was...

Amazing Air line.. consistently good. Great service , good value for money and have no hesitation in recommending them to all travellers heading to Hong Kong or Bangkok..we are continuing on to New Zealand and then back to Vancouver, that's how easy it is with them.

标题: Nice flight Brisbane to Hong Kong in new A35
内容:
Chose Cathay Pacific A35 for flight to Hanoi via Hong Kong. Flight left a little late due to inclement weather in Brisbane and subsequently we missed our connector to Hanoi, not Cathays fault at all.
The new A35 are a very nice aircraft, smooth with plenty of room in economy and all the entertainment mod cons. Larger windows, better air...

Decided to try another airline..Malaysia Airline have got worse each time I have used them...atleast 4 - 6 times a year.
Even though the flight passes over Cebu on its way to Hong Kong...it is way best airline I have used on this route....
Hong Kong Airport needs an urgent review of its signage and update training of its airport...

标题: Good flight,good crew, good plane - telephone customer service was not the best
内容: Good flight,good crew, good plane - telephone customer service was not the best. The leg room and seat size were good, I'm about 5'11 and 25lbs - so not a small guy :) The food was good, entertainment system was pretty good as well. I had an aisle seat and was not bothered too much by people passing by.
I went with my familly to see Dysneyland. Fight was amazing. No complain at all. Can recommend to any person

First time flying with this airline, They experience was good from Hong Kong to Han oi and Hong Kong Back to Adelaide.
But it wasnt a pleasant experience from Hong Kong to Adelaide 2 of the flight crew were rude and anything that was asked seemed like it was all to hard for them
Fantastic flight and the Airbus A35 is simply a lovely, quiet and superbly appointed aircraft. There is now onboard wi-fi, which worked first time.

标题: Cathay Pacific Hong Kong to Brisbane
内容: The entire process and flight is fine. If transiting the security screening can have lengthy waits. There are normally two points operating so if ques are long in one check the other as ques may not be as long. On board cabin service is excellent.

标题: Very good overall services, foods and lounges.
内容: Very efficient check-in and boarding. Overall services from check-in , lounges, in-flights and baggage claims are all very good as usual. Also the foods, both qualities and choices, are worth a 4.5 stars rating .

Whilst two luggage are allowed to check in, the machine check-in will let your luggage within limit through and down the transport belt and the other one, if just slightly over the limit, will be blocked, and you cannot call the previous one back!
Overall the luggage limit may not have been breached but the hassles are unbelievable!

We took night flight back to Bangkok and faced the 2 hrs delayed, such a tough day for us.
Although they announced on the board appx. 1 hr delayed since the evening time, but finally we have been waiting on the plane for another hour.
One of number of trips I have made on Cathay Pacific. Each has been a pleasure with the excellent service and amenity that I always find on Cathay Pacific. Cathay is always a good choice.

标题: Ontime departure and adequate food entertainment
内容: Cathay Pacific used to hand out hot towels at the beginning of the flight and give each passenger a pair of warm socks, a toothbrush and toothpaste.. No more. In exchange they lowered the airfare. The service was still good. Food was on par with what other airlines offer. Other than the ethnicity of the flight attendants and the routes,...

标题: apart from Jet Blue (love that airline) This was the best flt service & entertainment
内容: It's such a long trip one needs the kind of service this airline offers & it was an economy seating This is the airline I would take again for sure

标题: no pilot : 15 hours delay. zero compensation
内容:
When Flying between SFO and HKG there are two options : Cathay and Singapore Airlines.
Cathay experience was really bad.
Started with a 15 hours delay (and I did not get the voicemail so I went with family to airport that night to wait 2 minutes before someone tells me there is no flight and go back home.)
Delays happens...

Service and food were as good as usual on Cathay flight. The Business lounge in Toronto and HK airports could be better ― both get crowded and the food selection is limited, particularly in Toronto. The women’s restroom in HK lounge needs to be cleaned more often given the traffic.

I flew from NY to Hong Kong and on to Siem Reip in Cambodia on Cathay very deliberately as last year I had a great experience flying Cathay. Their service is fantastic wish I would experience it in first class
In business it was great, excellent food and drinks the flat bed was awesome, slept as if I was at...

I have used these guys for the last seven years for business and pleasure trips, they’re in the top ten airlines because they deserve to be. Luckily I use premium economy and business with my one world airpoints benefits. Was doing about 2 flights a year with them until early 217 with one bad experience when the plane was delayed...

I have never flown Cathay before but I think this is probably the best airline economy class I've ever flown. Checking in was a breeze, no queue! Seats were comfy and actually quite spacious I thought, a huge and good selection of current movies to entertain and meals are tasty. I had previously ordered vegetarian meals and they were really...

This was the highlight of the whole journey to Singapore. I was greeted by the cabin staff by name! Doesn't happen on other airlines, this immediately made me feel special. The seat configuration is perfect with right amount of space and privacy.The seat was very comfortable and I fell asleep before we had taken off. The staff were excellent and...

My first time flying with Cathay left a good impression. We flew from Melbourne to Amsterdam, stopping in Hong Kong for two nights. The food was good and the in-flight entertainment kept us busy, good amount of movies and TV shows. I'd definately travel again with them.

We flew from Vancouver to Bangkok with a connection in Hong Kong. Both flights were excellent with good food, entertainment and service. The only pitfall in the whole trip, both ways, was the connection in Hong Kong. Cathay Pacific is either under staffed in this airport or the staff they do have are poorly managed. My wife needs a wheelchair...
Nothing really special. Crammed seats, awful food. You cannot preselect your seat and even when online check in opens 48 hours prior, there are almost no seats to select.

标题: Taking a step back in time
内容: First time experience, and it was like going back to the old days, when the crew and airlines really cared for their customers. The bed seats were comfortable and my very tall husband could lay flat. You had your own personal space, and a wonderfully large TV screen that you could actually see. The food was excellent and the service...

I've flown Cathay Pacific from time to time over the years. I prefer their non-stop flights between New York and Hong Kong to that of United Airlines (formerly Continental Airlines). Mainly because their food is better and their flight attendants smile a bit more (or at least you feel that they are willing to serve you ... rather than carry...
We flew Cathay Pacific to Beijing and return from Hong Kong back to Toronto in November 216, when we visited Thailand. This airline excelled in service, far superior to anything in North America.

With basically four hours each way, this was a very affordable and convenient combination of flights via Hong Kong to get to South India. Clean and well maintained planes. Friendly staff. The only issue was that they emailed me the delay on the final flight after I had already left for the airport.

My last two filights to the Philippines in the past year I flew Cathay Pacific because they offered a pretty competitive price to other carriers flying this route from the East Coast. Booking and seat selection was pretty easy and accommodating. The seats and food on this International flight is pretty good.

标题: excellent trip very relaxing for such a long trip
内容: When you are doing a long haul flight like this the extra cost of J class is well worth it. Flight left Toronto at 1:3 AM , went to sleep right away, didn't wake up for the next 8 hours. Arrived in Hong Kong very refreshed.

Excellent service, flight crew are very professional, courteous, helpful and with a smile, great food, hot towels, cabins are very clean, and comfortable. We flew with Cathy Pacific, from Chicago to Singapore, and then on to Hong Kong, and return back home. We will fly again with Cathy Pacific again, because of the service, amenities, food, comfort, and the professionalism

标题: This airline continues to be top notch!
内容: Cathay Pacific continues to be our favorite airline for travel to Hong Kong and connecting points from there as well. The flight attendants are extremely well groomed and pleasant, and they keep the lavatories spotless throughout the long flight.We're not sure that the sleep beds are quite as comfortable as they used to be years ago since we never felt...

Besides having a world class First Class lounge (The Pier) the experience is top flight.
The concierge let you know when its time to leave for your flight and the food is restaurant quality. Two flight attendants for six passengers ensure a perfect flight. From the Champagne, Caviar and cooked to order steak. Perfect.

Every Christmas I fly to meet my sister somewhere in the world to spend the holiday. On December 216 I took Cathay Pacific to go to Singapore via Hong Kong. Because I had a few hours to kill in Hong Kong I decided to pay $1 to join their Marco Polo reward program. My goal was to be able to...

First time flying with Cathay pacific the staff is so unfriendly and soo RUDE they just don't care about you as a customer .Weighting anythings that you are own they will make you make you take out from your bags even a 6oz over the weight I have to cut out the box to to out some items away so...

Cathay charges extra for seat assignment at booking. You actually have to upgrade to Economy Plus at a cost of $15, or so,to do it. Otherwise you can only get seat assignments in Economy class by waiting until 48 hours before departure and the site is very busy then as everyone tries at once to access. This could be at...

标题: Premium Economy as good as first class on some other airlines.
内容: Good timing; non-stop flight with excellent service! My first trip on Cathay Pacific, and they will be my first airline to check on certain stops from here on out. The seats were roomy and comfortable - as good as some first class flights I have experienced on other airlines. The service was excellent and it is the first time I...

标题: Great service but the seats could be upgraded.
内容: This was a 15 hour flight and I found the seats need a little more padding or foam replacement as they felt very hard after a couple of hours. I had a blow up back cushion that I ended up sitting on to soften the ride! Other than that it was an excellent flight with good service food and entertainment.

The seats were spacious and comfortable. We got good food, snacks, drinks, silverware, pillow, blanket and a zippered case with eye mask, socks and earplugs. The steward/esses were friendly, nice and helpful. Landing was great, got there a little ahead of time.
Whenever I am going overseas again, will be using a foreign airline. They treat us better than our...

I was supposed to fly with a different airline.
Due to the ASEAN Summit held, no flying zone to Manila.
I was asked to stay another day or select another flight! :)
Good thing the option was Cathay I never bothered waiting a little more. :)
As usual, food was an ace to my taste! :) Hagen Dazs & Movenpick...

标题: Premium Ecomomy makes all the difference
内容: Cathay Pacific treats Premium economy is as I remember Business class use to be 2 years ago. Spacious seats and good service. When flying for over 6 hours, this flight was 16 hours, you need that extra space.
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容:
We have flown with this airline several times now and each return journey has been a fantastic experience.
The Toronto-Hong Kong flight was a 3-3-3 configuration and very comfortable. We have also flown the Hong Kong-Australia return route and again the flight was very comfortable. The selection of food was extremely good with lots of snacks available and drinks. We...

标题: Outstanding Service to Malaysia and so many other Asian destinations.
内容: My wife and I take this flight round trip several times a year and we have never been disappointed in the service and customer care given to us. Their inflight service is always at a high level of excellence and detail. We have, at times, been very pressed for last minute accommodations and they always seem to be able to...

Great aircraft, excellent in flight service, best wine choice, very quite and steady flight.
Crew takes good care of the passengers.

I had high hopes after using my frequent flier points to "splurge" on a First Class ticket. Cathay Pacific independent reviews were very upbeat about the service, food and comfort. From the moment I checked in (staff very stressed about an earlier flight that never made it so they were squeezing folk in). For a 1st Class experience, I would...

标题: The flight was smooth and efficient but the service was dreadful with staff who were not interested
内容: After flying with Cathay for many years we are rethinking using them again. The leg from Brisbane to Honk Kong was particularly disappointing because of the disinterested staff providing very poor service. Hong Kong to Rome was slightly better but still not the excellent service we have grown to expect
No matter what class I fly with Cathay Pacific the service is first class. 3 hour flight but but cabin crew got us a snack and drink plus whatever else we needed. On time.

I have flown Cathay Pacific many times from the States (Los Angeles) to Hong Kong as well as, within Asia. I consider Cathay to be one of the best. They are normally on time, have clean and comfortable cabins with excellent inflight services and decent meals. On my last return surprisingly, I was upgraded to Business Class which was fabulous....

标题: My Only Choice When Flying to Asia
内容:
I make the trip to Hong Kong at least twice a year and after experiences with other airlines will ONLY fly on Cathay Pacific.
The cabin crews are always fresh and polite with an amazing service attitude.
The food service on the overnight flights is always more than adequate and the menu items have enough variety for most tastes.
In...

This was my 8th Trans-Pacific flight and the staff were by far the best I have seen. All the stewardesses were very helpful and seem to have a great attitude plus they seemed to enjoy working with each other. They handled all customer requests (even the silly ones) with a positive attitude.
标签: International' 'Economy' 'Ho Chi Minh City - Los Angeles

标题: Modern , clean planes with good crew
内容: Modern planes that are clean and tidy. Crew are always nice and recognize their platinum one world partners when flying with them which is nice. Have flown with Cathay a few times and they always perform well.

I can honestly say this is an airline I can highly recommend. The service was great, the in house movies and games to play to pass the time and the food was really tasty. I flew on to Heathrow a lot longer flight and about 4 weeks later flew with Cathay Pacific back to Hong Kong and later to Adelaide....

标题: Cathay Pacific flight from Toronto to Tokyo with change of plane in Hongkong
内容: Generally it was a good flight, although too long for comfort. Cathay Pacific's service during check-in and on board is pretty good.

标题: Used to be a great airline but now average
内容: I have flown Cathay for 13 years and in the past 5 years I see the overall value has dropped. The food quality has seriously deteriorated, seats are uncomfortable and boarding at gates is often disorganized. Marco Polo members are not as valued as they used to be. Most of the attendants are service oriented however, when there is a...

Recently flew from Singapore via Hong Kong to Los Angles. The flight, crew, service and food were exceptional. Business Class is the only way to fly from SE Asia. The flight attendants were totally top notch.

As expected, the flight featured an on time departure, early arrival, friendly cabin crew and plenty of food and snacks. What other airline allows you to "pig out" on Hagan Daz ice cream?! Or cup noodles? And this after an ample dinner meal.

标题: Premier economy not worth the extra cost
内容:
Seats are a bit more comfortable compared to economy, but not worth the extra cost.
Food was good. When I asked for one of the red wines from the menu, they did not have it, only in business class, also it was on the menu for premier economy.

标题: Very Good Very efficient and Friendly
内容: The Aircraft was relatively new, The seating configuration was excellent and the cabin crew was very attentive
From beginning to end, the experience couldn't have been better. Service was prompt, warm, and delightful. The Suite was incredibly comfortable. Cathay is my favorite airline!

Late night flight originating in Hong Kong with final destination in New York - this is a great overnight flight from Vancouver to arrive early next morning. However, make sure to sleep on the flight as it's only a 5 hour flight plus 3 hours time change (forward). Eat dinner before the flight to avoid waiting/being woken up! Efficient crews,...

I recently traveled from a Chicago to Hong Kong. It was a sixteen hour flight. The experience exceeded my expectations. Aircraft was clean and flight attendants were very attentive and amiable for the duration of the flight. We were fed routinely, the food was good and refreshments were readily available. This was unexpected for this service class but definitely appreciated!

标题: Best Airline for Flights to South East Asia
内容:
Picked Cathay for their reputation for first class service in Economy and clean planes. Being on a flight for 15 hours the little things like snacks available in the galley and spotless restrooms goes along way.
I did the special request veggie meals and to be honest the regular selections would have been a better choice.
The O'Hare Airport TSA...

I have flow Cathay Pacific on several long haul flights and have never had a bad experience. My most recent trip from SFO to HKG was no exception. We left on time and arrived about 3 minutes ahead of schedule. Flight attendants were very professional, meals were good and plenty of movies (believe there were around 6 films available). Seat...

Flying economy class on Cathay Pacific to Bangkok with a layover in Hong Kong was a pleasant surprise. The service was top notch and the flight attendants catered to the passengers' needs. They worked tirelessly throughout the flight making sure passengers were happy and comfortable.
The food was good with plenty of snack options offered throughout the entire flight.
The...

标题: Welcomed Change from USA domestic airlines
内容:
Flying Premium Economy on this long-haul flight was a delightful experience: wider seats, a foot rest, 2 nice meals ( real food), attentive FA's. It made trip much more tolerable. Consider it....
p.s. The FA's were neat, tidy and mannerly

From efficient counter staff to great in air service, find them to be both helpful and always smiling. Yes, it was first class, but have flown all class of service and find it always to be true. It is the reason I chose to fly Cathay over my other choices.
I highly recommend you give them a try.

Ever since I found flying on American Airlines to be an exercise in frustration, not to mention the flight staff being less than attentive, I decided to try Cathay Pacific. This airline has never failed to be a good flight. The food is adequate and acceptable as far as airplane food goes. Teh flight crew are also very pleasant and...

Service was so kind; we were fuzzy brained but the staff were wonderful. Food was lovely (choice of western or a more authentic meal) and since the flight wasn't full, it was much more relaxed. I'd fly this airline again in a heart beat.

标题: One of the best in all classes.
内容:
Iv'e flown the other three classes and all were excellent. This was the first time flying premium economy. I wanted economy but there were no available seats. I had read about premium economy on other airline and was discouraged. Usually a few extra inches of legroom and a bigger bag of peanuts. Not worth hundreds more for a ticket.
As...

Ground crew friendly, helpful and very polite.
Waiting area, before boarding, well organized and non confusing.
Boarding was made easy.
Service on board was very attentive. Premium economy on Cathay very confortable and the price was very good.
The food was also delicious and well presented.
Cathay was a notch above while on premium economy.
One day would love to...

The trip didn't take long but it was very nice and comfortable. Lots of room beneath the seats for carry-on bag and lots of leg room. The flight attendants were very professional and courteous. Food was delicious. Wish we could always book planes like this one. Now all we need is free wifi in the plane and we're set. It...

Cathay Pacific is very well run -- on time, fine service, good price, and especially delicious food. I flew economy and every seat had a full movie and music console. We changed planes in Hong Kong efficiently. The only problem was the length of the journey. It took 2 hours in the air and six hours in airports. (There was...

Cathay is just another average long hauler of people from A to B.
Food quality was below average. Staff attentive. Too few toliets, LONG LINE UPS. Entertainment system average. ON time departure,
Airline has dropped in it's status from a once premium airlaine

We were traveling with a child with a food allergy. They refused to accommodate us with appropriate meals. We requested that the list of ingredients be made available to us. They agreed at the time of purchase of tickets but completely reneged once they had our money. The flight crew refused to give us any information and showed no desire...

I would highly recimmend Cathay Pacific if you are flying to Bangkok. Flights are punctual, service is giod both on the ground and on flight. Food is above average and better than many otther airlines.

I have flown on Cathay Pacific for years, not only between New York and Vancouver, but also New York to Hong Kong and beyond into Asia and South Asia.
Cathay is an excellent airline. Their service is first rate, the crew and in-flight teams are well trained and personable and their fares are often lower than many other airlines for...

Better than average log haul flight. Efficient, friendly and courteous crew. On time. Good equipment and amenities. On board entertainment equipment is very good. Comfortable seats. Organized and efficient boarding process.

标题: First Class on Cathay Pacific is Outstanding Experience
内容: My wife and I splurged on our flight to Jakarta and it was worth every bit of our investment. Not something that we can pull off on regular basis for sure but we have already started saving for next trip across the Pacific. The seating was extremely comfortable, food service amazing, and flight attendants wonderful. We routed through Hong Kong...

Flying to S.E. Asia is rather trying simply due to the length of the flight. Our trip originated in Chicago with Bangkok as our destination. We had a short stop in Hong Kong as well. Staff worked very hard to ensure that passengers were as comfortable as possible. Snacks were available as needed, and people were allowed to stretch their...

标题: I have travelled Vancouver BC to JFK New York...many times and will do so again in a few weeks.
内容:
and premium equipment. Cabin interiors are pristine, including lavatories (Mid-flight) Great flights! Professional service.
Cabin staff are quite attentive to passengers needs. I know for a fact (first hand experience) that they handle in-flight emergencies very well...**I had a medical incident on one flight.
Flight is great - on-time departure and arrival; great crew, good food considering the circumstance. The inflight entertainment has copious options for selection.

Flew CP to and from HK on my Trip this October. There are Pros and Cons for Cathay Pacific. I will start with the Pros.
1. Very attentive and professional Staff. They are very kind and truly look after you, doesn't matter if you are in first class or all the way in Econ.
2. The food was very good....

标题: Cancelled flight in Vancouver to Hong Kong, handled reasonably well.
内容: We were on our way to Siem Reap Cambodia and missed the first day of our tour as a result of a cancelled flight in Vancouver due to mechanical problems. The hours of waiting to hear if the plane could be fixed were the worst. Cathay Pacific did provide us with a hotel in Vancouver and contacted us the next...

标题: Efficient, good leg room and service
内容: It's a long flight from Vancouver to HongKong. The trip went by quickly as there were current movies and the seats were comfortable in spite of sitting in economy. I will fly Cathay Pacific again.
More seat and leg space. Sparkling wine service to begin flight. Menu to choose meal from. Excellent airline food. Highly recommend!
More leg room than most US carriers. Very efficient staff. Overall - as good as a 15 hour, economy flight can be.

The seating was so uncomfortable that cause me to never use this airline for long flights. Checked with my wife and fellow passengers and the comments were the same bad seats. The service and food was superior and is at the top when ranking airlines.
Flight 811 and 812

Two destinations, in fact. First Hongkong for a few days and then Fukuoka (via Dragonair), but return has layover at Hongkong for a few hours. Flights were all on time, no hassle. Tickets were bought on promotion with double Asia Mile points offered. It's their new plane A35 that offers leg and foot rest, a nice feature, and they say...

标题: Super serivce--comfortable flight in Economy plus
内容:
Cathay airlines does a good job--extremely organized boarding process and very attentative to passengers on the flight.
I sat in Economy Plus--def. worth the extra money. The seats are wider, there is more leg space, the seats recline further back and there is a comfy leg rest which allows you to stretch out your legs. I was actually able to...

Nothing special. I was traveling due to business, and selected a center row bulkhead seat for the extra legroom. The fight was about as basic as could be. The food was bland. The service was basic. My ultimate destination was Manila, with an overnight in Hong Kong. I checked two bags from Chicago to Hong Kong, plaining to recover both...

标题: No phone nor internet nor text communication when cancelling your flight. Business Class
内容: We were flying out of Basi, Indonesia on the day of the volcanic eruptions.Cathy Pacfic just canceled our flight! We could not reach the airline by phone nor the internet! We were staying at the Fourseasons hotel, which always has people at the airport. The Fourseason hotel concierges along with their airport personnel got us a fight out of Bali...

Cathay Pacific runs a tight organization. From all of the employees that are associated with the carrier.The NY to HK run must take a lot out of anyone after a while. Working a double shift on a cramped compressed to be of steel must be draining. So if someone from economy complains about inattentive flight crew, take it with a...

Due to a medical condition, I am on a restricted diet. The flight attendants were extremely solicitous, offering me to cook a special meal to help with my situation, Several of them came by to offer help. Far above expectations.

标题: Type of passengers make the flight
内容: A`great flight as plane only half full and several full seat rows vacant to stretch out and sleep. Mostly seniors travelling on holidays and excellent service. But returned Madrid to Hong Kong on Cathay Pacific and it was an extremely bad experience. Completely full of local Hong Kong younger families with little children (maybe a conference or similar group). Many...

Long haul flight from JFK with connection in Hong Kong, on my way to Penang. Great personal service and food was very good. Not so generous with the wine and spirits service, as you need to ask for refills. Triple 777 Boeing aircraft seating and sleeping pods are very well designed an entertainment choices are very international and varied.

Our flight from Bali was cancelled on Nov 26th as the flight did not come in from Hong Kong. Cathay said it was due to the volcano but our friends left the same day on an Eva flight that was at approximatwly the same time. We ended up staying two more nights in Bali then making a long drive to...

标题: get those planes off the ground
内容: First of all I can't say enough about how well I was treated by all airline staff. HOWEVER, make sure that you have at LEAST two hours between connections. My outgoing flight was delayed by one hour and we hit head winds so instead of making up time we lost some. I had just over one and a half hours...

Flew rt ewr to bkk. Shocked at the cramped seats in economy!!!! Service was only average. Returning i paid extra for premium economy. A totally different experience! Seats were outstanding. Service was 5 star. Not sure what the reason was, but it was like being in a totally different airline. Overall, i have to say ANA and JAL are much...

This was my first time on this airline as I usually fly a star alliance airline. I am surprised. Great service for a long flight. Crew was always checking up to ensure you had all you needed. In Flight entertatkiment had a good selection of movies and shows to watch.

These people have the art of serving you down pat. The thing that makes them good is the sincere interest they have when you ask for something or chat with them.
On time...professional service and caring

The flight was 22 hours, 39 minutes with a 4 hour lay-over in Seoul, south Korea. The seat was not very comfortable for such a long flight. The meals served were delicious. Each meal was large enough to fill you until the next meal. Every passenger was given a comfort package which included slippers. I appreciated that.

I have flown internationally on many occasions. Cathay Pacific is by far my favourite airline. It seems that their departures always leave on time. The in flight service is always great, i especially appreciate the vast selections of quality movies to watch, especially on long flights. On one occasion I needed to change my departure date and Cathay changed the...

标题: Comfortable service and plane for 15 hours
内容: I always take Cathay to and from HK as 15 hours on a plane can be painful enough, without having to transit. Cathay has non-stop flights and while long I always arrive somewhat fresh at both ends. This time I took premium economy and from a previous flight knew that the arm rests in the row of four seats lift...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - New York City

内容: Cathay has a great flights leaving from LAX and JFK most all evenings with a direct flight to Hong Kong. The flights usually leaves between 12:3A and 1:45A. Arriving in Hong Kong the following day around 5A. Leaving on one of these overnight flights saves you a day getting to your final destination in Asia. Plus allows you good time...

I used to be a die-hard fan of Cathy Pacific. Every time when I traveled Hong Kong I would only consider Cathy Pacific. However, I need change my mind and open my choice to other airlines in future ...
I just traveled Hong Kong in September, booked the Business Class (paid in full and not from an upgrade by points)....

标题: The boarding process is really easy , the food is so much better than our domestic airlines
内容:
I love to travel with Cathay pacific. The stewards(esses) are some of the best and I have a lifetime mileage across all airlines of 4, miles so I have seen a lot.
The boarding process is well managed and the staff are very helpful when it comes to assisting you with bags when tere is nowhere to put them. The...

标题: One of the very best experiences flying we've ever had!
内容: Larger seats. More leg room. An enhanced menu. The best service we've experienced on a flight! They even provided hot towels to wash our hands before dinner. The crew could not have been more solicitous.

Planning for a first time trip overseas can be a little intimidating. I had ASAP tickets as my travel agent and they obtained the Cathay Pacific tickets for me. From the time of my arrival in Chicago to my arrival in Manila, the flights were fantastic. Some may not think that economy is the preferred way to fly, but when...

Couple times in row they ve been number one airlines in charts. Proven. Staff is very attractive and attentive with big smile. Had transfer in Hong Kong. Economy is comfortable, infotainment system is good. Tried business class very good for long flight you can stretch like in bed in capsule. Difinately recommend. Food is ok.

I have flown numerous times from Boston to Hong Kong over the past ten years. Cathay Pacific has the FIRST non-stop, the most comfortable seats in coach, and the best service of any airlines I have experienced. Their customer service also once helped me in a crisis at the LA airport with lost luggage. They upgraded us without our asking...

We chose CP because of the positive reviews it got and we were not disappointed. We flew CP both legs of our fight- to HK and on to Bangkok. The service was very good. The food was also enjoyable and plenty of it. Good selection of movies and t.v. to watch. Legroom was sufficient, even for such a long flight.

Flying Cathay Pacific lives up to all the hype. It is a fantastic airline with great service. The seats are great. It can get a bit hot in the cabin while attempting to sleep. We will definitely fly CX again next time we head to HKG

Great airline- lots of legroom and great staff. Unlike many North American airlines that charge for meals, meals were complimentary and fantastic. Great food selection, beer, wine and soft drinks all included, and even ice cream and lots of other snacks available during the entire flight. Entertainment on board was good- a lot of newer movies available.

There are options for this route now - China Southern being the most popular it sounds like. I think there are ways through Kunming too, but these are likely 2-stop. I flew Premium Economy YVR-HKG, and business HKG-DAC. The price was just over $#K CAD which I though was pretty good; gives you lounge access throughout becasue of the business...
Good quality carrier, reliable, efficient, on time, reasonably good service although FA's can be a bit off-handed

A very big thank you to Edith, Kevin and the rest of the cabin crew who were very professional and calm when a medical problem with another passenger occurred on board the aircraft.
In-flight service was swift. Good hot food. A full aircraft with customers of varying ages, including babies. The cabin crew worked extremely hard. I fly worldwide and...

I flew Cathay Pacific from Newark to Bangkok with a layover in Hong Kong. The flight was comfortable and the premium economy seats and service were excellent. Overall if you have a long haul flight in mind Cathay Pacific is a top choice.

They were nice enough to upgrade me to premium economy from economy and what difference. The service and food was great, as a one world emerald I had multiple crew members come by and welcome me and let me know if there was anything I needed to let them know, really nice touch.

标题: Good service for a long journey
内容: My wife and I every time the we travel to Asia we used Cathay they provide an impeccable customer service to all the customer that flyer with them ?
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Service does not live up to Advertising
内容:
Took Cathay Pacific return Toronto to Hong Kong for two reasons: 1) convenient departure and arrival times 2) the purported quality of service, unfortunately service was rather poor and did not live up to their advertising.
Cathay Pacific states:From local favourites to international dishes, you will enjoy a variety of cuisines when you fly with us in Economy.and Enjoy an...

Check in was quick and efficient and it was a direct flight to Hong Kong about 13 hours. Plenty of leg room, air crew tried to make us feel comfortable but there were limitations. Drinks were in ample supply.
The food was ATROCIOUS but there was no choice at about 4, ft. If there was a feedback requested I would...

标题: Beware of short connections offered by Cathay at a premium fare. No commitment to deliver even when the fault is theirs
内容: My last trip with Cathay Pacific was a complete disaster. I had booked Cathay Pacific for my trip from Vancouver to Chennai on14th Nov at a premium fare as it had the shortest travel time of 21.5 hours with a 2 hour connection in Hong Kong and I strongly believed in their service , commitment and delivery. I ended up...

标题: Very pleasant staff and lovely food
内容: Flew from Hong Kong to Bangkok in October.Extremely pleasant crew.Good hot food.Very comfortable seats and plenty of room.

I travelled with Cathay AMS-HKG-MEL and SYD-HKG-CDG. The carrier offers very good on-board service, tasty meal and wide choice of drinks. All flights were on time so that we couldn't complain about anything.
check in was good. seats and cabin was average. entertainment was average. I have flown with better air lines

标题: Onboard service was not as efficient as advertised
内容: Welcoming glass of wine had to be consumed very quickly as she was collecting the glasses. Evening meal loaded in New York was not edible as the fish smelt spoilt, rice was very dry and vegetables were steamed beyond having any flavour. One glass of wine with the meal. No water or fluids prior to arrival.

A good flight with Cathay is to be expected for it is on par with SQ and other leading airlines.
We had flown from Surabaya, transit in HK and then fly with Dragonair to Shanghai.
Interestingly there is very little difference in the meal quality between Cathay and Dragonair. Both served Haagen Dasz and both also served bad coffee.

Cathay Airlines serves excellent food, selection of entertainment and hire excellent flight attendants. On my flight from Hong Kong to LAX, flight attendant, Albert Lo always maintained a very professional and friendly demeanor, had a smile on his face and was very patient to help both customers as well as other crew members. While he was pushing the drink and...

标题: The most outstanding coordination in service you can expect from any provider!
内容: I landed 5am this morning at HKIA to receive a pleasant surprise - upgrade award certificates hand delivered by Frankie. This was followed by a prompt upgrade by Mika Mak at the service counter near gate 21 for my connecting flight to Chicago. You have managed to arrange all this within a short span of 8 days and with superb...

Flying to Hangzhou is an alternative to Shanghai if your working outside of the city or in a nearby City.
Relatively quiet airport. Prompt customs and passport.

My wife and are due to fly to Ho Chi Minh City on Christmas Eve. We booked our flights months ago but have now been advised our seats have been down graded to economy by our travel agent Expedia. Cathay Pacific refuse to refund the extra money (about ￡5 ) and are offering us a voucher for future travel. What...

标题: Good flight service, great seats, quality leg room
内容: First time flying with Cathay, check in was really good with on line check in available, really makes a difference. Seats were comfortable and leg room was excellent, both my husband and myself are tall and we had no complaints. Cabin service was customer focused and the food was pretty good. We also flew return to Brisbane via Hanoi and...

CP used to be one of my go to airlines when I travel across Asia. I would pay extra for service and comfort. This flight was mixed. The B777 is getting a bit old. No WiFi, got to wait for A35 ie Newark. On outbound flight the cabinet in the bathroom was broken and the crew tried to cellophane tape...

Very well organised airline, no issues at all during check in, the flight or arrival. Decent entertainment system, food was on the better end for economy, and a quick transfer was managed very efficiently with a team member waiting at the gate to escort me and other travellers with the same connection through the airport, using the staff security line...

标题: Flew CP from london to Aukland via HK return
内容: London to Hong Kong uneventfull nice smooth flight; the layout was trully very comfortable and managed a good nights sleep; service was up to Cathay Pacific standards spent 2 days in hong kong sight seeing before flying on to Aukland the flight was fairly bumpy ( not that unusual but none the less noticeable as it disturbs sleep patterns) the...

标题: The Friendly VERY Expensive Airline. One World Group.
内容:
Cathay Pacific: Bali Denpasar/Indonesia - Hong Kong/China - 9/8/217 (business class) Flight No CX784
Good flight, good pilots and excellent service from the crew.
Only this Airline is to expensive for what you get.
Business launch: Poor food, very poor WiFi, ok service, ok seating, should have a smoking area.
Pre-boarding: Good
On Time: Yes
Food on board: very good...

My wife and I travel to BOS quite often and have used JAL in the past. We decided to try this airline as we are not keen on NRT conditions. Trouble for us began with the "hike" from the lounge to the gate which I estimate was about 1 mile in length. Boarding conditions were good although late. Once on...

A good smooth flight with on time departure out of AKL, and into HKG. The new dreamliner is so quiet. Good food served for the two main meals and larger than Air NZ serves on the same route.
The only issue I would mention is that the in-flight entertainment doesn't offer so much music or movies for westerners.
Great plane. Great service . So much space. Great movie choice. Love so much ro fly with cathay. They are an exemple of an airline who knows how to treat their customers!

I was quite disappointed with this airline.. I think they are new to premium economy. Happy to take the extra money but I don’t think they want to provide level of service that I gave see from other airlines in this class.
My big irritation was there was no toilet in the premium cabin. The stewardesses were very snotty about...

London Heathrow to Hong Kong Boeing 777
Long flight good comfy Seat good leg room. was lucky middle seat was empty.
Good Food
Good Drinks nice large glass of Wine with Dinner
Good entertainment large screens USB port too
Hong Kong Melbourne Airbus A35 great plane good seat size one negative the setback pocket has no backing so every time...

Going out from Manchester was good, food was OK and service was excellent. The lounges in Hong Kong for Cathay are fantastic - there are 5 lounges in HK that all belong to Cathay. The service and showers, views etc where brilliant. The food is a bit middle of the round, but its well presented - just not a huge...
