标题: Don't be afraid to ask for what you want.
内容: I found the service overall on my 4 flights on Cathay Pacific to be adequate but a bit underwhelming. The crew on this flight was extra good, but I also found overall they were very accommodating to any requests (like an extra glass of water or wine) but you had to ask versus being offered.

I just can't believe they don't offer free wi-fi (or paid) on international flights, especially ones this long. They do have a decent movie selection though. They offered a dinner and breakfast, both decent meals but kind of oddly timed. Dinner was right when we got on and breakfast was 2 hours before we landed, at 9:3pm in new york.

标题: Good Return Flight, Average Handling of the Late Arrival to Bangkok
内容: Cathay Pacific usually is a good airline, but this time the handling of the late arrival to Bangkok, was not that well handled by the ground staff before boarding. As the flight is near full, all the passengers, except for business class, premium class, and FFflyer card holders, were forced to stand in a line so close to the toilets,...

The whole experience with this flight is awesome from the moment of check-in at the airport till arrival in Bangkok. Had a wonderful and very courteous check-in staff, who not only did a superb job to issue the boarding pass in 3 minutes, as well was able to change with the seat as requested. The flight went on time, arrived...

Have flown this route several times over the last few years with BA (via London). Now that Cathay have a direct Manchester to Hong Kong flight decided to try this as cutting out any change stops has to be a good thing. We boarded the A35 with a degree of priority for Premium Economy, the cabin is a small area...

标题: reasonable airline UNTIL something goes wrong
内容: Our travel agent talked us into paying a lot extra for EXIT seats in economy for more leg room. The flight left late, but we made our connecting flight in Hong Kong on time, but our luggage was NOT transferred. We had to wait eleven hours to resume our trip to London. We were NOT given EXIT seats we paid...

Flying for twelve hours is not what I would call a great experience. However, Cathay makes it more comfortable and relaxing. The service is spectacular, and the in-flight dining is delicious (for plane food!) The Business Class seats are spacious and can be adjusted with a panel of buttons.

original aircraft was a A33K, config on J was 1-2-1, a month ago they changed it to a regional A33P, J changed to 2-2-2, cramped, no leg rest space, hated it, though the service was nice and meal was served promptly, yet CX has a long way to go when comparing to other J classes for eg. the middle east...

My flight was cancelled due to China air traffic control but we were given no information from CP staff. This happened 3days in a row. After spending all day in the airport having been given $75 voucher we were provided with overnight accommodation at which we arrived at 1am. Second day repeat of day1. Third day I was forced to...

I booked with Cathay from London to Australia a return flight flying our family of two adults and three children ages 11, 1 and 7.
The meals were decent, we even got a choice and the kids got given children's meals as requested before flying. We got given drinks when requested and snacks where available throughout the flight.
Flight attendants...

Cathay have such a great business class, it feels like first!
Comfy seat which becomes an amazing bed, duvet not a blanket. The bed is designed so it has a wider bit to fit your shoulders when you lie down, clever idea!
The crew are so friendly and service is excellent. The food was fantastic, as were all the drinks...

标题: Not as good as they used nto be
内容: I used to use Cathay in the past (over 1 years ago) and they were WOW. I used them again this time from Zurich to Hong Kong and back, plus HKG to Singapore and back and their level of service was average. The seat was great in terms of privacy, especially the window seats on Business class. Yet I tried...

标题: Cathay Quality is High in Economy, Premium, Business or First
内容: Flew on CX89 from Hong Kong to Newark, NJ. Was upgraded (randomly, I do not have any status) to the premium economy cabin. The cabin seats are arranged in a 2-4-2 pattern and I was given an aisle seat on the left side of the plane in the last row of the cabin. I was able to sleep a full...

Worst flight I have had in years. The plane was an Airbus (3 I think) with narrow seats that were as uncomfortable as any I have experienced during my 3 plus years of international long haul flights.
Could not be tempted by anything on the dinner menu but decided to try the omelet that was on the breakfast menu. When...
The service from the cabin crew members were all very polite. The food was edible but not the best. However, some of the in-flight seat TV screens did not work.

标题: Vietnam Adventure - Cathay Business class long haul with Cathay Dragon (separate review) connections in Asia.
内容: As it happens I flew on Cathay, and experienced the 1st generation lie-flat Business Class on my last trip to Asia in 29. The current product is a big improvement. The herringbone layout is 1-2-1 and on both long-haul flights I was in a center section D seat. The seats are quite spacious and the ‘shell’ of the seat provides...

This was the return trip and I found this flight way better than than the previous. The service was very good and the food was better. Meals Dinner and Breakfast. Very comfortable seats with good leg room. Plane was about 8% full. The plane was a Boeing 777-3ER.

After hearing how good Cathay is I was disappointed. The service was average and the food was also average for a 5star airline maybe having lunch at 4.3pm may have been the problem. The plane a Boeing 777-3ER was comfortable.

Apart from the first class service recieved by the crew, the downside of this trip was that it left at 1:AM To us old folks nearly hitting 8 it was too long a wait from morning to be picked up at 8:3PM by the shuttlebus for a flight that was to depart an hour after midnight. Will not do this...

This was my first time on Cathay Pacific and I was really excited about flying with them. My journey started at London Heathrow onboard CX238 on their B773 to Hong Kong, with a connection to my final destination Manila. The flight departed London around 18: in the evening 23/9/217. It was an 11 hour nonstop flight to Hong Kong. The...

I flew from Manchester, UK, to Hong Kong and then onto Manila, Philippines. The staff were very polite and friendly, the food tasted really nice and there was lots of entertainment to watch and listen to so it was hard to get bored.
The 2 down sides to Cathay was that they force you to close you window blinds for...

In my view one of the most professional outfits in the world. Ok the fleet isn’t all new but customer service, the lounges the airport in HK make it a great option. People living in the fat east only have too great options for me Singapore and Cathay. Just a shame they are in different airline alliances so if you...

My PA booked me on biz class since price is reasonable but slightly wasted on me since I am a good traveller and happy to fly premium economy especially on a day flight where sleeping is not really necessary. Anyway, food & wine is good but for some reason never really enjoyed CX biz class ( a bit too tight...

Hanoi to Hong Kong then a 13 hour flight from Hong Kong to Manchester.
I don't enjoy flying but i enjoyed my experience with Cathay Pacific.
The staff from the check in to the flight were all lovely! Food wasn't great in comparison to Etihad but added extras like bottled water, wet wipes, ice cream and small milk chocolate made...

Cathay Pacific flight was very pleasant. Seats were comfortable, plenty of leg room. Meal and flight entertainment were good but not good as Qantas.
Price is reasonable and Hong Kong airport is best transit option.

Excellent value combined to a high end service. Short stopover in Hongkong.
Good food, brand new A35 on the way back, excellent entertainment system.
I just miss the landings on Tristars at Kai Tak, but that is history!

The aircraft and inflight facilities were okay. In fact, kind of outdated.
But everything felt clean. Toilets were moderately cleaned during the flights.
What I felt awesome about Cathay Pacific was the inflight service.
By all mean, they have awesome cabin team.
Friendly was a very obvious attitude they showed. But most importantly, they were all very attentive to our...

To me, friendly and helpful staff compensate for a lot of other short-comings. Cathay Pacific staff at all stages of the journey were of the highest quality, with friendliness, courtesy and smiles by the truck load.
The Business Class lounge at Heathrow is a bit tired, but everything works well, and the staff were very welcoming. The selection of food...

Cathay Pacific another classy Airline to fly with. The Cabin Crew were extremely well trained, very polite and sweet natured. The food choices were western or Asian in preparation and very well presented and did I mention delicious yes delicious and very yummy. the seat configuration was OK for those wanting privacy but when you fly with your partner you...

标题: Wonderful experience with an excellent Airline
内容:
The ease of flying with Cathay never ceases to amaze me. We used the free government shuttle bus to collect us from our Hotel (Grand Harborside Kowloon) to take us to the express train station for the trip to Hong Kong Airport.
When we arrived at the Kowloon Station we were able to do our check-in there and have our...

It was a good flight; decent leg room, food, amenities... but I rate them 5 stars because of their customer services team on the phone. We had a problem with our visa for China and they were incredibly helpful and nice over the phone, and most importantly, they helped us to rearrange our itinerary. Thank you!

Unfortunately not upgraded to Premium Economy this time around.
Economy on Cathay Pacific is pretty much like Economy on every other mid range airline. Not a huge amount for not a huge amount of $$$$.
The food is average airline food and the range of drinks very limited. No fish dish offered at dinner so that was a genuine bonus....

标题: PREMIUM ECONOMY IS BEST DEAL FOR DAY FLIGHT TO HKG
内容: The flight from JNB to HKG is a day flight leaving 12:3 pm and is a fairly long flight of 12.5 hours ( more or less ). The meals are lunch and breakfast and quite OK for airline food! Wine was naturally nd was well chosen. Basically limited sleeping due to day time flying and really do not see the...

Comfort and Hi-Tech AirbusA35-9. Acceptable legroom and seat was comfort. The monitor was clear and function well for touch screen control.FA services was acceptable. The most remarkable services was served hot food despite that was a simple rice box. It was wonderful compared to EVA served cold food in the same route.

Flew 4 segments (TLV-HKG-PER 12-13/1/17 + MEL-HKG-TLV 8-9/11/217), mostly with 35-9 planes. Spotless service in flight even though upon return (HKG-TLV) a little bit disorganized during both meals. Toilette could have used better tidiness and improved dimensions as it is rather very small cell. Food quality and booths perfect. Service crew smiley and sympathetic. All segments departed and arrived ahead...
Cathay Pacific seem to do hospitality very well. Have always been impressed with the lack of fuss and calm approach.

标题: For International Flights To The Far East, Don't Pass This One Up!
内容: I fly with Cathay Pacific often. Returning with my business associate November 1st, 217 from Bangkok, Thailand, we missed our connecting flight in the States from Los Angeles. Not a problem with Cathay Pacific, they gave us a $2. dinner voucher each and business class non-stop tickets to Spokane International that left a few hours later.

标题: Good legroom, in-flight entertainment was good except for poor quality headphones.
内容: Had a good enough experience with Cathay Pacific not it's affiliate airline Cathay Dragon to give it 4 stars, good legroom, in flight entertainment was good except for headphones, food and beverage was ok as well so not a lot to say about this airlines other than please take your own headphones other than using the one in the plane.

Service for check-in luggage at HK Air Express Terminal was good, efficient and the staff was courteous and friendly. I and my wife enjoyed the entire 3 hours+ flight. Food offered was satisfactory though couldn't say it was good. Front line air attendants were working hard and their performances were ok. The only draw-up was on-line checking, both in HK...

标题: Frigid aircraft interior cabin temperature, multiple CX flights
内容:
In October and November of 217, a few of the recent flights were on CX from Hong Kong to (1) Perth-Australia and (2) London-Heathrow.
When the airplane is at 35, feet or higher, the outside air temperature is -4C or colder. Various CX personnel have repeatedly stated the aircraft interior cabin temperature range is maintained between +2-24C, which is a...

We travelled From Bangalore to Hongkong on 23rd November
Friends I sincerely suggest you please don't ever try this flight please choose another carriers .
As per my knowledge this flight maybe very older and poor technology it doesn't meet any International Standards Supporting staff are very arrogant legroom and seating is pathetic Air conditions are very poor, food served...

As an avid international flyer, this was our first time on Cathay Pacific and I can say it should be rated as one of the number one airlines. It was definitely number one of the many airlines and sky lounges we have used. Service and food as well as amenities were so good that we wanted flight time to be...

标题: Good Legroom for a cheap price!
内容:
Cathay Pacific offers the cheapest rate from Dubai to Bahrain. It's the most cost effective option if you're not concerned about the time of the flight which is always early morning.
Good legroom in the economy class. The food needs some attention as the juice is always warm, and the peanuts always tastes like plastic peanuts.

标题: The more you fly Cathay, the more headaches you will have
内容: I was on Cathay’s flight CX734 flight from Singapore to Hong Kong on 8th of November. It was scheduled arrival Hong Kong at 8:25pm and I was scheduled for Macau ferry at 9: pm. Unfortunately, we were wait for boarding in Singapore for 4 minutes until 4:3pm (original boarding time was 3:5 pm). We arrived in Hong Kong around 9:...
Kelly. And her staff. Exhale the As always as a 15 hour flight. Excellent makes the flight go buy much better

My first flight to China for business was booked by a vendor hosting my business trip. I flew business class on Cathay Pacific from SFO to HKG in October 217. Departure flight # CX 873. The check-in process was very easy with bag drop off and check-in at the airport smooth and literally no wait time to be attended by...
Cathay Pacific has always provided the best service at competitive prices. We have also used Dragonair Z(A Cathay company) while flying in Asia

Took the 777-3ER. Seats were comfortable and spacious but a wee bit uncomfortable in bed mode. Entertainment channels were not as extensive as SQ's but service was very good. I liked how carry on luggage is stored by the side and not overhead. Food was decent but not a fair comparison as it was breakfast.

标题: Great over night flight, well looked after
内容: The aircraft was comfortable, the cabin crew were kind and attentive, the flight deck gave us a smooth flight and pre-warned when turbulence was likely early in the flight. We got the best sleep - 5 hours - that we have ever had on a long haul flight and the food was very tasty. Well done Cathy Pacific.

Normally i travelled with another Asian airline but the price is a lot higher. I found this airline thru Expedia and only half price for what I use to pay for. The check in at west palm from JetBlue was good but when I got to jfk airport a little confuse. I need to take a train to go another...

I was nervous about such a long flight in economy but the Cathay premium economy cabin was very comfortable and service was excellent. Arrived in Hong Kong ready for the next leg of the journey to Melbourne suitably refreshed and relaxed, excellent

I have entitled it just like home because of the good food. The stewardess were very kind and very accommodating. The home entertainment is just like home with good selections of movies, TV Shows and music. Though it was a long haul trip, I enjoyed and was very comfortable inside the confines of the plane.
Overall it was a good experience,food was average and staff were under pressure to cope. Flight was on time and very smooth,connections at Hong Kong were made.

标题: comfortable seats but bad cold food
内容: Service and seats were comfortable but the food was bad. They served something like curry pork roll and it was cold. My 8 years old daughter can't eat curry and we haven't requested for kids meal. I don't think it would be anything good for kids provided adults were serving with this weird thing.
I have been flying from Hong Kong to USA with Cathay and love their lounge in Hong Kong and in San francisco. Lost of food and drinks and nice to relax before flying long haul.

标题: Best of the Ecomomy class,so far
内容: Altogether a pleasant trip via Hong Kong with sufficient leg room but could do with the integral sliding seat rather than the tilt back,very hard working on board service. A few minor negatives with no overheadlockers above my seat 7G (due to aircraft type) but managed to fit my carry on, amongst in my view, some very oversized cases. Althougth,...

Flight CX257 6/11/17 9.4
My husband and his sister along with me were travelling back to the UK from HK.
We were very upset that a family member was dying and was given less than 24 hours to live. We needed to be off the aircraft ASAP after landing and having mentioned this to the one of the hostesses,we were...

标题: Excellent service and on time / ahead of schedule too.
内容:
Cathay were great all the way - Brisbane to HK to Beijing/ Shanghai to HK( Cathay Dragon) and HK to Brisbane.
They were very conscious of being on time and actually made up for a15 min delay by getting us to the terminal 1 mins earlier than schedule.
Service was very friendly and attentive even in economy - they never...

- Great entertainment choices from the latest movies to playing games in your seat.
- It is hard to sleep in the aircraft, seats are not that comfortable.
- Food was great except for our flight heading from HK to Singapore where they serve snacks instead of a full meal.
Would definitely recommend to people who wants to be entertained...

标题: Some old planes still being used on this route
内容:
I always feel a bit cheated, when you pay up for business class and end up in an old plan which seats are more "premium economy class" than business class. Also the plane interior seemed very old and dirty. The service on board from the attendants was great.
The food out of Hong Kong was alright and far better on...

My wife and I had the pleasure of travelling business class with Cathay Pacific in September/October 217. We travelled from Perth to Hong Kong and then to Boston; our return was from San Francisco to Hong Kong and then to Perth. Our flights were CX17, CX812,CX873 and CX171. We found the service from Cathay throughout our journey was excellent. This...

Arrived at Adelaide Airport after checking in online 48 hours previously and found we had to print off our own luggage labels? and affix them to our cases, not sure why as there were far more staff than usual showing customers what to do, the flight service was lacking and I now know why Cathay has lost a lot of...

A recent work trip to Hong Kong and Dubai saw me doing 4 flights in a week to Dubai via Hong Kong.
The service from the Cathay crew was very nice, smooth and efficient.
The food, I enjoyed breakfast, lunch and dinner on all my flights was fresh and enjoyable.
The A33 business seats were comfortable although a touch narrow...

标题: Get in line early if economy
内容: Our flight was delayed about 3 minutes but overall went smoothly. Cathay Pacific doesn't have boarding classes so if you want to get on early or have a lot of carryon stuff, I'd get in the economy line early.

Flights themselves were quite enjoyable, and the laydown seats in business class were quite adequate. Flights are long sectors from Perth to Hong Kong with an 8 1/2 hour transit before the Hong Kong to Los Angeles sector.
Quality of service on the flights was excellent and faultless.
Staff were very accommodating, professional and courteous and could not find fault...

the flight from manila to london, with a stop-over at hk, was on time. upon arrival at london, i found out that my luggage was destroyed. It had a missing wheel, which as of the moment, they are having repaired. the flight back to manila from hk was on time, but from hk, it was delayed by an hour

CX26 4 Nov 217 I thought the crew EZRA was cold and not service oriented but I realised later that it was the extend of her skill set. She had watched me polish off one small sauce of peanuts but proceeded to remove it without offering another one that she was already holding. Her invitation to meal was mechanical -...

We were fortunate to fly with Cathay Pacific on our recent trip to Hong Kong & Bali. This airline was excellent value for money with courteous and helpful staff. We would certainly fly with this airline in the future.

Service level: pleasant.
Check in to baggage claim: smooth.
Seat and cabin:
The journey was 2 leg: from Jkt to Hk, then Hk to Van.
Jkt to Hk Business class is very average since it was for short haul.
Hk to Van is very nice.
Liked best: consistent service
Liked least: business class from Jkt-Hk and vice versa. And the...

Consistent superior service with this flagship carrier of the Oneworld airline group. Service starts at the superior Business class lounges at HKG airport, followed by excellent in flight service, both food and entertainment. Have flown this airline for over 3 years now, and consistently ranks as one of the very best.

Last year I flew Cathay Pacific to Hong Kong and it was great. This year I flew to Da Nang Vietnam and was not that great. Still better then some of the American airlines but the food was terrible in both of the directions and the over all experience was almost average. Maybe it was flying through LAX that made...

Check in and boarding early afternoon was excellent however once on board the problems started. Staff attention was saddly lacking and the food was average. The desert was so frozen it could not be penetrated with a knife. The requested replacement was exactly the same. This was an afternoon flight. By 7p.m. the staff had closed the cabin down, dimmed...

标题: Premium economy - more like economy at a premium price.
内容:
Premium economy - more like economy at a premium price.
The positive is that Cathay Pacific got us safely from Sydney to Hong Kong, Hong Kong to London and return. Plus a bit of extra room in premium economy, but you do pay for it.
The negatives.
3 out of 4 flights were delayed. (I guess not their fault but...

Suppose to leave at 2:3pm... pushed back to 5:3pm then 6:3pm. I asked about alternative options as this would miss my connection and was told no at ticketing... I would have to spend the night in Hong kong... then fly out late morning. When I checked kayak it seemed like there where other options. As the flight continues to get...

I travelled from Melbourne to Hong Kong and then Hong Kong to New Dehli two weeks ago and then back the following week. Out of the four flights that I was on, three of them did not leave on time. This was the first time I had flown this airline and will admit that even though the on time arrivals...

Premium economy is worth every single cent.
There is nearly a metre between us and the bulkhead so there's plenty of leg room.
Good options for your meal in premium economy. Admittedly one of those was a fish noodle thingy that was ‘fragrant’ shall we say.
Metal utensils are a nice touch.
Reasonable choices on the IFE.
Plane is older...

I was carrying with me my DSLR and lenses and also my laptops and my ipad so that I can take photos of the festivals. When I boarded my flight from Vancouver,...

Frankly a big disappointment. CX 382 from Zurich to HK doesn’t compare favorably with competition.
? are 2 generations old. ? is minuscule. Control system outdated. Food was so-so and as (industry)usual absolutely not what you looking for in a 12h flight. Wines list is tier 2 selection at best. The best amenity? The blanket! Really nice, but that was...

标题: Very average airline, do not cater for allergies
内容:
Starting with check in at Gatwick this was very busy and long as they only had 2 desks open, one for business and club members and one for all economy travellers.
First flight on the leg was on a what seemed to be new plane. New entertainment system with lots of selections of films and tv. Food was very average...

Great flight - I actually fell asleep a number of times. Cathay Pacific have a good check-in and time-keeping record in my experience, but their food has gone down in quality recently, and it shows. Nevertheless as in a few other Asian airlines the service is generally above that of North American ones.

Left Adelaide on time...half the TV screens in Prem Econ stuck on Childs TV Channel (told comp glitch!)..if I NEVER hear Frozen again it will be tooo soon!!!...Food was shocking...Beef dish tough and inedible (told run out of other option)...Late into Hong Kong after circling in holding pattern for 45 min... which left us 2 mins to RUN from GATE...

Cathay Pacific is my most favorite airline to date! Their staff always have friendly faces and are always willing to assist and help. Serving Chinese people must be one of the most difficult jobs out there. In my opinion and these folks makes it look easy! I would highly recommend flying with CX. Wish the connecting flights from HKG to...

标题: The worst airline I have ever known
内容: What a horrendous experience I have had with this airline! I have never written a review for anything before, but I absolutely had to say something about this. My fiance and I had a flight scheduled a couple weeks in advance from the Philippines to Japan, but just days before the flight we found out my fiance's ticket was cancelled....

We had Premium Economy return flight from KUL to LAX via HKG recently and we loved the timing as it helped minimize jetlag! The flight itself was good, crew was excellent, the seats were great with enough leg room, entertainment was okay. The only thing that disappointed us was on our return flight from LAX to HKG, the rice that...

标题: Very fast late afternoon flight Osaka to Hong Kong
内容: My mother and I took the late afternoon 5:55 pm flight from Osaka Kansai to Hong Kong on Cathay Pacific. We were too early at the airport and had to sit at the check-in counter area waiting for check-in to open 3 hours before the flights. Once checked in, we were quickly sped through security and passport control as my...

I would like to highlight the boarding procedure which was really confusing. There were no clear instructions for boarding and queuing. Business class, Macro Polo Club Members, Economy class, and non-One World Members were all mixed up during boarding with no queue at all.
In flight service was also below satisfactory. In comparison and despite hardware differences, the service on...

内容: I was surprised after looking at reviews about cathays premium oconomy how disappointed I felt have travelled premium oconomy with qantas and by far a more cx799luxurious experience no extras received in Cathay meaning drinks and food as for Qantas got proper glasses with wine extra food and drink and were attended to just like business class even white table...
标签: Southeast Asia' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - Ho Chi Minh City

内容: I was not looking forward to the long flight with only one stop in Hong Kong for 2 hours to break it. Seats were comfortable and entertainment ok, but could have had more recent movies. Plenty of leg room and a smooth flight. Would have liked more offers of water throughout the trip as. My water had been confiscated. Staff...

While on holiday in Thailand, American Airlines cancelled a flight from Hong Kong to Los Angeles on my return itinerary. Initially I was given a 24 hour layover in Hong Kong after my incoming flight from Bangkok on Cathay Pacific. Problem was I lost my choice MCE aisle seat on the AA flight and placed in the middle of the...

Terrible customer service. My first flight was delayed meaning that i missed my connecting flight to the U.S. Resulting in myself losing a days pay from work. Firstly the way Cathy Pacific handled this inside the airport was horrific! Myself and a number of other unhappy customers were left waiting for hours with no word of what was going on,...

标题: Clueless staff without authority or tools to assist
内容: My flight involved several legs, so I had to book directly over the phone because the Cathay website could not meet my request. Prior to arriving at the airport, I tried to upgrade my flight to business class, but the website and phone agent could not process this request. I got to the airport and again requested to upgrade, and...

Seats are automatically pre-assigned once flight booking done after adding the FF number. Update profiling can help much to this on their website. Why don't they offer optional pay transfer service at their portal for both booking directly made at website or other sources ? Online check-in is smooth and same at airport. Baggage come out at usual speed upon...

标题: Good return flight from LAX to HKG
内容:
Just completed a second-leg return flight from LAX to HKG with Cathay Pacific. This was a pretty good flight, similar to past Transatlantic flights with this airline.
After a few hour layover at LAX, my flight departed on time. It arrived in HKG around 2 minutes area as well. Luggage made its way to the carousel after 15 minutes or...

标题: Flight Cancelled but Staff GREAT and helpful
内容: Our flight was first canceled (due to technical problems, it happens) and delayed for 24 h...a bit stressful for us as it was late and tired but staff tried their best to help and were kind. Managed to get back safe and sound. Good Service overall!

The plane was a 777series plane. Seats in economy class are 9 abreast. So if you opt for the window seat , you will have to get pass 2 persons to reach the ailse.
Other than that, the seats were comfortable and the inflight entertainment great.
Not a lot can be said of the served meal. In general most airlines...

标题: Terrible seats very poor food and service
内容:
Ive now learned not to read reviews written by those who have been paid by airlines to take a trip.
Cathays premium Economy seat is no great shakes. The seat is hard and very narrow especially on the A35 from Hong kong to LGW. I thought food was from the business class menu? I normally travel business class on other...

Booked flight on full service Cathay Pacific but transferred to Dragon Air without informing me as passenger. Dragon Air is a no frills subsidiary of Cathay Pacific. Shame on you Cathay Pacific for your unethical practice

A really pleasant flight, good food, good service, on time, can't
ask for anything more. Comfortable seats, food of good standard.

The actual seeting "pods" were huge and reasonably comfortable but isolated as I was only just able to touch tips of fingers with my husband next to me by leaning forwards and sprawling across the table. Conversation was thus very limited and when I started to vomit after lunch, he was unable to help me until he went all the...

标题: Cathay Pacific is a world class!
内容: I travelled to London via Hong Kong with Cathay Pacific, it was my first time with the airline and my experience was fantastic. They treated me like a king. I would use them again in the future. They are 5 times better than Malaysia Airlines. Although, I don't think they understand the concept of vegetarian only meals. I'm not a...

标题: Can’t touch it for the price
内容: I recently flew from LA to Taichung, Taiwan, then back to LA, with Cathay Pacific (the main flights were from LA to Hong Kong, and Hong Kong back to San Francisco, with connector flights from Hong Kong to Taichung and back provided by sister company Cathay Dragon, which I include here for simplicity). First off I’ll start off with the...

标题: “Bunch of extremely unpleasant or maybe racist cabin crew serving the Economy Class”
内容:
Before writing down my review, I would like to bring this to everyone's attention that this is my own experience and opinion towards this Airline Carrier which was shaped by what had transpired during my journey.
I am a Marco Polo member #1185259135 and i’m always traveling to India (My Native Place) via Cathay Pacific from Philippines (My Current Residence)....

We have been fortunate enough to travel Business Class internationally for the last 15yrs and have experienced this service from more than 8 different carriers. A recent return trip to NYC via HK allowed us to experience Cathay Business across 4 sectors. Overall our experience was poor and we will not fly with Cathay again. The seats offer limited comfort...
Cabin crew not the friendliest and not quick to respond to requests. It took them long to clean the cabin.

We were a family on a long trip to Australia for leisure, stopping over in Hong Kong.
This flight had been perfect, and on time, also the service on board friendly and polite. We were in business class, and the food as well the space available also very good.
In case i should do a trip, even for business, in...

标题: Nice biz class at affordable price
内容:
Grab the promotion of SGD588 per person.
Check in at biz class row at terminal 1, very fast check in. Welcome DNATA lounge was provided. Food and drinks in lounge is great. With freshly brew coffee too. Priority check in to the flight. Biz class and flight supervisors introduced themselves to me on the flight; great services. Seat on flight...
My first travel to Cathey was memorable. The cabin crew were friendly and food was nice. I would love to travel with Cathey in my future too.

We flew last week via Hong Kong to Adelaide in premium economy, the aircraft was very old and basic. The entertainment console was good, but no instructions how to use and safety cards and passenger instruction cards were missing in our seat back pockets.
We found the staff brusque, really not interested in interacting with passengers and a few raised...

I have moved my allegiance in airlines away from Delta and to Cathay. I made the move for a number of reasons but probably number 1 was the experience I had with Cathy flying intra Asia for so many years. I made a couple of trips on the 777 but had my first opportunity to fly the new Airbus A-35....

标题: 1st time on board Cathay Pacific to Seoul via Hongkong
内容: me and the wife’s trip to Korea, 12/1/217 (my birthday). this is my first time flying with Cathay Pacific. I usually fly with Singapore Airlines for International Routes. AUD $8 Return Flight to Seoul from Sydney ... A Bargain! I had 2 big luggage, 1 small luggage and 2 small plastic bundles, all less than 6kg (3kg per per passenger)...

Flying the hk-dub- hk sector - I preordered ASIAN Veg. In cost cutting measures they will even lose more passengers and loyalty than the amount they save on...

标题: As Always, One of the best to Asia
内容: Cathay is my go to airline to Hong Kong and beyond, and has been for many, many years. The combination of very attentive service, excellent food and an excellent hard product puts Cathay way, way above domestic carriers in business (as well as coach) classes, as well as in price. No lounge access. Seats were comfortable and food and service were good. Highly recommend this flight. Seats were better than JAL.

Boarding this Cathay Pacific Airlines from Beijing to Hong Kong on 21st October 217 @ CX347 - Boeing 777-2. Seating arrangement is 3-3-3.
Service by cabin crew is a bit too robotic without any smile. They just delivered their service and that's it nithing outstanding or special. On this flight, in my opinion, this is just not a 5 Star...

I cancelled a reservation on August 18th, 217 for a trip that was supposed to have taken place on October 13, 217. I paid several thousand dollars for these tickets. I booked this through Vayama who claims that they are still waiting for the funds to be transferred to Vayama before they will refund my credit card. This is an...

Not as new of an aircraft for this 5 hour flight, compared to my long haul cross Pacific experience. Was told they were running out of my first choice for food so was given only other option although food is tasty for airplane food...and Haagen Daz ice cream was a bonus! Good service. Flight slightly delayed but updated appropriately.

Overnight flight from Toronto and Hong Kong. On time. Pillow and blanket provided to all passengers. Two meals - supper first then breakfast, delicious as far as plane food goes...even included Haagen Daz ice cream! Plenty of entertainment options and good service. Only negative thing would be that height of seat back was too short for me (I'm 5'1) but...

A33...Seat 16A. Excellent service from Flight Attendants. Excellent food service...dinner and breakfast. Seat very comfortable. Typical excellent Cathay Pacific service.
Uses Lufthansa Business Class lounge at Dubai...very good and quiet.

It was my first visit to USA and I chose Cathay Pacific. I had a comfortable journey in this flight and yes I will recommend it to others. The crew were good and helpful. Only thing I dint enjoy much is the 13 hr journey from hongkong! It was tiring after about 9 to 1 hrs and I started to...

标题: Very good flight between HKG and LAX
内容:
I recently flew Cathay Pacific between Hong Kong and Los Angeles and was well satisfied with my flight.
Flight was originally booked online earlier in the year. Flight date change requested was handled quickly and well by customer service staff a couple months prior to actual flights. All updates and change details were provided through email confirmation in an expedient...

The first thing you want with a Premium Economy ticket is room. Cathay Pacific does not disappoint. With one less seat in each row across the cabin, the seats are wider, and you get a good 6 inches or so of extra leg room. Seats are comparable to domestic business class, and you can recline way back without bothering anyone...
Level of service and cabin comfort has improved from a few years ago. Staff are friendlier and more sincere than Qantas.

The service of the airline cathay pacific was beyond commendable.i would highly recommend this airline for travel in terms of leisure, comfort, customer service and cleanliness.
I want to make a review about the immigration department of Hong Kong. This was the first time me and my family (total 6 people) were travelling to Hong kong. We needed to fill...

I don't fly as much as other folks. But I have flown Cathay Pacific several times over 25 year period of time.Cathay Pacific now serves many airports in many countries around the world. So they are always seeking employees who can get the job done. I am noticing flyers observing a drop in customer service compared to past history. What...
Economy seating isn't the greatest when it comes to super long flights but over all, the service, the food, and even the restrooms are pretty decent.

It was a transfer flight and round trip. The first trip I was expecting good service due to all the good reviews. However, it was disappointing because the service wasn't that good.Plus, the seat facilities wasn't comfortable.
When I came back to SG from China, I took the flight again. This time round, I was surprised by the service, I...

This airline is horrible. Their site has major glitches making it impossible to check in online. And the food quality is horrible. I fly regularly internationally and thus airline is far below the rest. Avoid this ness of an airline.

Seats did not offer much legroom. Base of seat was short, so no good if you have long legs.
Quality and variety of food was excellent. Service was outstanding and we were made to feel welcome

标题: Perfect service and cabin though first leg delayed and luggage delayed on arrival
内容: Service, cabin (A35-9) and food perfect. First leg from Düsseldorf to Hongkong with severe delay. Transfer in Hongkong was smooth because Cathay has frequent flights from there to Taipei and I was booked on the next one going out. No luggage on the belt in Taipei. Strange enough - just 3min after checking in my hotel room the luggage was...

We flew on the newish A35 from Auckland to Hong Kong.
Absolutely loved the reverse herring bone seats . We were in the second business class cabin that seated only 6 passengers .
The seats were very comfortable and very private so no one was overlooking you .
To get the seat into a bed was very easy with a...

No complaints about the flight, but 2 things really irked me.
(a) I am a VERY senior citizen and when it came time to board, passengers rushed to the economy boarding area and the queue ended up being the full length of the departure hall. I was prepared to wait till people boarded, the the attendant insisted I go to...
flew auckland / frankfurt and then on to venice..................................awesome service great trouble free flight would go again.....................

it has become a routine. a routined delay!
short flights to hkg seem to be delayed all the time nowadays. something is definitely wrong. i don't want to say it but i think i know why!

You wouldn't think you were in Economy on this airline: the seats are wide and comfortable, the food and service is high in quality. Reminds me of the way air travel USED to be. I have been on flights with other carriers where I was treated as cargo, not a guest. Not so on Cathay.

When serving dinner we were offered a drink. At no time between dinner and breakfast did the cabin crew come round to offer anything else, this includes water. Cabin crew were conspicuous by their absence throughout the majority of the flight. We were offered water / juice just before breakfast - hardly satisfactory considering how dehydrating long flights are. The...

Cathy Pacific used to be well know about their services, especially their customer services. So sad to see that the overall services has been deteriorating after they changed the management!
I tried to call the Macro Polo Club to change my flight, they put me on hold for 5 minutes! I gave up. Call again and they asked me to...
Paid for Premium Economy - food is awfull !!! Cathay pacific charge premium for PE class, the dinner is worst than cafeteria.

When we arrived at the airport we were advised that our flight was delayed 45 minutes so they switched us to an earlier flight which had not left. This flight was delayed 6 hours!!! They would not switch us back to the original flight as our seats had already been sold on. We missed our connecting flight and had to...
First of 2 flights to get to New Zealand with a stop over in Hong Kong. Very comfortable and happy with the choice of movies available. Lord of the Rings was of course an option!

The flight boarding went smoothly and the plane took off on time. The seats were comfortable and the staff were friendly. It was probably the best plane food I have had being vegetarian sometimes it is very plain but the meal was tasty. The service was good, the movies were up to date. I would probably recommend adding a few...

Cathay Pacific Airways has always been one of my favorite airlines. My experience Cx884/4OCT from Hong Kong to Los Angeles added an entire new definition to service excellence. From the First Class Lounge in HKG to my arrival at LAX I felt like a pampered puppy. Purser and her team did a outstanding job of promoting the CX branding and...

After having ran the Chicago Marathon, it was just so lovely to have the chance to sleep comfortably on board the Cathay Pacific flight on our way back to Manila. The service is impeccable with Asian hospitality at its best.

We fly Cathay Pacific whenever we are flying to Europe or just to Hong Kong. Their business class is very comfortable and each seat has aisle access - just four across - unlike some airlines we have used which cram in eight across! The customer service is second to none and some other airlines could learn a lot from their...

标题: Who wants to eat dinner at 11:15 pm HK time ( 1:15am Australian time ) on a seven hour flight ????
内容:
One would think that when a flight departs 9:2pm for a seven hour trip, it would be appropriate to let passengers get some rest rather than serving meals when most people would have eaten earlier.
Cabin lights were not extinguished until 11:45pm ( 1:45am Australian time ).
At least prior to arrival in Cairns cabin lights were left dimmed and...
Like the Cathay Lounge in Bangkok especially the Noodle Bar. There are a number of favs like Pad Thai, Tom Yum and some Hong Kong style Wonton Noodle Soup.

Arrived at LGW for my return trip to Melbourne to be advised that flight was really busy and asked whether we would consider alternative flight from Heathrow. Bearing in mind travel distance, traffic on M25 and departure of flight declined this offer. Only to be told 3 minutes later that we were unable to travel at all. Having booked premium...

I think this must be the airline that air crew use to travel when they go on holidays.
Lets run the no's
1. Service "A"+
2. Presentation "A"+
3. Genuine Deportment "A"++
4. Can do Attitude "A" ++++
5. Friendliness " Infinity and beyond"!!!!!!
Keep doing this and there will be no other airline left to compete.
NB. I didn't...

标题: Used to be fantastic, now on par with the rest
内容:
After living in Hong Kong for a long time (as a frequent flyer) I used to really love Cathay Pacific. The planes were always clean, the crew were really attentive and you didn't mind paying that little bit extra to get this great service.
We moved to the UK in 215 and now only fly back to HK only two...

We recently travelled to and from London in Premium Economy. We both felt it was a great waste of money. The seats are a little wider and you do have a little more leg room but it's certainly not worth double the fare. We expected the seats to be more comfortable than economy and better for sleeping. My husband couldn't...

标题: You forgot what good service is.....its Cathay Pacific
内容: I fly back and forth 4 -5 times a year from HKG to NYC or BOS. Using US airlines and trying to get miles is fruitless. Take Cathay and love flying again. VERY friendly flight attendants that help you with everything. Not old crabby ones. Seats are very comfortable and recline more than other airlines. A menu to chose your...

Check in was easy and the food was great with self serve snacks available through the flight. We were travelling with an infant and the attendants were very attentive and helpful which was great. We could stand in the bassinet seat area plus the emergency exit area to stand with the baby. The toilets were more spacious than other flights.

Check in was easy and the food was great although it was served at 6 hours into the 8 hour flight. We were travelling with an infant and the attendants were very attentive and helpful which was great. Whilst we had the bassinet seat it was quite cramped and we couldn't stand up in front of our seats and there...

We booked with Flight Centre on Cathay Pacific for four people to the UK. Not long after we made the booking Cathay decide to move our return flight with Qantas and took over the booking. My elderly mother in law has to look after herself apparently on the flight home to Cairns, while we travel direct to Brisbane. On the...

You can make online check in 48 hours before flight and pick up your seat also you can customize or make special request of flight meal. Even from the Jakarta after you do the online check in you still need go to Cathay counter in Airport. It's different when you make online check in in Hong Kong, you will get...

Return trip from HKG, very good experience.
Seat: private and comfortable Not suprisingly, not as spacious as first A lot of functionality, good remote control but headphones could be better. Recommend picking window seats that stand alone if travelling solo. Bed comfort, good but a little cramped. Got some zzz on first leg.
Food: Above average quality. First leg of...
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'Hong Kong - New York City

标题: I'm not usually a moaner BUT....
内容: I paid an extra ￡5 per seat to travel with Cathay Pacific because I thought it was a much superior airline compared to Vietnam Airways. Nice comfortable planes. Had to transfer at Hong Kong. Everything OK except surprisingly disgusting food. I haven't had such bad in-flight meals ever before. Considering the length of the journey to Japan I thought the...

标题: Delayed, miserable service, overly loud repetitive announcements
内容:
Our flight was delayed by an hour and a half before we arrived at the airport. This was well communicated.
Boarding was a fiasco, there was no queuing system. Staff were late to arrive and unwilling / /unable to sort it out.
After board and additional hour long delay was announced.
Announcements during the flight were long and laboured. If...

Would give it a 1 if there was wifi on board. Otherwise the service was great, the bathrooms were clean-ish (can't expect too much on a 16 hour flight) and the seats were comfy. The flight took off on time and landed early. Nothing better than a drama/issue free journey.
标签: International' 'Business Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

标题: Great hard and soft airline products, recommend!
内容:
Excellent first class experience, highly recommended. Late night flight out of JFK direct to HKG, Cathay Pacific 777.
Check in about same as business class but later a CA rep shows up at AA Flagship lounge (separate review) and offers to escort me to my direct flight since my original flight through Vancouver delayed. Wow, not your every day experience....
标签: International' 'First Class' 'New York City - Hong Kong

内容:
Service is good and entertainment in flight is good. Wide range of inflight items to make purchase,
recommend on a long haul to Boston as I like to stop over at Hong Kong

We are very disappointed - we traveled as a family - 3 persons. On our way from TLV to HK we received three seats - nothing outstanding (47 D, E, G). On our way back from HK to TLV - we arrived at check in counter 4 hours before the flight and were informed that there is no three seats...

The flight was punctual n on time. The foods n service are good. The cabin crew were nice n helpful. Despite air turbulence the pilot was calm n skilful. The plane is clean n pleasant flight. I would recommend to the average traveller for the safen pleasant trip with good cheap reasonable price

标题: Long Flight, but as Good as it gets
内容: What's not to like? Great service, good food and originally our first flight did not offer business class but the helpful check-in staff asked if we would like to leave on a flight 9 minutes earlier that had business class for no extra, so of course we did. Good customer service all round.

We had already flown Bangkok to Hong Kong on the 3rd October and the flight was okay. Today (5th October) we flew Hong Kong to Singapore on CX739 and it was brilliant. The crew were magnificent, a special thank you to Sean for his attentive service and for making us feel so relaxed and special.
P.s food was delicious

We have always flown CX and it has always been our first choice but after our recent experiences this is no longer the case.
Firstly, it is the fare. These days when air travel is no longer for a small handful who can afford to travel, we have a wider choice of airlines that offer same destinations at similar price...

标题: You get what you pay for
内容: I chose Cathay based on 2 things the seat and the price. I travel alone so don't want anyone anywhere near me. The seat suits me. The price is cheaper than ANZ or Emirates. Ofcourse I would much rather travel with ANZ or Emirates but they are far more expensive. I usually take some food with me and I'm glad...

I was travelling with my family, including our little kids. We were on flight CX 841 departing June 16, connecting to CX 797. On-board service was excellent. Flight attendants went all the way to ensure our safety and comfort. When we landed in Jakarta, apparently our baby pushchair was broken, but Cathay Indonesia handled the issue very well, even though...
Excellent crew, service and inflight entertainment. But often overbooked during peak season. Be prepared to check-in really early or accept a change to the next flight at no extra cost.

Flied from Hong Kong to Inchon, south korea. It was a very pleasant and comfortable journey for us. We pre booked the seats online. Seats were neat and comfortable with enough leg room. All the seats had a working charging plug.They had some latest movies in their collection. The meals served were hot & tasty. They had a good collection...

Just a fantastic flight. Staff so friendly and helpful, food beautiful, nothing too much trouble. Lovely pillows. Toilets very clean. Great comfy seats. Well worth the extra money for this class of service to fly

标题: New a35 gives top business class I've seen so far
内容: The new business class on the Cathay Pacific A35-9 was a slight improvement to the already great current design on other Cathay Pacific planes but had some room to improve. The day started off with check-in at Hong Kong airport. We checked in at the train station at Kowloon where check-in counters were available. It was convenient and we did...
Cabin crew and service very good and the meals more than adequate. the lounge in Hong Kong is good but make sure you have the right one closest to your departure gate otherwise you have a long walk!

Flight was good, comfortable seats, The food was better than expected, The attendants were pleasant and quick. I know this airline has been around for ages, but this is the 1st time flying it. I would definitely use this airline again.

Been several years since traveled on Cathay Pacific. Pleasantly surprised by the service provided. Plane was not the latest series, but the service by aircrew made up for the lack of gimmicks. What was lacking? I couldn't charge my mobile because the USB provided was not compatible with the new style cables. (Gimmicky). What was positive? Aircrew handled difficult passengers...

First time with Cathay Pacific. We flew from Perth to Hong 19 July 217. The aircraft interior was old and dated. My recline mechanism was broken which meant i had to take off and land in the recline position. Cabin crew were made aware but it didn't seem to worry them other than they'd get annoyed each time they told...

标题: Not up to the standard of competitors
内容: We have become accustomed to higher standards as aircraft have improved over the years. It is disappointing if the standard of food does not meet expectations as was the case on this flight. Service could be improved as there were several omissions on the part of the cabin crew. Food was cold and I mean cold with the breakfast sausage...

We had travelled from Hong Kong to Toronto in 215 and we were not happy there was no service it was hot no water it was not good.
Well I an report that it has all changed we were given dinner breakfast and snacks and we had our fill of water .and good service good one Cathy Paciffic .

We have traveled from Perth to Hong Kong in 215 and it was not good understatement .
We complained to Cathay Paciffic and they gave us a credit but we couldn't travel in 216 so it expired. We sent an email this year as we were travelling in 217 and they replaced them .
Well we travelled in September and...

标题: Can see why they are in so much trouble
内容: On the flight I was reading how Cathay Pacific are in big debt trouble. After three two flights I can see why. They place their effort into premium economy and business class and very little into economy. The premium seats take up much of the plane. The legroom especially on the Dragon air flight is very poor. It was more...

I was on summer holiday from Ho Chi Minh city to Narita-Japan on June 2nd to June 12th. The reason that I decided to fly with Cathay Pacific on summer because the airlines was on promotion and the ticket was extremely cheap. So I decided to choose Cathay Pacific. My flight from Ho Chi Minh City to Hong Kong was...

Flew to and from Australia via Hong Kong on our way to Europe. Overall a disappointing experience, whilst the in-flight service had improved this time round, in fact a big improvement on my last trip with Cathway, the aircraft are old and not really configured to accommodate a premium economy class, in particular access to the toilets. This becomes critical...
Short 3 hour flight to Beijing on a pretty quiet plane. Service was a good standard as expected but the old plane IE system wasn't up to scratch. Seats were comfortable and slept well.

Reliably good
This covered two flights. On both the class was comfortable the food and the service good. This is certainly not class leading.

标题: Plesant Flight extremely nice staff and exceptional service
内容:
Was able to secure last seat in rear of Plane both directions from JFK to Hong Kong which was pleasant with the extra Room and vacant seat next to me. Close to rest Room as well.
Food was good and the nicest part was during the entire flight the staff would bring you food or drink on demand not just...

This was my first time to fly with Cathay Dragon and probably the last one. The aircraft was cold and when I asked for a blanket, I was told that they have only limited number of blankets and already distributed to other passangers. Guess what? I was freezing for another 3 hours until I get off in Hong Kong. I...

From the departure lounge in Chicago to the landing in Hong Kong, our business class flight experience was very good. The seats were a bit more comfortable than other airlines which is really required for such a long flight! The service was excellent. Food was good for airline food. Plenty of movies and entertainment on a nice big screen. I...

It's often between the 3 airlines coming to mind when travelling between Sydney and Hong Kong. CX has added advantage by flying non stop and offers wide choice of flying schedule per day.
Service wise, CX could be among the best and food on the better than average side. Onboard entertainment was also its stronger tool if you are lucky...

It was my first time doing a long haul flight with Cathay Pacific.
Unfortunately my experience with this airline was not a good one. The reason mainly is the lack of cabin service throughout the flight and attitude of flight attendants, particularly HKG-YVR leg.
We were given ONE (1) bottle of water for 12+hour flight plus during meals which was...

We normally fly Emirates but thought we would give premium economy a go with Cathay Pacific.
Never again! Paid nearly $9, and not worth it. Yes the seats have more room and a bar thing to put feet on, different pillow and blanket. The food and service is exactly the same as economy! The staff were never around - disappeared...

After flying eceonomy for the pazt eight years and bring frustrated by service and food. We decided to step it up this year and go premium economy.
Wow what a difference. Great food and drinks.
Seats are much more comfortable and wider so you can actually have a meal without having to time your mouthful of food with your neighbour....

We were a group of 5 flying back from Narita to HK yesterday. Only my sister is a MarcoPolo green card member. The waiting hall was crowded but since green member was also given priority to board the plane (right after first / business class & higher level of Marco Polo member), we checked the CX Marco Polo web page...

The airline has attentive staff and friendly service. My vegetarian meal was nice. Although it is not in the same ranks as the Middle East carriers, i still enjoyed the flight. The plane was clean and there was ample onscreen entertainment to keep me occupied.
I will happily fly with Cathay again!

标题: One of the best airlines in a while
内容:
As a frequent british airways traveller I was sceptical of trying cathay pacific as the price was so low and thought there must be a catch.
Blew British airways out the water on service and the plane was beautifully up to date with hundreds more options movie wise.
On board wifi was available on low price purchase but there wasn't...

标题: Twice technical difficulties, excellent cabin staff
内容:
Heathrow to Tokyo via HK business class.
Flight 1 Heathrow to HK- delay over 1h due to navigational technical difficulties, had to have revised flight plan sent over.
Flight 2 HK to Tokyo- delay sitting on plane for over 1.5h again technical difficulties, engineer on board, never did find out what the problem was!
Return flights OK, technical wise but...

I found them to be nice and helpful. I need a wheelchair to travel and they were quick to get me one and had someone stay with me. When I landed they had someone there with wheelchair to help me. The price was the lowest of any airline. The plane had able seating room and air staff was friendly.

Flew from Amsterdam to Manila (via Hong Kong) and 2 months later Manila to Amsterdam (via Hong Kong). I was very excited for the first flight. I'm a tall person but the seats were still spacious enough for me on this 11 hours flight. A few days earlier before the flight I checked online to see which TV shows and...

标题: Got Premium Economy and it was worth it
内容:
Roomy seats, good food, good service.
Although, you could say our trip was unfortunate, (We had to turn back to HK after an hour in the air due to technical difficulties and the flight ended up getting moved 5hours later) the airlines did their best to make up for it. The meals and snacks were filling and the flight attendants...

标题: Generally comfortable flight but with room for improvement
内容: Flight generally comfortable.Crew pleasant.Food good.Toilets pretty messy halfway through flight.No extra touches.My main concern was the food and beverage service.Cathay fly A35 on the Auckland - Hongkong route.There is a smaller front and middle economy cabin and a larger rear cabin.I was seated in the rear cabin.On both aisles there were only 2 attendants manning one trolley.The time taken to...

标题: Unable to sit together and poor service
内容:
1) unable to get seats together during online check-in 48 hrs before flight.
2) at airport at check in were provided seats on the opposite side of the plan 44j and 48b.
3) in the plane found 5 other couples/groups in the same situation. Some people managed swaps. I swapped to help a young couple but was unable to sit...

Not enough places to sit while waiting for your plane. No one tells you departures are from the second floor.
Airport is more interested in selling you something then having you get to your hate easily. Some gates have no seating at all.
Gate departures change gates with little notice. If using the airport for a connection flight the terminal...

Terrible Customer service. We had our carry luggage checked three times. Had to get up from our seats at the terminal to get in line so they could check our carry on luggage, passport and boarding pass for the third time. No one here seems to carry about the customer. Forget about getting someone to help.
Pick another airlines if...

标题: Food is a joke on flight & lounge will save you as an option
内容: With this class I expected good to excellent service. Maybe I'm a food addict however food is unexpectedly bad to my standard, some of them I just had a bite and gave up. So recommend that do not have any expectation on food and you would enjoy a better flight. Bed is just OK but not comfortable enough to put...

Recently travelled in September. It is a 9 hour flight from Brisbane to Hong Kong 1.5 hr stopover we had. Not something anyone looks forward to but perhaps dreaded by those who find it.. impossible, to sleep on an aircraft. Check-in was fairly efficient. The usual additional bag searches at the gate for flights departing. Boarding was efficient with first,...

I had never travelled with this airline before but will certainly do so in future. There were five of us, including a five year old and a three year old. Nothing was too much trouble through the booking process - aisle seats, two consecutive rows; the airline staff on board and at the airport could not have been more helpful....

I fly Cathay because they are a part of the one world alliance. I am not based out of Hong Kong so I do not get the opportunity to fly them. This particular flight was jam packed. We were late to leave because Hong Kong was so busy but we arrived early so I appreciated that. The staff was friendly...

标题: Long flight. No complaints except disappointed with limited choice of movies.
内容:
It is a seventeen hour flight from Hong Kong to New York. Not something anyone looks forward to but perhaps dreaded by those who find it hard, if not impossible, to sleep on an aircraft.
Check-in was fairly efficient. The usual additional bag searches at the gate for flights departing to USA. Boarding was efficient with first, business and premium...
标签: International' 'Premium Economy' 'Hong Kong - New York City

标题: Premium economy worth the extra coin
内容: Definately worth the extra coin. Extra baggage allowance. Priority boarding & disembarking. Recliner style seats with extra width and recline great. Choices on the menu were a selection from the business class menu. Bubbly or juice, plus hot towels upon being seated. We did Melbourne to Rome with a 3 day stopover in Hong Kong. On the Hong Kong to...

标题: Always best service and best comfort
内容: Have flown so many times to Tokyo for the past 24 months, Cathay Pacific always provide the best service, despite its higher than competitor cost. In a crowded airport like Hong Kong, the Cathay lounge is like no other. Even if its a bit crowded, their food choice are excellent. And while other Hong Kong based airlines uses a satellite...

Aircraft was very clean, flight was on time, and the whole boarding process was very organized. You even get a menu when you enter the plane! Food was great! And the flight attendants were always ready to help, always smiling :)
I will diffidently flight with Cathay Pacific again.

We had the choice of going to the BA or the Cathay lounge at terminal 3. Having been to the BA lounge before and not overly impressed with it, we decided to go to Cathays. Best decision! Fabulous service and food. Highly recommend the dim sum at the noodle bar, freshly cooked and delicious! Not a large lounge but we...

After the boarding completed, we were put on hold for some repair work for a hour. Eventually it was cancelled and everyone had to leave the airplane.
Cathay should have known that they had to make arrangements for estranged customers but they were understaff and unnecessary out customers under enormous stress.
I managed to get on the next available flight,...

标题: Dream Flight - that went so quickly
内容:
Left for Hong Kong on the 17th September via Cathay Pacific afternoon flight from Cairns.
The six hour flight was over before we knew it. Great on board service, entertainment selection and comfort.
Only down side is that we were a little warm and there are no more adjustable air vents at the seats.
Took the red eye and it was fine. Slept for the whole flight so can't comment on service, entertainment or food. Seats don't recline much.

Needed an urgent flight to the UK at short notice. I usually fly Emirates as a first choice, however they wanted NZD$7, to Manchester or Birmingham. Outrageous!!!
So booked Cathay & Swiss flights through Lufthansa.
Got on the Cathay flight in Auckland absolutely knackered after just 3 hours sleep in the past 48hrs hours. The crew made the loading so...

标题: Great Customer Service In A Difficult Situation
内容: On the day of my flight home, I was sent a text and email stating that my flight had been delayed. I began thinking this was very helpful, but then realised that this meant that I missed my connection (also with Cathay Pacific). I went online and found no information there and started to worry that I wouldn't get home....

The flight was on time all the way through including our transit in Hong Kong and the landings were very smooth! The in-flight entertainment was amazing with up to date movies and TV shows. We were very entertained for the whole journey and there was something for everyone. The only disappointment was the food, but then I am very fussy...

My flight was late in the evening and I was so tired. I really didn't expect much but the the chair was more comfortable than I expected the plane was clean and the hostess were very nice and accommodating to your request.

I've only flown with this airline a couple of times and I think its good.you pay a little bit more but, its worth it.
Great service and amenities.
Cabin pressure is good.seats recline abit even for economy class.entertainment and food is good too
Would recommend this airline.

标题: Amazing experience and first class staff and service
内容: Title says it all. Immaculate plane, excellent food and drink service, but the genuine kindness and care of staff wins hands down! Best airline we've ever flown!

Flown from Sydney to xian via Hong Kong and returned from Beijing and stopover in Hong Kong again for a tour into the heart of China. All flights were on-time. Services are up to standard, everything was smooth. However, don't select congee on board. I bought ticket from my agent is cheaper.

OK, after reviewing Norwegian Airlines, I'm glad to review Cathay Pacific. I decided to fly Cathay Pacific to visit my parents in Asia this year. I usually fly Singapore Airlines. Both Singapore and Cathay airlines are quite similar in some ways and different in a few ways. When you get to JFK, the terminal is quite easy to check in....

Sydney to gatwick good seating comfort, food awful, cabin crew more concerned with having a rest during the quiet parts of the flight and seemed annoyed if you asked for a coffee etc, on the flight back from heathrow to sydney totally different service from the crew- helpfull, polite etc, cramped uncomfortable seating for the 1 hour flight, food awful,...

标题: Not my favourite airline. Disorganised and disappointing in many ways.
内容: Our trip started badly with us being ferried by bus to the furthest reaches of Tullamarine airport, further out than budget airlines Tiger and Jetstar. Are Cathay Pacific (CP) saving money by tarmac boarding out in the back blocks? I should mention that Cathay Pacific (CP) flew around Typhoon Mawar in an effort to get us into Hong Kong (HK),...

标题: 21 years Marco Polo member and terrible service
内容: During check in I have asked for a window seat but was told flight is full and only middle seat available, even when checking in 2 hours in advance. I can't believe this, service no smile at all and after saying what is the point of being a loyal member the reply was nothing as you can see! From best...

Flights to and from Perth and Heathrow left and arrived on time bar one. Hong Kong to Perth left an hour late. These things happen but you expect to get some feedback. No reason was given either in Hong Kong or during the flight. It is little things like that which determine how you view an airline. Having travelled predominantly...
Am at the airport in Hong Kong since 2 this afternoon and flight further delayed. Been here for 1 hours No sign of any offer for food or accommodation . It's not my way of travel!!!

Flew Cathay Pacific business class from Singapore to Bangkok recently. Check-in is at terminal one. Lounge assigned was Dnata Lounge as Cathay Pacific currently do not have their own lounge in Changi International Airport. Being a paid lounge has its limitations. Food selection is limited. Internet speed is not great C download speed .97 mbps and upload speed of 1.7...

I fly Cathay because they are a part of the Oneworld Alliance. I'm not based out of Hong Kong so I don't get the opportunity to fly them often. This particular flight was jammed full. We were late to leave because HK was so busy but we arrived early so I appreciated that. The staff was friendly but mostly I...

With the new online check-in and baggage drop, check-in was a breeze. Usually, I will not finished the plane meal, as it's always tasted awful. But Cathay Pacific plane meal was nice and delicious that I finish it. The entertainment was good enough to keep me entertained throughout the short journey

标题: Lacklustre service as crew behave highly unionised
内容: Long flight. Bamba, the inflight manager with a very managerial voice, tried to be really nice in her greeting, but came across as a regimental sergeant major with the undertone of "will there be anything else, sir" and the very petite but immensely forgetful stewardess with the name "Paris" asked me six times what drink would I like, and then...

Well this was our last flight and again we decided to splash out and travel Business Class. I can't explain how nice it is not to have to worry about feeling uncomfortable on a flight and enjoying the whole experience. Looking forward to next January as we have booked Business Class once again.

I'm sorry to read the experience of some of the reviews but this was my 3rd flight in a row traveling Business Class as a treat with my wife and have nothing but respect and thanks for all of the staff and their attention to detail. Looking forward to the next one.

Second treat in Business class, I don't think I will ever try to do a long haul without going business class. The pure opulence of it is breathtaking. If you are luck to get a free upgrade then well done but I don't think I would risk long haul being an uncomfortable experience. You only live once. The only disappointing...

Well what can I say. This was the first of many surprises for my wife. We flew on our wedding anniversary to Hong Kong in business class and were treated like a king and queen. The attention to detail was fantastic and the menu to die for. Kim Chong inflight catering manager gave us a fantastic selection in his selection...

Would not fly again.
They seem to only care about their Cathay Pacific 'members' instead of all of the passengers who paid their hard earned money to fly. It was beyond ridiculous checking in as well as the option to upgrade. no one seemed to know the price of upgrading. Being 6'4...I had been trying to get upgraded to premium...

It was the forth time that I flew on CA. Encouraged by the first three experiences, I booked my extra long haul (BKK-HK-NYC-HK-BKK) flight having done it on ANA and UA earlier. I didn't regret doing it for, it was a great experience again.
The food was great. And as I had pre-ordered to suit my dietary restrictions, I was...

What got me to travel on business class was few years ago, I got an upgrade from premium economy to business at the check in. Words can't describe how grateful I was and how comfortable business class was. The space, the flat bed/seat, the service, the food, and, not forget to mention the business lounges. When I arrived home, I...

标题: Awful experience on CX 881 on 9/16/217 from LAX to HKG
内容: All passengers were brought from the terminal on a shuttle bus to a distant, outdoor gate to board the plane. This was not a fully built out gate but instead was essentially a covered outdoor ramp leading from the shuttle bus to the plane. Passengers were off loaded from the shuttle bus and then required to stand in line on...

Planes arrived and left on time , 81 leg room which was great, Food and drinks were served on departure and just before arrival. Only complaint was the long lay over at Hong Kong airport both ways . Never had any problems with Cathay

CX 7 from Bangkok to Hong Kong, one of my best flight!
Very nice crew, good IFE and nice breakfast, on airbus A33 which is a quiet plane.
Connecting to Seoul
Cathay Pacific : my preferred airline with Singapore SQ

As I mentioned in my previous review, the food is not great, definitely grab a bite at the Hong Kong Airport of that is your layover before flying out to Denpasar, Indonesia. Otherwise, flight was sufficient and included a meal and beverages.

We booked via Travelocity as a package deal to Bali. Of course we had a 4 hour layover until our next flight. The airline was as expected. They did feed you twice and offered beverages since it was a 13hr flight. Food was less than average so I would recommend eating beforehand, if possible. Otherwise, flight was good.

标题: How not to look after premium passengers.
内容: Love Cathay normally, grovelling nearly exclusively with the airline to Europe. But when o9ur flight was cancelled, due to a broken window in the plane, there was no notification prior, no one at the gate (as we transited) and no notification in the airport. Eventually we found a Cathay person 'hiding' at another gate who was very helpful, but what...

Hi, This is the second time that I have flown Economy Plus with Cathay, return to the UK, the first being in 214. The difference in the service compared with my flights in Aug-Sep 217 a vastly different, so i think it is necessary for me to comment. Firstly let me say that my wife and I are experienced traveler,s...

The plane on both flights had spacious seats and came with little luxuries like pillows and blankets. Very good for an economy seat. The staff were friendly and the flight was smooth. I am Gluten Free and the airline had no problem in providing me with both meals and snacks.

We had an excellent experience with Cathay Pacific. We missed our flight due to a time mix-up and were very anxious and upset. Cathay went over and above what was required to ensure we got on standby with no extra cost. they were very kind and helpful and turned an anxious start into a positive flying experience. The overall service...
